Summary: The location of this motel is fantastic if you‚Äôre visiting Disneyland. A brisk 10 minute walk and you‚Äôre at the front gate. There‚Äôs plenty of takeaway food options between this hotel and Disneyland for breakfast/dinner options.   The room itself is relatively dated - the water pressure isn‚Äôt great, the pillows are small and our room was very loud and bright as we were close to the main road. For a couple of nights though, it was certainly ok.   If possible, request a room at the back of the motel.
Room tip: Request a room at the back of the motel.
Manager Response: Dear Nathan, Thank you for joining us at Kings Inn Anaheim and taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay. We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland. We also appreciate hearing about the little things that would help to make your stay perfect as we are always looking to improve the guest experience. It would be great to welcome you back on future visits to the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The rom is adequate. The staff was very good. You won‚Äôt get sheets cleaned daily but you can get fresh towels. The bed is a bit firm.  The walk to Disneyland is about 20 mins. A bit tiring after a long day at the park.  Unless you‚Äôre staying adjacent to the park, it‚Äôs going to be a walk.
Manager Response: We love to see that you enjoyed your overall experience. Thank you so much for highlighting our amazing staff. They will be delighted to be recognized for their hard work. It was a joy to have you, and we hope to welcome you back again to Kings Inn Anaheim.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Only not so great thing was that I was in room 140 and facing a parking garage. Every 20 minutes or so, there'd be a car alarm going off. Luckily I had ear plugs so did get some rest. In addition, the walls are paper thin. If you have a talkative neighbor, not so great. Otherwise, good service, clean room, microwave available. Close enough to all the attractions.
Manager Response: It was a delight to have you as a guest with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. Guest satisfaction means everything to our team, so while we are happy you enjoyed so much of what we have to offer, we're sorry you dealt with some noise issues. It's always our recommendation to contact us during your stay so we have an opportunity to rectify the situation, as we are always more than willing to help in any way we can. On behalf of our entire team, we appreciate your compliments and hope you consider staying with us again for an even better experience.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The room was spacious and clean. The staff was friendly. They change towels and trash everyday. Would recommend if you visit Disneyland, it‚Äôs just a 15 minute walk from the parks. Visited in February 2023.
Manager Response: Dear Vincent, There are plenty of reasons to enjoy a visit to Kings Inn Anaheim, and we are thrilled to see that our hospitable staff and prime location were a few of yours. Thank you so much for the recommendation. Come back and visit us again anytime.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay!!! so close to Disneyland and surrounding restaurants, clean rooms, comfy beds, great litlle shop for snacks and knick knacks,  friendly fron't desk staff too. Very safe and we'll be back for sure!!
Manager Response: We‚Äôre delighted to hear about your recent experience with us! From our clean and comfortable accommodations to our friendly team and great amenities, we aim to create an enjoyable experience for our guests at Kings Inn Anaheim. Hopefully, you were able to take full advantage of the convenience our great location offers our team, and we appreciate you highlighting it to your fellow travelers. Thanks for your kind words, and please allow us another chance to serve you at our lovely property!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: It was clean and very close to Disneyland! Its about a 7 min walk . Staff was nice and check out was easy! Restaurants are very close! Will definitely stay there again! Beds are comfortable blankets are thin .
Manager Response: Dear Vicky, With stellar service and an unbeatable location near Disneyland, you can always expect to have a fantastic experience at Kings Inn Anaheim. The cherry on top is that you can get all of this and more at an affordable rate. Thank you so much for the review. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Our go to hotel when we go to Disneyland
Summary: Front desk staff was friendly and accommodating! Room was clean and location was convenient. I wish the pillows were bigger and more comfy but other than that everything was fantastic! Our go to hotel when we go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all the kind words, and we're thrilled to know that our friendly team members, as well as our clean accommodations, impressed you at Kings Inn Anaheim! Please come back and join us again at some point later down the road.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at many hotels on Harbor and also Katella. It's always a cost-cleanliness-walking distance calculation for us.  This one hits the cost and cleanliness marks perfectly, and since it is clean, quiet and inexpensive, we don't mind a little extra walking.  We have stayed farther away at fancier hotels and it wasn't worth it. We love that we can park right in front of our room usually and that it has hard floors instead of carpet. Also the mini fridge actually gets cold!  We bring waters and cokes to carry into Disneyland and it's nice to have them cold when we grab them.  If you're spending your days at Disneyland and only crashing and showering at a hotel, why pay more?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience staying with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are delighted to see that you found our location convenient for enjoying the local area and that your room was clean and quiet. Please come back and see us again soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Okay for the price, but have some complaints
Summary: We stayed here one night for a Disneyland trip and, while we were able to do the things we got the room for (sleep, shower), the experience was far from ideal. Firstly, the room (232) was DANK. The room was incredibly humid and stayed that way despite running the AC unit on "dry" basically overnight. This was far from comfortable, and is my biggest complaint. The shower was clean, but the water barely went beyond lukewarm. TV was fine, but the remote had no "guide" button, so you had to manually navigate to the guide channel, which was beyond annoying. Mattresses were spring, so pretty stiff and might be uncomfortable for some. Check-in was easy and the staff were friendly, so no issues there. It's a motel style place, so you'll park your car outside and access your room from
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to leave us a review. We always appreciate hearing from our guests, and we're glad you appreciated our friendly team and excellent value. However, we apologize for any issues with your accommodations. We'll pass your comments along to our team for further review and to ensure any issues with odor are addressed promptly. It was a pleasure having you here with us and we wish you safe travels.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We love the Kings Inn.  It‚Äôs our second time staying (third room overall since last time we got 2 rooms) and have yet to have any issues.  Lovely family owned property close to Disneyland.  Rooms are spotless and well maintained.  Staff is very friendly.  10 min walk to Disneyland.   We are already thinking about our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Hayes, Thank you for joining us again at Kings Inn Anaheim. We're thrilled that our amazing accommodations, convenient location, and friendly service continue to bring you back. We'll share the warm praise with our team and can't wait to welcome you again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: The best budget hotel around Disneyland
Summary: I've stayed in other hotels around the resort, always finding some pretty great deals if you're willing to walk a bit to get to the park, but this hotel is only slightly farther away than the expensive Harbor blvd hotels across the street from the park entrance, but costs so so much less. Wonderful rooms for the price. Will be my go-to hotel from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review. We are thrilled you found your stay at Kings Inn Anaheim to be such a great value and are honored to know we are now your "go-to" hotel when visiting Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay. The staff was very friendly and our room was very clean. I liked that there was a little store in the hotel to access drinks and snacks until 2am. A short walk to Disneyland was also a good bonus.
Manager Response: Dear Maggie, Thank you so much for highlighting everything from our clean accommodations to our prime location. We hope you had a blast exploring Disneyland and other nearby locations. It was an honor to have you, and we can't wait to welcome you back to Kings Inn Anaheim.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Clean rooms, great service, hot tub is big. We really enjoyed the close distance to disneyland, which allowed us to come back for an afternoon nap when needed! Staff were very friendly and helpful to us.
Manager Response: Dear Solomon, Our relaxing hot tub and stellar staff are just a few reasons guests continue to count on Kings Inn Anaheim, and we love to see that these were some of your highlights as well. The prime location is just the cherry on top. Come back and visit us again anytime.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We‚Äôve always stayed here because we like the service and location. Rooms are clean. Bed is comfortable. Like the fact that there is a microwave available if needed. A mini store in case we want a snack or forget any kind of toiletries.
Manager Response: Dear Patty, Anytime you need comfy accommodations to relax in or top-notch service, you can bet that Kings Inn Anaheim will provide this and more. Thank you so much for the perfect rating. We look forward to becoming your new home from home.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed in Kings Inn purely based on Tripadvisor reviews. Kings Inn is around 15 minutes walk to Disneyland.  You can see the fireworks from the hotel.  Not much restaurants around.  It has laundry area.  The staff in the reception area were helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Cristinam, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. It is great to see that you found our location convenient for enjoying the local area and had pleasant interactions with our friendly staff. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: My stay here was okay. I‚Äôve stayed at numerous hotels and motels while traveling, in fact I‚Äôve stayed at the motel 6 only down the street from this location. The beds are eh, sheets are rough. Not the cleanest place I‚Äôve ever stayed at, bathroom smelled like mold. Also, the prices they have for the water in their scan and go are crazy, worse than disneylands. $6.50 for a smart water, 5.50 for ONE two serving regular size Reese‚Äôs. Overall I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place, I know it has great reviews but you‚Äôre better off staying somewhere else for slightly more. Or, if you‚Äôre really on a budget - motel 6.
Manager Response: Dear Alexandera, Guest feedback is always welcome, so we appreciate you taking a moment to share your thoughts. Providing clean and comfortable accommodations are always our goal, so you can rest assured that all of your feedback will be addressed by the proper parties as we continue to improve. Thank you for your insights, and we wish you safe and happy travels ahead.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Nice clean decent size room for 1 Queen and 2 Queen size bed. Nothing fancy but good place to sleep and adventure the next day. Very close to Disneyland and varies of restaurants. Check-in and out was easy and friendly. I recommend this hotel if you want to save money and a clean place to stay.
Manager Response: To hear that you enjoyed everything from our clean accommodations to our unbeatable location brightens our day. There is so much to do nearby, and we hope you had a blast exploring it all. Thank you so much for the recommendation. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Excellent staff, clean and close to Disneyland. Easy walk to the park. Good parking. Quiet location and nice big rooms. Easy check-in and check out. Lots of dinning choices within walking distance and shops near bye.
Manager Response: Dear Paul, Thank you for all of the delightful compliments. We are thrilled to know we were able to make your visit to Disneyland even more memorable and hope we have another opportunity to welcome you back.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Awesome hotel, friendly staff, clean rooms and its relatively close to the main gate. Always very accomodating to helping us make changes to our reservation and stay. Also has onsite laundry room which is super helpful if you don't want to have to take a lot of clothing
Manager Response: Dear Kelsy,  It was such a pleasure to welcome you to Kings Inn Anaheim! Receiving recognition for our friendly team, great amenities, and high standards of cleanliness is always appreciated. Should your travels bring you back to the area in the future, we hope you'll consider staying with us again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean and close to Disneyland. A good old fashioned motel
Summary: This place is exactly as advertised. A good value hotel located close to Disneyland (about a 10 minute walk). The rooms were clean which is more important to me than mod cons. The bathroom is small, only fits a toilet and shower. There is a basin in the main part of the room. The pillows were smaller than normal pillows but bigger than cushions and were filled with what seemed to be odd pieces of foam. They were more comfortable than I thought they'd be. But as I said, this ticks all the boxes for convenience and price. Plenty of restaurants close by both on the way to Disneyland and in the opposite direction towards Garden Walk. Free parking on site.
Manager Response: Dear Paul, It's great that Kings Inn Anaheim ticked all the boxes on your checklist for you to have a fantastic stay! The next time you are in the area, it would be wonderful to host you again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Clean Rooms, and Laundry service available
Summary: It was the first time for my BF and I to do multiple days at Disneyland Park and CA adventure so we needed a nice place where we can sleep comfortably, not expensive, has great customer service, was clean, and with laundry service.  Kings Inn and its team provided one of the best customer services we've had. One incident happened when we forgot to place the parking permit on the dashboard because we thought it was for "Do Not Disturb" sign since the two signs look similar. We parked somewhere near the front desk because our room was just above it. After our first day at Disney, we saw a warning sign on our car to place the permit, if not, the car will get towed. We asked the front desk about it and they kindly reminded us about the permit. Another incident is when my BF forgot
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing Kings Inn Anaheim! We're thrilled that you had a wonderful time with us and that every issue you had during your visit was ironed out. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to Kings Inn Anaheim, so don't be a stranger!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The hotel met and exceeded expecations. Fron desk very helpful, she is so nice and guided me thru our needs. As well they let me park early there before our checkin hrs at no cost and we were able to walk to the park with in 10mins & without paying for extra parking. Beds are comfortable, Hot water available, fridge, enough parking spots, so all you need just for sleeping os perfect.  Definetely will be out hotel by choice from now on whenever going to Disney. Thank you Kings in
Manager Response: Dear Jazzara, It's delightful to read that our outstanding staff could play a pivotal role in taking your stay beyond your expectations! We're also thrilled that you found your room to be well-equipped and comfortable, and we can't wait to welcome you back to Kings Inn Anaheim in the future.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We have stayed here numerous times now for our Disneyland trips. Very affordable compared to other hotels in the area. Short, manageable walk to Disneyland. Clean, comfortable rooms. Friendly staff. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Affordable rates are one of the things our guests get excited about, so we‚Äôre thrilled that this was your experience with us! We also appreciate your highlight of our dedication to comfort, and we greatly appreciate your recommendation. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to Kings Inn Anaheim the next time you're looking to enjoy Disney.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Experience Overall, but with Minor Cons
Summary: My friends and I stayed here for about 4 nights and overall our stay was very nice. Front desk staff was very courteous and friendly, our room was spacious and very clean, and shower temp/pressure was good. For the price we payed, we were content. The location is surrounded by lots of different food options - so if you're interested in eating outside the park this location was very convenient. Some cons we experienced during our stay (that we were able to overlook) included: our sink faucet would shut water off on occasion, many of the outlets in our room (specifically on the sides of our dresser) did not work resulting in us having to have our things away from our bedsides, our ac unit was very loud, and the ventilation in our room was poor resulting in our room being humid. We
Manager Response: It is great to know that our spacious rooms, excellent value, and friendly staff were bright spots during your time with us. However, we apologize that some issues made your stay less than perfect. In the future, never hesitate to let us know about any problems you may be dealing with, as we are always willing to help in any way we can. Thank you for your detailed review, and we hope to see you again at Kings Inn Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The room was a good room for the price I paid. We don‚Äôt spend much time in our room if we plan on visiting Disney. If you‚Äôre looking for high end, then this isn‚Äôt the place. The room is spacious and has basic amenities. They didn‚Äôt provide room cleaning at this time but if you needed to replace towels or items they provided. I didn‚Äôt feel unsafe or didn‚Äôt appear to be on the shady side and you‚Äôre near nice restaurants and Walgreens/CVS. The staff was nice and helpful. It was about a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland/California adventure entrance (map said .9 miles). We usually stay at the Fairfield inn however their prices have increased a lot and our kid is older and can handle the longer walk. The laundry room has microwaves to heat up food but the room closes at 10:00 p.m. I
Manager Response: Dear Rachel, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us your feedback. We're thrilled to know that our spacious accommodations, as well as our prime location, impressed you during your visit. We apologize for any disappointment in our amenities, and we'll be sure to keep your comments in mind as we continue to make changes for the future. Please consider coming back to stay with us again later down the road.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Pay a little extra and stay somewhere else
Summary: Ugly, dirty, noisy and smells like marijuana.  Great location within 15 minutes walking distance to Disneyland . Also close to many dining options and convenience stores. The property itself is ugly and dark. Rooms are large but extremely outdated, smelly and noisy. No housekeeping service provided during your stay. My room was plagued with maintenance problems. Common areas smell strongly of marijuana which is disgusting especially when you have small children. Pay a little extra and stay somewhere else
Manager Response: Dear Andrew,  We value your feedback and the time you've taken to share. While we're excited that our convenient location was a highlight of your stay, we are distressed that the same cannot be said about our accommodations. Guest feedback is our foremost catalyst for effective change, so rest assured that we will use yours to guide our efforts. We would be honored to have another chance to serve you and change your perceptions.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This hotel is okay for the location and price but we won't stay here again. Moderately long walk to Disneyland and good restaurant options close by. The rooms are just okay. Comfortable beds but the linens feel old and cheap.  There is no microwave, no hot water, the shower gets lukewarm at best.  There is nothing Disney themed in the rooms which wasn't a problem for us but might be disappointing for families with kids. Our room was at the back of the property farthest from the front desk and felt a little less safe.  Each morning of our stay a family of 3 adults stood behind our parked car and smoked a joint before heading over to the parks, LOL. Again, it didn't bother us but not ideal for families with kids.
Manager Response: Your feedback is valuable as it helps us improve. While we're glad our location worked well for your plans, we apologize for any disappointment with the linens and other amenities, as well as for any concerns about safety. We'll pass your comments along to the appropriate staff members, and we hope you'll consider staying with us again should you be back in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: extremely clean and conveniently close to food and park
Summary: the kings inn was very clean and quite, and close to Disneyland, and many many restaurants within walking distance.  They have set up a room service that you can get food from surrounding restaurants with no delivery or service charges added.  It was awesome and easy to use and the food was awesome well.
Manager Response: Dear Janice, To hear that you enjoyed our clean accommodations and prime location is music to our ears. There is plenty to do nearby, and we hope you had a blast exploring it all. Thank you so much for the perfect rating. Come back and visit us again soon at Kings Inn Anaheim.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Clean rooms, close proximity to park, and a fraction of the cost of other hotels nearby. If your main reason for going is to be at the park all day/night, King‚Äôs Inn does the trick. Close to restaurants as well for a well timed break.
Manager Response: Dear Doug, If you're going to visit the parks, there's no better place to stay than Kings Inn Anaheim. Our prime location makes exploring the area much easier. It would be an honor to welcome you back again soon.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We arrived at 8:30 am and the receptionist was very kind and offer us a room that was ready even when we knew check in was at 3:00 pm. The room was clean, quiet and well equiped. Definitely I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Roxana, It is wonderful to hear that you appreciated our attentive service as well as our top-notch accommodations. On behalf of all of us at Kings Inn Anaheim, it was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope that you will come back to see us again soon!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Just returned from a wonderful 6 night stay at King's Inn Anaheim. The staff were incredibly helpful,  the room immaculate and extremely quiet. The location was excellent,  next door to Anaheim Garden Walk and a 15-20 minute walk to Disney. Will definitely return!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to know that everything from our amazing location to our friendly team members impressed you at Kings Inn Anaheim! It would be a pleasure to host you again, so please, hurry back!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Room was clean and the walk was only 12-15 minutes from the entrance to Disney which was great. Front office staff was nice and checked us in quickly.  Shopping mall nearby with lots of restaurants that are walkable too. 4 stars because the beds were pretty hard. Disappointing after a 16 hour Disney day.
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure to welcome you to Kings Inn Anaheim! We are thrilled that our friendly team and high standards of cleanliness managed to impress you and that our convenient location suited your travel plans so well. We are always seeking new ways to improve, so we'll be sure to pass your comments about our beds along to our team for further review. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: My husband and I visited for our 3 year anniversary trip. The staff was very kind, the room we stayed in was clean, and the hotel us surrounded by things to do. We had a lot of fun, and we hope you will too!
Manager Response: Dear Julianna, Happy anniversary! It was an honor to be a part of such a special occasion. With our wonderful accommodations and prime location, you can always expect to have a great time at Kings Inn Anaheim. We hope you had a blast at Disneyland. Come back and visit us again anytime.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel within walking distance of Disneyland. Room was ready early which was very nice. This is my 3rd time staying there and will stay again in the future. Friendly and helpful staff. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Meghan, Thank you for the lovely review and recommendation! We're glad our convenient, welcoming accommodations continue to impress you, and we look forward to your next stay at Kings Inn Anaheim.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: the staff is what makes the place go here if you want to feel welcomed. other things would be the super clean rooms when we got there and the amount of parking spots there were overall this place is pretty nice and one of the cheapest around the Disneyland Park its perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Billy, Thank you for sharing how much you enjoyed your stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you liked our friendly guest service and clean accommodations. Please come back and see us again when you are next in the area.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The rooms at the Kings Inn are always spacious and clean.  I always enjoy my stay at the Kings Inn.  Parking is always easy.  Front desk staff is always helpful.  I do miss the Continental Breakfast however.
Manager Response: Dear Mimi, It was a pleasure hosting you at Kings Inn Anaheim! We're glad our clean, spacious rooms, friendly staff, and easily accessible parking keep you coming back to see us. Thank you for your feedback about breakfast. We'll keep your comments in mind and look forward to your next visit.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The housekeeping and maintenance staff were all so great and very friendly! Close Walk to Disney and there are restaurants right next door at the garden walk area. Very convenient area to stay with family
Manager Response: Our team is our greatest asset, so it is no surprise they made you feel at home! We're glad our central location made it easy for you to explore our bustling area, and we trust our accommodations allowed you to rest comfortably after a day of fun and adventure. Come back to Kings Inn Anaheim soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Older motel but very clean and it was quiet at night too.   Hot tub was great after a long day.  No complaints at all. Close enough to Disneyland to walk (15 min) and right next to Anaheim Garden walk with a bu ch of great restaurants. Staff was good. Free parking.
Manager Response: Although our accommodations may be slightly older, we firmly believe every guest can feel at home with us! We are delighted to learn that so many aspects of your stay pleased you, and we hope you had a wonderful time in Anaheim! It was a joy to host you, so please revisit us at Kings Inn Anaheim soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Location location location. Rooms are clean. Garden walk and lots of restaurants near by. Starbucks is right across the street and Disney is about a 15-20 min walk. Check in is easy and staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Janet, We were happy to provide you with convenient, welcoming accommodations, and we're glad our location worked well for your trip. If your travels bring you back to town, please come see us again at Kings Inn Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Amazing service clean rooms everything worked and parking was fantastic. U was checked in quick no problem answered any questions we had about a second car and the parking fees. Bonus points for the scan and go quick marr they had open 24/7
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you to Kings Inn Anaheim, and we‚Äôre elated that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate you shining the spotlight on our stellar service, dedication to cleanliness, and convenient parking! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Great location. Hotel is great. It's about a little less than a mile to get to Disneyland. If you were out to get a ton of steps in (like I was) this was a good thing.  They even have a dining area to view the fireworks from Disneyland.
Manager Response: There are plenty of reasons to enjoy a visit to Kings Inn Anaheim, and we love to see that our convenient dining options and unbeatable location were a few of yours. Thank you so much for the perfect rating. Anytime you need an ideal getaway where you can get your steps in, count on us again to deliver.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Bed very comfortable. Room near next Garage very lauth. No cleaning up!!! Everything becose Covid! Very clean and friendly people! Cafe machine, fridge, Wirlepool, Shop, laundry, free Parking, we come back
Manager Response: Dear Claudia, It was our pleasure to welcome you with warm hospitality and provide you with comfortable accommodations. Knowing you will return is a wonderful compliment. Thanks so much for choosing us to host your travels, and overall, we hope you had a terrific getaway. Come back anytime!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: The only place I ever stay when in Anaheim.
Summary: Room was very clean, comfortable beds, outstanding service by the office staff. centrally located and within walking distance of Disneyland. Huge shopping mall next door and a strip mall with Subway, Pizza, Mexican food and a liquor store just 1 block away.
Manager Response: Dear Joyce, Thank you for choosing Kings Inn Anaheim to host your recent visit to Disneyland. We‚Äôre thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience and enjoyed our wonderful staff and clean, comfortable accommodations. We‚Äôre grateful for your positive comments and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time you‚Äôre in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Perfect please if your going to Disneyland, super close (walking distance ) room was clean and price was sent bad compere to the other ones around, te only thing it smells like  old  other wise perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the perfect rating. If a convenient trip to Disneyland is what you're looking for, count on Kings Inn Anaheim to help make it much better. We loved having you, and can't wait to welcome you back again soon.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This is one of the lower cost hotels I‚Äôve stayed in, and with that being said, I got some of the best service I‚Äôve had in a long time. Every day our towels were replaced and our coffee bar was replenished. The rooms were clean and had everything we needed in them. This is more than I can say for some hotels that I‚Äôve stayed in in the area that were $800 a night. I was very satisfied with the service and check in process. I would definitely stay here again. It was a great value for the price.
Manager Response: On behalf of our Kings Inn Anaheim team, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and all we offer. It would be wonderful to see you again, so please come back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We liked this hotel. Clean. Walking distance to Disneyland and DCA. Only negative is that the shower floor was very slick. Need to put a towel or something in it to keep from falling. Otherwise is was a nice hotel and good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing Kings Inn Anaheim to host your recent stay. We're delighted to hear you had an enjoyable visit and appreciated our great location within walking distance to Disneyland, as well as our clean accommodations. Your feedback regarding the shower floor is gratefully received and we will certainly address this internally. We hope to have the pleasure of your company the next time you're in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Nice and CLEAN stay for a trip to Disneyland. Park is 10 minutes walking; super close to food, CVS, etc. The front desk were very friendly and we had no issues checking in. House keeping services limited, but that is okay; we had fresh towels every morning. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Angie, We're delighted you enjoyed your stay at Kings Inn Anaheim! It's great to know that our clean, convenient accommodations and friendly staff impressed you. The next time you're in town, please come see us again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This will be the 3rd time we stay at this hotel and our experience was just was good as the 1st time. The room was clean & the pools are also clean (my kid had so much fun). Check in and Check out was really quick. What I like the most is the area, there are many restaurants and stores around the hotel. They have laundry onsite and a mini store where you can purchase a few items such as water, soda, snacks, etc. Also, its just a 15 minute walk to Disney parks, however we just purchased ART passes to take a bus to the parks. The bus stop is just half a block away for the hotel. Definitely staying here on our next trip to Anaheim.
Manager Response: We're always thrilled to welcome back repeat guests, and you're no exception. It's delightful to hear that our clean accommodations and prime location were perfect for your needs. Please come back and see us again soon at Kings Inn Anaheim.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Room was very clean. Friendly at check in. Great location for walking distance to convention center and Disney theme parks. Only complaint would be a slow shower drain. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: It was great spending the weekend with you at Kings Inn Anaheim! From our spotless rooms to our welcoming staff and prime location, we're thrilled you had a delightful experience. We look forward to making your next one even better!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This was our 2nd stay in this hotel. It‚Äôs still as clean as it was on our first visit. We found the room size great for 4 adults. The location to the parks is fantastic, we walked in each day as it‚Äôs only about 10 minutes. Lovely pool and great supply of towels. Staff are always on hand to answer questions and are lovely and friendly. We requested a downstairs room if possible as I have mobility issues and this they did with no problem. I will definitely be back. Although the hotel was quite full when we visited we didn‚Äôt hear any noise from other rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda,  Thank you for your loyalty to Kings Inn Anaheim; it's always a thrill for us to welcome back a valued guest. We are so glad that you enjoyed all that we have to offer here right on the property and pleased that our accommodations were the perfect fit as usual. We look forward to your return!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We were skeptical because of the decent price but pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness and close proximity to Disneyland. There were only two minor issues that almost prevented us from giving a five star rating. A minor issue with the sink faucet and noise. The most annoying noise was nearby motel neighbors waking up early in the morning and making noise outside each day. The other noise came from the fireworks show at Disneyland at 9:30. It actually sounds similar to gunshots if your not familiar. This noise could easily be marketed in a positive manner by having lobby personnel providing brief notification of this upon check in and maybe a note in the room reminding occupant of noise from fireworks show because of close proximity to Disneyland. Other than that, it was a
Manager Response: Dear John, Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you had a pleasant stay with us and that you enjoyed our convenient location close to area theme parks, clean accommodations, and exceptional value. Your comments are important to us, and we will use them as we continually work to improve our guests' experience. Please allow us to host you again at Kings Inn Anaheim. Familiar faces are a welcome sight, so come back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place with close access to Disneyland
Summary: We love Kings Inn. It‚Äôs our go-to property to be near the parks. Very well maintained, a little older but plenty of storage, bathroom counter space. Front desk is always super friendly and sweet with us.
Manager Response: Wow! What an excellent review to read. On behalf of our Kings Inn Anaheim team, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and all we offer. It would be wonderful to see you again, so please come back soon for another five-star, memorable experience.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Great customer service the room was clean  and close to house  of blues üíô that's why I booked here walking distance to Disneyland and many food places to choose from transportation is very close also üòÉ
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding review of your recent stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We're glad you enjoyed our clean accommodations, excellent service, and convenient location close to area theme parks and a variety of delicious dining options. Please allow us to host you again when you return to Anaheim. Familiar faces are a welcome sight, so come back soon!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Room was VERY clean!!! We wanted an affordable room nearby Disneyland. Parking is included and not too far of a walk to the park. Beds are firm and comfortable. 4 pillows per bed. Free wifi and refrigerator and a few extras such as soap, shampoo, and lotion. In room coffee provided too. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Sabrinah, Thank you so much for your five-star review!  We always appreciate hearing from our guests. It was our pleasure to provide you with convenient, welcoming service, and we are thrilled to hear you loved your stay.  From our clean and comfy rooms to our prime location, count on us anytime your adventures bring you this way!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Immaculately clean, large fridge, helpful staff, and free parking. Easy walk to Disneyland park.  Could see the fireworks from my doorway.  Can't beat it for the price.  No elevators if that's an issue for you.
Manager Response: Our day is brightened by your outstanding review of Kings Inn Anaheim! We're happy that being within walking distance of Disneyland was handy, and that your room had a nice view of the fireworks. It's also wonderful that you considered our immaculate accommodations, great amenities, and friendly assistance to be an unbeatable value. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope you'll revisit us!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: For the (last minute) rate and proximity to Disneyland, it was a good find. It‚Äôs a little run down and dated, but not bad. We had an incident when we came back from the park and the shower drain had regurgitated a bunch of murky, smelly water. We called the front desk to request a new room and they accommodated without hesitation. The bed was comfortable and the property was quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Erika, We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our prime location close to Disneyland and your overall stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. It was our pleasure to jump into action and accommodate you after the inconvenience you encountered in your first room, and we are grateful you allowed us to do so. It would be wonderful to see you again, so please come back soon for an even better time.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: These rooms are very close to Disneyland, only 10 minutes walk and also included a parking space. Check in and check out we're very quick and easy. Laundrette was very useful, there was a pool but I didn't get time to use it. Rooms were spacious and well equipped, and generally clean for the most part. Restaurants and shops near by. Fridge in the room was also a huge bonus. Will definitely stay here again when visiting Disney thanks for a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Sam, Wow! What a fantastic review. To hear that you enjoyed everything from our spacious accommodations to our convenient location warms our hearts. We hope you made plenty of amazing memories checking out Disney and other nearby attractions. Thank you so much for sharing. We can't wait to welcome you back to Kings Inn Anaheim soon.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Disney trip for the whole family
Summary: Kings inn never disappoints. We have stayed 4 times now and always have a great time. The rooms are perfect and a quick walk to disney about 12 to 15 minutes. Staff is always helpful and kind. Check in and out Is a breeze
Manager Response: Dear Kayla, We're so happy to know that our wonderful accommodations and prime location impressed you at Kings Inn Anaheim. Should you come to the area again, we hope you'll join us once more.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Stay here on July 29,2022 to August 2,2022 in room 161. Great location kids loved the pool and the roof. Room is typical for a hotel, front desk is friendly at check in.  One thing that stood out was, I left my AirPods in the room and realized it after 2 days of check out. Checked the location and it shows it was at the hotel so I called front desk on August 4,2022 and wow they actually had a record of it and said they will ship it on August 5,2022. I had left items before and usually it‚Äôs never ‚Äúfound‚Äù. I greatly appreciate the honesty and integrity of the housekeeping and front desk staff. Would recommend this hotel to family and friends for this.  Below is the process and will provide update on status and if the hotel follows through with what they say. August 4 - called
Manager Response: Dear Aimee, We're proud to have earned your warm recommendation of Kings Inn Anaheim! It's good to know you enjoyed our convenient location, great amenities, and pleasant accommodations. We believe in conducting business with integrity, and our team was delighted to assist with returning the item you accidentally left behind. Many thanks for your outstanding review and we hope you'll return!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Good budget option. All you need, but limited bells and whistles.
Summary: It was the type of motel I stayed in a lot as a kid..  It had been updated somewhat as well but it‚Äôs an old building and it shows a bit.  It‚Äôs inexpensive and clean and that‚Äôs what we wanted.  It was a place to sleep between Disneyland days.  So if you‚Äôre looking for a solid budget option, then it‚Äôs for you.   If you‚Äôre looking for ultra modern with all the amenities, then maybe not.  Since we were driving, the motel format was super convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are proud to deliver great value to our guests, so we are delighted that you found your experience to be well priced. We hope you will revisit us soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms and not too far of a walk to the park entrance.  There are also a lot of dining options withing a short walk.  It's close to a Walgreens and other convenince stores. Great location for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Maggie,  It was such a pleasure to welcome you to Kings Inn Anaheim! We are thrilled that our friendly team and dedication to cleanliness managed to impress you, as well as our excellent value. Should your travels bring you back to the area in the future, we hope you'll consider staying with us again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We only stayed one night, but it was just what we needed after squeezing in trips to both Disney parks in one day. We arrived early in the morning the day we were going to the parks, intending to just store our luggage until we returned that night to check in... but they had a room ready for us already so we were able to fully check in early. This was a great surprise. The office staff was friendly and efficient, our room was clean and comfortable, and the location is perfect if you are going to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Jenna, It was our pleasure to be the clean and comfortable stopover you needed here in Anaheim! We hope you had a blast at Disney, and our team would be honored to serve you anytime your travels bring you this way. Please keep us in mind!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We weren't expecting much from the hotel. Just wanted a pool for the kids and good location, and that's what it provides. Beds were clean and comfortable.  Pool was clean, but too many people for the small size of the pool area. Its walking distance from the Garden Walk and Disneyland, so that was a big plus. Price was cheaper than other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Angele, Thank you for sharing your kind compliments on our top-notch accommodations and convenient location. That being said, we will be sure to keep all of your feedback in mind, and we hope that you will come back to see us again soon for an even better visit!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable room for a great price!
Summary: We really loved our stay at Kings Inn and will definitely stay here again during our next trip to Disney parks. The rooms were comfortable and quiet, the hotel is still a walkable distance from Disney, and we got an amazing deal on booking.com.  We all agreed that this was the farthest we could stay from the Disney parks and still walk (0.9 mile from main entrance according to my fit watch). Tough at the end of a 16 hour day in Diseyland but still do-able.  The hotel looks very dated 1960s motor inn on the outside but the rooms have been updated and are comfortable. The beds are comfortable and there is a dresser and a wardrobe plus plenty of storage space below the sink. The room was super clean, too!  We spent 3 straight days at the Disney parks from opening to closing so we
Manager Response: Dear Velouria, Thank you for the outstanding rating of your recent stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We're pleased you had a wonderful time with us and that you enjoyed our clean and comfortable accommodations, convenient location close to area theme parks, and quiet surroundings. Please allow us to host you again should you return to Anaheim. Familiar faces are a welcome sight, so come back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Good little average motel great deal nothing super special but you don't need fancy when you're only sleeping in it because you're at Disney all day.  My only complaint is they really need to update the website description I thought it came with breakfast. Also said I was going to have to pay 10 a night for parking and I didn't have to. Not complaining but just shows description inaccurate.
Manager Response: Dear Tina, It was a pleasure to welcome you to Kings Inn Anaheim during your recent visit. We're pleased to hear you had a pleasant stay. However, we're sorry for any miscommunication regarding breakfast and parking; there is no mention of a complimentary breakfast on any of our websites, and our parking is still currently $10 a day, but we do appreciate you taking the time to reach out. Thank you for your comments, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Super close to Disneyland. Very attentive and efficient staff.
Summary: Excellent hotel. Room very clean and staff very attentive. They answered all our requests very efficiently. Very close to Disneyland, less than 15 minutes walk. Also very close to CVS, Walgreens, 7-eleven, Dennys and other great value for money restaurants. I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Michel, Your warm recommendation of Kings Inn Anaheim brightened our day! It's great that being so close to Disneyland, stores, and local restaurants enhanced your stay. Our team is proud that you also enjoyed our attentive assistance and clean accommodations. Many thanks for your kind compliments and we hope to see you again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Super clean and close to Disneyland
Summary: Location was great, close enough to walk to the hotel for a mid-day nap or break from the park. You do have to walk through some true Anaheim flare to get back to the hotel.   Rooms are large and updated. The building is clearly old - and thus noise transfers through floors (didn't notice any noise through the walls, just from upstairs).. it's honestly nothing the hotel could do anything about and wasn't super disruptive, just noticeable.   Our room was the cleanest room we've stayed in as of late, had all the necessities. I enjoyed how the bathroom/shower was in a separate room from the vanity so two people could get ready at once. Unique comment regarding the vanity, my wife was too short to do her makeup using the counter, and my sister seconded this opinion, maybe if you're
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much for the recommendation. With our spotless accommodations and unbeatable location, you can always expect to have a stellar experience at Kings Inn Anaheim. It was an honor to have you and we can't wait to welcome you back again to create more amazing memories.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Family get away to downtown Disney
Summary: Nice experience.. Customer service great Close to mall,  Bubba Gump... Disneyland! Will definitely recommend   Clean room ..enjoyed our stay thank you Staff is very friendly! Our night was quiet slept comfortably
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear that everything from our amazing service to our wonderful location near the Disneyland Resort impressed you at Kings Inn Anaheim. It would be a pleasure to host you again the next time you come to the area, so please, hurry back!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I had a great experience at Kings Inn. The rooms were very clean and the staff was very friendly.  Overall, great customer service! walking distance to Disneyland was a plus. Best deal in town!  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Kings Inn Anaheim. Our team is pleased to have earned your compliments on our clean rooms and friendly service! Next time you vacation at Disneyland, you can count on us for the value you deserve!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Very clean, close to Disney. Affordable. We have stayed here two times now.  The beds are comfortable. We did end up needing a white noise app at night because the people upstairs were very loud. We did not use the pool.  We would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Courtney, Reading your review truly made our day! It was wonderful to welcome you back to Kings Inn Anaheim for your most recent stay, and it's great to know we were able to provide another enjoyable experience. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive review, and we very much look forward to your return!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Our recent trip to Disneyland was great thanks to the Kings Inn! The room was clean, the staff was friendly, and we had a wonderful view of the nightly fireworks from the seating on the top of the building. We were able to easily walk to and from Disneyland in about 10 minutes. I loved staying here!
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure to welcome you to Kings Inn Anaheim! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we‚Äôre happy to hear we hit the mark with our comfortable accommodations, friendly team, and convenient location. Should your travels bring you back to the area in the future, we hope you'll consider staying with us again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Perfect for a week at disney with children. Walking distance to everything. Great location for both parks and the garden walk...and ordering food to the room was easy. Just wish there was a microwave in the room..
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating of your recent stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We're glad you and your family had a wonderful visit with us and that you enjoyed our convenient location close to area theme parks. Your comments are important to us, and we will use them as we continually work to improve our guests' experience. It would be our pleasure to host you again in Anaheim, so come back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this motel due to how close it is to the amusement park. It is a 15-20 min walk, which is great; allowed my family and I to come and go with ease. It is close to several stores and restaurants, so that is a plus. The motel has both a swimming pool and a hot-tub (although there are hours of operation) and that is great to relieve from a day of walking or the heat. The staff was friendly and great. It is not a fancy hotel, but considering my family and I spent most of the time at the park or at the pool, this is an excellent place to stay. Very worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent visit to Anaheim. We're glad you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and our location close to area theme parks, our lovely pool area, and our friendly staff. It would be our pleasure to host you again at  Kings Inn Anaheim, so come back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The customer service was yet again on point! I love staying here for each trip we take to the Disney Parks. It was perfect for the kids and all of our needs were met. Our drain was a little stopped up in the shower initially, but they fixed it promptly upon being notified.  This will always be our go-to spot in the Anaheim area and it‚Äôs a huge plus to be less than a mile from Disneyland. Thanks again, Kings Inn for another great stay!!
Manager Response: We're proud to be your go-to hotel in the area! It's great to know that our amazing staff and convenient location continue to impress you. Thank you for the lovely review! Please come stay at Kings Inn Anaheim again soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We experienced a spacious, clean room and the hotel was close to the Disney Resort gates.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  This is one of the best values in the area when it comes to Disneyland area hotels.
Manager Response: Clean and comfortable lodgings are paramount to a wonderful stay, so we're glad that yours met our high standards in hospitality. We're also delighted that you could take full advantage of our convenient location, and we hope to see you again the next time your travels have you Disneybound.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We called about getting our security deposit back and we still have not received it over a week later. We were told it should appear in our accounts in 3 business days and it has been 11 days. Everything else was fine there.
Manager Response: Dear Sidney, Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We are sorry to hear about your concern regarding your deposit. We would love to speak with you directly so that we can work to address any issues. Happy travels and we hope to have the opportunity to show you a better experience in the future.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Older motel style that is kept in wonderful shape. The grounds were immaculate, pool clean and perfect temperature, 10 minute walk to Disney and restaurants and other needs very close. If your looking for a budget stay this is it hands down. Nothing negative to say other than try to get a bottom floor so you don‚Äôt need to lug your bags up the stairs.
Manager Response: Dear Erin, It was our pleasure to provide you with clean, convenient accommodations. We're glad you appreciated our affordable rates, and we look forward to hosting you again at Kings Inn Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Hotel was small, not like the pictures on their cover, Walls I could hear my next door neighbors staying at the hotel as well, front desk was kind and cleaning came to take out trash often & clean what they can, bed was not touched due to COVID which was okay , walking distance is perfect everything is close didn‚Äôt use car , car was kept safe, no damages, just lots of night noise, by cars and neighbors, but was clean, pretty small, I would stay here again 4/5
Manager Response: Dear Gudelia,  Thank you for choosing Kings Inn Anaheim for your Disney Vacation. While we are deeply sorry for the outside noise that disturbed your stay, we are happy to hear you appreciated our kind and hardworking staff and clean rooms. It will be our pleasure to welcome you back next time you are in the area.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This was a great hotel for a great price. Only things were a slight gap under the door which let in light but was not otherwise bothersome. Right next to Garden Walk and about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Shaina,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you were pleased with our location and appreciated our excellent value. We hope you will visit us again soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: The only place I ever stay when in Anaheim.
Summary: We left our keys in the room and didnt get back til midnight. The office personal was very nice about it and gave us a key. They are so friendly and helpful there and the rooms are immaculate. Fireworks can be seen from their rooftop patio and Bubba Gump is right next door. Within walking distance to Disneyland also. Why go anywhere else?
Manager Response: Dear Joyce, Thank you for sharing your lovely comments with us! We are thrilled to know that you appreciated our friendly and helpful staff members, convenient location, and clean accommodations. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again soon!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: HOTEL was very nice and clean. It was also great to have a refrigerator in room. We stayed on a Thursday night and it seemed pretty save and quiet. Walking distance to Disney or you can take Uber for $10.
Manager Response: It's always a pleasure hearing from our guests. We're glad our clean, quiet rooms and convenient location were ideal for your trip. If your travels bring you back to town, please come see us again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Terrible! Do not stay here! Not a full service hotel. I didn‚Äôt even know that was a thing! 2 story. No elevator. You will have to lug all your bags up and down on your own. They did not clean the room or change any linens at all during our stay. When we requested such cleaning, they told us they were short staffed. We stayed 4 nights. Toilet paper was so thin and see through that we went to purchase our own at theWalgreens down the street. We also bought room fresheners to knock out the musty room smell. Showers were small and did not drain well. Sink for wash basin filled with water while brushing our teeth. They did send soomeine to fix it, but would not allow us to change rooms. Sheets on the bed obviously, but no comforter. We slept in top of the sheets and requested
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We appreciate you sharing your concerns with us. Please accept our wholehearted apology for your unsatisfactory stay. Your feedback will enable us to improve the quality of our service and accommodations. Having said that, we're glad our proximity to Disneyland and restaurants was convenient. Thank you for reaching out, and we wish you safe and pleasant travels.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This little motel was clean, nice rooms and was budget friendly. We could also see the Disney fireworks from our room. Those are all positives! The pool gets a little loud at night and the staff is not the most friendly. I really do wish they had a hot breakfast in the morning. What we saved on the motel we spent on food.
Manager Response: Your positive rating of Kings Inn Anaheim is much appreciated! It's nice to know you had a great view of Disneyland's fireworks from your room. Although a few items could have been improved upon, we're glad you otherwise enjoyed our clean accommodations and great rates. Please know that your feedback aids in our constant improvement. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to see you again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The rooms were clean and quiet. The staff was friendly. The hotel was super convenient to Disneyland and the Toy Story parking lot. This was a great option for the price. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Heather, It was a delight to hear we were able to provide a clean, quiet, and comfortable stay. Thank you for making Kings Inn Anaheim part of your Disney vacation! We would be honored to welcome you back.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel before. The room is a really nice size. Nice size mini fridge. I liked the dresser size and the in room safe. With that said we did experience some issues. The bed was VERY shaky, like I was sleeping in a bouncy house. Every time my husband moved the bed shook. The water pressure on the tub faucet was excellent but as soon as you switch it to shower it was barely coming out. I know California is in a drought but I felt like I was using just as much or more water trying to rinse out the shampoo as I would if they had a decent shower head on it. Finally, the last time we stayed they served breakfast ( granted this was in March of 2020 before the shutdown) . All of the hotel booking sites I saw said ‚Äúbreakfast included ‚Äú, so I thought when we booked
Manager Response: Dear Theresa, It is always a pleasure to welcome back familiar faces. Thank you for staying with us again. We are glad you enjoyed your spacious room and amenities. Our sincerest apologies for the issues in your room and for any confusion regarding breakfast. Your feedback is appreciated, and we will be sure to discuss your comments internally to see where we need to improve. Please come back and see us again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Rooms clean & spacious!  Enough parking available. They have a cute little snack/gift store. Staff very helpful and friendly. Love that it is in walking distance to Disneyland and the Garden Walk. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Nita, Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Kings Inn Anaheim.  We are so happy you enjoyed your visit.  It was so kind of you to acknowledge our clean and comfortable rooms, our wonderful staff and how awesome our location is to nearby attractions.  We also love that you appreciate our cute little snack and gift store.  We are so grateful for your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Great location, walking distance to Disneyland. Laundry service was a must on site store for snacks and what not which was convenient. Room was clean.  Service was good and aircon in this Cali heat was good. We were in Cali last week and will be going back nxt week we have rebooked this place again.
Manager Response: Dear Lisara, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us. We are glad to know that you appreciated our excellent location, clean accommodations, and friendly staff members. It was a pleasure hosting you, and we hope to see you again soon!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Close to Disney, Reasonable $$ Clean Update and friendly Staff! Room and beds very comfortable and surprisingly very quiet! I would recommend. Good experience!  So close to Disney we walked back and forth from the hotel. Convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy, Thank you for your glowing review of your time with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are thrilled to hear that you appreciated our fantastic location and friendly staff and that you enjoyed our clean, well-maintained accommodations. It was a delight hosting you, and we hope that you will come back to see us again soon!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We had a great room, the kids loved the pool, and the staff were amazing. Walking distance to Disney Parks and Walgreens, Starbucks and the Anaheim Walk. They were very accommodating when we had to book an extra night after our flight was cancelled. We had a great stay, thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Jon, Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are so glad you enjoyed our wonderful accommodations and the easy access to Disneyland. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you are in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Can‚Äôt say enough good things! Just super duper! Clean, friendly and updated.  We were so so early for our check in. I literally hadn‚Äôt  slept yet, but they were able to get us into our room early before we headed to Disneyland.  Everything was clean and up to date. Couldn‚Äôt ask for more. Not to mention the gals that checked us in were very friendly and very fast. It was my 40th B day. Thanks for helping make it great!
Manager Response: Dear Shawna, Wow! What a fantastic review. It is amazing to see that you enjoyed our clean accommodations and stellar staff. Happy belated birthday! We hope you had a blast at Disneyland. Anytime you need another fun-filled getaway, count on Kings Inn Anaheim again to deliver.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: LOVE THIS INN and definitely booking when we return next time to DL!  Staff was extremely helpful and knowledgeable about being able to still get DL tickets although website showed sold out on DL site.  Room was super clean, seemed recently refurbished and the upkeep def there.  Love that they have a pool, a deck to view fireworks if checking in late, a grab and pay shop (what a great idea) so I don't have to lv the premises to grab a quick needed something for my kids.  Walk to DL is only about 20 min.  Def family friendly.  Honestly it was a great relief to find this Inn and we are def coming back next time!  Loved it more than our previous stay at DL Hotel as the walk seems almost just as long too lol!!
Manager Response: It brightens our day to know that you had a fantastic stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are delighted to have had the opportunity to provide you and your family with a comfortable and clean place to stay during your visit to Disneyland. Take care, and know that we'd be honored to serve you anytime your plans bring you this way.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We are staying in this hotel right now, and I dread that we still have 4 more nights here. Every night I‚Äôve been awoken by loud guests yelling in the corridors, people shouting and arguing in nearby rooms, or car alarms going off in the parking complex next door. The rooms have been upgraded, but it still feels like a budget motel. For nearly $200 USD per night, I was not expecting single ply toilet paper, thin towels and dark gloomy rooms. Towels are changed daily, but under the guise of ‚ÄúCovid‚Äù, housekeeping won‚Äôt so much as straighten the sheets. If your only requirement for a room is ‚Äúclean‚Äù, then this motel will suffice.The rooms are clean.  If your bar is remotely higher (which mine will be from now on), look elsewhere.
Manager Response: Your feedback is valuable as it helps us improve. While we're glad you appreciated our clean rooms, we apologize for any concerns about noise and amenities. Please know our front desk staff is always available to assist with any room or noise issues you may be experiencing. We'll keep your comments in mind, and we hope you'll consider staying with us again during your next trip.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great price, close to Disneyland, clean and very friendly
Summary: Picked based on previous reviews. Kings Inn was exactly as stated. We would stay again. The only reason this is not 4 stars is I really would like to have a microwave in room. very sore feet after a long day walking to and from Disneyland and the extra effort to walk from the back end of the inn to the microwave was a bit of a deterrent.
Manager Response: Dear Sue, Your outstanding review of Kings Inn Anaheim brightens our day! We are so glad that our proximity to Disneyland was convenient for you. We have noted your comment about offering in-room microwaves and will discuss it internally. Thank you again for sharing your thoughts, and we can't wait for you to stay with us again the next time you're in Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a convention in town. It was a great choice for us. In walking distance of places to eat, stores, convention hall and Disneyland itself.   It was clean , easy to get to and cozy. Great for a quick getaway!
Manager Response: Dear Nicholas, We were happy to provide you with clean, convenient accommodations, and we're glad your overall stay was pleasant. Thank you for the lovely review. It would be a pleasure to host you again at Kings Inn Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our 2 day stay at Kings Inn Anaheim.  We had a room w/ 2 queen beds. First, I like that the rooms are tucked away off the street.  Cozy, private and safe. The room is very spacious w/ extra cubbies to store items out of the way (higher # rooms)  & it was clean!  The soap and shampoo are nice quality products.  The staff from step 1 till check out were professional, helpful and always friendly.   The only small draw back was not having a microwave in the room (we had a toddler & infant) however, they have microwaves on site to use.  I like that they had outside trash cans available also. What is real cool is the amenity shop with ice cream, yogurt, chips, starbucks cold drinks, water, sunscreen, souvenirs & lots more.  You don't have to travel to CVS.  We did not use
Manager Response: Dear Deborah, Wow! What a fabulous review. To hear that our stellar staff and comfy accommodations were a few highlights of your visit is music to our ears. Thank you so much for the perfect rating. It warms our hearts to know that you will be returning to Kings Inn Anaheim. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: A Family Stay in May!  Craziness always happen when you travel with kids and grandkids. The best kind of craziness. üòÇüòÇ  The constant was, a clean place to stay, a perfect location and wonderful staff.  We will be back, get ready! üòÇ
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure to welcome you and your family to Kings Inn Anaheim! We are happy to have had the opportunity to provide you with a clean, friendly, and conveniently located place to stay. It will be an honor to host you again; we're ready when you are!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: My husband and I had a great stay here for our Disneyland trip a week back! Great price and everything we needed! Walking distance to Disney and the Garden Walk! Staff was great during our whole stay! Would recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear Sarah,  It was a pleasure to welcome you as our guest, and we‚Äôre elated that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. It is a huge compliment when our guests enjoy their time with us so much that they take the time to review our property and recommend it to others. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Kings Inn for a Disneyland trip and we were very impressed. The rooms were clean and all the staff were very helpful and friendly. The hotel was in walking distance to everything we needed. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sydney, At Kings Inn Anaheim, our goal is to impress all our guests, so we're happy to hear we succeeded with you! It's great to know that our attention to cleanliness and service helped make your visit memorable and that our location was ideal for your trip. The next time you're in town, we invite you to stay with us again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We love this hotel,the room was clean and comfortable,there is everything you need nearby (fast food, wallgreen, cheesecake factory, Bubba gump, Gardenwalk, Disneyland, ...) The staff at the reception is efficient, smiling and attentive. The housekeepers are friendly, parking is free This is my 3rd stay and I confirm that it is great This is our reference hotel and we will be back soon
Manager Response: Thanks for being our valued guest at Kings Inn Anaheim. You pay us the greatest compliment by depending on us for your accommodations whenever you travel to Anaheim. From our clean and comfortable rooms to our convenient location, you can always count on us for an enjoyable stay. We'll see you again soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I went in on May 9th, 2022 and was greeted by the nicest and most helpful receptionists I did not get the names but they sure made me feel welcomed. They helped me with everything I had. The rooms are very clean and updated. Definitely recommend it. It was also next to some coffee shops and a few restaurants and Disney was a very short walk. Definitely recommend Kings inn.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you at Kings Inn Anaheim. We're so glad you appreciated our incredible location, just a short walk away from Disneyland. You pay us the greatest compliment by recommending us to other travelers! Next time you travel to Anaheim, you can count on us for clean accommodations and warm hospitality!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The hotel is located approximately 10 minutes walking distance from the Anaheim Convention center and next door to the GardenWalk. The rooms are very clean, the first thing I noticed was no yucky carpet ,clean floors and good A/C.  The pool was great and the jacuzzi area was hot and the jets were powerful.  The entire staff was very friendly and knowledgeable of activities in the area and advised me to visit their second floor patio, on days when Disneyland has a firework show you can see the fireworks from there ..it was definitely one of the highlights of my short stay at the hotel and would definitely stay there again for my next vacation.
Manager Response: It brightens our day to know that you had a fantastic stay at Kings Inn Anaheim.  From our friendly and dedicated team to our clean and comfortable accommodations, we're excited that you had a great time with us. Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our guests happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you. Thanks again, and we hope to see you again soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Nice clean hotel. Friendly staff. About 15 minutes walk to Disneyland. Right next door to the Gardenwalk so great location if attending any events at the House of Blues. No microwave in room but may be requested and saw they had some in the laundry room. Great stay for the price.  They do take out the trash each day and provide fresh towels
Manager Response: It is wonderful to hear that our fantastic location, dedication to cleanliness, and affordable rates all helped make your stay with us so great! We love hosting you and would be honored to welcome you back for an even better stay at Kings Inn Anaheim.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Our stay, I have been staying at this hotel for years and will highly recommend it.
Summary: the rooms were very clean. The staff is great. It's a short walk over to the park.  there is a fridge in the room, no microwave but you can ask if a microwave is available from the office, for a small fee. But it's worth it, if you bring food back to your room and need to reheat it. Although there isn't a breakfast, there is a food court within walking distance from the hotel, which we used to bring back food to our room.
Manager Response: Dear Dennis, We're proud to include you among our returning guests. It's great to know that our friendly staff and convenient location keep you coming back to see us. The next time you're in town, we welcome you back to Kings Inn Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The room looked exactly like pictured, no surprises. While the hotel is a bit older, the rooms are renovated and very clean. The bed was on wheels, so it was a bit squeaky, but generally comfortable. The room needed more towel racks, as the ones available hung directly over paper products (toilet paper or tissue dispenser). The lamps had outlets and USB plugs, which was convenient. There is no real lobby or gathering place, but it looked like they're in the process of adding a little market/convenience store near the lobby. We didn't use the pool, as it was closed briefly for cleaning, but it looked nice. It was close enough to Disney that we could walk, and we felt comfortable coming back late at night. The hotel was not crowded, so there wasn't really any noise. It was a good
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to provide you with clean, convenient accommodations. We're glad you had a comfortable night's sleep, and we appreciate your suggestions to improve the bathroom. We'll keep your comments in mind, and we invite you to stay with us again should you be back in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This hotel was terrific for my guy and I. We stayed for 3 nights and visited Disney parks 2 of the 3 days. The walk was so short and convenient. There is a: 7-11, Walgreens, and Rite Aid at the nearest intersection. The room itself was very comfortable and quiet. The flooring and decor was new. Our shower stall was plugged, and that was the only issue. Overall, we were very pleased with this bargain!
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa, Thank you for your glowing review of your stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. It is wonderful to see that you found our location convenient for enjoying the local area and trust you enjoyed a good night's sleep in our clean, comfy accommodations. Please come back and see us again when you are next in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: We would return. No microwave in rooms , small TV but we were there for Disneyland. Not TV. But they had good channels.
