Summary: We would return. No microwave in rooms , Smaller  TV . but we were there for Disneyland, Not TV. They had a good selection of  channels. The staff was very nice.  No breakfast, but lots of choices near the hotel. Plus a reasonably priced 7/11 store . Every place was walkable too.  Disneyland was packed Sunday through Tuesday it was very hot when we were there.  It‚Äôs not the happiest place on earth any longer. Lines are so long , Genie lightening line is $20. A person ea day . We did it the 1st day. It‚Äôs becoming more of a money making adventure for them than what I believe Walt Disney would have wanted .  And buying your tickets, then finding the reservation days to book it is frustrating!  The joy and Magic is gone for me anyways  I doubt I‚Äôd return to Disneyland again . But I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few moments to leave a review about your stay with us. Kings Inn Anaheim aims to provide you with multiple options for fun and relaxation during your stay, so we're happy to hear that you were satisfied. We're sorry to hear that your experience at Disney wasn't magical, however. See you again the next time you are in town.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel last minute for a quick 2 night visit to Disneyland. It was just my teen daughter and I. This motel is a great budget motel. No it does not have a ton of amenities but you‚Äôre not paying a ton of money for stuff you don‚Äôt need. This property is walking distance to the parks and has free parking! We checked in around 10pm. Check in was quick and easy. I was able to easily find a parking spot right outside our room. The room was big! Bigger than many motel rooms in the area. The inside has been recently remodeled and I appreciated the laminate floors! Plenty of drawers and a closet to store stuff in. No usb outlets in the room so that‚Äôs something to know. Our only issue with our room is at the sink, the cold water came out really slow and the pipe made a noise.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to accommodate your last-minute travel plans for your Disneyland trip! We're so glad our location was perfect for your adventures, and we trust that our clean and spacious, well-appointed rooms made for the ideal place to unwind after a day of fun. Your detailed review is very much appreciated, and we will know it will help guide future travelers as well. Come back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: It was a short walk to Disney, which was awesome! It was a super fancy hotel, no fluff but the price was reflective of that.  The property, pool area and room were clean.  Its an affordable, clean place to stay close to Disney.
Manager Response: From the entire team at Kings Inn Anaheim, it was a pleasure to host you! It sounds like our location was ideal for your Disney adventures, and we couldn't be happier. We're also glad our accommodations served you well, and we hope to have the honor of calling you our guest again in the future!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Excellent location, big room, clean. Get the room to the west of the near parking garage. However, we did not get back to our room until 1:00am from an open to close day, and were sleeping I. Before driving home - we were awaken by the housekeeping crew yelling to each other in Spanish at 8:30 - that really sucked.
Manager Response: Dear Paul, While we are delighted to see that you enjoyed our clean and comfortable accommodations, we regret your rude awakening. Rest assured that we welcome all guest feedback and appreciate you taking the time to highlight areas we can improve. Despite this, we hope your trip to Disneyland was enjoyable and that you'll join us again the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Everything was very clean and the front desk was super helpful! 15 min walk to Disney and free parking!! The kids had a great time in the pool too. Only down side was the pool towels are super tiny. We have stayed here twice in the last few months and we will be coming again this month.
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding review of your recent stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We love to hear from returning guests and that you had a wonderful time with us. Clean accommodations, helpful staff, and convenient location close to area theme parks are all reasons to choose our hotel when visiting Anaheim. It will be our pleasure to host you upon your return!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location, Clean, Budget Hotel near Disney
Summary: We went to Disney for a few days with two other families and everyone stayed at the King's Inn.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating (putting our rooms near each other).  The rooms aren't fancy, but they are clean and the beds comfortable.  I really appreciated the LVP flooring (vs carpet).  The parking was plentiful and felt safe off the main streets.  There was a security guard at the entrance at night for added protection.  Easy walk to the park with late-night food options between, which made for easy dining options that were less expensive and outside the park.  We'd all stay again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Nikki, It was an honor to host your Disney getaway at Kings Inn Anaheim! We're so pleased our accommodations worked well for your needs, and we'll be sure to let our staff know how much you valued their service as well. The next time you visit, we look forward to earning that fifth star!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Return visit and will definitely return again.
Summary: We truly enjoy staying here.  We usually stay here when we are dying a few days at Disneyland.  It's a 10 min walk to the park.  We love how wet are able to have our car parked the day of check in and check out. The staff is kind and very helpful.  They are close to the Garden walk for food and they have a great patio of you want to watch some fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. It sounds like our property was the perfect choice for your vacation with our terrific location within walking distance of Disneyland and our lovely outdoor patio. We'll see you again next time you return to Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights for our Disneyland trip and had a great time! It was an easy 15 min walk to the park and the hotel was nice and clean and had everything we needed! We will be coming back! :)
Manager Response: Dear Kristine, We can't thank you enough for staying at Kings Inn Anaheim, as well as for your wonderful review. It's delightful to hear how much you enjoyed our prime location near Disneyland. There is no better compliment than a guest saying they will return! We are excited to have you join us the next time you're in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: i loved this hotel, very clean! we liked how close it was to disneyland about 10min walk! Also it was very convinient having different restaurants near by to walk to without moving our vehicle. i will be staying here again for our next family trip!
Manager Response: Dear Jazmine, Your five-star review has truly made our day! From our immaculate accommodations to our fabulous location, we love to impress, and we're thrilled you had such a great time at Kings Inn Anaheim. Please come back soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The stay was very comfortable and the "room service" was nice! I've stayed at places where they did NOT change the towels or removed the garbage! This place gets an A+ for that! My only problem was with the WI-FI password...Hotel staff, the paper that showed me how to get to my room AND even the lamps in my room said the password was Mickey...but in actuality it was Mickey415 (which I found out AFTER I had to walk to the Front Desk to ask!)
Manager Response: We enjoyed hosting you at Kings Inn Anaheim. It's terrific you found our accommodations to be comfortable. Thank you for sharing your helpful feedback, and we'll make sure our documents are updated as this information is changed regularly for the security of our guests and their devices. We're looking forward to seeing you again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, excellent place to stay!
Summary: We have stayed here a number of times, for Disneyland at for events at the convention center and we always have a great experience. They have an excellent location within short walking distance to Disney and the convention center, right next to some excellent restaurants and close to a Walgreens and a CVS. Staff is always friendly and helpful, room is clean and modern. Nice pool,  a little small but it's always clean. I highly recommend this place for your next stay in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear Jon, We appreciate you recommending Kings Inn Anaheim! Our convenient location in Anaheim makes our property the perfect choice for travelers visiting Disneyland or the convention center! We're delighted you have come to depend on us for our friendly service and clean accommodations. We look forward to welcoming you back for another stay soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I was here two weeks ago for another conference and booked here again because my stay last time was great. My room faced the parking garage for the GardenWalk and boy was it loud on a Saturday night. Sounded like motorcycles were racing on the ramps at 2:30am. The hotel and staff are great, friendly with good service and clean facilities. This will be my go-to when I'm in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Kings Inn Anaheim, your repeat business means the world to us! We appreciate the kind words regarding our clean hotel and friendly service. Hopefully, you managed a good night's rest despite the exterior noise. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you're in Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This is about a 10-15 minute walk to Disney, close to restaurants.  Has free parking, a pool and a hot tub for tired feet.  There are snack and drink machines on property.  Staff was very responsive, easy check in for our 3 rooms and we rented a roll away which arrived very fast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review of your recent visit to Kings Inn Anaheim. We're glad you enjoyed our convenient location close to area theme parks and dining, free parking, lovely pool area, excellent amenities, and exceptional service. It would be our pleasure to host you again on a return trip to Anaheim. Come back soon!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Our stay at King's Inn was short but pretty good. The hotel is on walking distance to Disney, 18 minutes from hotel room to Disney security point. Room was big, and clean, beds were very comfortable, a decent size refrigerator, but the bathroom had a strong odor that lasted a whole day... No breakfast but there is a Starbucks across the street and you can easily order online for pickup. The front desk ladies were very polite and helpful. I would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Ana, We loved hosting you at Kings Inn Anaheim. Thank you for highlighting our fantastic location near Disneyland, as well as our spacious and clean accommodations. We apologize that you noticed an odor during your first day; please know that our front desk team is always available should you have a problem that needs to be addressed. It was our pleasure to serve you during your trip to Anaheim, and we hope to see you again soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great room for the active trip!
Summary: We were at the conference most of the time, so the room was perfect for calm evenings, good sleep and close to the convention center. The staff was very friendly and helpful too! I wish we would have taken advantage of the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. It is fantastic to hear that you enjoyed a good night's sleep in our peaceful accommodations and had pleasant interactions with our friendly staff. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Researched so many hotels before deciding on this one. It was affordable and within walking distance of Disney. Check in was quick and the staff pleasant. It was clean and had plenty of space. Bed was comfortable and shower worked well. Only downside was some noise from other guests who let their car alarms go off, baby cry, or talk louldy as they passed by. But I would for sure stay again!
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that our prime location, hospitable team members, and spacious accommodations were exactly what you needed during your visit to Kings Inn Anaheim. Please come back and see us again soon.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay! Will definitely come back.
Summary: Excellent place to stay. Customer service was great and so helpful. We were concern there was going to be a lot of noise as the hotel is right next to a parking building but didn‚Äôt have any problems with noise at all. Very quiet place. Room was very clean and better than what we expected.  Very close to Disney (we walked to the park). 100% recommended.
Manager Response: Dear BIanka, Thank you for sharing how much you enjoyed your visit to Kings Inn Anaheim. It is fantastic to see that you liked our clean rooms, peaceful atmosphere, and friendly guest service. We look forward to welcoming you back when you are next in the area, and we hope you had a great time at Disney!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Older property but very well kept. Walking distance to the park. Front desk is so polite and helpful. We were able to check out and they held our bags until we had to leave for the airport. 3rd stay with this property and we already have another stay booked.
Manager Response: Dear Alexis, It was a pleasure to host your recent stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We're delighted to hear you had such an enjoyable time with us and appreciated our convenient location within walking distance to the park, as well as the friendly service our team consistently provides. We consider it a great compliment indeed that you have already planned your next visit! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your kind comments, and we look forward to your return!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We were going to the house of blues, and wanted something close. It was walking distance between garden walk (contains house of blues) and the other side has CVS, and food places. It was convenient. The rooms are nice, had a fridge, Wich is very helpful. Room was clean and had comfy beds. The pool area is nicely kept and you can see Disney fireworks from the hotel. There is an upstairs patio by the office where we gathered to eat dinner together, it was a lovely stay! Laid back...so if you are bothered by kids or by noise, be warned. There are lots of families with kiddos but hey, you are close to Disney so it's to be expected.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley, On behalf of our entire team at Kings Inn Anaheim, thank you for the great review and five-star rating! We're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and that our prime location worked well for your plans. If your adventures bring you back this way, we hope that we'll be your first stop!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Nice  stay ,  close to Disneyland.  We will be staying there again in a couple months. Good value for your money.  15 minute walk to the park. Right around the corner from the Anaheim Garden Walk  area ‚Ä¶..
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to host you at Kings Inn Anaheim. Thank you for highlighting our fantastic location, within walking distance of Disneyland! Our team is already looking forward to seeing you again in a couple of months!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for just under a week - the price we got was amazing. It‚Äôs basic yes but the rooms are clean and comfy and have everything you need. There‚Äôs no breakfast or housekeeping at the moment but that didn‚Äôt phase us at all. We just went to the front desk and asked for anything we needed for the room and there‚Äôs loads of places within walking distance to eat.  The walk to Disneyland is super easy and quick and the front desk team were always friendly and helpful even when I was in Disneyland and panicked I‚Äôd left my straighteners on in our room - they asked housekeeping to check to put my mind at rest!  When we return will be staying here again for sure - couldn‚Äôt fault it
Manager Response: Dear Kayleigh, We're delighted you had an amazing stay with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. From our convenient location near Disneyland to our clean and comfortable rooms, we aim to provide everything needed for an enjoyable stay. It was our pleasure to serve you, and our team is already looking forward to seeing you again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay at a Nice Hotel
Summary: We had a nice stay here - good for the price. Great location to Disneyland and next to Garden Walk. We enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Room was clean. A little bit of a smell but not bad overall. No room service due to Covid but we asked front desk for whatever we needed and received them with no problems. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Daniel, It was a pleasure hosting you at Kings Inn Anaheim! We're glad our location was ideal for your trip and that our attention to cleanliness and service impressed you. The next time you're in town, we invite you to stay with us again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We always stay the night before we go to Disneyland. Great customer service, decent accommodations (not luxurious by any means; eg, pillows aren‚Äôt great), clean, and perfect location. Hard to recommend this hidden gem bc I like to keep secrets like this place to myself ;)
Manager Response: Wow! We are thrilled to earn your recommendation. We love having you and are delighted that you find us to be a hidden gem. Thank you so much for highlighting our clean accommodations and stellar location. We hope you had a blast at Disneyland. Come back and visit us again anytime at Kings Inn Anaheim.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The room was great for the price!! We saved a lot and didn‚Äôt have to pay parking which is a plus!!  I would definitely stay there again.  The room was clean and comfortable for the short time we stayed. Disneyland was a decent walk, I actually have nothing to complain about.
Manager Response: Dear Christine, We take pride in offering clean, convenient accommodations at an affordable rate, so we're glad you appreciated our efforts. Thank you for the lovely review! Please come stay at Kings Inn Anaheim again soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The room was really clean and the staff was really nice. They also made it very easy to check in and out.  I would definitely stay there again. It‚Äôs also a short walk to Disneyland which was very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Madelyn, It was wonderful to welcome you to Kings Inn Anaheim during your recent stay. It's great to hear that you had such a positive experience and appreciated our convenient location so close to Disney, as well as our clean and comfortable accommodations. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind comments, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time you're in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great value hotel within walking distance of Disney. Immaculate room and friendly staff
Summary: The Kings Inn is great value and I wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to recommend it. We have stayed multiple times and it is consistently of a high standard. The rooms are clean and a good size. They have an under counter fridge which is useful for drinks and snacks. The basin is outside the shower room which had been recently updated. The shower had good water pressure, no bath but we didn‚Äôt require one. Tea and coffee facilities too.  Lots of storage in the room. We were near the pool and laundry room but didn‚Äôt hear any noise after 8pm.  Due to COVID restrictions we didn‚Äôt have daily housekeeping but were given towels and rubbish bags each day and they were removed quickly. We went to reception each day to replenish our coffee.  The hotel and grounds were very clean and the staff are very
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending Kings Inn Anaheim and for taking the time to share your review. We are delighted to know you had an enjoyable time and that our associates took care of your needs. We also appreciate you mentioning our convenient location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Can't beat it for the price
Summary: I was looking for the lowest hotel price near Disneyland and found this place on a third-party travel site. Wow, they really impressed us, especially for what we paid, which was under $80. The room was very clean and had a frig. The bed was comfortable but honestly we had just spent 13 hrs in the park so we would have conked out on anything. There was coffee and tea in the room, which is great. There is another low price hotel nearby that does not provide coffee, which I thought was horrible.   The staff was extremely nice, there is a public restroom that you can use if you can't get into your room yet, and they did let us access the room early when we checked in since it was already ready to go.  And at the time we visited, they were not charging for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Kim, Thank you for choosing to stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. We were honored to host your trip to Disneyland, and we're glad you loved your clean room and in-room coffee and tea. The pleasure was all ours, and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Our room was very clean. It was just a 10 minute walk to Disney, so close. We went with family and had an adjoining room which was nice. We just kept the adjoining doors open. We loved how affordable it was as well.
Manager Response: Dear Brianna, It's wonderful to know our amazing location and clean, convenient accommodations helped make for a fantastic experience at Kings Inn Anaheim. The next time you come to the area, we'd be honored if you'd visit us again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This hotel  is with in walking distance to Disneyland (a bit of a walk, but not to bad).  We stayed here for 7 nights and the beds weren't the most comfortable so it was rough by night 7.  We also didn't have a bath tub in our room and we have young kids so that was disappointing.  The price and location of this place makes it worth it though.  Because of Covid they don't offer daily cleaning services.  They were happy to come clean our room when we asked though.  They also supplied us with clean towels and garbage bags when needed. We've stayed her many times and will stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to count on us during your travels. With our affordable rates and stellar location, you are sure to have a fantastic time at Kings Inn Anaheim. We hope you had a blast checking out Disneyland. Rest assured that we will discuss your additional feedback. Nevertheless, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We spent the night after a long day at Disneyland. The hot tub was great for our sore muscles and the beds were comfortable. We were able to leave our car at the inn untilnext were done with disneyland the morning after. Staff was professional and kind. 100% recommend and will stay next time too!
Manager Response: Dear Bonnie, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. It is fantastic to hear that you were able to utilize some of our great amenities and found our location convenient for your needs. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Very good location.  Very close to the Disneyland Resort and shopping/eateries.  Definitely a budget hotel.  Beds are comfy and linens/towels are adequate.  Very low water pressure.  Floor stayed dirty (as you enter the room directly from the outside).  For two nights, the people above us were having a tap dancing contest.  Pipes rattled when using the sink.  For half the price of nearby hotels, it's definitely worth it to stay here though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. We are thrilled that our fantastic location, comfortable accommodations, and affordable rates impressed you, though we apologize for any cleanliness or noise concerns you may have had. Our housekeeping team will be sure to address any concerns, and we hope you will come back to see us for an even better stay soon!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here because it was a reasonable walking distance to Disneyland. The bed was really lumpy and hard around the edges. But we didn't spend too much time in the room anyway. Water in shower was amazing!
Manager Response: Dear Natalie, While we are thrilled that our affordable rates, excellent location, and luxurious shower impressed you, we apologize for any concerns you may have had with our beds. Your feedback will be kept in mind as we move forward, and we hope you will allow us another opportunity to impress you down the line.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We stayed for one night at the Kings Inn on January 30th. The experience was amazing and the staff were too! The rooms were great, we got free parking due to COVID-19, and Disneyland was a 12-minute walk with the Toy Story Buses being a 5-minute walk.  Also by booking through Hopper, our room was like $119 compared to other hotels that are like $200 a night! Crazy! Thank you to Kings Inn, I definitely love staying here and would stay everytime if I could!
Manager Response: Dear Katherly, We love hearing from our guests, so thank you for joining us at Kings Inn Anaheim! It sounds like our prime location, warm hospitality, and competitive rates were just what you were looking for. Nothing would make us happier than hosting you again in the future. Give us a call when you're making plans; we'd love to help you get the best deal possible!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: My husband, seven year old son and I all stayed at the Kings Inn (room 237) for our Disneyland vacation from January 25-29, 2022. The first night we arrived fairly late and rushed to shower and get to bed so we could rest up for the parks the next day.  The shower was horribly clogged and we essentially stood in a pool of dirty water- but I told myself, whatever- it's a cheap hotel, we can deal. The rest of the room seemed clean and well-kept.  I was too excited to fall asleep right away so I scrolled on my phone in one bed while my husband and son slept in the other. Then...I felt something biting my neck. I assumed it was a mosquito or a rogue spider (this stuff happens)- but when I went to slap off the bug, I quickly realized that there wasn't just one bug- there were
Manager Response: Dear Stacey, While we are happy to have situated you and your family close to Disneyland for your big trip, we regret any problems you encountered with unwelcome visitors. Please accept our sincere apologies for the pests, as well as any perceived lack of attention from our staff. Rest assured, our facilities are regularly treated for such pests, but we will bring in our specialist to investigate your first room and ensure everything is up to standard. We know we can't change the past, but we'd welcome a second chance to improve your perceptions in the future.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Ours was a two-night stay for a Disneyland visit.  Tiara at check-in gave us the room we originally requested - quiet, on the second floor (this is a two-story hotel).  We ended up needing an extra room, and Jessica was able to get one near our original room, which made things much easier for us.  Both Tiara and Jessica were friendly and welcoming.  Omar at checkout was also friendly and professional, so I give the staff high marks.   The rooms were immaculate, which says a lot about the housekeeping staff.  The refrigerator is good sized and runs very quietly - never woke us up.  There is plenty of hot water for showering and bathing, and the shower pressure was excellent.   We did not use the pool, but families staying at the hotel did, and they seemed to be having a great
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing Kings Inn Anaheim to host your recent visit to Disneyland. It's wonderful to hear you and your group had such an enjoyable experience and you appreciated our comfortable and fully-equipped accommodations, as well as the excellent hospitality our team provides; we will be sure to pass along your kind words! Thank you so much for your positive review and recommendation, and we hope to have the pleasure of your company the next time you're in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I can‚Äôt believe how affordable this hotel was in proximity to Disneyland! The room was perfectly clean, had a small coffee maker and some small toiletries. The walk to Disneyland was around 15 minutes. On the way, you‚Äôll pass numerous restaurants, walgeeens and CVS, several places that serve coffee in the morning and a few bodegas. Even though it barely got warm for my taste, the pool was open so naturally some kiddos were swimming one morning. Kids are never cold! I was hoping that I could stash my suitcase on the day I arrived and they were able to check me in as early as 9:30am which I certainly  didn‚Äôt expect but was a great surprise!  The area itself felt safe enough to walk on my own even at night. The street can get a little loud that runs in front of the parks but bring
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your high rating! We're thrilled that you had such a wonderful time at our convenient and comfortable property, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Kings Inn Anaheim the next time you're in town.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at the Kings Inn. The staff were very friendly and helpful. My room was nice and clean and a good size for just me. I loved being able to walk to the parks in the morning! There are also plenty of places to shop and eat on your way to and from the Disney Parks
Manager Response: Dear Morgan, We really enjoyed having you! Our team was honored to be of service to you, and we can't wait to share your kind words with them. It also pleases us that you enjoyed relaxing in one of our clean and cozy rooms and that you took advantage of our ideal location. Many thanks for making our day with your five-star review, and know that we can't wait to see you again at Kings Inn Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: My room was spotlessly clean, shower water was hot, pillows slightly lumpy and some occasional noise from the parking lot adjacent, but I still slept well. Receptionists very friendly! Was a bit apprehensive to stay at a motel/not a chain, but it was well worth it and I'll stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Marian, Thank you for visiting Kings Inn Anaheim. Our housekeeping team works hard to keep our rooms extremely clean, and they will be pleased to have earned your recognition! While we're sorry if our pillows weren't to your comfort, it's great to hear you had a good night's sleep. On behalf of our friendly team, we hope to host you again for another enjoyable stay!   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised how nice the rooms were after we drove in parking lot! Great spot - close to Disneyland and restaurants! Beds were comfortable and love that the shower and toilet were separate from sink and counter to allow you to get ready while someone else was taking a shower . Staff was very nice  ! Kids enjoyed the pool too - great price for a place to stay near Disneyland - would stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Brenda, It brightens our day to know that you had a wonderful stay with us at Kings Inn Anaheim. We're delighted that our comfortable accommodations, prime location, and friendly staff were some of the highlights of your visit. We trust your family enjoyed some relaxing time in the pool and had a memorable trip to Disneyland. Come back to see us again!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Stayed at Kings Inn for 4 nights as I was moving from the Midwest to SoCal (just in time to beat that dreaded winter SNOW!!!)  Loved the location.   Disney just 3 or so blocks away.   We were able to come back and take a break from the parks mid-day.   Also lots of food options close.   There is a great Hawaiian food place about 2-3 blocks away that we hot up twice.  Little strip also had Luna Grill and The habit burger.   The rooms were perfect for us.  I liked the hardwood flooring. The large fridge was awesome for keeping drinks cold for in the room or for taking to the parks.   Lots of people using the pool and hot tub even though it was mid week and a little cooler December temps.   Must be lots of Midwest folks.  The same ones wearing shorts and tees when it‚Äôs 44 degrees
Manager Response: It was a pleasure hosting you at Kings Inn Anaheim! We're glad our location worked well for your trip and that you appreciated the many available amenities. Our friendly staff will also be happy you felt welcome while you were here. We look forward to your next visit.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This hotel is very affordable and offers a great location to walk to Disneyland. We have a family of 4 small children and the adjoining rooms worked out perfectly. After spending all day at Disneyland it was nice to come back to our rooms and enjoy the nice warm baths. The kids also liked the outdoor heated pool and jacuzzi. This hotel also has many good restaurants only a 5 minute walk away. We went to Bubba Gump Shrimp Company and enjoyed a nice family dinner. We will definitely be back to stay here again on our next visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Brian, Thank you for your kind comments. We couldn't be happier to hear you had such a great stay with us. Our team takes great pride in making all of our guests feel special, so they will appreciate your kind words. We look forward to hosting you again at Kings Inn Anaheim.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: STAY CLEAR!!! We couldn‚Äôt even get in to our room, and the customer service was HORRIBLE both times I stayed here. I was completely ignored at checkin our first stay, and our AC was broken in the middle of HOT weather here. Stay ANYWHERE but this joke of a place. We were told to keep our room keys away from our cell phones because they can de-magnetize our cards‚Ä¶ well, after keeping them away from our phones, both of our room keys didn‚Äôt work (one of them didn‚Äôt work from the second we arrived). After being placed at the back of the whole property, we had to walk up to the front to get room keys that actually worked, after walking all day at Disney and all the way back to the hotel. The front office staff (that were standing around with nothing to do) were not professional, I
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany, Thank you for sharing your valuable insights. While it was our pleasure to host your trip to Anaheim, we're distressed to read your comments, as this is never the experience we would want for our guests. Please accept our apologies that you encountered issues with your A/C unit and key cards. While we can't change the past, we will do everything we can to improve for the future. We know that we can provide the quality stay you were hoping for, and hope you will consider giving us a second chance.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Hotel is decent. Clean and close to Disneyland. Quiet, amenities are basic but good. They need to replace their mattresses though, they are so hard and uncomfortable I had to lay down several blankets to be comfortable enough to sleep. I would stay again because of the cost and proximity to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa, Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the  Kings Inn Anaheim. It is wonderful to hear about areas where we've exceeded expectations. We also appreciate constructive feedback and will take your comments under consideration as we always look for ways to improve our guest experience. The next time you are in Anaheim, we look forward to hosting you again.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: Rooms were as expected.  No breakfast. Bus stop right next door.  Showers were cold in the morning, hot in the evening.  Rooms collected alot of moisture.  Front desk staff very nice.  Convenient to many restaurants and stores. Would stay again.
Manager Response: It's great hearing from you, and we're so happy we were able to meet your needs! Using your helpful feedback, we look forward to getting even better and taking your stay beyond your expectations next time. Thanks for choosing Kings Inn Anaheim; please join us again soon!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: It's been a couple of years since we last stayed here. This time we were put on the back in where it was away from traffic. Room was still really nice and they brought us extra towels and pillows without any issues. They also worked with us by not canceling our room since our first flight was originally scheduled.   I'm not too impressed with the overnight crew that works over night. But the morning, day, and late evening crew was very nice. I would recommend this hotel again without any issues.
Manager Response: Dear Marcus, It was a pleasure hosting you at Kings Inn Anaheim! We're glad most of our staff impressed you and that you had a comfortable visit. The next time you're in the area, please come back to see us.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: I booked a room at Kings Inn because it was walking distance to the park and very reasonably priced.  The lobby held our bags for us and allowed us to check in even before our room was ready so it would be easier when we returned late from the parks. The room was very clean and tidy. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We want everyone who stays at Kings Inn Anaheim to have an excellent visit, so we're happy to hear that was the case with you! It's great to know that our convenient location and affordable rates were ideal for your trip. Our friendly staff was happy to accommodate your early arrival and hold your bags. Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to seeing you again during your next trip.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This was our second time staying at Kings Inn Anaheim, and both times the staff have been friendly and helpful. The rooms have been affordable, clean, and comfortable. Within easy walking distance to Disneyland.  Will mention that it wasn't indicated beforehand that complimentary breakfast is unavailable right now due to covid. Which does make sense! It was just a surprise we weren't prepared for this time around. Still, would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Emma, Thank you for continuing to count on Kings Inn Anaheim during your travels. With our comfy accommodations and amazing staff, you are sure to have a stellar experience with us. We hope you were able to make plenty of magical memories at Disneyland as well. Come back and visit us again anytime.   Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: A great affordable stay close to Disneyland!
Summary: Our family had several rooms booked here for a trip to Disneyland. Overall it was a pleasant, budget-friendly stay! Staff were friendly and helpful, rooms were quiet and relaxing, easy walking distance to Disneyland.  The pool was under maintenance but the hot tub was still open and was great after a long day at the parks.  Overall we would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Chantel, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We couldn't be happier to hear you had such a great stay and were able to enjoy the peace and quiet Kings Inn Anaheim offers. Our staff takes great pride in making all of our guests feel special, so they will appreciate your kind words. We look forward to hosting you again when you return to our area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: The hotel is in good location. Next to it, you have, CPK, PF Chang, CheeseCake Factory, Ihop and etc... and the most fabulous and magical place, 12 minutes by Walk: DisneyLand. We just have an issue with the bathroom sink. The sink start to clogg and the water was coming up. We were able to connect our phones tough so that was fine.  We came in the end of October 2021. great stay, great place, we will come back soon.
Manager Response: Despite the hiccup with your sink which our maintenance team will look into, we are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your visit to Kings Inn Anaheim. With so much to do in the area like checking out all the magic at Disneyland, we hope you were able to make plenty of amazing memories. Thank you so much for the fantastic review. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.    Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay; 12 minute walk to Disneyland
Summary: The staff was really nice and accommodating.  We arrived a couple hours early, and they allowed us to park there before check-in,  We walked to Downtown Disney and timed it at 12 minute (we had a casual pace, we didn't stop the watch when we had to wait to go across).  We came back still early but they got our room ready before 2 which is great as I needed to rest from driving so long on the road and not much rest. The room was clean, they let us know to call if we needed towels and such, due to covid they can't do housecleaning.  Room had all that we needed, lots of storage, the mini fridge was big and has a freezer inside, make sure you turn the freezer level high!  A/C worked well, the shower had great pressure and didn't take long to get to hot temperature.  Ours wasn't a
Manager Response: Dear Ange, It was a pleasure to welcome you and your family to Kings Inn Anaheim during your recent visit. We're pleased to hear that you had a positive experience and appreciated our convenient proximity within walking distance to Disneyland, as well as our clean and comfortable accommodations. However, we're sorry if the beds were not to your preference. Thank you for taking the time to share your kind comments and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time you're in the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: We came in August to celebrate my mother's birthday and we never been here at the Kings Hotel before, this was the fastest unstressed check-in ever took no longer than 10 minutes, Sacramento California visiting Anaheim we were flown in and were allowed to check in to the room that I was allowed to actually pick when I made the reservation. They are very great about trying to for fill your needs and any questions I had. I needed to call the hotel I didn't wait on hold for very long everyone was quick to respond to any questions. As for the hotel room itself the room was clean well equipped or stocked with towels the convenient giant mirror and counter with the sink right there instead of in the bathroom actually was very convenient especially traveling with nothing but girls we
Manager Response: Dear Erika, It was our pleasure to host you and your family for your mother's birthday! We're thrilled to have had the opportunity to provide you with clean accommodations and friendly service. It's also great that you loved our relaxing pool area! Our team aims to provide a quick and efficient check-in process, and we're delighted you appreciated this experience. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon to Kings Inn Anaheim!  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary Heading: I became a victim of Racism here.

ÎåÄÎÜìÍ≥† ÏÇ¨Îûå Î≤åÎ†àÎßåÎèÑ Î™ªÌïú Ï∑®Í∏âÏùÑ ÎîîÏ¶àÎãà ÏΩîÏïûÏóê ÏûàÎäî, Ìèâ Ï¢ãÏùÄ Ìò∏ÌÖîÏóêÏÑúÍπåÏßÄ ÌïòÎÑ§Ïöî. Ïù¥Îü∞ Ï∑®Í∏âÏùÄ Ìò∏ÌÖîÏóêÏÑú ÎÇúÏÉù Ï≤òÏùå Î∞õÏïÑÎ¥§ÏäµÎãàÎã§.   I got a victim of horrible racism here visiting alone. Though I'd already finished all payments online beforehand, a Latino staff refused to let me check in because I was not holding my real passport as an ID card. Though I submitted a national ID card issued by the Korean government and I had the photo of my passport in my phone gallery, the staff required only
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to reach out and notify us of your recent experience at our property. It greatly distresses us to hear of your encounter with a member of our team and that you felt you were discriminated against at our property. This is not the type of behavior that is tolerated by our team and not who we are as a hotel. We can assure you that we take your accusations very seriously and will investigate your concerns internally to try and ascertain what may have occurred so we can ensure that this does not happen in the future. We hope that you enjoyed the rest of your stay in the area and we hope to have the opportunity to provide the visit you were expecting and deserved on another occasion.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: About a 10 min walk to Disneyland.  Their service is excellent and friendly, but it's an old motel.  It's really a 2.5.  Service is excellent.  Front desk people are friendly, fast and even offered to hold our luggage on the last day.  Some guy came in to ask if he can use the bathroom and was provided the key.  Great friendly staff and that's why they deserve a few stars.  Dirty.  Ground is dark hardwood and socks got black from walking on them.  Tea bags looked like it's been sitting out in the rain.  Bed was surprisingly the right amount of firmness.  Slept well.  Wifi is garbage.  Kept getting disconnected and when it connects, it's VERY slow.  We're talking a intermittent 2mbps.  You're not going to be watching Netflix or doing any Zoom meetings here.  USB power plugs
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you during your recent stay. We're delighted that you appreciated the exceptional hospitality our team provides, as well as our affordable room and parking rates and convenient location close to Disneyland. However, it saddens us to hear that we failed to meet all of your expectations. Please accept our apologies for any Wi-Fi connectivity issues you experienced and for any noise disturbance you encountered. We consider all feedback an opportunity to constantly review guest satisfaction and to see where we could be making improvements. Thank you for sharing your comments and we hope that you'll consider staying with us the next time you're visiting the area.  Peter Bhagat, General Manager

Summary: This was THE WORST hotel experience of my life. We were LOCKED OUT of our room and left without any belongings.  We checked in after midnight on Friday after traveling in. Spent about 6 hours in there before we got up and went to Disney. We came back at midnight after a fun, but very long 17 hour day - exhausted and ready to clean up and go to sleep. Swiped the key multiple times, nothing (not even a red or green light). Went downstairs to the office and got a new key, still didn‚Äôt work. Walked downstairs again and got 2 new keys, nothing worked. Walked back down for a fourth time and the front desk agent then nonchalantly suggested that he gives us a new room. ALL OF OUR STUFF IS IN THE OTHER! Toiletries, clothes, phone chargers, car keys, everything. I was furious at not only
Manager Response: Dear Alyssa, Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your stay. We apologize that you were disappointed with your stay. While not a typical guest experience, your comments will be used as we work continually to improve our guest services and accommodations. If you haven't received your requested refund within 3-5 days, please contact our management team so we may follow up to resolve your issue. Best wishes on your next adventure.

Summary: Clean, comfortable and convenient. It is walking distance to Disneyland and in a safe neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay, the front desk was attentive and fast. Parking space was available and safe. AC was available and worked perfectly.
Manager Response: Dear Henry, Thank you for allowing Kings Inn Anaheim to host your recent visit. We're delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and appreciated our clean and comfortable accommodations, as well as our convenient location within walking distance to Disneyland. We're grateful to you for taking the time to share your positive comments and it would be wonderful to welcome you back the next time you're visiting the area.

Summary Heading: Great value, short walk to Disney, next to Garden Walk
Summary: We generally just drive to Disney but thought it would be a nice change to stay nearby & walk to the park first thing.  Kings Inn is a great bargain in an excellent location.  Next door to Garden Walk with lots of restaurants, a few hundred yards from more expensive well known hotels, and a 12 min walk to Disney.  Given the reviews of cleanliness and the price, I took a chance and picked it over the fancier options for a one night stay.  It's a very old property but the rooms were updated and very clean.  AC was newer and worked well, bathroom was spotless, bedding was clean, HBO/Showtime on TV, small coffee maker, clean mini fridge.  It was super low occupancy so fortunately it was very quiet for us.  Check in was quick & very friendly.  Parking is only $10 compared to the $18+
Manager Response: From check-in to check-out, you can count on Kings Inn Anaheim to provide a quality experience. Thank you so much for highlighting everything from our convenient location near Disney to our well-maintained rooms. Anytime you need a clean and convenient getaway, trust in us to deliver.

Summary: Perfect place for my family to stay. The man at check in was super friendly and out going our room was ready for us and we there able to check in early. we will be staying here again the we go to Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised  room was perfect everything looked new,  VERY VERY CLEAN Good job housekeeping.  Loved the location.  Bed was very firm which I prefer if you do not might not be good for your taste...only thing was stuffy had to leave door open to air out .  Will definitely stay here again rooms do run small but if you just need  sleep and shower it‚Äôs perfect
Manager Response: none

Summary: Large size room, HBO,  nice high, comfortable beds,  hardwood floors,attentive staff, located in downtown Anaheim close to Disneyland. Tons of restaurants nearby.  I was VERY comfortable and I enjoyed my stay. Plenty of parking. The only thing I would change is there's no bath tub, only a shower. Other than that the room is PERFECT and I can't wait to return!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Had a peeping Tom who worked at the hotel
Summary: We came in late at night because we were driving through. When we got there we noticed a guy who was sort of stumbling around the property, I thought it was some random drunk guy walking around. Once checked in I went in the room to use the bathroom I left the curtains open and turned on the lights and then went to the bathroom. My husband was unloading the car and when he turned around he noticed the guy standing outside our room looking inside our room. When he saw my husband looking at him he walked the opposite direction. My husband went and told the girl working at the counter and she said he was staying there but she would go talk to him (she never did). The guy stayed in his truck all night which was right in front of our room which totally creeped me out so I couldn‚Äôt
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great prices,Friendly staff. Very clean rooms. Access to restraunts and walking distance to garden walk and downtown disney. Will be staying for our next trip to Anaheim.  Thank you again ! Also the pool is open. Hot tub closed. For those that liked to know.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Only about a fifteen minute walk from Disneyland! The room was clean and spacious with great service from the whole staff. We enjoyed the pool and spa a lot, both are open until 10 pm which was great for us since we were out late often. The wifi wasn't great but we got decent enough service. There is a good simple breakfast that is included. You can see Disney fireworks from the deck!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so excited that you had such a wonderful stay! It is terrific that our location worked out so well for you! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is delightful to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are really looking forward to another visit in the future.

Summary: Positives: very very clean hotel, not a single hair or bit of fluff anywhere in the room!  The pool area was also immaculate and a lovely heated pool/hot tub.  We got up too late for breakfast but nice that it is included.  The reception staff were friendly and efficient.  It was only a 15 minute walk to Disney - not the closest but we've walked that far for a DL parking lot before.  We got a terrific deal on the price which is always a plus.  Final pro was that the parking was plentiful and they let us stay till midnight on the day of checkout so that we could spend more time in Disneyland.  Negatives: our room smelled when we checked in, honestly couldn't distinguish if it was smoke or cleaning products but it was very pungent and my son mentioned it.  The walls were pretty
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you had a great stay with us and that you were so comfortable here. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are glad that they were so helpful during your stay and that everyone was so friendly. We do apologize for any disturbance that you experienced from you neighbors. We do have a 24 hour front desk who can assist. Make sure and let us know  next time so we can assist  you in making sure your stay is a pleasant one.

Summary: Great place to stay and close to Disneyland. Clean and comfortable room. Ours was adjoining which was wonderful for the 3 of us. We each had our own bed. Bed was nice and firm. Bathtub looks brand new. Breakfast included. Mini waffles are yummy and crispy. Lots of simple breakfast choices, cold cereal, hot oatmeal, oranges and bananas, hard boiled eggs, juice and coffee. Nice pool and spa that was open until 10pm. Go up on the deck to see Disneyland fireworks for a great view. Many places to have lunch or dinner within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad that you had such a great stay!  It is so true we are so close to the Disneyland park, making it so convenient. In just a quick 15 minute walk you are entering the gates to the Happiest Place on Earth! It is delightful that you were so comfortable in your room and that you found our connecting rooms so handy. Our breakfast is so good as you say. Those freshly baked waffles with butter and syrup are delicious this is true! We do have a wonderful heated pool and hot tub open until 10 pm . It is a great way to relax after a day at the park. We are glad that you were able to see the Disneyland Fireworks from our deck. It is a magical way to end your evening isn't it?  It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we are looking forward to your next visit with us in the future.

Summary: Nice and comfortable. The only thing that stunk was the WiFi. Had to go out in the parking lot to lick up a decent signal. Weird. The breakfast was wanting. However. Kings Inn is conveniently located, the beds are nice, and, overall, I enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you were so comfortable while staying with us. We are also delighted that you found our location so convenient and that you loved our beds!  We are really excited for a stay again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay near Disneyland!
Summary: Our family stayed at Kings Inn Anaheim for a week in February/20 while visiting Disneyland/California Adventure and we couldn't have been more pleased! Staff were friendly and very helpful, even before we arrived with answering our questions about shuttle service from LAX. Any information you read about this property always refers to it as a "budget" property but I think this misrepresents the quality of what you get. We stayed in a room with 2 double beds for a family of 3 and this room was larger than more expensive properties that we have stayed at in the area. Vinyl flooring which is much cleaner than carpeting. Recently renovated showers. Great housekeeping. And the included breakfast was wonderful for being able to get ready and get away to the parks. They also gave a nice
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so excited to hear that we were the best place to stay for you when visiting Disneyland. We are glad that our location worked out so well for you ad that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We are so glad to hear to hear that you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Clean, helpful, great price, easy walk to attractions
Summary: For 85 to 90 dollars a night pre-tax and fees, this place is great.  It's old, but maintained rather well.  Highly recommend to someone looking to have a safe, clean, convenient spot to rest up during thier visit to the Anaheim entertainment district.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget. We are  glad to hear that you will be recommending us to others. We are looking forward to another stay.

Summary: Sadly, our vacation needed to be rescheduled due to a family emergency.  Everyone was so helpful in making changes except for  the Kings Inn.  I did not ask for my money back, only the opportunity to change to a future date.  Even after the situation was explained they were not willing to help in anyway and told me it was non refundable for a reason.  I understand this is their right to keep my money but when tragedy happens you hope for compassion.  We will reschedule our Disney trilp but will not be staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so sorry about your family emergency, we want to extend our thoughts to you and your family. We do hope that things are better.  You did book a non refundable reservation, and unfortunately this is a chance that we do take when booking a non refundable reservation.  We are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. As it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations we are so sorry to hear that this was not the case. We do hope that you will be returning to see us again in the future.

Summary: Only stayed here one night but it was great. Check in wasn‚Äôt until 3PM but we had plans to go to Disneyland so they gave us our parking pass and let us park in the lot early! They also offered to hold our luggage at the front desk as well. When we came back for check out, it was a breeze. Didn‚Äôt take long at all. Our room was located on the second floor and I‚Äôm glad because the walls are definitely thin so you can hear almost everything happening outside and in rooms next to you so you‚Äôd probably be able to hear people walking around above you if you‚Äôre on the first floor. Room was modern and clean, absolutely no complaints there. I docked one point becuase the shower didn‚Äôt drain very quickly. When we checked out, the water still hadn‚Äôt drained from the shower so maybe it was
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a great experience staying with us. We are so excited to hear that you will be returning again in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfy, close to the park
Summary: Have stayed here a few times now.  Comfy, clean, budget accommodation only 15 minutes walk from the parks.  Staff are very pleasant.  Breakfast is a little limited but we rarely eat until we get to the parks so not a problem for us.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's.  We are glad to hear that you had another great stay. We are excited for another future stay.

Summary: If planning to visit Disneyland , this is a good budget hotel . Restaurants nearby, a mall , CVS, Walgreens , Starbucks are just few establishments nearby. I like the fact that there is a laundry facility in the premise and breakfast every morning. Staff are one of the nicest people to deal with. Wouldn‚Äôt mind staying here again .
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had  such a wonderful stay. We thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted that they provided you with such great helpful and friendly service. We are so excited to hear that you will be back to see us again in the future.

Summary: There are hotels right in front of Disneyland‚Äôs entrance - but Kings Inn isn‚Äôt one of them. It is about a 10-15 minutes walk away. But it has a much more reasonable price point!  Shops and eating places are an easy and quick walk away. You can view Disneyland‚Äôs fireworks from the hotel.   It is not a luxury hotel but we found the room comfortable, roomy and well furnished. It was a very comfortable stay.   Staff were pleasant and professional. There is a hot tub and pool, as well as laundry services available.   Breakfast is provided in a small dining room - muffins, bread, cereal, fresh made waffles, fruit, yoghurt, hard boiled eggs. Coffee and tea. But they are very strict about the dining room‚Äôs closing time. We saw people turned away.   All in all, it was a comfortable and
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a terrific stay! We thank you for the compliments to our staff. it is so great that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are really looking forward to a future stay!

Summary: Terrific place to stay! Outstanding service! Right  from our arrival all our immediate needs were taking care of by polite and professional staff. The rooms are terrific. Very clean. Terrific location to get to Anaheim Convention Center. Many other services within walking distance. I love this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so excited to her that you had such a wonderful experience. We are glad to hear that our location worked out so well for you. we look forward to many more future stays!

Summary: A 10 minute walk to Disneyland, however a good range of food was also close by, as well as a supermarket.  Breakfast was simple but a good range of items, just what you need before a long day at Disneyland.   Yes this is a budget hotel, the rooms aren't huge but it's excellent if you are there to spend most of your day at Disneyland (and night!)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad to hear that you found our location so convenient. We are also so happy that we fit so well into your budget. We look forward to having you again as our guest in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent location for my business show attendance!
Summary: Nice hot tub, pool was heated, easy access to the convention center.  Back rooms were nice and quiet, not being close to either the pool area, the breakfast rooms, or the street.  Close to great restaurants, and Starbucks!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so delighted that our location worked so well for you. We are really excited for a future visit.

Summary: I had read a bunch of mixed reviews and honestly aren't sure what people were expecting when they booked. We got a double queen room, which was larger than expected and very clean. The only issue is the bathroom is very small. The bathtub is actually quite deep and good shower pressure. The walls are very thin and you can hear everything but it's nothing turning on the tv or using ear plugs can't fix. There is a window above the door and it dows let a bit of light in, but it's frosted so it's not that bad. Beds are a bit hard, pillows make up for it. They offer a complimentary breakfast. Fresh fruits, coffee, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, pastries, waffles, toast as well as cereals and oatmeal. It saved us a ton of money on breakfast. Good idea to be in at 6am and it does get
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had an excellent stay and that we exceeded your expectations. We glad that we fit so well into your budget and we are excited for your return

Summary: We booked this room due to the location and past reviews. Upon arrival we were instructed we had to pay a resort fee (which was not listed on the website of $7.50) - Disappointing.  At 8am on our check out today, the cleaner walked straight into our room (we had the do not disturb sign up). This woke both myself and my wife u, which was annoying as we had a late flight out and required the sleep.  I mentioned this to the front counter, who advised me they would talk to the manager about this and they would get back to me and also refund my resort fee.  I messaged them a number of days later about this, and they basically said tough luck and we cannot waive this resort fee (even though then gentlemen on the counter said this was possible).  The room was nothing special, and the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. As it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations we are so sorry to hear that this was not the case..We do charge a resort fee of $7.50 per night. We do include many valued amenities such as parking, wifi, breakfast with your stay. We do not charge for these services. We do apologize for the inconvenience and misunderstanding. We do disclose the resort fee on all reservation sites for our hotel. We do hope that you will be back to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Clean, comfortable. I was looking for a place close enough to walk, that had breakfast so we could eat right away, and that we could park our car there without a fee. Although an older hotel/motel, it was clean, comfortable and make things easy for us.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad to hear that we were just what you needed. It is so good to know that you had a great experience and that we fit so well into your budget. We are really excited for a return stay.

Summary: Very clean room. Quiet location. Within walking distance to the business market we attended on Disney Property (at the Grand Californian). Within walking distance to a good variety of restaurants. Good security. A fair variety of food (hot and cold) for breakfast while we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is terrific that  our location worked out so great for you during your business trip. We are so happy that you had a great experience. We are looking forward to a future stay.

Summary: Our rooms were very clean and nice.  It was within walking distance to Disneyland.  Beds are firm but comfortable.  We liked the laminate floors for cleanliness and enjoyed our stay. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay and that you were so comfortable here! We are delighted to hear you will be returning!

Summary: It's all we needed, very good. Short walk to Disney, quiet room, close to some restaurants, very good value. We would book it again. Clean room, cleaned for us every day which was nice. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so happy that  you found our location to be so convenient and that you found us to be such a great value.  We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here from the 24th Dec to 27th December 2019 and we couldn‚Äôt be more happier!  Location: This hotel is in an excellent t location. It is 10 mins walk away from the main entrance of Disneyland. You can also get Uber/Lyft and it is literally 2 mins drive away, depending on traffic..It is next door to Anaheim Gardenwalk where you can get something to eat from a variety of chains; Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump, PF Chang and many more. I-Hop is also across the road, CVS and Walgreens.   Room: The rooms were huge and I think it has been recently renovated. Lots of space to put all the suitcases and shopping. They do provide a coffee maker in the room.  We are a family of 4, and our room had two double beds, closet and drawers. We all fitted in with enough space for
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. It is so great that you had such a lovely stay and that you had such a  great experience. We are delighted to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We love that our location worked out so great for you and that you were so comfortable here. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Stayed for 7 nights.  Was pleasantly surprised by this property.  About 4 blocks from Disney main gates. Very clean.  Walls a bit thins so bring earplugs is you are a light sleeper  Bonus is an excellent little bistro at Hotel Indigo just two doors down
Manager Response: .Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so exited to hear that we exceeded your expectations. We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced regarding your neighbors and any noise. We do have a 24 hour front desk as well as security. Please notify  us in the future so wel can assist in making your stay more enjoyable. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: We stayed Jan. 22-24 2020 during our family trip to Disneyland. Rooms were clean, bed was comfortable. Shower had excellent water pressure. Breakfast was handy before a day @ Disney with lots of choices including fruit, yogurt, cereal, danishes, toast, waffles. I didn‚Äôt enjoy the hard boiled eggs but everything else was fine. The room for breakfast is very crowded. The pool was good, hot tub was nice after walking all day. The walk to the park was about 10-15 mins depending on your walking speed. Lots of restaurants, shops & Walgreens next to the hotel. The rooftop patio had a nice view of the sunset. Our only issue was that we were on the bottom floor and the people above us sounded like a heard of elephants while we were trying to get to sleep! We would stay here again but on
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are delighted that you had such a great stay! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: we stayed here the first 2 weeks of January, we had a very pleasant stay.   Short walk to the Disneyland entrance.   Always enough free parking places on site, many supermarkets and places to eat nearby.  ATM inside reception area.  cleaning very good and tidy actually there was nothing wrong with this simple hotel, especially considering the price I would not know where you can get it better.   when we are in anaheim again we will definitely choose kings inn again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are delighted to hear that you found our location so convenient! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Came back after at day at Disneyland to our room door wide open. Nothing had been taken thank goodness, no staff came to the room to check anything. Staff said we had to go to the front desk and write an incident report. No manager in until the next day. It was delt with very very poorly, in the end the manager offered to wave resort fees of $37, what is that?? Had to fight to get one nights stay free, when you are from another country and your passport could have been taken and then what?? Breakfast room is crowded and unorganized. Rooms were humid and cold, not cleaned the maids only made the beds. Staff is immature, lazy and good at rolling their eyes. Not happy will never stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest . As it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations we are sorry to here that this was not the case. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  We do offer breakfast which included fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hard cooked eggs with salt and pepper, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet danish, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee regular and decaf, cream and sugar as well. We are sorry to hear that this did not meet your breakfast needs.   We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Nice hotel and close to Disneyland park, Good room service and very clean and offer a breakfast, we stay for 2 nights and very safety and greats rooms, close to food, stores and fun places and good price
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient for you! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful that they provided you with the excellent and friendly service that you deserve! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Very nice place, near to Disney, 10 mn by walk, and the Anaheim Gardenwalk, where tou can find Bubba Gumps, Cheescake Factory, many shops. nice breakfast, friendly staff, a lot of parking. Rooms are clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient for you and that you were so comfortable here! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here at the beginning of January 2020, just my 8 yr old son and I for his birthday trip. The check in was smooth and the staff friendly, the room was  clean and spacious and because we didn't have a car they gave us one close by.   We used the pool and hot tub almost every day and they were clean and maintained. No complaints other than the breakfast room was often over crowded and the options very limited. the walk to the park is less than 15 mins or an $6.10 UBER ride. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are glad to hear that you received such wonderful service during your stay. We are glad to hear that you were so comfortable here and that our location worked our so well for you. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: This hotel was in a great location to walk to Disneyland. It also has a good number of shops and restaurants near by. Rooms are pretty basic, but clean with everything needed. Complimentary breakfast was pretty standard with breads, yogurt and waffles. Overall a good economical place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so glad that we fit into your budget and that you enjoyed our breakfast that is included in your stay. We do offer breakfast which includes fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hard cooked eggs with salt and pepper, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet danish, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee regular and decaf, cream and sugar as well. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Location can't be beat, rooms are super clean, friendly and professional staff, proudly maintained property. Breakfast room is very small and very crowded with no actual dining space, microwaves in laundry room only.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so excited to hear that our location worked out so great for you. We have microwaves available as well to put into your room . Just inquire at the front desk. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: My family and I stayed there for 3 nights it was clean and close to Disneyland. Everyone there was super friendly. David from the customer service was very professional. He told us to let him know if we need anything, later we had an issue with the wifi so we went to the lobby and told him he was very patient and called the internet company so we can have access to the internet. We'll definitely be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff! We are so happy that you received such friendly and helpful service! We are so excited to hear that you will be returning! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary Heading: Hop skip and jump away from happiest place on earth
Summary: This place was definitely a great find!  It was right behind the hotel my sister and her family stayed in for 40% less and it included breakfast.  The responsiveness of the staff was amazing.  I had an issue with the a/c unit and they replaced the unit with a brand new one while we were at the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance making it so convenient! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We   are delighted that you experienced such prompt and friendly service! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Our stay began with the nicest staff at the front desk. They we super sweet and had a smile on their faces. They made sure we got our two adjoining rooms, which is what we had requested.
