Our rooms were clean and ready on arrival. The beds were comfy, good size fridges; which is a must with a family of 9. Lots of space for clothes, suitcases. The breakfast was good too. They had cereal, mini waffles, hard boiled eggs, sweat bread, yogurt, oatmeal, toast, sliced oranges, and a good assortment of hot and cold drinks. Kings Inn was just right for our familly! Thank you Kings Inn, you were absolutely awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable.Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so terrific that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so happy that you enjoyed our breakfast that is included in your stay and it worked so well for your family.  We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good accommodation at a good price
Summary: Had a great stay here, it‚Äôs so convenient for Disneyland. We took a Lyft when we could but it‚Äôs close enough to walk back (about 10-15 min) which came in handy when we had issues connecting with the rideshare apps.  It‚Äôs right next door to Anaheim Gardenwalk which has a good selection of restaurants so food isn‚Äôt an issue. There‚Äôs also a Walgreens across the street.  The room was clean and had everything we needed, plus the beds and pillows were comfortable! They also provided a light breakfast which was easy to grab and go before heading to the parks. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient for you! WE are so happy that you were so comfortable here and that you plan on returning!  We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Old building, a bit smelly. Just an old motel. This place needs a big update. Staff friendly, room clean but smelly.Great location close to everything that is to do around Disney, great restaurants around walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear that they provided you with such excellent service during your stay with us. We are so happy that our location worked so well for  you! We are so convenient to places to shop and dine as well as the Disneyland Resort! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Generally good breakfast options. Helpful staffs. Laundry room. Heated pool during winter. The room is big and there are 2 queen size beds that can accommodate a family of 4. There are food options around the corners.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so happy that you loved our breakfast that is included in your stay. Our pool and hot tub are heated and so enjoyable after a long day at the Disneyland park. We are in a perfect location this true.  Just minutes from the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are several places to shop and dine. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary Heading: loved the breafast and the staff were lovely
Summary: We loved King's Inn location was perfect for Disney and restaurants.Had a ball. The staff were friendly and provided an amazing service.The hotel provided a free breckfast for all guests, perfect before going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are delighted that you found our location to be so convenient! It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park making it so convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is good to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good clean place and wonderful staff
Summary: We booked for two nights , the check in was easy , the staff are wonderful and more importantly the rooms are clean and tidy , pool and spa available even in winter and we were allow to leave our car on site for FREE even after we checked out to go to Disneyland on our last day .  Happy we stayed there  Breakfast is simple and plenty to eat but limited tables available in breakfast area but you are welcome to take your food back to your room. That‚Äôs what we did . 10 out of 10 from us traveling Australians
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to hear that they provided you with such friendly and helpful service during your stay with us.  We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast that is included in your stay! It is a great way to get your day started in the morning. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Great hotel. Just in the right place to move. You have everything near here. The hotel has everything you need. Although the dining room for breakfast is kind of small the service was nice. I would likey to come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are delighted to hear that you found our location so  convenient. WE are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast as well We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Location is very close to Disneyland, and right next to an outlet mall as well.  Did an excape room there, it was fun.  Make sure you get up early for Breakfast as they have a decent spread for an Inn.  There is a pool and spa as well onsite.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. It is so terrific that you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park making it so convenient! We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast that is included in your stay. The waffles are delicious this is true! We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Breakfast was good, the waffles were delicious I mean my family and I could eat only waffles and bananaa so... room was pretty clean, peaceful place and great location, totally worth the price, near Disney, restaurants and shopping, bed was ok, bathroom really clean, TV, fridge,  safe, totally worth it and would definitely stay there in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so glad that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park making it so convenient. We are glad that you were so comfortable in your room as well. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: A brilliant hotel, just a little rough round the edges. Lovely clean pool area, rooms clean, just a little dated. Great how you get breakfast included, just a small continental served until 9, great to give you a boost before the parks. Bed comfy, but a little small. Great how you have on demand tv. Polite staff. No lifts to first floor make it hard to move large cases. Free parking is included.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable.We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast that is included in stay. We also have parking that is included as well. We are glad that it fit so well into your budget.  We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary Heading: Outstanding as always, our go to place in Anaheim.
Summary: Such great staff and location, always ALWAYS the first place I check for availability.  Rooms are a great size, easy walk to the park.  We just leave our car right there and 10 min walk, no need to pay for parking elsewhere, lots of hotels charge for parking.  Our favorite!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy that they provided you with such wonderful service throughout your stay. It is so nice that you found our location to be so convenient, It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort making it so convenient. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Had a nice stay for 5 nights. The room was clean and the bed was good. Had a decent breakfast every morning. Selection didn‚Äôt change but plenty of food. Small breakfast room so took it back to our room. Front desk staff were friendly and helpful. Location is great about a 15-20 minute walk to main gate. Pool is okay and clean. Good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff.  It is so good to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are in the perfect location. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort making it so convenient. We are a super value this is true. We have several amenities such as breakfast included in your stay. Parking, wifi is also included. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: The hotel was very nice, everything was clean and free any bugs. Beds were a little stiff but we spent very little time in them with going to Disney every day. The walk wasn‚Äôt bad, and for the price of the hotel I would stay here again. The exterior of the hotel could use some TLC or updates but the inside was very nice and not what I was expecting after seeing the exterior. The reason I gave it a 3 is for the following: upon arriving at the hotel they asked me for a credit card and would not accept my Apple Card because there wasn‚Äôt a number on it. They didn‚Äôt care that I could give them the number. Next the breakfast room was a bit small and made it hard to get food, I would‚Äôve preferred scrambled eggs instead of hard boiled but aside from that the food was good. Lastly, the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so happy that you were so comfortable staying with us. We do offer breakfast which included fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hard cooked eggs with salt and pepper, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet danish, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee regular and decaf, cream and sugar as well. We are sorry to hear that this did not meet your breakfast needs. We are sorry for any inconvenience regarding the acceptance of your credit card. We do not accept any credit card without the number on it. Again we are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: We got the hotel stay for dirt cheap ($400/ 4 days with taxes included)during the summer. Had to change dates and management was gracious enough to allow us to transfer dates to Thanksgiving week with a small increase in price ($80). Went to Disneyland which is a block away, so we walked and saved $$$ on parking! The breakfast service was outstanding and the staff running the breakfast are second-to-none in service. The rooms were clean and much more modern than the exterior suggests. No issues with noisy neighbors or insect/rodents. Felt safe in the room at night. The only concerns were: inability to open a window (a/c is only way for fresh air) and avoiding the particularly scary homeless people on the way to Disneyland (on the ones that are displaying erratic behavior).
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us! It was a pleasure to have you as our guest  and we hope your stay was memorable.  We are glad to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget. It is true with our amenities such as breakfast, wifi, and parking all which are included in your stay it makes for an affordable stay. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was close to Disneyland. The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and comfortable. It had a refrigerator in it.  There was plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us! It was a pleasure to have you as our guest  and we hope your stay was memorable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are so excited to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay and that they provided you with such excellent service which you so deserve. We are happy that you were so comfortable in your room and that you enjoyed our amenities that are included in your stay. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: We had a wonderful visit thanks to the great staff at Kings Inn Anaheim. Prince David at the front desk was very helpful and nice. We had a lot of people staying there and the staff allowed us to use the pool area for a birthday celebration.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us! It was a pleasure to have you as our guest  and we hope your stay was memorable.We thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted that you found our Prince David in particular to be so friendly and and helpful during your stay.  We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: Actually never made it there!  My mistake was booking with them on a nonrefundable. I live in the mountains of Southern California we experienced a Thanksgiving snowstorm was not able to travel and they wouldn‚Äôt work with us at all on any refunds, or change of dates. They even charged us more than they said they were going to charge us‚Ä¶ They included the tax not just the room rate so very disappointed with their customer service skills. Will never be staying there!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry to hear that you were not able to make it. We do apologize for any inconvenience you my have experienced. As you do say here you had a non refundable reservation.  This type of booking is a great deal, and it is understandable why you as well as many of our guest's choose this type of a reservation verses a refundable reservation. Unfortunately when booking this type of reservation you do indeed fall under the Non-Refundable policy terms and conditions when making the reservation. In the future, it would be suggested to compare the refundable 24 hour cancel policy verses the Non-Refundable non cancel policy booking. We are sorry for any misunderstanding regarding your rate for the hotel. Room rates always do include tax. This is according to the State of California and the City of Anaheim. We must charge applicable taxes. Again we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. We do hope to see you return again in the future.

Summary: Recently stayed at Kings Inn Anaheim for our family holiday to Disneyland.  Comfortable, clean rooms and great location close to Disneyland.  Next door to Gardenwalk Mall featuring restaurants such as Bubba Gump and Cheesecake Factory.  Walgreens pharmacy across the road was handy. Pool and spa was appreciated at the end of a long day. Definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us! It was a pleasure to have you as our guest  and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are several great places to shop and dine. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: This was my first time in California. I came with my dad. He had stayed with Kings Inn before and really enjoyed his experience. We had arrived Saturday evening after three hours in LA traffic (that was fun). We were happily greeted by a front desk clerk that was very patient while getting us checked in. I was really happy with the cleanliness of the room as we entered. The morning breakfasts were good, honestly it's not a four star breakfast by any means, but if you have kids or a big group, the breakfast they offer starts you off on the right foot. I really liked the waffles and the two staff ladies in the eating area were super friendly and helpful. Dad and I didn't indulge in the pool or the hot tub but it was nice to see that they were well taken care of. Overall during the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. On behalf of all the staff at the Kings Inn Anaheim I would like to thank you for staying with us! It was a pleasure to have you as our guest  and we hope your stay was memorable. We are so glad to hear that you had such a great experience!  Thank you for the compliments to our staff, We are so excited to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. It is true we have respect for our guest's and their property and make it common practice not to touch or handle our guest's property. We look forward to seeing again in the future.

Summary: This place is a gem of a hotel. Great location 10 minute walk to Disney, great customer service, lovely rooms. Breakfast is included in the room rate which was delicious. I‚Äôd highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient! We appreciate the compliments to our staff as well. Thank you for recommending us to others and we are really looking forward to your return

Summary: great hotel with everything. cheap, free breaakfast, close to disney. they even have a rooftop patio. uber is 6$ to the front gate. this is where i stay every time i come to visit disneyland. the workers are great too
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so happy that you had such a wonderful stay. We always love to hear from repeat guest's! We do look forward to another future stay .

Summary: The front desk staff is friendly and was kind to allow us with the early check-in, which we very much needed, after our 17 hours flight. Also, provided us with a kettle when requested for it. Breakfast is included, simple but nice, especially the waffles. The room was clean, safe, and large. The parking lot is directly in front of the room. It is within 5 mins walking distance to Disneyland Resort. I felt that it is worth the price and highly recommended. I will stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We love to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us! We hope to see you return again in the future!

Summary: Perfect hotel to explore Disney and Anaheim Convention Centre. Shops and restaurants at walking distance. Staff super friendly. Nice spacious room. Breakfast was well supplied (though no scrambled eggs, hams etc. but I like my cereals and yogurt and a good coffee to start the day, so that was fine with me). Only downside was that the internet in the room was a bit wonky, that the coffee, tea and shampoos were not restocked daily. But in general very happy with service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you had such a great time and found our location to be so convenient. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced regarding housekeeping. I do assure you I will forward this to our housekeeping manager for review. We hope to see you return again soon!

Summary: We had a room on the first floor overlooking the car park, lovely clean room lots of space, clean bathroom with shower and toilet. Bed comfy. Breakfast offered was very adaquate with waffles, danish pastries, toast, fruit cereal and yogurts. If the breakfast room was busy you could take your breakfast back to the room. Only a 10-15 minute walk from the entrance to Disneyland...all in all very good value for money. Very impressed for a motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you had such a wonderful stay and that you had such a great experience. We are delighted that you found us to be such  a great value. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Room was very clean, and kept clean by staff daily  Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful Free Breakfast can be busy  We had considerate neighbours all around which made the stay even more enjoyable Great location close to Disney Park & Garden Walk restaurants, entertainment and shopping complex
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so fantastic to hear that you had such a great stay! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are so glad to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are really looking forward to another stay with us in the future!

Summary: We stayed in connecting rooms, we asked for quiet  upstairs, with good views of the fireworks and we got exactly that which was great as it turned out the night we were set to watch the fireworks in the park they were canceled due to winds so off our balcony was it.  Staff were always very accommodating and kids had a blast in the pool each night after long days at Disney. Easy enough to walk 10 minutes each morning and handy location to restaurants and Walgreens and CVS which has everything you could need. We have stayed in Best Western Plus Park Place previously but rates had gone up a huge amount,  for us it was nearly half the cost with the only major difference being a two block walk so would definitely recommend for family on a budget. Breakfast was very basic, yes I've
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you had  a great stay. We also want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are glad that you found our location so convenient! We are hoping to see you return again!

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at the Kings Inn Anaheim. I loved being close to Disneyland. The hotel is clean and surrounded by families, which made me feel safe travelling alone. My room had air conditioning and a fridge. It‚Äôs close to local bus stops and staff made it easy to purchase bus passes at the front desk. Free wifi and breakfast was included which was really good. Overall I‚Äôm really glad I stayed here and will be back one day! :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such a terrific stay! We are even more excited to hear that you will be returning in the future!

Summary: Nice hotel 15 minute walk to Disneyland and right next to the restaurants at the GardenWalk. Rooms were clean and a good size. They were able to accommodate our request for two side by side adjoining rooms. We did not have a car and hotel staff at one point were able to arrange transportation for us with a car seat. Breakfast room had limited seating but we never had any issues bringing food back to our room to eat while we finished getting ready. Nice view of the fireworks from the seating area above the lobby - the fireworks were cancelled in the park on the days we were there due to wind so this was the only time we were able to see them.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location so convenient and that you found our staff so accommodating to your needs. We do have a wonderful view of the fireworks from our sundeck this is true! We hope on your next visit you will be able to view them from there. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Very cozy hotel and really close to Disneyland (Walking distance). The room was recently remodeled and really clean. Reception was great, I early checked in and they let me leave the car parked before I got the room. Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also happy that you loved our newly remodeled rooms. We are excited for a future stay!

Summary: Great location, close to Disneyland (within easy walking distance), and plenty of places to eat locally. The accommodation was clean and comfy and, thankfully, air-conditioned. The staff were attentive and friendly and the breakfast was great. This is a great budget option that's still close to Disneyland. We could see the Disneyland fireworks from the door of our room and from the balcony dining area. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so wonderful to know that you had such a great experience staying with us. We are thankful for your recommendation to others and we are looking forward to another future stay.

Summary: I had 160 lbs 2 luggage! Great reception Larry walked all the way back to room 156! Double check to made sure room is ready! Also i requested a hot cup! Before i reached the room, what a team! The gemtle holding the hot cup for me!!üôèmanager Peter very sincere he staffs well done and very professional service! And made sure his staffs did the best to make the hotel outstanding as so much hotels next to each other! Great competition!!! Well done manager Peter!!üôèüôèüëçüëç Location is excellent! 10 minutes walk to Anaheim convention center! 15 minutes walk to Disneyland very convenient! Price in Anaheim is reasonable including breakfast!!  I will be back because the staffs team work! Master chef jp
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. We are a team here, a family.  We welcome you to our family! We are happy that you had such a marvelous experience and we do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Nice motel in a fantastic location
Summary: This is a really nice motel in a prime location to Disney and Angel stadium . We stayed in room 107 for five nights. The room was pleasant and spacious with plenty of in house amenities. It was cleaned thoroughly every day. The breakfast was brilliant. There was plenty to choose from. Cereal, yoghurt, waffles and pastries. It was quite crowded some mornings, but it is a grab and go breakfast so this didn't bother us. My only negative was the bed. If I was sleeping alone, it would have been perfect. But with two people, it was impossible to get a good nights sleep. It was so bouncy and seemed to move every time one of us turned over! All it needs is a decent base, preferably not one with wheels for the base. The pool was really nice. We spent a couple of hours there and had it
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient!  It is so good to know that you had such a great stay. We are glad that you will be recommending us to others and we are excited for a stay with us next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great location and a good price (compared with Disney resorts)
Summary: We enjoyed our stay - the rooms are clean, staff are friendly, breakfast is included and parking too. We particularly liked that we were only walking distance from Disneyland and that the hotel cost a huge amount less than Disney resorts.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location so convenient! It is true we are just a quick 15  minute walk to the Disneyland Resort. We are hoping to see you return again in the near future.

Summary: We took our two kids to Disneyland and stayed at Kings Inn. It‚Äôs about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland entrance from the Inn. Walgreens and CVS pharmacies are half a block away. Our room was away from the lobby and pool area, so it was very quiet. Also, very clean and comfortable. The outdoor pool area was Nice enough and my kids spent hours in the pool. The breakfast was pretty good and included oranges, bananas, Frosted Flakes/Raisin Bran cereal, small danishes, waffles, hard boiled eggs, juice and coffee. The breakfast area is small and crowded, so it pays to get there before 7am or after 8am. Once we took our breakfast back up to our room as tables are often full. We were usually up really early, so we didn‚Äôt really have trouble finding a table. We ended up finding a deal
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so good to know that you and your family had such a wonderful stay! We are really excited to hear that you will be returning!

Summary: I love this place. Warm, welcoming, and well done in the interior decorating. Pool was warm, hot tub hot. It felt like home.  The breakfast was complete and tasty. A little more fruit would be nice, but, cereal, waffles, good coffee. An overall very  nice memorable experience. The beds were comfortable too!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a great stay! We are so delighted to hear that you found our staff so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do look forward to another stay in the future.

Summary: My son and i stayed at the hotel. It was reasonably priced and clean. If you are visiting Disney and want a place within walking distance for a quick break and sleep at night you can definitely stay there at a reasonable price. They also served a decent complimetary breakfast. For some people who need more proten this breakfast may not be enough. The management can also improve the wifi. For us the signal strength wad too weak inside the room. Overall it served my purpose.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted that you had such a great stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We are glad to hear we met your needs. We do hope to see you return again in the future.

Summary: The staff were friendly and helpful and provided a place to store luggage on the day we left. It was a quick 10-15 minute walk to Disney! There were some great eateries nearby (including the yummy Cheesecake factory). The pool was nice on a hot day as was the terrace to relax outside under some shade.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to know that you found them to be so helpful and friendly . We are glad that you found we fit so well into your budget. We look forward to another future stay!

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland and so many places to eat and shopping close by! Outlet mall less than a 5 min drive. Olive Garden 10 mins away. All at a great cost! I would definitely come here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear that you found our location to be so convenient to everything! We are very happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We just stayed at the Kings inn for 7 nights. This budget hotel is in a great location. It is a 10-15 minute walk to the Disney Park. The property is well kept, very clean and the staff is awesome. There are lots of food choices within walking distance. If you are looking for a solid budget property this is a great choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort. We are excited for another future visit!

Summary: Close to Disneyland within walking distance. Very friendly service at the front desk. Rooms are clean and NO bugs!!!!! I always come here when visiting Anaheim. Easy access from the freeway also. Nice pool and sauna area and free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are glad that you enjoyed our amenities such as our heated pool and hot tub. We are really excited for your next stay.

Summary: Difficult to find fault. Ok, it‚Äôs not luxurious, but who needs luxury as Ling as the room is clean and comfy. Room size is very generous, there‚Äôs a buffet breakfast included & a laundry room (& front desk has change for the machines.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted that you had a terrific stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are hoping to see you return again soon.

Summary: EXCEPTIONAL service from checking in to out! We were impressed with the cute, clean and spacious rooms. Room service went above expectations. Decent breakfast. Close walking distance to Disneyland & shops. Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so excited to hear that you had a wonderful stay and that you will be recommending us! We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Affordable and Quick Walk to Disney!
Summary: Affordable and Quick Walk to Disney!  Rooms were recently re-modeled.  Staff was friendly.  Pool & Hot Tub were a plus.  Anaheim Garden walk is right next store so you have plenty of restaurants to choose from.  They allow you to park until midnight on your check-out day so can go to the park or downtown Disney!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you found our location to be so convenient! We are really looking forward to a future stay.

Summary Heading: A great start to our USA trip!
Summary: Arrived from a 14hr flight from Sydney at 9am on 3rd Oct for our 5 night stay. Kings Inn and Princess Jessica were happy to accomodate all our needs with early check in requests, ground floor accomodation and bath tub for our kids. Even a request for a kettle.  The room‚Äôs are huge! Perfect size for a family of four. The fridge‚Äôs are also a great size. More than ample space.  There is a pool, free parking and laundry facilities. The entire complex is kept immaculate throughout the stay. A credit to the groundskeeping staff.  After a quick bite at the complimentary breakfast it is only a 15min walk to Disneyland. We utilised this going back and forth twice a day for the kids to have a break.  Wifi is quite patchy and phone reception isn‚Äôt great and would be great if laundry was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. it is so good to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so happy that you had a great stay and we are excited for your future visits!

Summary: Stayed at kings inn with extended family. It was clean and comfortable but the breakfast was lacking. The resort charge did not really cover anything. The beds are up high so you have to jump to get into them and the moves because they were on a hard floor. I would stay here again but only if it was for a shorter time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We are glad to hear that you were so comfortable and you found your room to be so clean. We are sorry if you were inconvenienced due to the height of the bed.  We do have all new beds in our rooms. We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We spent 7 nights here recently, we found it to be older however clean and tidy, free parking and great location to Disneyland and restaurants. Free breakfast. Onsite laundry which we found very handy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do offer breakfast, wifi, and parking included in your stay. We do have an onsite laundry for guest's convenience. We are really excited for a future stay.

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights and really took advantage of the close proximity to Disneyland. I had to work for a couple hours and the WiFi was nice and strong. We will definitely be back. Thank you King's Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to know that you found us to be such a great value! It is good news that you found our location to be so convenient. We cant wait for your return!

Summary: My sister and I stayed here in sept when we went to Disneyland for the Halloween party. Price is great for the area... way cheaper then other hotels in the area. Location is great, short walk to Disney, buses close by if you need, TONS of restaurants around. Best thing though is the beds , they have the most comfy beds I have ever slept in in a hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that we fit so well into your budget.  We are really glad that you had a great stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are glad that you were so comfortable in your room. We hope to see you return again in the near future.

Summary: The room was clean and tidy, close to Disneyland and great to relax in spa and pool afterwards.  Very handy to have breakfast provided.  Only downside was that we had noisy people above us, so next time would take top room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are happy that you will be back to visit us again in the future.

Summary: Had a room at the back away from the street, so quiet.  Got to watch the Disney fireworks from the balcony.  Good breakfast, nice rooftop deck to use for eating.  Pleasant check in; check out.  Staff was happy to assist with information.  Free parking, free WiFi.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you loved your stay and that you had such a wonderful time. We are really looking forward to a future stay.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean rooms, helpful staff
Summary: Had a great trip to Anaheim gay days staying at the kings inn. The location was unbeatably close to Disney and the House of Blues. Both were within easy walking distance. Rooms were spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also glad to hear that you found our staff so helpful and friendly during your stay We are looking forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Started off rocky but got better
Summary: Our room was very clean. The pool was refreshing. The continental breakfast was perfect for what we needed, cereals, hard boiled eggs, pastries, waffles, juices.  The in room coffee is not good lol. Thankfully there's a Starbucks across the road. Lots of great restaurants nearby to choose from. And Disneyland main entrance is a 15 min walk.  I would suggest a 2nd floor if you don't like noise above you but we had earplugs as we knew we had to be on the ground floor.  I booked 10 months in advance to ensure I had a wheelchair accessible room however when we arrived we were not given one. I even called a month in advance to double check. At first the front desk staff did not seem very interested in accommodating us and suggested we cancel for no charge. I got quite worried as it
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that we were able to accommodate you! We are glad that things worked out for everyone. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Great place to stay close to Disneyland.  Nice breakfast, clean comfortable rooms, and great staff. Clean pool and hot tub. You can also see the Disney fireworks. Close to restaurants and coffee shops.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is truly great to hear that you had such a great stay. We are glad to know that you found our location to be so  convenient. We are looking forward to another future stay.

Summary: The facilities were fun and the staff was very friendly. The restaurant was tasty, we loved the waffles.  It was a great place to sleep after a day of adventure.   We look forward to staying there again on our next trip to California.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you had such a wonderful stay! We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Kings Inn Anaheim is very average in every aspect from check in,  to room quality, to check out. Staff are not the most helpful and were quite rude when attempting to get a late check out. Considering we had booked and paid for two rooms and were told the night before to see the manager as he could not assist seems a little poor. Rooms themselves are clean but very dated in particular the shower. Simply changing the tap would have made a huge difference. Bed was nothing special but did the job. Air con worked well. Breakfast room is so small and cramped it is like being on a subway train during peak hour. Food is OK for what is being offered. Location is OK in relation to Disneyland (10-15 minutes walk). Close to Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gumps is a plus. Overall Kings Inn is
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you found we fit so well into your budget. We are also glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We do look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We stayed for a week, clean rooms, practical space. Breakfast was simple, coffee was great! My only complaint was they did not have tea.   Staff was helpful and knowledgeable! Close walk to all services! Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you were so comfortable hear. We do offer hot tea  during our breakfast hours as well as in your room. We are so happy that you will be back to visit us again!

Summary: Everything was clean, the staff was friendly, the beds were very comfy. The only downside was that the room keys were very finicky, but overall our stay was great! I would stay here again for future Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient and that you were so comfortable in your room. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Clean & Comfy great Location for Disney parks!
Summary: Arrived & was welcomed pleasantly at the reception desk. The check in was good & fairly quick. Great location!! Stayed here 5 nights & loved it very quiet location! Walking distance to Disneyland, & nice place to stay with your family! VERY VERY clean & well supplied rooms.  Free breakfast & Free parking!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you were so comfortable staying with us. We are glad to hear that you found us to be so affordable. We are really looking forward to another future stay!

Summary: The rooms were clean, renovated, a few minutes walking to Disneyland, safe, very quiet, confortable and spacious rooms. Breakfast was good and very friendly staff.  Would definitely stay there again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Not the first time i have stayed at this hotel, it has everything i need, a good location, friendly staff. always making improvements. the onsite laundry is so handy. if you want a hotel that has good size rooms at a affordable price then you have found it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are always happy to hear from repeat guest's We are so delighted that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you had another great stay! We look forward to your return!

Summary: First off, I need to comment on how clean everything was. Our room, the office, the laundry room, the outside of the buildings (not even a spiderweb in sight), and the pool area were so well kept. We didn‚Äôt end up visiting the breakfast area, so I can‚Äôt comment on that. But literally every other area we did see was so amazingly clean that it stood out to me.  We stayed in room 237 which was in the back building on the side that faced the King‚Äôs Inn parking lot (not the Garden Walk parking garage). It was super quiet and we were lucky enough to also have super quiet room neighbors.  It was just my husband and I and there was more than enough room for the two of us in this two queen size bed room. We each took a bed and both of us had an awesome night‚Äôs sleep every night. The beds
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay. We are even more excited to hear that you will be returning!

Summary: Exclent access to Disneyland is about 10 minutes walk. The place is very safe, clean and comfortable. The only negative is that although it has rooms on the ground floor there is no elevator, so it is very difficult to load your bags if you have many or are heavy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you found our location to be so convenient and that you were so comfortable in your room. WE are sorry for any issues you may have experienced bringing your luggage upstairs. We would suggest requesting a lower floor room for your future stay.

Summary: Room was very nice just recently renovated rooms. The beds were comfortable, the breakfast had a good selection.  The eggs were overdone and very plain but everything else for breakfast was fantastic. The pool and hot tub are very nice and a really good temperature it could do with some shade in the pool area though
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you were so comfortable in your room. We are also happy that you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub during your stay. We do apologize regarding our breakfast if you did not find it satisfying. We  do hope that you will be back to visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great location and value - 2 adults & 2 kids - 16nights
Summary: We spent 16 nights with 2 adults and 2 kids aged 4 & 7 at the Kings Inn. Rooms have been nicely updated, breakfast options for a family are great including cereal, oats, toast, bananas, eggs, pancakes, waffles, juice and coffee.  Next door plenty of lunch/dinner options including Bubba Gump which for all of September kids eat for .99c with an online voucher. Other options include California Pizza Kitchen, Cheesecake Factory, Johnny Rockets and House of Blues.  The walk to Disneyland with a 4 year old was around 20 minutes including going through security.  Adults would be 12-14 minutes brisk walk.  Staff were friendly and would recommend to all.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such a great value. We are also so glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really hoping to see you return again in the near future.

Summary: nice hardwood floors , plenty of storage for extended stay. walk in shower area.fridge in room, access to microwave and laundry room. pool, hot tub. breakfast in area by office. staff very accommodating
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so delighted that you and your family had such a wonderful stay. We are excited for your return!

Summary: Stay was short, but room was perfectly suited to a family. Very close to Disney land. Everything in common area, pool, breakfast room was clean and well kept. Room was modern, clean and effective. Breakfast, had, some limitations in choice, but still filling and good.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay. We are really excited for your next stay.

Summary: You are next door to Riverwalk a large mall with everything. Bubba Gump's is next door and the Cheese Cake Factory is just beyond. The ART bus takes you into Disney. Easy to find near I-5. Not far to Knox berry farm and short drive to Beaches. If you fly into LA you have 3 airports and quick shuttle service to the motel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk. The ART shuttle does pick up right next door as well. Very convenient to so much! We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Great service. Great rates. Nice rooms. Convenient location. Nice pool. Can't really go wrong with this place, especially compared to what other hotels in the area charge for inferior accommodations. Really enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you had such a terrific stay. We are really excited for your next stay!

Summary: We spent a week at Kings Inn. Positive: Clean Comfortable Beds Free parking Free breakfast Walking distance to Disney and restaurants Would stay again and recommend to to anyone  Negative  Pool needs to be cleaned
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had a wonderful stay. We are glad you were so comfortable here. We hope to see you return soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay for 10 days for 2 adults and 2 kids
Summary: Location perfectly close to Disneyland plus many food options to choose close by.  Room cosy with all you need, though I personally didn't like that sink was outside of bathroom.  Pool bit small and most times full of people.  Breakfast was plentiful with lots of good options for adults and children.  Staff was super helpful and cleaners made sure room was tidy every day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review We are glad to hear that you had such a great stay. We are so happy that our staff was so helpful and friendly during your stay. We hope to see you return again soon

Summary: Me and my partner stayed at the Kings Inn for just over a week (for D23 at the Anaheim Convention Center, with a few days either side to visit Disney!)   The hotel is within walking distance of the Anaheim Convention center, Disneyland, GardenWalk, and across the street from a 24-hr CVS, which was super handy when we needed to grab drinks etc.   The hotel itself was clean and safe, and there was always someone at the front desk or security on site. We didn't spend a lot of time in the room as we were at the convention center or Disneyland during the day, so it was just a place for us to sleep. We didn't use the pool, but we did use the washer and dryer facilities, which came to about $4 for both washing and drying one lot of clothes (both mine and my partners clothes fit in one
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also happy that you were so comfortable in your room. We do have in room safes, as well as security boxes at the front desk. We issue a key, the one an only key to the box holder. There is no other way to open the box. There is no charge for this, however, if  the key is lost it is a $75 dollar charge so we can have a locksmith open the box.  Your items would be safe, and there is no charge unless the key is lost. Sorry for any inconvenience.  We are hoping to see you return again in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean, affordable hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms were much nicer than I expected and it was just a 15 minute walk to the parks. This is my new go-to affordable stay when I come to Disneyland. The office staff was very polite and professional, and offer baggage hold for if you check in and your room isn't ready, or check out and are still spending time somewhere before you leave.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found staying with us was so convenient, and comfortable. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great that you found them to be so helpful and friendly. We are really looking forward to a future stay.

Summary: The room size was adequate however had a damp smell, the service to the room was great with fresh towels daily, WiFi was OK couldn't connect in the room at times. Pool was great and breakfast had everything you need to get your day started. The accommodation is a little outdated but for the cost and location i would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank  you for the review. We are glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also happy that you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub. We are very happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but now charges a nightly ‚Äúresort fee‚Äù
Summary: Overall, the hotel is a nice and convenient option for a Disneyland visit. I‚Äôve stayed here a few times before, however upon check-in I was advised of a ‚Äúresort fee‚Äù which was not disclosed on Expedia when I made and paid for my booking. When I queried this charge, I was advised the charge was ‚Äúnew‚Äù. I didn‚Äôt think it was fair that i was charged this fee as I didn‚Äôt use any of the amenities. For me the hotel is literally a place to sleep, shower and store my luggage. I was literally at Disneyland from 7am-12am each day. This is a 2-star motel  and not a resort, so don‚Äôt know why they are even charging a ‚ÄúResort fee‚Äù. Yes, there is a pool, laundry mat and free parking, but I didn‚Äôt use any of these things. Guests should be asked if they want the amenities for an extra fee, as I
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad that you found our location so convenient. We are also happy that you were so comfortable here. We do offer wifi, breakfast, and parking included in your stay. Most hotels in the area do charge for these services. We do not, however we do charge a minimal fee of $7.50 per night resort fee. Access to our heated pool and hot tub as well as guest laundry is included as well. We also offer a 24 hour front desk, business center with ATM. We are do hope that you will be back to visit us again in the future.

Summary: I found the rooms to be very clean and the staff very friendly. I don't know what more you can ask for for the price! The location is a short walk to Disneyland that anyone without mobility problems can do with ease. I like to take a trip to Disneyland yearly and I will without a doubt stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found us to be such a great value. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We had a great stay at King‚Äôs Inn! We arrived at 8am and we were offered our room keys at that time which was such a pleasant surprise! I‚Äôm sure this isn‚Äôt always the case, but we were there midweek and off season.  We had an easy walk to Disneyland and were able to come back to the room for a nap before heading back to the park for evening shows.  The room was clean, comfortable, and had a fresh California look with large black and white photos of surfers on the beach.  The continental breakfast is a nice start to the day! I would highly recommend King‚Äôs Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you found our location to be so  convenient. We are also happy that you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We are really excited for a future stay. Thank you for  recommending us.

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, good location for Disney
Summary: Although this is an older hotel, the rooms have been updated. Our room was clean, and had most everything we needed. Our room had a good sized refrigerator, an excellent hair dryer, and tv (that we never used). The pool was small, but very clean!  We couldn't get wi-fi in our room after the first night, but it wasn't a big deal to us. If you are a light sensitive sleeper, bring an eye mask. There is a window above the door that is not covered by the curtain, the corridor lights brightly shine through. Also bring your own hair conditioner if that's important, they have the combo type. We rode the bus the first morning, buy bus pass for $6 in office. But missed it at night and didn't want to wait 30 more minutes so took Lyft.  After that we just used Lyft, about $5-7 depending on
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to another future visit.

Summary: They are charging me for a TV that i didnt break. Tryed to solve the issue on the phone but they told me there is nothing i can do, i wouldn¬¥t be writting here if i had broken the TV, its not fair what they are doing to me.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize for any inconvenience. We did  a full investigation and we did discover that the TV was broken during your stay in the room. We apologize for any inconvenience and assure you a full investigation has been put in place.

Summary: we decided this was the place. It had free breaky, a pool, close to shopping and close enough to Disneyland. the front staff was great to me and my kiddos. watching the fireworks from the roof was a plus as was the eateries being so close. We loved the rooms. tough to complain with the price. Happy Canadians!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you had such a wonderful experience! We are looking forward to another future visit!

Summary: The room was perfect, 10 min walk to Disneyland.  Plus a 10 min walk in the other direction to so many different restaurants, bars, coffee, breakfast.  It was exactly what we needed.  Would recommend. The do offer a free breakfast, it does get busy, so would recommend going early
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you were so comfortable in your room and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really looking forward to a future stay.

Summary: This trip was amazing! Thanks to Kings Inn, walking to Disney was a breeze since it was so close. It felt nice experiencing it without the hassle of having to uber every where. They have an amazing  continental breakfast that helped with getting to Disney early & on time each day that we went. It is also right next to this plaza with a bunch of different restaurants such as Cheesecake Factory, PF Chang‚Äôs, Roy‚Äôs, Bumba Gumps... as well as this rooftop bar called The Fifth. All walking distance!!! I definitely recommend staying here for your Disney vacations.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you loved staying with us so much! We are delighted to that you had such a lovely stay. We are excited for another future visit.

Summary: Our stay at Kings Inn in Anaheim was sufficient for our needs. A friend and I stayed 3 nights for a girls trip to Disneyland. The hotel itself looks a bit outdated from the outside, but feels a bit more modern in the room. There was ample space in the room with a wide vanity. The beds were comfortable to sleep in after spending 16 hours at the park. While the hotel was definitely within walking distance, it did feel a bit lengthy when walking home each night. Overall, it was a decent stay for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay.We are happy that you found our location so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are really looking forward to another future stay.

Summary: Overall the hotel was an okay place to stay for us Disney travelers.  The staff were very friendly and the pool was nice and relaxing!  Maybe a little dirty on one of the nights we were there, but that was only 1 of the 4 nights we swam.  The hotel room was clean.  But the first thing I noticed was that the beds were kinda squished, pretty close to the walls.  You couldn't really walk in between them on one of the beds.  And the beds were squeaky!!  You couldn't move without it squeaking really loud.  And our next door neighbors were very easy to hear as they chatted while getting ready for bed and in the morning.  Granted, we had a room that shared a door with them, so those walls may be more thin, but I had to knock on their door to tell them to be quieter.  I don't know if
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We  are glad to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are also happy that you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We do apologize for any issues that you may have experienced regarding noise in your room. We do have a 24 hour front desk. Please do no hesitate to let us know so we can address things for you. We do apologize for any inconvenience regarding housekeeping in your room. I assure you I will pass this on to our housekeeping manager for review. We do hope to see you return in the future.

Summary: Everyone is so nice!!! Alittle crowded for breakfast. The pool needed to be cleaned. The bed could have been better. I room was very clean. Good breakfast. Not sure why we had to pay for the Breakfast when it was FREE.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a wonderful stay! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted that they provided you with such great friendly service. We are excited for a future stay!

Summary: Excellent hotel with the benefit of breakfast, walking distance to Disney, and easy access to the freeways for everything else. The check in was very simple and they allowed me to request a second floor unit. I will always recommend Kings Inn!
Manager Response: We thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such an excellent stay with us. We are really excited to hear that you will be recommending us to others! We hope to see you return again soon

Summary: We spent 2 weeks at the kings inn, the room was spacious and clean. The pool was kept clean, the staff were really lovely! The free breakfast was good too, and the walk to Disney land took 10-15 mins. The only one thing that I would change is the fact that the rooms don‚Äôt have their own safes, that would of made our stay perfect. We will be back , thanks again üòä
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to say that today we are in process of putting safes in all of our rooms. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: 2nd time I have stayed and will stay again. Only down side was that the room still got a large amount of light even with curtains drawn. People above us let their kids run a marathon all morning. Clean and comfy staff is great. Breakfast could be a bit longer.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such a wonderful experience and we are really excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: What a wonderful experience we had at this hotel. Above and beyond expectations for the price. Excellent value! The rooms were clean and perfect. Only a 10 minute walk (.7 miles) to the main gates. Thanks for making our Disneyland and Disney‚Äôs California Adventure trip amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a great stay with us. We are so happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations! We are really looking forward to another future visit.

Summary Heading: Decent hotel with a good location
Summary: The room was clean and well serviced, the hotel is close to Disney as well as many dining options, and the staff at the front desk were friendly. However, the hotel‚Äôs breakfast is lacking and the pool is in the middle of the parking lot which in the deceiving pictures can be overlooked.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We are also happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are sorry to hear that you did not care for the pool location. We are actually in process of a remodel for our whole pool area. We are really hoping to see you return again in the future.

Summary Heading: A great hotel for families on a budget.  Close to Disneyland.
Summary: It was a nice inexpensive hotel.  The hot tub and pool were usually full of people so I didn't use them.  The housekeeping staff was great.  They did a great job cleaning the room every day.  The breakfast room was quite small and it was tough to get around all the people.  The staff tried to keep up with the spills.  I would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you had such a great time staying with us and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are happy that we fit into your budget as well. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. it is wonderful that they provided you with the service that you deserve. Thank you for recommending us and we do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed here as we knew it was within walking distance of Disneyland. Our room was lovely and spacious, very clean and tidy. I was concerned as we were opposite the pool but it got locked at 10pm every night so no issues. Breakfast was rather basic and not the best, but we were aware of this before arriving so had picked a few bits up and left in the fridge in room. No noise from rooms around us and for a small deposit you can rent a safe deposit box in reception. All staff were lovely and helpful. I will be back here on my next visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our location to be so perfect for you! It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient! We are glad that you you had such and enjoyable stay and that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: A good deal for visiting disneyland
Summary: A basic motel popular with those not wanting to pay top dollar in the area, and yet be within walking distance to Disneyland. The rooms are a good size for two or three people, and clean and comfortable. It has a good pool and good basic breakfast. If your after a clean motel very close to Disney at a good price its worth putting on the list.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found we fit into your budget! We are excited that you loved our heated pool and hot tub and so excited that you found our breakfast met your breakfast needs. We are so happy to hear you will be "putting us on your list!"

Summary: Was a nice Hotel. It was very clean. Cleaner than 4-5 star Hotels that we have stayed before. Walking distance from Disneyland was sure nice. We got to leave our car right at the hotel. No parking hassles. Also it includes a free breakfast. We will return.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such a great value! We are glad that you found our location so convenient. We are really excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Large room. Breakfast not great. Good location
Summary: Kings Inn in Anaheim has a very small and basic pool, the pool in Kings Inn San Diego is much larger and nicer.  The bedroom itself is great. Family of 4, we had 2 large beds and they were fine to sleep on. There is a fridge, there is no safe. The room is very clean. The breakfast room is dirty and the food is not nice, we did not eat there at all. The staff cut the bananas in half and do not clean the tables. I really won‚Äôt recommend!   As for Disney, it‚Äôs a good 15 minute walk from Disney, which is ok. There are closer hotels. The walk was simple enough. The hotel is well located for pharmacies. The pharmacies do sell food and drinks, which was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. As it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations, we are sorry to hear that this was not the case. I assure you I will pass this on to our management for review. We do hope that you will be returning in the future.

Summary: I was very disappointed... Wifi access was a struggle, credit card/paying issues (while things were  already paid upfront), unfriendly staff, very basic breakfast, noisy rooms with too much light coming in from the outside, overprized, etc.  Especially not recommendable when you are not a US citizen (lots of issues with wifi access and payment).
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. As it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations we are sorry to hear that this was not the case. We apologize for any inconvenience. I assure you I will pass this on to our front desk manager as well as the housekeeping manager for review. We do hope that you will be returning.

Summary: Very Nice! Have been going here since 2000 when a Disneyland Annual pass was only 99 bucks! Cheesecake factory is a half block away and they have a great deck to people watch! jaccuzi is another one of my favorites after a couple of cocktails at the Cheesecake Factory!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It really is terrific that you found our location so convenient. We are are always excited to hear form repeat guest's. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great place to base yourself for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: We had such a lovely stay at the Kings Inn Anaheim (September 2018). The included continental breakfast did the trick to set us up for a busy day at Disneyland.  After a 14 hour flight from Australia, we received an early check in and were allowed to have some breakfast. Just what we needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. We are really looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: The Kings Inn, is about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.   Plenty of parking and large rooms. A good breakfast is provided with toast, boiled eggs, pastries, fruit, waffles, cereal, yogurt, juices and coffee. A good assortment that satisfies everyone and it‚Äôs a good start to the day. Thee is also a coffee maker in the room and a bar fridge.  There is also an air conditioner that you can regulate the temperature of to your liking in each room. There is a laundry at the hotel and an outdoor swimming pool.  A large shopping centre right next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you had such a wonderful stay with us. We are glad to hear that you found our breakfast, which is included in your stay so delicious! We are hoping to see you return again soon

Summary Heading: The rooms are crean and confortables
Summary: It has an excellent location, you can walk to go to Disney and there are so many restaurants very close. The waffles were delicious, is the best food of the brakfast, all the personal is very kind and it has a very good service
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted to hear that you were so comfortable here! We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast that is included in your stay. We do want to thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. its great to hear that they provided you with that excellent service that you deserve. We are excited for another future stay!

Summary Heading: Reasonable pricing and great location to Disneyland and
Summary: Found this through using Hotels.com and their rates were very good compared to other hotels nearby. Rooms were clean, we had free parking, it's very close to Disneyland and restaurants. Overall a terrific deal!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that we fit so well into your budget. We are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are so excited for a future visit!

Summary Heading: Great value and close proximity to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here with my wife for a few days in June and although the outside looks dated, the rooms were in good shape. Offered free breakfast and it is a very short walk to get to the Disneyland parks. This is a great value for people not looking to break the bank on their hotel but want to be close to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found us to be such a great value.  We are also happy that you found our location so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We hope to see you return again in the future.

Summary: Loved how clean and spacious the room was! Can‚Äôt beat the free breakfast in the morning (my boys loved the waffles) right before you head out to Disney. Not to mention the inn is walking distance from Disney, Starbucks, and a few other restaurants. If you request something from the front, they bring it literally immediately and they also give you fresh towels when they notice that you‚Äôre out. Only reason I didn‚Äôt give a five star was because they shouldn‚Äôt advertise free WiFi if the WiFi is horrible. It was really just pointless to sign into it because it was THAT horrible. Other than that, I would definitely recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We are glad that you found our location so handy and that you had such a good stay. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: Excellent location near Disney Park and with many restaurants options. The hotel is very safe and very quiet, the rooms are very clean and very spacious, the hotel staff is very friendly. I consider that for its excellent location, prices are quite accessible
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient for you. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are glad to hear that we fit so well into your budget and we are really looking forward to a future stay.

Summary: Room was great, clean. The hardwood floors make the room seem extra clean. The pool / hot tub area is lovely to rest your sore feet. The breakfast was excellent!!! A staff member always had waffles ready for the kids and we went with the healthy options of oatmeal, fruit, yogurt. And the staff was alway refilling items so it was plentiful.  Great Location to Disneyland. We watched the fireworks from the hotel.  We stopped at Walgreens across the street for water and snacks each day on our way. Also near is Bubba Gumps Shrimp Factory and The Cheese Cake Cafe as well as a strip mall of fast food restaurants.  My only wish was there was a little grassy area and small playground the kids could have gone to play at. But with that said, I would stay here again and recommend the King‚Äôs
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so glad that you had such an excellent stay! We are delighted to hear you will be returning! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very comfortable rooms. Property seemed dated on the outside, but everything was updated and in top shape inside the rooms. Beds were comfortable, pillows were ok (not used to sleeping with square pillows), and the amenities inside the room were up to standard. I would stay there again for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found we fit into your budget. We are also happy to hear that you will be returning! We do look forward to it.

Summary: Stayed here for a conference at the convention center. Perfectly located for conferences or a visit to the parks. Would stay again!  Only complaint is that breakfast didn‚Äôt have many options and the tiny room was packed both days I tried to get food.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so glad to hear that you found us to be so convenient when attending an event at the Anaheim Convention Center. It is true we are just a few minute walk to there. We are hoping to see you return again in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable off property hotel near Disneyland.
Summary: So I really struggled a bit with giving this 3 stars vs 4. First, the hotel is perfectly fine. It is about 1/2 a mile from the Disney Main Gates. The rooms are comfortable and very clean. A really nice feature is the the Free parking where most hotels in the area charge you. This is the reason why I ended up giving it 4 rather then 3.   The disappoint is the free breakfast. First is is closer to a Continental breakfast but to be honest it was truly awful and not edible in either my opinion or my wife's. In the grand scheme of things not a big deal. The most surprising was the pre-mix waffle mix they were using. Usually that is hard to screw up but what ever they purchase didn't taste experience but it was horrible and we just tossed them. I have had some mediocre waffles in my
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also glad to hear that you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We are sorry to hear that you did not care for our freshly baked waffles. We do hope that you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary: Semi comfortable room.  Daily items not replaced like paper cups, tea and coffee, and bath products.  Requested linen change by putting sign on bed as requested and no linen change.  Complimentary  Breakfast was very high in sugar not realy dietary friendly nor much option
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. As it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations, we are sorry to hear that this was not the case. I assure you we have passed this on to our housekeeping manager for review. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. We are hoping to see you return again in the future.

Summary: We chose this motel for its price, proximity to Disneyland, and complimentary breakfast. Fingers crossed.  We drove into Anaheim the day before our visit to Disneyland. The staff kindly accommodated our request for an early check-in.  The kids swam in the pool all afternoon. The kids loved the big room and comfy beds.  I appreciated the laminate flooring - especially when wet kids were coming from the pool and out of the shower (which they loved!) The staff gave us good recommendations for food and transportation to the resort and provided tickets to the ART bus.
