They offered to print our Disneyland tickets, but I had purchased them on the Disneyland App.The next day we caught the ART bus on the corner of Katella and Harbor Blvd. and got dropped off right at the entrance to
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such an excellent value when visiting the Disneyland Park. Thank you for the compliment to our staff. It is wonderful to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are excited for your return.

Summary: Great location, good breakfast, nice pool and hot tub, used the washers and dryers (great), nice room.  Wish there was a microwave available later than 10 pm (there are some in the laundry room).  We 'lost' a stuffed animal and the staff was great about helping us find it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so excited to hear that you had such a wonderful stay with us. We are really looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I was a little nervous about staying here due to the age of the place, but it was VERY clean and I have no complaints at all.  The rooms are comfortable and clean.  The place has been updated and I love all the ports for charging phones, electronics, etc.  The only issue we had was one day we didn't have any wash clothes left after they had cleaned the room (we stayed 8 nights) & when I called down to the main desk that night to let them know, the guy at the front desk said I could come to the office and get some.....I was in my night gown!  It was an oversight and the rest of the stay was really great.  I would stay there again, it isn't anything luxurious, but it is a clean place to sleep.  Thanks Kings Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear you had a nice stay. It is wonderful that you were so comfortable in your room. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay with us. We unfortunately do not have overnight housekeeping, only our front desk is here overnight. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Walking distance to convention center. Friendly and helpful staff at front desk on both shifts Fully stocked breakfast until closing. Clean and quiet. Rooftop Patio for a nice view of Disney's fireworks show.  Their ad does not misrepresent. Great value! Discounted ticket purchase for area attractions with advice from the front desk made my trip to Medevial Times seamless and enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you stayed with us during Vidcon. We are just a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center making it so convenient! It is so wonderful to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget. We are really hoping that you will be back to viit us again in the future.

Summary: We went for the annual Vidcon and location was perfect, we will be back again for sure and King‚Äôs Inn is my first choice. Walking distance to Disney as well, we visited downtown Disney on our trip. Parking is great, only downside is breakfast options and how small the room it‚Äôs provided in. But we aren‚Äôt big breakfast eaters anyhow, so I was fine! Got to see the Disney firework show each night from all areas of the property as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great that you found our location to be so convenient for you during your stay. We are also excited to know that you enjoyed the fireworks from our sundeck. We are really hoping to see you return for a future stay.

Summary: Location, location, location. Nothing is fancy or luxurious, but the price for the location can't be beat. A short 10-minute walk from your room leads you to Disney's front gates. Plus along the way is a large pharmacy and many eateries.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you found our location to be so convenient while visiting Disneyland. It is true, we are just 15 minutes walk from the entrance to the Disneyland park. We do hope to see you return again in the future.

Summary: I booked this hotel because of the price, so the saying that you get what you pay for is true.  The free breakfast was not very good, with minimal selection and very cramped eating area.  The pillows were small and flat. The wifi was sporadic and slow.  Two days in a row we came back to our room at 2 pm to find our room had not been cleaned yet, so the next day we had to put in a special request for cleaning.  After walking around Disneyland all day this hotel is just too far away for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you found we fit into your budget. We do offer breakfast that is included in your stay. We offer fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hard cooked eggs with salt and pepper, freshly baked waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee. We are sorry to hear that this did not meet your breakfast needs. We are sorry to hear your room was not made up as early as you would have liked. I assure you we will pass this on to the housekeeping manager for review. We hope to see you return again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good bang for the buck for a family trip to Disneyland.
Summary: We stayed here in a double queen room for 4 nights for a trip to Disneyland.  The rooms themselves were very nice.  It was fairly recently renovated as far as I could tell and it had the wood flooring that is popular these days.  The layout was a little awkward since one side of each bed was very close to a wall.  Housekeeping did an excellent job while we were there as well.  We also never had any issues with hot water which was a big plus.    The layout of the hotel means it runs lengthwise from the street back into its own fenced in enclosure.  So if you are at the back of the hotel and you are walking to Disneyland it's an extra couple hundred yards hike.  Not a big deal but I'll try to get a room closer to the front next time.    The breakfast buffet is pretty typical for a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are excited to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback regarding the breakfast room, we are in the process of expanding the area for our guest. Thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Having arrived in Anaheim after a long drive from Las Vegas We found the Airbnb place we booked not up to standard so  we hurriedly looked around and got a room in Kings Inn. We were not sure what to expect but were pleasently  surprised  at the quality of this hotel. Staff were great and location perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy you found our staff to be great and our location to be convenient. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: hotel has everything you need for a quick Disney trip! Our room was sparkling clean (the bathroom was literally shinning), parking was free and plentiful, small breakfast til 9 (very minimal fruits and cereal to get you going real quick) and friendly staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy you had a great stay, enjoyed our breakfast, and found our staff to be friendly. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We love staying here. The staff at this motel are super friendly and helpful and we are always made welcome.  The rooms are clean and quiet. Breakfast is provided with a wide selection available.  The motel is situated only a 10 minute walk from Disneyland.  FREE car parking is available for quests. There are plenty of eateries nearby.  The Reception staff can also book bus tours if required.  Disneyland tickets can be purchased from reception.  Disney fireworks can be viewed from the upstairs balcony every evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast, found our rooms to be quiet, and our location to be convenient. There is someone available in the front desk lobby 24 hours, and we are always more than happy to help out our guest to make their trip more enjoyable. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We booked four nights in Kings Inn Anaheim based on the positive reviews that I read. We really enjoyed our stay there. Staff were so kind and friendly,  the place is cozy. Beside that It is so near to Disneylnad, around 12 to 15 mins walk ( a walk with two four-year old girls, you can expect the speed of walling).  The breakfast was just the basics, but it was more than enough to have energy to walk to Disneyland. The breakfast included mainly boiled eggs, toast, small danishes, waffles, flakes, fruit, jam, juice, tea, coffee and milk. You don't need more than that or you will stay at the hotel for the rest of the day :)  Well, having free wifi and free parking during our stay was awesome and especially parking. And one more thing that I really enjoyed is that the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy you found our location to be so convenient. Yes, we are about a 10-15 minute walk from Disneyland and we are next door to the GardenWalk Outlet, which does have many tasty restaurants in there. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast, found our rooms to be spacious, and our staff to be kind and friendly. We are excited to hear that you will be returning to our hotel, and will be giving Kings Inn San Diego a try as well. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Went to Star Wars Galaxy's Edge for my birthday. Decided to get a room for two nights to get the full Disney experience.
Summary: The hotel/inn was great! Nothing lavishing but the room was really cheap so we didn't have high expectations. The room was very spacious and the beds are comfortable. Although there were a lot of families that stayed at the inn, there was not much noise at all. Very relaxing and convenient to walk to the parks. I would definitely stay here again for a Disney trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad  to hear that you had such a great stay! We are also happy that you found our location to be so convenient when visiting Batuu. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: I‚Äôm from New Jersey and go to Walt Disney world every year. We always stay on Disney property so we were hesitant to stay off property and in a motel. I read so many reviews and decided to stay here after it got such good feedback. Motels are definitely different in Anaheim than back home. This place was beautiful inside. Rooms very spacious and beds were big and comfortable. Check in was super easy and we had a room on the first floor right next to the breakfast room. It was so nice just waking up and being able to walk to the park. No waiting for shuttles or anything. No longer than a 7 minute walk and you were in through the security gates. At the price of this hotel I can‚Äôt imagine staying anywhere else. It‚Äôs such a fantastic deal and a great location. If you have a car they
Manager Response: We thank you so much for the great review. We are so happy that you had such a wonderful stay and that your visit to Disneyland was so fantastic. We are happy that we fit so well into your budget and that you found our location to be so convenient. we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Great friendly service at check in, rooms  are clean as seen in the website photos, good breakfast with a variety of options, location was 10 mins walk to Disneyland. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy you enjoyed our breakfast, found our staff to be friendly, and our location to be within walking distance to Disneyland. We are excited to hear you will be staying with us again and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Amazing stay! We will be back!!
Summary: Kings inn was awesome! Clean, pool was a terrific surprise, and early breakfast was totally a plus!!! Minutes to Disneyland!! A+++ Special shout out to our morning breakfast lady Lanny for being top Mitch! And to our concierge people at the front desk, they all did a superb job! Thank you, we will be back!! Robert 407-247-8966
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you had such an amazing stay. We are glad to hear that your staff was so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We stayed at the Kings Inn Anaheim the last 4 days. Checking out today. Booked a 1 room queen bed room. The room was clean and updated. We had room 206 near the office and breakfast room. They were downstairs, we were up. Pool was clean and so was hot tub. We did not have a chance to use. Pool goes up to 8 feet. We did laundry. $3 each to wash and dry. Washers are large and so are dryers. We brought our own soap. $2 for soap and $2 for Bounce sheets if you don‚Äôt.   Walk to Disney was about 15-20 mins. Bubba Gumps is next door with happy hour 3-6.   Breakfast was ok. Need more options for gluten free folks such as Cheerios or Chex. They had small danishes, toast, Raisin Bran, Frosted Flakes, hot chocolate, coffee, tea, oatmeal, yogurt, hard boiled eggs, oranges, juice, milk, jam,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you found our location to be convenient and our staff to be friendly and helpful. We appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast and will forward this to our manager.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Good hotel nice location to see Disney
Summary: We liked the stay nice location, just 8 min walk to Disney. I will book again here in future.  What I liked:  Neat and clean room.  Breakfast  Parking was near to my room.  What I don't liked:   1) They asked me to pay a 100$ refundable deposit while check-in even through I paid full money while booking the room and not refunded it back even after the 3rd day of checkout while I am writing this review. I think this is unfair. This is just to hold customers money. I cannot think this is for security any way because their hotel items worth only 100$? I stayed 3 other hotels in this trip none of them did this to me. Ok how this affect me as this is refundable? Ok, my credit card bill will be generated on 7th so this appears in my bill and I get this adjusted only next month.   2)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our property to be within walking distance to Disneyland. We are glad that you found our rooms to be clean and enjoyed our breakfast. We do authorize a $100.00 refundable security deposit in case there are any damages made to our room and/or items missing from the room. We do also release the $100.00 refundable security deposit the day you check out after the housekeeping checks the room. The bank does take 3-5 business days for the $100.00 refundable security deposit to drop off. We do charge $5.00 plus tax per night if our guest would like to have a microwave in the room. However, we have microwaves available in the breakfast room which is open from 6:00 AM to 9:00 AM and another one in our laundry room from 7:00 AM to 10:00 PM for our guest to use for free. We appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Bizarre Breakfast Experience, Otherwise Great Value Walking Distance to Disneyland
Summary: Upon check-in, I was very impressed. For the affordable room price, the check-in staff were friendly and helpful, the location convenient to our 2 destinations - Disneyland & the Queen Mary, the pool small but clean & perfect for a four-year-old, the room was spacious, modern and clean. Walkable to Disneyland itself, too. The entire experience was ruined by the bizarre, militaristic "hard stop" on breakfast at exactly 9 a.m. (8:59 a.m., to be exact). If you're going to have staff push back on the entrance door to breakfast the moment the clock strikes 9, you should indicate that to guests upon check-in. I mean, really stress you're going to do that; because it was so rude, unexpected and bizarre, and made our entire morning so much less relaxing than it would've been, it was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you liked the location of our property, found our check-in staff to be friendly, and found our property to be budget friendly. Please accept our sincerest apologies regarding the breakfast incident. We do inform the guest upon check-in that our breakfast hours are from 6:00 AM to 9:00 AM and we also have it written on the map that we use to show our guest where their rooms are. We appreciate you bringing this up to our attention, and we will forward this to our management. We strive to make our guests feel comfortable during their stay and we apologize for the inconvenience you faced. It is reviews like yours that help us further improve ourselves.

Summary: Had a Great experience. Stayed with my daughter for a nearby softball tournament. The rooms were very clean, the TV worked great and the water pressure was perfect. Newly updated rooms.  Bed was comfortable. Parking was free and easy.  Staff was very nice. Will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you had a great experience while staying with us. We are glad that you found our rooms to be clean, our beds to be comfortable, and our staff to be very nice. We are looking forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Ghetto but nice price for close location. Go w low expectations and you will be fine.
Summary: This is a budget hotel and you get what you pay for.  If you go into with low expectations you will be fine.   The rooms are decent enough, they've been updated with LVP flooring. While this looks nice, it makes for a little bit of a gross situation in your sheets at night because unlike when you walk on carpet, when you walk on LVP, your feet pick up the little crumbs of dirt which end up in your sheets at night. I would have preferred carpet that gets vacuumed daily.   Coffee only restocked one day that we were there.  The shower plumbing is very loud so if the person below you takes a shower, it is VERY loud and it will wake you up.  Fortunately there was only one day that the people below us woke before we did.     There was a lot of pot smoking going on at the hotel so
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We appreciate all your detailed feedback, and we will forward this to management to investigate. We apologize for any inconveniences you faced during your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Second time staying at The Kings Inn within 6 months. Great location, about a 10/15 min walk to Disney and close to food options. Has parking and a pool.   Room size was good although bathroom is on the small side. Breakfast was included but ate out each morning.  Room was upstairs and no lift was mentioned so not sure if they have one so could be difficult for lots of luggage.  Staff were very friendly and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our property to be close to Disneyland, and found our staff to be friendly. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: free parking, free breakfast, pool AND down the street from Disneyland!
Summary: This is the place I stay when going to Disneyland.  Reasonable price, free parking, free breakfast (don't be so picky...it's decent food that beats paying Disney prices!) it may not have a spa for massages or a bell hop, but no one ever uses those things and you end up paying for them when you stay at more expensive properties.  our room was clean and quiet.  Thanks for a great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our property to be reasonably priced, clean, quiet, and enjoyed our breakfast. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: It was kinda noise at night outside our room area. Walls were thin. Breakfast ok, nothing special. Rooms were clean. No elevators, but it was alright with us only had one luggage. It was close to everything, that was a plus. I give this place above average rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean and our property to be close to everything. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconveniences you faced during your stay. We do have a 24/7 front desk staff and security at night to assist guests with any issues they may have. We appreciate your feedback regarding our walls and breakfast. We will forward this to management so we can further improve ourselves. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: A great hotel with all the amenities you need for your stay.   The rooms are generous in size and have everything from a blow dryer to a flatscreen tv with many channels. They are also extremely clean. The hotel is also only around 10 - 15 minutes walk to Disneyland and has lots of shops, cafes and bars within a 5 minute walk.    The staff were all very helpful and friendly with nothing being problem. Breakfast is ok if you are into waffles, pastries etc. Not my thing but that‚Äôs ok.   All in all we enjoyed our stay here and will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our property to be clean, within walking distance to Disneyland, and found our staff to be friendly/ helpful. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed here in March, the rooms were super clean, and super friendly staff. Our kids loved the pool. The breakfast was basic but did the job before a long day at the parks. If you are looking for a 5 star Hilton this is not the place for you, if you are looking for a 5 star at a great price this is your place, We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean, our staff to be super friendly, and that your family enjoyed the use of our heated pool/ hot tub. We appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast as well. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Fine place to stay, nice and close to the Disney parks
Summary: Much of the accommodation near Disneyland has become very expensive but the rooms at Kings Inn were reasonably priced which is why I booked it.  My wife and I arrived early (around 9am) after our flight from Australia and were given a room straight away which was great. The room turned out to be next door to the laundry and was quite noisy, so the staff happily moved us to a better location. The room was spacious and clean, the wifi was fine and the bed was comfortable. We never ate the breakfast so can't comment on that, but we did look and see that they had boiled eggs available which would have given another option to all the sweet stuff that Americans seem to love. We'd highly recommend this hotel as an economical and comfortable place to stay that is nice and close to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean, spacious, and budget friendly. We are glad that our staff was able to accommodate you to an early check-in and move your room to a location of your liking. We appreciate you recommending us to others. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: The walk to Disneyland was a little far compared to other hotels I‚Äôve stayed at! But doable! The staff was nice, the rooms were small but extremely clean! I loved the hardwood floor in the rooms! Overall great experience and very very very budget friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our property to be within walking distance to Disneyland, found our rooms to be clean, loved our floors, and found us to be budget friendly. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: First things first, the pictures on trip advisor make this place look a lot nicer than what it actually is.  However, that doesn't mean it is bad - far from it.  Free breakfast, free WiFi, free parking and it is a 15 min walk to disney.  We walked with our two young kids in strollers to disney and stopped off at the 7/11 on the way to grab cheap drinks and snacks rather than paying disney prices and it worked well.   For the price point this place was excellent value for money and I'd choose to stay here again.  If you've ever done disney before you know that really all you need is a clean and safe hotel and this fits the bill nicely.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our property to be an excellent value for the money and that you would choose to stay with us again. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: I thoroughly researched options in Anaheim & the Kings Inn is honestly the best value! It has convenient facilities & is only a short walk to Disney. The money you save is worth the extra couple of minutes walk. The rooms are clean & the staff are friendly & accommodating. The hotel laundry is easy & convenient to use & the breakfast is great - hot fresh waffles were my favourite option. It works out as an awesome money saver. We also stayed at this same hotel back in 2012 when it was known as the Super8. Glad we chose it to stay at again. I would highly recommend Kings Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean, our property to be budget friendly, and within walking distance to Disneyland. We are glad that our staff was able to show you how friendly and accommodating they are! We are happy that you had a chance to enjoy our breakfast and liked our laundry facility. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us again and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Rooms were very clean and great spot to see the fireworks. Staff were very polite and made the process easy to check in and out. Had a great stay and definitely plan to come back on my next vacation..
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean, our staff to be polite, and enjoyed the view of Disneyland firework from our property. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a great experience at the kings Inn and will be back! It is a clean and spacious room with in walking distance to Disneyland.  We used the pool and hot tub every day to relax in and looked forward to the rest. The front desk staff was amazing and pleasant, as well as the everyone else we encountered. We opted to rent a microwave in our room at $5 per day but did find a public microwave in the laundry room. We did laundry at $3 per load and $3 per dry. It was fast and did a fine job. Breakfast was a little squishy with lots of people and not much room but it served its purpose and filled us up. We were thankful to the waffle lady...lol,  without her it would not have run so smoothly. Overall we were extremely happy and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean, spacious, and within walking distance to Disneyland. We are glad that our staff was able to show you how amazing and pleasant they are! We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: great location, friendly staff, bus right in front! It was great! Clean, quiet, very nice. Will definitely stay there again. it was nice having a refrigerator in the room as well as a hair dryer.  Close to CVS in case you forget something.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean and quiet. We are glad that you liked the location of our property and our staff was able to show you how friendly they are. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: The location is prime, however, the rooms were just ehh.  After reviews, I was looking forward to staying here.  We were on the main level and could hear the upstairs room walking LOUDLY upstairs.  Sounded like a stampede.  You could also hear the room next door and their conversations and they were talking normal.  The walls are paper thin.  The towels they provide for the pool are tiny but you aren't allowed to take the room towels.  Also, not a great breakfast selection.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconveniences you faced during your stay. We do have a 24/7 front desk staff and security at night to assist guests with any issues they may have. We appreciate your feedback regarding our walls, pool towel, and breakfast. We will forward this to management. It is feedback like yours that help us improve our property. We hope you visit us again so we can better serve you.

Summary: Wasn‚Äôt impressed with this motel, for the price I paid it should be about $50 less a night. The only really positive thing I can stay about this place is we were able to check into our room at 9am as our flight landed so early. Though I have a feeling why, as our room faced the parking garage - which was very noisy and loud, car alarms would be going off at late hours. We could also hear our neighbours chatting in the room next door - thin walls.   I like the laminated floors rather than carpet. But the room had a bit of a funny smell, which we got used too. The first day our towels were off-white, the next our used towels were taken but not replenished, the next day we actually had white towels. I saw various marks on the bed sheets, and the beds were quite loud.  Breakfast was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are glad that we were able to check you in early. We apologize for the inconveniences you faced during your stay. This is not a normal occurrence for our property.  I have passed your feedback to our housekeeping and maintenance managers to investigate and take all the necessary actions to improve it. We appreciate your feedback regarding the Garden Walk's parking garage and our breakfast. It is reviews like yours that help us improve our property.

Summary: The rooms where nice and big.  The staff was friendly.  Only thing is I wish they had a tram to and from.  But the walk back from Disneyland isn‚Äôt that bad, but with toddlers it can be rough.  Overall a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be spacious, our staff to be friendly, and our property to be within walking distance to Disneyland. The ART city shuttle does stop in front of our hotel every 20-30 minutes. It starts to run an hour before the park opens and closes 30 minutes after the park closes. The tickets are $5.00 cash per adult, per day and $2.00 cash per child (ages 3 to 9) and seniors per day. We are looking forward to your future visit.

Summary: Have stayed here twice now and both times have been great.  This time, Jessica at the front desk went above & beyond by getting something we left in our room.  Thank you so much Jessica!  You were so kind & helpful!!   Rooms are clean, waffles at breakfast were great.  Nice, clean hotel that‚Äôs just about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you stayed with us twice and found it to be great. We are glad that Jessica was able to help you retrieve your item. We appreciate you finding our rooms to be clean, enjoyed our breakfast, and found our property to be close to Disneyland. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We arrived to California at 4 in the morning. It was too early to check in so we ate at IHOP to kill some time. Then we fell asleep in our car. We woke up at 730 and went to the hotel.  We wanted to go to Disneyland so when I went to the front desk I asked if we could just park our car and we will come back to check-in at the appropriate time. They were kind enough to let us check in early! I was so happy! We were lucky that they had a couple of rooms available.   Now I'm here reading other peoples review and they are complaining about the breakfast. Come on seriously? You are going to complain about FREE FOOD?! If you are going to complain then go to IHOP and spend $15 on a plate of anything. I am thankful that there was food for us to eat because it saved us alot of money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that we were able to accommodate you with an early check in. We try our very best to make our guests feel comfortable and welcomed! We appreciate you liking our breakfast and how close we are to Disneyland. We are glad that you found our rooms to be clean as well. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: good deal for a good price
Summary: room was clean every day. we had a problem with our shower draining and they had it fixed very fast. only complaint is breakfast is such a free for all as the space is very limited. just not big enough for when the motel is very busy. nice to be close to Disney too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that your room was clean every day and that we were able to quickly fix the shower. We appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast and we will forward this to our management. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Rooms were clean and comfortable, looked newly renovated. Staff were friendly and accommodating!  Easy walk to Disney, 12 minutes at a leisurely pace. Many restaurants within minutes walk: Subway, Blaze Pizza, Bubba Gump's. Walgreens, CBS and 7 eleven right around the corner.  Really enjoyed our stay as we visited Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our recently renovated rooms to be clean, comfortable, and liked the location of our property. We are glad that our staff was able to show you how friendly and accommodating they are. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Alright for a budget Disneyland trip
Summary: I booked a stay here based on reviews. It was one of the few places that had a breakfast included which seemed like a plus, but their selection of stuff wasn't that great and like others have said, the breakfast room is TINY. The room was very clean especially for a place of this caliber. The bed was really firm though and I woke up sore every morning. They charged a resort fee that wasn't mentioned when booking which would have been nice to know about. It's about a 15 minute walk from Disneyland. We went for 3 days with our 9 year old. While it was close enough, I think we'll try for something a little closer next time. In all, it was an okay stay for the money, but I think next time we'll spend a little more for something nicer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be very clean. We are currently working diligently to further improve our breakfast. However, currently we do offer fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hard boiled eggs with salt and pepper, freshly baked waffles with syrup, hot oatmeal, two kinds of cold cereal with milk, sweet danish's, two kinds of juices, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee. Please accept our sincerest apologies regarding the bed, we will forward this our maintenance management and take all the necessary actions. We do include the $7.50 resort fee per night, along with the $100.00 refundable security deposit on our website and require all the websites that advertise for us to do the same. We apologize if it was not clear to you and we appreciate you bringing it up to our attention. We appreciate your feedback, this helps us better improve our property.

Summary: Rooms are really clean and updated. Room had plenty of amenities like a coffee maker, fridge and nice toiletries. Plenty of drawers and a closet to put away clothes. A/C unit was a modern unit with auto or fan options to keep room at whatever temp you set. There is a complimentary breakfast available which unfortunately we didn't get to try because we had to leave early. The exterior of the place looks dated but once inside, the room is very nice and fresh. Will stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you liked how clean our rooms are and liked our amenities. We are glad you appreciated our newly renovated rooms as well. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Good location, FREE parking, FREE breakfast
Summary: Location is good. 15 minute walk to parks, don't think you can cut through the back of the property, you can't! You have to walk all the way around via sidewalks as each property near the park has walls, fences, or hedges built around them. Property is CLEAN, they take pride in this! Pool was heated which made our trip nicer since we were able to enjoy it in cooler weather. FREE parking and a FREE breakfast with hot waffles! The FREE parking, FREE breakfast and within walking distance to the park is why we booked here. No issues staying here however, I would book closer to the main entrance next time. After long days at the park the savings to walk further ended up not being worth it to me. Nice stay, nice hotel, would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so ecstatic to hear that you found our location to be within walking distance to the parks and found our property to be clean. We are glad you were able to enjoy our heated pool and hot tub as well as our breakfast. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Nice room at a moderate price
Summary: Our room was spacious, quiet,  and clean, and the bed was actually comfortable.  It was a little farther (1/2 mile or so) than motels we have stayed at before, but the room was about half the price for the same quality as those that are closer.  And there was no additional charge for parking, and the price included breakfast. There are also several nice restaurants close by.  This is a great value for Disneyland visitors (and there aren't many great values in that area).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear that you found our rooms to be spacious, quiet, clean, and found our beds to be comfortable. We are happy that you found many restaurants near us and found us to be a budget friendly option. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great hotel very close to Disneyland. Very clean rooms with hard wood floors and  fantastic reception staff with very comfy queen size beds. Shower in bathroom with good water pressure and a tasty breakfast included. Fantastic pool and great hot tub. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean, found our front desk staff to be fantastic, and found our beds to be comfortable. We are glad you liked the water pressure in our showers, enjoyed our breakfast, and enjoyed our heated pool/ hot tub. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed at Kings Inn and it was great. Both of us are DLR veterans and each have stayed at several places but never at Kings Inn. Neither of us have stayed at a cleaner place. The rooms were spotless! Going by recommendation, we requested rooms at the back of the resort facing South Harbour and it was very quiet. They were kind enough to give us adjoining rooms which was great. Grounds are clean with lots of greenery. The pool looked great. We enjoyed the breakfast, it had everything we needed. Customer service was excellent!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are ecstatic to hear that you found our property to be clean and our rooms to be spotless. We are glad we were able to accommodate you to adjoining rooms. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and found our customer service to be excellent. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Kings Inn in Anaheim!  The rooms were spacious and very clean.  I was impressed by the number of easy access electrical plugs.  With so many electronic these days this is a major plus. The pool is an other plus.  After a day at Disneyland the pool is a great way to unwind and rejuvenate. The main pool was a perfect temperature on the warm side. The hot tub is large.   The staff were friendly and very helpful. This is a perfect place for those in Anaheim visiting Disneyland.  It is close enough to walk for those that choose.  And far enough away to be out of the crowds. There is also a stop for the ART bus right at the hotel.  Get on the number 6 bus and you are in the park is 5-10 minutes. Take the same number 6 back to the hotel.  You can buy
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are ecstatic to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our property. We are so happy that you found our rooms to be spacious/ very clean, and liked the electrical plug points we have throughout our rooms. We are glad you had a chance to enjoy our heated pool and hot tub. We are happy that our staff was able to show you how friendly and helpful they are. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great room, Great view, Amazing service
Summary: The staff at Kings Inn are all very kind. They make your comfort and satisfaction their top priority.  Our room was a nice, decently sized room that was clean. Not to mention, the water pressure in the shower is heavenly especially after a long day at Disneyland. They are literally around the corner from the park so you can choose to take a nice stroll or catch the Art bus. With them being by the park, you also have a great view of Disneyland's firework show at night on the terrace or just standing in the lot if you are on the far side of the inn. Their continental breakfast is a little skimpy, but does not take away from the homey experience you get, and because I enjoy waffles. I would highly recommend Kings Inn as an option if you are planning a trip to Disneyland. I'm sure
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are ecstatic to hear that you found our staff to be very kind. You are definitely correct, we make your comfort and satisfaction our top most priority. We are so happy that you found our rooms to be nice, clean, liked the water pressure of our showers, and found our property to be conveniently located near Disneyland. We are glad you enjoyed the view of Disneyland firework from our property. We appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast, we will forward this to management and work on it. Thank you for recommending us to others. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Good sized room and beds for a family of 5 (small children) clean, and conveniently located to surrounding restaurants, Disneyland, and other amenities. Easy to get to and easy to get around this part of the city.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you liked the size of our room/ bed and found our room to be clean. We are glad that you found our property to be conveniently located near Disneyland and many popular restaurants.

Summary: This hotel has been remodeled and looks fantastic. Wood floors in the room are so much cleaner than carpet. Inexpensive, nice pool, decent continental breakfast, and only a short walk to Disneyland. Friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are ecstatic to hear that you found our newly remodeled rooms to be fantastic. We are glad you liked our wood floors, enjoyed our heated pool/ hot tub, breakfast, and found our property to be within walking distance to Disneyland. We are happy that our staff was able to show you how friendly and helpful they are. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We enjoyed our 4 night stay at Kings Inn. We requested a room on the quiet side of the complex, which was great! Breakfast was great, waffles (which the kids loved), cereal & toast, all you need. The pool was fabulous & staff friendly & welcoming. The Wifi signal wasn't very strong where our room was situated, which would be my only gripe. A 10 minute walk to disney & lots of restaurants close by for eating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are ecstatic to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and found our heated pool/ hot tub to be fabulous. We are so happy that our staff was able to show how friendly and welcoming they are. We are glad you found our property to be within walking distance to Disneyland and many popular restaurants. We appreciate your feedback regarding our WiFi; we will inform this to our management and work on improving it. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is so near to Disneyland Parks. It's a five minute walk. The rooms are big enough for a family of  4 and the bathroom is so clean that You feel like Home. I totally recommend it. The hotel staff is very Nice and helpful. Breakfast is not very Good but You have a dennys, IHOP and McDonald's just around the corner.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be big and our bathrooms to be clean. We are glad you found our property to be conveniently located near Disneyland and many popular restaurants. We appreciate you finding our staff to be nice and helpful. Thank you for your feedback regarding our breakfast, we will work with management on it. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland about 10 to 15 minutes. Pool was nice and there is a hot tub. Area was great, near many good restaurants. Clean and comfortable room. Had everything we needed. We had a very enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, and thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable. We are glad you enjoyed our heated pool/ hot tub and found our property to be conveniently located near Disneyland and many popular restaurants. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great experience. Very close to Disneyland and transit to downtown la. Also the staff were extremely friendly. Loved being able to go in the hot tub after a long day. Only thing we would change is higher water pressure in the shower
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We had a wonderful time. The Kings Inn was perfect for our family of 4 (two teens). The staff was helpful, motel & our room very clean, the pool-heated, & the breakfast was very decent. The whole area seems very family oriented /safe. Approximately a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. There are restaurants a few steps away at the Anaheim Garden Walk. There's also a CVS, Walgreens within walking distance. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you had such a great stay. It is true we are in a perfect location , just minutes from everything. We are excited to hear you will be back

Summary Heading: Great service at an even greater rate!
Summary: I spent 4 nights and King's in on my vacation, and it was a wonderful experience. The staff were all friendly and helpful, and more than acomodating for all my needs. The hotel is located a very quick 10 min walk from the Disney Parks property, and also only a few minutes walks from 711 and other convinence stores. Traveling solo, this was the best hotel value! I would definately recommend to anyone traveling solo, or couples looking for a budget hotel very close to he parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear that we fit so well into your budget. We are glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your next stay

Summary Heading: 2 Star hotel with 5 Star Customer Service
Summary: We just came back from a 2 night stay at King's Inn.  Their staff took such good care of us. We arrived several hours before check-in, but we were still given a room amd were able to freshenup for our trip to Disneyland. The room smelled so fresh upon walking in and definitely was so clean. I love that there's a generous sized refrigerator in the room. We stayed at King's Inn to visit Disneyland and California Adventure. The hotel allows guests to park there any time on ckeck-in day to go to the parks even if it's not check-in time. They also allow guests to leave their cars there til Midnight on check-out day, which is perfect for Disney visitors. Continental breakfast is generous and the employees running it are great. The front desk clerks are very professional and welcoming.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review. We are so happy that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We really are excited for your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Disney visit. always stayed when it was super 8.
Summary: very nice motel as we remember super 8 was. would suggest that the windows be covered more to block out light at night from outside lights. breakfast was very good better than super 8. would stay here again. resort fee was something we did not pay with super 8.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We always love to hear from repeat guest's. As always we are happy that you had such a wonderful stay and we are really happy to see you will be returning.

Summary: Great little motel.  Walk to disney was 10 minutes for 2 adults.  Stayed 4 nights in mid April, and did not hear any neighbours at night, so must have gotten good neighbours. Beds and towels were nice, no problems.  Wifi was always on. Staff is the best, especially the lady in the breakfast room.  I gave her a tip at the end of my stay.  She works very hard especially when the breakfast room turns to a zoo after 7:30am.  So best time to go is before 7am for the breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear that you had such a great stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are so glad to know that you found them to be so helpful during your stay with u. We are looking forward to a future visit.

Summary: Sleep was amazing. I thought the bed was hard at first but turned out to be perfect slept like a rock. Shower pressure was good. Hot water was amazing. Pool was heated and nice for the kids, hot tub was great for sore feet. Walking distance to food, and Disney however if you dont want to make that walk at night due to sore feet you can take the #6 bus from Disney for 3$ a person which drops you off right in front of the hotel. Room rate was as expected with a small resort fee. Paid extra for a microwave in the room had one issue with the key card which didnt want to read but when we went to the office they fixed it right away and had maintenance help and make sure it was fixed. All the staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast was fresh and delicious I didnt much care for
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had such a great stay. We are so excited to hear that you will be returning.

Summary Heading: Nice little motel that does the job for Disney!
Summary: This hotel/motel was incredibly cheap for the standard provided! The rooms were nice and clean and had a nice design/layout for a motel. This motel did the job for Disneyland as we never really stayed in the resort. It is a walking distance from Disney 10-15 minutes depending on how fast you walk!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found our location to be so conveniently located. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are excited for your next trip!

Summary Heading: Good value for money and in easy reach of Disney
Summary: The rooms were clean and modern looking and all staff we spoke to were very helpful.   The rooms could do with a safe and rooms at the front of the hotel get a lot of street noise. The noise is the reason it gets a 3 and not a 4.   I would stay again, but request a room further from the street.   There's plenty of places to eat, and stores for room supplies.    Disney is an easy 10-15 mins walk away.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  It is so good to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really glad you found us the perfect place to stay while  visiting the Disneyland park. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Had a great time in the Anahiem area, the motel was in a great location, the staff were very accommodating, friendly, from the front desk clerks to the maids, and the grounds keepers also. The room was clean with no issues. Would definitely recommend the King Inn to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is so good to know that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We really  are excited for your next visit.

Summary: Great Breakfast with a variety of hot and cold choices, orange juice was excellent and very tasty mini waffles but no bacon or sausages were provided , very clean hotel and  within walking distance to Disneyland Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is also wonderful that you found our location to be so convenient. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Remodel with great location and staff
Summary: The Kings Inn Anaheim exceeded our expectations. The room was spotless with updated flooring and furniture; looked just like the photos online. Easy walk to Disneyland as well as being surrounded by a multitude of dining options. Pool and hot tub area were very well maintained. The breakfast had enough items and there was even a staff member making waffles, which were delicious! Every staff person we encountered was friendly and helpful; it is apparent that this is a very well managed. For a 2 Star property, I rate it a 5 out of 5.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is so great to know that you found our location to be so  convenient and that you found your accommodations to be so  comfortable. We are so excited to see you return.

Summary: Great hotel in a good location close to Disneyland. You can walk to Disneyland and some great restaurants. Good for families. Breakfast was good and staff very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well.

Summary: I‚Äôm glad I choose this hotel for my stay everytime. The customer service is great and they handle your needs professionally. I will be definitely coming back and would like to thank Kings Inn for my stay :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and that you had such a good time. We are very excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: My family and I had a great experience at this hotel. Check-in was easy and painless. The staff we interacted with were approachable and nice. Housekeeping showed up daily to make beds and tidy the room up. Housekeeping did a great job at that. Beds and pillows were adequate and the room was nice with wood looking laminate flooring and a lot of space. Since the price was so reasonable, pool and hot tub were always packed with people. Also, we had a hotel in the 200's which face a well-lit parking lot for the garden walk (shopping center). Some of that light does come in the hotel room and makes 3am look like 7 in the morning. It would be nice to get some better curtains for those hotel rooms. Also, given it's location, the hotel is noisy at night. Spend a day at Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found us to be so affordable and that you found we fit into your budget. We are really excited for another visit in the future.

Summary: We just stayed for 5 nights on our latest Disney trip.  It's an easy walk with teenage kids.  For younger we likely would take ART or even Uber (which we did take a couple of times).  The room was very clean and comfortable.  It's close to some good restaurants for takeout or a quick bite.  The pools and Hot tub are nice.   The breakfast was OK with not a lot to choose from.  Only complaint was it fills up quickly so if you pick the wrong time it's hard to get in.  If they could fix one thing it would be a better layout for breakfast.  Wifi was fast enough to get a little work done.   If you are used to staying at Sheraton or Marriot this is not your place.  If you are looking for a safe clean place to stay while at Disney this is certainly a good choice.  Just FYI Uber rides to
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so glad to hear that we exceeded your expectations! We are glad you found our location to be so convenient and we do look forward to another future stay.

Summary: This hotel provided just what was needed, it's close to Disneyland and the walk wasn't bad. The free breakfast was ok, doughnuts and mini waffles. The pool was awesome and warm. Room was nice, the bathrooms are small. Overall the stay was very nice and the staff was amazing, will stay again next time we visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Visiting from Australia we booked 3 rooms at the Kings Inn Anaheim for 4 days in order to visit Disneyland for 3 days. Rooms were clean & serviced daily. Kings is about a 10 - 15 min walk to Disneyland & Downtown Disney. There is a bus (approx $5 US per person) that takes you to Disneyland, bus stop is situated approx 2 mins from the Inn. Reception will be able to direct you. Although we did not use the pool we were impressed that it was heated, allowing all year usage. The only real con was the noise from the parking station next door when the cars drove over (what sounded like) metal ramps...very loud but little I would assume that the Inn could do about the noise. (We happened to be on the same side as the car park) Ideally located to a good number of eating venues, all
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so glad to hear that you had such a wonderful stay with us. Weare excited for your next stay!

Summary: The hotel is great. What makes it fantastic is the people who work there. From the front desk to the housekeepers, everyone has a great attitude. We were granted an early arrival (THANK YOU!!). The only drawback is the linen. The wash cloths and the rest of the terry was less than desire able and the pillows were not great to sleep on. I see that the rooms received a small renovation which is great. I have stayed at other hotels with higher price points and did not receive the type of service I got at the King's Inn. Thank you guys!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you received such wonderful service! We are happy that you found we fit so well into your budget and we are really looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Staff was great, personable, & professional  Being in the service industry myself i truly appreciate the smiles when being appreciated.   Thanks to all the staff that made our stay memorable, pleasant, &  desirable to return to the wonder kings Inn.  The Holland Family
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you had such a wonderful experience when staying with us. We are really excited for your next stay with us.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel 4-5x, so know it well. New things I noticed this stay - the $7.50 per day resort fee. At least it is relatively low as other motels can charge for parking, wifi, etc. Last year, I stayed at a different hotel and had to pay $25 per day of parking.  My child kept falling asleep at the parks at the end of the day and it was very difficult to get him up to our 2nd floor room in his stroller. We should have requested a ground floor room and will likely do so next time. Wondering if there is a possibility of putting in a ramp or an outdoor lift/elevator to make the 2nd floor wheel-chair and stroller accessible?  Otherwise, it is always a great stay at the Kings Inn. The people are friendly and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The breakfast is a bonus if
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a wonderful stay. We are glad to hear that you found us to be such a great value. We are really looking forward to another future visit

Summary Heading: Good budget option for visiting Disneyland
Summary: This is a very basic motel, about a 15 minute walk away from the gates at Disneyland. Breakfast is served daily from 6am until 9am and is also, very basic, included cereals, waffles and fruit; all food is served on disposable crockery which I assume is due to the lack of on-site facilities for washing up. Our room was clean and spacious.   Staff were helpful and friendly- one evening, some guests were being very loud outside our room at around midnight so I called the front desk who asked security to check it out and they were able to quickly fix the issue and move the people along.  One thing I would point out is that from January 2019, this motel charges $7.50 per night for amenities including WiFi and parking etc that I don't think you can opt out of. This is charged upon
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you had such a great visit with us. We are really looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Good stay, sleep well, good breakfast
Summary: We had goes to Disney, and we choose this place for the distance to Disneyland (15 minutes of walk) and the price.We were happy with our choice. We were at the hotel just to sleep. The only small bad points, the beds creaked, if you turn in the bed you ear the sound. But for the rest everything was # 1. We really appreciated our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear that you found our location to be so convenient and that  you found us to be so affordable. We are looking forward to another visit in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice Place to Stay Near Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here in March 2019 as it was reasonably priced and close to Disneyland. It is about a 10-15 minute walk and many restaurants nearby. Breakfast was good and service was great. We got a better price booking directly with the motel rather than using a third-party website.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found we fit into your budget so well and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really hoping to see you back in the future.

Summary: Hotel location is very close to Disneyland and very much accessible. Rooms were very clean and one good thing about the hotel is they have house keeping everyday so when we use to come back tired from Disneyland we use to get a clean room.  In addition to that by mistake I book a queen room instead of 2 queen, hotel front desk upgrade me to double queen with no charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad that you had such a nice stay and that you received such wonderful service! We are really excited for a future visit!

Summary: Staff super helpful to accommodate my whole family and get all our rooms together. also in answering all questions etc. Stay was very affordable and only about a two block walk to Disneyland. Rooms were clean however no microwave in the rooms. You‚Äôd have to walk up to where the laundry room was to use a community microwave. The beds were very uncomfortable and hard which is kind of a big deal for me. If not for the bed discomfort, I would totally recommend and return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that your found us to be such a great deal. We are happy as well that you plan on returning and recommending us!

Summary: 10 min walk to Disneyland. Had everything we needed, for a great price. Breakfast could use a little more variety. No regrets, would definitely book and stay here again. Rooms were also kept very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also glad to hear that yu had such a wonderful stay. We are excited that you will be returning!

Summary: If you are use to posh hotels, this place is not for you. Newly updated rooms, but still appears to be an old inn they tried to cover up. Towels were dingy. The beds were ok. Pillows were awesome. After long days at Disneyland, we slept pretty sound on the mattresses. The breakfast was not good. Basic waffles, cereal, pasties, oatmeal, bread for toast, coffee, some fruit (bananas and oranges), yogurt, etc. No fancy breakfast foods. Lanny (working in the breakfast area) was kind and helpful. My husband slept while me and my 2 year old ate breakfast. Lanny made our waffles and made sure we had all that we needed to eat. You can hear plenty of outside noise, but again, we were too tired from Disneyland for very much outside noise to bother us. The pool was open and utilized,
Manager Response: Thank you for the review We are so glad to hear that you had such a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so great that you received such wonderful service! We are really looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Accommodations with the Perfect Location
Summary: The location of this hotel is within a 15 minute walk of the security lines to get into the Disneyland Parks. It is the perfect location, and they sell tickets at a cheaper price than you will get online! The beds are comfortable and everything is clean and fresh! They also have free parking and free breakfast (although the breakfast left a bit to be desired, but it was enough). We stayed for 3 nights, and checked out in the morning of our last day of Disney and were able to leave our car there until around midnight. Saved us the $25 for Disney parking and the time it takes to get through the tram and security. Very thankful for their accommodations! We thoroughly enjoyed our time there and have already recommended it to many people as we live in the LA area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also glad that you had such a wonderful stay and we are really excited for another future visit!

Summary: The hotel is very clean! We have stayed at different hotels close to Disneyland and so far this is the best option  Something that I really liked was that it has wood floor instead of carpet  Very affordable! We will stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted that you found us to be so affordable and that you plan on returning!

Summary: Kings Inn was a great place to stay for our family vacation. They didn't charge extra or make us get another room for our family of 5 with younger kids and parking was free even after check out. The resort fee was also minimal. Walking distance to the parks (about 2 blocks), heated pool and hot tub, laundry on site, Walgreens/ CVS half a block away all for an affordable price was great! Our favorite was Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake Factory and IHOP were all super close! Kings did offer free breakfast but the space is very small and usually very crowded. The waffles were delicious. We spent 4 nights and the rooms and grounds are consistently being cleaned. There are cameras around the property and we never had any issue with random people having access to our exterior door or vehicle.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are glad that so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: My mom and I stayed at the Kings Inn for 4 nights during a Disneyland trip in February 2019. We were VERY impressed with the cleanliness of the room and the customer service given by the front desk staff. We had them hold our luggage both before check in and after check out and we felt very secure leaving our belongings with them. The complementary breakfast was also above expectations; they had a lot of offerings and it was replenished pretty quickly during the busy breakfast times! Also a pretty easy walk to the Disneyland resort. Our only complaint about the property was that the outside walls were NOT particularly sound proof and we could hear every car on the road and every conversation outside in perfect clarity. Overall our stay definitely exceeded expectations and my mom
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such a great stay ! We are sorry if you were disturbed by your neighbors. We do have a 24 hour front desk staff. Please do not hesitate to let us know so we can address things in the future. We hope that you will be back to visit us again soon!

Summary: Close to everything.  Could walk to restaurant Friday night.  Really nice shower.  Every time we went out we had a real clean room to come home to.  I would stay here again.  I would recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so happy that you had such a great stay and we are so excited to hear you will be recommending us to others and that you plan on returning!

Summary Heading: Kings Inn - One of the Best in the Area
Summary: This was within walking distance of the Convention Center - CVS - Walgreens - some pizza places and some nicer restaurants.  The room was very clean and the front desk help was great. The only improvement I can think of would be with the breakfast.  Good part - it was extremely busy so they prepared the waffles so you could walk right up and get a fresh waffle.  But the general area for the food was very cramped.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient! We are in process of improving our breakfast room as well as making some additions to the menu. We are hoping to see you return again soon.

Summary: My daughter and I visited Disneyland last week.  We stayed 3 nights. The rooms have recently been renovated and are very comfortable, clean and updated!  New floors, furniture and linens.  The staff are friendly and helpful.  We checked out our last morning and were able to leave our bags at the front desk while we enjoyed a few hours in the parks before we left for the airport.  The hotel is a quick 10-15 minute walk to the security gates at Disney.  Great location!  There is a Walgreens, CVS and 7-11 within walking distance so it is very easy to get snacks or anything you might have forgotten at home!  We watched the fireworks the first night from the hotel - great bonus!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so delighted to hear you found the perfect place to stay with us! We are excited that your stay went so well and we exceeded all of your needs. We are looking forward to another future stay!

Summary: Walking distance, close to Disney, good breakfast, clean rooms - good for 4 people. and the best = free parking, you can walk 10 min and be at park. Good restaurants close. Good choice, fair price. My husband lost his jacket and they found it. =)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We are also so happy to hear that we fit so well into your  budget .We are excited for  your next stay with us!

Summary: Close to Disneyland and a reasonable price for a clean room and comfortable beds. Continental breakfast is included as well as parking with the price of the room which makes this a really fair deal all considered.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to know that you had such an awesome stay. We are glad to hear that you found us to be such a great value. We look forward to another future visit.

Summary: The Kings Inn was a simple but perfectly wonderful motel for our Disneyland visit.  The room was clean when we arrived and kept fully supplied and organized during our stay.  The staff was friendly and helpful throughout our stay.  At one point we needed a maintenance man and he came right away.  The beds were comfortable and made each day.  The motel was close enough to walk to Disneyland but, since we had little ones, we chose to take Lyft to and from each day.  Very reasonable and easy.  We would recommend this motel to our friends and definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We are  thankful for your review. We are glad to hear that you had a simply wonderful stay and we are excited for your next visit!

Summary: No elevators, no microwave in room (misleading from their amenities list ), you pay resort fees but doesn‚Äôt get you in Disney any earlier, about a 15min walk, we waited 20min and paid for their shuttle that never showed up. Tried to get a refund and they told us no refunds, except we were never told this. Terrible breakfast - fruit with either being restocked or only had orange slices.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry if things were confusing for you regarding our microwaves or amenities. We do apologize for any confusion. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with our breakfast. I have passed this on to our manager for review, as our breakfast is always stocked up to closing. We apologize for any inconvenience. and we do hope to see you return in the future.

Summary: I was looking for a budget friendly overnight stay close to Disneyland for my group. This is a typical motel, with doors open to the outdoors.  Within easy walking distance to the parks, though not the closest. Most importantly the rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast room lacks in looks, but food was the same as the chains. Staff were very nice and accommodating. My opinion: this place is fine; not great, but fits the bill for a clean bed for the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you were so comfortable here  with  your group. We are also happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We do hope to see you return in the future.

Summary Heading: Decent priced location not far from Disneyland
Summary: Room was clean and modern. Hot water and colder water faucet handles were reversed but work d perfectly fine. About a 15 minute walk from Disneyland. Several eateries nearby- subway, pizza and more. Convienent Walgreens just a 5 minute walk away for items you may have forgot to bring with you.   Advertised as having a continental breakfast I was disappointed with th selection. Breakfast room was small also. This would not prevent me from staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient.It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We do apologize if you were disappointed with our breakfast selection. We do offer fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hard cooked eggs with salt and pepper,sweet rolls, freshly baked waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea, as well as coffee. Again we do apologize if this did not meet your breakfast needs. We are in process of enlarging our breakfast area and making some changes so it is more easily accessible. We do have a very popular breakfast and a lot of our guests do like to enjoy it. We are really excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Stayed with family. Good 15-17 mins walking distance to Dianeyland, lots of shops nearby. Very convenient for disney stay. Appreciated the housekeeping for making sure the room was clean, fresh towels everyday. Not enough sitting area for breakfast ‚Äî but its ok if you just want to grab something and go. Microwave only until 10pm. Only thing was that there were screaming and fighting family next door and we can hear their conversation at 2am, so the walls are thin, I can assure that because it woke us up. Beds were ok. It was good for the price paid and its location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found us to be such a great place to stay. We do apologize for any inconvenience regarding the breakfast. It is true we do have a very popular breakfast! We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We are in process of a remodel in the future for our breakfast room. We will be enlarging it and making it much more accessible. We are sorry if you were disturbed by your neighbors. We do have a 24 hour front desk as well as night time security. Please do not hesitate to call us in the future as we will be more than happy to assist you at any time. We are so happy that you feel we fit so well into your budget and we do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Me and my Fam stayed at the Kings Inn from Feb 4th-12th. Every staff member was helpful and the rooms were perfect for our needs. Beds were comfy after along day at the parks. The walk to Disney is about 12min..The breakfast was perfect for early morning..Only regrets is we didn't use the pool n hot tub enough! Both r kept very warm, so even though the temp outside was only about 55, the pool was nice n warm for a swimüåû. Also wait to buy your Disneyland tx from the Hotel, we thought we got a really good deal from perk spot, they were $15 bucks cheaper per Tx at the Hotel. A 5 day hopper was $275..‚ò∫ Also due to weather in Seattle our flights got Cancelled and rescheduled two times, the Hotel made sure we were taken care of and didn't need to switch rooms..This Hotel is right
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found our location was so perfect for your trip to the Disneyland Resort. We are glad that you found us to be such a great value and that you loved our amenities that are included in your stay. We are really excited for another visit in the future.

Summary Heading: Great location from Disneyland. Quick Lyft ride. Walgreen's, CVS, Cheesecake Factory in walking distance
