Summary: Great location from Disneyland. Quick Lyft ride to Disney. Walgreen's,CVS and Cheesecake Factory in walking distance.  This Inn was clean and updated. Everything worked. The staff was very friendly at all times. The pillows are a little firm, but each bed had 4 pillows!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also delighted to hear that you  found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are really excited for your next visit with us.

Summary: We chose this place because it is in walking distance to Disneyland.  It did not disappoint.  Great location for the value!  The room was clean.  The staff were friendly.  Easy check in and check out.  Maid service was excellent.  Loved coming back to a clean room after a long day at Disneyland.    At first I thought the beds were a little hard, but I slept great on them.  We were there on days when it was rainy and cold.  I got cold at night but fortunately there were extra blankets in the cupboard which I really appreciated.  If you have loud neighbors, you can hear them which can be annoying at bedtime.  But we were able to cover the sound by turning on the air in the room.  I would definitely consider staying here again for our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also excited that you found we fit so well into your budget. We are so excited to hear that you will be returning!

Summary: Very clean hotel, nice pool and hot tub. Very friendly and helpful staff. Would stay here again. Short walk to Disney Land and lots of restaurants close by. Couple shopping centres located within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are glad to know that you found our location to be so convenient as well. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: The breakfast was good with several options to choose from. The rooms were clean and the maid service was excellent. Check in was fast but there was an unusual policy about using a different credit card to check-in with than the one you made the reservation. Can't be done. So be aware.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are very happy that you enjoyed our breakfast. It is also wonderful to hear that you found your room  to be so clean and comfortable. We do require the credit card holder along with ID to be here upon check in and the credit card  used to make the reservation present upon check in. This is for the security of our guest's. We are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. We hope to see you return again in the future.

Summary: The rooms were clean, laminate floors, duvet covers instead of itchy covers. It was a perfect place if you just need a room to crash in while spending all your time at the parks. The walk to the park was about 10-15 minutes, although on our last day when your feet are super sore you might want to take an uber. The breakfast was the typical continental breakfast with cereal, boiled eggs, muffins and a waffle maker. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found us to be such a great value. We are also so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are so excited to hear  you will be returning!

Summary: The rooms are clean and the breakfast is nice. Great for going to dinseyland. It is an older motel and I am not sure as to why they have a "resort fee" now. But when I went back in Summer they didn't. I know they were making some changes to the place. Maybe it is nicer now. I only paid $80 dollars when I stayed looked at their prices and they are way higher now.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We have many upgrades to our property now, and have made a lot of improvements to our rooms as well. We hope that you like the changes. We do offer breakfast, parking, wifi, heated pool and hot tub all of which add a lot of value to your stay. We hope that you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Average Hotel but a place to go when all else are full up
Summary: A older Motel that is starting to show its age but a decient value about 2 blocks from Disneyland ....    The rooms were clean but a little dated but the staff was nice enough parking was free and OK ...   The price included a light Breakfast with pastries ü•Æ coffee , not chocolate üç´ orange juice cereal etc..
Manager Response: Thank you for the review We are glad to hear that you found our newly remodeled rooms to be clean and comfortable. We are so happy to know that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are  so excited that you enjoyed our breakfast which is included in your stay. We hope to see you return again soon

Summary: The hotel was close to Disneyland, Starbucks, fast food restaurants, CVS and the cheesecake shop. Great location and good value for money. The room was clean and spacious compared to some of the other double queen rooms we had previously stayed in. Breakfast was fairly standard motel style. It was very handy having a laundry with more than 1 dryer and washing machine. Staff were friendly and helpful. I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also so glad to hear that we fit into your budget and you found us to be so affordable. We are excited to hear that you will be returning!

Summary: Overall, I was not blown away by the hotel.  Its location is within walking distance of Disneyland, coupled with the free parking, and reasonable rates which include free "breakfast" (I'll get to that more in a minute), made it a reasonable solution for our family to visit.    The rooms are air tight, making them very humid, and hard to air out. The air conditioner was not quite satisfactory to remedy the humidity in the space.  The fan in the bathroom was very loud and largely ineffective, and there was no tub--a big no-no with a toddler.    Breakfast was the biggest disappointment.  For the price, (free), I'm not sure what I expected, but it was carb and sugar-loaded and the Styrofoam plates and cups made it feel even more chintzy.   Waffles, pastries, yogurt, cereal, chunks
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also so happy that you found we fit into your budget. We are so sorry to hear that you were so disappointed in our breakfast. I assure you we appreciate your feedback, and we are in process of upgrading our breakfast selections. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is awesome to hear that they provided you with such wonderful service throughout your stay. We hope that you will be back to visit us again in the future.

Summary: Don‚Äôt be put off by the exterior of the Kings Inn Anaheim. While the exterior looks a little dated and tired, the interior will surprise you!  As a family of four, we found the room a good size with enough space for everything we needed. The rooms have recently been renovated and feel clean and new. The room and bathroom were exceptionally clean and the hard flooring (no carpet) was a plus from us.  Breakfast (included) consisted of a couple of cereals, yoghurt, toast, waffles, milk and juice. There is a small breakfast room to sit if you wish. This was quite crowded when we were there.  There are laundry facilities if you wish to keep up with your washing and the reception staff were more than happy to change notes/coins for use.  The kings Inn is within comfortable walking
Manager Response: We thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you had such a marvelous stay We are really excited to hear that you had such a great experience. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy that they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve.  We are looking forward to another visit and are so happy that you will be recommending us to others.

Summary: This is our new go to hotel, it was our 3rd stay within 5 months. Walking distance to Disneyland and stores. We were able to check in early, which was great after a long drive. Staff is always nice and very welcoming. New thing this year was the additional $7 daily charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to know that you found our our location to be so convenient. We are delighted that you had such a good stay and we are excited for another visit

Summary: The motel is located at a walking distance from Disneyland.  The room was spacious.  Good breakfast with a relatively good variety of choices.  Some times, it can be noisy, but we have been able to sleep well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad that you found our location to be so convenient. We do know that you have a lot of choices and we are so happy that you chose to stay with us. We are really looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Best value in Anaheim. Very nice hotel!
Summary: This is my second stay here in 2 years.  I booked it through hotels.com on a prepaid basis and got a fabulously cheap rate for its prime Disney location.  The regular rate is reasonably competitive also.  They are in the process of fully renovating the rooms. I got one of these redone rooms.  It was large, fresh and very modern internally.  The new room fronts with brand new air conditioners were very modern and stylish.  The new wood floors were likewise pretty and modern looking.  The furniture and beds are new.  The sink area had a very large mirror and nice counter top.  The bathroom only has ba shower stall.  Hot water took a little while to come but not too long.  Lots of TV channels to choose from.  Lots of lights make the room bright.  The staff are very nice, very
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a great experience during your visit here. We are glad to hear you like the improvements, and we are looking forward to another future visit!

Summary Heading: Not the best but customer service was excellent
Summary: It‚Äôs your typical inn. The outside isn‚Äôt the greatest. But the customer service is second to none. I was very impressed with the several people I encountered at the front desk as well as the cleaning crew. The beds were comfortable and clean and the shower had excellent high water pressure.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. We are delighted to hear that they provided you with such excellent service through out your stay. We are happy that you were so comfortable in your room. We do look forward to a future stay!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and Very Friendly
Summary: We had a great time at King's Inn.  The room was clean and tidy and everything worked.  The staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  They gave us advice on how to get tickets which saved us money.  Just a good walk from Disneyland, it was also located near shops and places to eat.  Breakfast (included) was basic but good for what we needed.  All in all a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to know that you found our location to be so covnenient and you had a great stay. We are glad that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful as well. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great hotel if you just need somewhere to stay overnight whilst visiting Disneyland. It took us 10 mins to walk there. We booked two rooms for two nights and they were very clean and just what we needed but were very noisy. Unfortunately we were given the rooms second and fourth from the front of the hotel above reception and all we could hear all night was loud traffic and people walking past. I had requested quite rooms at the back of the hotel months earlier when we booked but obviously requests are not considered as we got the complete opposite. We thought the breakfast was fine considering the price you pay a night. We would stay again but no longer than two nights in the rooms we were given as they were far to noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had a great experience and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are glad that you will be back to visit us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel has an awesome location, instalations, and furniture!!!!!!!  Their staff were incredible with us!!!!!!! It is really close to Disneyland!!! Breakfast is good!!!!!! Im general it was an awesome experience!!!!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. We are really excited for another future visit!

Summary: Spent 2 nights here with family to visit California Adventure. Room was good sized, clean, with fridge and coffee maker. Laminate flooring was nice. Free parking, wi-fi, and breakfast. Breakfast included waffles, cereal, pastries, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, toast, fruit. Outdoor pool and hot tub. 10 minute walk to Disney which my 7 & 8 year olds did without too much complaining. Also, next door to Garden Walk, which has Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump and other chain restaurants. Reasonable rates made me feel less guilty about spending so much at Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great that you enjoyed your stay and that you found we fit into your budget. We are excited for your next visit with us!

Summary: Clean large rooms. Great receptionists. They helped me with copying. There is no sport gym unfortunaltely.  The only problem is a long line at the  brekfast  room and not enough space for everybody to sit
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome that you had a great stay and you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. We are so sorry for any inconvenience when partaking of our breakfast. We are in the works of enlarging and improving our breakfast. In mean time we do have additional seating on our sun deck as well as at the pool area. We hope to see you return again soon.

Summary Heading: Enjoyable stay within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was in walking distance to Disneyland.  Also close to CSV and Walgreens to pick up any last minute needs. Our room was a good size and clean.  The breakfast consisted of pastries, cereal, packaged oatmeal, toast, hard boiled eggs, fruit, and hot waffles.  It was simple but filling.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you had an enjoyable stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are glad you were so comfortable here and we are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Excellent customer service. Room always cleananed, everyday fresh linen. Staff friendly and helpful!!  Kings in Anaheim is close to Disneyland, walking distance approximately twenty minuteswalk. Easy and convenient bus shuttle takes you to Disneyland as well as down town Anaheim. Definitely will be coming back again!! üòÉüòÉüòÉüòÉüòÉ
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to know that you found them to provide you with the excellent service that you deserve. We are really excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Basic motel at good rate in good location
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while visiting Disney.  The room was spacious and offered all the standard items. Towels were older and thin. Pillows super soft. The room fan was good white noise. Free breakfast was basic - 2 cold cereals, bread, yoplait, hard boiled egg, banana, drinks.  Also small waffles that were decent.  Super crowded - go early or you won‚Äôt sit.  Only a 3 block walk to Disney parks. We chose this place for the cheap rate and it was worth it if you‚Äôre just there to sleep.
Manager Response: We thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you were so comfortable here.  We are so looking forward to another visit in the future.

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. We went to Disneyland.Good location. The second day we took the bus to Disneyland and the bus passes were available at the desk. The room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was OK
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear you had a great stay. We are also happy to know that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really looking forward to another future visit.

Summary: Very accessible to Disneyland, just a short walk. And dining areas. Staff were super friendly and helpful. Onsite breakfast was good , but needs a little more variety and some more space . For Disney souvenirs its highly recommended to go to the Walgreens on the corner .
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so happy that you spent your Christmas break with us and you had such a great experience. We are  happy that you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly as well. We hope that  you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary: Clean rooms, friendly staff, great breakfast, laundry facilities, pool and spa, and most importantly walking distance to DL. This is our go to hotel when we visit Anaheim. Excellent location - oh and Bubba Gump and other eateries/ shops in the Garden Walk are a stone's throw away.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such a great value. We are also glad that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really looking forward to another future visit.

Summary: The price and the location are the best values of this hotel, it is only 10 minutes walk to the park entrance. Rooms are good and clean.   Drawback: breakfast is short, not many options. Although in this area prices are really expensive for normal hotels, only because of the Park.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us over the New Year and we are so glad that you found us to be such a great value. We are really hoping that you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here during Christmas of 2018 and was pleasant. No bed bug, bathroom was clean, the bed was comfortable, free breakfast and 10 mins walk to Disneyland (literally around the corner. Close to restaurants, CVS, Starbucks, and free parking.  The layout of the room was a bit weird and could use another towel rack. There was no "Do Not Disturb" sign. Will stay here again if I'm in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. WE are so happy that you found our location so convenient to the Disneyland park. It is true we are just a 10 to 15 minute walk to the entrance. We are so happy  and we are  hoping that you will be returning in the future!

Summary: The rooms were super clean and nice..the staff was Over the top friendly and helpful..walk around the corner to Disneyland or next door for mall and restaurants. .would recommend to families or anyone looking for a nice affordable place to stay! The staff Will go out of their way to accommodate you! My new favorite place!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful that they provided you with such great service. We are really glad we fit into your budget and we look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: New favorite place to stay during Disney Vacation
Summary: Stayed at the King‚Äôs Inn in on Katella Ave for the first time in December of 2017 during our annual Disneyland vacation. Chose it for its price and what appeared to be a reasonable walk to the park. It‚Äôs can get exhausting with two kids, each with their own stroller, ESPECIALLY after a 16 hour day at the park like we usually do (we do Disney the right way haha), so location was key and this was the furthest we had ever stayed from the park with the intent to try walking there. It TOTALLY worked out. The walk from the inn is literally a 4-minute walk to the corner of Katella and Harbor and then maybe a 10-min walk to the entrance to the park. We‚Äôve been able to maneuver and choose crosswalks wisely and get to the park in no time at all, it‚Äôs super convenient. And not only that,
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are so happy that you had such a memorable experience and we are delighted that we are are your favorite choice to stay when visiting Disneyland. We are very excited about another stay.

Summary Heading: Great location with spacious & comfortable rooms.
Summary: We stayed at Kings Inn Anaheim in September & really enjoyed our stay. The rooms were clean & spacious & we liked the option of having a basic breakfast to take to our room. The location is fantastic, less than a ten minute walk to Disneyland & we could not fault how helpful & attentive staff were to our needs. We also really enjoyed unwinding in the pool & spa after a full day of activities. Thanks Kings Inn Anaheim, we would not hesitate in recommending your motel to family & friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so delighted to hear you found our location to be so convenient. and you had such an enjoyable stay. We ear excited for your next visit!

Summary: The Kings Inn is close to Disneyland and as such popular with families. The rooms have external access and no lift to upper floors.   Being on a busy thoroughfare the traffic noise can be a problem, for that reason the back block rooms are better.  The rooms are spacious and provide WiFi and charging points, however they are very dated and in need of repair and updating.  Breakfast is minimal and the breakfast area small and cramped especially when large groups are staying. Staff were helpful and a credit to the business. Reasonable budget option.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We have recently upgraded our property and have all new internet wifi throughout the buildings. We also have a 24 hour helpline for those who have issues connecting. We are in process of upgrading our breakfast area as well. It is very popular and it does get very busy this is true. We have additional seating on our sundeck as well as in the pool area. We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We are glad to hear that you found we fit into your budget and we are hoping to see you return in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay not far from Disney
Summary: We had an excellent stay at this hotel. It was very busy and unless your early to the breakfast room it‚Äôs tough to get a seat. But, the rooms are well maintained and clean; the breakfast has a great selection and continually well stocked (staff are lovely, especially when you are polite, and always happy to help); tv is good; beds comfortable; and while a 2 block walk to the main Disney gates, it‚Äôs really not that far and is handy to Walgreens, A Market, CVC? Pharmacy & 711 so great to be able to purchase a few snacks to keep in your fridge. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you had a good stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast. We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We hope that you will be back to visit us again soon. Thank you for recommending us!

Summary: Perfect for what we needed. Rooms where very clean. All the staff where excellent. We broke the TV & within minutes the maintenance man arrived and fixed it. We needed fresh towels and where provided with no troubles .  It‚Äôs just around the corner from Disney Land. So close was an easy fast walk. Also very close to lots of places for to eat.   I was excited about the free breakfast, but for my taste it wasn‚Äôt that great , so skipped it ( but I am fussy ).  Perfect for us as we spent all our time at Disney and just needed a place for sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so exciting to hear that you found us to be such a great place to stay and that you found us to be just what you needed. We are really looking forward to another stay.

Summary: Great little motel in the heart of everything. Short walk to Disneyland. Next door to Anaheim Garden Walk. Rooms were a nice size. Very clean. Mattresses were a little firm but that was nice for a change. Staff were super nice and nothing was to much trouble. They had a free breakfast which was basic but you can‚Äôt expect to much when it‚Äôs free. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is so great that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also so glad that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are really excited for  your next visit!

Summary: I was impressed by how great of a room for a value price. I will stay here again for sure. Great location, grounds were keep clean, plenty of free parking in a well lit lot. Room was clean & spacious. Good free breakfast. Nice & friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such a great value. We are also glad to hear that you found our staff to be so nice and friendly. We are really looking forward to another future visit.

Summary: Clean, comfortable, recently remodeled, quiet, reasonably priced, and free breakfast: who could ask for more? The hotel staff was friendly and accommodating. My linens and towels were changed each day, even though I didn't request that service. I appreciated the new flooring (thank goodness for no carpets!). I never would have believed that this place was once a Motel 8.  Better lighting in the sink area was needed, as was a room safe, but these are easy fixes. There was no bathtub, but this was not a problem for me.  The Kings Inn Anaheim is the motel I will book again.
Manager Response: We do thank you for the review. We are happy that you had a great stay. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We are so happy that this was indeed the case. We are really excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: The room was very nice, when pulling up to the rooms you wouldn‚Äôt expect them to be really nice but they were. Only downside was the staff knocked so quietly before opening the door so we barely heard them before they opened the door. But the door has a lock so that was our fault. Walking distance to Disneyland for the price of the room is unbeatable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had a good stay. We are so sorry that you were disturbed by our housekeeping staff. I assure you we will pass this on to our housekeeping staff manager We do hope that you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary: We came to Anaheim for Disney and this hotel was perfect! It was about a 20 min walk to the parks. The price was great, and the room was clean. The free breakfast is a definite bonus. It is also super close to other food options.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. it is so wonderful to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget. We are also glad that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really excited for another visit.

Summary Heading: Great place for a Disney trip
Summary: Nice clean room TV Fridge coffee all in the room with Microwave and coin operated Washing machine in a common room. Pool and spare on site. Next door to The Garden walk a small mall with lots if restaurants. I recommend PF changs and the cheesecake Factory. Noise from the cars on the street can be invasive and the heater/aircon unit is very noisy. But the walls are thick and we didn't hear the neighbors at all. 10 minute walk to Disneyland parks. Felt safe at night too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you found our location so convenient and safe. We are glad that you found us so affordable as well due to the amenities that we offer. We do hope to see you back sometime soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing value and perfect for Disneyland!
Summary: Myself and my boyfriend stayed at Kings Inn for 5 nights and haven‚Äôt got a bad word to say really! It‚Äôs quite a basic motel style place but has everything you need and is spotlessly clean! I‚Äôm quite fussy when it comes to cleanliness and I was very happy with the cleanliness of the room as well as the rest of the hotel. The rooms are also pretty sound proof, we never had any trouble with noise, the beds are comfortable, linens and towels are nice and fresh (looking and smelling). There‚Äôs a tv, iron and ironing board, nice sized fridge, hairdryer and really decent free WiFi. We requested a room close to the front of the hotel to reduce walking time (increase Disney time!) and that was happily honoured but the hotel isn‚Äôt that big anyway so probably won‚Äôt be an issue for most!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff.  We are so happy that you had such an enjoyable stay. We are so looking forward to another future visit!

Summary: Room was tidy and clean. Bedsheets were clean too. There was coffee machine in the room. Staff are nice and helpful. There was an outdoor swimming pool that opened till late. Motel is located within walking distance to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Centre.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear that you had a great stay and that you were so comfortable here. We hope that you will be back to visit again soon.

Summary: First off, the beds were amazing for a cheap hotel - very comfortable and different types of pillows depending on what firmness you prefer. Not too bad of a walk to Disneyland - about 15 minutes. I wouldn‚Äôt want to walk it with kids, but I was there with my sister for this trip, so I didn‚Äôt mind. Breakfast was ok - there was the usual fare (waffles, cereal, danishes, coffee, juice, etc). Breakfast room was super cramped and hard to move around. Definitely go early to avoid the crowd. Pool and hot tub were good, staff was friendly. I‚Äôd go back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that we fit into your budget and that you had a good stay with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are so excited to know that they provided you with such great service during your stay. We are really excited for another future visit!

Summary: The rooms were spacious and clean. There was a lot of storage in the room which was nice for our 5 night stay. The breakfast was good but the breaky room gets very crowded so it pays to go early. It was only a 10-15 min walk to the Disney main gate and the motel is also very close to many stores and restaurants. The only negative was that we had a door that connected to the room next door which was not sound proof at all. If I stayed again I would request a room without the connecting door and hope it would eliminate the noise from our neighbors.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you were so comfortable in your room and you found our location so convenient. Our complimentary breakfast is very popular as you say. We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We are hoping that you will be returning soon.

Summary: My cousin and I are 66 yrs young. As we are retired we tried to find a lodging with good value and close to parks. Kings Inn hit all the marks. With bus service right out front and Mall next door, made our trip even better. We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is so excited to hear you had such a great stay and even more exciting to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Well managed super motel very near Disney
Summary: We loved this well maintained / cared for motel in Anaheim. Check in was very smooth and quick with helpful staff at hand. The motel rooms are up to date, very clean with large HD TV, fridge etc. A light  breakfast was included and went down a treat each morning. Location was very good, just 10 minutes walk to Disney. We also went exploring down town LA. To do down town LA we found the best way was to drive/park at the Anaheim Railway station (2 minutes drive from hotel) and take train to Union Station. Takes about 40 minutes and cost less than $20 return. We then did the hop on hop off bus on the first day / subways on the second. Bach at the motel, plenty of eating options within walking distance and their nightly rates were really good..
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also glad to hear that we fit into your budget. We hope to see return soon.

Summary: Not my first stay here, its clean, the rooms are refurbished and spacious, free parking, free breakfast, free in room frig, wifi, coin op laundry close to everything including Disneyland, why pay more when you get it all here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such a great value. We are really looking forward to another stay!

Summary: I stopped here on my way home from LA, it was an unexpected stay. I found it Clean, safe, refurbished, comfortable bedding. The breakfast was lacking. This place offered what a needed a place for a very tired driver to stop and get a goods night rest
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad that you were so comfortable in your room and that you were just what you needed. We are hoping that you will be back to visit us again in the future.

Summary: As two young australian girls on our first trip overseas by ourselves, this hotel was a pleasant surprise, only thing was tv did not work most nights. Short walking distance to disney. Thanks for having us!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to know that we exceeded our guest's expectations. We are really glad you had a good stay. We are excited for another visit.

Summary Heading: Decent budget hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: We were taking our third annual trip to Disneyland around Thanksgiving and decided to save on the cost of hotel since we just needed somewhere to stay and nothing fancy. This hotel is at a great location, only a 10-min walk to and from Disneyland, and the services were good. Everything else was okay, but good enough for our purpose and excellent for the price we paid. I was content with our stay since we paid about half of what we would have paid had we stayed at our previous hotel. I was also pleasantly surprised by how quiet it was in the room. We did hear the garbage truck outside every morning, but it wasn't a major bother for us. One small issue we encountered was our room cards quit working a few times, and as our room was at the end of the hotel complex, it felt like a
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and that you had such a marvelous stay. We really do apologize for any issues you experienced regarding housekeeping. I assure you that this will be passed on to the housekeeping manager for review. We are looking forward to another visit.

Summary: I stayed at the Kings Inn for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland. Check in was easy and the front desk staff were quite helpful. It is only a 10 minute walk from the hotel to the park, and they have shuttle service available for a small cost as well. My room was clean and nicely decorated, and the breakfast offers lots of variety and friendly assistants. Parking was easy, since you are allowed one free spot on site. After a long day at Disneyland, this is the type of hotel that you want to come back to for a good night's rest. If you miss the fireworks in the park, you can watch them from the special outdoor seating area upstairs! This is a hotel I will return to!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you plan on returning! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Lovely room, spotlessly clean. Nice decor. Power outlets everywhere.Got a queen bees room with an acccesible bathroom, which was impressive, almost as big as the room area. Was able to relax in the big open shower. Walk around 15 minutes to Disneyland. Everyone I encountered was nice and welcoming.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay. We are really glad that you found our location to be so convenient as well. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Stayed 3 nights, great experience 1) wooden floor 2) staff cleaned the room and changed towels, bedsheets daily on time 3) no microwave inside room; but 2 available in common area 4) laundary available; self service ; accepts quarters or through mobile app; can buy detergent as well  5) 10 mins walking to Disneyland 6) nice swimming pool 7) good breakfast from 6am - 9 am 8) excellent staff; good customer service  9) Walgreens and CVS are close by; 5 mins walk 10) subway/pizza/chinese restaurant 5 mins away 11) lots of power outlets in the room to charge all your electronic gadgets   Can definitely recommend it to a friend!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful that you had such a terrific stay and that you will be recommending us to others. We are so excited for your next visit with us.

Summary: The room was perfect for our little family, customer service was fast and easy we asked to check in early and they accommodated us our house keeper kept our room stock with fresh towels and the breakfast room was awesome with fresh waffles, donuts, cereal milk and fresh fruits.. we also used there washer and dryer which was perfect with there phone app to pay if you don‚Äôt have loose changes thank you for a great week happy holidays
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great that you had such a terrific stay and that you really enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We are really hoping to see you return again soon.

Summary: This place is reliably clean and comfortable. We stay here every time we visit the Disneyland, which is 4-5 times per year. Other places aren't dependable or have really high prices. I love that we can walk to the parks, so we don't need to hassle with parking or anything. The breakfast buffet is perfect, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's. We are glad that you had another perfect stay and we are so excited for another visit!

Summary Heading: Good Price and Nice and Clean
Summary: I have stayed at the Kings Inn previously it is a reasonable price.  The rooms are nice and clean. It can be noisy with cars outside and people upstairs. Just see reception if you have any problems they are very helpful. Its a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so happy to hear that we fit so well into your budget. We are also glad that you found our property to be so nice and clean. We are sorry about any issues regarding noise during your stay. We do have a 24 hour front desk available as well as night time security. Please do not hesitate to give us a call in the future so we can assure you have a great and peaceful stay. We do look forward to another stay.

Summary: The room was perfect for my family of four. We enjoyed the room as it was kept clean and only needed to go to sleep since we spent all day at between Disneyland Resort and California Adventure parks. The walk was only about 10-15 minutes to both parks which we enjoyed while walking with our littles (2.5 year old and 5 year old). The only downside was the breakfast area which got full pretty quickly so make sure to get up early to get a table. Otherwise, that didn't bother us much as we enjoyed the stay overall. Our beds were very comfortable. Usually, I'm very picky where I sleep and I was able to rest with no problem.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you found your room to be so clean and you were so comfortable in your room. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to your return.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay!  Very Clean rooms, that were well maintained.  It is Close to Disneyland, about a 15 minute walk.  It was Easier in the morning than at the end of the day, if you have children or are older.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you had such a wonderful stay. We are hoping that you will be returning soon.

Summary Heading: Great price and just round the corner
Summary: What can I say! We had ground floor room. Plenary of parking. Room was clean, we moved one of the beds to the wall for mom and baby and no dust under the bed! Sink was a little dated but was clean. Furniture was new. Room had two usb chargers on each bedside. Fridge in room and A/C. Was able to get refills of coffee pods at desk. Breakfast free and there was a great selection with fresh fruit too. Facilities open till 10pm. We booked room for Disney and was a pleasant walk to the park. About 7 mins in total. On our checkout we asked if we could leave the car there and they said yes. Staff were very helpful and always smiling. Will book again and recommended hotel to family.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to know we fit so well into your budget and that you found our location to be convenient. Thanks so much for the compliments to our staff! Its so good to know that they provided you with such great service. Looking forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Average - Clean, Inexpensive, Breakfast Wasn't Great
Summary: Stayed here in November 2018. Great location to Disneyland (about a 15 minute walk). Free WiFi and clean room. Bed was a little uncomfortable, but not unbearable, especially considering the cheap price for the room.   Breakfast was the worst part of the stay - it was only open for one hour (8am-9am) and there was not much to pick from. The water in the boiled eggs pan was gross with toast particles floating around in it.   If you're looking for a fancy stay, this isn't your place. But if you're just looking for somewhere quick and fairly inexpensive to sleep, it's a great option for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad that you found we fit into your budget. We are also happy that our location was so convenient for you. We do have a complimentary breakfast that is served daily from 6 am to 9 am. Our breakfast does include fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hard cooked eggs with salt and pepper, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, freshly baked waffles with syrup, cream cheese danish, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee. We are sorry to hear that this did not meet your breakfast needs.  We again are glad to hear we fit so well into your budget We are excited for your return

Summary: Overall a good experience some mix up with the rooms resulting in our group being separated that couldn‚Äôt be rectified . Close to food and shopping . Short walk to Disney. Courteous staff , clean pool and hot tub . Breakfast was good just needed more protein
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great that you had such a good stay with us when visiting Disneyland. We are hoping to see you return soon.

Summary: This hotel is walking distance to Disneyland. We stayed for 2 nights and enjoyed our stay. I love that there are no carpets! The breakfast was sufficient to start our day - cereal, toast, hard boiled eggs, bananas, homemade waffles, yogurt.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. It is good to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast . We are really looking forward to another stay.

Summary: Excellent little motel. Close to park entrance, 10 minute walk or there is a shuttle right outside lobby. The next stop is main gate. Clean rooms. We were able to get an adjoining room so we had ample space for our families. Nice to have hot tub after a long day of walking. Staff was very helpful and friendly.  Nice continental breakfast. Overall excellent stay. Thank You!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are glad to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful as well. We are excited for another stay.

Summary: Hotel staff was nice and friendly from the desk when we checked in to housekeeping.   The pool was by the front lobby which generously give you towels closes at 10 which is perfect. It was a great experience close to Disney lots of restaurant options nearby very safe
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a wonderful experience and that you felt so safe here. We hope to see you return soon.

Summary: Good location near disneyland  and comfortable room and beds. Room is too big and clean. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Price is acceptable for staying.  Breakfast is okay.  But no elevator to carry luggage upstair.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do look forward to another visit.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Places to eat very close by, all minutes walking distance. Walgreens on the corner. At the time they were replacing all the windows with soundproof glass. Carpet has been removed from floor & replaced with floorboards. A great added extra. No more dirty hotel carpets. Great swimming pool & spa. Good breakfast selection, breakfast room is a bit small but there is extra seating outside on rooftop. A great spot to stay while in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful that you were so comfortable staying here and that you had a great stay. We are so excited for your next visit!

Summary: Very clean, great location, friendly staff. We stayed here for 5 nights during our Disneyland trip and it was perfect for what we needed. Within a 15 min walk to the park entrance, or there is an ART stop right at the front entrance to the hotel. Rooms have been updated and are clean. Pool and hot tub was a nice bonus. Breakfast was decent - fresh waffles, cereal, toast, bananas and orange slices, danishes and hard boiled eggs. We booked directly through the hotel's website and got a great rate. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you found us a great place to stay during your Disneyland trip. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I have stayed here a few times - the staff are always kind and welcoming, it has been recently renovated, it is spacious, beds are comfortable - close to parks. Clean, air conditioner, quiet, lots of parking!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's! As always it is so good to know that you enjoyed your stay. We are looking forward to another visit!

Summary: Great breakfast and location to all attractions and restaurants. Clean rooms and friendly staff.  Only negative is the lack of a room safe, which all other Hotels provide.  Other negative is that there is no access to top floor rooms for wheelchairs and difficult to access if on crutches.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do have safes available at the front desk free of charge. We do apologize for any inconvenience. We do not have an elevator, but we are more that happy to make sure you have a first floor room if needed due to a wheelchair. We are hoping that you will be back to visit in the future.

Summary: Its mu second stay in two days. Very very clean, beds and pillow comfortable, the air conditioned is goooood and lots and lots of hot water.  Includes free parking, wifi and breakfast. This last one is very basic, milk, cereal, fruit, waffles, juice, toast, coffe you get the idea.  Its 5 minutes fron CVS, Walgreens and 7Eleven. Two minutes walk from The Cheesecake Factory, P.F. Chan, Bubba Gum. 15 minutes walk from Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney.  Also is a 20 walk to the Anaheim Convention Center, 30 minutes from Target. With Uber is 20 away from Outlets, Stadium, Ross and PetSmart.  Honestly this IS the best hotel you could stay in.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear that we exceeded your expectations. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and we are really looking forward to another stay.

Summary: Great stay. Room with space, bed was nice, breakfast and service good. Bathroom was clean, with a bathtub. Close to Disneyland (15 minute walk). Also shutlles available, but unsure how to use it (We never asked, sure they would've helped us.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad that you had such a wonderful stay. We hope that you will be back soon!

Summary: Long way from anywhere but Disneyland but the room was clean and staff helpful.  and the hotel has a pool. More like a motel than Hotel though. Surrounding area was clean and felt safe. Fine for families who want to concentrate on Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are convenient to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We are also a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center, and a quick 15 minute walk to nearby shopping. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experience while staying with us.

Summary: I was looking for a nice clean hotel that was easy walking distance to both the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland that wouldn't break the bank.  The rooms were very clean and comfortable.  The hotel was a very easy walk to both the convention center and Disneyland.  They also offered a good breakfast.  Staff was very friendly and checking in and out was quick and easy.  For a very reasonable price this was a perfect fit for my BlizzCon vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome that you were so happy with our location and that we fit into your budget.  We are so close to the Anaheim Convention center, just a 5 minute walk!  This does make it so convenient. We are looking forward to  another visit.

Summary Heading: For the money it's a good deal
Summary: This motel is close to Disneyland and it's great price wise.  It's an okay motel. The rooms are clean and plenty big. The continental breakfast is lacking. Plus there's very little room in the dining area. Could be improved upon. Coffee was terrible!!!! But staff was super nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review It is so good to know that you found we fit so well into your budget. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to hear that they provided such awesome service. We are sorry that you did not like the coffee we serve. We do serve a colombian brew coffee. We are really looking forward to another visit.

Summary: Close to Disneyland. Lovely waffles for breakfast each day.  Clean room and adequate for our stay. Comfy beds. Staff friendly. A bus stop right outside takes you directly to Disneyland.  You can buy the tickets at reception.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so delighted to hear that you had such  a wonderful stay!  We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient.   We are looking forward to another family visit!

Summary Heading: just as great as last time!
Summary: we had stayed here when it was Super 8 and we were wondering how it would be. Let me tell you, It is even better! they keep it spotless and our room was very clean and smelled fantastic! the pool area is kept clean and has plenty of seating.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's. We are glad that once again you had a great stay. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here in September for a week, we booked it as it fitted our price range. The price was reasonable, beds were comfy and it was very close to Disneyland which was the main purpose of our trip.  Staff were helpful.  Would recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We hope that you will be back in the future.

Summary: Got to check in early. 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Treated my service dog with care and respect. I will be back and recommend them to everyone.they have everything you need laundry etc. My favorite was there is someone there to make the waffles. Thank you all for such an enjoyable clean wonderful stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you had such a great experience when staying with us. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We are excited for your return.

Summary: Good hotel walking distance to Disneyland.  Free breakfast is great but maybe a few more healthy options would be good too.  Kids loved the pool.  The only thing I didnt like was the air con noise and the heat of the room.  Very well priced.  Would recommend
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so awesome that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Park entrance making it so convenient. We are so thankful for your review and we are thankful you will be recommending us. We look forward to future visits!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at Kings Inn, loved the free breakfast. Great price.
Summary: We spent 6 nights at the Kings Inn (September 15 - 21), travelling in from Australia and we loved our stay. Two Queen Beds, upper floor. On arrival, we were very tired from our overnight flight from Sydney and we were lucky to receive an early check-in and free breakfast. A big shout out to the ladies in the breakfast room making us fresh waffles everyday. The free breakfast daily set us up for a huge day at Disneyland and it have everything we needed. We went to the breakfast room early and never had a problem getting a table (as other have said). Just a 15 minute walk to the front gates, and we did this every day and every night and not once did we need to use the ART shuttle, even with a 9 year old. Our room was kept clean, and plenty of hot water. Very close to restaurants.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we are glad to hear that you found us to be so affordable. we are really looking forward to another visit.

Summary: Stayed here 6 nights & very happy. Close to great restaurants. An easy 10 min walk to Disneyland. Enjoyed the pool everyday. Rooms clean. Lovely staff. Would definitely stay here again & recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you loved your stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and in a great location.
Summary: Staff happy to allow breakfast to be removed from the area and taken back to room. Walking distance to Disney is very good and a bus right outside as well. Close to 7/11 and lots of restaurants. Nice and clean and comfy, we had a fridge and there are ice & drink machines around the property. The area for breakfast was far too small! Long queue out the door each morning, difficult when everyone is wanting to get to Disney in the morning. Pool not particularly inviting, its in the middle of the car park so not really suitable for sunbathing!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to know that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland. We are also so close to so many great places to shop and dine. We are  glad that you had such a great stay! We hope that you will be returning soon.

Summary: I worked in the hotel business for almost a decade. I did front desk, maintenance, and housekeeping work for a 4 star hotel. Anyway, wanted to give my experience in when I give this review. I hardly give 5 star review, but this motel deserved it.   When my wife and I first arrive at the facility we were expected a 'tired' hotel with the basic accommodations just to meet our minimal requirements during our stay. The front desk clerk assisted us to our room and confirmed if we were happy with the room. I was really impressed when I first walked into the room.  The room had a complete renovation and didn't take any short cuts. All walls were patched up correctly, new furniture, bed, TV, floors, bathroom shower, toilet and sink, new light fixtures. The owners went above and beyond
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you had such a wonderful stay. It is so awesome that we exceeded your expectations and we are really excited to know you will be returning!

Summary: We have stayed here many times as Super 8, first time there since they switched  over to Kings Inn. Great location , clean rooms , professional staff, never had a problem. Plenty of great restaurants , right next door.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We look forward to another visit!

Summary: This hotel has excellent location to everything in Anaheim. Anaheim Gardenwalk is next to it. Disneyland is nearby and  food is everywhere. Their breakfast is good and the people working here are really pleasant, efficient and work hard. The rooms are clean, updated and has all the basic necessities.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome to hear that you found our location to be so convenient and you had such a great stay. We are excited for a future visit!

Summary: My family and I (2 kids & 2 adults) stayed at The Kings Inn Anaheim for just over a week in Sept/Oct 2018. It was our base for Disneyland which took approx 15mins walk. The hotel room (2 Queen beds) was clean, spacious and recently redecorated. The hotel staff were very friendly and the kids loved the pool. There are a few places to eat/drink within 1-5 minutes walk (Cheesecake Factory, Chinese, kebabs, bubba gump shrimp, Starbucks, pizza, subway, 7/11, burgers & fries). Laundry (wash & dry, $3 each). The only things that were not ideal were if your room is on the bottom floor, you could hear people walking in the room above you, there were no windows to let in a bit of fresh air (although you can just open the door) and that the air con was quite loud. Even though the walk was
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such a wonderful stay and that our location was so conveniently located. We are really looking forward to another visit

Summary Heading: Nice location and very good value
Summary: Such a prime location came at a good price for the tax-payer funded trip to Solar Power International. So many amenities nearby meant I did not need to use the car during my stay. Basic and clean facilities,
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget. It is true we are so close to everything a car is not needed! We are glad that you found us to be such a great value. We look forward to another future visit.

Summary: Just stayed last night and it was perfect as always.  A Friday night near Disneyland (about a 12 min walk) and totally peaceful.  Beds comfy, price for the area, fantastic.  And if that wasn't enough, great staff, all of them!  But a special place in my heart for the lady making the waffles in the morning- how she gets them so light, fluffy and piping hot ready to put on your plate is sheer magic.  Still Our favorite place to stay in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We always love to hear from repeat guest's. Seeing you return and wanting to come back again warms our heart! We are so excited for your return!

Summary: Great service and location for a great price! Short walk to the parks.  Older buildings but kept up very nice! Breakfast area is a little tight but they keep it well stocked and clean. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good to know that you found us to be so affordable. We are also glad that you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: We stopped off here whilst embarking on our travels from San Francisco to Las Vegas. For $69 i was impressed with the cleanliness of the room and the 2 queen beds were very comfortable. Disney is within walking distance however we did not have enough time to go there, something we will look to do next time. We only stopped for one night to break up the drive and decided to catch a baseball game as the stadium was near by. The LA Angeles were playing the Texas Rangers and being the first ball game I've watched live i was extremely impressed with the whole experience. The stadium was about a 5 minute taxi ride, we would of walked to the stadium but we arrived at the hotel at 18:45 and the game was set to start at 19:00. I opted for the extra couple of hours in bed so i am unable
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so delighted to hear that we fit so well into your budget. We are so glad to know that we exceeded your expectations. We are so excited to hear that you will be returning!

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel.  The hotel is next door to the Anaheim Gardenwalk, a complex of mostly restaurants that is just east of Disneyland.  The standard restaurants are in the area: Calif. Pizza Kitchen, P.F. Chang's, Cheesecake Factory, and for faster food, Johnny Rocket's, a 50's diner-style burger & malt place.  there's a Starbucks coffee, and Walgreens and CVS retail/drug stores within a 5 minute walk.     Property has a pool, was generally clean in that area.  Property overall was kept up pretty well, didn't see a lot of trash anywhere, and when I did see a plastic bottle or similar, staff picked it up right away.    The rooms are not huge, but they are perfectly adequate.  Ours had two queen beds and hardwood (maybe vinyl but looked like wood)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such a wonderful and memorable stay. We are glad to know that our staff was so friendly and helpful. We really appreciate all of your feedback and input. We are really glad to know that we exceeded  your expectations. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Had a great 6 night stay.  There's plenty of choice for dining nearby and also CVS, Walgreens and 7-Eleven for anything else you might need.  The room was comfortable and the under window air conditioner worked well and was less noisy than similar units in the other accommodation we stayed in during this trip.  The bed was good to sleep in and the furnishings in the room looked new.  There was a decent sized fridge which was appreciated after having flown in from Las Vegas where there was no fridge at all in the room!  Check in and check out was quick and efficient and all the staff were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome to hear that you had such and awesome stay. We are glad to know that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to another visit!

Summary: nice place even a view from the fireworks from disney. enjoyed the pool Breakfast wasnt the best but it was included. . nice quiet place i would go back for sure 10 minutes from Disney   rooms are clean and spacious
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear that you had such a great stay. It is also wonderful that you found our location to be so convenient.We are really looking forward to another visit soon!

Summary: Loved our stay at Kings Inn, would definitely stay again. A short walk to Disneyland and right next to the Garden Walk. Clean spacious rooms. Only thing id recommend would be a shade sail at the pool as it got so hot without shade by the pool.  Overall great place.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found our location to be so convenient to the Disneyland Park. We are really glad you had a great stay and we do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Really like this hotel. Basic but good. Room was good size and well thought out. Fridge was massive. Cable tv. Parking outside rooms. And you can use car park after you check out. 9 mins to walk to Disney. Plenty of shops nearby. Breakfast was great but cramped. Pool was great though half of it is 8ft deep!!!! Staff were really helpful. Fireworks from Disney are loud here!!!!  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a wonderful stay and we are so excited for your next visit!

Summary: Clean and very comfortable beds and pillows. Breakfast was better than expected, with eggs, waffles, yogurt, cereal, oatmeal, toast,danish and oranges. Staff was wonderful and very helpful.  Only complaint was the dirty patio/pool furniture. Beware...it is a very long walk to the Disneyland entrance!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It is great to hear that you staff was so friendly and helpful as well.. I assure you I will pass this information about the pool on to the maintenance manager to follow up on.  We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Close to Disneyland and convention center. Free breakfast and parking. They have onsite laundry and will do whatever they can to make your stay enjoyable. They have a nice outdoor pool and hot tub. Overall, great place and value. Will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be returning.

Summary: Very nice, clean and well equipped hotel. Rooms were spacious and peaceful. Pool facility was good and also a sun trap! Breakfast room is a bit small but turn around is quick as everyone seems to have Disney on the mind - a 15 minute walk with a 3 year old! Great hotel, great location, great price!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great to hear that you had such a terrific stay. It always is good to know that our guest's vacation turned out so well. We are glad that you found we fit into your budget and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your next stay.

Summary: Clean room with basic things. Free breakfast was great, having such variety of foods. No elevator, so be aware of some lifting if you have heavy baggagies. 7-11, Walgreens, and CVS are just around the corner with some restaurants. It‚Äôs convenient to get food and supplies even during midnight.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review.  it is so fantastic to hear that you had such a wonderful stay and that you found we fit into your budget. We are also so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are really excited for your next visit with us.

Summary: Everything was excellent ... rooms clean... breakfast was great... pool was clean and not over crowded.. will definitely choose here to stay from now on... close to Disneyland and restaurants... friendly staff!
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so glad that you had such a nice vacation and that you had such a nice stay. We are really hoping to see you return again soon.

Summary: this is first stay in Anaheim. but I'm so satisfied to stay! clean,calm and useful, especially staff has great kindness! we are not good at english, but staff helped us to stay comfortable! thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you for recommending us as well. We are glad that you had a lovely stay and we are so happy that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you return!

Summary: The Kings Inn is a great Hotel.  Our check in was very easy and the staff were very friendly and helpfull. Car parking was good, as you could park right outside the room. The room was big enough for our family of 4 with 2 large and very comfortable beds. The room looked recently refurbished with wood effect laminate floor, and modern decoration. It had a good size bathroom with a large double shower. Storage was good and the air-con was the quietest I've come across for a while. The large fridge came in very useful for a cold wine/beer after a long day out. One slight negative was that there was no safe in the room, instead you have a free safe box located in reception which meant a short walk each time, but it wasn't a big issue.  The breakfast room was a challenge. The food
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you had such a great stay. It is always great to hear that we exceeded our guest's expectations.  We are really looking forward to another visit.

Summary: It looks like they just remodeled the rooms. We were only there for one night but it was great and we would stay there again for longer. It is a quick walk to the Disney Parks which is always great. The breakfast was good too.
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. We have remodeled the rooms as you say. We are so happy that you liked the new look. We are glad to hear that we were so convenient for you and we do look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: This is our second time staying at this property, and we would definitely stay again. The room was clean and comfortable. It was nice to have laminate flooring instead of carpet; it was much cleaner. The room size definitely met our needs for this trip. The staff are friendly and very welcoming. They were able to answer all of our questions and provide very accommodating service during our stay. The free breakfast has plenty of simple options that are quick and easy, including hot mini waffles! While the air conditioners are on the older side and some may find them a bit noisy, they pump out really nice, cold air which is just what you need after a busy, hot day at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you returned and had such a fabulous stay. We are really looking forward to your return.

Summary: Kings inn was better than expected. We checked in at 2 am and the front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. Check in was quick and easy. The rooms were cleaner than expected. We‚Äôve stayed st other hotels near Disneyland and they were not as nice. The best thing is how close and convenient the location is to Disneyland, it‚Äôs only about a 10 minute walk. There‚Äôs also free breakfast. Lots of other families staying here which is nice. We will definitely look into staying here next time.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so wonderful to hear that we exceeded your expectations. We are very excited for your return!

Summary: Third time at this hotel, & each trip has been great. This is the first time we have been under the Kings Inn banner & the service is even better than when it was super 8. Super friendly guy (All staff were very friendly) at check in says it was now family run. Location is superb ...15 minutes to Disney on foot... 3 minute walk to heaps of restaurants & shops at the Garden Walk. Walgreens & CVS just across the street. Great transport links to get where you want. Rooms all refurbished & nice & big. My 15 & 12 year olds love it...Amazing VFM...Definitely returning again next year...Can't wait !!!.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so terrific to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. We are always so happy to hear from repeat guest's. We really are so excited for your next stay with us.

Summary: Close to Disneyland, approx 10/15min walk. Breakfast included with stay, very handy before day at Disney. Staff very friendly during our stay, very welcoming. Only negative is no safe in rooms. Need to wear slides as floor can be dirty. Great value for money.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We do have safes available at the front desk at no extra charge. We are sorry to hear that your floor was dirty, I assure you I will pass this on to our housekeeping manager for review. We are looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: Great location for Disneyland resort. Very neat and tidy. Everything is within walking distance and very convenient.  Excellent customer service. There is not a thing they won't do for you. And always with a smile.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. IT is true we are in an excellent location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are really glad you received such great service. We are excited for another visit.

Summary: It‚Äôs an old hotel and it doesn‚Äôt look very nice but rooms are updated and clean. They offer breakfast and it‚Äôs not bad either. It is Very close to Disney so it makes it very convenient. Staff is friendly. I would stay there again. Good price too!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are glad that we fit so well into your budget and we are really excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights. The walls are PAPER THIN, but for the price, it was a very good place to stay. It was a 10-minute walk to Disney's main gates, at the most. You can see the fireworks from the room and there are lots of restaurants, stores etc all around. The hotel is clean and very nice for the price. The hotel staff wasn't spectacular or anything special but they weren't rude or bad. The hotel breakfast was subpar at best. There were 2 cereal options and danishes that tasted like nail polish remover. There were toast and mini Belgian waffles. The waffles were the best part, hard to mess up.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient to the Disneyland park. We are also glad to hear that you liked your room and you felt so comfortable here. We are really looking forward to another visit.

Summary: This hotel is an amazing deal for the price you pay. Fifteen minute walk to Disneyland, with clean and comfortable rooms. Check in was super quick and Princess Jessica was able to find us a room even though we arrived early in the day. No noise issues.   My only complaint are the pillows on the beds. One was too flat, but two was too bulky, and this thought was shared by everyone in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful that you found us to be such an awesome value. We are also happy that you found our staff to be so helpful. We are so excited to see you return!

Summary Heading: Great value for money! Clean and comfortable
Summary: Having read some opinions about this hotel I was skeptical for my visit there with my family to go to Disney. But it exceded my expectations! The personnel was kind helpful and attentive. The rooms were cleaned daily and thoroughly. Bed were very comfortable.   Complimentary Breakfast included freshly made waffles, juice, boiled eggs, oatmeal, cereal, toast, and some oranges. It‚Äôs limited but I think was good enough! (No bacon or scrambled eggs, but  My kids enjoyed it very much. The breakfast room is small, but there‚Äôs a terrace outside and you can also use the tables at the pool deck. Overall it was good!  The heated pool and the hot tub are nice and a great way to end the day.   Distance to the Disney parks is 10 minutes walk. If you do not want to walk there‚Äôs a Disney
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so awesome to hear that you found us to be such a great value and that you had such a great stay. We are happy that everything was just perfect for you during your stay with us and we do look forward to your next visit with us

Summary Heading: You stay here for the location and price
Summary: Top notch location for the price.  My suggestion is if you can afford a little more then stay elsewhere.  We stayed 3 nights and it was more than enough.  There's nothing completely wrong with the accommodation but it's all the little things that add up.  Pros: Location.  Easy walk to Disney.  Plenty of food options in walking distance. Pool area nice. Service staff are good. Aircon in room is good during hot months.  Cons: Rooms are cramped and tired.  Bathrooms are tiny.  Beds just passable. Breakfast passable.  It's very cramped and busy. Not much in the way of healthy options. It's next to a car park for a shopping area and prone to loud/hoon cars at all hours of the night. Laundry charges expensive compared to other parts of the US.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also delighted to hear that we fit so well into your budget. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear that they provided you with such excellent service. We do have a very popular breakfast as you say. We have additional seating on our sun deck as well as at the pool area. We do apologize for any inconvenience regarding the parking next door. We do have security as well as a  24 hour front desk. Please make sure and let us know so we can address this for you. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Check in was quick and easy. Staff was friendly and helpful. Our room was clean and comfortable. AC was nice and cold too!. Loved the hard wood floor's instead of carpet. Continental breakfast was fine it just got VERY  crowded. Parking is ample and you can see fireworks from there. Easy 8 minute walk to Disneyland. We really enjoyed ourselves and will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful time when staying with  us for your birthday. We are so excited for another visit!

Summary: Very good location. 15 mins walk to Disneyland. Lots of restaurant nearby. 2 Queen beds for family room. Comfortable beds and pillows. Beds were done daily, but floors were not clean enough, we could still see the crumbs left behind on the floor.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are so happy that you found your room to be so comfortable and you loved our new beds! We are sorry to hear there was an issue with housekeeping. I assure you I will pass this on to our housekeeping manager to follow up on. We are really looking forward to another future visit!

Summary: We had an awesome time!! All the hotel staff was very friendly and professional.  The rooms were very clean!!! It felt like home! Very comfortable beds and wonderful showers.
