We would like to give a grateful thank you to Peter the hotel manager!!! You made our grandsons birthday a success! Great family hotel!! Trevor Floyd and familyüôÇüíõ
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. Thank you for the compliments to our GM and our staff as well. We look forward to another visit.

Summary Heading: The perfect place to stay on a budget
Summary: I have no complaints about my stay at Kings Inn Anaheim. The staff were friendly and helpful, our room was spotless and clean, and the place was a reasonable distance away from Disneyland that we could walk to. The breakfast was minimal, but it was free so I'm not going to complain about free stuff. All in all, I had a positive experience with this hotel and would 100% return when I go back here for another vacation.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great that you had such an awesome stay and even more exciting to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay at if you're going to Disneyland
Summary: Kings Inn was a decent place to stay at.  Pros: walking distance to Disneyland, very close to restaurants and pharmacy stores like Walgreens and CVS. It was a good place to stay at for a couple of days. AC kept the room really cold as it could get really hot in there without it on. Liked how the room is hard floored. Cons: We had trouble the first night because our shower got clogged as I was showering, I called the front desk and maintenance came in to fix the problem. Took about 20min and he got it fixed. There was also an odd smell coming from the sink. Breakfast was not that great. Just mini waffles, pastries, juice, cereal (Frosted flakes, raisin bran) yogurt, fruit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. We are also happy that you liked our newly remodeled room with the hardwood flooring. We are sorry for any bad experience that you had during your stay with us. We are glad to hear our maintenance staff was able to repair the issue. We  do have complimentary breakfast which includes fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, sweet rolls, freshly baked waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, hot cocoa, hot tea, 2 kinds of juice, as well as coffee. We hope to see you return soon!

Summary: The Kings Inn is a great place to stay.  Incredibly friendly and helpful staff. Clean, spacious rooms that are impeccably clean. A great swimming pool and perfect location.  You are within 10 minute walk to Disneyland and right next to the garden walk. Wonderful Mediterranean restaurant just up the street and you are able to book tours right at the front desk. We did universal studios and Hollywood. Price was reasonable too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are go glad to hear that you had such an awesome stay and that you had time to enjoy our heated pool and hot tub. We are also glad to hear that we fit so well into your budget. We hope that you will be returning soon

Summary: Kings In was a great last minute option for me and my gf. We wanted cheap but still decent when it came to Cleanliness of the rooms. This place is great for a weekend getaway and the walk is extremely close to Disneyland along with a bunch of places close by to eat at or a pharmacy if needed. Downfall for me was the pool closing at 10pm but that's understandable. Great place great price close to park. Worth looking Into
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to hear that you had a good stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We  are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay on a budget
Summary: Pros:  Location: About a 15 minute walk to Disney, right next door to some great restaurants & shopping. Across the street from a Starbucks, Walgreens & CVS. Short drive to Target.  Parking: Plenty of parking right outside our room. We parked our car the first day we arrived and didn't move it, but it still seemed like there was plenty of parking late after Disney closed.  Room: The room looks like it was recently renovated. There are wooden floors, a nice size refrigerator, plenty of space for clothes. The rooms were very clean as well, which is a major bonus. The beds and pillows were super comfortable.  Cons:  Breakfast. They advertise that breakfast is included, but there were VERY little options. They had some small waffles, cereal (Raisin Bran & Frosted Flakes), toast
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good to know that you found staying with us to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We do have open parking which does make it so easy to find parking, and it is free! We have recently remodeled our rooms and have put in several upgrades and special touches. We are so happy that you liked our improvements to our rooms. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast. We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. Our complimentary breakfast does include fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, freshly baked waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as hot coffee. We are sorry to hear that our complimentary breakfast did not meet your breakfast needs. We do apologize for any issues regarding housekeeping. I assure you we will follow up on this with our housekeeping manager.We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We had a 2 day pass to Disneyland and wanted somewhere close that wouldn't be over priced. Well this place has it all! 12 minute walk to Disneyland, close to shopping and places to eat. There is also plenty of parking on site. The rooms are perfect for visitors who are going to Disneyland and don't want to waste a lot of money on a room that will only be used for sleeping in. The staff are so friendly and helpful and its clean. Best of all its very well priced.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and thank you for recommending us! It is wonderful to hear that you had such a great stay and that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are excited to see you return!

Summary: Just returned from our stay of 6 nights, and I wanted to say our room was super clean, the staff very friendly, was surprised to see security actually walking the grounds every night, this location is close to everything! We would stay again for sure! We did not use the pool for lack of time, but it was enjoyed by many, the breakfast area is small and was super crowded every morning so we did pass on that however it smelled delicious when we walked past. The fireworks from Disney were an added bonus! I had read some bad reviews and I was pretty nervous about staying here after seeing post regarding roaches.. However we did not see so much as a spider. Our room was super clean, love that there are no carpets! Room was small but for 2 it was perfect! Walking distance to Disney
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always so good to hear that we exceeded our guest's expectations. We are delighted that you had such a wonderful stay. Please let others know about your great experience and we look forward to another visit.

Summary: It was so great! They made my bed and put my stuffed Disney Characters on it each day. They even held our bags for us. Just down the street from the Convention Center and Disney. Showers were large and bed was comfortable
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that our staff was so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: On our honeymoon trip we stayed here overnight. Room big, ample car parking. Close to Disney. Nice area. Did not have breakfast as we missed it as we where tired. McDonald‚Äôs not far away. Good restaurant‚Äôs nearby. Pool good. I would stay here again great location. Great value for the money we paid for the room :-)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good that you loved staying with us and that you had such a wonderful stay. We are happy that you found we fit into your budget and we really are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel and forgot a wallet with money and credit card, we called the hotel and they sent it to us in Las Vegas with every penny inside, lovely experience!!!!! Besides the location is wonderful and it‚Äôs very clean
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear that we exceeded your expectations and we really do look forward to another visit in the future.

Summary: Fantastic stay !  Friendly staff. Clean and Comfortable Rooms. Breakfast and Good Coffee. Within walking distance to Disneyland. The pool and jacuzzi  are perfect.  I will stay at the Kings Inn Anaheim on my next visit to Disneyland or when I'm in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so wonderful that you had such a great visit! We are excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights.  Our room was very clean and comfortable.  It is not spacious, but was the perfect size for two adults and two tweens visiting Disneyland.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The free buffet breakfast was nothing special, but it provided us with a decent meal to get our day started. Would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear that you found your room so clean and so comfortable. Thanks for the compliments to our staff, it is so good to know that they provided you with such great friendly service. Thanks for recommending us to others. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: My family and I just had our annual family vacation at Disneyland and decided to stay at kings inn Anaheim. Since arrival the front desk was nothing but helpful thumps up to Paola she was super friendly and helps us to get the perfect room with the perfect view. #227 (fire works ) after check in we went to our room and what a surprise, room was nice And clean beds were super comfortable sleep like a baby lol everything was just perfect. During the afternoon we went to the pool and even do it was not as big as it seems in picture it was perfect. Breakfast was nice cereal,coffee,milk,waffles and yoghurt it could have been better if they offer scrambled eggs but can't complain.location wise its about 7 min walk to disney 10-12min if you're a slow walker.. Would I recommend kings
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that we exceeded your expectations and that you had such an awesome stay. We really are hoping that you will be returning soon.

Summary: Great location for walking to the park.  Rooms have been remodeled and are very large.  Quiet area at night.  Close to Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gump Shrimp. Staff was very nice.  Forget the breakfast though. It's in an old room converted to a very cramped food area.  Just toast, yogurt, coffee, cereal, danish pastries etc.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a block and a half from the Disneyland park entrance making it very convenient and cost effective. We are right next door to so many great places to shop as well as dine. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast this is true. We have additional seating on our sun deck as well as at our pool area. We are excited for your next visit!

Summary Heading: Very Convenient to walk to Disneyland Parks
Summary: The Rooms are basic. The beds are comfortable enough, but nothing to brag about. I gave the Four Stars because of the Very Fair price and location to get the Disneyland Parks. It is easier to walk from this hotel then to find a parking place and go into the park. The staff were more than friendly and kind enough. Though don't get your hopes up with the "Free Breakfast". The food quality is basic common fair. Your fellow guests attack the crowded and very short for space common eating area like Sharks in a feeding frenzy.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you found our location to be so convenient. We are a short walk, just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance of the Disneyland park. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast. We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We hope that you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel and honestly no major complaints or commendations.  The hotel itself looks to be a reincarnation of a previous hotel of some sort.  Its older styling means rooms with doors that face the outside and a small centrally located, not very private, pool.   The rooms themselves appear to be fairly recently updated with new furnishings and d√©cor.  They contain a refrigerator, but microwave is in the laundry facility elsewhere on site.  Hardwood (laminate) floors take some getting used to. Also getting used to is not having a tub, only a shower (at least in the room we stayed in).  The beds were too soft for my liking and really squeaked a lot.  Morning 'breakfast', was heavy on the carbs with nothing but cereal, waffles, premade pastries,
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you had a good experience with us and that we fit so well into your budget. We are a block and a half from the entrance to the Disneyland park. It is a 15 minute walk or so. If going to the Toy Story parking lot, it is a mile or so walk. We do apologize for any misunderstanding. The ART shuttle does pick up right out front as well for those who wish to get transportation to and from the park. We do hope that you will be back to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Room was very clean and comfortable. Beds were a bit on the small side ,but comfy. Breakfast was more like a continental and the eating area was extremely small. There wasn't enough food provided for the amount of people having breakfast. We opted for near by restaurants the other days. Close enough to walk to Disneyland, but the ART bus stops right infront of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found your accommodations to be so comfortable and clean. We do have a very popular complimentary  breakfast as you say. We have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We are just  a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are also right by the ART bus stop for those who wish to catch a ride for a small charge. We hope to see you return in the near future.

Summary: Fantastic location. Right next to loads of dining, shopping and entertainment options. Spent five nights at this beautiful establishment. Went to both Disney parks plus enjoyed a day at Venice Beach. Lovely staff. A very inviting space. Loads of rooms. Two buildings total. Both 2 story. Awesome typical kidney shaped pool in center of buildings/parking lot. Cleaned every morning plus nice sized hot tub, also cleaned. We met family from abroad for this vacation. Easy access for the younger children. Breakfast area is spacious, loaded and reloaded throughout the designated times. Plus cleaned as well. Very well maintained property. Thanks for a wonderful stay. We will definately stay here every time we are in the area.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is so awesome that you had such a good stay and that  you plan on returning! We are excited for your next visit.

Summary: I don't know what the heck people were doing outside my room, and up on the second floor.  Banging, thumping noises, people walking around noises.  It was bad enough when we first checked in with the cleaning staff banging and thumping but who is making all of the noise at 9:30, 10:00 pm and later????
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize if you were disturbed by your upstairs neighbors. We know that most likely they were just having a good time, however, possibly the did not know they were disturbing you. We do have a 24 hour front desk available and would suggest that you give us a call next time right away so we can address things. We also have an onsite security who would be able to assist as well. One other thing, we would make sure you are on upper floor next time if that is acceptable with you. We want all of our guest's to have a good time, and have a relaxing stay. Just make us aware of the situation so we can make sure that happens. We do look forward to another visit in the future.

Summary: Three rooms, 6 adults and 2 children......this was a good spot for us, with Disneyland around the corner about a 15 minutes, 5 by Uber and the cost around $5.  The hotel serves a quick breakfast which we tried once and they opt for Denny's across from the park and of course the Breakfast with the Character morning.  We stayed five days.  The staff were great and when the air conditioner broke they fixed it right away and replaced a light bulb. Make sure you leave nothing on the bed in the morning, clothes, baby blankets, they can't make it.  We ordered a stroller from a rental company and it was right there waiting for us.  We swam in the pool and sat in the hot tub, lots of parking and we actually used the laundry room.  Good choice for a hotel near the park. Very Very family
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great that you choose to stay with us for your summer vacation. We are in the perfect spot, so close to Disneyland it is true.We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We are a perfect place to stay with family. We are really hoping that you will be returning soon.

Summary: Wanted to share this one. Had to cancel my stay do to my childs medical emergency.   Called them 3 weeks in advance to cancel. After telling them my situation and the front desk talking to management, they called me back and refused a refund.  I'm sure they were able to rebook the room and they kept my funds. Sad
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this hotel because it is one of the neighborhood hotels which I thought was closer than it really was to walk to Disneyland. I needed up driving anyways because I did not want to walk 15 mins after leaving Disney and during the night. It‚Äôs a decent hotel. The one great thing about it is that it is right next to a shopping area with PF Chang‚Äôs, Bubba Gump, Cheesecake Factory, etc.   Check in time was 3 pm but I still didn‚Äôt get into my room until closer to 4pm. Looks like they need more staff with the turnover rate. As far as the room, it did not have a microwave. Although there is a designated area for reheating food.... it is not open all the time. I think it is only open during bfast time (6-9 am) or if you ask they may be able to open it for you to use the
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to know that you decided to stay with us on your birthday. It is true we are in a great location to both the Disneyland park as well as several great places to dine at the  Anaheim Garden Walk. We are so sorry to hear we were unable to check you in at 3 PM. As it is summer we have been very busy and do our best to accommodate all of our guest's. We did have a specific request for you and because of that we did not just want to move you to another room. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast which includes fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee. We do apologize if this did not meet your breakfast needs. Thank you for the compliments to our staff and for all their hard work. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Bus at front door to Disneyland, also close enough to walk. Good breakfast supplied. Laundry on site. Pool to cool off. Close to many restaurants and fast food outlets. Short bus trip to Target and Walmart.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as well as Downtown Disney. We are also right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk where there are several great places to dine. We are every excited for your next visit!

Summary: Kings Inn has a great location, easily walkable to Disneyland, with 24 hour food nearby, as well as Starbucks and Walgreens within walking distance. Room was clean. There were a few imperfections but overall it was a very nice room. Maid service knocked a lot, even despite us saying that we were still in the room (very loudly). I‚Äôll admit that we forgot to put out the privacy placard a couple of times, but it happened with it on once too.  Overall, a great experience and would definitely stay again!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is true we are a great location when visiting the Disneyland park.We are sorry about any inconvenience or misunderstanding regarding housekeeping. We do hope that you will decide to visit us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel is in a good area with close proximity to Disneyland and nice restaurants. The room was spacious and everything functioned well. The staff were friendly and obliging. The breakfast filled us up but everything was very sweet hence the four stars.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so wonderful that you loved staying here during your Disneyland trip. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast which includes fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk. Freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee. We are looking forward to your next trip with us.

Summary: This hotel was the perfect base for a trip to Disneyland. 10 minutes walk from the park, handy shops like Walgreens and 7/11 nearby and loads of restaurants nearby too! The hotel was clean and pleasant and the staff could not have been more helpful, they were even kind enough to track down some super glue for me when I broke my sunglasses! The room was a good size and the included breakfast had a lot of options. There is a pool, laundry room and car parking on site.  The only issue we had was that it was so close to the Disney parks that the fireworks made it hard to sleep on the first night, but when you are actually spending time in the parks this is not a problem.  Excellent! We would love to stay here again on our next Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is wonderful that you found staying here during your Disneyland trip was such a great choice. We are so happy that you will be returning in the future.

Summary: Good: Staff are very friendly and helpful            close to a lot of restaurants and coffee shops            Newly refurbished room            Close to Disney  Bad: Breakfast is a joke with paper cups plates and cutlery and staff that don't understand English. We asked if there was any chocolate to go with the waffles and they just directed us to the door and said sorry. Our room was on the ground floor next to the breakfast room so people start to queue outside your room for breakfast. The walls are thin so you can hear your neighbours Pool is in the middle of the car park and gets very noisy in the evening
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. It is terrific that you found our location to be so convenient. We are sorry if you were disturbed by your neighbors. We do have a  24 hour front desk. Please do not hesistate to let us know so we can address this in the future.

Summary: Great location for a disney trip. We were able to walk to the park. I would stay here again. The price was reasonable and the customer service was great. It was nice having breakfast available.  A little noisy if you are staying on the bottom floor. Next time I will ask for a top floor.
Manager Response: Thanks for much for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you found our location so convenient and our price fit so well into your budget. We are happy that you will be staying with us again in the future.

Summary: excellent service - front desk very friendly and helpful.  stayed one night for family visit 2 days at Disneyland.  They allowed us to park at the hole both days. Plenty of parking and safe secure parking lot.  Walking distance to Disneyland and places to eat.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay here for your family vacation. we are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This was a great hotel for the money. Clean rooms, friendly staff, great breakfast and pool for the kids. My kids and I had a good time. I would definitely stay here again. I will recommend all my friends and family.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so excited that you had such a great experience and we are even more happy to hear you will be back!

Summary: Easy 10-15 min walk from Disneyland and California Adventure park. Rooms have been tastefully renovated. Pool and hot tub are great to relax in after walking around all day at Disney. Breakfast is supplied, but be warned the queue for the waffles can be a little long. Very helpful staff. Close to many restaurants, convenience stores stc
Manager Response: Thanks for the review.   It is so awesome that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of Disneyland Park. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It is so great that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are really excited for your return.

Summary: It was one of the best hotels I‚Äôve stayed so far the staff were nice excellent location to Disneyland and to other shops clean room next to food places walking distance which was nice and everything was professional
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great that you had such an excellent stay. We are in a great location it is true. It is so convenient. We are really excited for your return.

Summary: Always have stayed at this hotel when i've gone to Disney.  Always have been able to be put in the same room and is nice the hotel has bag storage since my flight was leaving later in the evening and I wanted to go back and enjoy the park.  Great walking distance to the park and nearby restaurants as well.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is always wonderful to hear from repeat guest's.It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the main entrance making it a great place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: A great value hotel for your next Disneyland trip
Summary: The hotel is conveniently located next to the GardenWalk and two blocks away from Disneyland and the Convention Center. The exterior may look dated compared to some of the hotels in the resort district, but the rooms themselves have been renovated to have a more modern look and feel. The staff is great and check in was quick and easy. I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you you found us to be such a great value. We are also happy that you found us the perfect place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park. We are so glad to hear you had such a wonderful stay and that you will be returning.

Summary: It‚Äôs close to Disney land, the free breakfast was really good, they had a ton of options for food. My kids loved it.  We had 9 people with us and they were able to accommodate it easily and give us connecting rooms. You can also see Disney lands firework shows   the hotel
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you had such a good stay and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do hope to see you return soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a short vacation to Anaheim.  Close enough to walk to Disney, Starbuck's close by, and some decent places to get food.  Room was clean, but Dated.  Front Desk Staff were really good to deal with.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are also delighted to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say and we are right next door to so many great places to shop and dine. We are excited for your return!

Summary: Location was great, 15-20 minutes walkable from Disneyland. Desk people were helpful and accommodating. Room was updated and beds were comfortable. Couple downsides: no elevator to second floor, breakfast was minimal and crowded, and our sink was clogged. But all in all, a good value.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful .  We are sorry to hear your sink was clogged. We do maintenance onsite, and are always ready to assist. We are so happy that you found we fit so well into your budget and we do look forward to another visit in the future.

Summary: The Kings Inn Anaheim is close to the Disneyland and is in about 15 minutes reachable by foot. There is free parking and wifi and the breakfast is included. We liked the nice large rooms without carpet.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you had such a good stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary: We booked Kings Inn Anaheim as a short stay as part of our road trip across the US for our anniversary. The images looks great and the description was quite inviting. On arrival we noticed that it was not next to the Convention Centre and there appeared to be a very small swimming pool in the parking lot! The 'motel' feel about the place is very dated and the rooms are very small but adequate. The front door isn't very secure and there is no safe so you have to carry around all your money, passport, documents etc. when going visiting. We had booked breakfast as part of our stay and this came as a massive shock in the morning. The breakfast room is just an emptied out apartment and is very basic and ad-hoc. The free wifi is fast and uninterrupted. The breakfast consisted of a few
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do have safes available free of charge at the front desk. Just inquire if you need one. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast which includes fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of  cold cereal with milk, freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot coffee as well as hot tea. We do apologize if this did not meet your breakfast needs. We do hope that you decide to return in the future.

Summary Heading: Spotless,comfortable and free parking for Disneyland.
Summary: All that needs to be said except great value., sometimes when you pay less you're concerned about how clean or how nice this place was perfect for us.  The exterior looked a little older but the tub and the room look brand-new especially the bathroom. The tax were comfortable white and fluffy. I walked around in my socks and they were spotless afterwards.  It was about a 15-minute walk to the Disneyland front gate there is a shuttle if you want to pay for it.  Breakfast, nothing fancy, consisted of yogurt, cereal, Danish and Waffles. The waffles were very good and the yogurt provided protein to get you through till lunch.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good to hear you found us to be such a great value and you had such a good stay. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We hope look forward to another visit!

Summary: Had a amazing stay, very helpful , allowed us to stay after check out time. Would stay here again. Clean & tidy place. Good parking. Great breakfast. Pool was lovely. Friendly staff. Nice and quiet.Not far from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you had such an amazing stay. We are so excited for your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near the Convention Center
Summary: Spent 4 nights here and walked about 1/2 mile to the Convention Center to attend a seminar, leaving car parked the entire time. Could wish free breakfast could include some protein, but attendants there and at the front desk were great for whatever was needed. Bed was comfortable, room seemed brand-new and was CLEAN! I wiped up some spilled water and the white cloth still appeared to be clean when I'd finished. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are just a quick 5 minute walk to the Anaheim convention center. It is very convenient when attending a convention. We are really excited to hear you will be back.

Summary Heading: An affordable choice that's located near Disneyland!
Summary: Prior to my stay, I normally book luxury hotels, but with my last minute planning, I decided to stay at Kings Inn. The hotel room is AMAZING for the cost! The room layout was nice with plenty of outlets by the bed. Their WIFI works very well and my bed felt very luxurious and cozy after a long day. There was plenty of sink counter space for all my toiletries and I have no negatives about my hotel room space. I liked how Kings Inn was located right next to the Anaheim Garden Walk which has all sorts of restaurants and stores near by. I traveled solo and felt safe the entire time I was walking around this area at night. Also, the staff was so friendly and accommodating to me when ever I asked any questions ( I also wanted to add that I witnessed the front desk handle a situation
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so excited that you would be staying with us again and that you found us to be so affordable. We are really looking forward to another visit.

Summary Heading: Great location as well as very nice room
Summary: Close to Disneyland and a reasonable walk to the Convention Center.  My single queen room was nicely remodeled, clean, had comfortable bed, good internet reception and curtains that actually totally closed.  Continental breakfast was adequate with cereal, yoghurt, instant oatmeal,pastry and freshly made waffles --no eggs or premade oatmeal.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so good to hear that you found our location so convenient and that you had such a wonderful stay. We are really looking forward to another visit soon.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Kings Inn Anaheim.  The room was spacious, clean and comfortable!  The kids loved the pool and hot tub.  We also stood in the parking lot and watched the Disneyland fireworks!  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is great to hear you loved our location and that you had such a great stay. We are really excited for your next visit.

Summary: We stayed here in March 2018 in 2 rooms with our children 23,16 & 6. I was worried we may be too far away from Disneyland for our 6 year old to walk but he was fine. It took us about 10 minutes however we often stopped at Starbucks on the way :) we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had a good stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to seeing you return!

Summary: Ive stayed in several properties near DLR and this was a new one for me. Price was reasonable, room was clean and tbe beds were comfy. Staff was friendly and helpful. The pool area was fine and the hottub actually hot.  My major concern is the noise. Windows and doors are super thin. Hearing every stompy flipflop walking to the breakfast room at 6am was awful. The  housekeeping carts rolling by and the car alarms in the parkade next door did not make for a restful night.  I would stay here again but I would request a room facing away from the parkade and away from the breakfast room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I arrived earlier than check-in time, but one of the employees was able to find a room for me anyway. They have luggage storage, so if you don't have a rental car and want to hit the parks upon arrival, don't hesitate to ask them to store your stuff. The hotel is a little dated, but the staff was super friendly and the room was clean. Beds were comfortable, and the parks are literally about a ten minute walk. There's so much close by that I walked everywhere. I am already planning my next trip and this hotel will be my "go-to" whenever I visit Anaheim. PS if you're a solo traveler, this area was safe enough that I didn't have to look over my shoulder every two seconds. Would totally stay here again and again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: 5 min walk from Disney and right next to the Anaheim garden walk with some fantastic restaurants. Good size beds with clean rooms and a tv. Staff were great helping us get Disney tickets and really friendly. Breakfast is toast, waffles and a selection of pastries, we had these most mornings before hitting the parks.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great that you found them to be so helpful during your stay and so friendly. We are looking forward to another visit.

Summary: This was exactly was what husband and I were looking for. We wanted a place to sleep place to stay for our Disneyland/Universl trip. The room was clean and the staff friendly. It's about 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland entrance. Walgreens and CVS were about a 5 minute walk. It's also right next to Anaheim GardenWalk, which has a few restaurants and some shopping. The continental breakfast was pretty good. They offered cereal, yogurt, small pastries and they make waffles for you. The pool area was clean, I would have preferred it be open pasted 10pm - would have been nice to use the hot tube after walking around Dinseyland all day.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great that you had such an enjoyable stay. We are so excited that you loved our heated pool and hot tub. We do hope to see you back in the near future

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.  We stayed here for a visit to Disneyland and were able to walk to and from the park to save money on parking.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful that you had such a terrific stay and even better to hear you will be back!

Summary: This hotel was great for the price, the room was nice and clean and a perfect size for the 3 of us.  The breakfast could use a protein of some sort to help get you powered through the day. Staff was friendly at check in. They are updating the hotel so don‚Äôt let the outside fool you, the room was nice and remodeled. (We did not hear any construction happening while there)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We are so happy to hear you found us to be so affordable. It is true, we are really a great value considering our free amenities. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so wonderful to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so excited to see you return.

Summary Heading: Good price and close to Disneyland
Summary: Booked this hotel thru Expedia and was pleasantly surprised. Good price and close to mall with good selection of resturants and close to Disneyland. Room was clean and queen size beds. I would stay here again for sure
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good to know that we fit so well with your budget. It is true we are a great value! We are very happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Aside from being conveniently located in a short walking distance from Disney and many restaurants and shopping, the stay was awesome. The staff is exceptional, friendly and ready to please. The room was comfortable and well stocked. I would stay again and recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you had such a good stay and even happier that  you will be returning! We are excited for your return.

Summary: For the price, the hotel was great. The rooms are CLEAN (which is a big deal), and they have a refrigerator. My only wish is that the beds were a little softer, because my hips don't love firm mattresses.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a great stay and that you found us to be such a great value. We  are sorry you found our mattress too firm. We do have all new mattress in all of our rooms. We are hoping to see you return soon.

Summary: Very friendly, trustworthy staff. Room was clean. Large soft, plush bath towels. Quiet premises. Safe area. Close to Disneyland. Beds were comfortable and plenty of soft pillows as well. Enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are glad to hear you found our beds to be so comfortable and you found our location to be so convenient. We do look forward to another visit from you!

Summary: the rooms were clean. stuffy smell but not bad. close to restaurants and Disneyland. it is what I expected for the price. would stay again. the breakfast was good juice coffee waffles. the pool towels could have been a little bigger.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you had such a good stay with us while here and business and you plan to visit us again. We are in a great place when attending an event at the Anaheim Convention Center as we are only a 5 minute walk from there. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Overall a great stay!  We arrived early in the morning in our first day. We were able to leave our bags at the front desk and spend our first day at Disneyland. When we arrived back at around 4 o‚Äôclock, our rooms still weren‚Äôt ready, but they were able to help us by getting us different rooms immediately. The rooms are basic, but newly renovated. Everything was clean. The beds were comfortable, and we had no issues with noise (other than one family that were up early one morning and didn‚Äôt really respect the quiet policy!  Not the hotel‚Äôs fault).   The complimentary breakfast was much better than anticipated!  It was he same every morning, but there was enough food to get you off for a great start for a day in the parks!  It was nice not to have to worry about a meal first thing
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you had such a great stay with your family. We love that you will be recommending us and that you will be returning! We are excited to hear that

Summary: We stayed here while visiting Disneyland and thought it was great. It's easy to find and only a couple minutes away from Disneyland. Peter and his staff were so friendly and accommodating. The rooms are really clean and the continental breakfast is great as well. We highly recommend this Hotel.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay. It is true we are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park entrance.We are looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The Motel is very close to any atraction around Anaheim and also very close to the freeways. Thats good if you'ld to travel with the car. Breakfast was not my Favorit... only sweet things... I recommended it anyway because it was clean the staff is friendly and the location is realy good.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay. We are glad that you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to seeing you return soon.

Summary: My sister and I booked a trip to Orange County and decided we did not want to spend a ton on a hotel. We found the kings Inn in Anaheim at a great rate per night for 4 nights. It‚Äôs within walking distance to Disneyland and lots of restaurants near by. We arrived and check in was a breeze. Maybe took 5 minutes. They explained everything and provided a map to locate our room. They also provide a parking permit to hang inside of your car. Once we arrived to the room, it was great. Appeared to be renovated not that long ago. Had a nice sized mini fridge so we bought water and drinks at the nearby Target. The bathroom was so clean. I‚Äôve been to many hotels and this may have been the cleanest I‚Äôve seen. The room had two queen beds. Had a tv and a small desk that we used to eat. It‚Äôs
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful that you had such a great stay. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations, it is so good to hear that this was the case. We are looking forward to another visit soon!

Summary: This is a good hotel for simply crashing in when on vacation. The beds are fine, there is a pool, and there's a small breakfast in the mornings. Other than that it's not anything exceptionally exciting. It serves its purpose and that's just fine with me. My only complaint is the walls are literally paper-thin, you can hear every word of every conversation outside or next to your room. So no adult times or loud TV if you want to keep your privacy, cause there isn't any. This isn't really the hotel's fault though, more of the people who forget to be quiet at 6:30 AM. Overall a decent hotel, clean and has amenities.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that we fit into your budget and you had  a good stay. We are sorry if you were disturbed by your neighbors. We do have a 24 hour front desk, please let us know if the future so we can address it. We are hoping to see you visit again soon.

Summary: I expected more from reading the reviews but it's just a basic motel. Good base for Disney, 10 minute walk. The breakfast wasn't good, alright if you like waffles and cereal but there wasn't any fruit just unhealthy foods. The rooms were really clean, found the A/C off when we came back. Ask for a room upstairs because being downstairs was so loud with people coming back from Disney. The fireworks were great at Disney but they literally shake the motel and the noise echoes for miles!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is great to hear that you found us to be such a great location for visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park making it so convenient. We are sorry to hear you did not find that  our complimentary breakfast met your needs. We do serve fresh fruit,  yogurt, toast with jam and spread, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet rolls, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee and 2 kinds of juice. It is wonderful that you found the room to be so clean. We are sorry for an inconvenience regarding the AC. We do our very best to conserve energy here in the state of California, and we do turn off the AC unit when no one is in the room all day for several hours. We are sorry if you were disturbed by your neighbors when they were returning from Disneyland. We do have a 24  hour front desk and if you ever feel that the noise is unnecessary we would be happy to give them a call or ask security to come by. It is great that you enjoyed the fireworks from here. You can see them which is really great. as we are very close. Fireworks can echo for miles as you say. This is typical, and although it is not the fault of the property, we are so sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced from the Disneyland fireworks . We do hope that you will come stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland, shops (Garden Walk mall) and restaurants (Bubba Gump, Cheesecake Factory and PF Changs) so a very convenient location. Could see the Disneyland fireworks from the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel for his location, which is walking distance to Disneyland. We don't book rooms for the Breakfasts or internet service. There is a Denny's and IHop walking distance to buy your breakfast. The room we got was located on the West side nearest the Wall. Our room had been recently renovated, including New Dual Pane windows and a new AC unit. This made it nice as the windows blocked out noise and the AC unit didn't keep you up at night listening to it turning on and off. I would suggest that if you want a quiet room ask for a room on the West side nearest the Wall as all these rooms have the new Windows and AC units. I would definitely go here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so terrific that you had such an awesome stay and that you will be returning! We are excited for your next visit!

Summary: Nice clean room, basic amenities, complimentary breakfast which was nice but could have had a few more healthier options. Conveniently located near nice restaurants and in walking distance to Disneyland. Staff were helpful and friendly. Overall I enjoyed my stay at Kings Inn Anaheim and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great to hear you found us to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: Me, my husband and two small children stayed here for 2 nights. The hotel is about 15 minuets walk to Disney parks.  The stay includes a breakfast which is very basic and the breakfast room is tiny.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had a great stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: Me and my wife spent 4 days here for Disneyland we got it super cheap! (¬£211) with all the taxs very nice rooms, like 20min walk to that park and close to restaurants for an meal out and nice staff didn't have an problems get down early for breakfast normally after 7 Its packed will be going there again next year
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay and that you will be returning!

Summary: From the outside, Kings Inn appeared to be an older motel. Once you enter, however, the rooms are decorated tastefully and were obviously recently renovated and equipped with large Frigidaire refrigerators complete with a freezer compartment. They even provide makeup remover towelettes as part of their toiletries. The beds are creaky though and the walls are pretty thin. We could hear every footstep from the room above. Their computer at the ‚Äúbusiness center‚Äù - a small corner of the very small lobby - was not working, but they immediately offered me an alternative solution. Breakfast left much to be desired, but it didn‚Äôt bother me much since my husband and daughter woke up too late to have any anyway. Small area and small selection with no visible hot foods other than waffles.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always so good to hear we exceeded your expectations. We are glad that you found us to be so convenient and we look forward to another visit.

Summary: Room was refurbished and super clean. Our towls where replaced daily and they gave us extra with out asking. Close to Disneyland. Smelled a little humid but  Will stay again in Octoberand the price was great.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are hoping that you will be returning soon!

Summary: The hotel was very close to the Disney Parks, and just next to a Mall with dinning options. The check-in and check-out processes went just smooth, our flight was delayed and it was not an issue to check-in later at the hotel. I would just suggest a little bit of protein for the breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are look forward to another visit.

Summary: The place was pretty close to Disneyland and a lot of dining options surrounding it. The room was clean but outdated. They also have a standard buffet breakfast which was a good way to start your day. Overall, our stay was okay.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you found us to be such a great value. We really are looking forward to another visit.

Summary: We had a good stay. It took us until the day we checked out to figure out how to turn the static off of the alarm clock (which disrupted our sleep)... future reference, switch it off of mp3 on side of clock. Room was clean. Breakfast was good, but wish it lasted longer than 9am.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you had a good stay. We are sorry to hear about the issue with the Alarm clock. We are glad that you were able to adjust it. We are glad that you found our location to be so conveniently located. We are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Budget friendly walking distance to Disney
Summary: We had two separate bookings at this hotel and stayed here 5 nights. The first 3 nights weren‚Äôt as good as the last two.   The first room was 1 queen size bed room, it was above the lobby and the street. It got pretty loud with the street noises.There was a huge gap under the door so it was loud, we called the front desk and they sent maintenance right away, he tried to fix it but I still had to stuff towels to block out, the outside sounds and to stop the aunts from coming in. That was really annoying. The AC was also old so there was no temperature setting. So we had to manually turn it on and off whenever we either felt hot or cold. To me the worst part was the aunts, I had them crawling even on the bed one night.  The second half of our stay with our other booking we were
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are sorry to hear about any issues regarding the first room you were in. It is good to know that your staff was able to assist in moving your. We are sorry about any noise that you might had experienced. We do have a 24 hour front desk, just make sure and contact us in the event of any noise. We are here to assist. We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We look forward to it.

Summary Heading: Parking Garage next door is worst aspect
Summary: This isn't a place I would recommend, but it wasn't horrible.  Bring Earplugs!  I'll start with the pros in the interest of fairness:  Room was like photos Room was clean TV worked well and had a built-in guide Wi-Fi worked well Attentive staff Location (great location close to convention center and Disney) Free parking (close to room)  The so-so: Breakfast includes waffles and syrup.  There are pastries, a few cereals, milk, apple juice, and orange juice.  There is white bread, wheat bread, a couple different jellies and no peanut butter.  It's set up in two rooms and is quite the gong show.  Too many people, not enough room, and a single doorway to connect most of the food and the seating.  The water temperature in the shower.  We didn't run out of hot water, but sometimes it
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are  glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. This is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. it is wonderful to hear you found them to  be so friendly and helpful during  your stay. We do have free amenities that do help out with your budget. Our complimentary breakfast is very popular as you say. We do have additional seating on our sun deck. It is a great place to relax and enjoy your breakfast. We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience regarding the next door parking structure. I assure you we have followed up on this with them. You can always request a room on the other side of the property away from the Anaheim Garden Walk. We do apologize regarding any issues with the credit card you used for booking. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations and for this we do apologize if  this was the case. We do hope that you decide to visit us again in the future.

Summary: We are a family of 4 with 2 kids aged 5 and 8. This was our first time to the area and Disneyland. I would like to start out by saying that I was VERY nervous about staying here because of  some of the reviews and the price point...we paid some of the lowest prices in the area and I was nervous that the saying would be true "you get what you pay for". WELL, I was very pleasantly surprised at our accommodations. We stayed for 5 nights and it was fantastic. Just over 10 minutes to Disney, and tons of eating places around the area. The area is very busy so we felt safe, even when a homeless guy swore at us. As for the hotel itself, the beds were comfortable, the rooms were simple but clean and the staff were VERY accommodating and FRIENDLY. I would suggest that if you have a
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such a great value and you had a good stay. We are really glad that you will be returning! We look forward to it.

Summary: This is a great budget friendly place to stay close to Disneyland. Comfortable beds, and only about a 10 minute walk from the park. There is also a bus stop right in front of the hotel that will take you right to Disneyland that comes every 20 minutes for a small fee. The free breakfast was what you‚Äôd expect. All carbs, no protein. We only used it once. And it closes at 9 and they mean it. They start yelling warnings about 10 minutes to, and at 9 I half expected them to come in with cattle prodders to herd everyone out! The pool and hot tub were nice, and being right by the Anaheim garden walk there are lots of great restaurants close by. There is also coin laundry available if you need it. Room and the grounds were very clean. All in all a great place to stay for a trip to
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. WE are so happy that you had such a great stay and that we were so budget friendly for you. We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced during our breakfast service. We will follow up with our breakfast staff. We are really excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We stayed for 9 days. Rooms were clean and spacious. Outdoor pool and jacuzzi were great! Breakfast was chaos every day. The setup they have in such a small space doesn‚Äôt work when lots of people come to breakfast at the same time. They also don‚Äôt offer much protein type items for breakfast, like eggs or meat. It‚Äôs a very basic, carb loaded hotel breakfast of sugared cereals, pastries, and waffles. The walk to Disneyland is about 10-15 minutes and not too bad, especially in the morning sun. The walk back after a full day in Disney can be rough though, but you can Uber or Lyft for about $5, especially if you are soaked from Splash Mountain or Grizzly River Run.
Manager Response: thanks for the review We are so glad to hear we fit so well into your budget. We are glad that you had an enjoyable stay and we do hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: A wonderful budget option near Disneyland
Summary: I was very impressed with the cleanliness and newness of the room, as well as the helpfulness of the staff. They were always pleasant and were able to help me get a new room key when mine stopped working.  The room seemed to be newly renovated, and the only downside to me was that the bed was hard. It is a motel, however, and not a fancy hotel, so that seemed fitting.  It is a close walk to Disneyland, but since my five year old and I would be walking all day, we opted for the local bus that stops just in front of the motel, and it costs $5 for the day for an adult & $2.50 for a kid. It runs every 20-30 min a day.  It was absolutely a good experience, and reading the reviews helped prepare for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that we fit so well into your budget and you found us to be so convenient. It is true we are a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. This does make it so convenient. We are really looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Location is great, rooms aren't bad as long as its quiet!
Summary: We drove up and was a little leery, but everyone inside was friendly and wonderful.  The location is what you pay for as it's a mere 10-15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance.  The rooms are nice, beds are comfortable, except I would've liked heavier blankets.  I like the faux wood floors and the large bathroom counter, with the sinks being outside and separate from the shower & toilets.  I didn't like not having conditioner (or an all in one shampoo/conditioner), but I suppose I should've brought my own!    The only problem is the thin walls and open corridor which allow for sound to travel!  I was woken up both mornings by a child's screaming voice and I sounded like they were at the foot of my bed!  I don't know what can be done about the sound travel (or the screaming
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are in the perfect location to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are sorry that you were disturbed by your neighbors.We do have a 24 hour front desk, please let us know if there is every an issue so we can assist. We are so glad to hear we fit so well into your budget. We hope to see you return soon.

Summary: Staff was nice and place was clean. The breakfast area is a mess. I wouldn‚Äôt choose this place based on breakfast. It‚Äôs close to Disney though and there‚Äôs a lot around the area. It‚Äôs a mediocre hotel but overall it was fine.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so glad that you found your accommodations so comfortable and clean. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say making it so convenient. We hope to see you return soon!

Summary: Clean and neat, nicely redone.  Very close to Disneyland (8 minute walk), employees friendly and very helpful.  They even went above and beyond when my reservation came to them wrong.  They corrected the problem and made sure a room was ready for me.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you had such a great stay. We are so happy to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so excited for your next visit with us!

Summary: Great Hotel. Quiet, clean, and comfortable. They offer a simple breakfast in the morning.  A short 10 minute (or less) walk to the main gate of Disneyland. Close to many food establishments, Walgreens, and CVS. We have stayed here many times and will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are always to delighted to hear from repeat guest's. We are glad that once again you had such a great stay. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Great hotel for Disneyland. Less than 15 minute walk to get there. Good standard hotel breakfast (waffles, yogurt, juice, oatmeal, cereal, toast... etc.), but crowded. Hot tub felt great after a long day of walking.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so good to know you found us to be the perfect place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park. We  are glad that you found us to be so conveniently located. We are really looking forward to another visit from you!

Summary: We spend 3 nights here this past week. The hotel is convenient to Disneyland and rooms are nice and quiet as well as comfortable. The shower had good pressure and the rooms were clean. The fridge and microwave were nice for having some treats late night. We did not have breakfast any of the mornings, but it is nice that they have a full breakfast option to offer guests. Ample parking and easy in/out of the lot. The price was right for us and I will absolutely stay here again on future trips. Staff was helpful and friendly, check in and out was quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is absolutely wonderful to hear you had such a great stay with us and that we fit so well into your budget. We are really excited to hear you will be returning.!

Summary: Great location,friendly staff and great price would definitely book again,nice rooms , cute pool area ,very close to restaurants,shopping center, downtown Disney, we went to disney land next day we went to mall wich is in walking distance like across the street ;)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so glad that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are really looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We chose this motel because we wanted one that was walking distance to Disney, had parking, and was not crazy expensive. Kings Inn covered all the basis and gave breakfast as well. We enjoyed the heated pool and the hot tub. The room was a decent size with a comfortable bed. They were in the process of updating the rooms and ours was very clean and nice looking. I'm very happy with our stay and would recommend this motel for good value right near Disney.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so exciting to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. We are so glad that you will be recommending us and we look forward to your return!

Summary: I enjoy staying at this location with the easy access to Disney, both walking and ART.  I appreciate the staff always being helpful and courteous.  They treat their guests with respect and take time to answer questions when help is needed.  Rooms are clean and good sleeping beds and pillows.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's. We  are glad to hear that you feel so at home when staying with us. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Wood floors are a huge plus!
Summary: Room was very nice, clean, and quiet. Even when guests arrived above us it wasn‚Äôt super noisy. The hardwood floors were a huge plus. There was no bathtub so my younger sister was a little disappointed to have to shower but it wasn‚Äôt a big deal. Quick easy walk to Disneyland and California adventure. Breakfast isn‚Äôt the best, besides the waffles. Can‚Äôt go wrong there! Overall a great hotel and I will definitely book here again for my next trip to Disney!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is such a delight to know you found our new flooring to be so comfortable and clean. We do have rooms with bathtubs. Just request that when making the reservation. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: My husband and I and 4 children, 5 years old and younger, stayed in a room with two queens and we had a wonderful stay! The breakfast was great, lots of options and a seating area. 15 minute walk from Disneyland, that made it nice for strollering home 4 sleeping children.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are happy that things went so well for your family when saying with us. We are really a family friendly place to stay, and we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are looking forward to another visit soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, spacious room, close to Disney
Summary: Very happy with this motel.  The room is large, clean and seems recently renovated.  Easy 15 to 20 minute walk to Disneyland.  Free breakfast is simple but well done, waffles, cereals, some fruit, juice, yogurt, pastry.  Free wifi works well.  Good price, nice accommodations.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you found your room to be so clean and you were so comfortable here. We are also happy that you found we fit so well into your budget. we are looking forward to another visit!

Summary: Nice hotel, walking distance to Disneyland, clean rooms. Continental breakfast very basic but helps a lot with children. The staff was very friendly and was able to check in an hour before which was nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are excited for your return!

Summary: This hotel was great for our short trip to Disneyland. We stayed for 4 nights. On arrival I used the laundry facilities which were great as we had been travelling for a week prior to arrival. $2 to wash and $2 to dry just make sure you have plenty of quarters. The room was a good size for our family of four including teens. Breakfast was good but it would have been nice if the hours were a little longer as one of our days was a rest day and we all wanted a lie in. I ended up going down and getting breakfast to take to the room for my sleepy family, many other people were doing the same.   It is an easy 10-15 minute walk to the Disney gates and there are lots of eateries in Garden Walk next door.    As budget hotels go I can recommend this one.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient and you enjoyed your stay so much. Our complimentary breakfast does help with the budgeting as well. We also have free wifi and free parking adding the the value even more. We are excited for your return!

Summary: Rooms were clean, beds are very comfortable, 15 min walk to Disneyland.  And also very close to restaurants and walgreens/CVS. Great little hotel, Will definitely stay again. No problems checking in or out great service!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay. It is true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park.  it is just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance making it so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Good location easy walk to Disney property. Lots of dining and stores about and room was clean and comfy. Air conditioning and heat worked well bed was good and they provided and extra blanket. Shower was great no tub though.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you had such a wonderful stay. We are so close to so many great places to shop and dine as you say. We do have rooms with tubs as well. Just request when making a reservation.  We do hope to see you return in the future.

Summary: Pros- cost effective, 10-15 min walk to the park, A.R.T. Bus tickets available at the office for $5 a day. You can ride to the park and back as many times as you want in a day. Bus stops right out front.  Continental breakfast included 6-9 a.m. Milk, Apple juice,coffee ( I didn't like the coffee). Packets of oatmeal, frosted flakes, raisin bran, pastries, bread for toast, yogurt, orange slices, fresh mini waffles that they make for you.  Staff was amazing, super friendly and fast. Always helpful. Had a small issue with our door lock. They fixed it within 5 min of telling them.  It was recently remodeled as it was the old Super 8. Nice floors and decor, New bathroom. Very clean maid service was excellent.  Cons- we stayed a few doors away from the office which is close to the
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had such a great say and even more happy to hear you will be returning! We are glad that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful and that you were provided that wonderful service that you so deserve. We really are excited for your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed at Kings Inn for 7 nights, check in was quick and efficient with friendly welcoming staff. Room was quite spacious and clean, well serviced apart from our last day where toilet roll had not been replenished nor was the floor mopped but that is just a minor thing compared to the rest of our stay. Pool is small but not an issue as it was not really well used, hot tub was a welcome treat after a day exploring! Breakfast was a bit manic as the room is small but breakfast plentiful. 2 types of bread, 2 types of cereal, choice of juices, tea, coffee, yoghurts, delicious pastries and freshly cooked waffles all more than enough to set you up for the day. 10 minute walk to Disney but lots of buses if needed. Bubba Gumps next door, just a short walk to a choice of eating places.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had such a marvelous stay and that you plan on returning! We do have a very popular breakfast as you say, We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We are glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. You did describe it quiet well. We also include hot oatmeal as well as fresh fruit. We will be including hard cooked eggs as well in the near future. We are very excited for your next visit with us!

Summary: It's located right next door to Anaheim GardenWalk shops and restaurants, and minutes away from Disneyland! Renovated rooms are nice and kept clean. It was definitely a great stay for the bargain price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the view. We are delighted that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk as well as Downtown Disney.. There  are so many great places to shop as well as dine there. We really look forward to another stay with us.

Summary Heading: Second stay there was just as good as the first
Summary: We have now stayed at King Inn Anaheim two times. First in November 2017, where we liked it (and the price) so much that we booked for spring break 2018. Both times the rooms were clean and quiet. The breakfast room gets busy, but with so many families heading to Disneyland each day, that is the case at all Anaheim hotels I have stayed. The walk to the parks took about 10 to 12 minutes, depending on the lights.  The hotel is conveniently located near tons of great restaurants (that also happen to have great happy hour deals). We emjoyed swimming in the pool, but the hot tub was too cloudy for us to want to get in. We will certainly stay at this property again if the price is right.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always so good to hear from repeat guest's. We are glad to hear you once again had a great stay. We are in the perfect location to visit Disneyland! It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We do have a very popular breakfast  as you say. We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We look forward to another visit in the future!

Summary: Mini bridal shower trip to Disneyland for 7 girls to celebrate our friend who is soon to be married. The property was well taken care of, the rooms looked remodeled and the hardwood flooring was a plus for me. The beds and pillows were SUPER comfortable!! The rooms were very clean and the check-in was smooth. Princess Ekta had all of our registration cards and keys ready when we arrived. You must have waffles in the morning! They are the best !! I will definitely be back with my daughters for our next trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear you had such a great experience staying with us! What a delight it is knowing that we were part of such a great celebration! We do wish your friend the best ! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to know that you were provided such super service and you found our staff to be so efficient!  We do have delicious waffles every morning, as well as so many other great choices to get you started off to a terrific morning. We have upgraded all of our rooms with all new bedding and decor, We are glad that you found this to be so comfortable and cozy.  We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We cant wait! Please tell others about your excellent stay with us, and we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: This hotel is located about a 20 minute walk from Disneyland and is a great price for the location.  The pool is a little small for the size of the hotel, but nice.  The front desk staff was friendly and very accommodating about making sure our rooms were close together (we had family in 2 rooms arriving on different days),  There was some construction, but it didn't affect the visitors except to take up a few parking spots..Nice free breakfast open at 6:00am so you can still get an early start.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found us to be such a great value and you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: I only have one complaint, I wish the floors were mopped every day. Everything else about this place was fabulous, very helpful staff, great location for Disneyland and nice rooms. We could walk to many different types of restaurants and a mall.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad to know you found our location to be so convenient and that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Great walkable location for Disney. Room was spacious with everything you need to rest your head after a long Disney day. Breakfast was as you would imagine, basic with disposable everything, but set you up well for the day. Really liked that you could use the  free parking for the whole day on your checkout day. Would have no qualms about staying again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you had a good stay and you found us to be so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: The Yelp review said 8.2 but I give it a 1!! The receptionist ( India Woman) was very blunt and short , not welcoming at all and rude. As soon as you walk into the room it was a smell of old, no carpet and when anyone walked on the floor barefooted the bottom of their feet were BLACK from being so dirty. The towels smelled clean but when they were extended there were make up stains and other bodily stains , gross!!! It was close to Disneyland , but I would pay extra to stay at a chain instead of these kinds of places again. We couldn't get out of there fast enough and we bought two nights that were not refundable!! Don't there its a rip off!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. After looking into this, we can not find a reservation or a complaint to the front desk regarding this. You were very specific about a review from 3 years ago including the rating from 3 years ago. You were not specific regarding this stay however. We have nothing under this last name. We have no complaints regarding dirty floor, dirty towels or  a rude front desk clerk. We also do not have any information on your stay,and if you left early we do not have any information regarding you checking out or asking for a refund for the 2 prepaid nights.
