It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. In cases like this we are truly disappointed as we were not allowed to follow up or even make it better. With out being informed, we can not follow up. We are really sorry for any bad experience you may have had staying with us. We again wish that we had more information, or that we were informed during your stay to make things better.  We really hope to see you return, and we hope that we are given the opportunity to make it up to you.

Summary: Very convenient location, friendly staff, like the non-carpet rooms. Outside doesn't look like much but room was clean, rooms must have been remodeled at some point and worked fine for us. Walls are thin and could hear TVs playing and there were kids running around upstairs and it was loud for a little while. But we weren't in the room much and was a short walk to the convention center and Disney where we needed to go. Felt safe in that area although there were homeless people sleeping down by the traffic lights. Went to breakfast the first morning at 6:30-6:45 and no crowds, but 2nd day we went at about 8:15 and it was standing room only...so go early! We all loved the waffles! Kids swam and enjoyed pool & hot tub. Thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great say with us and you liked our new improvements to the rooms. We are in the perfect location as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Kings Inn, 20 mins walking distance from Disney and great food options nearby and friendly staff.   Breakfast provided was okay, but it's better than nothing and the waffles were pretty good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are so happy to hear you had such a nice stay. We are also happy that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We really liked our hotel. It was a lot nicer than we hoped for. The service was great and the staff was friendly. We arrived a little early and they still let us in and were able to get the 1st floor as requested. The fridge worked great and the pillows were comfortable. My only complaint... which is why I'm doing the 3 star for now, is because we had roaches in our room. We had them clean our room everyday because of it, but the roaches were pretty bad. We found the first one in our bed and continuously found them all over the hotel room. If it weren't for the roaches, we would have been extremely happy with the choice we made.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that we exceeded your expectations and that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay with us. We do have a great maintenance staff who does practice preventative maintenance. During this time of year they do need to be very diligent about this as it is common in Southern California at this time. I assure you we have followed up on this and rectified the situation. We are really hoping to see you return soon.

Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean, a great size, and the amenities were very nice.  The beds were comfortable, and having a fridge came in handy. The proximity to Disneyland & Garden Walk were absolutely perfect. We will definitely stay here again & recommend it to family & friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff were great. Very pleasant, helpful, and went out of their way to answer questions about the area. Only thing I would suggest is upgrading their coffee, but I'm from coffee NW so usually picky. Hey should advertise the great view of the fireworks at Disneyland from the balcony. That was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are also glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We look forward to another visit with us!

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland, on the ART route, and reasonably priced. This was our second time staying here for a Disneyland vacation. We‚Äôve been generally pleased with our stay. The hotel isn‚Äôt fantastic, but it‚Äôs cheap and a decent place to stay the night. Not particularly quiet. We had an issue with ants in our room one night. They sent someone to spray and then offered to help move us to another room, but it was 10 p.m. and the idea of having to move rooms with our child at that time was daunting. We had two more nights in our stay at that point. It would have been nicer to have gotten a refund for one of our five nights.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you found us to be such  a great value.  We are glad to hear you were pleased with your stay and that we fit into your budget. We do apologize for any inconvenience regarding ants in your room. We do have a great maintenance staff who do have a preventative maintenance plan. We did offer to move you as we wanted you to be comfortable in your room. We do realize that refunding money is an option, however, that would not solve the problem and that is our goal.  Our goal is to exceed our guest's expectation and make sure they have a comfortable and enjoyable stay with us. We do hope that you decide to come back and visit soon!

Summary Heading: very good room, not so quiet
Summary: Walls are paper thin and we must have gotten the girls gone wild bunch next door!  I could literally hear every word they were saying until 11:30 at night and starting at 6:30AM!  Accomodations were fine, beds were a little hard and squeaky.  Coffee maker not working but was promptly replaced, the Breakfast room is WAY too small for the number of people attending - could never even get into the room to get food
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you found the room was comfortable. and that our staff was able to assist with the coffee maker. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast as you say. We do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as at the pool area. We do apologize for the noise you experienced from your neighbors. We do have a 24 hour front desk  as well as security, please do not hesitate to call us from your room anytime so we can address the issue. It is our goal to exceed all of our guest's expectations and make sure everyone has a great stay. We do look forward to another visit!

Summary: This place was really clean and nice people super friendly and helpful. 5 star service and highly recommend staying here.  It‚Äôs a few blocks from the  Disney theme park walking distance saving you parking at Disney.  Plus they offer a free continental breakfast in the morning lots to choose from
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. it is sure good to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are the perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. So convenient! We hope to see you return soon!

Summary: Room was clean and roomy. Beds were comfortable and had good sleeps.  Enjoyed the pool.  Staff was great.   The breakfast area was congested and selection was limited to cereal, toast and waffles.   About a 10 walk to the security check-in at Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you had such a comfortable say with us and you found the location to be so convenient. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast as you say including fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, freshly baked waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal, hot oatmeal, sweet rolls as well as 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea, and coffee. We have additional seating on our sundeck and at our pool area. Both are pleasant places to enjoy a relaxing breakfast. We are really looking forward to another visit soon!

Summary: Great price for a very clean room!!!  Great location to walk to Disneyland and California Adventure.  Nice little pool and hot tub, clean and simple breakfast.  Free parking and easy walking to dining options and across the street from a CVS pharmacy for drinks and snacks to take to parks.  Couldn't have beat the price for this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget and you had such a satisfying stay. We are so excited for your next visit! Please tell others about your great experience.

Summary: The property was clean, front desk was pleasant.  The breakfast was okay, but in tight quarters, which made it difficult to maneuver if very many people were trying to get food at the same time.  If going to Disneyland, I would try to find something closer.  This property is over a mile from the park entrance and not cheap, unless you get a deal through a booking agency.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. Thank you for the compliments to our front desk. We are delighted that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do have a very popular complimentary breakfast as you say. We do have additional seating on our sun deck as well as at the pool area. We are a block and a half from the front entrance of Disneyland. It does take about 15 minutes to walk to the front entrance. For those who do not wish to walk, the ART shuttle picks up right out front and comes every 20 minutes. The ART shuttle is ran by the City of Anaheim and is really a great way to get around as they also go to many other locations for a very small fare. We do hope that you decide to visit us again, next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here for five nights on a trip to Disneyland.  It was about a 20 minute walk to the entrance, which we thought was not to bad.  There is a Walgreens and CVS close if you need anything.  Thought the room was clean, the bathroom area (shower and toliet area) could use updating, but the rest of the room was very nice.  Plenty of storage space.  Front desk staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you had a great stay. We are just a block and a half from the park entrance making it so convenient. It takes just about 15 minutes to get to the front entrance. We want to let you know we are updated our whole property, with improvements and upgrades all over, including the bathroom area. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: There were  good place for us various aspect such as the price, accessibility from Disney Land and service. The breakfast was normal but waffles made directly were really special. I'll choose it again if I would go to the Disney Land next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found we were so affordable. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast. You are right, the freshly baked waffles are wonderful! we are excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: The room was clean, comfortable and recently rennovated. This was a budget friendly hotel that was within walking distance to Disneyland. We liked having the salt water pool and hot tub to go play in as well. Having the free parking and free breakfast added in makes it a great option and value for a hotel in that area. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear that you found us to be such a great value and we fit into your budget. We are very excited for your return!

Summary: We stayed at Kings Inn while visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is walking distance to the park and was located near lots of shops and restaurants. The hotel is an older property, but the room was updated, comfotable and clean. We would stay at Kings Inn again.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so good to hear that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you found our location to be so convenient! We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: the front desk was very accommodating to us, we were early but soon after we got back from lunch, we were able to check in to the room we requested.  The breakfast is really good, cereals, hot and cold, waffles, sweet rolls, coffee and juices, everything you need for a continental breakfast.  They do have microwaves available and there are fridges in the rooms.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review.We are so happy that you found our front desk so helpful and friendly. We do have microwaves available upon request to put in your room, as well as microwaves available in our common areas. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The online description says the room has microwave if you request it, which it didn‚Äôt. And we didn‚Äôt receive clean towels or room service until we had to call and request it. Our towels were very clearly on the floor and dirty and they were just rehung on the racks...which is disgusting. So we put a ‚Äúservice immediately‚Äù sign on the door and they never came back to fix it. The room itself was decent but the service could‚Äôve been way better.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We do offer microwaves in your room if you request it for  a small fee. You do need to let us know if you would prefer a microwave in your room and we will gladly put one in for you. We do have microwaves in our common areas for use at no charge. We do service all of our rooms, including stayovers unless there is a do not disturb sign on the door, which it does sound like this was the case. Our housekeepers would not hang dirty towels that were on the floor. This is not something we practice. I assure you we are following up with our housekeeping manager regarding this as well as the issue regarding service immediately.  We do hope that you decide to return on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent location near the Anaheim Convention center, we were allowed to park onsite and walk to WonderCon without hassles.  Staff was knowledgeable and organized and pleasant, unlike a lot of places.  Room was reasonable and had all the necessities.  Not luxury but we weren't asking for that.  Breakfast too carby and sweet, but at least my husband got a jelly sandwich out of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear you found staying with us to be such a great value. We are going to be adding hard cooked eggs to our menu soon. We so have fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hot oatmeal, two kinds of cold cereal with milk, freshly baked waffles with syrup, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The hotel was good for the price. The check-in staff wasn't exactly friendly, but the housekeeping staff and maintenance staff seemed to be quite helpful. The bed was the standard budget hotel bed; new and clean, but very firm. If we were in better health, we probably would have had no problem. We are also used to our memory foam bed. After traveling quite a bit this year, I am convinced that I would have paid $20 more a night for a hotel a little closer, but it would have had the same bed. This is an assumption on my part, but every budget hotel we've been in this year had the same mattress. The Excalibur in Vegas had the same firm mattress. The room was clean and rather large. The bathroom was pretty tight, but it was newly redone and had a great tub. I felt like the room was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so wonderful to hear that you found us to be such a great value and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are sorry to hear you did not like our new beds. All of our rooms have new beds in them, and everyone finds them quite comfortable. Perhaps your's might have had some kind of defect. As they are brand new, perhaps if you have  a chance give us a call so we can follow up on which room you were in. We are delighted that you found our complimentary amenities such as the free parking, free wifi, as well as our complimentary breakfast to add so much value to your stay. We really do hope to see you return soon!

Summary: This is a cute and clean inn to stay. Just walking distance to Disneyland. Staff are nice.And we really appreciate that we cal leave our luggage at their storage room when we checked out because our flight is still 5 hours away. Clean rooms, no bedbugs thank God! We recommend this Inn. Thank you for the daily free breakfast. And we love the location also very near anaheim garden!Love it! Thank you King's Inn. We miss you guys already!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so excited that you had such a wonderful stay and we really are glad that you feel so comfortable here. We are looking forward to another visit!

Summary Heading: Nice clean rooms, good wifi, free parking, comfy beds, walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We booked 3 rooms for a Disneyland visit with out of town guests.  They accommodated us with 3 adjoining room.  They let us check in early to one of the rooms and we all put our bags there and put our food in the refrigerator.  We walked to Disneyland, a short, easy, and nice walk, maybe 15-20 minutes.  The front desk staff was friendly and helpful.  The rooms were very clean.  The wifi internet was great, and parking is free.  The beds are comfortable, and they give you lots of pillows to choose from. The shower had good hot water and water pressure.  We didn't go to the free breakfast because there is an IHOP a 5-10  minute walk away, and the IHOP also has free parking.  This motel is a bit pricey for what it is, but it's very nice and clean and there are no junk charges for
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful that you found our location to be so convenient and that you were so comfortable in your room. We Are really looking forward do seeing you return soon.

Summary: Overall this was a great hotel to stay at! Remodel rooms with two comfy queen beds & my final decision to stay was free parking. It‚Äôs only a 10/15 minute to the park or ART has a stop just next door to the hotel which very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear you had such a great stay  with us and you found our location to be so convenient. We look forward to your next visit, please tell others about your great experience staying with us.

Summary: Just a 15 minute (or so) walk from the main entrance at Disneyland, although we took the city bus which picked us up and took about 5 minutes to get there.  Hotel rooms were nice, beds were comfortable, continental breakfast was pastries, cereal, mini waffles, and toast, along with juice and coffee.  Pretty good spread, would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome that you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are delighted that you will be returning, please tell others about your great visit with us!

Summary: Great service from the front lobby staff and room service. The rooms were great in size. We added a roll away bed and still had plenty of room. Walking distance from convention center and to Disneyland was convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to know that you found our location to be so convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are happy to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. Please tell others about your great experience and we look forward to your return.

Summary: The staff take care of this property as if it were a five star hotel.  Room fresh and clean, and the grounds spotless.  The people are wonderful, and I loved my stay.  When I stay again, it will be my third time and not my last.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We always love to hear from repeat guest's! We are really looking forward to seeing you return again!

Summary: Easy check-in even though we were 45 minutes early. Very clean room and bathroom. Lots of hangers in the wardrobe. Bed is squeaky when climbing on it, but very comfortable to someone with a back problem like me. Lots of pillows on each bed so I was able to sleep with my legs elevated after a very tiring day. Towels were clean with no stains. Extra towels provided in the cabinet under the vanity.  Breakfast room opened promptly at 6:00 AM. Choice of breakfast cereal, instant oatmeal, fresh fruit, yogurt, white or wheat sliced bread, pastry, brewed coffee, hot water for tea and hot cocoa. The best part was the homemade waffles!  There were four belgian waffle makers and a staff member made it for you right there in the dining room. There were also four microwave ovens and five
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay! Please tell others about your great experience and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Went for Disneyland. Was about a 10 minute walk to the gate. Room was nice. Breakfast could have had some basic hot food like bacon, sausage, eggs, biscuits, and gravy. The best part of it was their 6 waffle stations and an employee making them constantly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great that you found us to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. It is true, we are a quick walk to the front entrance. We do have a complimentary breakfast which includes fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam and spread, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, freshly baked waffles with syrup and sweet rolls. We also have 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, and hot tea. We are sorry that this did not meet your breakfast needs. We do hope to see you return next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: great location, clean , spacious, and comfortable rooms. the swimming pool was very good, hot tub was wonderful, i would bring my family here for a vacation anytime of the year. the service was great.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful that you found our location so convenient and you had such a marvelous stay with us. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It is really good to know that they provided you with the excellent service you deserve. we are so excited for your next visit! Please tell others about your great experience staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel close to Disneyland.
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights on a recent visit to Disneyland with my family.  From the moment we checked in, we felt very welcome by the reception staff.  I had booked 2 rooms.  These were both connected.  The rooms were comfortable and with plenty of space.  Both had  fridges and generous work stations. The location and price attracted me to this hotel. Only a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. I read many family reviews that were all favourable.  This is a little gem.  The staff were always helpful with my questions.  I was able to park at the hotel for the day upon check out whilst spending time at Disneyland until late in the day.  The hotel is close to restaurants next door.  IHOP, Denny's and Walgreens not too far away.  There is a heated pool and hot tub.  Additionally the free
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are also happy that you had such a great stay and that you plan on returning! Please let others know about your great experience and we are excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Our new go to hotel when visiting the Disney Parks
Summary: Helpful staff. Clean and good sized rooms. Great location close to Disneyland Resort Parks and Garden Walk. A Disney ‚ÄúGood Neighbor‚Äù hotel. Definitely a great deal!  We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear you found us to be such a great value and that you enjoyed your stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We look forward to it. Please others know about your great experience and we cant wait for your next visit!

Summary: I‚Äôm normally skeptical of small motels, but this place is different. Sure it‚Äôs a modest and simple accommodation, but SUPER CLEAN, updated and very comfortable. The staff is lovely and helpful, and they even gave me breakfast to get me on my way. For anyone spending the day st Disney or the convention center. This place is right in the middle of all of it, easy parking, easy walk to dinner.! I would stay here again without hesitation!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome that you found our location to be so convenient and that you found us to be such a great value. We are so happy to hear you will be back!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with a great price!
Summary: This hotel was great and hit everything that we needed! The breakfast was great whether you were on the run or if you wanted to sit down. The rooms were very nice...Really liked the hardwood floors. It had a fridge and basically all the necessities that you‚Äôll need. The staff was very friendly from the moment you checked in to when you checked out. Housekeeping did a great job cleaning the rooms and always greeted you as you walked by. The location was great! Only a 10 minute or so walk to Disneyland which was perfect. Close to convenient stores as well as restaurants. Also parking was free which was a huge perk. I highly recommend this hotel as it‚Äôs probably the best for your dollar. It‚Äôs also a Disney choice hotel and your able to buy park tickets at the front desk. The pool
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you had such a great stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We always have a great experience here. Check-in/check-out is quick, staff is friendly, and the rooms are clean. It‚Äôs close to a lot of restaurants, and to Disneyland. This is our new go-to hotel when we go to Anaheim. They also offer free breakfast!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful that you found we fit so well into your budget and you had such a great stay. We hope to see you return soon!

Summary: Great location to restaurants and shopping. 15 minutes walk to Disneyland and all the parks. Breakfast is great. They offer waffles, cereal and fruit etc. front desk is friendly and the rooms are very clean and comfortable. I will stay here every time I make the trip.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for recommending us! We are glad to hear you had such a great stay and that you plan on returning!

Summary: Beds comfortable and lots of room. Rooms were clean and free breakfast was great, especially the fresh made waffles. We were here a week and walked to Disneyland everyday. Pizza press restaurant is close by and great pizza for cheap. Lots of restaurants and gift stores close by. Target was easy enough to get to by bus and we bought some of our souvenirs there for cheap. Beautiful pool and hot tub that we enjoyed every night. Friendly staff
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you had a great stay and that you will be returning! We are glad that you found our staff so friendly and you found our location so convenient.

Summary: Great location, wonderful staff. We requested to be away from the parking garage across the way and they honored that request. You could still hear car alarms go off, but not real loud. Only down side was no microwave in the room and the beds were really uncomfortable. Room was clean and I liked the wood floor, felt much cleaner then old carpet.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are glad to hear they were so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced regarding the Anaheim Garden Walk parking garage. We assure you we are following up on this with them. We are so excited for your next visit with us!

Summary: This was our first stay at Kings Inn. We loved it. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable. The free breakfast was fantastic and saved us a ton of money. Location can't be beat- close to parks and great restaurants. While the hotel is a little dated our rooms were fine, clean and tidy. Will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thanks  for the review. We are so excited to hear you found us to be such a great value. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. it is so wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are really looking forward to your return!

Summary: We wanted to love this hotel from the moment we arrived to the last day. However, there are a couple of issues here you wont find at other budget hotels in the area. First, our room was located in the wing near the parking garage for the Garden Walk shopping area where people are constantly trying to find there cars with the "panic" button. All hours of the night we heard loud car horns, every night. The breakfast was ok, just ok. The staff is friendly and the pool has an 8' deep end. If we stay here again we will hope for a room on the other end of the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are really glad to hear that we fit so well into your budget. We are also glad to hear we exceeded your expectations. This is our goal with each and every guest. We are sorry to hear you found the Anaheim Garden walk to be so noisy. We have already opened a case with them and assure you we are taking care of this issue. We do wan to thank you for the compliments to our staff. it is so wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Close hotel to Disney with great amenities
Summary: Great budget friendly, family hotel. Room was clean and nicely remodeled. The in-room fridge is perfect for snacks and the laundry room had a microwave. I will warn families that there is not a tub, just a shower but this wasn‚Äôt a big deal. Bathrooms were clean. Linens were a bit sparse (I find this at most hotels so this is a personal opinion) but we brought our own blankets and pillows so it was cozy. Staff was friendly and accommodating. This is a 10 minute walk from Disneyland and the hotel allowed us to stay parked through the day we checked out so even though we checked out at 11 am we kept our car parked there for our last day at Disney. Located within a mile of a Target for snack or grocery shopping and next door to several places to eat. I would stay here again in a
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear you had a great visit and even more excited to hear you will be returning. We do hope you tell others of your great visit and that you return soon.

Summary Heading: We love this Kings Inn In Anaheim
Summary: Breakfast is excellent, a lot of choices, waffles is very good. Location is good, close to restaurant and Disneyland. Room is clean and quiet, staff are friendly. House keeping did a very nice job. We all appreciate the stay
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be the perfect place to say and you found our location to be so convenient. It is wonderful to know that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit with us! Please tell others about your great stay. See you back soon!

Summary: Spent 5 days here during our trip to Disneyland.  It's about a 15 minute walk from Disneyland park gates, and a huge value for the price.  Rooms were a good size, clean, hot water, good AC.  The new hardwood floors made them feel even cleaner.  Wifi worked well.  Bed was comfortable and we slept well.  Service was great and employees were really kind and efficient.  Breakfast as included - it was adequate though nothing exceptional.  Felt like we got a great deal for our money - especially given that most of our day was in the parks.  Great place to rest your head, and save those travel dollars for some dole whip and Mickey ears.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to  our staff. We are so happy that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are also so excited to hear you found us to be such a great value! We really look forward to seeing your return, please tell others about your great stay.

Summary: Everyone was wonderful at Kings Inn. The room was a decent size. The breakfast foods were what I expected.  The bed was soooo comfy!  Very accommodating, friendly and professional staff.  Thank you, Kings Inn staff!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, we are so happy to hear you had such a wonderful experience. Please tell others about your great stay and we really look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We spent five nights here (Feb 23-27) for a trip to Disney.  The hotel is an easy walk to the park, under 15 minutes. The rooms have been redone recently so it feels fresher than you'd expect for a budget hotel.  The beds were very comfortable! The breakfast was sufficient and easy.   We had one little hiccup at check out, they failed to mention that they charged the entire room at check-in. So when I wanted to change my payment method at check out I was unable to do that.  This was not mentioned at check in. I even asked the person checking us in if I could change the card the room had been booked with and they said yes. I'm not sure what the real policy is but it was confusing. Not a huge problem, but still something that should be addressed.   Otherwise a good place for base
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient and that we fit so well into your budget. We are also glad to hear that you were so comfortable in our newly upgraded rooms.We do have new beds as well in all of our rooms. Glad to hear you found the bed to be so comfortable. We are sorry to hear about the misunderstanding regarding payment for your room. I assure you we will follow up on this and address it accordingly. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Great place for a very reasonable price!
Summary: This is a great little hotel that I think is flying under the radar.  Completely updated with hardwood floors, comply  beds and great customer care! Perfectly located with short walks to Disneyland, The Garden Walk, fine dinning, Anaheim Convention Center, drug stores and more! Staff is excellent in meeting all your needs. Check in and check out was easy and the property has great and very close parking to rooms! Nicely kept grounds and swimming pool and hot tub. Did my laundry there twice and for $4... if you need soap & fabric softener they have that in the laundry room as well for a couple bucks each! There are only two draw backs.. 2nd floor in stairs only and breakfast very minimal... but both are doable!! We stayed 5 days and loved it and were treated like royalty the
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our second stay in less than 6 months.  Kings Inn is now our home base for Disneyland trips (2-3 times a year)  Travelling from Canada as often as we do, we're always looking for ways to stretch our budget, and The Kings Inn definitely helps us with that.  Free Parking, Free Wifi, Free Breakfast - you can't go wrong here. Some of the negative reviews make me chuckle - clearly, this is not the Disneyland Grand Californian Resort - this is a budget motel.  Do not expect to have a mint on your pillow during your turn down service.  The rooms are spacious, clean, renovated - we love the new floors, the mini-fridge is a perfect size, the pool and hot tub are nice and easy, and we appreciate the large laundry room for our longer stays.  Being a Disney Fan, a 10 min walk to the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Especially for the price. Just a short walk to Disneyland.
Summary: The continental breakfast was really good the room was very clean and neat. Great place to stay. I would stay again.  Short walk to Disneyland. All the staff was very nice and courteous.. My family really enjoyed their stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are also glad that you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are glad you had a great stay, please tell others about your experience and we look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed here for a recent trip to Disneyland, and it was certainly convenient and affordable. The key card failed frequently and it was a drag going back and forth to the office after a long day, trying card after card. Breakfast was nothing special, but free. Worst danish of my life, toasters barely warmed the bread,  but the kids liked the waffles and I liked not entering the Park with starving children and a need to drop $50 on breakfast right off the bat. Rooms were clean, but poorly ventilated. Condensation on the walls of the sleeping area when anyone took a shower. But fine for the price. I‚Äôd look elsewhere next time, but if I ended up here because of price, I‚Äôd be ok with it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you found our locations so convenient. It is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are also glad to hear we fit into your budget. Our amenities such as our complimentary breakfast does add so much value to your stay. We do offer fresh fruit, yogurt, freshly baked waffles with syrup, toast with jam and spread, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, hot cocoa, 2 kinds of juice, hot coffee as well as tea. We are sorry to hear his did not meet up to your expectations as it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We are sorry to hear about your experience regarding your key not working. They do have a magnetic strip, which sometimes can stop working if placed by a cell phone. We do apologize for any inconvenience. We do have a new AC unit in all of our rooms, this does have a fan only feature which does a great job ventilating the room. We are glad to hear our housekeeping staff did a good job. We do hope to see you return again next time you are in Anaheim

Summary Heading: Affordable and comfy but some big issues
Summary: The good: - very nice staff, super helpful and friendly - they had a hot tub which is always awesome to have - laundry room (pricey but still useful) - minutes from disney entrance   The bad: - no microwave in the rooms - had some wiring problems with both our bedside table lights and the air system  - very thin walls so the sounds of someone having a shower above you is LOUD - the windows don't open  The ugly: - cockroaches in the room (small ones) and it took a lot of going back to the front desk before anyone came and sprayed the room for us  - the housekeeping did not make our bed because there was a pack of gum and a water bottle on our bed (they are not allowed to touch guests' belongings which I understand, but we were not told this was a policy and it was a stretch to
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so nice to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you liked our amenities such as the guest laundry , it is $ 2.00 to Wash and $2.00 to dry. We are glad that you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub as well. We do not have microwaves in the room as a standard feature. So that we can offer our guest's a better value, we do have them available free of charge to use in our common areas. They are available to use through out the day into the later part of the evening, as well as in the breakfast room during breakfast hours. For a small fee we will place one in your room as an upgrade. We are not sure what you mean by wiring problems? Did the lights not work or was the AC unit not functioning? We do have have any info on this recorded during your stay with us. All of our rooms have new outlets, and all rooms have been inspected for safety purposes. For safety reasons we do not have windows that open, as per most hotel establishments. We do have a new AC unit in all of our rooms which has a fan only option. This works very well with providing fresh air into the room. We do apologize if  you found we took too long to address the issue of insects in your room. We will follow up on this, as we want all of our guest to be comfortable and address things that come up right away. To respect our guest's privacy, we do instruct our housekeepers to not touch belongings left on the bed or anywhere else in the room.  Regardless of what it is, we consider it our guest's private property, and we respectfully leave it alone. If there is anything to be collected and thrown out, it would be in the garbage can. We do apologize if our housekeeping staff left anything behind. We will certainly follow up on this as well. We are glad to hear that you were so comfortable in your room and that you found the room to be clean. We do thank you for staying with us. Thank you for telling others about us, and we do hope to see you return soon.

Summary: We stayed here for a week from Feb 11-18th, and we were so pleasantly impressed! The rooms have been recently renovated,  and they're great- I LOVE the laminate flooring- the germophobe in me really appreciated not having to walk on nasty hotel carpet. The front desk staff were phenomenal- check in and check out were super fast, they gave honest reviews of the restaurants nearby, and were super quick to answer our questions.  The housekeeping staff were awesome, and our room was never anything less than spotless when we cam back from Disneyland, which was all of a 10 minute walk away. Our only (tiny) complaint was that the breakfast room was super small, so it got crowded quickly, but really- that was a minor issue. We will absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had such a great visit and we exceeded your expectations. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations, we are glad to hear that this was the case. We are expanding our breakfast room in the future, however in the meantime, we do have additional seating on our sundeck as well as in the pool area. We are looking forward your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a cheap stay at Disneyland
Summary: Stayed at the King‚Äôs Inn Feb 11-14 for a quick trip to Disneyland. The location is great if you don‚Äôt mind a quick (12-15 minute) walk to the main gates of the park. Beds are comfortable, rooms are clean. WiFi works great. I do wish the hot tub was open later than 10pm, and my only major complaint is that it can be quite loud with people outside your room, but I suppose that‚Äôs unavoidable in a motel this style. The water also had sort of a funky rotten egg smell that I noticed every time I washed my hands. But - if you‚Äôre booking this hotel simply for a place to sleep during a trip to Disneyland, it‚Äôs more than adequate. Cannot complain with a price this fantastic. Oh - and we also wished that there were nightstands on either side of the bed with wall outlets (only one side of
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear we fit into your budget and you had a good stay. It is also great to hear you found our free amenities added to your value of your stay. We do appreciate your feedback on the location of the outlets in the room. We have added additional outlets in various places around the room. We are sorry to hear if you found the locations not very convenient for your personal use. We really  are the perfect location as you say to the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. The ART shuttle also picks up right out front for those who do not wish to walk. We are really looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Had stayed here before when it was a Super 8 - rooms have been updated and are nice, but not luxurious.  If you stay 3 or more nights and book unrefundable there is often a slightly better rate (at least in the off season).  No elevators so if you need handicap access be sure to ask for a first floor room.  The reception staff are very friendly and knowledgeable and the free breakfast is good too.  The hotel is so conveniently located on Katella Avenue right on a bus route that goes directly to Disneyland about a mile away.  The Garden Walk next door has many well known restaurants - California Pizza, Bubba Gumps, PF Chang.  There is also a company at the Garden Walk that sells bus passes and sells tickets for other attractions in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during  your stay with us. We are also glad to hear you found us to be so affordable and our location to be so convenient. We are really excited for your next visit with us!

Summary: Location and affordability with free parking and a pool (that‚Äôs heated) and a cute breakfast can‚Äôt be beat for Disneyland!  Staff was not overly friendly, but were helpful. Maybe they don‚Äôt crack smiles much? Each to his own, I‚Äôm from Texas and a huge smile is always on every ear üòÉ  Note‚Äîtheir shuttle is a wait and $5 an adult and $2 for kids. We ubered for all three of us for $5.65, with a $3 tip I gave. Didn‚Äôt wait more than 3 Mins once I ordered it.  When getting picked up from Disneyland walk to the McDonald‚Äôs across the street or the IHOP. Your return trip home will be faster so they don‚Äôt have to wait in the line getting out. Also‚Äîcomfortable shoes! We walked 11 miles in one day and were exhausted!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you had  a great stay and that you found our location to be so convenient. It is also great to hear we fit so well into your budget and that you found our complimentary amenities added so much value to your stay. We are glad to hear our staff was so helpful. We are sorry to hear if you did not find them to be as friendly as they should have been. I assure you we will follow up on this. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations in each and every way. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: nope, not the newest or fanciest hotel in the area but its priced right, importantly its clean, refurbished and spacious rooms, close to everything, has free breakfast, wifi and parking, staff are friendly. onsite laundry. your going to be comfortable and spend the money you save on entertainment. its not my 1st stay here nor is it the last
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad to hear you had such a great stay and that you found us to be such a great value. It is also great to hear our staff was so helpful and friendly during your stay. We really look foward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Great Value on Trip to Disneyland
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised.  Kings Inn was a great place to stay.  Rooms were clean.  Beds were good.  Bathroom was smaller, but updated and clean.  Large vanity with good shelf space outside of bathroom.  Kings Inn had by far the best rates of hotels we looked at in planning our stay.  There is free WiFi, Free Parking.  It is within walking distance of Disneyland.  Continental Breakfast had smaller choices than some places, but was adequate.  You can see my overall rating above.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. We are so glad to hear you found us to be such a great value and our location to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We do truly look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Front desk staff were helpful, friendly and pleasant.  We arrived early and were able to get into our room before the regular check-in time.  The room was clean, bed was very comfortable and the breakfast exceeded our expectations.  The price was lower than other accommodations in the area and the parking, breakfast and Wi-Fi were included in the price.  I plan to stay at Kings Inn- Anaheim when I return for another visit to Disneyland.  Thank you, Kings Inn staff, for making our stay so pleasant!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do look forward to seeing you back in the future.

Summary: The Kings Inn is within easy walking distance to the Disney complex, and there is also a shuttle stop right outside. Staff were very friendly and helpful and we noticed security guards patrolling at night time, so if safety is of concern, this is the place for you. Our room was very spacious, clean and comfortable. There are no elevators, and we were on the second level. It was a bit of a pain to lug our suitcases up a flight of stairs after a long flight and then a day of road travel, but nothing more than a minor inconvenience, really. If we ever go back to Anaheim, we will stay at Kings Inn for sure
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true, we are just a short 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are glad you found us to be a great value as well. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Great for the Value and Location
Summary: I chose Kings Inn for the price, Free WiFi, Free parking, and location.   I used Ebates Hotel on Black Friday and got Kings Inn for $147 for 2 nights all inclusive.  Great customer service from the front desk.  I didn't get maid service staying only 2 nights but they left me a note saying that they tried, which is great customer service.  Great amenities: Free WiFi, Free parking, Free breakfast from 6-9am but never got up early enough.   The location is about 1 mile to Disneyland's entrance.  When walking out of hotel facing the street, take a right and walk to the corner, take a right go passed Castle Inn, at next light at the Anaheim Inn/Pizza press restaurant, cross the street across and then straight on the Disneyland side of street, and then walk pass Disneyland's
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad that you had such a great visit and that you would recommend us to others. We do have bathtubs in some of our rooms, just request that when making the reservation. We are glad that you found our location to be so convenient as well. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Booked the King's Inn on short notice for the NAMM show.  Easy walking distance to the Convention Center, free breakfast and free wifi.   Rooms are average however what is not at all average is the honesty and level of customer service.  I accidentally left four shirts, a vest and a very expensive Italian Leather jacket hanging in the closet when I departed.  After a full-day of travel, I realized what had occurred when I unpacked my luggage.   Phone the Hotel and they offered to mail me the clothing.   It arrived within two days and everything I had left, including my own hangars, was in the package.  That is wonderful service and a very honest staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so glad to hear you found we exceeded your expectations. We are glad to hear that our staff provided you with that excellent service that you so deserve. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Our first time back since it became Kings Inn- Love It
Summary: Really loved this hotel before the ownership change and love it even more now, terrific location, great staff, they had put a lot of money into the rooms and the fantastic pool is still there (just not a January activity) - we will be back.  We did not make use of the included breakfast but it is a nice selection.  The only downside, and its minor, is that people coming in are very noisy getting out of their cars- nothing the hotel can do and its the same everywhere.  Still a favorite, an easy walk to Disney and they let us keep the car in the lot which saved us the parking fees.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We always love to hear from repeat guest's. It is so great to hear that you like the improvements we have made. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations, we are so glad that we succeeded! we are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Ekta at the front desk was great; helpful, sweet, and informative. Our request to have a room away from the pool sounds and high foot traffic areas was accommodated without any trouble and with a smile.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy to hear that you were provided that excellent service that you so deserve. We are glad to know that you found our location to be so convenient and we are really looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Stayed here at the last minute with hubby when we decided to go to Disneyland on the spur of he moment before heading back to Australia. Excellent location to parks and walking distance - 10 minutes max. Room is large and clean and all you need to explore the parks it is also on a great location re places to eat and shop. Safe to walk around. Off street parking a bonus. Breakfast included and good section but hard to get in due to large amount of people. We gave up and ate elsewhere. Staff great and very helpful re things to do and places to go also helped us out re tickets to Disneyland. Overall a great place to stay highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to know that they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve. We are so thankful that you will be recommending us and we do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: great location right next to restaurants, across the street from walgreens and at the end of the block plenty of kid eateries (pizza, burgers, subway) also very close to Disneyland. rooms are spacious with comfortable beds and tons of plugs so no arguing as to who's turn is it to charge up. no dingy carpet actual wooden tiles.they offer a continental breakfast that has toasts, waffles, milk, cereal and assorted pastries. there is also a pool and Jacuzzi although I did not use ( it is cold in January) plenty of free parking available. highly recommend to all.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to know that you found our location to be so convenient and you had such a great stay. We are so close to the Disneyland park, just a quick 15 minute walk making it so convenient. We are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk as well, where there are several great places to shop as well as dine. We are so excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Great location to Disney and restaurants
Summary: We stayed at the Kings Inn Anaheim for a couple of nights to do both Disney parks. It is perfectly situated, about a ten minute walk from the parks and Downtown Disney. There are also plenty of cheap food options nearby. The rooms are large and comfortable, whilst the staff were very helpful and friendly. I wouldn‚Äôt suggest relying on the wifi though, as we struggled with it for our stay and couldn‚Äôt connect at all on some devices. Other than that, it‚Äôs a good option.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are so glad to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so sorry to hear you had issues with our Wifi. we assure you we have followed up on this and fixed any issues that  may have come up. We hope to see you back soon

Summary: I used hotels.com to get a sub-$100 room rate.  the pool area is very compact, but more than adequate.  pools were clean and working well.  Hotel staff for nice and helpful with local area queries.  parking in front of room was convenient.  room was clean with good but not luxury linens and towels in good condition.  good channel selections on TV.  exellent location for disney and freeway access.  lots of nearby restaurants including several 24 hour places, and Cheesecake factory almost next door.  I highly recommend this hotel.  it is safe and the provided breakfast is OK given this is not a 4 0r 5 star property.  Cleanliness goes a long way.  Hotel manager, Peter, does a good job of managing the property.  their other property in San Diego is also good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to know that we fit so well into your budget and you found us to be so conveniently located. We do have a complimentary continental breakfast as you say. It is great to know you found this fit your breakfast needs and you enjoyed it. We thank you for the compliments to our General Manager, we sincerely appreciate your comments and do look forward to another visit from you!

Summary: Stayed at Kings for one night. The room was clean and updated. The staff was friendly especially Joe at the he front desk! Free parking, free breakfast, and in an amazing location. Kings is close to Disneyland and with in walking distance of tons of restaurants shops and the convention center. I would come back!  One piece of advice... Bring a chromecast... No one demand movies available.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay! Thanks for the compliment to our staff. It is so great to know you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Very convenient to get to Disneyland from this place. It is not a long walk at all. Had no issues with the room we stayed in, it was clean and very spacious. Free breakfast was included every morning which was great. Although not too much variety in the breakfast, you can't complain because it's free and at least they served hot waffles! There isn't much space in the dining area for breakfast though, so it was a bit cramped to have breakfast/had to wait for a seat. It was also convenient to catch the bus to and from the Anaheim Amtrak station. Overall, a very pleasant stay for the awesome price.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted that you found us the perfect place to stay and you had such a great time. It is wonderful that we fit so well into your budget as well.  We are so looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This motel was exceptional, better than most hotel chains that we have stayed with. Value for this property was outstanding. I am not sure I have ever stayed anywhere so clean and well organized. Room was spacious, clean and well appointed. Staff were very friendly and working hard every minute to ensure property remained clean. Pool was larger than I had first thought as was the hot tub. Breakfast was basic but good for our morning start. Breakfast room was larger than I had expected with lots of tables to sit at and eat. Great shopping, coffee shops and restuarants all within minutes walk of the property. Transportation was extreamly easy to access. The front desk can assist to arrage this for you. Disneyland entrance was a short 10 minute walk away. This is where we would
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a wonderful stay during your last visit to the Disneyland park. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park, as it is just right around the corner. We are right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk as well, where there are several great places to shop as well as dine. We want to thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is so great that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your visit. We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We do look forward to it!

Summary Heading: Fantastic room at a fantastic price!
Summary: I've stayed here before and had a pleasant stay! I have no problem with the room, staff or FREE breakfast... My problem is that I've stayed here 3 times before (once while it was under another name) and each time my key wouldn't work! EVERY single time! I have to put my stuff back in the car, walk down to the lobby and tell them my key doesn't work. They "redo" the key AND have maintenance come and see if I'm using the "new" key properly!  Its getting frustrating! This better not happen when (and if) I stay here in April...
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are always delighted to hear from repeat guests and we are so happy that you are returning! We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced with the key not working.  The keys do have a magnetic strip on them, and if placed next to a cell phone or in a wallet made of a certain kind of leather it can demagnetize them. We do have a paper "sleeve" that will help protect the key card. Next time inquire about this, and hopefully it will help. We are so looking forward to your visit with us in April!

Summary: When it was Super 8 we stayed there often. Now they are hard to find at Hotels. Com.  They have also taken out the shower/Tub combos and we enjoy a hot bath to soak in. Plus the room was less comfortable than before with the ‚Äúupgraded ‚Äú furniture.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are always glad to hear from repeat guests and are sorry to hear you had some issues booking with us. We do have a great staff here 24 hours a day if you wish to book directly just give us a call. 714-778-6900. We do still have some rooms with bathtubs. Please give us a call so we can make sure you are assigned to a room with a tub. We are sorry to hear you were not comfortable in your room. We have replaced the closet area and put in new mattress as well as improved the lighting and the sink and bathroom areas with new tile and counter tops.  We are hoping to see you return soon.  Please give us a call directly so we can better assist with the location of your room.

Summary: I had a reservation for this hotel but was unable to make it due to being snowed in on the east coast. They were more than happy to allow me to delay my arrival, which their policy says they will not do. However when I tried to cancel my reservation after several days of continually being delayed, I was not allowed to do so. Now, on top of being charged $500.00 for a room I never got to see, I also have two separate $25.00 charges and have no idea why. Two managers later, I'm disputing the charge.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so sorry that you were unable to make it due to bad weather. Unfortunately you did book a non refundable reservation. These reservations are really a great deal, and require prepaying and they are non refundable and non changeable. We were offering for you to change the dates however for future travel. This again was not according to the booking policy, however because of the unfortunate circumstance of the bad weather, in which you could not control, we did make an exception for you. It is one of those things when booking a non refundable reservation, you do take that chance, and we do our very best to accommodate unfortunate situations. As far as the additional charge, we would suggest you contact your credit card company so they can further investigate. We would not have charged you any additional charge. We again apologize for any trouble with the booking that you made, and we sincerely are glad that you are safe despite that bad weather. We hope to see you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Good budget alternative to Harbor Blvd
Summary: No complaints whatsoever with the hotel - clean room, free parking, laundry and basic breakfast. You cannot ask for more. The only downsides, and they are minor, is the distance - 15 min walk - and the street noise; but after a day at Disneyland this quickly fades into sleep . Being close to the Garden Walk, there are several places to eat. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel during peak season as it is vastly cheaper than the hotels on Harbor Blvd.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. Thanks for recommending us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel. We stayed in a double room with 2 adults and 2 children. We arrived early due to a early flight in and the hotel staff were great allowing us to check in early. The hotel room was big enough for us all, and was very clean and comfortable. We had a downstairs room, and the free parking was great. There is a laundry on site which was great. The breakfast was ok, the only downside was not enough room in the breakfast area to eat, but you can get it and take it back to your room. A great location to Disneyland, being only a 10 min walk, and plenty of places to eat around the place. We really enjoyed our stay, and would recommend to those who are on a budget. Value for money.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome that you found us to be so convenient when visiting Disneyland. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. It is great to know you found us to be such a great value and we do hope to see you return soon!

Summary Heading: Good Location Good Price But Pick The Upper Floor
Summary: Great spot , helpful staff . Easy walk to Disneyland and Disneyland California Adventure . We had a ground floor unit and there is a lot of noise carried from second floor, that was the only down check ...
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. WE are so happy to hear you had a good stay and you found our location to be so convenient. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are more than happy to assign you to second floor if requested. It is great that you found us so affordable and we are excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Make sure you ask for 2nd floor
Summary: Pretty good budget motel. Stayed for 3 nights for a visit to Disneyland and DCA. Gave it 3 stars based on the location, the price and the handy parking. Almost gave it 2 stars because the walls are made of paper, the breakfast is a low basic carb fest (bread products, cereal, yoghurt, passable coffee), the mystery bug on the night table and the bedspread with the holes in it. Having said all that, I would maybe consider booking again but would insist on 2nd floor as I think we heard every footstep from any room remotely above us. I did appreciate the roving security guard and great view of Disneyland fireworks. So close they set off car alarms in the motel parking lot!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you found we fit into your budget and even happier that you plan on returning! WE do have a complimentary breakfast the does include fresh fruit, yogurt, fresh waffles with syrup, toast with jam, 3 kinds of cereal with milk, sweet rolls, hot cocoa, hot tea and coffee. We do know that it will give you energy before hitting the Disneyland park! We are unclear about the bedspread you speak of, as we do not have bedspreads on our beds. We have a coverlet? Not sure if this is the spread you are speaking of. We do check each and every room prior to renting it, so we are surprised that you found a hole in it. Perhaps you could give us a call so we could follow up on this to better our service and correct this if indeed it is an issue. We do have a wonderful security guard every night to make sure all is peaceful and safe. We are delighted to hear you found this comforting. We do hope to see you come back in the future as you say, we look forward to it!

Summary Heading: Rumbled possibly reused sheets. Paper thin walls.
Summary: #1   First day The room was adjoining door, on the first floor.  The walls were so thin that every movement and word was magnified, which is even worse after everyone goes to bed. The kids were tired and crying.  I felt like I was rooming with strangers.  Neither of us had any privacy.  They heard me sneeze.  I could hear them talk quietly in bed.   I called the next morning at 7:30 for another room.  When I got off the phone the child next door whined, "Mommy is that lady going to talk anymore?".   #2   Second day new room.  I had just taken my luggage up to the second room and left for the day.  When I arrived back at the hotel I found the sheets were even more wrinkled than the first room, I pulled back the covers to find course shorts hairs midway down and dirty streaks
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry to hear you had issues with the noise from your neighbors. It is good to hear that our front desk did a great job accommodating you, and It is good to hear you found them to be friendly and helpful as well. We do have an excellent housekeeping staff, and we actually have  a housekeeping manager check the room before we rent the room to give it an extra stamp of perfection. We are sorry to hear that you did not find the housekeeping to be satisfactory. I assure you we do not re use sheets and that every check in room has clean linen. We even change the bedding on stay overs unless otherwise told not to by the guest. There would never be a wet hand towel left by anyone else except the guest who is registered and staying in the room. I assure you our housekeeping staff does a thorough job. The glasses at the sink are paper and are wrapped, so I am not sure how the cups would be dirty, unless again opened and used by the guest staying in the room. We would like for you to give us a call and let us know what room you were in as we would like to follow up on these housekeeping complaints. We take this very seriously, and will follow up once you provide us with your information. We do hope to see you return in the future.

Summary: 15 to 20 minutes walk to Disney for those who choose not to take their shuttle for fee. Very clean room, however it has a stale sewage smell emitting from the basin, probably due to their old pipings. Breakfast include basic selections, but I had worse before. Can consider for those who are budget conscious. The inn also offers coin laundry service at quite a low cost.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. WE are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so easy to go to the park. We look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: We had a great stay here. The room was clean, large, and comfy with very little outside noise. We were within walking distance of Disneyland as well as many restaurants and shops. We were able to leave our car parked in the lot while we went to the park and felt safe in the area. I would stay there again and definitely recommend it for anyone needing to visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you enjoyed your stay. WE are so happy to hear you will be recommending us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed 3 nights for trip to Disneyland. Good size rooms, clean, quiet(room near back of property), comfy beds. Had hair dryer, iron/board, coffee maker and paper cups and mini fridge.    Breakfast was basic: mini waffles, toast, yogurt, round danish type pastry, instant oatmeal packs, some oranges, cereal. Small eating area and busy, signs say can also eat by pool or upstairs but most eat and run so found seats.   Location is great. For us 10 min brisk walk to park, but we have long strides & move. Casual 20 min? Close to shopping, restaurants, drugstores etc.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true, we are just a 15 minute walk to the front entrance of Disneyland making it so convenient. We have upgraded our rooms, it is wonderful that you like our new additions and you were so comfortable in your room. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Fairly inexpensive and ok, but the cleaning crew was awful
Summary: This is a great place to stay as far as overall comfort and within walking distance to the Disney parks, which was our reason for finding it in the first place. On the other hand, we would go to the park in the morning, and come back to our room to rest in the afternoon before going back.  Without fail, we would return around 2 pm or so, and somehow, they had not cleaned our room.  This occurred 3 days in a row....the 3rd day, they arrived to clean our room about 4 pm, and we asked for them to come back in about an hour, but were told they go home at 5.  The 1st day, they took all our used towels but didn't bring us any back.  When I called the front desk to point this out and ask for towels, they told me they had some there if I wanted to go down and get them.  Um, no....how
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear we fit into your budget and you  found we were convenient to the Disneyland park. We do apologize for any confusion or miss understanding regarding your room service during your stay. I would recommend next visit, you just give us a call to the front desk or stop by on your way out. Just let us know a good time during the time our staff is here and we will make sure to service it at that time. We are so sorry for any issues you experienced this visit and do assure you we have followed up on this. We hope to see you return soon!

Summary: The breakfast room was too small and food was ok.  Wish there were more to choose from. The front desk was friendly.  The rooms were clean.  The area was clean too.  It was convenient to walk to the parks and places to eat.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do have a complimentary breakfast that includes fresh fruit, yogurt, freshly baked waffles, toast with Jam, sweet rolls, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, hot cocoa, hot coffee and tea as well as 2 kinds of juice. We appreciate your feedback and will possibly look into some additions. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is within walking distance to Disney land and some good restaurants. Rooms are clean and seems newly renovated. Parking is plenty and it's free. Breakfast consists of waffles, cereals, bread nothing fancy. Some complaints that I have are (1) small breakfast dining area (2) self service laundry room closes at 10pm.  Other than the 2 complaints, it's a super worth hotel for famous to visit Disney land.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and that you liked our free parking as well as our other complimentary amenities. We are really looking forward to your return!

Summary: Very clean and comfortable.  The only complaint we had was no microwave in the room and a safe to put valuables in.  Overall, excellent hotel.  The breakfast was more than we expected. Would recommend it for a great stay at a reasonable price!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so terrific that you found  us to be so clean and comfortable. We are glad that we fit into your budget and that you will be returning!

Summary: I chose this hotel site unseen and was not disappointed. It is definitely older and not shiny and spotless. But it was clean, comfortable and quiet. (We had a downstairs room toward the back.) The beds were very nice and the a/c worked great. The shower looked like it had a recent facelift and was very clean! We had a 2 queen room for a family of 4, and didn't feel like we were too cramped. We didn't eat breakfast, but it looked like the standard pastries, muffins and coffee.  Parking was plentiful and free, and it's an easy walk to Disneyland, as well as being next door to the GardenWalk. I'd stay again anytime!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are delighted to hear that we exceeded your expectations! We are so happy  that you had a great stay and we look forward to your return!

Summary: The friendly service of the staff was much appreciated. We had a group of 16 in our family and everything worked out great! We‚Äôve stayed here for the past 4 years and this year was by far the cleanest year. We plan to stay here again next year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We think it is so exciting that you plan on returning next year! We are a great place to stay when you have a large group as you say. We have a wonderful group sales manager who is always ready to assist in planning your stay! Looking forward to next year!

Summary: The staff was nice and let us check in early. The room was clean and the beds we're very comfortable. There was free breakfast and it was very close to Disneyland all for a good price ? Sign me up! Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! It is wonderful that you found our location to be so convenient and we fit into your budget. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed at Kings Inn and were thrilled with our hotel choice. The male office manager specifically (didn‚Äôt get the name) was very welcoming and allowed us to check in early without hesitation since the room was open. We were able to park our car, get settled into the room, and head over to Disneyland in no time. The walk to the theme parks is only about 15 minutes. Plenty of food options, CVS, Starbucks, and just about everything you could need is walking distance on the same block. The room itself is pretty good size, bed is comfy enough, and ammentities inside are fair. Price is awesome for what you get. Stay here.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be such a great value. It is true, with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking as well as complimentary breakfast this does add so much value to your stay. We are so excited for your return.

Summary: we stayed for 10 nights at Kings Inn and it was a lovely Hotel. Rooms were Cleans and new Renovated. Daily Breakfast service was delicious, Fresh Waffles, Cereal., Coffee, Juice, Youghurt, Toast.. to name a few. Facilities were great, staff were friendly, and within walking distance to Disney Land.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to know you found our location to be so convenient and you had a good stay. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is sure wonderful to know that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Location and price are great for Disney visits
