Summary: We stayed here two nights expressly to visit the two Disney Parks, and were very satisfied with this lodging. Our second-floor room was relatively large and seemed like it had been updated. It seemed clean, and the bed was comfortable, Our only complaint was the stairs. This hotel is about 1.5 miles by car from the parking entrance to the Disney parks, and from one point on the property, you can actually see the backside of Cars Land in the California Adventure Park. In fact, the first night we arrived, we watched the fireworks display from Disneyland from the balcony just outside our room. It‚Äôs a good thing we did, as both days we actually visited the parks, the fireworks were cancelled because of wind.  The breakfast room by the office was very busy, and offered a typical
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, and like you say, just about a mile from where you would park if you choose to drive. The ART shuttle does pick up right out front as well if you would like to take a shuttle. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: The King's Inn had everything we needed for our trip. We arrived on an early flight and were able to check in early and leave our luggage behind the front desk. Our room was comfortable, clean, quiet, and looked like it was recently updated. The breakfast was basic (cereal, toast, waffles, fruit, yogurt, coffee, juice) but enough to give us a good start to the day. The breakfast room is a bit small, but the staff were very helpful in stocking everything and making sure that everyone got what they needed. The pool and jacuzzi were warm and a good place to relax. The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland and California adventure parks, about three blocks. However, Downtown Disney is on the opposite side of the parks from the hotel. There are also several restaurants
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, It is wonderful to know you found we fit into your budget and you found our location was so convenient. We are excited to see you return.

Summary Heading: Good hotel but didn‚Äôt like the intrusion
Summary: Great location and a short nice walk to Disneyland. Staff at front desk was friendly and helpful. Room was pretty clean and modern looking.  However, beware of housekeeping coming inside your room despite that fact you put the privacy please/ do not disturb sign on your doorknob. I was taking a nap and they still came in and did their duties. I was appalled and in disbelief!! That was upsetting to me
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well to the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. It is also good to hear you found our location to be so convenient. I do apologize with any issues with housekeeping and your do not disturb sign. They will not enter if it says do not disturb, so I am wondering if it had fallen off the door knob. We have had some strong Santa Ana winds lately, and perhaps that was the issue. I am not sure, but I assure you we are following up on this. They do not ever clean the room when a guest is in the room either, so it is really  unclear. We will follow up and again we do apologize. We do hope to  see you return soon.

Summary: For the price, very nice. Within walking distance to Disneyland so got to save on the parking. It was a pretty cheap room but we honestly only used it to sleep. We made it down to the breakfast one day and they had decent options.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are happy to know that you found we fit so well into your budget and you had a good stay. We are so looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel is clean, big room, with shampoo and soap, only they should add Salt foods at breakfast because All is sweet. Maybe some eggs or bacon. But i definitly stay here again. The parks are around the c√≥rner so easy get there walking.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location so convenient and you had an excellent stay. We are so excited to see you return!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for the money and very friendly staff!
Summary: This was our first time staying here and found the rooms to be really clean and a perfect size for our family. It was also a good location and only a 10 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland. The staff were very accommodating and were able to do adjoining rooms with the rest of our family. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so excited for your return.

Summary: This motel is wonderful for those on a budget, who still want the convenience of being close to the parks. We stayed for 10 nights in mid November and it was definately a great find. 2 blocks to the parks and plenty of food choices close. Beds were soft, tv new and room clean and private. Breakfast was very basic, however, it is not a priority for us in Anaheim so who cares :)  Highly recommend this motel!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so excited to know you found we fit so well into your budget and you will be recommending us. We are happy to know you will be back!

Summary: Room was in great condition.  Beds were comfortable.  Loved the laminate flooring and the fact that the vanity was outside the bathroom/shower.  Within walking distance to Disneyland and if you don't want to walk, the ART stop is right in front of the motel.  Was also pleased with the breakfast selection.  Definitely great value for the price. The room included a refrigerator, iron/ironing board, coffee maker and blow dryer which is not all offered in most motels.   I go to Disneyland several times throughout the year and have stayed at many motels in the Anaheim area and this one is definitely the best hotel I have stayed in.  I would definitely recommend and will be staying there again myself in the future.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. thank you as well for recommending us! We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Newly decorated and refurbished hotel.  First off the staff is always very friendly! The room was clean and comfortable ..only suggestions would be to bring slippers to walk on the hardwood floor.. and there's no longer a microwave in the room .. however there are some available in the laundry room until 10 PM ..room was  clean and I especially like the vanity area which was newly done..very nice!!  The shower was nice and worked well with enough warm water and decent water pressure..  It is right next-door to a few really good restaurants and just five minute walk to CVS ..Walgreens and now across the street is a Starbucks.  The walk to Disneyland is approximately 15 minutes.. also convenient nearby is the ART shuttle and OCTA bus..we took the OCTA bus  which stopped right by
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a nice stay and our staff was so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so excited for your return.

Summary: First time staying at this awesome place, after a long drive from San Francisco. All our family were very happy to stay here. Staff was very professional and friendly. Location is perfect, very clean rooms, this will be our place to book every time we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. WE are so happy to hear you had such an awesome stay and you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, convenient location and decent breakfast.
Summary: Rooms were clean, with hair dryer, toiletries and in-room fridge available. At a moderate pace we would get to the park entrance in 12-15 minutes. Nice and close to Gardenwalk as well for dinner. Two pharmacies and a little market nearby for drinks, snacks etc.  Breakfast area is quite small so best to arrive early. Basic eats: mini waffles, toast, danish, cereal, oatmeal, yogurt, coffee, tea, and orange slices.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you enjoyed your stay with us. We are so excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney Parks and other amenities
Summary: A basic hotel within 10 minutes walking distance to Disneyland. Also, located near a mall, stores and restaurants make it a good base for visiting Anaheim. It serves free breakfast consist of cereals, pastries and freshly made waffles. Not much but a nice way to start a day. The room has a fridge but no microwave. You can use a common microwave located in the laundry room. For the price that we paid, it is definitely value for money.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. WE are so happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and you found our location to be so convenient. We do have a wonderful breakfast including those fresh baked waffles. We are so happy that we fit so well into your budget and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Friendly staff...clean rooms and close to Disney Breakfast had mini waffles, oatmeal, cereal, yogurt, toast, fruit and juice. Would be even better with bacon and eggs and potatoes but not bad   Great rates and close to Disney
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so delighted that you found us to be such great place to stay and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We are also glad to hear we fit so well into your budget. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The room was large, flat screen tv, with many channels.  The housekeepers were very good.  There was plenty of towels each day and soap and shampoo.  My only negative remark is that the rooms allow noise from above, so if I were to stay again it would be on the second floor.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Ants, holes, broken glass in bed... what?
Summary: We stayed here for a quick trip to Disney and universal studios. Was easy to find. GPS (Waze) led us right to the inn. Check in was easy. Got to our room and everything looked great. We got all set up, and had some time to waste before bedtime so decided to watch some tv. While laying in bed my husband suddenly gets a stabbing pain in his leg, upon investigation he finds a small piece of glass stuck in his leg. We ran our fingers over the bed and found even more glass... broken... in the bed. Pictures attached.  How does that even happen??? Do they not change the sheets?  Does a maid have beef with management? We call the front desk and they offer to change our room.  Well yeah we aren't going to sleep in a glass filled bed.  They move us to the only other room they have that is
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had an easy check in. We do apologize if you had some issues while you were here. I assure you we are following up on this with our housekeeping manager. You were right to feel upset and wanting to move to another room. It does appear you were moved to a ADA room, which would explain the way the bathroom was designed.  We are now an independent hotel and shifting away from Super8 standards and your feedback will help us as we plan to upgrade our rooms. We really do hope to see you return in the future. Contact us directly so we can assist you with your reservation.

Summary: Advisory: Google doesn't get the navigation tight all the time on this place. It is on Katella, next to Bubba Gump Shrimp, across from the Toy Story parking lots. These lots are less busy and more convenient to access than the big parking structures.   There is complimentary breakfast in the mornings, simple and adequate. The rooms are comfortably spacious, and very clean. The beds squeak a little, but they are quite comfortable. Also, the pillows available are varied in firmness enough that any guest can find one or two that will be comfortable to them.   The parking lot is extremely well lit and clean, even in the back. The exterior building stairs, rails, and overall condition are in good repair. The pool looked like it could use a little attention,  but it is the off season.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear we exceeded your expectations, this is our goal. We are looking forward to seeing you back soon.

Summary: The room was clean and the staff was friendly! There are tons of places to eat nearby and Disneyland was a very short walk away. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will be staying at Kings Inn next time we visit!
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear your review. We are delighted that you had such an excellent stay and that you will be returning!

Summary: The room was clean.  The walk to Disneyland was just under a mile and went by very fast even after walking all day at Disneyland.  The breakfast was severely lacking compared to most hotels that I stay at.  You could see Gardians of the Galaxy and the Disneyland fireworks from the upper balcony eating area just above the front office.  I would probably look for a different hotel next time just because the breakfast was so lacking.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is true we are so close to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance. Yes! You can see the fireworks as well as Guardians of The Galaxy Mission Break Out! From the motel making it such fun experience, especially at night. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Tidy place - good price. Very close to Disneyland. The breakfasts are not flash, but you can eat elsewhere as there are plenty of restaurants around. The day staff were very helpful and knowledgable. The night staff weren't too switched on to the surrounding area, but there was an information centre just down the road which was very helpful. Overall it is a nice tidy place to stay with friendly staff. The location is a very safe loaction too, so you can work around at night confidentally.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance making it so convenient.  We are so excited to see you come back!

Summary: This hotel is a Great Value. We stayed here for three nights for my daughters 5th birthday trip to Disneyland. Every employee that we encountered was friendly and helpful. I have a 5 year old, 3 year old and a 2 year old. We loved the breakfast because it was fast and just enough before our day at the parks. We have stayed at this hotel 3 years in a row and will continue to stay here for years to come. They do a fabulous job keeping up the property and there is always a fresh coat of paint everywhere you look. Thanks for making my family trip affordable to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. That is so wonderful that you decided to spend your daughters  birthday with us. We are so excited for your next visit!

Summary: This was my second time staying here.  I loved that the rooms don‚Äôt have carpet, that they don‚Äôt charge for parking, that i can leave my car in the parking lot after i check out and still enjoy Disneyland, customer service is amazing, rooms are clean, it‚Äôs adorable and it‚Äôs a walk away from Disneyland.  I will be coming back from now on when I‚Äôm in town.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is always so good to hear from repeat guests. It is so good to know you will be back soon!

Summary: I cannot brag enough about what a great job housekeeping did during my family‚Äôs visit this year! We always came back to a clean and well stoked room. The housekeeping team even decorated my sons bed with his ‚Äúpoop‚Äù emoji pillow which he was excited about. Check-in/out was a breeze as well. The complimentary breakfast was great (although I would have liked a wider variety of foods other than waffles every morning). This hotel exceeded our expectations and is within walking distance to Disneyland/California Adventure!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear it was a wonderful experience staying with us. We are so excited to see you return.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for a good price
Summary: The hotel was amazing and great for your budget. Our room was newly renovated and very clean. The customer service was excellent and the complimentary breakfast was good for what you pay for. The hotel is very close to Disneyland and saved me a lot of money on parking. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and thanks for recommending us! We are delighted to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: For the low price, we received a big, clean, comfortable double bed room.  We were 15 minutes‚Äô walk from Disneyland and near several reasonably priced restaurants. It was a convenient and quiet enough place.  I‚Äôd come back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Glad to hear you found we fit into your budget and you had a relaxing stay. we are so excited for your return!

Summary: Less than a mile from Disney at a very affordable price. The room was big and clearly newly remodeled. Comfortable beds. Thin walls but at the price something's gotta give. It was a Very good experience
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and we fit so well into your budget. We are so happy to hear you had such a great experience.

Summary: least expensive place stay within walking distance of Disneyland and numerous dining choices. small but clean and efficient room no parking charges which is nearly impossible to find this close to Disney They don't appear to have any bed sizes except queen
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful that you found our location to be so convenient and you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Room was large our family did not fill cramped and the toddlers had plenty of room to move around in. Room was very clean. Kids could see the fireworks just outside our door. Free parking and breakfast added more bang for our buck.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found us to be such a great value and you had a good stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We were staying just a couple of nights, and it was perfect.  Close to the park, provided a quick breakfast, and the room was clean.  Good size refrigerator but no microwave. The office staff were professional and friendly, and the housecleaning staff were also quite helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and you loved your accommodations. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary: Within walking distance to both Disneyland Resort and the Anaheim Convention Center, the room wasn't luxurious but it was functional - nice shower, comfortable bed and A/C that worked.  The only problem was the room door didn't automatically close - you had to remember to close it.  The "breakfast nook" was cramped and didn't offer much, but the pastries were not stale and I was able to pick one up on the way out.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you found we fit into your budget. We are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland resort or attending a conference at the Anaheim Convention center. It is just a quick 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center making it so convenient! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We had good time in this hotel, especially silent nights which was not everywhere available.  Due to short stay we could utilize all of benefits, but pool or laundry makes a deal :) Almost all was perfect, location, cleaninless (but for the second days we were not given new tea cups - old were taken). If only the breakfast could have been better :( People start really need warm meal and something else than pooridge and waffers. Think about vegatables and fruits, eggs etc - even with price increase. And cups - could be cartoon, not thin plastic ones.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found we fit so well into your budget   and you enjoyed your stay. We are glad to hear you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We hope to see you return soon!.

Summary: This Motel is great value, very clean, close to Disneyland , good breakfast included. Close to restaurants at Anaheim Citywalk. Pharmacy and seven eleven and also take away very close. This motel is very good for the price I would recommend it.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted that you found our location to be so convenient and you had such a great stay. Thanks for recommending us! We will see you back soon !

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for cheap!
Summary: The location of this motel can't be beat with how close it is to Disneyland. For as cheap as it is, it's very clean and the rooms were comfortable and nicely decorated. The breakfast in the morning was really good too! I was expecting the typical pastries and bare minimum so having fresh waffles made were a lovely surprise. I highly recommend this place for anyone traveling on a budget. You get more bang for your buck.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a good stay and you found us to be such a great value. We are always glad when we exceed our guest's expectations. We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a great location for visiting Disneyland
Summary: The Kings Inn is a nice hotel in a great location for visiting Disneyland. It's about a 10-15 minute walk to the gates. The rooms are newly renovated. They are clean and have wood floors and no carpet. We will definitely stay again when visiting Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found our location to be so convenient. We hope to see you back soon

Summary: We found an air and stay package that had the Kings Inn in it. We were really concerned about it as the pricing was really good but checked out TripAdvisor and decided to go for it.   It is a great location and about a 15 walk to the front gates, or a $5.50 Uber ride. It is a motel style place that has all of it's rooms renovated, free parking, free breakfast, free WiFi, is really clean and nice.   It is not super fancy but we have always believed that we would rather spend money at the park as we aren't in the room that much. There are some good restaurants close by, a Walgreens and CVS within a block, as well as a shopping mall next door.   I would stay here again and think it is worth the price.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had such a perfect stay and you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: the room was very clean. the necesary goods were already sat up. if possible the breakfast want to be more kinds of foods. but the stuffs were very kind and friendly. i want to stay again when i go to anaheim with my family.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a good stay and that you plan on returning!

Summary: Pro tip: if you're thinking of booking here, definitely request a room away from the Garden Walk parking garage. The walls are paper thin, and there seems to be a large number of the population who is unable to locate their cars without resorting to setting off their car alarms. Repeatedly. At 2 or 3 in the morning.  Other than that, though, this hotel is a great value. It's within easy walking distance of Disneyland, with two pharmacy stores a block away. There's a strip mall-type shopping center a block away one way, and the Garden Walk in all its splendor a block away the other way.  I was here with my dear friend to celebrate our milestone birthdays at Disneyland. We were there for four days and three nights. When we arrived on Friday afternoon, we were a bit too early to
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and you found we were such a great value. It is true our location is so conveniently located next to the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: The location is great if you are considering trips to Disneyland.  The rooms are very clean and comfortable, close to many restaurants.  Free parking is an added bonus.  The reception staff are very helpful.  Check with them for discounted rates for multi-pass tickets  to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so conveniently located and you enjoyed your stay with us. It is true, with our amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: We will definitely stay there again!!!!
Summary: We enjoyed the stay there. The room was really clean and spacious. All of the employees we encountered were super helpful and kind. It was only about a 10 minuet wall to Disneyland main gate! We will definitely be staying there again!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you plan on returning! We look forward to it.

Summary: This place was Awesome! Not only is it an 11 minute walk to Disneyland but they are super cheap for Anaheim! They were very clean, pool was heated, super friendly staff and great breakfast room with people to help! All around great jem to find! We will be returning here often!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so exciting to hear you had such and great visit and you are so happy that you found us! We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Location to all the Disney and other Anaheim attractions makes visits to these places easy to get to, even on foot. The hotel rooms have had a refurbish make over and still provides the guest with all the in room comfort amenities required . The staff are as friendly and helpful as they were last time we stayed. Plenty of walking distance, inexpensive restaurants close by, and for those wishing to shop till they drop, a variety of inexpensive retail outlets can be reached by bus or taxi. All together another enjoyable stay. Well done to the new Kings Inn.   We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. It is true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We would definetly recommend this hotel. Staff are friendly.Rooms are very clean and bed so comfy. The free breakfast is basic but okay. Its only a 10 - 15 minute walk to Disneyland. There are lots of restaurants nearby to choose from.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such and awesome stay and that you will be recommending us to others. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: It's a bog standard motel but rooms are all refurbished, spotless and brand new. It's nothing fancy but if you are spending 18 hours a day in the park it would be a waste to spend more. Best value hotel in anahiem.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so true we are just so close to the Disneyland park it is so convenient! We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget as well. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We had a great stay. Our room was excellent. The bed very comfortable after walking around Disneyland all day. The bath/ shower was an awesome surprise! Tall shower head ( husband is 6'8") the bathtub is deep for soaking. Breakfast was perfect. Warm waffles and yummy danish. We walked to the parks each day and it only took 10min.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and you found our rooms so comfortable. It is true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. It just takes a quick 15 minutes and you are at the entrance! We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: The room was very clean and updated.  The towels were very soft! Usually at hotels they are not very good but here they were great!  The walk to Disneyland was easy as well and maybe took about 15min.  Breakfast is simple, with waffles and cereal but it did the job. Great motel that I would definitely stay at again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and you found we fit so well into your budget. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the modern upgraded room we were given at this hotel. My daughter and I enjoyed our 4 night stay here while visiting Disney and my Disney College program student. Breakfast room was small but the food was normal breakfast fair you get at hotels. Clean and comfortable...we enjoyed our room being in the back as we heard no traffic at all. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who plans on visiting Disney on a budget.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you were pleasantly surprised when staying with us. We are so happy that you found our rooms so clean and you were so comfortable during your stay with us. We  are affordable lodging at its best! We hope to see you back soon, and thanks for recommending us to others.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel 3 years ago and returned because of its location to Disneyland.  The hotel has changed ownership and is family run.   It's been transformed!   The rooms are very clean and  tastefully coordinated. Beds are very comfortable and good use of space.  The staff were very friendly and helped with a swift check in.   The property inside and out, is very well maintained.   My family used the pool and said it's heated and nice.   I had nothing to complain about as we were very pleasantly surprised.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so glad to hear we exceeded your expectations! This is our goal, and it wonderful that this indeed was the case. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you back soon!

Summary: The Kings Inn is a good stay for its price.  The room was quite small, but it was also a single queen room so it didn't need to be large.  It was clean and looked fine.  The shower was huge and the shower head very high up which I'm sure is nice for taller people.  The bed and pillows were comfortable, though my bed was pretty creaky which didn't bug me but may have bugged my neighbors.  The walls were pretty thin.  AC wasn't that great and was very loud when on.  Fridge in room is very large.  The staff were friendly and checking in and out was a quick process.  I showed up very early (around 8 AM) and expect to just leave my bags and go, but got lucky and they had a room ready for me.  The property is pretty big and if you're staying at the back, like I was, it can be a
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so great to hear we fit so well into  your budget and you found us to be such a great value. Our location is awesome as you say when visiting the Disneyland park. It is a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance, however the ART shuttle does pick up right out front for those who wish to ride. We Do look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Recently stayed 5 nights during our visit to Disney and Knott's Berry.  This is my second stay with this property and everything was wonderful.  Rooms clean and affordable, and the staff was friendly and accommodating.  Will stay here again on my next visit to CA.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We are so glad that once again you had a wonderful stay and we do look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Fantastic budget option steps away from Disneyland
Summary: Excellent budget option for quick visits. All we needed was a good, clean, comfortable hotel room close to the parks for our quick weekend visit. We are no frills travelers when it comes to a trip like this and this room offered exactly what we needed. Ideal for Disneyland trips where you aren't at the room much during your time. Service was great, property as a whole was well maintained and clean. We will definitely consider this property next time. My only very minor complaint is the property sits adjacent to the Anaheim Gardenwalk parking garage. Car alarm sounds can possibly create a noise issue but we didn't hear it super late and only 1 of the 3 nights we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay with us. It is wonderful that you found we fit so well into your budget, and found our location to be so convenient. We are so happy to hear you will be returning! We are looking forward to it. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: My friend and I stayed here for one night when we went to Disneyland for the day and everything about it was perfect! Not only did they let us park there and walk to the park before hand but at that same time they let us check in early so we were able to unload and unpack before getting worn out from the park.  The room was immaculate, not a speck of dirt or dust in the main room or bathroom. The beds were very comfortable and the room had an impressive sized mini fridge. The inn offers a free continental breakfast which we were unable to enjoy because we were anxious to get on the road and beat traffic home but it look yummy. The staff were also extremely nice and very helpful. I highly reccomend
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you found we exceeded your expectations! It is our goal to make sure that happens with each and every guest. It is true with our complimentary features such as free breakfast, free wifi, and free parking it does add so much value to your stay.  We do hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Stayed for a quick overnight in Oct 2017. We wanted a quick place to sleep without breaking the bank. Property is older, but well taken care of and was previously a Super 8 Hotel.   Pros: Great location - its a bit of a walk to Disneyland (about 15-20 minutes) vs closer properties. But close enough you can forego ART tranportation or have to drive to the Disney parking lot Great A/C - bit noisy but worked perfectly Upgraded floors, new fridge - nice bathroom area. Friendly staff Pool looked well take care of Easy parking Guests are friendly Adjacent to the Anaheim GardenWalk mall Close to lots of shopping/dining  Cons: Hardly any - room was small-ish, but for the price it was more than adequate and comfortable.   Didn't try breakfast - but everyone seemed to love it. Had a minor
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to hear that you had a great experience when staying with us. It is true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park making it so convenient when staying with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is wonderful to hear you found them to be so helpful and kind during your stay. We are so looking forward to your return!

Summary: My husband and I used this hotel as a base for a visit to Disneyland and we were not disappointed. The check in staff were friendly and helpful, the room was immaculately clean and the bathroom had obviously just been newly renovated. Bed was comfy but quite squeaky to get in and out of, aircon worked great albeit a little noisy. No restaurant for dinner but it is nearly right next to a Buba Gump Shrimp with a Cheesecake Factory a few doors down and a few other restaurants too.  Breakfast was the same as we have experienced in many other hotels, mostly cereal, toast, pasties or waffles with tea or coffee then 10 min walk to Disneys gate in the morning.  Overall this hotel exceeded our expectations and I would definitely recommend staying here and would love to do so again myself
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so excited to hear we exceeded your expectations.This is indeed is our goal, and we are delighted to hear that this was the case! We are in the perfect location just like you say, only a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, as well as right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are so many great places to shop as well as dine. We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We look forward to it!

Summary: This was our 8th time we have stayed at this Motel. Peter and his staff are always friendly and welcoming. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Disneyland is a 10 min walk away.  The Anaheim area is undergoing major upgrades and there is a wide variety of places to dine.  As of September this motel has changed to Kings Inn.  Peter has advised that they will be making major changes to the motel over the next year or two. The breakfast doesn't disappoint with cereals, hot waffles and muffins included.  We will be returning in 2018.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our GM Peter as well as our staff. It is always so awesome to hear from repeat guest's! We are happy that you like the changes and that you plan on being back next year! We are looking forward to it!

Summary Heading: Got a lot for a great price
Summary: Loved this hotel.  Location was 15 min walk to Disneyland.  Free continental breakfast and parking.  Room was clean, spacious and well equipped.  Loved that we could grab breakfast to go and start our walk to Disney. Plenty of restaurants surrounding too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is just terrific that you found us to be such a great value and you enjoyed your stay with us. We are in the perfect location as you stay, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so easy and cost effective, as you are not spending any money on parking. We are so excited to see you back next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: Newly named Kings Inn, we found the location fabulous.  So near the Disney experience.  Breakfast was good.  Cereal , juices, pastries, toast, freshly made waffles.  As it was included, it was very adequate.  Rooms were clean, and the beds were great.  Disney fireworks were easily seen from the back of the complex, or even on the upper balcony near the entrance.  Be aware they start at 9.30, so when they start don't be startled.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We think it is fabulous you found our location to be so convenient to the Disneyland park. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient when visiting the park. We do have a great breakfast as you say, and the fact that it is complimentary does add so much value to your affordable stay. We also do have a great view of the Disneyland fireworks from our sundeck, as well as from the pool area. A very nice touch to ending your day. We are so looking forward to seeing you back soon.

Summary: Went to Disney land with family the rooms were really just to sleep in at night and get ready for the next day so it worked out just fine for us. The walk to Disney was not bad getting there but after spending all day at the park the walk back to the hotel seemed long But doable. Check in was very good 5 min in and out, parking for us was good I had no problem with finding a parking spot so over all if you don't want to spend a lot of money to be by Disney and just looking for a place to sleep this will be a good choice
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you found us to be such a great choice when visiting the Disneyland park. We are delighted that your check in was so efficient and you found our location to the Disneyland park to be so convenient.  We hope to see you back soon next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: If you're in Anaheim you're probably going to Disneyland and this place is only a 10 minute walk from the park! It was comfortable and clean, also recently renovated which is excellent. Breakfast was decent but it's not a 5 star hotel so you get what you pay for. But ultimately this place is awesome value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so delighted to hear you found us to be so affordable and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Excellent customer  service, location, clean room, great price, pretty good breakfast and free parking. Amazing deal!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such an excellent stay and you found us to be so comfortable as well as convenient. It is true, we are a great deal with our free parking, free wifi, complimentary breakfast as well as our wonderful amenities in our rooms. We are excited for your return!

Summary: Great place to stay. Conveniently located close to Disney and other entertainment venues, restaurants and attractions in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear you had a great stay and you found our location to be so convenient. We are right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk where there are several great places to shop as well as dine. Disneyland of course is just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance, and even Knotts Berry Farm is very close, as well as the wonderful Southern California Beaches. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We stayed to attend Disneyland and it was the perfect location. It is a short walk (10 min) to the Disney parks and right down the street from several shops and restaurants. We were on the second floor of the back building and it was recently remodeled. FYI it was a shower only bathroom and the floor of the shower was extremely slippery. I heard other guest make the same comments at the breakfast room. The breakfast line moved efficiently and fast. They had a dedicated staff person making the waffles so it moved pretty quickly. One problem we had and didn't voice our concerns about was there were no elevators. We had to take the outdoor (steep) stairs with a toddler and injured grandmother. The rooms had refrigerators but no microwaves. There was a microwave available in the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. It is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance making it very convenient. We have recently remodeled our rooms, it is great to hear you liked the improvements. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary: Got what we expected for the value, nice and clean, good proximity to the activities we had planned. My only "complaint" was when booking was asked for expected arrival time, between 6-7am, then when we showed up as planned was informed that we wouldn't be able to check in til 3pm. Not sure why it allowed me to put in an expected arrival time of 9 hours earlier than could be allowed but oh well. Not a huge problem just unexpected inconvenience. Still give the place an 8/10 though.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had a good experience staying with us. We do our very best to check our guest's in when they arrive earlier than check in time. In the event that we can not, due to occupancy, we will process all the paperwork, hold your bags, as well as register your vehicle here for free parking.  We do apologize if this was an inconvenience, and we do hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing Value Perfect distance from Disneyland
Summary: We were looking for an inexpensive place to stay when we visited Disneyland. This Super 8 had good reviews, so we booked it. We stayed for 7 days and had no complaints. We had an easy check in, had a rental car two times during our stay and it was easy to switch that over to the new car. When we walked into our room, we noticed it was recently updated, laminate flooring, granite counter top, everything we could ask for. Room was extremely clean, no odors. It was nice that there was a mini fridge as well, and in the laundry room a few microwaves. The pool was also very nice, it would have been nice to be open later than 10 as we hardly got back before 9 from the parks. We walked most of the time, walking slow and taking our time, it only took 14 minutes. We did take an uber one
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found us to be such a great value. We are really a great value with all of our complimentary amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast. It is so true we are in the perfect location as well when visiting the Disneyland park as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, making it so convenient. Thanks for recommending us, and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Good price for a room you're only sleeping in because it's walking distance to the parks. AC units are lackluster. They need to update the hotel in general, but its not bad.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review, we are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are working on upgrading our property, and are sure you will find the improvements to your liking when you return.

Summary: We are live about 35 mintues from Disneyland so when we want a quick get a way on a budget we always book at this hotel. Clean rooms, great service and in walking distance to Disneyland. Also you are very close to the toy story parking garage, of you don't want to walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. So glad to hear we fit so well into your budget and had found our location to be so convenient. We do hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The place looked good when we first arrived. We had booked 5 rooms and out of the five rooms when we first arrived had cochroaches in the washroom and under the beds. I was travelling with 22 people and 12 of them were kids. The rooms had a really bad smell to them, and the washrooms were really tight and had very limited light inside. The showers were not as good, the water pressure was bad and the tubs had yello stains in them. There were no water bottles avaible and no room service. I would definately not book this place again
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear your first impression was good upon arrival. We do apologize if you experienced any issues during your stay with us. We do have an awesome maintenance staff, and I am glad that they were able to take care of things right away for you. We also have a great housekeeping staff, and all of our rooms are inspected prior to check in to make sure all rooms smell great, and look great, are are impeccably clean. We are not sure of what yellow stains on the bath tubs you are speaking of, as there was no report of this to the front desk, and all of our tubs are brand new as we have recently renovated all of our bathrooms, with new tubs as well as tiles and granite.  As we are a motel, and not a hotel, we do not have room service as you speak of. Some hotels do offer this extra service, usually for an extra cost. We do have a 24 hour front desk however, who is ready to assist at anytime, as well as a great maintenance staff, and housekeeping staff. We do have several vending machines throughout the property,which do have water, soda, sport drinks and various snacks available for purchase at all times. We are sorry to hear you will not be returning, as we feel we are a great value, with various free amenities adding so much value to your stay. We do hope to see you return.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights as part of a west coast driving holiday. The hotel is in a perfect location. Basically next door to the Cheesecake Factory and bubba gump shrimp restaurant. Disney only 10-15 min walk away with plenty of shops and food places en route. When checking in, the male receptionist came across as quite arrogant and unapproachable. The hotel came with complimentary breakfast which we had a nosey down on the first morning. Wasn't impressed, was very basic, small and overcrowded. The pool area was great and always loungers free. Had laundry room on site which cost $6 for fabric wash, use of the machine and dryer. We used this and it was great. Parking is plentiful and free also for guests. Wifi was available in rooms and we had no issues
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We do apologize if you had a bad experience when checking in, we are glad to hear the rest of your visit went well. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The good AC works great and ice cold! On site laundry overpriced but works great! Wonderful location (we were at the back of property a 20 min walk to Disney) The breakfast is free (UNBELIEVABLY crowded, but it's free, planned on using it everyday but it only runs until 9am Disney usually opens at 10, didn't really make sense went only once) Rooms are recently renovated  TV was great and wifi worked Water was always hot  The not so good Walls are very thin  It's super busy (great price though right?) Housekeeping kind of hit or miss (everyone was working their butts off though so I understand if we leave at 10 but room didn't get cleaned up by 2pm) Breakfast room in terrible need of expansion If your in the back of the property it's an additional 5 minutes to breakfast or to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is wonderful that we fit so well into your budget and that you had an enjoyable stay. We do understand that being towards the back of the property does add a few minutes to your walk to the park. A lot of our guest's do prefer it though as if on the Disney side, you do have a pretty good view of the park. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, it is true, they do work hard, and we do appreciate your patience in the time that your room is serviced. You can always request that your room is serviced by a certain time, as long as it is during housekeeping hours of when they are here. We are so excited to hear you will be back! We look forward to it. We do think you will be pleasantly surprised as we are going to be in process of a makeover of our breakfast room! See you back next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: This motel was great for our needs.  We just wanted a place to stay the night before our trip to Disneyland so we wouldn't have to fight the morning traffic for the 100 miles from our home.  It was clean, the breakfast was decent, and the front desk staff helpful.  We didn't take advantage of the pool, but it looked fine.
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and you liked our amenities such as our free breakfast. It is true it does add so much  value to your stay. Thank you for the compliment to our staff as well. It is wonderful to know that they provided you with that friendly helpful service you so deserve. We do hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The Super 8 Anaheim was amazing!! I wasn't expecting much, but I was certainly surprised at how nice the room was. It seemed to be newly remodeled with hardwood floors and a walk in shower. My only complaint is that the fan that comes on when you turn the bathroom light on is a little loud, but otherwise I had a great stay. Will definitely be back in the future!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay and that we exceeded your expectations. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: Good service and comfortable rooms. They have swimming pool and quite large parking lot. I would recommend for short stay. Also it looks quite new and neat. Staff is helpful. There is laundry for the quests.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a perfect stay and that you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, it is great to know that you found them to be so helpful. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Problem with door lock card not working.
Summary: The card for the door lock worked some time and some time it didn't.  We had to go to the office 3 times regarding this problem and they gave us new cards.  Maintenance checked the lock and did something, but there still was a problem from time to time.  We were told that if we had our cell phone near the card it could stop it from working, I think it was a door lock problem.  Never knew if the door lock was going to work.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced with the door lock. It is true, sometimes putting your cell phone close to the  magnetic strip on the key card, it can deactivate the key card. Some types of leather as well will do this. It can be the door lock at times, as they are battery operated. You did mention maintenance did go and check out the lock, which is good, as they would have seen if the lock had a low battery or there was a mechanical issue with the door lock. We do know, which ever the case, it is an inconvenience coming to the front desk to get the key reactivated, and for this we do apologize once again. We do hope you decide to visit us soon.

Summary: Can't fault this place for value for money.  It's in a great location, the beds are soft and comfortable, our room was clean and the staff were fantastic.  Thanks to Rigo (front desk) who was always so helpful and friendly, and thanks to the girls in the breakfast room who do such a good job, and to the room maids who did a lovely job cleaning our room every day.   I would highly recommend this place to anyone on a budget who is looking for a great place to stay for a great price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is so true we are such a great value for the money. With our complimentary breakfast, free parking as well as free wifi this does add so much value to your stay.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is wonderful to hear they were so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Rooms are nice and clean. We enjoy staying here. They've upgraded. I especially like the fridge they added.  And the breakfast is ok. More than danish and coffee. I always have Raisin Bran, yogurt and coffee. But the freshly cooked waffles are there for the asking.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. As always we are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast as well. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Thank you for a great night. It was a quick stop over from our visit from the grand Canyon since we got into Anaheim a day early. Then proceeded to our reserved hotel the next day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We were delighted to have you stop here for  quick stay over. We are glad to hear you had a great night with us. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: rooms were nice. no carpets which I loved. breakfast could use some work on selections. nice distant from DL and DCA.  Worked perfect for race.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. WE are so happy to hear that you were happy with your stay We are very handy as you say to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are Excited for your return.

Summary Heading: Perfect moneysaver for a Disneyland trip on a budget!
Summary: Perfect moneysaver for a Disneyland trip on a budget! Great shuttle bus service to Disneyland entrance that stops right in front of Super 8! CVS, Walgreens, Ihop, Pizza and other shops all in walking distance too! My family loved the perfect sized pool and the hot tub was great to soothe tired legs after all the Disney walking.  My kids (Cynthia 9 and Cyrus 7) even loved seeing the tops of the Radiator Springs mountains from the Super 8 parking lot because they felt like they lived right next to Cars Land during our stay! Continental breakfast with fresh mini Belgium waffles was a nice way to fuel up for the day too.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget! It is true with our free wifi, free parking, and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay. We are also so conveniently located to the Disneyland park as you say, it makes it so easy to just walk over and save on parking fees at Disneyland. We want to thank you for staying with us during your family vacation to Disneyland and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: This hotel is great nice and clean. Checkin was quick as well as check out. It is little bit outdated but I guess pretty much all hotels are like that in California. It is cross a street from Disney Land. It is very convenient and very accessible to the major street. I highly recommended.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay and you will be recommending us! We are in a very convenient location next to Disneyland, just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance. We are renovating and improving our property. We are sure you will love the new changes next time you are here!

Summary: Wasn't allowed to put down cash deposit and they charged my room fully on the credit card. Didn't get the room Location I requested and was put above noisy pool. Street is very loud all hours of the day. No tub in room but it was newly renovated and very clean. Cold water tap only produced lukewarm water
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We actually do not require a cash deposit if you pay with a credit card. We just charge the amount in full to the credit card and there is no deposit due. I do apologize if you were not put in the location that you requested, We do our very best to accommodate, but sometimes do to occupancy, we are not able to move our guest's to a different location if we are sold out. We do have some rooms that have bathtubs.  again we do our very best to accommodate request's when we are able to do so. We are glad to hear you found you accommodations to be so clean. We do have an awesome housekeeping staff! We hope to see you return in the future.

Summary: A very good value for a good family friendly property and proximity to Disneyland (could walk there in approx. 10min.)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. we are in the perfect location, We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, making it so convenient. We do hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and other food places and attractions
Summary: I would highly recommend this location if you and your family is on a budget. Very close walks to Disney and other attractions. Friendly workers and the room has AC/heater. Breakfast in the morning from 6-9 I believe. Room kept clean.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review.  We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient and our rooms so comfortable. We are glad to hear we fit so well into your budget. Thank you recommending us, and we do hope to see you back soon,.

Summary: The total hotel experience for this super 8 property met and exceeded my overall expectations. Other than the busy-ness of the breakfast offering between 8-9 am I highly recommend this property. The pending change to a Kings Inn should not alter the incredible value of staying here
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We are so glad to hear you had such a great stay and we exceeded your expectations. We are very excited to be becoming the Kings Inn Anaheim, and we do hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I enjoyed this hotel! It was pretty close to Disneyland. About a 10 minute walk or so. The hotel room was clean, in good shape and pretty big too. Parking and Wifi was free (which is a huge plus for me since most hotels nowadays charge for those) Had a good size refrigerator which was great so you can bring snacks. Would recommend - good stay for a good price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had a great stay and you found we fit so well into your budget. Our location is awesome I have to agree. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be recommending us. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Location to Disneyland is around 10 - 15 minutes walk depending your speed so location is pretty good. The check in process was smooth and the staff were helpful and friendly. The room was nice and comfortable. Their breakfast offering was more than enough to start the day with selection of toast, bread, juices, cereal, porridge and even freshly made waffle. I would happily recommend this place for Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. it is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so glad to hear you will be recommending us to others, we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: I'm rating this place 5 points because of location, it's 10 minutes walking to main gate Disneyland, and parking is included, so we just left the car there and walked to Disney and California adventure park; the room is standard, don't expect anything much, but it's quite clean, no resort fee or hidden charge, so it's a great option for Disney travelers
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and your accommodations to be so clean and comfortable. We are really looking forward to your next visit with us

Summary: very comfortable very close to disney and right next to a shopping center and dinning , i would get this hotel again when i come to disney again, the best part was that it was very cheap and really nice rooms for the price
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay and you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are such a great value, especially with our free wifi, complimentary breakfast and free parking. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Exactly as expected! In a good way.
Summary: We stayed here in August 2016 for 5 nights, and again for another 5 in August 2017. Both times, our rooms were clean, and staff were very kind. The hotel is a little dated, but still included a fridge and flat panel TV. The key features here are the vicinity to Disneyland and DCA, on top of free parking and a solid pool and hot tub. Don't stay here if you're overly picky and expect a Hilton, but do if you're a chill couple with or without kids; we've had an awesome time two years in a row!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is wonderful that were so comfortable here and that you had such a nice visit both times. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's. We really are excited for your return!

Summary: Our stay was great and the location could not be beat! The hotel is located half a mile from the Disneyland parks main gate. A very quick 10-15 min walk (with kids) Rooms are clean and spacious. Beds are comfortable and there is a large vanity area with lots of counter space for getting ready. We were very happy to find a refrigerator in the room as well. Lots of store close by (1 block away) to buy goodies and snacks for your stay. The front desk staff is always there with a smile and very accommodating to any requests you may have. Great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found our location to be so convenient and you had such a great stay.  We are so glad you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful as well. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Other then being lock out of our room for 15 mins because the battery died in the door reader and walking back and forward to get keys as well as the maid service coming too early on check out day a great stay. Fits our needs every time.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had a great stay and we are glad to hear we met your needs. We do apologize for the inconvenience with the door lock, We are glad that we were able to take care of things for you though. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: This is a great budget motel that's 10-15mins walk from Disneyland.  The rooms are very clean.  Breakfast is conplimentary but basic great for a simple breakky and saves money,  gets very busy by 8.30 though.  Pool towels are tiny and scratchy apart from that beds are super comfy , rooms very clean, free parking what more could you want!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found us to be such a great value and you found our location to be so convenient. It is true with our complimentary breakfast, free parking and free wifi it does add so much value to your stay. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Nothing fancy, a clean room, a clean pool the kids loved, hot tub, a/c and a mini fridge, laundry on site. FREE breakfast: cereal, milk, toast, fresh made waffles, oranges, yogurt, coffee, juice. WALK TO Disneyland, or pay for a shuttle, we walked, and good restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so good to hear you found we were such a great value and you loved our location. We do hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great place for the price & location!
Summary: I stayed at Super 8 on my own for a couple of nights during my mini vacation to Disneyland. The location was exceptional as it was close to many restaurants, shops and Disney attractions. I felt very safe being on my own. The room was tidy and was made up for me every day. The free breakfast was a bonus!(Dont have high expectations as it's very basic & crowded)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. WE are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. Our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast do add so much value to your stay. We a looking forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Seniors/disabled use Art bus system it's great and if you buy tickets in certain places you get a major discount
Summary: You can buy ART bus tickets daily from the office or they will tell you where you can buy tickets for multiple days. Also there is a kiosk just outside the security entry to Disney by the bushes on far right side. Looks like an ATM .Seniors/disabled can buy multi day bus tickets that are far less than at the office. Also, because my room was so far from the street, I drove to the office each day with my chair and parked there + caught the ART bus right out front of the office. Made it so much easier. The rooms are nice + they are clean. Come with a frig so that helps + there are CVS, Walgreens + 7-11 close along with several good restaurants within a block.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is wonderful you found the ART shuttle to be so helpful in getting around while staying with us. It does help a lot if you do not wish to walk making it so convenient. We hope to see you back soon,.

Summary: Nice pool, for breakfast most of the time standing, Some more chairs and space would be better. Good restaurants nearby, especially the cheesecake factory. Also very good for dinner, realy excellent food.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found location to be so wonderful. It is true we are right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk where there are so many great places to shop as well as dine. The Cheesecake factory is one of our favorites! We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary: We chose this motel as an affordable base from which to visit the Disneyland parks.  It offered far better value for money than many neighbouring properties and served our needs well.  We had a spacious room on the ground floor.  The in-room fridge and coffee machine were welcome additions for those travelling on a budget.  The room itself was very clean, and although we did have a bit of an ant problem in the bathroom on our first night, housekeeping swiftly dealt with this and it was resolved by the second night of our stay.   The motel is easy to access from the freeway - a bonus when faced with LA traffic!  There is plenty of off street parking, and we had no issue finding a space close to our room.  It is a 15 minute walk on flat streets to the Disneyland properties, so we
Manager Response: thank you so much for the  review. It is so awesome to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. It is true, with our amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast, this does add so much value to your stay. We do have a great view of the Disneyland fireworks from either the pool area or the sundeck, a great place to gather at the close of a fun filled evening at Disneyland. We are sure excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: This place is excellent value for money! Its cheap but the room was nice, bed was comfortable and it is so close to the park. Plenty of food options in walking distance. The pool was clean, the laundry facilities excellent, staff super friendly and we will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to know you found our location to be so convenient and you had such a good stay. Most of all we are so happy to hear you will be returning! We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed here while visiting Disneyland. We were looking for a cheaper hotel but one that was still decent quality. We were very happy with this hotel. The beds were comfortable and I liked the fact that it had laminated flooring instead of carpet. The staff at the front desk was super friendly during check-in and we didn't have any trouble. There is an ART shuttle that stops down the street that will take you to Disneyland, we used this both days we were there. . We did not eat the breakfast. Overall we were happy with our stay.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget. With our amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast, it does add so much  value to your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to know you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary: The stay was overall really good. We liked the room, spacious and clean, that was able to hold two people. The breakfast was okay, limited to a "normal" breakfast with some yummy waffles. An upgrade could have been some more options to choose from but we don't complain. Location is a 5 star if you're looking at Disneyland and Gardenwalk, it's even near the Cheesecake Factory and other restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such an enjoyable experience. It is true our location is awesome, as it is right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk where there are several great places to shop and dine. As well as Disneyland, which is only a 15 minute walk to the front gate, there is Downtown Disney where there are so many great fun places to shop and dine as well! We are so excited for you to return!

Summary Heading: Some confusion and I don't know why
Summary: Site called and claimed my credit card was declined. This was a new card with < $100 balance at the time. I had used it on the drive down and let the back know I was traveling. Hotel did not have a chip reader so I had to pay out of pocket. Very inconvenient.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. I do apologize if there was some confusion regarding your credit card. You might contact your bank, as it would not process on our end. Thankfully we were able to accommodate you and you ended up having a good stay. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great place and close walk to park
Summary: I liked that the rooms were really clean and the fridge was a good size. Beds were comfy. Didnt try the breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are the perfect location to Disneyland, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are glad you found the extra amenities such as the complimentary breakfast and the fridge in your rooms so cost effective and convenient. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary: Room was clean and well maintained. Staff were friendly and helpful. Room is close to Disneyland and a short uber ride to most other attractions. Pool was clean and a great size to cool off. Breakfast is minimal with toast and cereal being all I ate and washed down with orange juice and a cup of tea. Overall a worthwhile stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a wonderful experience when staying with us. Our location does make it so easy to get around when visiting the Disneyland area. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Great location to Disneyland & to Garden Walk centre which has a great range of restaurants, Bubba Gump & Cheesecake Factory. There was also a place where you could purchase discounted tickets to mant attractions. The hotel is an older style but the rooms were clean, a light breakfast was included in the rate. We used the pool & spa during our stay & would definitely stay again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so delighted that you had a great time, but most of all to hear you will be returning! It is wonderful to hear that our staff assisted you in planning your visit here and you loved the convenience of staying here. We look forward to seeing you back in the future.

Summary: What happened to bathtubsmy stay was fantastic it's centrally located to where I need to be which is of course the Disneyland and to the convention center but it would've been nice to have a bathtub at the end of the day with all the walking together but besides that everything was A1
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We do still have bathtubs, they are in specified rooms however. Next time you reserve, just request a room with a tub. We will be more than happy to make sure you are in a room with a bathtub. We are glad you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center making it so convenient! We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary: The Super 8 was a great place to stay at, this building was built in the 1970's you can tell by the architecture. Completely different in the inside of the building, the rooms are clean and spacious and it  looked like they were newly renovated.  The walk to Disneyland was about a 15 minute walk not to bad.  The Anaheim Gardenwalk is located right next door so if you want other options for shopping, food and drinks its nice and close to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay and you found we fit so well into your budget. We are in the perfect location it is true, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are also right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk as you say, where there are some great places to shop and to dine as well. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Really convinient place to stay for really cheap and well cleaned room. About a 10 min walk to the park and is literally right next to 2 big chain restaurants (Cheesecake Factory & Bubba Gump) Stayed here 2x already and haven't had any trouble or problems! Will be coming back here over and over when we go back to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you decided to stay with us when visiting the Disneyland park. We are in the perfect location it is true, just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: Room was cleaned everyday. Towels replaced daily. Great location to Disney and restaurants such as the Bubba Gump Shrimp Co. and Cheesecake Factory. There is the Garden mall right after the hotel. Near Walgreens in case you forgot something or in an emergency. This was my third time staying in the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient.  Welcome back! We always love to hear from repeat guest's!  We do hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The place was nice and clean.  Great stay for the price.  The entire front wall was actually a window which was interesting.  Had some light seeping in at night but it was manageable.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so delighted to hear you had a good stay, and we are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised at the overall cleanliness of the facility and aside from a few minor issues that were taken care of by the front desk, we enjoyed our stay. The only recommendation I would make is to maybe have some type of eggs at the breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is terrific you had such a good stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at super 8 for a family Disneyland trip and they both were great. It's affordable, walking distance to Disneyland, clean rooms and the staff was nice and accomadating.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you had a great stay and we are excited to see you back in the future.

Summary: This isn't the closest hotel to Disneyland but it worked. Definitely not one to stay at if you plan to walk to and from the park with little ones. Their breakfast was better than I expected...more than just packaged bear claws and coffee. Loved the fresh waffles! I feel like the pillows were on the softer side but some people like that. Our room was nice and clean everyday we were there. The staff was very friendly. I think the only thing I didn't like about the room...no microwave.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. we really look forward to seeing you back soon.

Summary: The price and the service were great.  The decor and the cleanliness of the two rooms we used was excellent.  Enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is wonderful you had such a great stay! We hope to see you back soon

Summary: The hotel was closer to Disney than the Disney parking lot. It's also close to the highway, so easy access to move around the city as well.
