Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. We are happy to hear you found our location to be so conveniently located. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, making it a pretty quick walk to the park. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Booked through booking.com and was a disaster with fine print
Summary: The person at night was very rude, we booked through booking.com. When it asks what time to check in it does not state policy for time frames; it asks when you'd like to go check in. We were not able to check in when we got to this hotel and the staff member didn't even try to help us fine somewhere to go; we had 2 small children in tow. I called The holiday inn, the Hyaat and they both looked for other hotels that were not even part of their own company. The morning staff was kinder and much more helpful. The breakfast was terrible, they used Styrofoam there was very little to choose from. There was no breakfast with protein for someone is lactose intolerant, all carbs also. We won't be coming back anytime soon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience when arriving. We do our very best to accommodate early arrivals, there are times however if we are sold out we can not check you in early as no rooms are available. We are glad to hear that when you did check in things went smoother for you. We do have a complimentary breakfast available from 6 am to 9. It does include fresh fruit, yogurt, freshly baked waffles with syrup, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal,  cinnamon rolls hot cocoa, coffee, tea, 2 kinds of fruit juice as well. We are sorry to hear this did not work for your breakfast needs. We are hoping to see you back in the future.

Summary: Great service from the staff. Walking distance to Disneyland parks. Decent rooms, beds, pool, hot tub, etc.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. We are delighted that you found us to be such a great value and we fit so well into your budget. We are walking distance to the Disneyland park, just a quick 15 minute walk  to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with kids while visiting Disneyland
Summary: The hotel had recently been refurbished and was great.  Very clean and walking distance to Disneyland.  The staff was very friendly and they even provided waffles with their breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Nice price decent hotel near disneyland
Summary: for an affordable hotel near disneyland this place is well worth it. Clean and close enough to walk to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are excited to see you next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: It is at walking distance to disneyland which is a big plus. Plenty of places to eat out. Overall staff of super 8 are very hospitable & attending.   Breakfast is a bit of a let down & can be improved. Cleanliness & quality of rooms, bed is super.   We will definitely recommend it to families with kids.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such an excellent stay and we are so happy that you were so comfortable here. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Not fancy but clean nice place to stay. The breakfast is the same very morning and go eat early, about 30 minutes before breakfast is over they will not put anything else out that they ran out of.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you found us to be such a great bargain and we fit so well into your budget. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary: Room and bathroom are small in size.  Wished there were more options for breakfast such as fruit and some protein. Overall clean, good customer service. Close to theme park, and restaurants is a plus. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted that you stayed with us for your mini getaway. It is true we are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do have fresh fruit included in our breakfast, as well as 2 kinds of fruit juice. We have yogurt, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, as well as hot oatmeal with toast and jam. We also have freshly baked waffles and cinnamon rolls. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Employees in charge of cleaning and the breakfast were extremely nice
Summary: I enjoyed my stay here. I had no issues whatsoever and liked the fact it was so easy to walk to Disney every single day
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. It is so wonderful you had a good stay and you found our employees to be so friendly and efficient. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Our room was clean and comfortable. Parking is free. Continental breakfast is nothing fancy but does the job.  Hotel will store your luggage before you check in or after you check out for extra time in the park. Shout out to Ana for getting us an extra night!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so good to hear you found us to be so clean and comfortable and you enjoyed your stay. We are glad to hear Ana was able to extend your stay! We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: Comfortable and clean hotel. Hotel staff are helpful and accommodating. We pick this hotel cause it's very near our destination.
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. It is so great that you found them to be so helpful and accommodating. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: it an excellent choice. One of the closest to the disney land  and we didn't feel our privacy was compromised at all. Our room was very clean, great aircon, great bed, clean bathroom and plenty
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found out location to be so convenient and you found your accommodations to be so comfortable. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed 7/2017 for a family vacation.  The room was clean but the water pressure in the shower was weak. It is about 1/2 mile from entrance to disneyland. Some discount tickets can be purchased in the lobby.  For the price, I thought this was a good hotel. There is a shuttle that can take you to disneyland but we found Uber was cheaper for 4 people.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. For those who wish to take the ART shuttle it picks up out front and comes every 20 minutes. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: When we visit Disneyland throughout the year we stay at the Super 8.  Other family members stay there also. Everything is great when we stay! We really like the fact that we can park before we check in and also after we check out we can leave our cars there if we are going to Disneyland for the day. We will be there again next month!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you for you and your family for staying with us and we are so happy that you found us the perfect place when visiting the Disneyland park. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are excited to have you back!

Summary: The food was great, the room was clean, the location was incredible and we felt safe walking back at 11:00pm. I would definitely stay there again. And we loved watching the fireworks from the balcony.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so wonderful to hear that you had a great stay and we are excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: Everything was perfect for whay we needed. It was close to Disney and there were plenty food options around. The only complaint I have were the towels for both the pool and the room. They could be better.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is great to hear we were just what you needed when visiting the Disneyland park. We do look forward to seeing you back soon

Summary: We only stayed for one night, but really liked what we got for the price. Room was clean, had nice decor and a decent size. The complimentary breakfast was great with waffles being cooked freshly! Location to Disney is fab- it's just a few minutes walk!!!!  I'd recommend to anyone looking for a cheap but very cheerful stay near Disney :)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to hear we fit so well into your budget.  We are in a great location when visiting the Disneyland park as you say as it is just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. we hope to see you back soon

Summary: Very clean and nice.  Great for the price and close enough to walk to Disneyland., approximately 15 minutes.  Everything was great.  Breakfast however could use some fresh fruit or other protein.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review.  It is wonderful you round our location to be so convenient and close by. It is also great to hear we fit so well into your budget. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Hotel staff was very friendly. Rooms were very nice, clean and remodeled. Breakfast was included and parking was free! It's walkable to Disneyland, but feels like a VERY long walk after a long day in the park. Took me about 15-20mins to walk with my 5 & 7 yr old kid's. I'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank  you for the review. It is so good to hear you had such an enjoyable stay and you found our location to be so convenient. We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Close enough to walk and see fireworks
Summary: We stayed here for two nights on our trip to Disney. It was super convenient, had free parking and a free decent breakfast with waffles.   The rooms were comfortable enough and clean. The shower provided adequate water pressure. Great place for a couple nights rest as long as you're not expecting luxury, you'll enjoy your stay. It is a great value, being one of the cheaper walkable hotels in the area.  It is about a 15-20 minute walk to the park entrance from this hotel, but it is manageable, safe and a lot of people do it. At night walk towards the back of the hotel and you can see the fireworks from the parking lot.  We'd be back if we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient and you got to see the fireworks from here. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary: Ive stayed at this hotel for Disneyland trips fir years and have seen all the remodeling this hotel has done in that time and the changes have been great! This trip though, the man at the front desk was very rude and belittling to me about a hotel policy that I wasnt familiar with at all. It was very upsetting for the start of my stay, especially as I stay here very often, but I would suggest staying here reguardless. Its a nice and clean hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are always delighted to hear from repeat guests. We do apologize for any issues upon check in, and assure you we have followed up on this. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: Location is excellent, everything in walking distance. Rooms were clean and up to a good standard. Breakfast was ok. Kids loved the pool.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient and your kids loved the pool so much. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: A very convenient and pleasant stay during convention weekend.
Summary: I stayed here during the D23 Expo, and while the convention raised prices all around my room was still a good value. Check-in was quick and painless, and the room was clean, roomy, sufficiently quiet, and kept tidy regularly. The bathroom and shower were roomy and spotless. The included parking was one of the best perks of booking a room here. It also goes without saying that the AC was a godsend in the midday heat. The included breakfast was also very convenient, however, aside from the waffles, the breakfast items were pretty simple. Still, filling up early in the morning helps save a ton!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you had a great stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning

Summary: We always stay here! Very convenient and close to everything. Rooms are clean and Love what they've done to them, would like a microwave, but have to sacrifice somewhere. Very friendly staff, quite & efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted that you had such an enjoyable stay and we are happy that you found the room to be so quiet and comfortable. We do have microwaves available upon request for a small fee and we will gladly put it in your room. We also have microwaves available in our common area for use. We do look forward to your next visit

Summary: Nice, clean rooms. Didn't smell like some hotels, staff was very friendly and brought extra towels like requested.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had such a great experience. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Hotel was ok if you're just looking to rest your head for the night. We were only there at night after our days at Disneyland. Definitely not a hotel if you're looking for comfort. Newly remodeled rooms but they looked like they were poorly put together. Breakfast was plain with cereal and packaged cinnamon rolls. Like I said, not a place if you're looking for comfort just somewhere to rest your head if you'll be out most of the time. Didn't seem like a family friendly hotel either. We got a call from the manager on one of our nights we came back to our room shortly after 10 pm. He said our neighbors were complaining that we were making too much noise. I guess walking on the 2nd floor is not possible after 10pm. Definitely will not return or recommend to anyone else.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations and we are sorry to hear that this was not the case and we do apologize for that. We do have a complimentary breakfast that does include cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, freshly made waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea, hot chocolate and coffee.  We do apologize if we had to give you a call regarding some noise issues. The comfort to all of our guests is so important, and sometimes with all the excitement we do not realize we might be disturbing the rooms nearby. As a courtesy, we will sometimes call the neighboring room just as a reminder we have other guest's nearby. We assure you we keep all our our guest's best service in mind. We do hope you decide to return sometime in the future.

Summary Heading: Great for a family with small kids
Summary: This hotel was excellent we would definitely stay there again. The rooms were clean, and the staff was very helpful. We loved the location it was only a ten minute or less walk to Disneyland, and close to restaurants.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you so much for the compliment to our staff, it is great to hear they exceeded your expectations and that you will be returning! We look forward to it!

Summary: I was really pleased with my stay at super 8. I was actually paranoid about staying here because it is technically a motel. But this motel was very clean. I didn't have any problems. The room does get hot if the ac isn't on, but that's what the ac is for. It was an okay distance from the park. About a 10 min walk. Our price was amazing and distance was great. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so great to hear we exceeded your expectations! We are so delighted to hear that and we are so excited to hear you will be returning.

Summary: This motel is conveniently located, reasonably clean, staff are friendly and the free breakfast is simple, but works.  We had to keep our shoes on in the room because the floor was so filthy it made our feet black, but the rest was reasonable.  If you need to call a taxi/cab, don't fall for the scam they have going with a limousine company. They charge 20% more and make you wait a lot longer for them to come. Call your own taxi
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you found us to be so convenient and you found we fit so well into your budget. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do have all new flooring in our rooms to ensure that the floors are clean, if you found the floor to be dirty, we wish you would have let us know so we could follow up on that for you. We do pride ourselves on our cleanliness. We do work with a couple different taxi service in the area. We do not work with a limousine company however, and we are not sure which company you are speaking of. There is a yellow cab in the area and our guest's are certainly welcome to call their own taxi as well. We do hope to see you back in the future.

Summary: The Super 8 is a great place to stay FOR THE PRICE. This is not by any means a luxury place, and if you expect that, you will be letdown. But considering the pros, it is an excellent value. A basic breakfast is included, which is adequate to fuel up before a day at Disney. There is a pool to cool off after a long day at the Park. The rooms are clean. My main complaints are the hard beds, AC which makes the room freezing if it's on but once you turn it off it's warm and muggy, and the tiny bathrooms. Anywhere in the area will have inflated prices, but the Super 8 serves its function for is since when we stay here we spend all day at Disneyland anyway.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you found everything so clean. We are surprised to hear you found the mattress too hard. We have all new beds in the rooms and have really had a great report on them. If it is possible maybe you could give us a call so we can follow up on this. Perhaps there is a factory defect or something. We are hoping to see you return in the future.

Summary: i was too  tired to report the a/c that's why we got this room to sleep in comfort, maybe next time
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry to hear you had some issue with the AC unit. We do have a wonderful 24 hour front desk staff and a great maintenance team. in the future make sure and let us know so we can address the issue. We want you to be comfortable. We are glad to hear you will be visiting us again in the future.

Summary: Overall, a fantastic experience for this price. The room was clean, bathtub was spotless (no mold/mildew to be found anywhere). My boys and I stayed 3 nights for a Disneyland trip. 15 minute walk to the park. Our room was towards the back, overlooking an ugly empty lot, but we weren't there for the view. Breakfast was acceptable and it saved me spending money on one meal. Oatmeal, cold cereal, juice, waffles (the ladies there made them and had them waiting for you staying warm on the waffle iron). Pool was great (goes to 8-1/2 feet), but their pool towels were surprisingly small. We did not get in the hot tub. We saved $5 by buying our park tickets at the office. Will definitely stay here again.  The only complaints I had: Towels were a bit thin and scratchy The hot and cold
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great that you had such a fantastic experience when staying with us. It is true with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast it does make for an affordable stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: room was very spacious , excellent location, close to angel stadium, huntington beach, back yard to Disneyland, clean rooms. considering it is a very large hotel, probably need to extend the breakfast area or extend breakfast time, was very crowded .
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are excited for your return.

Summary: Surprisingly great stay at this motel very close to disneyland.  Walking distance to the park, great room and pool area to relax in.  Staff very friendly, helpful, and attentive.  Breakfast wasn't great, but you can't expect much of a motel breakfast anyway.  Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate making it so convenient. We are happy that you found us to be such a great value and that you will be recommending us.

Summary: For a Super 8, it is more than adequate for a Disneyland vacation.  Clean rooms, comfortable beds make the in room stay great (why would you spend a lot of time in your room anyways?).  It is also very quiet, as it is not on the main road (ask to stay in the back).  The breakfast is actually quite good.  Fresh made waffles, cereal, yogurt, pastries, coffee, juice, toast.  A great way to start the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear  we fit so well into your budget and you enjoyed our free amenities such as our complimentary breakfast. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: A fine hotel to lay your head before or after Disney!
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel several times and service is friendly and consistent. The rooms are clean and appointed with a small fridge, flat screen tv. We always stay in the 2-queen room and prefer the first floor. It a drag to be on the second floor for bringing stuff to and from the car. We like parking in front of room to have door-to-door convenience.  The breakfast leaves much to be desired but the kids seem to like it. The options for breakfast are: packaged cinnamon rolls, cold cereal, oatmeal pouches, coffee, toast, and fresh made waffles to order. I don't care for the waffles but the kids like them.  Walking to Disneyland takes about 20 minutes for us and is an easy walk. Totally worth the walk. We would much rather walk to/from the hotel than deal with waiting for a
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are always happy to hear from repeat guest's. We are so happy to hear you like our new improvements and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Thin ceiling at first floor room
Summary: Hotel is very near Disneyland. Toilet was clean enough. Free breakfast and WiFi. Ample parking space. You may be able to park your car at the front of your room.   If you have playful kids as upstairs neighbors then you will be able to hear their footsteps.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We do apologize if you experienced a bit of noise from your neighbors above. We do have a 24 hour front desk, please feel free to call us at any time so we can assist in the future. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you found your room so clean. We look forward to seeing you back in the future.

Summary: It is a 15 minutes walk from our room to Disneyland, I think it is acceptable. Free breakfast is provided, mostly waffles and cereals. Room is cosy, clean and big beds! There are many restaurants near the motel, we enjoyed our stay :)
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you were so comfortable in your room. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: The staff was friendly, room was clean, plenty of towels, and fresh waffles for breakfast!  We enjoyed the roof top patio and had a great view of the fireworks show.  Close enough to walk to restaurants, the Garden Walk and Disneyland.  It was also pretty easy to navigate to the beach through some lovely areas around the town.  Would recommend it to friends.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear that we were just what you needed when staying with us. We do want to thank you for recommending us and we do hope to see you back soon!

Summary: The hotel room was clean, beds were comfortable. The breakfast wasn't the world's best but you are getting some basic hotel staples, waffles, yogurt, juice etc.   Overall no complaints. Especially given how close it is to Disney!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and we fit so well into your budget. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel had nice renovations to the rooms but the shower sucked and the breakfast was sub-par. Also I told the lady we had 4 adults and 2 kids and booked us in what I thought would be 2 doubles and a couch, got there and there was no couch and they charged us $10 a night for a cot. Wasn't please about that but it's close to Disney to walk and free parking so they have that going for them.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are close to Disneyland as you say. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. Our largest room does have 2 queen size beds, and we do not have sofa beds in any of the rooms. We are sorry for any misunderstanding, and we do apologize, but it is great that we were able to put a rollaway in the room for you. We do have free parking and free wifi, which does add so much value to your stay. We are hoping to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This was a family get away to Disneyland and our stay at the Super 8 hotel was very nice and comfortable.  The rooms were very clean and comfortable.  The location is great for walking back and forth from the parks.  There was not a big selection for breakfast, it is good if you have small children, but traveling with teenagers there is not much of a selection.  We ended up going elsewhere to eat.  But other than that we would stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you had a nice and comfortable stay. we are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay for a budget price
Summary: I think that most people hear "Super 8" and have an image of a grody hotel, but this place was really nice! Incredibly clean, comfortable beds, nice staff, and the best location possible.   In particular, the women working in the breakfast room were SO nice and provided a far above average breakfast experience.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. We are glad to hear we fit so well into your budget and you you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Spotlessly clean. Hardwood flooring...no nasty carpet. Easy walking distance to Disneyland. Efficient staff. Very economic price! I booked the day before we traveled and honestly didn't expect much from this place but was pleasantly surprised! Hot breakfast every morning in a dedicated breakfast room...no awkward eating in the lobby. Will definitely stay here again! Two thumbs up!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear we exceeded your expectations and you were so surprised with your visit. We are also glad to know we fit so well into your budget. We are excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: My two teenage children and I stayed here for four nights so they could attend Vidcon while I worked remotely from my hotel room. The check in staff was friendly and efficient. The room itself was very spacious but it did have a fairly tiny bathroom. This made it impossible to keep the floor dry but the staff was great in giving us extra towels for the floor. The cleaning staff was easy to deal with, efficient and did a great job.  One of my only real complaints is that the WiFi/Cable was out for quite a few hours. While this may seem trivial it caused me to lose income by not being able to work. When I voiced my concern to the front desk, all I received was a disingenuous sorry. That did not make me happy. I work with sensitive data and can't simply work at the nearest
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. we are so happy that you decided to stay with us for Vidcon. We are located in the perfect location when attending the Anaheim Convention center. We are just a quick 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center making it so convenient when staying with us. It is wonderful you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We are so excited for your return.

Summary: Super 8 in Anaheim California was clean with remodeled large rooms, comfortable beds, and great pillows. I was very surprised at how nice the rooms were. Just about 2 blocks to Disneyland and California Adventure easy walk. I would definitely stay there again it was well worth the money.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to know that you had such a SUPER stay! We are just a block and a half from the park entrance, just a 15 minute walk making it so convenient when staying with us. We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Our family of four enjoyed our multiple day stay. The location was within walking distance of restaurants and convention center. From our second floor room we could observe the Disney fireworks each night. Breakfast is carb heavy but yogurt and instant oatmeal is available. The staff are friendly and hard working. It is not the lap of luxury but it is CLEAN. We were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Not the happiest place on earth!
Summary: Good location and room attendants are great, other than that, our 1st step into the check in - it was over! We arrived at 12:47 pm knowing that check in is at 3 pm but we came from a long way and wanted to see if there was anything available, bad move; 1st off she said "No, check in is at 3 pm", i think she saw we came through a vendor and received a good rate....next step, we went for lunch and went shopping at Target to get water and snacks, we arrived back at 2:27 pm and the same woman, not happy, says, "oh we do have 1 room", we said oh my, thanks and gladly went to our room...well, there is major construction going on in 2 rooms and guess where she put us, one of the furthest rooms on the east side right beside the band saws and no parking, and the key cards wouldn't even
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry to hear you had some issues when checking in. We do apologize for that. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you thought the housekeeping staff was great. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations and we do our very best to do that. There are times when guest's arrive early that we are able to check them in right away, however, in some cases the room is not ready until check in time which is 3 pm.  We are happy that you found you received a good value when booking ahead. As pricing and availability is always subject to change it is a good idea to book ahead when you can, and some times there are some good deals through 3rd party websites! We do hope to see you return next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It was very convenient having the city transportation stop right outside the hotel and take us directly onto Disney property. The free breakfast could have been a bit better. Coffee, juice, fruit and prepackaged cinnamon rolls were offered. I would stay again because the cost was very reasonable, for the amount of time we were actually in the room.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value. We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient. We are also happy to know you enjoyed our breakfast! we do offer freshly baked waffles with syrup, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of cereal, toast with jam, yogurt and fresh fruit, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, coffee and tea. It is  complimentary and served daily from 6 to 9 am. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Minimalist hotel but good for the budge
Summary: Small but clean room and nice to have big refrigerator. Best thing about this Super 8 was the location & free parking. Walking distance to the Convention Center.   Disappointed with the breakfast offerings. Would love it if there was protein: eggs, cream cheese or peanut butter. Just carbs but great for waffle lovers! A no frills hotel and budget-friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget! We do have a complimentary breakfast from 6 to 9 am every day. We are sorry to hear you did not find the breakfast to be adequate. Most people do find it is  a great way to start the day.  We are so conveniently located when visiting the Disneyland park. In just a few minutes you are at the front entrance making it so convenient. We are hoping to see you return next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: We like this hotel room because we could access our car from the first floor very easily. We did enjoy the breakfast in the morning. We also thought the pool and hot tub were enjoyable. We did end up renting a microwave for $5, really! I just needed to warm up one thing. We slept well and bathrooms were nice and clean. Other than the microwave, I can't complain!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. we are so happy to hear you had a great stay. We do our very best to keep our guest's stay as affordable as possible, and most of our guest's find they do not need a microwave every night of their stay. Instead of paying for something that will not be used, we would rather have the room rates a bit more affordable and only charge for the extra amenities as needed. This way we can keep the prices to our rooms just a bit lower, and you are not paying for something you do not need or will not be using. We do thank you for your understanding, and do hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: You are within walking distance of Disneyland. I absolutely love it. No worrying about getting a ride back, you just walk. The rooms are a good deal for the price and they have a breakfast that's actually decent. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great time and found our location to be so convenient. We are so happy that you will be returning!

Summary Heading: the price was more than we thought for SUPER 8
Summary: we were checking the price a week prior to our trip and on the web they were offering 2 nights for  about $200 but when we put our credit card on to pay there was an estimate of $310 I didn't really understand it but I had to just take it . but over all I was ok. with the service. It worked for us ,because we had tournament in Convention Center.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a good stay and enjoyed our service. We are also happy that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 5 minute walk to the convention center. We do hope you understand that pricing and availability is subject to change until booked.We do apologize for any misunderstanding. We are glad you had a good stay and hope to see you back in the future.

Summary: The room was spacious and overall clean. The floor in the room could use better mopping. However the hotel was close to lots of activities Disney, the beach, Anaheim stadium. Great location and value for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you found us to be such a great value and you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so cost effective and easy to get there! We are so looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, short walk to Disneyland
Summary: My family and I stayed here for 4 nights while we went to Disneyland.  We were able to walk to the main gate within 15-20 minutes.  I was very surprised by the wood floors.  Everything was very clean and there was plenty of storage for our clothes. The lamps had outlets on them and the nightstand had a USB port on each side.  There was a single cup coffee brewer.  The breakfast was adequate, but as others have mentioned, a protein would have been even better. We did have a couple of problems with our room, but they were promptly fixed.  My only complaint is that the water pressure in the shower was very low.  I would definitely stay here again if the price is right.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear you had a great stay and you plan on returning! We always love to hear from repeat guests, and as usual it is our pleasure to assist you in having a wonderful stay.

Summary: We picked this hotel because it was close to the parks (walking distance) and come to find out we really genuinely liked this hotel. The rooms are a pretty good size, beds are comfy, after a full day at the parks. Not cramped at all, the staff was welcoming and nice. The free breakfast in the morning was a plus and the waffles are AMAZING! Overall it was a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is so great to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast! It is true, it is a great way to start the day. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great place at a great price
Summary: We had a great stay I was especially glad to see our room had laminate wood floors since other reviews complained about carpets not being so clean. The price was great the walk to Disneyland was ok. It was only about 10 minutes to walk if you don't mind walking a bit.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear we fit so well into your budget and you loved our new upgrades to our rooms. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as you say, making it so convenient. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Bed was nice but needed to be a bit softer, breakfast was good but needed more protein like eggs or sausage.  Great location to the park and nice clean rooms.  Would recommend for convenience and comfort
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you found our rooms to be so comfortable. We look forward to your next visit with us

Summary: 2nd time staying here. Easy in and out. Clean, great fresh waffles for breakfast and great prices.  Couldn't ask for more. Came for a day to watch the baseball game at Anaheim stadium and it was a breeze. Also made a quick trip to Huntington Beach too and that was easy. Will definitely use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always so great to hear from repeat guests. We are glad that you had a great stay once again and so so happy tho hear you will be returning!

Summary: The hotel was a great price. It was about 1 mile from Disney. Good room. Plenty of space for our stuff
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to know you found we fit so well into your budget. We are very close to the Disneyland park entrance, just a block and half, a short 15 minute walk. We do hope to see you back soon.

Summary: the front desk staff was exceptional. I had an early flight so I arrived there early morning (9:00am) they let check in early, put my bags in the room and off we went to Disneyland. Breakfast was good, may need a variety from day to day just to change up things especially if you stay for 6 days. Grandkids loved the pool.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so glad to hear you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your visit with us. We are hoping to see you back soon!

Summary: Everthing was great and met our needs! The location is perfect, close to stores, food and walking distance to Disneyland! Our room was clean and we slept well! The only problem we had was a glitch in the computer that wanted to charge us an extra night, but they were a letter to correct that immediately!!  Loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had such a great stay. We are glad to know you slept so well and were so comfortable. We are excited for your return!

Summary: Great place to stay,  cheap,  friendly place,  breakfast very basic. But you wouldn't book this place for its breakfast,  it's the location, which is great, buses right outside, the hotel. You can walk to Disney,  there is a supermarket, and takeaway 2 mins away a shopping centre nxt door.  I would defo stay again.  Swimming pool in middle of car park,  but my kids loved the idea.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in a very convenient spot as you say when visiting the Disneyland park. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is centrally located to Disneyland and the Gardenwalk which has many restaurants. We didn't get in our car from the time we checked in until we checked out, everything we needed was within walking distance. It's about a 15-20 minute walk to the security line of Disneyland. I was leary of Super 8 not being very nice or clean, this hotel exceeded my expectations! We basically were just there to sleep, didn't even use the pool area. The breakfast is as advertised. I wouldn't hesitate staying here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so excited that you found us to be just what you needed. We are so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park as you say. It is such a pleasure to know our guest's had such a good experience. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: While on a family trip to Disneyland we had a poor experience at a different hotel. Last minute i stoped by and spoke with Ana.  She did so great helping us out.  Was able to get a great deal with Ana. She understood the situation we were in and was able to make a bad day in to a good one. Without her we might have still been looking for a hotel for several hours, which she was able to reduce to a matter of minutes.  Without her, this trip would have been miserable. My family is so grateful to Ana and her professionalism and courtesy.  Definitely will be coming back!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a good experience when staying with us. We cant wait till you visit us again!

Summary Heading: The hotel was clean and close to Disney and restaurants...
Summary: The hotel was clean and close to Disney and restaurants. The breakfast room is a little small and they need more items/ hot food. The room had a fridge but no microwave you had to rent one for $5 a day. I only had one thing to heat up during the 8 night stay and asked the front desk to use  The microwave in the breakfast room they said they didn't have access to the breakfast room. Nor was there a microwave in the lobby to use. They could also provide a free shuttle to Disney as for little ones after a long day there it a lot of walking. The check in was easy and fast. We had a great trip .
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay with us. We are so close to the Disneyland park, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so handy when visiting the Disneyland park. We do have microwaves available for   a small fee if you wish to rent one and  you can use it in the convenience of your room. We do hope to see you return soon.

Summary: This is a very average motel with a breakfast that needs is a lot of work.  The room is too small and there are very few choices for food.  Only fruit was cut up oranges, no protein opinion -not even peanut butter.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do have a complimentary breakfast served daily from 6 am to 9 am. Our breakfast includes fresh fruit, yogurt, fresh baked waffles with syrup, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of juice, hot chocolate, hot tea, and coffee. We are sorry to hear you did not find this adequate. Most of our guest's find our breakfast a great way to start the day. We do have additional seating for breakfast on our sundeck which is a great place to enjoy your breakfast. We do hope to see you back soon.

Summary: This is our second stay at the Super 8 near Anaheim and we brought a group this time :) It always feels like you have a lot of space at the Super 8. We found the rooms big and their was room at the pool and spa each night/morning. The included breakfast is busy but is always a plus. There is decent choice of channels on the TV (for those in-between Disney days where you are resting the legs)   It is a decent walk to Disney 10/15mins to the actual inside gates I would say but again for the price it is worth it if you are on a budget (you can always take the ART bus). The staff are helpful and there were always clean towels and the maintenance staff are friendly. It is close to the CVS and Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gumps and 7/11. We caught the bus to the packing district and
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear from repeat guest's!  it is wonderful you brought the whole group this time around. We are so looking forward to your return.

Summary: I would recommend this hotel. The staff were pleasant and took care of any of my concerns and questions. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We are so excited to have you return.

Summary: The hotel room was quiet and had new flooring (a big improvement from the green carpet I could see in the other rooms).  It was clean and located fairly close to corner convenience stores, Subway, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our improvements and upgrades to your liking. We are in a great location, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Was a average hotel, you should stay here if you are on a budget. There were 2 roaches in the bathroom on the first day we stayed!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear we fit so well into your budget. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may ave experienced during your stay. We do have  great maintenance staff who are here to assist if needed. We hope that you decide to stay with us again.

Summary: The room we had on the first floor of the main building was decent, I would have preferred to have been towards the back of the property with less street noise and people walking back and forth.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. it is great to hear we fit so well into your budget! Just request the back of the property when checking in and we will be more than happy to assist in making you more comfortable. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Any travelling family will tell you the two necessities: Pool and onsite laundry. Change readily available from the reception. Pool and spa (jacuzzi) were a god send. ART bus right out the front to take you to Disneyland (yep it's a close walk but after walking for 16 hours the bus is bliss!). Breakfast was okay - cereal, muffins, oranges, waffles. Location was perfect as right next door is Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gumps and a few other stores and restaurants. Rooms were clean. Only downside was the size of the bathroom and the location of the toilet.. had to sit almost side ways.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient and you had a great stay. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Trip to Disneyland Super 8 /near Main Gate.
Summary: We were very pleased with this Super 8  Motel. It is near Disneyland  but to say 'near main gate' is a little confusing. The motel in not that near to the 'main gate' and for some people ,the walk just to  get to Disneyland may be a little too much for families with small children.  Super 8 offers a nice size room with FREE parking and a very good selection for foods for their complimentary breakfast! That is a big plus for families! We would stay there again!  :-)  :-)   Thank You!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. WE are glad that you had a nice visit with us when going to the Disneyland park. We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: The hotel has a good location and that is the best thing going for it. The bed was super firm so be careful and dont jump and flop on it all happy you made it to the hotel or you might hurt yourself. the traffic noise at night is loud so bring something for back ground noise or ear plugs.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is terrific that you found us to be so budget friendly. We do apologize if you found it to be noisy outside. We will always do our very best to make sure you sleep well when staying with us, just let the 24 hour front desk know if there is any way they can assist. We are hoping to see you return soon.

Summary: Our stay was very pleasant, the room was super clean and the staff friendly and helpful, I recommend this establishment to anyone visiting the area.  Great times. thanks for everything  Sincerely.  Daniel
Manager Response: Thank you so much Daniel for the review. It is wonderful you had such a pleasant stay and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. It is so wonderful to hear you will be recommending us! We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We had a great time staying at the motel we didn't have any problems. The house keepers were great. we liked that they had washers and dryers. We will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so good to hear you had a great stay. We are even more excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: All staff ready and fully ready to assist in any way possible. Breakfast crew is great and. Wey attentive with all guest no matter the age. Rooms are super clean and newly remodeled. I would not hesitate to return for another full week or recommend to any one looking for a great stay near Disney.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so exciting to hear you found the perfect place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park. We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: The room were perfect size, clean and only a 10 min walk to Disneys gate. The hotel is changing its name to "KINGS INN ANAHEIM" by 2017 September. I would definitely come back. CVS, 7-11 and lots of restaurants within walking distance. Breakfast is included and they serve hot food and cold. Lots of fresh fruit. Staff keep up on the food and never runs out. They make and serve waffles which is a treat. Because of Disney I never used the pool but looked nice. Laundry is available and across from the pool, so convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in the perfect location as you say as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: The accommodations at this Super 8 were surprisingly nice for the price, and it's right outside Disneyland. A definite value for anyone's stay. The staff was friendly and the room extremely clean.  The grounds were also well maintained and the location is perfect for an Anaheim stay
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. it is wonderful to hear you had such a great stay. We are thankful that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Room waa great, amazing customer service, pool was fabulous, parking was a breeze and just a 10min walk from Disany Land
Summary: The customer service was amazing so very helpful you can purchase shuttle passes at the front office if you wanted to in the shuttles right outside the hotel parking was really great we got a spot right in front of our room even if we left maid service was great we were lucky to have an ice machine right outside our door which was handy and fantastic the free breakfast was pretty good not too shabby considering it being free and the best part was the beds were so comfortable.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is such a delight to hear you had such an amazing stay and you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. W are so excited for your return!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay in Super 8 hotel. Good size and clean room. Nice and decent place and very comfortable. The staff are very helpful and accommodating. It has free breakfast and internet access is fast. Close to Disneyland and California Adventures which is about 5-10 minutes walk from the hotel. Thank you for the wonderful service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful that you found that happy get away when staying with us. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say, its just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: The staff was very friendly and the facility was clean and tidy. It's within walking distance to Disney land and has a lot of parking. They allowed my friend to park there no charge as well.  I will absolutely  be staying here again! :)
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and even more excited to hear you will be back!

Summary Heading: Nice Motel, quiete room away from the street. The...
Summary: Nice Motel, quiete room away from the street. The breakfastroom was too small for such a lot people.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you found your accommodations to be so quiet and enjoyable. We do have additional seating on our sun deck, which is a great place to enjoy a relaxing breakfast. We hope to see you back soon

Summary: Clean and tidy. Quite a long way from front gate as advertised, thank god for buses! Breakfasts were just all carbohydrates and sugars.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you found your accommodations to be so clean and tidy. We are a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. We are just a block and a half from the entrance to the park. We do have a complimentary breakfast that includes fresh fruit, yogurt, waffles with syrup, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea and coffee. We are sorry to hear you did not find this satisfactory. We do hope to see you return.

Summary: Great place to stay and very affordable. We were very pleased with our stay. Nice rooms, very clean and cozy! Would definitely stay again if we are in the area. The staff was very accomodating and friendly. We didn't expect the breakfast to be an actual breakfast with more than a couple of options as well. Gteat location as well...within about 10 minutes walk of the convention center and disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so glad to hear you will be back!

Summary: Close to resort, CLEAN, friendly, pool, free breakfast, free wifi and CLEAN. Also laundry room!
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. we are happy that you found staying with us was so perfect. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here as a family with 2 adults and 2 kids (9 and 2).  Very affordable rate (especially since we booked a week beforehand).  The beds were very comfy, the room has a mostly updated look to it (minus the bathroom), it's spacious enough with a good-sized fridge and the location is conveniently close to Disneyland (a 10 minute walk), which we loved!  The beds were made every day and items like towels and toilet paper were restocked well.  We didn't use the pool since it wasn't super hot, but it's quite small, which may or may not matter depending on how much pool time you want during your stay.  The breakfast is quite minimal but does the trick with cereal, coffee, juice, waffles, cinnamon roll things, and milk, but no fresh fruit or protein like eggs or
Manager Response: thank you for the review. I am so happy to hear you found us to be such an affordable place to stay. We are excited to see you return.

Summary: Left a bag , but its now in the mail. Motel is in the midst of renovating rooms , bright and clean, staf f is friendly.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I do not classify white bread and orange slices as a continental breakfast.  If you have more than 4 people in your serving room it's too crowded.  Come on. You already know this.  Gut it and redo lobby with a nice spacious/modern lounge and eating area.  What's the problem?  Your making tons of cash on a facility so old it probably saw the first ever sunrise.  Your staff, for the most part, are great and loyal.  Fake wood floors with dust bunnies under the beds.  Wifi slow.  Tear it down and rebuild it all.  Great locations deserve great facilities.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We do have a complimentary breakfast served daily from 6 am to 9 am. Our breakfast does include toast with jam, fresh fruit, yogurt, 2 kinds of juice, freshly baked waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, hot tea, hot cocoa, and coffee. We do apologize if you did not find this to be an adequate breakfast. Most of our guest's find it a great way to start the day. Our breakfast room can be very popular as well. We do have additional seating on our sundeck, Which is a great place to enjoy a relaxing breakfast. We do hope to see you return.

Summary: Stayed here going to Disneyland. Comfy beds and pillows, plenty of towels, and VERY CLEAN. Only thing to note was there was only a shower. No bath for little kids.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. we are so happy you had a great stay! We do have some rooms with a shower only, some of the rooms do have a tub and shower, just request that upon check in and we are more than happy to make sure you have a tub. We look forward to seeing you back soon.

Summary: I saw that they are changing their name which is an awful choice for those of us that have been there more than once and might not be able to find it, but maybe it will help them in the long run.... who knows.   I stumbled across this gem of a motel 7 years ago, and it was awesome then, so when I headed back to Disney Land I remembered it, and it was every bit as great as I remembered.   Put simply it's outstanding value.... clean, awesome staff, great location... Just fantastic and a great price.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. we are so happy to hear you had such a great stay with us and we want to thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. We are looking forward to seeing you back soon.

Summary: Room was okay, clean restroom, might need to change the shower curtain, doesn't really help, after the 1st person goes to shower, floor outside the curtains is wet. Breakfast was just cereal,coffee, juice, waffles, toast, and fresh orange.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are happy to hear you found your room to be so clean. we are sorry to hear that you had an issue with your shower curtain during your stay. We do have a 24 hour front desk available, just let us know so we can help make you more comfortable during your stay. We do have a great breakfast including freshly made waffles with syrup, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal, hot oatmeal, yogurt, fresh fruit, cinnamon rolls, milk, 2 kinds of juice, hot tea, hot cocoa, as well as coffee. This complimentary breakfast is served from 6 am to 9 am every day. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary: It was a cool hotel, convenient and good for the price. I would recommend this hotel. The room was nice and clean I like the wood floors.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found your accommodations to be so comfortable. we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The hotel was clean and spacious. The only complaint was the bath tub did not drain properly. Very convienent to walk to Downtown Disney and Anaheim Garden walk.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We do apologize if the tub did not drain well. We do have a 24 hour front desk, and we are more than happy to make your stay a trouble free one. Please let us know in the future. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Over all very good experience. First night we were woken by a herd of stampeding buffalos in the unit above us, ( i.e. children running and jumping) beginning at 5:00 am. The motel staff quickly moved us to better/quiet unit. They were also very accommodating in that they refunded a Disney two day park hopper ticket after my wife detemined that she didn't want to go. This was despite the fact that they normally do not issure refunds.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great experience and our staff was able to make that happen for you. We are so excited to see you back in the future.

Summary: Staff was friendly, room was clean, and breakfast was better than most continental breakfast I've had. Location was in walking distance to Disneyland.  I'm picky so I give this a great rating.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great experience staying with us. We want to thank you for the compliments to our staff and do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: Great place to stay if you are going to Disneyland.  Takes about 15 minutes to walk to the entrance to the park.  There is also a very close ART shuttle stop to get a quick ride to the park and many other locations.  The rooms are decent and the one I was in seemed to have been recently remodelled.  Nice hot tub and pool on site.  Pool ranges from 3.5 to 8.5 feet in depth and appears to be a salt water pool as opposed to a chlorine based pool.  They do offer Continental breakfast but it seemed to be lacking.  The options were limited to waffles, cereal, fruit, toast.  Would have been better to have some sort of significant protein option like egg or a breakfast meat this not giving a 5.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as you say, making it so convenient. We do hope to have you stay with us in the future.

Summary: We like this hotel because the ART bus has a pick up and drop off right outside.  This is great for the marathon runners.  The Super 8 staff have always been so helpful and accommodating.  In September they will become the Knight Inn.  I hope the quality stays.  This has been the best kept secret.
Manager Response: We thank you for the review. We are so happy you decided to stay with us when attending the Disneyland marathon. we are excited to see you back soon!

Summary: The room was comfy, not too modern, but for what we used it for it was good. We spent the whole day at Disneyland and because this Hotel is only 5 blocks from the entrance we saved 20 bucks on parking.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance of the park. Just a block and a half from here. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We stayed many times at this hotel, it's nice, great warmed swimming pool and hot spa, walkable to Disneyland!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so great to hear from repeat guest's! We look forward to another visit!

Summary: First this hotel itself wasn't all that bad, the breakfast was a joke though, nothing good to eat at the free breakfast. Second the hotel was a bit of a walk to the Disneyland parks. Third there is no elevator to the second floor rooms so if you have a stroller it is very difficult to bring it to your room. We had to unload the stroller every night and put it in the car, carrying the kids and items we had stored in it up the stairs and to the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you had a pretty good stay. We do have fresh waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cereal with milk, hot oatmeal., toast with jam, cinnamon rolls yogurt, fresh fruit, 2 kinds of juice, hot tea, hot cocoa, coffee as well. We are sorry to hear you did not find this to be an adequate breakfast. For most of our guest's they do find it a great way to start the day. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. For those who do not wish to walk the ART shuttle does pick up right in front of the motel and runs every 20 minutes. We would be more than happy to locate you to a lower floor for your next visit. Just request it when making the reservation. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We had a window of opportunity to stay one night after coming off a cruise. We found reception staff accommodating making available a room late morning, we were able to drop our bags and make the 30 minute walk over to Disneyland to make the most of the day and evening.    The room was clean, tidy, comfortable and modern.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so handy when visiting the Disneyland park. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon

Summary: from las vegas. my mother and niece came to visit so we decided to come to cali and go to Disney. wonderful hotel perfect location and GREAT price. only iffy on the breakfast, kinda short and would have liked hot idem choses.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found we fit so well into your budge. We look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Clean rooms, nice staff. We stayed for seven nights. We only used housekeeping once, in the middle. Housekeeping could have been more generous with towels and coffee ( like I said we only have the room cleaned once) but front desk was accommodating as long as it is before 11.. easy walk to Disney from the hotel. My wife me and boys all enjoyed it. I like the fact that I could load up on breakfast and bring it back to our hotel room while we were getting ready for the day. Definitely better than the Quality Inn on Manchester that we've stayed in before. We will definitely stay at the Super 8 again on Katella next time we are at Disneyland Resort. As you would with ANY older Hotel, just make sure you inspect your room for bed bugs.. We did NOT find any AT the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay and even more happy to hear you will be returning! We are also happy to know we fit so well into your budget and that you found our location to be so convenient. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We like the hotel it is clean and the rooms are nice. The bed is comfortable. The breakfast is good, wish there was some meat available. This time our room was above the office and there was a vibrating hum we could not figure out. We are staying there again.The staff is always friendly.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. As always, we are delighted to hear you had such a great stay and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nice, quiet and clean place. Many families with children, close to Disneyland. I can only recommend this place for your holiday.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and  we are looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Don't get a room by the parking garage
Summary: We saw this affordable hotel with a high review rating and tried it. The first night was horrific. There is a parking garage next door and the walls are paper thin. We couldn't sleep forever. Once we moved to the other side of the hotel, it was much better. I am surprised this hotel has such high ratings. The beds aren't good. But it is cheap. So I would say it's an average cheap hotel near Disneyland. But not much more than that. Don't be deceived with the high rating, it's not a stellar property. But if you go into it thinking a cheap hotel with a good location, you will be fine
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that we were able to relocate you to a more comfortable location. It is surprising you did not find the bed comfortable as we have put all new beds into our rooms. If it is possible please give us a call and let us know which room you were in so we can see if it was possible that there was a defect in the new mattress. It is good to hear you found the location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do hope that you will decide to return.

Summary: The pictures in the site look absolutely nothing like the room I was given, I would have never ever ever stayed here knowing what the room really looked like. There's no tub, just a shower head and tile floor with a disgusting plastic curtain. The bath fixture literally hung off the wall so bad you could see the separation between the fixtures and the walls. Staff was totally rude, their refrigeratorsite in the rooms are right next to the bed like a nightstand aND it's so loud you can't sleep. I would never stay here again or recommend anyone else to do so. Gross, gross gross. Spend another $40 and don't ruin your vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE are so sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations. We do have tub shower units in most of our rooms. We also have a shower in all of the others. It does sound as if you booked a handicap room which would allow a wheel chair to access the shower, thus the tile floor. You do state our staff was rude, although you do not specify in what way or what happened. So I am unable to address this, although I can tell you we do strive to provide the very best customer service to all of our guests. We do hope  to see you back in the future.

Summary: We stayed at the Super 8 Anaheim for three nights in May 2017. This hotel is only a 10 minute walk from Disney Land. Hotel rooms were clean and adequate Breakfast was basic but quiet OK the only problem  had was all breakfast plates cups cutlery  plastic disposable a terrible waste
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance as you as you say. We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do have disposable utensils and table ware so our guest's can have the convenience of taking breakfast to their rooms. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Have stayed here previously and the motel is clean, well-kept and a reasonable price near Disneyland. Parking is limited so get there before 6 PM or you'll need to contact the office to find available space during busy times. Also, it'll take 20 minutes to the Downtown Disney security entrance or 10-15 minutes to Mickey and Friends tram ride near the parking complex.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear that you found our location to be so convenient We are a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable.  we received wonderful customer service as well. Our ac quit working and maintenance arrived to fix it in minutes. The location is great and very close to disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such and awesome stay and you found our service to be so great. We do look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Loved our stay. Staff are very helpful and accommodating. Lovely selection of breakfast items.
Summary: Only wished we booked earlier. We needed a room for three nights but the third night was not available due to a prior booking. We had Wednesday and Thursday night but was not available on the Friday night. Will definitely book further ahead in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you loved your stay and that you found our staff to be so helpful and accommodating. We are excited to hear you will be booking with us again!

Summary: Returned from last year which was a good experience. Unfortunately this time it wasnt as great. Rigo, front desk attendant, was rude from the start, not attentive to any of the guests entering. Our room keys did not work and asled to get them replace. The replacement cards didnt work as well and when my cousin who was in the second room went to change it thay took the key and said he couldnt get any back. The female desk attendants were nice, unlike the ladies in the breakfast room.  Overall, that might be our last visit to Super 8. I hope for future guest they receive a better hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so sorry if you had a bad experience this time around. It is always our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We are so disappointed that this was not the case. We assure you we will follow up with our desk clerk, and are happy to hear that you did find the female desk clerks to be so friendly. We do hope that you will decide to give us another chance and come visit us again.

Summary: Housekeeping was great!  Wish there were microwaves. Great location and price! Staff was nice Continental breakfast was not great but it was a nice option.  The ladis who ran it were great customer service providers.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found us to be such a great place to stay with your family. We do have microwaves available upon request. Please check with the front desk next time you are here with us!

Summary: Remodeled rooms were decorated nicely. Every person we encountered was nice and always smile.  Pool area was really nice as well. Front desk attendants were very resourceful. They gave easy directions to the post office.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. We are happy to hear you had a great stay and that you will be back.

Summary: It was alright. Really didn't interact with the workers or anything like that. Estimate walk to Disneyland was 20 minutes, few steps to near by shops and restaurants. Parking was great! Room was cozy for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a good stay and you found your room so cozy. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary: Everything was great, value, cleanliness, accessibility.....except there was a group of very loud guests standing right out side our door, smoking and trying to out talk each other, louder and louder for hours when we were trying to sleep.
Manager Response: we want to thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you thought everything was great. We do have a 24 hour front desk staff, please do not hesitate to contact us so we can assist at any time. We hope to see you back soon

Summary: We booked two separate rooms by accident but Kevin was able to fix that for us no problem. The room was clean as always not our first stay here. Location is nice just a bit of a walk to Disney. So the last walk back to room seems forever but it's actually not as bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that Kevin was able to assist in making your trip so trouble free. We are glad you had a great stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good Value Hotel for a Disney Trip!
Summary: I stayed here with 2 of my girlfriends for a quick Disney trip and a business meeting. It was clean and comfortable, and the breakfast was good! Breakfast was served until 9 and consisted of waffles, toast, cereal, fruit, and a few other things. The staff was really nice and helpful. The previous year I stayed at the America's Best next door and I have to say that this hotel is nicer than that one. The rooms are a little small and there is no bath tub (just a shower), but there is a mini fridge and the beds are pretty comfortable. It is a decent walk to the parks, I think this is the farthest I would personally choose to stay form the parks. I would say that it is a nice and clean version of what you would expect to get for the cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you found us to be such a great value. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed at this Hotel for 12 nights and really enjoyed it. The room was large, comfortable and clean. The beds were comfy and we really felt at home. The staff were friendly and helpful. The Hotel is just around the corner from Disneyland and we also had an ART bus stop right outside the Hotel which was great because my daughter has a slight disability and it was much easier to jump on the bus than walk. Thanks Super 8.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that you found our staff so friendly and helpful and you enjoyed your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you next time you are in Anahiem

Summary: Yes we did have an excellent stay in this hotel, room is big and the beds are comfortable, there‚Äôs a swimming pool and lots of kids are enjoying to playing inside. Totally our experience here are very good, it‚Äôs close to the main area of Disneyland park, from a short distance we can find the area of restaurant and shops so it‚Äôs quite easy for us to find something to buy, eat and drink. Definitely I will recommend this hotel for family travelers in the future, if they wanna find a place with price reasonable, big parking area, quality/big room and close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such  a great experience when staying with us. we are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Clean and comfortable.  Not fancy, but an excellent choice for the budget minded park goer.  The staff were friendly and very helpful.  Super 8 will definitely be my first choice for my next Disneyland visit.  Comfortable walking distance for most people, and the front desk was great in assisting with my mobility scooter rental.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you had such a great time and we fit so well into your budget. We want to thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy that you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay.

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, clean rooms, good breakfast included
