Summary: We stayed here twice on one trip, first for 5 nights and returned for 3 nights. Within walking distance of Disneyland and very convenient for restaurants close by. Our room was on the ground floor and had parking directly outside. The room had recently been renovated and was comfortable for me, my wife and 2 children. Shower was good, tv with lots of channels and fridge.  Nicely decorated with wood style flooring and very clean. The pool was near our room and again was very clean and we enjoyed several trips to it.  Hot tub great and towels provided in reception. The breakfast was better than expected and had a variety of everything.  Cereal, waffles, cinnamon rolls, fruit, yoghurt and toast. Coffee was really good and also available in reception. The staff were very friendly
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review.  We are delighted to hear you found our staff so friendly and helpful and you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is a great way to start the day. We have upgraded our rooms with wood style flooring and new tile in the bathrooms. This does add a nice touch. We are happy that you found us to be such a great value that you will be returning.

Summary: Motel is about 10min walk from Disneyland. The staff and friendly and helpful. Room was more than adequate with 2 queen beds, fridge, coffee and functional bathroom. price was also good. Only Cons are: do get a bit of noise from neighbouring rooms and breakfast room is quite small.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to know you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. It is also wonderful to know you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are so looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The room was very clean , and the personnel was very courteous . location its great near disneyland just about 10 minutes walk .
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you had such a great experience and you found our staff so friendly and helpful. We are located so close to the Disneyland park. It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, close to Disney, free parking and breakfast!
Summary: No frills, clean, friendly, would definitely stay again next Disney trip!  Bring fruit and protein to supplement the free breakfast but the kids loved the waffles.  We didn't use the pool but it also looked clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay and that you will be returning! We are looking forward to it.

Summary Heading: Spend the extra money and stay at a better place.
Summary: Booked this room for a family trip to Disneyland. The rooms are to small!! We were given a room that had an old carpet that smelled like urine. We stepped out to eat dinner we entered the room and it smelled like marijuana and urine. I immediately called the front desk. They told me they had no other room and to return at 6am the next day which I did and we were given another room. The next issue with the new room was the ac not working, again I called and they immediately came over and replaced the ac. Overall the staff was great but the hotel can use an overhaul. Note!! If you have more then 2 guest spend the money for a suite.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are surprised to hear that you had old carpeting as we are upgrading all of our rooms. We are sorry if we could not move you right away, but are happy to hear that our front desk personnel was able to assist. it is good to hear you had a good experience with our staff and they were able to fix the AC right away. We do apologize for any inconvenience and we do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Staff were rude while trying to checkin. Hotel was booked in my wife's name. Even though both names were on my insurance card they still wouldn't allow. Took 2 hours to get a hold of my wife have her change the reservation and then get the hotel to accept it. Now double charged. Once in wife's name once I mine.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do remember when you came to check in you had a reservation that was booked under your wife's name and you were not listed on the reservation. Unfortunately, you also booked through a 3rd party, so we were unable to just change the reservation, and we had to wait until your wife straightened it out with the company she booked with. Because your wife was not here we could not check you in to a room with out you being on the reservation. We do apologize for that. The credit card that was provided to hold the room was your wife's as well, and again, as you did not have the credit card, and she was not here to provide it, we could not use the credit card that was originally authorized to hold the room. We did advise you we would release the pending authorization and would happily take your credit card for payment once you were added to the reservation. We did so and did advise that you would see activity on the original credit card, but it was only and authorization, which we did release upon you checking  in. So you were not double charged. Unfortunately, due to credit card and identity fraud, as well as privacy laws both 3rd party and our local reservation desk does require that there is a proper government issued ID  to check into the room under the individual who is present and  checking in. This is for your own protection as well as the business. We do apologize if you experienced any inconvenience and would hope to see you in the future.

Summary Heading: multiple hotels within a few mile radius with the same name
Summary: Be sure to arrive at the correct hotel prior to releasing your driver, a cab or taxi will be willing to take you to the correct hotel that is only 5 miles or so away but it will cost you an additional fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true there are 2 Super 8 motels in the Disneyland area. We are the one  that is the closest to the Disneyland park entrance. We are just a 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We hope to see you again next time you are in the Disneyland area.

Summary: This is a great place to stay for you Disney travelers. Not too close but not too far to walk. Breakfast is always good and the rooms are very clean. We will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be back! We look forward to it!

Summary: We had a wonderful experience at the Super 8.  The outside of the buildings are nothing special to look at, but to me that is not important.  The things that are important (cleanliness, friendliness of staff, location) were all super!  The rooms were clean and I loved that there is no carpet!  The pool was great for the kids and did the job of letting them swim for a couple of hours and was clean.  The staff was friendly.  The walking distance to Disneyland was great and the free parking at the hotel was an added bonus.  The breakfast room did the job and we loved that not only were there four waffle machines, but also a worker constantly making the waffles for you.  Thank you so much and we do plan to stay here for our next Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so terrific  you decided to stay with us for your birthday celebration. We loved to hear you found our new rooms with out the carpeting to be such a plus. We have recently upgraded our rooms including the new flooring. Next time you visit, you will see some more changes and improvements that we believe will surprise and delight you. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Was average overall, but location to Disneyland was great. Breakfast was okay, just too small of a space to crowd everyone in to an extremely compact area. Would recommend walking to someplace close by and spending a few dollars for breakfast. Overall service and accommodations were good. For one night, not a very good value, other than excellent location to attractions near by.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. It is so good to hear you found us to be so conveniently located and you thought we were such a good value. We are glad you found our overall service to be exceptional as well. We are hoping to see you again next time you were in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: I WILL NOT come back here!
Summary: My wife and I checked in April 2017. We liked how the Hotel was close to Disneyland and Gardenwalk. However, right after checking in, we walked into our room and the first thing we see is a cockroach! We right away called the Front desk and they explained that it may have been a sewer roach. We decided to have them look around before we had to pack up all of our stuff to move into in another room. There was no sign of insects anywhere else in the room so we decided to give it a shot because the room they suggested was a lot further than where we were assigned. Unfortunately, the following morning, I found another roach in the restroom. I called the front desk and told them that I was unhappy and I would like to check out. We were about to book another hotel but were unable to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am so happy to hear that we were able to move you to a room and you had a good stay after that. I do apologize for the issue you had in the first place, and I am glad to hear that the GM refunded you and thus easing the frustration you experienced. We do have a great maintenance staff as you say, and they do a great job at preventing cases such as this. We are sorry that this was an unhappy experience for you and we do hope to see you return in the future.

Summary Heading: Not Bad, but uncomfortable beds, and loud A/C
Summary: This Hotel really wasn't that bad. My major issues were that the bed wasn't comfortable at all. Also the A/C was really loud and the curtains let in too much light making it hard to sleep. The hotel did have excellent front counter staff who were polite and friendly and it is right next to the shuttle stop.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so wonderful to hear they provided you with such friendly and helpful service. We have all new beds in our rooms, so we are unclear as to why it was uncomfortable. If you have a chance,  maybe you could give us a call or email us to let us know which room you were in so we can follow up on it. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Close Enough to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here while we used our 5 day passes for Disneyland. It was clean, had good breakfast....yogurt, cereal, waffles, cinnamon rolls, juice, toast. Swimming pool and hot tub. We walked back and forth and the grandkids are 5 and 6. It's about an 8 minute walk. Only 2 stories and lots of parking. Price was right for 7 nights. I booked way ahead and got a deal for non refundable booking on booking.com. You can see fireworks on a patio above the office. Clean, pretty quiet and right next door to Anaheim walk with Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake Factory, and some really good chain restaurants. Would stay here again. I actually have stayed here 5 years ago. Great value!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient when staying with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We have stayed here twice when going to Angels baseball games.  They rooms are very clean & the staff is always super friendly and helpful.  We will definitely be staying here when we need a hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We are happy to hear we fit so well into your budget. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Excellent room and very comfortable.  staff was helpful and courteous and my grandson loved the waffles. The pool was great for the kids when our Disneyland breaks occurred. I would definitely stay here again and.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and even happier to hear that you will be returning!

Summary: My wife and her daughter stayed at this hotel to celebrate my wifes 60th birthday. The hotel was maintained in an immaculate condition. Staff were attentive to detail yet were completely unobtrusive. Whenever my wife returned to her room she found it tidy and organised. A complimentary continental breakfast was provided which was more than adequate. In summary, my wife said that she would have nothing but pleasant memories of her stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had such a great experience when staying with us and you will be back! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: If you ever worried that you didn't have enough outlets to charge your various gadgets, you need not worry here. Power outlets galore along with USB outlets. A/C works nicely. Bathroom is small but functional. There's a pool...didn't use it tho. Breakfast was ok - they had juice but no cold water (weird hey?)  Decent location. If you need any snacks or drinks walk just down from the hotel to the corner of Harbour and Katella. You'll find a CVS, Walgreens, 7-11, Subway and a liquor store.   Easy to get to Disney. We walked most days.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location so convenient and we fit into you budget.

Summary: My family and I went on vacay and we were on a budget and decided to stay at the knights inn and after that horrible experience we said we were never going anywhere except our usual when we go down to Anaheim. This super 8 is our usual and as before I am never disappointed! The staff is amazing! The rooms were the best! BEST HOTEL and best price range!
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value.  We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient. We are excited to hear you had such a great stay and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My son and I stayed here while visiting Disneyland and California Adventure.  We were immediately greeted by a friendly office employee who quickly checked us in.  The entrance to Disney was a pleasant 13 minute walk. Our room was clean and upon return after a long day, our room was cleaned and even smelled lemony!  The  pool, hot tub, breakfast room, and entire property were well maintained.  Entire staff was friendly.  I highly recommend the Anaheim Super 8  on Katella Avenue.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a wonderful experience. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Very nice short stay to eliminate the need to drive twice...
Summary: Very nice short stay to eliminate the need to drive twice in one day. Loved the hot tub. Was sad that the ice cream vending machine was out of service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We do apologize about the vending machine, we have contacted the vendor and it is has been serviced. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Nice place, free breakfast (waffles are delicious!), short walk to the parks, bus top right outside but we never had any luck catching the bus so we ended up walking.  Plenty of parking.  Unfortunately neighbors were obnoxiously loud, but that's not the hotels fault.   Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are happy to hear you had a good stay and you loved our complimentary breakfast. We do apologize if your neighbors were loud, we do have a 24 hour front desk if it happens in the future please let us know. We are so excited to hear you will be back

Summary Heading: Great value. A short walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Loved our stay here. Can walk to Disneyland. Clean rooms with fridge, hairdryer, tv, wifi, air con and comfortable bed. Breakfast included and had everything we wanted. Waffles, toast, cereal, orange juice, coffee, fruit etc.  Visited the pool a few times, good size, plenty loungers and hot tub great. Friendly staff especially girl in reception and lady who made waffles in the morning. Take a tray to carry your breakfast to roof or pool area if you can, helped us a lot and saved a few trips. ideal place for couples or families.  Would recommend anyone to stay. Very good value.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value.  We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient.

Summary: The Super 8 is a great location! It is affordable, clean, and the bed was very comfortable. The breakfasts are simple but good. The location is perfect, walking distance to Disney and many restaurants in the area to choose from.   My only complaint is that the AC unit in my room smelled a little musty when I ran it. Luckily the weather was cool enough I did not need to have it on a lot. Other than that everything was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a good stay and you found our beds so comfy! We have recently upgraded all of our rooms with new beds as well as other furnishings. We are so convenient as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance.

Summary Heading: Excellent value, very clean, fantastic staff and great breakfast included
Summary: We stayed twice during our holiday for a total of 8 nights. We have stayed here every year for 6 years, often multiple times.This is a gem of a hotel which I recommend highly. The rooms are very clean and have everything you need for your stay. The beds are very comfortable and showers powerful. There is a fridge and good size tv with lots of good channels and on screen guide. Air con is good and you can keep it on when at the pool (often air con goes off when you leave the room in other hotels). Coffee making facilities in room and vending machines close by. It has free wifi across the property. We stayed in an upstairs room overlooking the pool and heard no noise. The rooms have been updated in recent years and are of a high standard. They are excellent value for money. The
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value.  We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient.

Summary Heading: Great motel near Disneyland for the price
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights visiting Disneyland. We stayed on the second floor at the back of the property. The room looked rerenovated recently with new carpet, furnitures and bathroom. The room looked very clean. The housekeeping did a good job everyday. Breakfast is served until 9am and there were only bakery items, waffles, cereal‚Äã, coffee and juice. There was no meat and eggs. It is a 15-20 min walk to the Disneyland front gate... So it does require some walking. The area looked very safe, no problem walking at night. Restaurants nearby open late. One side note, I think they are changing ownership, so if I remember correctly, the hotel name will be changed in Sept.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value.  We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient. We are also happy to know you enjoyed our breakfast!

Summary: Would definitely recommend to stay at this location, first time was very impressed. This location was extremely clean, the rooms were spacious. The staff was friendly and helpful. Even though carpets are clean they definitely need to be updated. I notice a few rooms that had been vacated, we're being cleaned  the staff had the room  beds flipped up vacuuming underneath the beds, they were thoroughly cleaning the rooms. I was very impressed on how they cleaned the room before renting it out again. Definitely will stay there again.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value.  We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient.

Summary: We stayed here based on potential distance (as viewed online) from the major theme park. I was not disappointed! This hotel was an easy 10-15 minute walk to the front gates of both parks, had sufficient restaurants and shopping close by. The rooms were clean and larger than expected. The bathroom shower could use some new higher pressure heads, and the shower didn't have proper venting so the steam makes everything damp, including the toilet paper. Overall had a great stay though!
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value.  We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient.

Summary: Very happy with the Super 8 Anaheim near Disneyland.  About a ten to fifteen minute walk to the park entrance but it's an easy walk with safe surroundings.  Food outlets nearby.  Easy parking, fantastic service from Ana.  Nice pool.  Comfy bed.  Quiet at night.  No complaints whatsoever.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you were so comfortable and you found us to be such a great value.  We are happy to know you found our location to be so convenient.

Summary: The room was larger than expected and very nice.  Breakfast was slim...no eggs, bacon or sausage. Overall it was a very nice stay and I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you had a great stay and you will be recommending us.

Summary: Space and convenient to our family condo near Disneyland. Enjoyed the stay, and pleasant staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you found your room so spacious and you had a good stay.

Summary Heading: Their Photos Are Well Taken, But Don't Show The True Motel
Summary: We had a three day stay booked at this Motel, but cancelled once we realised that the pictures online did not represent this property accurately at all.  Bedrooms are old.  People are sat around smoking all over the property, including near the pool, making it an unfriendly environment to stay with children.  The pool is located just off the main road, and smack bang in the centre of the car park. Every car coming or going at this busy motel MUST drive by the pool. There is a constant flow of traffic and exhaust fumes that surround the pool, which has no walls or shrubbery to protect it, just a little fence.  No idea how it has such good reviews?! Sure, it's not a dreadful standard for your typical Super8, but it's certainly not worth the 4 star rating it currently has on
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry to hear you did not like the location of our pool and hot tub. Most people enjoy the location as it is so close to the location of the rooms. We do have a lot of guest's reviews that are very positive and we assure you that we do our very best to exceed our guest's expectations. We are sorry to hear that this was not the case for you. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I booked this reservation on the super 8 website it said I booked for previous night which I did not resulting in me having to pay 2 nights to stay one
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize if you had an issue with booking on the super 8  national website. We did see that your reservation was booked for the previous day that you arrived at the motel. We did our very best and did manage to accommodate you providing you with a room. We would suggest that you contact customer care regarding your booking and the confusion on the dates. We again do apologize and hope to see you in the future.

Summary: We've been going down every three months for past couple years and was impressed at the value Super 8 offered. Walking distance to Disneyland, clean rooms, variety of amenities, and note the free parking just to name a few. Already have reservations for July. Thank you
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always so great to hear from repeat guests. It is so wonderful that you had a good stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning in July! We cant wait!

Summary: Good value, excellent customer service, and a great walk to Disneyland.  I would definitely stay again on a return trip to the happiest place on earth :)
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and even happier to hear you will be returning! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: On the phone I was told the my stay would be 99$, but when I got home I saw my bank was charged over 240. I called many times and they never get back to me. I talked to motel staff and corporate and my case is still open. They never call me and when I call they say their looking into it. This is very unprofessional. When your told it's going to be 99$ and then pay more then double. That is insane.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so sorry if there was any confusion regarding the rate that you agreed to pay when making the reservation. We have researched this and did not find a billing error. If there are questions regarding the rate that you agreed to, you should  contact customer care. We do hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Extremely noisy. Literally got no sleep in 3 days. Breakfast was a joke. It's in a tiny little room where you line up for your food which was terrible, ran out of coffee and so we didn't bother with breakfast at all on all 3 days. People had to take their food back to their rooms because their is no place to sit. Won't ever go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience with our complimentary breakfast. We do have additional seating for our breakfast on our sundeck, where many guest's enjoy their breakfast and morning coffee. We do apologize as well if you experienced noisy neighbors. We do have a 24 hour front desk, and would encourage you to give us a call if this is ever an issue so we can assist. We did not have any reports regarding extreme noise during your stay. Again we do apologize and would hope to see you in the future.

Summary: I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who wants a clean, no-frills place to stay that is close to all the attractions Anaheim has to offer.  This was my first stay here, but I will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you found us to be such a great value. We are even happier to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Hotel was within walking distance to Disneyland. Room was recently renovated and clean. However; the bed should have been replaced as we could feel the springs. It was quiet in the room we had. The breakfast was not to my liking, but there is a Denny's and IHop within walking distance and we were fine with that. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beds were super comfy and room was a typical motel room that you could park right out side of. We didn't like that house keeping turned the air off so it was stuffy when we returned to our room after the day at the theme parks. Also the coin laundry on site needed longer hours. Otherwise it meet our expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us We are happy to hear we met your expectations and are hoping to see you again soon

Summary: This motel worked well for my family of myself, husband, and 4 year old.  The walk to Disneyland was about 15 min. as we pushed her in the stroller.  The motel was clean and service was great!  When the housekeeping staff made our beds, they placed my daughter's stuffed toy nice & neat with it.  My daughter actually left it in the hotel the day we checked out on our way back to AZ.  I called and they are going to mail her toy back to us.  Thank you for the great service and making our trip to Disneyland easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are just a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance as you say making it to convenient when staying here. We are so happy to hear you feel you received to p notch service do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here in order to go to Disneyland.  I thought they had a shuttle, but it was a 20 minute walk on crazy busy highway to wait in line for a shuttle.    took me hour to get to park entrance and thats without little kids!  Tried to save money, but will go back to park vue  next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are just a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We do not have a shuttle, because we are just a block and a half from the front entrance of Disneyland. The Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle does pick up right out front of the motel for those who do wish to catch a shuttle to the park.  I am a little confused as to where you went to catch the shuttle, or if this review is for this location. I am sorry for any inconvenience, and do hope that you do decide to stay with us next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here during Spring Break 2017, with 2 kids. We got non-smoking double queen bed room for amazing price in this area. I really liked that room was spacious, bedsheets were super clean, good house keeping, mini refrigerator in the room (So I can save my leftover dinner :) ) . It's hardly 10 minutes walk to Disneyland. CVS, Subway, California pizza kitchen, Indian restaurant, Mediterranean food, so many shops so close by. Free Breakfast was also very nice, Bread, yogurt, cereal, juice, coffee, waffles,fruit, milk. Every morning we use to have good breakfast then leave for Disney. We would come back to this hotel again if we are coming back to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to have you stay with us during your spring break. We are delighted to hear we fit so well into your budget and are so excited to know you will be returning!

Summary: Overall everything was better than expected, I would come back again. I did have an issue when trying to get a roll away bed. I called the hotel to make reservations around 6pm. At the time of the reservation, I inquired about a roll away. I was not sure if I would need one so I told the lady that I would decide once we checked in. We didn't get to our room until after midnight, and we were very tired. I realized that we did end up meeding the roll away and I called the front desk to ask for one. Unfortunately, I was told that they don't give them out after 11pm! Apparantly, the manager with the key leaves at that time and the worker didn't have access to the room. That is fine, but nobody informed me of that when I inquired earlier in the day. The man working the desk made
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize for any confusion or misunderstanding regarding a rollaway. We usually do try to put one in if we know ahead of time that our guest is going to want one. Because it was unclear if you wanted one, unfortunately it was not put in your room prior to arrival. We again apologize for that. We are hoping to see you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here with friends for a Girls Disney Trip. The front desk workers were great and very helpful whenever we went in for anything. The rooms were clean and beds were comfy enough. Awesome location! Very easy walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in a great location as you say. We are just 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park. It is so wonderful to know we fit so well into your budget. We are hoping to see you again soon.

Summary: The two men at the desk were rude. They charged our credit card the first day at Check in for all six days. We asked if we could use the card for incadentals and pay cash we were told they don't deal in cash.we were told at the time of  booking three weeks earlier we could. We asked for two queen beds and a tub on ground floor at booking she said ok. We get there we were on second floor. I said.can we be on ground floor like I booked and he said fine then put us at  furthest point from the exit as he could in two doubles and a shower. Kevin and the guy who booked us in should not be working the desk. There are much friendlier hotels and better priced closer to the park
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize for any misunderstanding or inconvenience you my have experienced when checking in. It is standard procedure for us to authorize the credit card that has been used to guarantee the room prior to arrival for that day. We do accept cash, however, we also require a deposit of $100 if you do choose to pay cash. This is in addition to the room rent. We do have some rooms that do have a shower only. we do our very best to accommodate all request's, however there are times when this is not possible. we did move you to a lower floor where we did have a room available. We are a large property, some of the rooms are located towards the back. All of our rooms have queen size beds. We do not have any rooms with double beds. I do apologize if you found our desk clerks to be unfriendly. I assure you this has been addressed. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We are sorry to hear that this was not the case.  We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney parks, within walking distance, quick free breakfast in the mornings, clean rooms,
Summary: This was a great place to stay.  Easy walk to the park for the whole family.  Nice pool.  Pleasant staff.  Great quick breakfast in the morning, hot waffles!.  Clean comfortable rooms.  Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted that you had such a great stay and even more excited to hear you will be returning! We are so close to the Disneyland park entrance as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do have a great breakfast which does include those freshly baked waffles. They are delicious!

Summary: Their service was really good other thing is really close to Disneyland 10 minutes walking time. I really like that no parking problems.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so close to the Disneyland park entrance as you say making it so convenient getting to the park when staying with us. We are so happy that you had such an excellent stay and are looking forward to your return!

Summary: just walking distance from Disneyland, various restaurants, Walgreens and CVS, the location is very convenient especially we planned to stay until closing time at Disney.  the room was clean and the beds were comfortable, for me, my husband and two kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  It is so great to know you found our location to be so convenient and the room to be so clean. We are hoping to see you again in the future.

Summary: Clean rooms with free wi fi.  Friendly housekeeping.  Great breakfast-ready by 6 AM.  Front desk was warm, friendly and helpful.  Would highly recommend.  I hope nothing changes when they become the Kings Inn in September.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, and thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are changing to the Kings Inn in September. This is an exciting change as we are doing several upgrades to the property and will  have the great pleasure of providing better service to our guests. We are hoping to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice staff. We were able to check in super early and leave our car there while we walked over to Disneyland (15 min). Room was very clean. Breakfast was good.  The ladies in the breakfast room kept everything stocked and were very nice.  Definately staying again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had a great stay! We are so happy to know you will be returning!

Summary: This is probably the 5th time  we've stayed here.  This last spring break trip was exceptional. I requested for a bottom floor and it didn't disappoint.  The hotel got rid of their yucky green rugs and they upgraded the furniture.  The beds were always comfortable.  Only 4 stars because the AC cover was loose and was very very loud,  and while walking into the bathroom a piece of metal protruding from the bottom of the door frame cut my left foot. Although the floor is laminate now,  the floor collects a lot of dust and/or the maid mops with a dirty mop so our socks still got pretty gray (not black anymore) lol.  When returning back to our room I would go over the floor with sanitizing wipes. Overall we would stay here for all of our Disneyland trips.  It's a 10 minute walk to
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is always great to hear from repeat guests. It is great to know you had a great stay and you are enjoying our upgrades and improvements. We are looking forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel could/would not accommodate early check in. Even though the room was pre-paid, we ended up not staying there.
Manager Response: We are thankful for your review. We are so sorry to hear we could not accommodate you checking in early. Our check in time is after 3 pm, however if we can, we will do our very best to check you in early, or preregister your vehicle. We hope to see you in the future.

Summary: We wanted something close to Disneyland that was not too expensive.  This hotel fit the bill.  The employees were very helpful and friendly.  The front desk staff were very helpful with any of our needs or concerns.  They kept the rooms clean and we spent four nights there. We would use them again if we had another reason to go to that area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you decided to stay with us during your spring break. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is great to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are very excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Our rooms were clean, nicely furnished and the location was amazing. It was a 13 minute walk to both Disneyland parks. The beds were soft and the place was quiet. I like that there was a security guard standing outside at night. The concierge told us that they would be changing to a Kings Inn soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance as you say. We are very excited to become the Kings Inn Anaheim! We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: The super 8 was the perfect hotel for our stay. Short walk to the park. The beds are comfortable. Very convenient to restaurants and stores as well. The only negative I can think of is this is the first hotel I've stayed in without a microwave in the room. The do have them for rent in the office. I just found this odd and little inconvenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you decided to stay here when having your birthday celebration.  it is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of the park making it so convenient. We are sorry for any inconvenience regarding the microwave. We do  deliver it right away when requested. We are hoping to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for a great price
Summary: We did a family trip had 7  very clean rooms and plenty of hot water  ..the staff was very friendly  the pool was heated and the spa was great on the feet after a long day at the park I am highly recommend this hotel as we will be coming  back  here again...
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear that they provided you with that excellent service you deserve. It is so awesome that we fit so well into your budget and that you will be returning!

Summary: Great place to stay excellent customer service and the manager Omar was very helpful and only a couple minutes away from Disneyland I am definitely staying here again next time I come to Disneyland thank you Super 8 from your friend back in the day.......
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We delighted that you had such a wonderful stay and are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: we stay in Super 8 Anaheim 5 nights, everythings it`s great, the room and the breakfast, the pool, is very near of Disneyland and the Convention Center, we travel to WonderCon and it`s very accesible to the place and to the restaurants
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so great to hear you had such a great experience when staying with us! We are located so close to the Anaheim Convention center as you say. it only takes 5 minutes to walk there from here. We are also just around the corner from Disneyland making it so convenient when staying with us.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great Launching Point for Disney/CA Adventure
Summary: We were in Anaheim during spring break and found few options for affordable lodgings near the Disney parks. We're happy we found this Super 8. It looked a bit shabby when we drove up, but we were pleasantly surprised by a clean, recently updated room. And we were very glad we landed here when we were able to comfortably walk back and forth from the park to take a work break during the day. And especially glad the next day when the kind folks at Super 8 let us store our luggage in the office after checkout so we could visit CA Adventure and not leave valuables in our rental car. All in all, a great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you found we fit into your budget and you found us to be so affordable. We are so close to the Disneyland park it is true. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient! We are hoping to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Absolutely fabulous hotel. From the moment we arrived we were very impressed. The staff on check in were very friendly and helpful. The rooms are immaculate and well equipped with a very good air con system. It has a lovely swimming pool area and a roof terrace. The breakfast was very nice. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay here for Disneyland which is only a 10-15 minute walk away.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I don't often say this, but I genuinely couldn't fault the place. Despite being a budget hotel, it was fantastic. Newly refurbished rooms, super comfortable beds and pillows, AC positioned so it doesn't blow over the bed, tasty fresh waffles for breakfast, smiling efficient cleaning staff, and of course a short walk from Disney. Well done to the team at Super 8 Katella!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy to hear you found us to be the perfect place when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick walk to the entrance making it so convenient and cost effective when staying here. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. It is so wonderful you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great experience at the Super 8 Anaheim!
Summary: Our stay at the Super 8 Anaheim was beyond our expectations and we received a rate that couldn't be beat! Located next to the new Anaheim GardenWalk, there are great restaurants located right next door,The Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza Kitchen, Roy's and PF Chang's (not your typical IHOP or Denny's culinary experience as is usually the case!). The distance from Disneyland was approximately 15 minutes, not bad for older kids and adults, maybe a bit too far for families with young children. The location was perfect for our visit to the two Disney parks, Knott's Berry Farm and concerts at the Honda Center!!! Will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had such a great experience when staying with us and even better to hear you will be returning! We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland this is true. It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance making it so convenient. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is great for visits to Disneyland! Before we booked, we saw that there were mixed reviews, but I don't know what all the complaining was about? This hotel is totally what we were hoping for. The room was super nice, big, two beds, nice sheets, bit tv, good sized desk, fridge, lots of room to move around, nice big bathroom with a great sized shower, my son even slept in a crib at the end of our bed and there was still plenty of room to move around. There wasn't anything dirty, or old looking about this room. The walk to Disneyland is only about 12 minutes, so that was very nice. The breakfast area was small, which we did read about, but the selection was decent, the waffles were super yummy and you could eat all you wanted and we always found a table to sit at. We were
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and even happier to hear you will be returning! We look forward to it. We are excited to hear you found us to be so affordable. it is true with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: DISABLED?  Make sure you call the day before arrival if you booked online
Summary: I booked online.  I requested a ground floor room close to the front of the hotel because I am disabled.    When I arrived they were sold out and had booked me in an upstairs room.  They did manage to find a ground floor room at the very back of the hotel which made getting to the breakfasts and hot tub difficult.  On check in the front desk clerk took no responsibility for ignoring my special request.  She acted as though it was my fault my request wasn't followed because I hadn't called ahead.  That put a negative tone on the four nights we stayed there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear that our front desk staff was able to accommodate you with your first floor request upon arrival. We do our very best to accommodate special requests, and it is recommended you call and speak with the motel directly as sometimes online request's do not show up on our system as in this case.  We do apologize for any inconvenience this might have caused, but again it is so good to hear our front desk staff was able to meet your request upon arrival. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Convenient for Disneyland, clean, pool, nightly fireworks, great staff
Summary: Had a great 3 night stay here.  About a 15-20 minute walk to the Disneyland trams.  We were here during Spring break, and it was actually faster to bypass the trams, and walk past the trams to Disney town, and then to the entrance gates.  Easy and friendly checkin and out.  Free parking.  We could see the nightly Disneyland fireworks from our room. Fridge and microwave in room. Clean, nicely sized rooms, newly refurbished.  Didn't try the pool, but saw a few people in there daily.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found us to be so conveniently located and you enjoyed your stay. We are such a close walk to the Disneyland entrance. It is just a quick 15 minutes to the front gate! Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. It is so awesome to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The Super 8 near Disneyland  is a great hotel for the budget minded traveler. The hotel is only a 15 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland!  It has a decent free breakfast and free parking  (most hotels charge for parking in the area  of Disneyland).   So if you're  on a budget and you don't care about the frills this is the hotel for you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to know you found our location to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We are only a 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are so happy to hear you found us to be so affordable and we are delighted to hear we fit so well into your budget. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location, great price, clean rooms
Summary: Our main purpose of this stay was to visit Disneyland. The walk to/from Disneyland is not bad, considering this hotel was considerably cheaper than the hotels that are located closer to Disneyland. This hotel is also very close to the Garden Walk and decent chain restaurants (Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza Kitchen), which was convenient when we weren't headed to Disneyland. The rooms were incredibly clean, partially due to the wood-type floors and no carpet! For the low price of the room we weren't sure what we'd end up with, but the room was very clean, comfortable, and seemed to have been recently remodeled. for the price we paid this hotel definitely exceeded our expectations!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is so true we are so perfectly located so  close to the Disneyland park. In just 15 minutes you are at the front gate! We are delighted to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our rooms so clean and comfortable. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: You pretty much get what you pay for here but my stay here was great! Staff was great as well!   PROS:  Free parking during your stay Continental breakfast (not a lot of a selection but it'll do! EX: Cereal, mini waffles, milk, juices and coffee only) The shuttle bus stop that brings you to Disneyland is right outside the hotel.   The only con I had was just the car alarms and street noise I heard before heading to bed around midnight. But that was only because my room placement was right next to the front desk/street. But after a tiring day at Disneyland I'm sure you'll sleep right through it. I did!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful  to know that you loved our complimentary breakfast. We are so close to the Disneyland park this is true. It is just q quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. It does help to park here and walk over, this saves on parking at the Disneyland park. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: The bed was always made when we came back to the room and they give you a free breakfast, it was a nice place to stay and rest. Shower got really hot, the heater and cooler worked great, had a nice looking pool. It was a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay and we are so excited that you will be back! We do have a great breakfast go get you going in the morning with fresh waffles.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for price & nice pool
Summary: Last time we came we stayed at the Alpine Inn which was a nice hotel also but had smaller rooms than the Super 8. The pool at the Alpine Inn was also cooler so my kids didn't want to play in it. They had a lot of fun and the Super 8's pool.
Manager Response: Thank you  for the review. It is so awesome to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub! It is true, it is sure a great place to relax and enjoy it after a long day at the park. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Rigo was there for check in, he was over the top with kind friendly service.  Went out of his way to make everything enjoyable and our vacation stayed enjoyable the rest of the weekend. Plenty of parking and the rooms were very quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you front desk staff was so friendly and helpful.  We do pride ourselves in excellent  customer service, and it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel is ok. I felt safe, traveling as a single; except for carpet, it was clean. Breakfast all carbs. My main complaint - they ordered a taxi for 5:30am to airport. No taxi till 5:45, and it wasn't a taxi. It was a black suburban with a women in pj pants and rotten attitude. No meter, no way to take card. Since I didn't have a choice due to their late arrival, I had to take it. Flat fee of 49.00. I told her I only paid 38. to get there in traffic and she said taxis charge different rates. I'm sure at that hour and how long it took to get back to airport a real taxi would have been around 30.00. I felt like this was someones sister and I felt ripped off!! Be sure you indicate you want a REAL yellow cab for back to airport!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad to hear you felt safe and comfortable when staying with us.  We do apologize for any issues you may have experienced with the local taxi driver. I assure you we are following up on this, although it is not our fault as the motel, we do feel responsible for our guest's and agree this is not a proper way to handle customers. We are hoping to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary: Hey, it's Super 8, but for what you're asking for, a place close to the park at a great price, you're getting exactly what you want. The breakfast was efficient, not high end, but above the motels that just have 'make-your-own-waffles' as the only item on the menu. They had a couple of cereal choices, yogurt, danishes, oatmeal, & more. The room was nice & clean. The staff was VERY helpful, allowing us to park early in the morning, way before check-in, and they watched our bags for us. It is a 15 minute walk to the gate, if you hit the crosswalks at the right moment and keep a decent pace.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so great to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our amenities added so much value to your stay.  Our complimentary breakfast does help with the food budget. We also have free wifi, and free parking making it so convenient and affordable.! We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Second time staying here and will recommend staying again. I do wish I was on the first floor because of two kids but not that big of a deal. Was a little irritated with the noise below us. I think they were cheerleaders, but they didn't wake my kids, so again, no big deal. Will stay again!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review.  It is always  so good to hear from repeat guest's.  As always, we are glad you enjoyed your stay. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We booked our room at Super 8 for our vacation at Disneyland. The motel had everything we needed including a mini fridge to keep food and drinks cold in the room. It is a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland so it is reasonably close to the park. The room is clean and well maintained. The bed was comfortable and they have breakfast available. All in all, we enjoyed our stay here and feel it was a good value for our money.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear we fit so well into your budget.  With our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Regular clean motel to visit that part of LA
Summary: Good location for visiting Griffith park, zoo, Hollywood or Beverly Hills. Regular clean motel, rooms regular size. Little bit overpriced, but so are most motels in that area.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review.  We are  glad you decided to stay with us when visiting LA. We are also glad to know you found your accommodations to be so clean and comfortable. We hope to see  you again in the future.

Summary: Perfect location. 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Nice pool area. Breakfast was fine. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a perfect stay. We are in the perfect location, so close to the Disneyland park, it is just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We had a great experience.  The staff with very helpful and friendly. The manager was very helpful when we the stroller company sent the wrong stroller.  She even called the company for us when they wouldn't return my phone call! The room was clean and cozy.  It was the perfect place to crash after being in the parks all day. My only complaint was the breakfast.  The choices are limited and the sitting area is very small.  Other than that, i would highly recommend as a cheap, close hotel near Disneyland.
Manager Response: thanks for the review.  We are so happy to hear you will be recommending us! Thank you for the compliments to our staff it is great to know you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: The hotel was nice, bedroom we got was quite small but sheets and towels were clean. We found some bugs in the room (probably coming from the bathroom..) but we were leaving next day so didn't complain. Breakfast was complimentary but it should offer more healthy options such as fruit and whole wheat bread. The hotel has a self serve laundry and a coffee machine in the rooms, loved it. Good deal for short stays!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are happy to hear we fit so well into your budget. We do offer a complimentary breakfast including waffles, fresh fruit, yogurt, 2 kinds of cold cereal, oatmeal, white and wheat toast with jam, cinnamon rolls, milk, juice, coffee, cocoa and tea. It is a great way to start the day.  We are happy to know you found us to be such a great deal. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Way overpriced, terrible phone customer service
Summary: Clean place, walking distance from Disneyland, but booking through Wyndham was an absolute nightmare.  I was promised a discounted rate for our trip (was still going to be over $145 CAD/night), but then the company reneged.  Ended up paying more than $200 CAD/night for a motel with paper-thin walls and construction next door/above our room.  On the phone for over 3 hours talking to over a dozen people who all told me they couldn't do anything about it and constantly refused to connect me to a supervisor.  Find another place if at all possible!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear you had a hard time with Wyndham customer service. Unfortunately, it sounds like they were unable to help you. Although I realize it was not the fault of the property, I am still so sorry to hear that. We are are renovating our property, making a lot of improvements, and do our very best not to disturb our in house guest's. We always finish up in a timely manor and at a reasonable time, but do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused during your stay. We are hoping to see you again in the future, and if it is better for you please give us a call directly when making a reservation. We would be more than happy to assist.

Summary: It was okay hotel. Loved that it was walking distance to disneyland.  it was close to a lot of things. The price was very affordable and very friendly staff.  Free wifi and free baby crib couldn't say no.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so wonderful to know you found our location to be so convenient.  We do have free wifi, free parking as well as complimentary breakfast making it such a value! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay - the room was clean (rugs could be updated) and service was good.  I would recommend the hotel and look forward to future stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear we exceeded your expectations. We are also so excited to hear you will be back!  We look forward to it.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland for the price
Summary: The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. My only objection was I needed a blanket cause there was no bedspread--which is fine because they don't always get cleaned. It was a good motel very close to Disneyland. Staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you found our location to be convenient and we fit so well into your budget.  With our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast this does add so much value to your stay this is true. We are so close to the Disneyland park entrance, just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate making it so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Super 8 Anaheim near Disneyland Main Gate
Summary: It's great to be able to leave your car in the lot and walk to Disneyland -- very convenient!  I liked that the room did not have carpeting as it seems cleaner and more hygienic. I saw a card in the room that in Sept 2017 the site will change hands and no longer be a Super 8.  Too bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our new improvements were   to your liking. Yes! In September we are going to be changing to The Kings Inn Anaheim. We have decided to make this change in an effort to continue upgrading our property and to better our guest services.  This is very exciting and we do hope that you will return to see us and our new property in the future!

Summary: The staff was extremely HELPFUL. .. I needed a room for a special Week end and they delivered .. even threw in a ROLL IN BED for me at no additional cost. I enjoyed me Disneyland adventure. my nieces enjoyed their nights away from home.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear you had a great experience when staying with us. We are delighted to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay as well. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great/walkable location to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center. Can hear the fireworks at night from the room. Plenty of parking. Room is clean and spacious. Breakfast is a plus with fresh waffles, yogurt, bread cereal and oatmeal but needs more of a healthier less sugary option like hard boiled eggs or fruits. The floors seemed thin and you can hear the upstairs guests walking around.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so conveniently located as you say, just a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center, and a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance.  We do have a great breakfast to get you going in the morning, which does include fresh fruit, and yogurt, waffles, cinnamon rolls, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of cold cereal and toast with jam. We are hoping to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Customer service was nice, about 20 minute walk to the disneyland resort, location is great for all needs, LOVELY hot tub for the evening when your feet are sore and you just want to relax. Clean rooms, quiet atmosphere, overall the stay was extremely pleasant and my kids loved it.
Manager Response: thank you for the review.  We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and we exceeded your expectations. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: We were very pleased that we were able to check in early on our arrival date. It made things more convenient. The young lady that checked us in was very friendly and knowledgeable. She gave us a good tip regarding Uber.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so good to hear that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Pleasantly surprised. Hotel was more than I expected. Great room. friendly staff. convenient to both Disneyland and Convention Center. Can walk to lots. Not sure if the property was recently redone but when other hotels were changing hundreds of dollars a night, taking a chance in Super 8 was a winner. Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is always so exciting to hear that we exceed our guest's expectations!  We are so conveniently located so close to the Disneyland park. It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center. Thank you for recommending us to others and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: OUR STAY AT THE ANAHEIM FACILITY REVIEW
Summary: We were very pleased with the comfort of the bed and the close location to Disneyland.   Also liked it  that you started you breakfast to early and provided extra coffee for our room as we are early risers.  The staff wasn't very friendly or helpful as we asked about you matching the price that at the time listed a lower price on the internet.   Nobody wanted to look into it for us
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you were pleased with your accommodations and you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast in the morning. We are sorry to hear that you did not find our staff to be as friendly, or helpful as you feel they should have been. It is true, sometimes there is a lower price online due to online offers and specials. It is very similar to booking airfare online, as sometimes you can get a lower price when booking online. We do apologize for any inconvenience or misunderstanding regarding this. We do hope to see you return next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Nice Super 8 in a Great Disneyland Location
Summary: We enjoyed our 2 day stay with family at this Super 8.  Too bad about the revelers setting off car alarms in the parkade next door on Saturday night   (Hint:  book a room facing the in side of the property to reduce noise from off the property).
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to Disneyland so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We do apologize if you found the Anaheim Garden walk to be so noisy during your stay. We have followed up on this with the Anaheim Garden Walk management. We are hoping to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Staff was rude and not helpful.
Summary: Not a great experience. Staff was rude. The alarms in the parking garage next door were loud and could  be heard all hours of the day and night. They have updated a few things in the room but the rooms still smelled like old basement and made me feel like I was breathing in mold the entire time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear that you found our staff to be so unfriendly and you did not have a good experience. You do not say how the staff was unhelpful, but it is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations and we are sorry to hear that this was not the case. I do apologize if you heard noise from the Anaheim Garden Walk parking garage next door. I do assure you we are following up on this with the management at the Anaheim Garden Walk. We are in the process of upgrading all our rooms with new flooring, and other amenities, we hope to have you stay with us again and we do believe you will like the upgrades.

Summary: A Fantastic Place to stay on our holiday, staff are friendly & very helpful. We stayed for 11 nights. Rooms are very spacious & the pool & hot tub are great after a long day at Disneyland. Nice & close to all the Disney Parks & close to the Anaheim Garden walk for shopping & meals. Also buses are right out the front to get you to & from the Disneyland Parks if you don't want to walk the 10-15 minutes. I will be staying here again when I go back to Anaheim :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us for your Australian holiday. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, but the ART shuttle does pick up right out front for those who do not wish to walk over. We are so excited to hear you will be staying with us again next time you are in town.

Summary: The service is very good. For attended the fair, it's very convenient.And this hotel is near Disneyland. It's good for family traveling with children. Only one thing not very satisfied, the quilt is very thin.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to know you found our location to be so convenient, and you thought we were a good choice when you were here on business. We do have additional blankets in every room and at the front desk if you need something heavier. We are so looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Last minute trip to House of Blues and it was the only place with vacancy in the area. Turned out a little pricey, but in the location was perfect and room was clean and comfortable. Room has a coffee maker and fridge. Very convenient
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is so true we are located so perfectly, whether it is to go see a show at the House of Blues, do some shopping, attending a convention, or visiting Disneyland. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Good stay for a reasonable price
Summary: Check-in was easy, room was clean, great location and easy to get in and out of (free parking is a plus). Only complaint would be that my room was near the busy road (W. Katella Ave) so it was a little noisy at times. Good value.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so awesome that you found us so reasonable. It is so true, our amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast do add so much value to your stay. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great price and walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Recently updated hotel rooms, except for the carpet.    Overall, clean & a place to sleep.  Great price within walking distance to the maingate...about a 12 minute walk. The hotel let us check-out and leave our car in the parking lot while we went to the park. The complimentary breakfast was also nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so nice to know we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are happy to let our guest's leave their car here even after check out so they can enjoy their day at Disneyland before heading home. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It was in a good location rooms were nice! Staff was pleasant! Checkin/checkout quick breakfast was good and it's free so you can't complain! If you want more options go out and get it ! Only complaint is had ground level room whoever was above us was loud you could hear every step it was nonstop! However knowing that I would request a ground level room so that we wouldn't make too much noise for whoever is under us! Since we have kids! Overall room was decent looks like it was just redone! LARGE REFRIGERATOR!  Definetly stay again!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so wonderful that you will be coming back. We are happy that you found our new upgrades made for an even better stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary: This is a great little hotel within 15 walking minutes to Disney. The rooms were clean, the furniture was new, the breakfast was just ok (but it's free), the staff was nice, pool was clean and it was overall very well taken care of. I'll definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to know you enjoyed your stay and you will be back! We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Have stayed before to visit Disneyland. this trip our room was located next to a parking garage. Between 10:00 and 12:00 PM very noisy.  Room was good. Glad to be able purchase tram tickets in the office.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We do apologize if you found the location next to the parking garage noisy. We have followed up on this with the Anaheim Garden Walk management. We do have the ART shuttle tickets available for sale at the front desk. We are glad you found this helpful.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very very happy with this stay. Clean rooms, friendly staff and great price.  Will be using you guys in the future
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is so good to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and you found we fit into your budget. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary Heading: Great location, accommodations and staff....What more do you want?!!!!!
Summary: Fantastic location to Disney Resort.  Shuttle available  Fabulous location.  Convenient shuttle w/ great hours takes the hassle out of driving/parking.  Beautiful accommodations since a recent remodel.  Fantastic staff: friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so nice that you found them to be so friendly, helpful and informative. We are in a perfect location this is true. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making us so convenient. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: All staff were friendly the rooms were nice and a good size. Looked like they were renovating but no nose complaints I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so happy to know you will be back!

Summary: While the grounds and exterior of this motel are pretty old, they run it like it's brand new. The front desk service was excellent, the room was very clean, the beds were perfectly comfortable, and the price was right! My only complaints would be the very old, forest green, worn carpet and the unpleasant smell of the air coming from the AC unit. But these things are not enough to keep me from staying there again. A major plus is the proximity to Disneyland and the ability to leave my car at the Duper 8 even after checking out, walk to DLand, and thus avoid the $20 parking fee.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to know that you found us to be so clean and you enjoyed your stay so much. We are working on renovating our property, which does include new flooring and new amenities in all of our rooms! We are sure you will love it when you return!

Summary: Loved how close it was to Disney & breakfast was better than most hotels. They had waffles, oatmeal, fruit, to name a few, not just muffins & drinks. There was plenty of parking & it didn't feel too crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast. It is a great way to start the day.  We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Due to a family emergency, I wasn't able to sleep at the hotel or visit Disneyland. I had already paid for the 3 day stay, and wasn't able to get my money returned (unfortunately, but I really don't believe it's their fault). The little time I did spend there was pleasant, though. Very clean rooms, free breakfast, free parking and they even have pool and laundry room. The motel is a pretty long walk from the Disneyland entrance, but it is located beside one of the park's parking lot, where a tram comes by every couple of minutes to take people to the park. I really wish check-in was a bit earlier than 3p.m. I'd definitely come here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. we are so sorry you had to cut your trip short, but do appreciate you taking the time to review us none the less. We are very close to the Disneyland park entrance as you stay, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do have a complimentary breakfast and free parking as well as free wifi, which with these amenities it does add so much value to your stay. We are so happy to hear you will be back!

Summary Heading: ImpressedI was impressed in the Goodway the moment I open the door I got a good summer help the room smelled so good so
Summary: I was impressed in a good way. The moment I opened the door I got a good smell,  the room smelled so good so clean. I did a lot of research on clean hotels and even though this one had nothing but good reviews I still wasn't sure because it is an expensive motel but I must say that it is five stars. On our next Disneyland trip we will definitely be staying there again I have zero need of looking anywhere else when I was so happy with this one. My family and I stayed a total of six nights and I am completely happy I stayed there. Oh and the waffles are delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always so exciting to hear that we have exceeded our guest's expectations. We are glad to know that you were so impressed and we do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good, could have been better, would stay again.
Summary: So overall we gave a three star because it was what I expected from any general motel. There wasn't any above and beyond service which is what I look for in a 4-5 star. I would have been more prone to give a 4 star had we had a better breakfast selection and if we hadn't been booked into an already occupied room.   Upon our arrival, we checked in and were given our room keys. We grabbed most all of our luggage (all that we could carry), went to our room only to find it was already occupied. We then had to lug all our luggage back to the car (no elevators and two kids) and back to the front desk. When explaining the situation and what had happened, all we got was a "sorry".    We then received our key to an unoccupied room and had no further negative experiences though I do wish
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. we are delighted to hear you would stay again with us. We do apologize for the few hiccups as you say and assure you we will follow up on this. We are happy to hear you had a good stay and again we look forward to your return!

Summary: Hotel is conveniently located within short walking distances from Convention Center and Disneyland.  The front desk personnel was friendly and helpful.  The only drawback is the breakfast room, which is too small for the vast number of rooms it has.  The continental breakfast selections are limited.  Even so, the staff helped ease the congestion in the room by making waffles for guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are in a perfect location as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Great hotel to stay at.  Comfortable beds, free parking and nice staff.  The only thing we didn't like was the free breakfast.  Could of been better.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to know you had such a nice visit and you found our staff to be so friendly. We do hope you will be returning soon.

Summary: Best location for the price. The woman who takes care of the breakfast area does a wonderful job. Very good climate control; we slept very well.
