Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in a perfect location, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are so looking forward to your  next visit with us.

Summary: Clean and comfortable. We had two rooms, and neither had a bath tub, which was disappointing and the reason I'm only giving it 4 stars. Not a bad walk to Disneyland. We have a 1 yr old and 4 yr old and came back to rest everyday. For that reason I think I'd get something even closer next time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found us to be so clean and you were so comfortable in your room. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park, however if you do not wish to walk over with the little ones, the ART shuttle does pick up right out front every 20 minutes. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Good place to stay.  They seem to be upgrading the property.  Close enough to Disneyland to walk.  Only suggestion would be to take a second floor room or to the back of the hotel.  We were on the ground floor close to the breakfast area and it did get noisy early.  Their are several good places to eat close by.  Everything from fast food to House of Blues all with in 5 minutes walking of the hotel.  Staff was helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are so close to the Disneyland park. It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are happy to hear we fit so well into your budget. We hope to see you again soon,.

Summary: Nice rooms and not too far from Disney Parks, it was an okay walking distance. The free breakfast is early and had good waffles. The pillows were comfortable and had great beds as well. Would recommend
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a pleasant stay and you found our location to be so convenient. We are so happy to hear you will be recommending us.

Summary: clean rooms, close to the park, service desk was great.  They even booked me and my sister in adjoining rooms, I didn't think to ask at the time of booking but they saw the names and booked us together.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and that you will be returning

Summary: I would have given this hotel a higher rating, as it is usually one of our top choices when going to Disneyland, BUT on our most recent trip we had one request (when we booked our room), that we stay on the ground level. Well they didn't make any efforts to put us on the ground level, which sucks when kids fall asleep on the walk back to the hotel and my husband and I have to take turns carrying kids up the stairs and not leave the kids/Stroller alone on the parking lot. üòí  Also, the rooms near the parking garage are noisy. Car alarms going off, people racing through the garage at 3am....I was less than impressed this trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so great to hear you found us to be so clean and we fit so well into your budget. We are sorry to hear about your experience regarding the Garden Walk parking structure. We have addressed this with the owners and managers of the Gardenwalk. We are hoping to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: can't find a better bargain in Anaheim!
Summary: great location, clean and comfortable accommodations, welcoming and helpful staff, affordable. what more could anyone want!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to know you found us to be such a great bargain! We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: The room was comfortable but the heater /air when turned on had a odor so I sprayed Lysol the whole time we were there.  I went to use the iron and ironing board which was there when we left in the morning and it was gone. Called front desk to report and they just said oh ok but I never got them back.  Luckily my son was next door and I used his.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so sorry if you were inconvenienced at all during your stay with us.  I assure you I have forwarded this to the correct department so we can follow up on the issue with the Ironing board. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here last week for 4 nights and were very happy with our stay. The hotel was very accommodating and even put my room right next to my sister and her family, with an adjoining door. That made getting ready in the morning super easy. We stayed right near the front of the hotel and even though we could hear other guests in the pool area, it was never too loud. They also have a really cute balcony area where you can see the disney fireworks if you go at the right time. We opted to rent the microwave and the refrigerator in room was awesome. Kept everything super cold and the freezer part re-froze our ice packs. Score! The walk to Disneyland is literally 10-15 minutes and the whole area is packed with restaurants. There are even two drugstores on the corner of Harbor and
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you loved your stay! We are in a perfect location this is true. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of the Disneyland park. The freshly made waffles are delicious. It makes for a wonderful start to your day. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Awesome place to stay for value
Summary: Loved the hotel, continental breakfast was yummy, hot tub on sore feet was very nice, mini fridge in rooms and very comfy beds!      Aweso.e location for just a short walk to both parks. Alot of variety of food places surrounded the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We have updated all of our rooms, it sounds like you found your accommodations to be comfortable and you had a great stay. We are so happy to hear that. We are excited for your return!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Anaheim Super 8.  Our room was clean and spacious.   We used the pool and hot tub.  The breakfast was adequate,  mostly carbs.  It was about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  It was nice to be able to buy our Disneyland tickets at the front desk.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you found us to be such a great value. With our complimentary breakfast, free wifi and free parking this does add so  much value for your money. We are are excited for your return!

Summary: Kitchen staff were fantastic. Good place to stay for Disney visit. Comfortable room, great sleep. We stayed with our two kids. About one kilometee from gates of Disney. Free breakfast was a welcome addition to the stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland resort making it so convenient when staying with us. We hope to see you again  next time you are visiting the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: My daughter and I went down to Anaheim to go to Disneyland. Needed a hotel to sleep in for 2 nights. Found Super 8. To us it was very clean and quite.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so happy to know that you and your daughter enjoyed your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Great location to restaurants and Disney. Right beside the Garden Walk. Good room for when we were exhausted from 3 days at Disney. Comfy bed, Good housekeeping service. Continental breakfast not the greatest but saved us money each morning.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We want to thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We have stayed here many times over the past 10 months since we bought Disneyland Annual Passes (APs). We stayed this time with our good friends who joined us for a couple of days at the Parks.  I told them this is a great place to stay in Anaheim. Everything is not perfect but when it isn't it is taken care of quickly by the staff and maintenance personnel. It really is the best value for your dollar in the Disneyland area. The 2 queen bed rooms are comfortable and great for families or if you and your better half want your own bed. LOL Most of the rooms have new or newer furniture, tub enclosures and toilets.  No leaks and the water in the shower is consistent never running out of hot water. The mini frig comes in handy and is quiet. The TVs are nice and get lots of
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay with us and you enjoyed your time here with your friends. We are so excited to have you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Booked this motel not expecting too much ( only because it was very reasonably priced) and a 10 min walk to Disneyland BUT had a pleasant surprise, rooms large, modern and clean. Room looked like an update was made recently and very quiet which is what we had requested. The breakfast was a continental, toast, cereal, waffles, tea, coffee, juice, yoghurt and a cinnamon bun in a sealed wrapper to go ready for a day at Disneyland. A very busy breakfast room indeed. I would DEFINATELY recommend for couples or families visiting Disneyland on a budget.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and we exceeded your expectations. Thank you so much for recommending us to others and we do hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very clean rooms, staff was nice and provided complimentary breakfast. It was also very close to disneyland.
Summary: Very clean rooms, staff was nice and provided complimentary breakfast. It was also very close to disneyland.  Pools and hottubs were nice as well. The only bad thing is that you have to pay extra for a microwave in ur room. Overall, I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to hear you found them to be so efficient and so friendly and helpful. We do have a wonderful heated pool and hot tub, it is a perfect way to relax after a long day at the park. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary Heading: Overall a good place to stay
Summary: Overall it does exactly what we needed it for. Close to Disneyland and excellent walking distance to good restaurants. Has a mini fridge, AC or heat in the room, a few places to sit, and a firm bed. However, there is a large window at the front of every room, and you can easily hear anyone walking by it, conversations and people walking by. Although I do think the sound proofing between each room is fine. We had a room by the pool, and I highly recommend against that unless it's simpler with kids. The breakfast is sufficient, but choices are limited to cereal, oatmeal, waffles, with coffee, milk, juice, and some cut fresh fruit. While not the best place to sit and hang out at all day, if you're looking for a place to crash at the end of a long day, this is a great place. Full
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you had an enjoyable stay and you found your accommodations to be so comfortable.  We are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park as we are just a quick 15 minute walk. We are sorry to hear there was an issue with your door. I assure you we have looked into this and it is good to know that everything turned out ok. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: check in fast and friendly. clean rooms. walking distance to Disney. free parking and breakfast will stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so wonderful that you had a great stay and you will be back! We look forward to it!

Summary: Very good overall, the breakfast was super complete, although there was no place to sit (all tables and chairs were busy) we sat on the balcony over the lobby with beautiful view.  The crew was super helpful, we sent some items we bought on Amazon and they gave it to us during the check in.  Walking distance to Disneyland, this is amazing since the hotel has its own parking, therefore we did not have to take the car into the park, we just walked! The room was very tidy and complete too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad you found we fit so well into your budget and you had such and enjoyable stay. We are in the perfect location as you say making walking to the park so convenient! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: My wife and I were there at the Super 8 Hotel and we enjoyed our stay was really pleasant. The bed was really comfortable the room was really clean. The breakfast was really enjoyable. The only thing that was missing in the room was a microwave. The shower was really nice and clean the walk to Downtown Disney was about five to ten minutes we just had a wonderful time
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted that you had a great stay and you were satisfied with your stay. We do have microwaves available for a small fee and are more than happy to put one in your room at your request. We are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park entrance as you say, just 15 minutes to the Park entrance. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The room was big enough, the bed was comfortable, the breakfast was so-so if you like cereal and waffles. It is about 6 blocks away so that was nice and they have free parking.  I got there 5 hours before check in and they let me park my car so I could get my Disney adventure started.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad to hear you  had a good stay.  We do pre check in and allow our guest's to park their car here if it is before check in and the room is not ready. We will also hold your bags if needed. it is good to know that you found this service helpful. We are excited for your return.

Summary Heading: Shipped me my forgotten wedding band.
Summary: I was very pleasantly surprised. I am used to staying in a Marriott or VRBO rooms. SO when my wife said she booked at a super 8 I had many concerns. However, when we got there the room was very clean and looked great. The parking was fee which is a big plus in this area, the pool was decent and I did some laundry there. Best part of it all was on the plane ride home i realized i had left my wedding ring by the sink in the room. I called the next day and asked about it and they said their maid had turned it and one of my daughters toys in to the front desk and they would ship it home for me.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and we exceeded your expectations. We do have free parking, and it does add so much value, especially since we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are so glad that we could return your left behind wedding band. Something so precious. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: good service freindly staff they might of over done it though by chsrging so much extra for a simole microwave i wont get in in how much but it should be complemetary atleas other thsn thst whas a good stay..
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do have microwaves available. it is just a small fee and we will put it in your room during your stay. Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Room was clean and spacious. Staff was polite. The hot breakfast was delicious and while the choices were not overly healthy, there were plenty: waffles, cold cereal, cinnamon roll, yogurt, toast, oranges, juices, milk, coffee. And walking distance to the conference center and Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and you found our service to be so friendly. We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast, a great way to start the day. Those freshly made waffles are so delicious! We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: It's a very comfortable and accomodating location. This is our second year staying same place and same time of the year and we've had wonderful experiences. Breakfast is good and included with the rate, which are pretty reasonable. They are located about 6 blocks away from Disneyland which is very convenient. Staff is always nice and accomodating. The beds are comfortable and the room is big. We are very pleased and will continue to use their services.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome to hear you found us such a great value. We have so many amenities that do add so much value to your stay this is true. Free parking, free Wifi, and complimentary breakfast does help with the budget. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Rooms are very clean, breakfast available, free parking, great customer service I stay here whenever I make a trip to Disney. Walking distance to park. Also available in the ART, public bus, tickets available at Disney, all day bus passes and kids under 9 are free, discount for seniors 65+
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great visit with us and you found us to be so conveniently located. We do offer tickets to the Disneyland park as well as the ART passes as you say making it so convenient. We do look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, shops and restaurants
Summary: This is the fourth time I have stayed in this hotel in the last 10 years. I like the proximity, it's reasonably priced and the breakfast is more than adequate. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. We are delighted to hear you will be recommending us! We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed one night because it was cheaper to fly in on Friday and out reservation at the Disneyland Hotel was for Saturday. I would have been very dissapointed if this was our hotel for our entire trip. The entire room stunk like cigarettes and feces. You would have thought someone just used our restroom to do there business while chain smoking. There were also a few little bugs crawling along the counter top while my son was brushing his teeth. Just not a very welcoming experience. If we didn't plan on leaving as soon as we woke up, I would have asked for another room.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. I apologize if you had a bad experience while staying with us. Our goal is to exceed our guest's expectations, I am sorry to hear that this was not the case. We do have a 24 hour front desk and would have been happy to move you to another room if this would have made things better for you, even if it was for just one night. If you would like, please give us a call so we can research this further. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is probably the closest reasonable place to stay that has consistent value and quality . We have been to Disneyland over 130X and don't want to overspend for lodging .
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found staying with us so convenient. We are so close to the Disneyland park this is true. It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We decide to do a quick trip to Disneyland, decide to stay somewhere inexpensive a close by. It was better than expected, clean rooms and breakfast was good.   They have a very helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to know they provided you with that great customer service you so deserve. We are hoping to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: My husband and I stayed 2 nights we had an amazing time. The room was comfortable and the breakfast was a good free add on.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so amazing to hear you had such a great stay and you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We are hoping to see you again soon.

Summary: The resort is within good walking distance to Disneyland and a good price. While it looks a little outdated on the outside the rooms are in great condition. This was my second stay here and will not be my last. Will recommend to any family or Friends visiting the parks.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are such a great value as you say, with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast, this does add so much value to your stay. We are so close to the Disneyland park as well. In just a quick 15 minutes you will be at the park entrance making it so convenient. We are so happy to hear you will be recommending us to others!

Summary Heading: This hotel has the highest ratings of hotels around...
Summary: This hotel has the highest ratings of hotels around Disneyland that I could find for one and two star hotels. I felt like the hotel met or exceeded my expectations. The rooms were clean. The beds were comfortable (that's a big issue for me) and there was plenty of room for the requested crib for my youngest. The pool is outside and wasn't very warm, but the hot tub was nice to soak in after a day of walking around the parks. The breakfast was limited (danish pastries, oranges, yogurt, two kinds of cereal, toast, and fresh-mad waffles) and usually crowded, though we did usually only get there after 8 AM (served until 9 AM.) It's a 15-20 minute walk to the park entrances. I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear we did in fact exceed your expectations and even more excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Aside from the disappointing breakfast and no breakfast that are used for drinking water is definitely a very good hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are pleased to know you had such a good experience when staying with us. We do apologize if you found our complimentary breakfast a bit disappointing. We do have fresh fruit, yogurt, 3 kinds of cereal with milk, toast with jam, fresh waffles with syrup cinnamon rolls coffee tea and hot cocoa. We do appreciate  you staying with us and hope to see you in the future.

Summary Heading: Book it, so close to Disney!
Summary: went here with my family. we enjoyed our stay. 10 minute walk to Disney and super central location. rooms were clean, and staff was great.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. we are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and  you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. We look forward to your return.

Summary: I have been coming here since the late 90s. They are always friendly and helpful. The rooms clean and comfortable. Thanks for another great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great time at this hotel! Perfect location and really near from Disneyland... i hope commming back:)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to know you had such an excellent stay with us and so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We had a great experience in super 8! 10 Min Walk from Disneyland The staff members was so nice,they just made everything so easy and fun. The room was clean and in a decent size, the beds were really comfortable. We will be back to this hotel next time for sure!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you had a fabulous visit and even better to hear you will be back! We are looking forward to it.

Summary Heading: Great except breakfast host was rude about getting one cup of coffee.
Summary: Everything was great except for the hostess at breakfast. My husband went to fill refillable  coffee cup up. The hotel breakfast hostess rudely said "one styrofoam cup can't you read? " I reported to the front desk and they were very supportive and apologetic, however who knows if they spoke to her.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear you had a great stay in general. We do want to apologize for any problem you may have experienced during breakfast. I assure you we have addressed this and do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Great location near Disneyland - 10/15 minute walk. The breakfast room is very small so its difficult to get a table in busy times of the morning. The rooms are clean. Safe area to walk on your own at night.  The toilet in my room got blocked so I had to move all my things over to another room in the middle of the day when I could have been at Disneyland... but that is mostly unavoidable from the motels perspective and they tried to make it as painless as possible.   Definitely good value for the price. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in a great location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, making it so convenient. It is so great to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and even more exciting to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Front desk was extremely friendly & very helpful.  Our room was very clean, but it didn't have a microwave in it . It was a great location while visiting Disneyland. The only issues that I had was the following morning when we went for the complementary breakfast the breakfast area was so small you can barely move about getting your breakfast and it was parked next to a parking garage which car alarms would go off in the middle of the night.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park this is true. It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance from here. Our complimentary breakfast is very popular and at times it can be a bit crowded for seating in the breakfast room. We do have additional seating on our sundeck which is a wonderful place to enjoy breakfast. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great price, location and awesome service!
Summary: This motel is a great price based on its location and not only that the staff is so friendly and provides excellent service! If your ok with a little bit of a walk to Disneyland then this is your place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great to hear you received that excellent customer service you so deserve. It is also wonderful to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Obstinate and Unhelpful Staff Diminish Benefits
Summary: The rooms were clean, hotel had good value, and it was a good location not terribly far from Disneyland. Though they did try to charge me more than my reservation indicated.    They would have earned a nice review except for an incident that still leaves a bad taste in my mouth. I had left something in my room when I left for Disneyland for the day.  I went back the same night to pick it up, but they said they couldn't get it for me because of some bs corporate policy. I tried to work with them so I could pick it up before I left but they were incredibly obstinate, unhelpful, and rude to me.  Instead of giving it to me when I was standing right in front of them, I had to call them the next day after I had driven hundreds of miles. Instead of calling me and paying for shipping
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was in Anaheim for a runDisney event a couple of weeks ago.  I got a great AAA rate at this location, which is about a mile or so from the Disneyland entrance.  The room was comfy and when there was a problem with the heating unit, they sent someone right away to fix/replace it.  Our room was the farthest away from the street, so the street noise was nonexistent.  We did hear the people in the room above us and the storage room behind us at times, but it was not sleep disturbing.  The breakfast was good each morning.  Checking in with Carlos was great.  I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us for the Run Disney event. We are so happy to know we exceeded your expectations and we are excited for your return!

Summary: The rooms were fantastic for the price you pay. As well as great walking distance from Disneyland!  Breakfast wasn't bad either! :)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. we are delighted to hear you had such a Super stay and are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Great and affordable location for Disneyland. The breakfast room was crowded and we could never get in but that was the only problem.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. it is wonderful to know we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. Our complimentary breakfast is very popular this is true, making it a bit crowded at times. We do have additional seating on our sundeck, which is a lovely place to enjoy breakfast. We are hoping to see you again soon.

Summary: Great place to stay . Reasonable very clean !! Employees were very friendly . Close to walk to Disneyland but we used the shuttle that pick u up right in front of the hotel . Can't go wrong . Great location.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to know you had an Awesome stay with us! We are in a perfect location this is true. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Another great stay at the Super 8
Summary: We had another great stay at Super 8 for our Disneyland trip. This is our second time staying here in 2 months. We needed an early check in for our two room. No problem. Room were very clean and the beds are comfy with fresh smelling sheets. I was impressed how sparkling clean the tub was. Overall the room was nice and clean. No black dirty feet on my 5 year old. (That happens at too many hotels). They have a heated pool and jacuzzi. Free Parking & Free breakfast- fresh made mini waffles, pastries, cereal, milk, juice, coffee, fruit, oatmeal. It's nice to have something to grab and go before you head off to Disneyland. It's a short walk there, about 10-15 minutes. Close to restaurants and stores. We have found our go to hotel when we visit Anaheim. Overall great experience x2.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. it is always a pleasure to hear from repeat guest's. As always we are happy to hear you had a great visit with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We came for a quick family trip to Disneyland.  This hotel meet all the requirements- clean, budget friendly, and close walking distance to Disney.  The staff was friendly and they serve breakfast.  Also, my husband left his phone behind and they were kind enough to send it back to me via fed ex. So I am so grateful to them.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy to hear you had such an awesome visit and even more that you will be back!

Summary: This Super 8 really is super!  It's clean, totally refurbished with modern finishes, good beds, easy walking distance to Disneyland, includes breakfast and parking, all for a very reasonable price.  I was very happily impressed with this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you were so impressed! It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We are so happy that this was the case. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Good location. Rooms are old. Dark and dank. You get what you pay for.about 10 minute walk to the park. When the mall next door gets going it will be a destination in the evening. Currently a ghost town.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in the process of upgrading all of our rooms and doing some amazing modifications and improvements. We have updated all our carpets, bedding and furnishings in all of our rooms, as well as put in new tile, and light fixtures. We are sill working on it, but we are positive you will love what you see next time you come visit!

Summary Heading: Uhmmm...are you up for 15-minute walk from here to Disneyland Park?
Summary: Hmmm..my husband and I are not that picky, but we're still human who'd love to stay in a fancy hotel.  Bed and bathroom for the two of us were fine. AC & heater were working good. And oh! If you're a couple and if you need microwave, there's none. I ain't sure with their other rooms but you might wanna ask them for that.  Breakfast? it's free! There's free waffle, coffee, Swissmilk choco, toast, cinnamon bread, slices of oranges, these are free in their cafeteria. (we ate some of them, but we had better breakfast in some cafe's in the Park)  And with how I gave title for this, 15-minutes of walking was legit from this hotel to the Park. It's a good exercise for us though, doing it in 3 days. A good way to start our stay in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is true we are a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of the park. For those who do not wish to walk, the Anaheim Resort Transit does pick up right out front of the motel and runs every 20 minutes for your convenience. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Bad first impression. The carpet in our room was really gross. We were afraid to take off our shoes. The table was sticky and there was something on the sheets. They cleaned the table but said the carpet could not come clean. The breakfast room was way too small and in need of paint and a good cleaning. Most of the employees were helpful. Jackie that cleaned our room several days did a better job than the condition our room was in when we first checked in. Not a good first impression
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff member Jackie. We are so happy to hear she did a great job and turned things around for you. I assure you our goal is to always exceed our guest's expectations. We are sorry to hear this was not the case at first. We are hoping to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The Super 8 was a let down from the Hotel I stayed at in Buena Park, The Best Host Inn.  I booked this hotel thinking there was a microwave and a fridge, but only a fridge.  Also the breakfast at the Best Host was fabulous and at the Super 8 a real joke.  Mini Waffles and toast with pieces of oranges, and toast.  The ad says a block and a half away from disneyland but it more like 2 1/2 to 3 blocks and states that you can walk it in 8 minutes, but I took 13 to 14 minutes (timed) and I am a fast walker.  The rooms are nice, clean and always prepared when you return.  The t.v. has alot of channels and has good reception.  One complaint about the walls is that I could hear the t.v. on one side until very late and the person on the other side talking (on his phone) I guess.  The
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to know you found our front desk so friendly and helpful during your visit. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance. We are a block and a half from the park. For those who do not wish to park, the Anaheim resort transit does pick up right out front, and comes every 20 minutes up to park closing. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Exactly what we were looking for
Summary: This was a clean, no frills hotel within a 15 mn walk to Disneyland/DCA. This is not a 'resort' hotel by any means, but if you are looking for a nice, cheap hotel to have a hot shower and a good nights sleep - this place absolutely fits the bill. We had an issue with the hot water pressure in the sink, but we said something in the morning, and by the time we got back in the evening it was fixed. FREE parking, and plenty of it! Something a lot of other locations near by did not provide.They do have breakfast - fruit, yogurt, waffles, oatmeal - no protein. The breakfast room is very small, and super crowded. Breakfast hours are only until 9am - with everyone headed to the parks, it would be nice if it was open a little longer. But there are a ton of restaurants within walking
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and you enjoyed your stay with us. We do hope to see you back soon!

Summary: If you're going to Disneyland and on a budget...stay here! My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights and had a wonderful stay. Carlos at the front desk was amazing helping me check in, even before we got there. Our room was super clean and free parking was a huge bonus! Breakfast was good and got us full for a long day at Disneyland! Definitely will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear our staff was so helpful. We do have complimentary parking which is a great and a huge bonus as you say. It is a great way to save on parking at the Disneyland resort.  We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: If you've stayed in a Super8 before (or almost any other American motel), you'll know what to expect. The room was a decent size, and the bed was decent enough. Antiquated (and loud) air conditioner / fan heater which meant the room was either boiling hot or freezing cold. No bath but a decent shower. On the positive side, free wi-fi and a large fridge was handy.  Superstart breakfast was pretty much inedible, and the breakfast room was like a bad factory canteen. Avoid. Luckily the motel is basically next door to loads of decent restaurants, go there instead.  Staff were helpful and friendly, and the outdoor pool and hot tub were great.  Good for the money, but definitely not luxury by any stretch of the imagination.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We do have a heated pool and hot tub, and it is really refreshing and relaxing especially after a long day at the park. Our breakfast is complimentary and is served daily from 6 am to 9 am. As it is very popular, sometimes it does get very busy during the breakfast hours. We do have additional seating on  our sundeck which is really nice and peaceful and a great place to enjoy your breakfast.  Our breakfast includes fresh fruit, yogurt, freshly made waffles with syrup, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, hot cocoa, 2 kinds of juice, hot tea and hot coffee. We are sorry to hear you did not find this an adequate breakfast. As you say there are several great places to dine right next door, and that of course is a great choice as well. We are delighted to hear we  fit into your budget and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: If you are on a budget this is the place to stay.  Near all eating establishments, Disney and sport complexes.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and you had such a great stay.

Summary: Super 8 Anaheim is the perfect place to stay if you're visiting Disneyland/California Adventure. Within walking distance to the park. Lots of nice restaurants nearby. The rooms are clean and well kept. Super 8 Anaheim is our "go to" place when visiting the happiest place on earth!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a delightful stay. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the beds are too firm for us. Ana at the front desk was so helpful...went out of her way to help. THANKS! Breakfast wasn't bad-waffles, yogurt, oranges, cereal, oatmeal and a few other stuff.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great to hear they provided you with such great friendly customer service. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: No bodily fluids on mattress, Excellent!!
Summary: This was a clean place.  I liked it a lot.  Nice and central location.  No blood stains on sheets.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad you had an enjoyable stay and found your accommodations to be so clean. We are in the perfect location, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance. We do hope to see you again soon

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights. Comfortable beds that came with free breakfast. The room is not bad with very clean bathroom - no tub. However, there are ants don't know where it's coming from. No safe or microwave. Distance from Disneyland is pretty good. However, at the end of the day it seems pretty far after walking the whole day. Continental breakfast included oranges, cereal, cinnamon(pre-packed), oatmeal, toast, fresh waffles, coffee, tea and juices. Overcrowded at peak hours in the am.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to know you found your accommodations to be so comfortable. We have upgraded all of our rooms, and added new mattress as well as all new decor. We are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient when staying with us. If you are tired at the end of the day, the ART shuttle does pick up and drop off right in front of the motel. It runs every 20 minutes. We do have a complimentary breakfast that is a great way to start your day and it is very popular with our guests. We do have additional seating above the lobby on our sun deck. It is a pleasant way to enjoy a quiet breakfast. We do have safes available at no extra charge at the front desk. Microwaves are also available upon request and rented on a daily basis. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Breakfast area so small! Workers at the breakfast area are rude! Hotel is nice and great if your a family going to Disneyland üòÄ
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is good to know you found our hotel so comfortable and you found our location to the Disneyland park to be so convenient. We do have a great complimentary breakfast and it is very popular. We do have some additional seating on the sun deck above the lobby as well as in the pool area. We are sorry to hear you found our breakfast attendant was rude. We do apologize for that as our goal is to exceed all of our guest's expectations and provide friendly and helpful customer service to all of our guest's. I assure you we will follow up on this. We do hope to see you next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: Rooms super clean. Refurbished, we enjoyed the stay. Breakfast very good. We definitely recommend it extensively and of course we will return.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay, and even happier to hear you will be returning!

Summary: I was rather surprised regarding the quality of the room and my stay for 4 nights.  The room was clean and seemed like it was newly renovated.  The positives included the proximity to Disneyland, easily walked to in about 10 minutes.  Also, nearby were both businesses and restaurants that provided what we needed.  It also had an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub that appeared to be nice, but we didn't have to time to try them.  The negatives had to be the lack of quality breakfast items.  The breakfast was okay with coffee, cereals, cinnamon rolls, and waffles.  Seating was cramped and hard to come by.  I would stay here again though it any of my travels went back through this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad that you decided to stay with us for your family vacation. We are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are also so close to many great places to shop as well as dine right next door at the garden walk. We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We are looking forward to it.

Summary: When you book a hotel around the Disney park complex, you are faced with a variety of choice, most of them rather pricey. Being on an extended holiday, we opted for a budget hotel close to Disneyland, and were pleasantly surprised. The rooms are well appointed and large, the facilities all work and are clean, and the staff super helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found us to be such a great value. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to know they provided you with that excellent customer service you so deserve. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great location and value for your money. Room was clean and well decorated. Vanity outside of bathroom had the largest counter area with the largest mirror I have seen and made getting ready in the morning for four people very easy. Beds were fairly soft and comfortable. Shower was large and had plenty of hot water. Air conditioner worked very well and was very quiet. My only complaint was the complimentary breakfast was very basic. The fresh waffles were great, but other than that and oranges, just cereal. No bagels and cream cheese. The breakfast was fine for one or two mornings, but after two days gets old. In summary, this motel is an excellent value especially with being about a 15 minute walk to the Disney Resort entrance and being surrounded by excellent restaurants.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are delighted to know you found us to be such a great value. It is true with our free amenities such as free wifi, free breakfast, and free parking it does add so much value to your stay. Our breakfast does include those freshly baked waffles with syrup as you said, as well as fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea as well as coffee. We are sorry to hear that you did not find this adequate.  We are close by to so many great places to shop and dine as well as just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do hope to see you again next time you are in town.

Summary Heading: Great stay for the new year
Summary: We had  a great time. Check in was super easy and everyone was very nice. I would love to see more gluten free options for breakfast. We will be back in may.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. we are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and even happier to hear you will be returning! We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Great price for an average hotel.  I didn't have the highest expectations because of the price of the hotel, but figured we were using the room mostly for sleeping.  The outside of the hotel is dated, but the inside of the room had been updated.  The room was clean (carpet had some stains) and the beds were comfortable.  Service at the front desk was excellent as well as room cleaning service.  It was great to be walking distance from Disneyland; we were able to go back to the room and rest and then walk back to the park without being overly exhausted.  My only disappointment was in the breakfast, and that is because I had the same expectations at this Super 8 that I have experienced other Super 8s--this one was more of a continental breakfast in a couple of very crowded rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you found us to be such a great value when staying with us. Our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast do add so much value to your stay! We are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. In a quick 15 minute walk you are right at the entrance. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Found roaches in our bedroom but did not reported I figured there is nothing they will fix our comment will get ignored
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so sorry to hear you had a bad experience and are very sorry to hear you did not report it. We actually do have a great staff who are ready to assist at all times. We do have a very good pest control routine to prevent things such as this from happening. If you could please drop us an email and let us know what room you were in we will follow up on this. Our email address is reviewsuper8@gmail.com  It is our goal to exceed every guest's expectations and it is  too  bad we did not have the opportunity to have the chance in this case because it was not reported to us until now. We do hope to hear from  you and do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is very close to the entrance of Disneyland. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was ok for a quick snack. Also very close to lots of restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: Thank  you for the review. It is so great to hear we fit so well into your budget! With our free amenities such as free breakfast, free wifi, and free parking it does add so much value to your stay. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are so happy to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Not enough to choose for breakfast,  not close by parking spaces from your room, stain  carpet on the room and polite staff members.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are sorry to hear you were disappointed in your stay. We do have a complimentary breakfast which includes fresh fruit, yogurt, freshly baked waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, hot cocoa, hot tea, hot coffee and 2 kinds of juice. We have found most of our guest's enjoy this and find it a great way to start the day. We are sorry to hear you did not find it adequate. We do have open parking and there are several choices of where to park located next too our rooms. For those on the upper floor, it may be a little walk to the  parking. If you request 1st floor this does make it quite an easy walk to the car from the room. We are delighted to hear you found our staff to be so polite during your stay. We do our best to provide that exceptional customer service you so deserve. We are sorry to hear you found a stain ont eh carpet in your room. if you could give us a call and let us know what room you were in, we would appreciate it so we can follow up on that right away. We are hoping to see you again int he future.

Summary: This is a great budget hotel in a great location. When we go to Disneyland we really don't spend much time in the hotel room, other than to sleep so this was perfect for the price. The rooms were clean and spacious. The beds were comfortable. The breakfast room was busy but we just took it back to our room. The kids enjoyed the pool and hubby and I enjoyed the hot tub. They also have laundry facilities which we used once as we travelled light! Parking was free and we had no trouble finding a spot. We would stay there again!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. I is so great to hear you found us to be such a great value. We are also delighted to know you found our beds to be so comfortable and the room so clean and spacious. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great value with clean budget level comforts
Summary: This property gets mixed up with the other Super 8 north of DL by reviewers. They mistakenly place reviews of the other one here and vice versa. Read them with that in mind.  The sleep was okay. The value was excellent as we booked through a 3rd party service at about 50% off normal rates. The staff was great. The conveniences were average. The eating was just average with cramped space to eat. The room was average.  Overall we would be okay staying here again but only at a fantastic rate below $100. There are other properties we enjoy more. This one works for location and value above all.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is wonderful to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. We are in a great location as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at this location. Both times the rooms are clean and very comfortable.  Close to Disneyland, we walked both days.  Breakfast is so so, but good enough for a day or two.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guest's!  We are so glad you decided to stay with us again. We are so close to the Disneyland park entrance, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed at the Super 8 Anaheim during October 2016 to experience Mickeys Halloween party at Disneyland. We normally stay closer to the entrance but decided to give the Super 8 a try as it was considerably less costly. The staff at Super 8 were really great and very helpful. As budget accommodation we could not fault our stay here with the room spotless, bed comfortable and the room and facilities well kept. After our long days at Disneyland housekeeping had our room fresh and ready for our return. The free breakfast was okay and in line with budget accommodation. It is located about a 20 minute walk from the Disneyland main entrance and is well located. With Walgreens, CVS and the Anaheim Garden Walk Center so close there are plenty of options for eating and to do some
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and you found us to be so conveniently located. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance of the Disneyland park. We are also so close to many great places to shop and dine. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: The room was a good value. I liked that the bathroom looked like it was recently updated and there was a daily breakfast. However, the carpet in our room was really dirty. If you wore socks they were really dirty after waking around for a bit. We made sure to wear she's at all times.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear your found us to be such a great value. We have recently upgraded all of our rooms with new carpeting, new furnishings, as well as new bedding. We are sorry to hear that the carpet in your room did not seem to be clean. We do have a great maintenance staff who do shampoo the rooms on a regular basis. If you could give us a call and let us know which room  you were in we would follow up on this right away. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This is my 3rd time staying here  Amazing location  Fabulous price  Clean and tidy  Great amenities  The pool is small but is find for the size of hotel  Would definitely stay here again  We love bubba Gumps and it next door Nice little pizza place on corner south Harbor and katella
Manager Response: none

Summary: My fianc√© and I stayed here one night prior to our visit to Disneyland. The room was acceptably clean, the WiFi was strong enough for us to stream a movie, and parking was free including on the day of check out. The breakfast was simple, no eggs or meats but they did have freshly made Belgium waffles. The staff was friendly. Overall, for less than $100 per night, I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I chose this hotel because it got really good reviews, however, I was quite disappointed.   Good Points: Walking distance to Disneyland. Bus which takes you to Disney which stops right outside. Many restaurants close by.  Won't ever stay there again points:   1) SOOOO LOUD!! The insulation on the windows is so poor that I could hear EVERY car drive by on the adjoining STREET (not the parking lot) and I wasn't even right on the street. I was a few doors down from the office. I didn't sleep well at all and was there for 3 nights. I had to use an ear plug but could still hear noise. Also could hear EVERY person walk by. Horrible!  2) Because of the good reviews I overlooked that it was a Super8 - but it is still a Super8. It was pretty clean (although the carpets needed cleaning),
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the price, this hotel was great! It is a short walk to Disneyland entrance, and a fraction of the cost of others close by. The rooms were simple, but comfortable. The hotel has free parking, free wifi, Continental Breakfast, and a pool. There are many restaurants within walking distance too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights.  Nice sized room, very clean.  Room did have a musty odor when we first opened the door so I had to leave the door open to air it out a little.  No elevator, only stairs which can be a little challenging if you have alot of stuff.  There was a huge parking garage right across from my room and I would hear car alarms going off all the time.  I didn't really have the need to interact with the staff all that much, but what interaction I did have, they were very pleasant.  All in all though it was a nice stay and very close to Disneyland, just a 10 minute walk.  I will stay again
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughter, boyfriend and I stayed here during December 5-8, 2016 and were quite happy with the double room for those 3 nights.  Room was clean, beds were comfortable!  Great location.  Breakfast could have been a little better, fruit was limited.  the first morning all my boyfriend was able to get were the waffles, which weren't the greatest.  We've definitely had better "free" breakfasts in other hotels.  Also, the door to the outside could be sound proofed more but no real issues, just in the morning while we were getting ready we could easily hear people walking past.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We cant thank the staff enough for making our holiday amazing , the rooms were spacious and fine for a family on a budget. the walk isn't to bad to Disney . the staff was there 24/7 if you needed them and always made you feel welcomed and would do anything to help make your stay a happy one. we were the big group in room 242 :-)  to us it was the staff that made this hotel worth staying at, look forward to seeing you all again on our next holiday :-)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Thank you as well for your compliments to our staff. It is so great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay . We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Great for what you pay for
Summary: Wife and I spent five days here, this hotel is only a 10 min walk from Disneyland which is very convenient. Breakfast every morning is decent too. Pool and hot-tub is great. This is an excellent hotel for what you pay for. If you're looking for a gourmet luxury experience, this hotel wont be the right fit for you. If you're simply looking to stay at a place to go hard at Disneyland that wont empty your wallet, then definitely stay here. On our next Disney vacation we would strongly consider staying here again.   P.S - Access to a microwave will only be available during the morning. If you need one in the afternoon or evening they will charge you more which is dumb.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear we fit so well into your budget, and that you plan on coming back! We do have microwaves in the breakfast room available during breakfast hours. Most of our guest's find this is adequate for use during their stay. If you need to have one in your room we are happy to put one in your room for a small charge of $5 plus tax per night. We are just a short walk to the Disneyland resort entrance, it just takes 10 to 15 minutes to get to the front gate making it so convenient. We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: 1st day okay , next visit no so much
Summary: 1st time we stayed got a 3 star room , it was not super nice,  but it was clean. We stayed here 1 day before we could get our room at the Disney land hotel . Pool was fun , jacuzzi tub was relaxing .. The free breakfast had the normal, cereal, rolls, coffee, waffles. It was just fine. Then our second stop was a real cruddy room smelled as there was mold not at all what we had hoped for, but was to tired after 5 days at Disney land to complain.. Guess check out your room before packing your bags in ... üí§
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We do have an awesome heated pool and hot tub which is a great way to relax and have some fun after a day at the park. I do apologize if you found the room was not as nice the 2nd time staying with us. If you could give us a call and let us know which room you were in, we will follow up on that. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations, and I am sorry that this was not the case. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We chose this hotel as we were handing in our car rental the next day so wanted to be close to everything.  Super 8 was just that.  Close to Disney, restaurants, shopping.  The room had all that you need for a good value for money hotel.  We used the laundry room which was really handy.  room was clean, bathroom a little on the small side.  We were on the ground floor which was good as we had heavy suitcases. there is a pool which we didn't use but saw plenty of others in it.  The breakfast room was quite crowded so you needed to get there early.  Would stay again for the location and the value for money.  Staff were friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear you found us so convenient and we fit into your budget so well.  We are in the perfect location as we are next to the Anaheim Garden walk as well as Downtown Disney where there are several great places to shop and to dine. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Very good choice for group of adults
Summary: 15 minute walk to Disneyland entrance; beds and pillows very comfortable; street noise at times but used ear plugs for sleep; breakfast room a little tight at times when lots of people were trying to get food at the same time, choices included bran flakes, oatmeal, yogurt, orange wedges, waffles, and some drinks; we didn't use the pool but it wasn't busy; rooms clean, fridge an asset!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome to hear you found us to be the perfect place to stay during your visit to Disneyland. We are so glad to know you had such a great time and that you will be back!

Summary: Breakfast was a little sparse, Room was clean and comfortable, Staff was very friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do have a variety of choices during our breakfast hours. We have fresh fruit, yogurt, freshly made waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, 2 kinds of cereal, hot oatmeal, toast with jam, 2  kinds of juice, milk, hot cocoa, hot tea and hot coffee. We try our best  to accommodate all of our guest's and do apologize for any inconvenience. We are happy to hear you found our rooms so clean and comfortable. We do hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Great place to stay for the price.  Office staff was great, very helpful.  Good food within walking distance.  Short walk to Disneyland.  Don't have to pay to park!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in the most convenient location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a short 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: A Pleasant Surprise and a Pleasant Stay
Summary: When I booked my room, I honestly didn't expect much. I have been to other hotels, and their rooms are usually just fine. When I checked in, I was honestly surprised at how nice the room looked. The presentation of the room made it appear as if I was in a fancier hotel. The beds were comfortable as well. When the time came to check out, a friend and I were going to be in the city for a couple extra hours, but we had already checked out of our room. The staff was very understanding, and let us keep our car spot and held onto our luggage until we left the city. Great room presentation and friendly staff are why I would highly recommend this hotel. If I needed to, I would definitely come back here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to  hear they were so friendly and helpful during you stay with us. We are always delighted when we exceed our guest's expectations. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The room was clean and staff was friendly and helpful.   The continental breakfast was good...particularly enjoyed the hot little waffles...and ended right at 9 am.  It is just a short walk to Disneyland.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay with us. Our hot waffles are so delicious! We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Great value for money in a good location
Summary: I stayed in a ground floor room.  The room was very spacious, although the bathroom was smaller, with the hand basin sitting outside in the room itself.  The staff were really friendly and helpful and the desk is manned 24/7.  I was there for a visit to Disneyland and couldn't fault the location and convenience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are always delighted to hear when we fit so well into our guest's budget! We are located so close to the Disneyland park, just 15 minutes from the park entrance making it so convenient. We are also right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk and Downtown Disney where there are several great places to shop and dine as well. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean Nice Rooms For a Great Price
Summary: Staff was very nice, But there are no gluten free items on the breakfast bar, they need to have a few options for gluten free people, Chex cereal would be a nice start. other than that this is a nice clean hotel for a great price. the walk only took us 12 to 15 min to the park gate. and I loved the fact they don't ding you for parking every night when you stay there.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We do want to accommodate all of our guest's. We understand everyone has different dietary needs. We do have some items on our breakfast menu that are gluten free, such as yogurt, fresh fruit and juice. We are always updating and improving our menu, and we will take your suggestions! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We chose this motel for its convenient location to Disneyland. Very nice, clean, comfortable but the bathroom was very tiny. Nice people running it. Very nice breakfast included. Large dining room and attentive servers. But.... no bananas!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so pleasing to hear you found us to be so conveniently located and you were so comfortable during your stay with us. We do have a delicious breakfast, with fresh fruit such as oranges, or apples. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This is the first time I've stayed at a Super 8 motel, and I have to say, it was clean and comfortable, the staff was very nice, and the breakfast was great! another plus is that they're Non-smoking rooms. Disneyland, restaurants and convenience stores are all walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to hear we exceeded your expectations! We are so conveniently located as you say, with several places to dine and shop all within walking distance. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good hotel within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: Although asked for an upper floor, ended up on the ground floor with people stomping about above us at all hours. Apart from that, no complaints. Rooms are very spacious, with two large comfortable double beds with lots of pillows. Good large flat screen TV. The breakfasts were very good, with a selection of cereal, oatmeal, yoghurt, juice, tea, coffe & chocolate. There was also a member of staff on hand making waffles. The pool is small, but nice. The location and free parking are an added bonus. There are a number of restaurants and shops within easy walking distance, would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We have recently upgraded our rooms, we are delighted to hear you liked our changes and upgrades we have made to our rooms. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed here in Nov 2016 for 2 nights to visit Disneyland. We received a friendly welcome at the front desk and were quickly checked in. The room was upstairs and spotlessly clean and comfortable. the bathroom also was spotless and water pressure good and hot. Beds were very comfortable and  slept like a log both nights and didn't hear a thing. Firework from Disneyland were visible and audible from the landing. Location is very good, alongside Gardenwalk. Close to Walgreen's and CVS. There is a Dennys, IHOP and 7-11 close by, and a quick walk, about 10 mins to Disneyland front gate. Would stay here again in a heartbeat if visiting the area again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so exciting to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found us to be such a value. We are so close to so many great places to shop and dine as you say, and just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are even more excited to hear you will be back! We look forward to it!

Summary: Very accommodating with free parking on date of check-in and check-out.............  clean updated room..........  good bed.............  good cinnamon rolls, waffles, and coffee for breakfast...........  easy walk to Disneyland, California Adventures, and Downtown Disney (free 2 hour parking at DT Disney, if tired of walking)................  right next to a Bubba Gump's, close to a 7-Eleven, Walgreens, CVS, mall, and multiple eateries.    Only tiny complaint is the bath towels are a little thin.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is so awesome to hear you found we fit into your budget so well and you found us to be such a great deal. With our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast, this does add so much value to your stay. We hope to see you again next time you are  in Anaheim.

Summary: I was extremely happy with this motel.  I am always nervous to try a new place.  All I really want is clean and friendly and this place was both!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  We always love it when we exceed our guest's expectations! We are delighted to hear you were so happy with your stay.  We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Decent place to stay for the price. Clean and staff was friendly and helpful.  Location is great for walking to Disney to avoid high cost of parking.  Rooms are ok sized and somewhat updated.  Nice outside pool and hot tub.  Continental breakfast is a nice plus, but limited selection.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found our location to be so convenient! It is true, we are just a short 15 minute walk to the park entrance, making it so easy to park here and walk on over saving some money on  the budget. We do have a wonderful heated pool and hot tub, as you say it is so nice after a day at the park! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: PERFECT choice for DISNEYLAND  VACATION ‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è We have stayed here the last 2 times we have visited Disneyland and think it is the PERFECT choice ...SUPER clean and quiet , ( and recently updated ! ) FREE delicious breakfast including fresh hot off the griddle waffles...AMAZING above and beyond attentive staff  , and GREAT location... ( There are several great restaurants and markets surrounding the property if you ever need anything )... No need to rent a car or pay high prices to stay in the park !
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to hear you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We do our very best to exceed our guest's expectations each and every time. We want to thank you for choosing to stay with us and we so look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: clean and spacious rooms, located close to everything, including Disneyland, free in room fridge has its obvious advantages, store your water food and snacks, free breakfast and parking, the money you save staying here can be spent on other things, very enjoyable stay at this hotel, i highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, and thank you for recommending us as well! We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay and you found our free amenities helped so much with the budget. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very pleases with the hotel location.
Summary: Hotel location is walking distance to Disneyland and the hotel breakfast was good.  The only low review we have is when we turned in the AC It has bad smell, it smell like cigarettes smell, but after it's been on the smell went away only.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found the location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We are also happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. it is a great way to start the day and the freshly baked waffles are so good! We do apologize if the AC unit smelled a bit when you turned it on, but it is good to hear it improved once it was on for minute.  We do have a 24 hour front desk, please do not hesitate to notify us if something like this happens so we can address it for you. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here with three teenage girls. Free parking is a plus. Rooms are large. Nice staff. Negatives - basic wifi is weak at best (wouldn't load news sites to read without timing out, higher tier $10). Breakfast was terrible. Donuts, crappy coffee with powered creamer, and Eggo waffles with one working toaster (my son loves Eggs waffles - when they are not kept frozen, they turn out strange in a toaster). No attendant in the breakfast area, thus dirty tables and floor.  All that being said, I've stayed here twice. Can't beat the price, proximity, and free parking (use the money you save to eat somewhere for breakfast).
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do have to wonder if you stayed here at the Super 8 on Katella, as we do not serve Eggo waffles. We have fresh baked waffles that our staff makes every morning for our guest's. We also do not serve donuts with our breakfast. We do have cinnamon rolls, however, but we do not serve donuts with our breakfast. We have not just one, but 2 breakfast attendants during our breakfast hours in the breakfast room. That being said, we are glad to hear you found the staff to be so friendly and you found the free parking to help out with the budget. Thank you again for the review, and we would recommend you follow up with the property where you stayed. We would love to have you stay with us in the future!

Summary: Great location. Easy walking to parks. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Housekeeping skipped my room one night. Front desk did not understand what I was asking for at check in. Pool area is a little outdated but clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do apologize for any confusion upon checking in. We do our very best to meet and understand all of our guest's needs and and concerns. We are working on updating and upgrading our whole property, including the heated pool and hot tub. We are happy to hear you had a chance to enjoy it and it was so nice and  clean. We are looking forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Very nice. Clean hotel with friendly staff. Will definitely stay there again. Great rates and location. Seems to have been recently renovated -- everything seemed new. Wonderful free breakfast -- waffles, cereal, toast and more!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you liked our remodeling and upgrade of our rooms and property. We are really looking forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Just love this place! I cringe when I see the bad reviews. You just can't please everyone. It isn't the Ritz so don't expect that. It is a great motel for budget-minded families. It is walking distance to Disney, but for seniors it is nice to have the ART (Anahiem Resort Transit) available right in front of the motel. Passes can be purchased in advance online or at kiosks at Disneyland. Otherwise the fare is $3 per adult, $1 per child and $1 per senior, each way. The passes are a much better deal.Rooms are always clean, beds comfy, continental breakfast is a great start in the morning. I can't say enough about the staff. Ana is a sweetheart!!! I just love her!I feel as if I have come home when I see her at the desk! I have stayed here for years and would never stay anywhere
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. it is always such a pleasure to hear from repeat guest's. We are so happy to know you always have a great stay and you feel as if you are home when staying with us. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so wonderful to know we are doing our very best at exceeding our guest's expectations. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Be Careful! Lock Your latch on the Door
Summary: Always make sure you lock your latch on the door. The motel double booked our room. We were sound asleep at 11, when someone was opening our door with a card key. Thankfully they could not get in. The door had opened just a crack. They couldn't get it all the way open because we had locked the latch. And then the family was trying to open the side door. Good thing we had locked that on our side. 5 Minutes late the desk called asking if our room was occupied. I said obviously it is, I answered the phone. Also the room is not very sound proof. You can hear everything from outside. The rooms were very clean and comfortable besides that.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do want to apologize if it appeared we double booked your room. I assure you we have looked into this and we are truly sorry for any confusion. It is always advisable as you say to lock the latch on your door. We are happy to hear you found our rooms to be so clean and comfortable. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: A great place for a quick overnight
