Summary: The room price and location are all excellent. The bed was comfortable and the room was very clean. What else can you ask for? It's within walking distance to downtown Disney and Disneyland. The service and staff are very accommodating
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to know you found them to be so accommodating. We are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park, just 15 minutes to the park entrance! We are glad you found our location to be so convenient. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great customer service from all staff members I interacted with,,  a little bit pricey, but it was nice,
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so happy your choose to stay with us for the Disney Run and we do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here for a run Disney event. Location was great for walking to the parks. Room had been updated with new beds and shower. Carpet also appeared newer and was clean. Some rooms still being updated while we were visiting. Breakfast was available only took advantage of the coffee but saw waffles, yogurt and cereals. Many restaurants, drug and convenience stores nearby. Staff was friendly. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are right next door to so many great places to dine and shop as well. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  it is a great way to start the day! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Low price & nice place close to Disneyland.
Summary: I chose the Super 8 on Katella Ave. for the low rate, trusted brand name and close proximity to Disneyland. We got there a day late due to flights but had no problem checking in. The room and property were exactly what you'd expect from a lower-end hotel and we had no issues.   The only problem was the room had ants. Lots of ants. And we were on the second floor. Didn't bother me though.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear we fit into our guest's budget and that our guest's have a great stay. We do apologize for the inconvenience of the ants in your room. We do have a great maintenance staff who do have a great pest control routine schedule. We do hope to see you again in the future next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: The hotel room was outdated however the pool was heated and jacuzzi was great.  Laundry facilities a bonus and 10 minutes walk to Disney.  Breakfast was just fine compared to other places however the staff are friendly. The room was clean however wished they had a safe.  I found the location quiet and only a shorter trip to The Walkway and The Cheesecake Factory!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland as it is only a 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are also right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk where the Cheesecake factory as well as several other great places to dine are. We are so glad we fit so well into your budget and we do hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary Heading: Good deal for the price. Comfy stay
Summary: Super 8 Anaheim Near Disneyland is our go to when we plan a mini-vacation to Disneyland and California Adventure. Comfy bed. Clean rooms. Nice stay. Lotsa clean towels and linens. Short distance from the Happiest Place on Earth. :D
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and you  had such a comfy and good stay with us. We have upgraded our rooms including new mattress, we are delighted you found the be so comfortable. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I had a recent reservation for this past Veteran's day weekend in Anaheim for the Disney's Marvel Avengers Run Disney weekend.  We were to check in Friday, Veterans day and check out on Sunday, Nov 13th.  Check in was at 3pm and I arrived around 3:20pm.  Upon checking in, I was told I would have to wait another 20-30 minutes because they had no rooms available.  Now for some one who has been out all morning traveling to this hotel, this was not pleasing to hear especially when I arrived after supposed check in time.  Fortunately another worker was there who had the original front desk rep help me with a room immediately.  Now traveling with a toddler, that was news to my ears.  Now upon arriving at my room which was on the second floor, I was displeased to see that there wasn't
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to know that our front desk staff was able to get you checked into the room upon arrival. We do want to apologize for the inconvenience as we are working on remodeling and upgrading our property and our rooms. It sounds like this was the case upon your arrival. We  do have a super start breakfast which is complimentary and served every morning from 6 am to 9 am. We do have additional seating available on our sundeck as our breakfast is quite popular. We are located on Katella as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. For those who do not wish to walk, the ART shuttle does pick up right out in front and comes every 20 minutes. We do hope to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland park.

Summary: Near Disneyland, great breakfast, clean comfortable rooms and excellent service from staff.  We locked our keys in our car and the front desk helped us find a lock smith and had it open in 20 min. Thanks you guys are the best!  Only complaint was that the hot tube and pool were dirty. Not normal for this motel but they were nasty this trip.  We WILL stay hear again! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do strive to exceed our guest's expectations in every way, It is a bit disappointing to hear this was not the case regarding the heated pool and hot tub. We will follow up on that and do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Clean.  Friendly staff.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  First floor rooms facing the parking lot get a lot of foot traffic noise.  Beds were a little hard for my taste, but that is just personal preference.  All in all a good hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  It is so awesome to hear we fit so well into your budget and you had an enjoyable stay with us.  We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We have stayed at this Super 8 twice while visiting Disney. Easy 15 minute walk to the park entrance. Several restaurants within walking distance. Our rooms have been clean and quiet. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so good to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are delighted to know you found our location to be so convenient, we do look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: The gentleman who checked us in was lovely. A large room with a spacious shower and vanity area.  Only a 15 minutes walk to the entrance of Disneyland. Multiple convenience stores, restaurants, CVS and Downtown Disney are only a short walk away.  Heated pool and jacuzzi which was very popular.  Continental breakfast was great and plentiful. Cereals, cinnamon scrolls, juices, tea, coffee, fruit, toast and freshly cooked waffles.  Great value option for our 4 days in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay. We are in the perfect location, so close to the Disneyland park entrance, it is just  a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. The various stores and restaurants are within walking distance as you say, making it so convenient. We are so happy to know you found us to be such a great value as well. We are looking forward to your return1

Summary Heading: We had a great experience, and we loved everything  Super 8 had to offer
Summary: Everything at Super 8 was clean and accessible. Plenty of towels, plenty of parking. The staff was very helpful and cordial.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room had 3 cockroaches and mold/mildew in the AC unit. We asked to be relocated, and got moved into a new room... with more cockroaches and mold. Hotel staff was apathetic and even worse, they had another family booked into our old room the same night we moved out!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 5 nights. On the 2nd and 3rd days, I had noticed an ant hanging out in the bathroom, but it wasn't a bother so I didn't say anything. Then waking up on the 5th day, there were ants all over the bedside! We were in a rush to leave for our last day at Disney so we didn't complain to the staff, however, my boyfriend's mother was quick to call them and arrange a new room for our last night (she booked the reservation as a birthday present to her son, so that's why she went mama bear over the ant problem). That evening after Disney, we went straight to the front desk and everything was sorted. Kudos to the staff and their service!  The new room had 2 queen beds because that's all they had available for the night. No complaints! Last night and a
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very clean, well-kept, and for the budget I was on, overall nice looking. Had A/C and a fridge. I would assume their roomkeeping service is great, however I left the "Do Not Disturb" sign on my door for the whole day due to having a very expensive ($1.5k) laptop and other electronics in the room. They did leave a note saying they did not go in and do any roomkeeping and I could call a number or go to the front desk for any roomkeeping service, which was a good sign they respected privacy. The small complaint I would have is the unstable WiFi connection, but it was free and I didn't know whether or not it was the area my room was at that was a problem. The area was an 8-10 minute walk to Blizzcon (2016) and was near CVS, Walgreens, and some food places nearby.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are delighted to hear you decided to stay with us when attending Blizzcon at the Anaheim Convention Center. We are just a short walk making it very convenient. We are sorry to hear that you had a problem with the wifi. We do have a 24 hour tech support line for any wifi issues. We also have  a 24 hour front desk. If you have problems in the future with the wifi please let us know so we can assist. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: ten minute walk to Disney, lots of stuff in walking distance, clean, small pol but good on a hot day, pretty perfect
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear you had such a great stay and you found our location to be so convenient! We do have wonderful pool that is very refreshing on  a hot day I do have to agree! We are hoping to see you again soon.

Summary: I enjoyed our stay, it was clean and family friendly. Close to Disneyland we walked back n forth each day. Close to restaurants. The only bad was that I could occasionally hear out neighbors through the wall, and we had ants in the bathroom the first day, never came back after that. Not a big deal since they never came back. I really liked they had easily accessible outlets to plug in all of our chargers. I definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay! We are even happier to hear you will be returning! We have recently upgraded all our rooms and have included some extra outlets! It is so great that you found them to be so handy. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The rooms does remind me of those 70s to 80s sitcom, very old fashion, but clean. The rooms were big, and our family of 4 with our luggage fit very comfortably in the room.  The free breakfast snack was nothing to rave about, and just enough to fill our tummies for the not so short walk to Disneyland. The distance of the hotel is not too close, that after a day of walking in Disneyland, you would probably try to find a cab or Uber to bring you back to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay. We are a short walk to the Disneyland park entrance, it takes 15 minutes to walk to the front gate. The ART shuttle also picks up right out front and it is just $5 per day per person and you can go back and forth as much as you need to. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: It's no secret that this hotel could use a few upgrades (the carpet has had its time etc), however... when you're on a budget and don't want to spend a fortune for a room you crash at the end of a long day in Disney.. this is your hotel! The rooms are clean, and it appears the bathrooms have been recently upgraded. The bed is plenty sufficient when you're exhausted from being at the park all day. The staff at the check-in desk are always friendly and helpful. It's about a 10-15 minute walk to the park, so plan accordingly so you can make it for gate opening. They provide breakfast: toast, cereal, yogurt and waffles. It's nothing fancy, but it comes with the price of the room, so it's perfect to eat something quick on your way to the park! There is also the Anaheim garden walk
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is wonderful to know we fit so well into your budget. It is true with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast, it does add so much value to your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: We chose Super 8 because it was more affordable than hotels closers to Disneyland. We had a car so we used the very close by Disney parking and we're at the gate in only about ten minutes. A big plus at night when you are tired from walking all day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are in a great location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. If you do choose to drive, we are very close to Disneyland parking as well making it so convenient. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Rooms are small. Breakfast was waffles made by staff, muffins, yogurt, pastries, and cereal. It's a good 15 min walk to Disneyland entrance. If you need a bed and bathroom this is the place. Any other amenities I would look elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear we fit so well into your budget and you had such a great stay. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: This motel is pretty average, and kind of forgettable. I've stayed in plenty of other motels that were the same price or less and the amenities were way better.   Pros: clean rooms, nice staff, hot tub/pool, yummy fresh waffles.  Cons: they say there rooms are renovated, but the bed was not. Upon inspection, it was old and I could feel every spring. NO microwave in the room (that's a deal breaker) so any leftovers you have will probably be wasted or greatly accumulated. Paper thin windows/walls and was awoken every morning from a truck constantly backing up (so don't book a room in the back of the complex!).   So all in all, my stay here was blah and I probably won't be returning unless the room rates are no more than 70/night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We have recently renovated all our rooms, including the mattress and furnishings. We do not have microwaves in the room as you say, however, upon request we can send one to your room for a minimal fee. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Given the location (close to Disneyland) and the money paid and the clearly updated rooms I have to admit this place was much better than expected.  The free breakfast in the morning seemed to overwhelm the staff running it and there was too many people in there at once but maybe we just happen to catch it at a bad time.  The beds seemed new and a little firm which was ok for one of us.  The AC was tough to gauge as well it was either too cold with it on low or way too warm with no air on at all.  But again...given the price we paid and the location its tough to beat the value we got and the nice safe room. If the price was right I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and you had an enjoyable stay. It is always great to know we exceeded our guest's expectations. We are looking forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Found this motel to be very convenient to Disneyland just a short 15 min walk. Rooms very clean and serviced daily staff friendly and helpful and no traffic noise. Only noise is from other inconsiderate guests. Breakfast was good and very close to restaurants would definitely recommend and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome that you found us to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance as you say. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Room was great! Dont know if windows are not double pain or walls to thin. I can hear people walking and talking while trying to get some sleep. Other than that everything was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us overnight. We do have a 24 hour front desk if you ever need to let us know of noise that keeps you awake. We are here to make sure you have a great relaxing stay. We are hoping to see you again in the future.

Summary: Very impressed with our stay here. The room was great (alot better than the Hollywood hotel), staff were lovely and friendly and the breakfast had a really good selection. Would definitely recommend this hotel. 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland and next door to a shopping centre and Bubba Gumps.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to hear you were so impressed and you found our location to be so convenient. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Had some issues at check in.  The front desk staff was rude and did not want to look for available rooms for early check in
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, perfect for a few days stay for Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was fine. The great advantage is the free parking for hotel guests. This was already valid on the full arrival day which was perfect! The room itself was ok and fully equipped.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Maybe I was expecting too much... Very dated and not overly appealing. We were on the second level in a room towards the back of the motel so it was quiet. The room is very cave like, only light is from the front window. Bathroom sink is outside of the bathroom and the bathroom itself is very small. I didn't notice right away but the bathroom looked to be recently updated but to a poor quality. Double bed was soft and smaller than we were used to! The walk to Disney is about 15-20min. Breakfast was a miss, the setup does not work. The serving and dining area is cramp. Free parking and close to eateries.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not what I expected from the reviews!
Summary: When we got there it was at about 9:30am, we understood that check in time was not until 3pm (pretty late) so we did appreciate that they let us park our car there while we went to Disneyland. We came back at around 3:30pm (after check in time) and the guy told us that our room was not ready yet, to wait 5 mins. We waited more than five minutes, he kept trying to get a hold of housekeeping over the two way radio with no success for about 15 mins. Then a girl came in to get her room changed, she had just checked in, she said the vending machine outside was making too much noise, they gave her another room right away ( which I couldnt understand since we had been waiting for 20 mins). They gave us room #190, we went to get in and as soon as we opened the door it smelled like
Manager Response: none

Summary: First impression was how clean room was, found mattress to be to soft. Did not eat breakfast at motel instead walked to nearby Denny's. Close to Disneyland, great price, plenty of restaurants near motel. Appears that they are trying to update but have not gotten there yet. Front desk staff nice. Would consider staying again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review.Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, it is good to hear they provided you with such great service. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: I was pretty impressed with the property for the value presented.  Probably the Best Super 8 I have ever stayed in. Big rooms, clean, decent pool, awesome location, friendly staff.  Breakfast was the only thing that could be seriously improved.  Get rid of the styrofoam, add fresh baked goods (not packaged) pastries, more fruit, better traffic flow.  We loved the idea of an included continental breakfast, but the lines were too long, layout strange and the breakfast could definitely be improved for it detracted from the rest of the high quality of this hotel.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are delighted that you found us to be such a great value, and you were so pleasantly surprised. We are happy to know you enjoyed your visit and that you will be back.

Summary: Myself and my Husband have just recently stayed here for three nights and it was great.  The locations is perfect and is literally a 10 minute walk from both Disney Parks and Downtown Disney. The rooms are very spacious, we had two double beds in ours and it had everything we needed. The fridge was quite large as well which was good as we could store all our water to take to the parks the next day.  Breakfast in the morning was fine, porridge, cereal, yogurts,  pastry, waffles,  juice, tea and coffee. The seating area did get quite busy, but we always found a place to sit.  Also right next door to the hotel there's other restaurants like Bubba Gumps and Cheese cake factory. There's plenty of other hotels round this area, but we saved ourselves a lot of money by staying here,
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to know you had such an awesome stay and you liked the new upgrades to our rooms. We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We look forward to it.

Summary: You pay for what you get. Parking sometimes got a little tight but overall a very accommodating stay; front desk workers were friendly and helpful. Continental breakfast helped us save money at the park for sure, would have been nice to have more "hot" options though. Room was overall nice and clean; floors are a little dirty because after showering we noticed dirt on our feet. Our check out was early on our last day when our flight didn't leave until a couple hours later, and they were very accommodating with letting us hang onto our parking pass until we needed to leave Anaheim. Very appreciated!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you had such a great visit with us and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are always happy to hold luggage at the front desk! We are looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Disney vacation with my beautiful fianc√©e
Summary: This hotel is perfect walking distance to Disneyland, took us 15 minutes from our hotel room which was great. Room was clean and tidy even had a fridge which was a bonus. Bed was comfy and clean. Staff was always really friendly and helpful. Only disappointing part was the breakfast it was really basic just offering, cinnamon roll, yoghurt, waffles, cereal, bread which could be toasted. No fruit or basic stuff like eggs or bacon which was why it only got four stars. The trip was perfect though and having a clean close hotel was such a treat. Would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear our staff was so friendly and helpful during your stay. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us and we are delighted to hear you will be returning!

Summary: Highly recommended to stay! About 10-15 walk to Disneyland and the hotel had strong WiFi. The staff allowed me to check in early without additional fee and it also includes daily continental breakfast. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review and thank you as well for recommending us to others! We are so excited to hear you will be back.

Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful throughout stay. Free breakfast was good with lots of choices,loved the waffles,room was very clean,excellent location for Disneyland. Only 15 minute walk awY
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so awesome to hear you had such a great stay and you found us to be such an excellent value. We are so happy to know you will be returning!

Summary: So close to the park you can walk to the main gate. Rooms are clean and staff is friendly. Continental breakfast is a great way to start the day, Tons of restaurants near by as well as a drub store and a 7/11.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests! We are so close to so many great places to shop and dine as well. We are located right next door to the Garden walk, and just a quick walk to Down Town Disney. We are excited for your return!

Summary: Hard to beat for the money.  Room was quiet even though there was quite a bit of activity outside.  Continental breakfast was typical (waffles/yogurt/cereal/etc).  Parking was a plus, as we could park in the Super 8 lot the day we checked out & went to Disney.  So we paid ~$130 for the room, but didn't have to buy breakfast (~$40) & didn't have to pay to park at Disney (~$18).  Walk to Disney took ~10 minutes & the staff provided helpful instruction to get there.  Would recommend if you're traveling to Disney & need a relatively inexpensive spot to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to know you found us to be such a great value. It is true with our amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed here for 2nd half of our trip. Fresh waffles. Yogurt. Cereal. No fresh fruit. 8 min walk to Disneyland. 1/2 block from Walgreens, 7-11, a market. Walmart 25 min walk down Katella. Renovated bathroom. No microwave in room
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are happy to know you found us to be such a great value. We have recently upgraded all of our rooms as you say, and we do have microwaves available upon request. We are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We were in Anaheim to visit Disneyland, not to spend a lot of time in our hotel.  All I wanted was a hotel that was within walking distance (10-15 mins max) to Disneyland, had both a pool and hot tub, laundry facilities, free parking, good wifi, clean rooms and wasn't going to cost a fortune.  Apart from the sticky carpet, the Super 8 Anaheim near Disneyland fulfilled all of these requirements.    Moreover it had a free breakfast (which I didn't try), the staff was helpful and it was practically next door to all of the restaurants in GardenWalk.  If you're after a swanky hotel, this is not for you but if you're on a budget, I'd totally recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, making it so convenient. We are delighted to hear you found us to be so affordable! We are looking forward to seeing you on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Very clean, great value for price, breakfast very basic but ok.
Summary: The room was very clean and spacious. Beds were comfortable. Breakfast was fine for a Motel, could add fruit or other healthy choices, though.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you had such a great stay and you found us to be such a great value. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Hotel was clean, comfortable & convenient to Disneyland. The continental breakfast was nice, we did not realize it was included (nice surprise). Great pool & hot tub. Very pleasant staff.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, it is great to know they were so nice and helpful. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed two nights at this location.  Pros:  walk to Disney in 10-15 mins,  clean, limited breakfast, cost was reasonable., good wifi.  Cons:  noisy - thin walls, limited breakfast - would be nice to have more choices,  busy hotel, long wait at check-in late at night. But would I consider staying again - yes.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to know you found our location to be so convenient and that you will be back! We are looking forward to it!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Super 8 on Katella.  The room was clean, nice size, however upon returning to the room the second night our keys had been turned off and we had been charged a Pet fee of $117 because house keeping found a "pet hair" in the room.  They refused to remove the charge even though there was no pet with us or ever in our room.  The manager was not available to speak with us.  They said the charge would be reversed on our last day of stay but in fact they had charged my bank again for a second $117 fee,  I am disputing with my bank and contacting Corporate since the hotel seems unable or unwilling to correct the issue.  I would not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We are a pet free motel, and for those who do have allergies to pets, we must make sure each room is free of any pet hair, or pet dander as our guest's expect that because we are a pet free motel. We do a great thorough job at cleaning and inspecting our rooms each and every day. Our housekeeping manager is very experienced and makes sure every room is inspected before we rent it to another guest. In such cases where pet hair, or evidence of a pet is there, we must not re rent the room until it has been cleaned and shampooed and made a pet free environment for our next guest.  We do apologize for any fees, but this is to cover the additional cleaning costs.

Summary Heading: Great- we traveled there to go to Disneyland and the location was totally within walking distance.
Summary: This hotel was great we stayed there with 22 people in our family and they were accommodating and put all of our rooms by each other and the service was great location was great and we will definitely be staying there again!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear you had such a great family vacation and you found our service to be so great. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: This hotel is in a great location. Easy walk to Disneyland and next door to lots of restaurants (Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gumps etc).  Lots of parking. Comfortable beds.  I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others.  Fantastic price for the location.  Free breakfast, WIFI and parking.  The kids loved the great swimming pool.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in a perfect location for visiting the Disneyland park and the Anaheim Garden walk is right next door where there are so many great choices to dine and shop. We are hoping to see you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: We always love staying here and are very happy with the recent renovation. The beds are super comfy and the new bathroom features are fabulous!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always so wonderful to hear from repeat guests. It is good to know you found our upgrades to be such an improvement. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: rooms were clean but the 1st day out we came back at 4:00pm and they had not cleaned our rooms had to get the front desk to tell them to clean our room other than that our stay was good. We were able to see firewoorks right from our hotel, Hot tub and pool worked great
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you chose to stay with us when visiting the Disneyland park. it is true you can see the fireworks from right here at the motel. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights, the room was very comfortable and clean, the staff was very helpful and the continental breakfast was good, fresh waffles were a plus.   Not enough seating, we had to take our breakfast back to our room, but that was ok. Only a 15 min. walk to Disney!! The only reason I did not give them a perfect score was on our second night there we returned from Disneyland to an open door. Whoever made up our room while we were gone left the door open, thankfully nothing was missing. The front desk said they would leave a note for the manager. they were very helpful. I'm sure it was just a mistake. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of Disneyland making us very convenient when visiting the park. We do apologize for any inconvenience and assure you we did follow up on this. It is good to hear you found our front desk staff to be so friendly and helpful. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: Stayed there with my family on a trip to disneyland. Very close to the parks and very convenient. The rooms were clean and comfy and the stay overall was great. Our room was serviced everynight and i appreciated that. The breakfast was good and had quite an option to choose from. would recommend this to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are such a  great value and it is so good to hear we fit into your budget and that you will be back!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights whilst visiting the parks as we got a great rate of $50 a night and figured we wouldn't spend much time at the hotel so there was no point getting somewhere nicer. The motel was great value for that price. The rooms were a decent size, the bed comfortable and the breakfast was fine for grabbing on the way to the parks. The only negative was our room did smell strongly of air freshener when we walked in but guess that's better than some other scents! If I were to choose again or was travelling with kids I would maybe book a place even closer to the parks as I didn't quite appreciate just how much walking you do and if you need to nip back to the hotel in the day then that trip can seem quite a lot on your feet! If you literally walk there in the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are such a great value as you say with our complimentary breakfast, free wifi, and free parking this does add so much value to your stay. We cant wait for your next visit!

Summary: - It'a motel with all amenities of pillows - Clean and sufficient rooms with lots of pillows - AC, LED TV, mini fridge (hope its in all rooms) - Free Parking(not assigned) - Complimentary breakfast (wafels, milk, coffee, orange, cinnamon roll, kellogs) - Disney / Universal Studios tickets in discount around $5(one-day hopper), $15(3-day hooper) - hope these discount tickets available almost in all neighbourhood hotels. - Open swimming pool(small) - Microwave oven for $5/night - on request - Guest laundry - shops nearby Walgreens, CVS, Subway(24/7), Cheesecake factory, next to Garden walk mall.  Our family with 2 kids stayed here 4 nights(Wed to Sat) for the Disney trip and the stay was awesome and very comfortable to walk to disney. We got it on average of $70/night +TAX.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. we are so happy to hear you found we fit so well into your budget. It is nice to know you found our breakfast so delicious and so cost effective. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Clean room, nice staff, fine breakfast, great location, and good price. But the most uncomfortable, rock hard bed I've ever encountered. Neither of us got 10 minutes sleep. And despite the good point, the primary purpose of renting the room was a place to sleep. Sorry, can't recommend you.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient and you found our upgraded rooms to be so clean. It is also good to hear you found we fit so well into your budget. We are sorry to hear however you did not find the mattress comfortable. We have recently upgraded all of our rooms with new mattresses. We do hope you will visit us again in the future.

Summary: If you aren't into fancy and just want a good, honest, basic place, this is it. Been coming for several years. There's a minor breakfast, but the $2/$4/$6/$8 menu at Denny's is on the way with better choices. So, if you don't mind some exercise, it's a great choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear we fit so well into your budget and that you found our breakfast to be such a great perk when staying with us. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We visited Anaheim to go to Disneyland and the location to the property is a couple of blocks from Disneylan. Yes you can walk to it and No it's not 15 minutes from the location . It was a family trip 2 toddlers ,my sister and myself . Toddlers are 2 and 3 yrs old. Room was great. Front Desk person was very friendly and gave me choice of a downstairs room because she saw the strollers. I wish I can remember her name she was nice . Whoever was working around 7pm-8pm on Sunday September 25th. Continental Breakfast was Great it's more that there places offer. There's Cereal, Make your own mini waffles station that someone manages, cereal, already packaged, cinnamon rolls, yogurt, fruit , coffee, milk, orange and apple juice. Plenty of ice machines near rooms. Soda machines also
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay at Super 8 for your family vacation to Disneyland. We are also so happy to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We look forward to seeing you again on  your next family vacation to Disneyland!

Summary: Super 8 is clean, quiet, comfortable.  The entire staff was friendly and helpful.  The pool was great and the hot coffee and waffles - perfect!  I highly recommend this Super 8! Walking distance to Disneyland and Convention Center.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are just a quick 5 minute walk to the Anaheim convention center. This makes it so convenient when attending a conference or an event. Glad to hear you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Friendly staff! Clean, great price for being right by Disney. 10 minute walk from hotel to park. Offer discounts for tickets to the park. Offers free continental breakfast, free parking, pool. Great eating places around the block.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to know you found us such a great place to rest when traveling. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: price was only about 25.00 less than other hotels in the area. location to disneyland is great. the room itself, not so much. carpet dirty, room reeked of strong cleaner smell, door was loose when shut and locked, breakfast had no meat whatsoever. only tiny waffle, ceareal. would not stay there again. you get what you pay for. the employees were very nice, though.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is good to hear they were so friendly during your stay with us. We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced  and assure you we will follow up on the issues you mentioned. We do have a great maintenance staff. Our complimentary breakfast includes fresh fruit, yogurt, waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal with toast and jam, cinnamon rolls as well as coffee, tea, cocoa and 2 kinds of juice. We do not have meat on the menu as you say, and we apologize. We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Another first class stay at an affordable price
Summary: Another amazing Halloween vacation. Helped by the good people of the Super 8 on W Katella. This hotel is worth every cent paid. The best value by far of the hotels surrounding Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always such a pleasure to hear from repeat guests! Thank you for joining us for your Halloween visit! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: You can't beat it for the price!! Close enough to walk to Disneyland. The rooms were clean, the place was quiet. Our room had a mini fridge, coffee maker with coffee and tea. The free breakfast was basic, cereal, milk, juice, waffles, fruit, and cinnamon rolls. Wish there was a little more selection of pastries. We would come back again for sure.    Nothing bad to say about this place.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so close to the Disneyland park. We are just 15 minutes walk to the park entrance. We are glad to hear you liked the amenities such as the fridge, and coffee maker in the room. It does make things so much easier and convenient and it does help with the food budget! We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and room was kept neat.
Summary: The Super 8 was a good value for the money but the carpet felt dirty and sticky. We were close to Disney and it had free breakfast and a pool. We only used the pool once but it was a decent size. There was plenty of seating around the pool. The breakfast was limited unless you like waffles every morning and the seating was very limited. We took our food to our room each time we got breakfast at the motel. Overall it was a decent place but I would probably stay a little further out at a hotel with a shuttle next time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found we fit so well into your budget. It is true with our amenities such as free wifi, free parking and our complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay. We do not have our own shuttle, however the ART shuttle does pick up right out front every 20 minutes. Inquire at the front desk on how to get tickets! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice motel for a family near Disneyland
Summary: We stayed for 4 nights during our vacation to California.  The room was much larger than expected, which was so nice! The room was pretty great and seemed very clean, but the carpet was filthy! My children's feet were black on the bottoms after walking barefoot in the room.  I could tell that housekeeping was vacuuming, but the carpets could use a shampooing.  I wish that the pool and laundry room would stay open a little later. We wanted to relax in the hot tub after a long day at Disney and do some laundry, but with everything closing at 10 it felt rushed by the time we got back from the park.  Microwaves in the room would have been really nice.  The fridge was a great addition but there's no reason to store leftovers if you can't heat them back up.  I once even asked the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for choosing Super 8 for your family vacation home. We do have a great maintenance staff who do shampoo our carpets in the rooms as scheduled. We will follow up on this, and hope to see you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: I would recommend this motel for it was clean. comfortable, friendly staff, great location and good value for your money
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and thank you as well for recommending us to others. It is always good to hear we fit into someones budget and our guest's find us to be such a great value.

Summary Heading: Nice lodgings for a visit to DIsneyland
Summary: Well located with convenient shuttles to surrounding attractions including Disney's parks.  Reasonably priced, with clean and well appointed rooms.  Friendly and helpful staff. Continental Breakfast in small dining room behind office.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are conveniently located from the Disneyland park entrance this is true. It's a quick 15 minute walk. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: We enjoyed our stay. We'll be back.
Summary: The property doesn't look impressive on the outside but our room was great - spacious, comfortable, has a mini fridge, cable channels, and nearby restaurants deliver. Most of all, the location to Disneyland was perfect. You can either walk or take the no. 6 Clementine route bus for $3 one way or $5 for a day pass. Reception staff were very helpful, friendly and patient. They provide toiletries and tea and coffee together with the coffee maker. I'll definitely recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you had such a wonderful stay and even better to hear you will be back! WE are looking forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Comfortable room, walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: For the price, this was an excellent base camp for a Disneyland trip. It has comfortable beds and is within walking distance to the parks. They also offer a free breakfast but it has very limited options and a tiny seating area.  The air conditioner was an on/off sort of deal which wasn't my favorite.   If you're looking for a reasonably-priced hotel within walking distance of the parks, this is it. Be aware that the rooms are motel-style and are accessed from outside. I was traveling alone as a female and wasn't terribly comfortable with this but didn't have any issues. There are always plenty of people on the streets, especially if you are walking during opening/closing time for the parks. Just be aware of your surroundings and use common sense and it is safe enough.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient as you say. We are happy to hear you are recommending us to others and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great location, wonderful staff, decent breakfast, awesome free parking but there was a very musky, dank smell in our room! Housekeeping came and put an air freshner in or room but then that smell became over powering. If you could get past the smell it was an good stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is wonderful to hear you had a great stay. We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced and want you to know we will follow up on this. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This was our second time staying here! We loved it the first and will be back! The o my thing that sucked was the stench of urine in the parking lots and the small breakfast they provide. Even though I loved having the waffles and cinnamon rolls, i was hoping for more of a variety of food. Overall, I highly recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome to know you are recommending us to others! We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Walking distance to Disney and local food. Clean rooms. Not fancy free breakfast but one of the staff made hot mini waffles. Juice machine was down but they made up by using pitchers. Price is very reasonable considering how close we were to Disney. I would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are walking distance to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient when staying with us. It's so good to know we fit into your budget and we are so happy to know you will be returning!

Summary: This was my first time staying at the Super 8 near Disneyland.  I stowed my luggage and went to Disneyland while my room was prepared. The room was clean and the bed comfortable. When I had a problem with a noisy guest upstairs, staff switch my room. All the staff went out of their way to help guests feel welcome. The computer was down, so the front desk printed my boarding pass and luggage ticket. Breakfast choices are simple- dry cereal, instant oatmeal, toast, cinnamon rolls, and fresh waffles. Coffee, tea, hot chocolate, apple and orange juice are available to drink. Fresh oranges were served when I was there. Being gluten free really limited my choices. And there are plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby. Great value for the price.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to know you will be returning!

Summary: Short stay but was great. Take care of property. continue to be professional and thanks for answering all of our questions.  Loved the waffles and Apple juice.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Those Waffles are so delicious it is true! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: nice for the price. The rooms appeared to have just been remodeled and some were still being redone.  The laundry area could use a table to fold clothes and maybe a chair or two for waiting.  Close to Disney was about a 15-20 minute walk... maybe longer is you have small children.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to know we fit so well into your budget. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great rate, room was clean and neat with plenty of space. Grounds were kept up and staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is wonderful you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We look forward to seeing again soon.

Summary: I had a great stay, hotel was near Disneyland just how we wanted and priced perfectly. Room was very nice and clean. Hotel staff we had interactions with were nice. No complaints at all. Will definitely be back
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is good to know you found them to be so friendly. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary Heading: Hotel no longer sell rooms, they sell experience!
Summary: An ideal magical Disneyland get away is when you spend as much time as you need to revel in one of the happiest place in the world.   A nearby hotel with a good value will benefit you to that purpose. Super 8 Hotel is a brief walk from the park.  Budget friendly ($75/night), the room is adequate for a good night's rest (1 room has 2 big beds), and is conveniently at the center of restaurants and 24 hour convenient shops (California Pizza Kithen, Cheesecake Factory, Tony Roma's, McDonald's, Teppanyakki Buffet, Walmart, CVS, Walgreen's).    Gone are the days when a hotel room is just a place to sleep. You enjoy the experience!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are delighted to hear you had such a great experience and that you will be back!

Summary: Our overall stay was wonderful.  I would just suggest a little more variety for breakfast.  Also the air conditioning could be updated.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. It is great to hear you had such a great stay and you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Worth the place to stay if you're going to disneyland
Summary: Needed parking space but place was simple for few days to go to disneyland and breakfast was worth it. Loved the waffles!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good to know you had a great stay and you found us to be so convenient to Disneyland.  Those waffles are delicious I agree! We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stay here twice a year. We like the upgrades in the room, especially the fridge. The rooms are always clean and the beds comfortable. Continental breakfast is a plus  I like the freshly made waffles. It's a little crowded where the bulk of the food and drinks are located.  I would like to see fresh fruit   We enjoy are stays here.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is always such a delight to  hear from repeat guest's. It is so awesome to know you had another great visit with us. We do have a delicious breakfast which does include fresh fruit, as well as those wonderful waffles! So Yummy! We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Just finished our Disney section of or vacation stayed at the Super 8 on 415 W Katella Ave,   clean friendly establishment. free breekie helps start the day of well. Walk was not that far from park entrance. plenty of eateries with short distance from hotel. Also csv was just up the road for any other requirements. Would defiantly use the place again, cheaper than the ones across the road from the park. Giving you more money to enjoy yourself.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to know you had a great stay and even happier to hear you will be back! We are very budget friendly, with our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast, this does add so much value to your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Great rates stayed a week literally across the street from Disney parking lot. Walked to everything, parks, restraunt's  great staff good breakfast recommend this affordable hotel for couples, families! Pool was nice rooftop tables to enjoy also
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are happy to hear you had a great visit over the Christmas holiday. We do hope to see you return soon.

Summary: We are glad we chose this hotel, it is close enough to Disneyland, 10-15 min walk and is very close to some superb restaurants. Great choice, great price.  Rooms are very comfy, staff helpful, laundry facilities, pool etc, all excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are a perfectly wonderful location when visiting the Disneyland park. It is just 15 minutes to the front entrance as you say, making it so convenient. We are excited for your return!

Summary: 12 min walk from the park, we were able to come back for a quick rest and shower and that was a true bliss on a hot crowded summer day at Disneyland!   Staff at the reception were nice and friendly and gave us a map of the facility with the secret password for the Wi-Fi, can you guess what it was?!   The room was surprisingly good, comfy bed, well equipped (coffee machine, mini fridge) but no safe. complementary breakfast had tasty waffle machine! not much place to sit and eat so we grabbed it and went back to our room.   We used the laundry room and the superintendent was so nice and considering letting us use it a bit longer after closing time.   One last thing is the hotel is at a great area which was steps away from restaurants like Bubba Gump Shrimp, cheesecake factory and
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. You are right we are super close to the Disneyland park! It is just a quick 1 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is a great way to start your day. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Fair stay at a fair price
Summary: We stayed here 2 nights before and after going to Disneyland! The bed was ok, clean but a different from what I'm used to so did not sleep 100% good. Clean and conveniently close to Disneyland and the Cheesecake Factory (yum!).
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is great to hear your found we fit into your budget and you had a great stay. We are conveniently located to the Disneyland park as you say. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The check in people were courtesy.  The beds and pillows were comfy, but the carpets desperately needed steam cleaning.  If you walked on them with your bare feet the soles of your feet or your socks  would turn black with dirt. The manager Luis was great. The only down side was being charged at the beginning of the trip and then paying on check out day and getting my money back from the credit card company.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is great to hear you had a great stay. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during  your stay regarding the carpeting in your room. I assure you that this will be addressed. We do hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is obviously undergoing renovations, but since we were out and about all day, it was never an inconvenience. My room looked like it was already renovated. I don't like staying at 2-star hotels, but this one is definitely an exception! I will stay here again! The only issue that I experienced was poor water pressure, but it wasn't that bad. Really easy walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. We are so happy to know you found your accommodations to be comfortable and you enjoyed your stay. We are even more excited to hear you will stay here again! We do look forward to it.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland main gate, dining and shopping
Summary: We chose this hotel because of it being walking distance (15 minutes) to Disneyland where the Disneyland half marathon was being held and the lower price.  Reviews were on the higher side.  We ignored the reviews where people expect 4 star amenities for a 2 star price and the just plain petty ones.  We were not disappointed.  The property is older for sure, but they are keeping it up well.  The front desk staff was friendly and quick to get us checked in.  The free coffee in the lobby was good and available 24 hours.  When we got to our room we found it to be clean and it had a large refridgerator.  The bed was comfortable as were the pillows.  The air conditioner worked well.  The room was cleaned daily.  The free breakfast had continental breakfast items and was totally
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient  to the Disneyland park. It is true we do have a great view of the Disneyland fireworks. We do hope to have you stay with us next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Great affordable place near Disneyland. The rooms are very clean and affordable everything is walking distance. The Hotel also offers complimentary breakfast it's pretty basic stuff cereal, yogurt etc but it gets the job done. I would recommend staying here if you are looking for an affordable place near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is terrific to know you will be recommending us to others! We are delighted that you found your accommodations to be so clean and comfortable and  that we fit so well into your budget. We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: If you go to  disneyland and you want something near, this could be a good option. Is only 10 min wallking. The rooms are ok, but the cleanest not so much.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is terrific that you found our location to be so convenient. We are sorry to hear you found our rooms were not up to your expectations. I assure you this will be addressed. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations.  We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I've stayed here plenty of times as I am an annual pass holder for Disneyland. It's always pretty cheap and clean. This last time though, I felt that since I booked so last minute they just stuck me with whatever they had left. We found 2 cockroaches in the bathroom on the first night. We were also right next to the maintenance room and right above the laundry room so needless to say...it was pretty noisy. I'm mostly sadden because I've stayed here multiple times and I have never seen it so dirty.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. it is always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. We are sorry to hear you did not have an exceptional stay. We do apologize, and I assure you your concerns will be addressed. We do hope to see you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Decent cheap hotel. I'd stay again.
Summary: Not a bad value hotel. Breakfast setup is a waste. Too small, too busy, not enough choices. Room was clean and quiet. It's a pretty long walk to Disneyland especially after a long day at the park. Wireless internet was very strong.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. great to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and even more exciting it is great to hear you will be back. We look forward to it! We do have a complimentary breakfast from 6 am to 9 am every morning. It is very popular. We do have seating available in the breakfast room, we also have additional seating on our sundeck, as well as in the pool area. For our breakfast we serve fresh fruit, yogurt, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, cinnamon rolls, waffles with syrup, toast with jam, hot cocoa, hot tea, and coffee as well as 2 kinds of juice. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Very friendly staff. super reasonable for it's close proximity to Disneyland. The room was very clean, simple but comfortable. I would definitely stay here again, as it was a real bargain.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to know they provided you with such friendly and helpful service. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We chose the Super 8 for its proximity to Disneyland and to our Car Hire place. Quick eady check in, friendly helpful staff. Rooms are spacious (ours had 2 queen size beds) but the bathroom is soooo small and the water pressure was pretty minimal. The beds were comfy and the rooms were clean (if not a little dated). Free breaky with waffles. There is a pool and it is family friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so awesome to hear you found our location to be so handy and convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance making us so convenient. We have upgraded all our rooms with new beds and all furnishings as well as new mattress and linens. It is so good to know you found the changes to be so comfortable. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: Great place to stay close to Disneyland and eating places staff helpful & friendly Rooms clean and tidy. 10 minutes walk to Disneyland with shops on the way. Nice clean swimming pool and large spar pool to ease those tired mussels after walking around Disney all day
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so true we are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland as we are only a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance. It will be nice to see you again on your next visit to the Disneyland park.

Summary Heading: Always a great place to stay!
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel numerous times and it's always great. The staff is great, the rooms are clean and comfortable. My kids love the pool. The hot tub is a great place to relax. It's right by the pool, which makes it so that the kids can swim and I can be in the hot tub.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is always such a delight to hear from repeat guests. As always we do appreciate you complimenting our staff and we are so happy to hear you were so comfortable and you found time to enjoy our heated pool and hot tub. We are excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Check in was easy and quick, loved it.
Summary: The property was in a perfect place for all the disney lovers.  Room was great, just wasn't so happy that on my check out date i saw couple of fleas.  Did let front desk know though.  Other than that it was a great stay.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is so terrific you had such an easy check in and things went so smoothly and you had such an enjoyable stay. We do want to thank you for making us aware of any issues during your stay with us. We are a pet free establishment, and this shouldn't have been an issue. We do look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed 6 nights and had a great experience here. Great location close to Disney resort, beaches, stores, etc.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It's so great to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It's true we are just next door to the Garden walk where there are several great places to shop and dine as well. Downtown Disney also have a lot of great choices. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Overall for the price we paid it was pretty decent. The only thing was that the carpet seemed to be dirty and smelled kinda musty. It was a quick walk to Disney and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found we fit into your budget. We do have  a wonderful maintenance staff who does a great job with shampooing our rooms. We are sorry to hear you had an issue with the carpets in your room. I assure you I will bring this to their attention. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Was very good have stayed here before very close to Disneyland staff was nice rooms really big
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always  great to hear from repeat guests. We have remodeled our rooms, it is wonderful that you found them so comfortable and spacious. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for the second time in 3 years, nothing has changed still the same old place, staff friendly, rooms cleaned daily, close to Disneyland takes about 10 minutes to walk. There is free wifi but comes in waves as its good one minute and then nothing the next called them up and fixed straight away. But if your looking for a good place to stay with free breakfast and close to Disney this is your place.
Manager Response: We want to than you for the review. We are the perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are so happy that you will be returning and that you will be recommending us to others.

Summary Heading: Great location. Got a great rate from third party. Wanted...
Summary: Great location. Got a great rate from third party. Wanted to stay more time. Luis the day manager was so helpful, so nice and was able to give me same rate. The previous worker during night shift was rude. But Thanks to Luis. I did wanted to stay and now will comeback next time around same time.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is wonderful that you found we fit so well into your budget and that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making us so convenient. We are excited to hear you will be back.

Summary: Super happy with my stay. Everyone at the front desk were incredibly helpful and friendly. The rooms was very clean and the beds were amazingly comfortable. Only draw back was no microwave in the room for my left overs. And the breakfast room was chaotic but that's to be expected when every family is there right before going to Disney land
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is so terrific to hear you had such a great stay and so happy to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: Basic motel but the room was clean and had a comfortable bed. We could hear the people above us walking around latd at night and even woke me up a few times but we still managed to get a good night's rest. We also had noisy neighbors next to us a few mornings.  Stayed for seven days but only took advantage of the free breakfast one day,  we ended up eating breakfast elsewhere the remaining days.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you found your stay with us so enjoyable and that you took advantage of our complimentary breakfast. This does help so much with the budget. This along with our free wifi, and free parking makes us very affordable. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Every year my daughter and I go to Disneyland for her Birthday. The Super 8 is very close to the park. It is an easy hop,skip and a jump.The hotel is very clean and you can't beat the price.The employees are very friendly.I've been booking there for years. This particular trip was different though. I booked a non cancellation. i made that mistake. I could not make that date so i cancelled.  I did not realize at the time when I cancelled it, I was charged for the full room. I did not know until I received my credit card bill.I spoke to one of the employees at the Super 8.She told me i could still have the room.i forgot her name but I'm sure she remembered our conversation. Kudos to her for helping me. She was very pleasant and kind. I normally go through Expedia to book my room.I
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear we fit into your budget and your found us so affordable. We are also happy to hear our employee was so helpful and kind. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Booked online, had no problems checking in. Customer service exceeded my expectations. Rooms are very nice quiet and clean. Comfortable beds and good connection to the internet. The breakfast was good also.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so exciting to know we did exceed your expectations. It is also so awesome you found we fit into your budget so well. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Motel was very clean and comfortable, the rooms were remodeled nicely. Nice new spacious showers. Extremely quiet and convenient to every thing. I would definitely recommend this Motel, to other Travelers
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is wonderful to hear you had such a comfortable stay and that you will be recommending us to others. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The bathroom is tiny, shower ok, service good, beds ok, room ok, pool nice, fairly quiet, not too expensive, this is a simple good motel. Walk to Disney with teenagers about 15 minutes.....not 10!!!!!!!......front staff should stop lying about that. Unless your jogging your not making it in ten! Walk is easy though. Places like Walgreens , pizza, burgers, nearby. Your not staying there to enjoy the room anyways.
Manager Response: Thank your for the review. It is great to know you found our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, just a block and a half from here. We are right next door to so many great places to shop and dine as well. We do hope to see you again on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: This hotel is pretty close to Disneyland and convenient to many shops. The continental breakfast was good, comes with yummy waffles make freshly for you. Reception staffs are friendly and helpful. Room was clean no doubt a bit old but comfortable and spacious.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. It is wonderful to know you found our location to be so convenient and our staff to be so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This was our 2nd stay at this property.  It was just a short walk to Disneyland and that just what we were looking for.  Room was clean and fridge is appreciated.  The only drawback was that there was a musty odor in the room, but it got better once the air had been on for a while.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We do apologize for any inconvenience during this visit. We do have a 24 hour front desk to assist if anything does arise during your stay. we do hope to see you again on your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Motel in a superb location with Disneyworld on your doorstep!
Summary: Fantastic Motel in a superb location!  I stayed here for a week whilst on a touring holiday and we wanted somewhere close to the I5 freeway and near to Disney World. This hotel delivered on both. Disney is within walking distance, so you can beat the queues for parking and in the evening you can clearly see the firework displays just by standing outside your door ‚Äì no need to hang around in the park!   The rooms are clean, modern and comfortable and air-conditioning and tea/coffee making facilities are good. The fridge was also very handy to keep drinks and chocolates in! We made full use of the complimentary breakfast , which we used to stock up on freshly made waffles and cereals before spending the day at Disney.  The staff  organised a day trip for usto L.A which I would
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. It is so awesome to know you had such a great visit and even more important that you will be back! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Everything was great! Breakfast was convenient and the hotel was within walking distance of the park! There were also a number of restaurant options nearby along with a store so we could purchase water bottles and snacks to take into the park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so good to hear you had such a perfect stay. We are in such a great location as you say. Several great places to shop and dine are right next door and we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of Disneyland. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here. The room was clean and the location is fantastic. The walk to Disney is perfect for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you found our location to be so convenient when visiting Disneyland. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Staff was very quick and helpful.  Lack of English ability made it hard to fix maintenance problems.  They did fix the stinky clogged up sink in 219, but could not understand the strong mold and fungus smell in 217.  They wanted to spray perfume in the A/C.   The perfume smell was overwhelming when we checked in and had to leave the doors open for hours to reduce it. (Windows would not open). Deep cleaning skills are lacking.  25% solution of bleach water and a one time deep clean of that room would fix the problem in 48 hours.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a great stay at Disneyland!  The hotel was fairly close about a 1/2 mile walk to Disney.  We walked to the park everyday, but there were a couple of days where we chose to take a cab back because we were pretty tired.  Cab was about $8 one way.  The staff was very friendly!  Room was taken care of daily.  Breakfast was served daily, pretty basic cereal, toast, juice, yogurt and belgian waffles (it was just enough of what we needed).   Pool area is a bit small for the size of hotel, seemed just a little crowded.  Beds were very comfortable.  There was no tub, just a shower - my wife and daughter were not too happy about that.  Overall a nice stay, probably would stay just a little closer to Disney next time, but for the price it was worth it this time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of the Disneyland park. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to know they provided you with such friendly and helpful customer service. We are excited for your return!

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay for a quick visit
Summary: The good:  Customer service! The staff was very helpful and courteous. Thank you very much! The room had a few recent upgrades and looks nice. The breakfast in the morning was limited but appreciated, especially the freshly made waffles.  Room service was nice and tidy about cleaning up our room. The air conditioner was properly functioning and actually blowing cold air. Very nice~! Nothing was missing or stolen. (I really appreciated that since there was no safe in the room) Having a pool and a hot tub was very nice but it would be nicer if they closed at midnight vs. 10pm.  The bad: The walls could use a huge insulation update. I could hear everything happening in the next room. The towels and wash cloths are EXTREMELY tired and need to be burned. The tub drain kept backing up
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found our customer service so excellent. It is great to hear they are providing you with that excellent service you so deserve. We are upgrading all of our rooms, I think you will find the new upgrades to your liking. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Excellent vacation, I did book 3 days, they did give us a...
Summary: Excellent vacation, I did book 3 days, they did give us a key just for one day, then they call at 11:00 night to tell us we need another key, twice they told us that our debit card wasn't accepted, we insist was something wrong they solved
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had an excellent stay with us. It's great to know our staff was so helpful and had such great service. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: 150 square feet .  Bathroom was so tiny (attached picture, if it will upload),  that the toilet paper wall was behind the door so only way to access it was to close the door.  Breakfast was very basic, lots of waffles and white bread.  No water .    Service was a bit angry especially when I asked if there was any wheat bread.  I felt like Oliver Twist .     There was a long line out the parking lot for breakfast, standing room only and the gate came down at 9am sharp.  Front desk was dishonest.  Pool is in the middle of the parking lot and it's crowded and small.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fabulous hotel,  great location for a great price.
Summary: This basic hotel is great, highly recommended,  great location next to Bubba gumps and the cheesecake factory and 15 mins walk to disney. Plenty of parking.  Pool small but not usually busy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we are so glad to hear you found us so affordable and we fit into your budget so well. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Very small room (about the size of Motel 6). Small beds queen is about the size of a double. No tub, small towels.  The line for breakfast goes out the door and when we did go down there all they had was toast and waffles.  After breakfast is over no coffee is available.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do have standard size rooms, which is per state standard requirements.
