Our queen beds in our rooms are queen size and we have all new mattress in all the rooms. Some of our rooms do have showers only, but we do have several that have both tub shower units. We have a very popular breakfast as you say, and it can get pretty busy. We do have a wonderful sun deck where many of our guest's enjoy their coffee and breakfast as well as fireworks at night. Our complimentary breakfast is served daily from 6 am to 9 am. We have fresh baked waffles with syrup, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal,  hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit, yogurt, 2 kinds of juice, milk, coffee, tea, and hot cocoa. Our coffee is served all day ever after breakfast hours  in the lobby at the front desk. We do hope to have you visit us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We love staying here....the upgrades they have been making are very nice....we only wish , my husband only wishes, there was a better shaving light over the sink and a different paint color for the bathroom.  I do think an update on the air conditioning would be a plus...
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is always such a pleasure to hear from repeat guest's! We appreciate your feedback and we will look into it. You will be excited to hear we are replacing the AC units in all of our rooms. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Very good Disney/convention motel. Room clean and obvious wear locations (paint, carpet) in good shape. TV OK with reasonable assortment of channels. Breakfast is typical motel continental (bread, cereal, milk, juice, coffee, tea, waffles). Pool was medium sized - suitable for playing but not swimming. Staff was friendly. Location was great --  close to Disney than our last trip there.
Manager Response: thanks for the review, thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear they were so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do have a wonderful location, it is just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We ave happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is a great way to start your day. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I booked based on recent reviews. This is an older motel, but the rooms are updated, bed is comfortable, room was clean. The front staff were all very nice. The breakfast is very basic, but serves it's purpose- a quick bite before heading out to the parks where you can eat all you want!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay. We do have a wonderful breakfast to start your day, with fresh baked waffles, fresh fruit, yogurt, cereals, toast, juice, hot coffee hot tea and hot chocolate. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This is a real no-frills motel. It's saving grace really is it's location; it's a slow 30 minute walk to the Disneylamd parks. It is near to restaurants and takeaways, shops and a 7-11, which is really convenient. There is also a laundry and small pool. It's a great place for families. WiFi is sketchy to say the least, but tv and shower were good. It is clean, but unless you are going to Disney and you are on a budget, don't bother.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient . We are a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are also right next door to the Anaheim garden walk where there are several great places to shop as well as dine. The CVS pharmacy, Walgreens and the 7-11 are right around the corner as well. We are the perfect place for a family when visiting Disneyland. We do have free wifi, free parking as well as a great complimentary breakfast, which helps so much with the budget. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel has it all for the right price. First off, Location is great with about a 15 min walk to Disneyland and a host of restaurants and convenience stores nearby. I visited the Anaheim Garden Walk adjacent to Super 8 and it is a great place to get a meal at many different restaurants or stop by for a happy hour beverage. Second, the rooms are above average and very clean. The bed is comfy and the TV, Fridge, AC and plumbing work great. And if they happen to not, the staff is courteous and prompt. If you want a microwave they are $5/day extra. The breakfast is ok with fresh hot waffles made for you, juices, and coffee.  I usually bring a few things on my own to enhance what they have available.  After a long day at the park the pool and spa are clean and maintained very
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is so great to hear they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Great rate and amazing room for cost. Clean, big, and comfortable. Will definitely stay again in near future. Many rooms and close to Disneyland. Friendly staff, quick check in. Only dislike was the parking pass per guest.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. we are so happy to hear you had such a fantastic stay and that you will be returning! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to know they provided you with that excellent customer service you so deserve.

Summary: We stayed in Super 8 for a week while attending a conference nearby. The breakfast was very bad, there wasn't anything proper to eat.  The rooms were smelling too bad, once I was about throw out because of the smell.  The things in the rooms were old and smelly as well.  And it was not a cheap accommodation. Because there was a big conference and demand was high, prices were also very high.  A big disappointment in our ends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was immaculate, quiet, easy to access. The air conditioner worked perfectly. Breakfast was great and the staff was friendly and genuinely helpful. I will stay here again and recommend to friends. Thanks!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. It is so wonderful that this was indeed the case! Thanks for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to hear they were so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. We stayed 2 nights. It was walking distance to Disneyland. Staff were all very nice and helpful. They had an outdoor pool and laundry available for guests. Our room was big and clean. They offer free breakfast and my only complaint about this hotel would be that the breakfast only went till 9 so I found it was pretty packed just before 9 cause everyone was trying to get food before it closed and 9 was a little early in my opinion. Most hotel I have stayed at, breakfast goes to 10 and it's not so packed and rushed but regardless that is so minnor I would absolutely stay here again the next time we go to Anaheim.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and you will be returning! We look forward to it!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel at a good location
Summary: A friend of mine and I traveled to Anaheim recently to see some baseball, and had decided to stay at this hotel because of the location and also it seemed reasonably priced.  We got there on the night of our arrival, and were checked in right away.  Going through the parking lot we found out our room was in a separate building near the back of the hotel complex.  When we got to our room, we found it to be a decent sized 2-bed room.   There were comfortable beds and everything worked properly and there was enough room to move around.    I will say that I was not overly impressed with the continental breakfast.  There are two rooms one where the items were and the 2nd where tables and chairs were located for people to sit and eat.  It seemed the food area was always crowded and
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. we are so happy to hear you had a nice stay and you found our location to to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We do have a great complimentary breakfast included in your stay and it is very popular. We do have additional seating on our sundeck which is a pleasant place to enjoy your morning coffee and breakfast. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Had a short stay for Disneyland and the place was great! Hotel is extremely close to Disneyland and the room was completely comfortable. Wished I stayed longer!
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay and were so comfortable during your stay. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: The room smelled bad when we checked in. We discovered...
Summary: The room smelled bad when we checked in. We discovered later that the odor was actually coming from inside the drawers. The nightstand was horrible. My clothes smelled bad from the other drawers. My unworn clothes had to be washed when I got home.  Our group reserved 3 rooms, my son"s room had an awful insecticide odor, even caused breathing problems during the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are sorry for any inconvenience or bad experience with odors when you stayed with us. We do have a wonderful 24 hour front desk ready to assist at any time. please in the future always let us know if you are experiencing any issues during  your stay so we can better assist. We do hope to see you again next time  you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great Stay, very large rooms and very clean!
Summary: Great Stay, very large rooms and very clean! Overall very good. Only improvement would be the breakfast, as the breakfast room was too small to accommodate the guests, and breakfast choices were limited. WiFi wasn't fast enough, but OK if you use 4G.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay and enjoyed your stay with us. We do have a great complimentary breakfast, and it is very popular. We do have additional seating on our sundeck which is a very pleasant place to enjoy breakfast. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: This hotel was perfect for us.  We arrived in Anaheim a day...
Summary: This hotel was perfect for us.  We arrived in Anaheim a day earlier than expected so we needed a place to crash for the night before checking into our vacation rental.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a perfect stay and that we were just what you needed. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Loved the key cards, they were Harry Potter for Harry Potters birthday. loved that it was so closed to Disneyland we walked there no problem, the staff were very friendly  and the room was very clean.. will be my first choice  whenever I go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary: This time around was longer than I expected so this Motel satisfied my stay I seem to gravitate to this place the hospitality is good, the rooms are good, you have a Fridge and the usual amenities, no Microwave but you can ask or one,if stay is going to be a long one, be kind to the housekeeping personal make sure, if your solo to put your luggage on the floor if you go out for a stroll or tour, to make it easier for the team to make up your room-this Motel is not far from the Disney Resort
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are happy to hear you had a good stay with us. We are  in a great location as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance of the Disneyland park. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We were happy with this hotel's proximity to Disneyland, a fifteen minute walk and all the restaurants nearby. The rooms are clean and well kept and the staff are friendly and helpful. We booked through a third party agency so we ended up with a room where housekeeping staged each morning so it was noisy. Our air conditioner and bathroom fans were very noisy too which made sleeping challenging , thank goodness we were so tired after Disneyland. I would stay here again but book through Super 8.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Super 8 Motel - great location but basic
Summary: This Super 8 Motel is in an excellent location for Disney Land. If you want a budget motel this is the place for you. The room we were in was a 2 bed queen room as we had 3 adults. The deco is old and needs updating but it was fine value for what we paid and there was a very basic breakfast included in the booking. Parking is available on site so you can get into Disney with a walk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just stayed 10 nights at the Super 8 in Anaheim. I booked almost a year in advance and got a great rate (average $59 a night). The rooms were clean and pretty modern. The walk to Disneyland was about 15 minutes and the hotel is pretty close to restaurants and convenience stores. The breakfast was your typical Super 8 breakfast but seemed to be really busy every day. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location is very convenient if you are planning on going to Disneyland. If you are up for walking the park is just a few blocks away so you don't have to pay for parking!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place needs some updating and the carpets need to be cleaned, but overall, this place wasn't bad. If we had known better, we would have stayed here for our entire trip to Disneyland instead of moving to one of the resorts. The breakfast room was large and people weren't too bad about getting out once they were done eating. Waffles were made by one of the employees which I thought was great (she was really on the ball!). My only complaint was that it was a high carb breakfast with only yogurt as something different.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our go to hotel on our annual trek to Disneyland. It's close enough to the parks  that we can walk and avoid paying for parking and rooms are clean. ( 15 min walk? Maybe longer if you have small children)  I noticed they did a room remodel recently which was a pleasant surprise.  Rooms are quite basic/ no frills, but they do provide continental breakfast. (Cereal, toast, oatmeal)  When visiting Disneyland we spend every minute we can in the park and this hotel is perfect for sleeping and showering without breaking the bank.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Yes just like Mickey, if you're like me and wen on holiday yoy rader spend your money on food, attractions and not on a hotel wich you'll only be for 10 hours a day then sit and read.  This IS THE hotel to stay, why? First is 10 minutes walking distance from Disneyland Parks; second they included breakfast and wifi;  third is next door to: Bubba Gump, Cheesecake Factory and PF Chang, forth there is a CVS 5 minutes away and a Target 30 minutes all of this is walking distance.   Bonus!! Every day at 9:30 pm you get to see Disneyland's fireworks from the hotel parking lot.  Te beds are very conftable, the staff is always there to help you, enough hot water and the air conditioning is great.  Uber to Los Angeles is US 70 more or less to get to Universal Studios and US 75 to get
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay for family vacation location was great and nice clean rooms are always a plus
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were very clean, staff very nice and helpful. It's a good 15 min ride to the front door of Disney because we need to walk around the block, but you can also take the bus or call a cab for a few $. We are so close that we could see the back drop of the Disney cars and fireworks from the hotels parking. Complementary Breakfast was good for me, cinnamon rolls and 1-2 bole of cereal. Distance from down town LA with traffic can take a few hours. I would go back anytime.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best value for the money hotel.  Free parking, free wifi that works good, and free breakfast.  The people who work here are very kind and caring.  Some of the ladies working here are extraordinarily lovely and should be working as Disney Princesses.  It is a very easy walk to Disneyland (from a 50 year old man with feet that hurt).  The all-you-can-eat breakfast room is always crowded, but get your breakfast and take it to your room or up to the rooftop veranda.  The waffles were delicious, and made for you.  Add to that a few ice cold Yoplait fruit yogurts, fresh sliced fruit, and a few cups full of OJ, and your group will be good 2 go until lunch.  With area breakfast prices, this will save you insane amounts of money.  The room was very clean and stocked with free Matrix
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Anaheim Super 8 location is economic friendly and impressively clean. They offer a bed and breakfast, plus a heated pool 8A-10P. I made a late reservation visit with a family of four and enjoyed the nightly rate! Parking is free+. Upon arrival, a front desk agent kindly went over geography of the hotel for us to reach our room simply and swift. Beds= cozy. Super easy to take a walk to Disney park, errand, activity, meal during a stay. Thank you Super 8 team!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just needed a place to stay after a long day in the park.  The front desk staff really worked with me to get a room on the first floor close to the office as I was bone tired!  The room was clean and a good size.  The beds were very comfortable.  The hotel is close to the park and close to the shopping and dining area so it would make a good place to stay for more than just one night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The motel was a little ghetto. The breakfast royally sucked, I was grossed out when I walked in. It was in a good location but it a good walk to Disney, you really do not want to walk back from Disney !
Manager Response: none

Summary: We decided on a last minute visit to Disney and pulled in here after circling a couple of blocks.  The price was right especially for the location, there's a small swimming pool, a patio sitting area in a couple of different locations.  It is a quick walk to Disney main gate entrance.  Continental breakfast included and coffee is always available in the lobby.  Parking is included in the cost. Showing a little bit of it's age but is well maintained and kept very clean.  It is a motel style, so parking is right out front of the ground floor rooms, which is convenient but you can hear everyone coming and going, fortunately most people are worn out from the day and it is not late into the night.  Front desk staff were nice but quite busy.  The Disneyland shuttle bus pulls up out
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is terrific to hear you had a pleasant stay. We are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. If you wish to take the shuttle  it does pick up right out front for a small fee and takes you right to the entrance. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Honestly the reason we chose this place was because it was the first affordable one we found available with 2 queen beds for 2 nights. It's an average hotel with friendly enough staff. The best part about this hotel is that it is a very close walk to Disneyland (8 minutes to the gate). Well close for my family and I, others may disagree. They also have shuttles if you hate walking. Again it's just an average hotel. Don't expect a lot, just a clean enough room and bed to sleep in and it will be fine.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We tried this hotel as we get a discount here with our college alumni club.  We usually stay at a location across the street.   Check in was easy.  Rooms were ok.  Bathroom was small and no tub.  No safe in the room either which is a big deal for us.  Walls are very thin.  We heard everyone when they walked by and it sounded like a heard of elephants living above us.    Breakfast had lots of options, more then the other hotel we usually stay at.  The breakfast room is way too compact for the amount of people they are trying to serve.  You could hardly move to get your food.  Employees working at the breakfast were not very pleasant.  We love staying at hotel with the make your own waffle makers.  We got chewed out by an employee for making our own waffles.  How were we to know
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a great location. There is a bus that runs to Disneyland every 20 minutes. You can get a day pass from the hotel next door instead of paying $3 per trip....especially if you will be there more than one day and will be going back and forth more than once in the same day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was not expecting much, but I was pleasantly surprised!  The rooms not only were clean, it was nicely decorated!  The free continental breakfast is what you would expect, but still a nice bonus! Location to the Magic Kingdom the major prize if the purpose was to go to the Magic Kingdom.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice hote, really near of Disney Parks, very clean and comfortable, the breakfast is great too!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so excited to hear you had an excellent stay! We are just around the block from the Disneyland park entrance. making it so convenient and budget friendly when visiting the Disneyland park. We are delighted to know you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is a great way to start the day. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: The rooms were nice.  My main beef with the hotel is that the complimentary breakfast ended at 9am. For the early bird, I can see that being fine, but for families with kids, it would have been nice for it to end at 10am. Both days we were there we missed it by 5 min.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to hear you thought your room was nice and comfortable. We do have a complimentary breakfast that is served daily from 6 am till 9 am. We  are sorry that these hours did not work for you and your schedule. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Nice room, good breakfast & walking distance to Disneyland. Would recommend if you do not mind a short walk and saving the parking fees at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in a perfect location as you say, so it does save you money when going to the Disneyland park. We are glad to hear it helped out with your budget. We have free parking, free Wifi as well as a great complimentary breakfast. We are so happy that you would recommend us and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The room was clean but the toilet was loose and rattled loudly every time someone sat on it. There was a stain on one of the sheets but they changed it immediately. It's close to Disneyland but after 3 days of walking even 1 km is far. We found out too late that there's a shuttle for $5/day. The pool is small but adequate. The breakfast is lackluster. There was no fruit the first day and then orange slices after that.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are such a good value when visiting the Disneyland park. Its true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. For those who do not wish to walk, there is a shuttle ran by the city of Anaheim that picks up every 20 minutes right out front. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It's definitely a great value, it's walking distance to the Disney park, so you can save money if you park your car there instead of paying Disney's parking, another good feature is that it offers you free continental breakfast which by the way is much better than average.  I do definitely recommend this for family trip.
Manager Response: Thanks for giving us the review. It is so wonderful to hear you found us to be such a good value and we fit into you budget. With our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to  your stay. We are so happy you will be recommending us! We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Quick one-night stay - great location and room was nice. Had refrigerator but microwave costs $5 extra/day.  Upper patio deck is great place to watch Disney nightly fireworks. Didn't use pool but it looked fine.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is great to hear you had a pleasant stay. We do have a wonderful sun deck that is a perfect place to watch the fireworks. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The only reason why they didn't get 5 stars is because the room we stayed in smelled a little "musty" and after 5 days, they could have switched the breakfast up a little. Just change the flavour of the yogurt or switch to apples instead of oranges! The staff were amazing and the rooms were always cleaned well. The pool & hot tub were nice ways to relax after long days at Disney. Beds were comfortable with lots of pillows. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy that you and  you family decided to stay with us! We are even more excited to hear you will be back! We do have a nice heated pool and hot tub that is so nice to enjoy after a long day at the park. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Stayed here in May with friends...the proximity to everything is amazing, the clean rooms, comfortable beds, free breakfast and friendly staff make this place so awesome! Revamped rooms rock, the short stroll to the store, Disneyland etc. rocks and given the low buck cost for staying here we have already booked for our next years vacation!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is always such a delight to hear from our repeat guest's. We are so happy to know that you once again had a great visit and even more excited to hear you will be back! We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Adequate for a place to sleep
Summary: Went to Disneyland for a quick trip and found a great rate here. Would have been just right if the beds were not as uncomfortable as sleeping on concrete. We are not 20 anymore and the beds ruined an otherwise good experience. Also, "free" breakfast was more like a cereal bar with subpar waffles and yougurt. Skipped it most days
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you found we fit so well into your budget and  you found our location to be so convenient. We have upgraded our rooms, and have put in all new beds with new mattresses as well.  We are so sorry you found the mattress to be too hard. We do hope that you will give us another visit next time you are in Anaheim, I do believe you will be happy with the new mattress and other upgrades. We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast with freshly made waffles, fresh fruit, yogurt, cinnamon rolls, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cold cereal, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea, and coffee. We are sorry to hear that you did not find this satisfactory. We appreciate you giving us a review and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The first night we arrived, as we were preparing to go to sleep, we noted numerous small ants on one bed (closest to the door) and a whole line by the bathroom next to an on the mirror. We were told they would have to "inspect" before moving us rooms. Upon arriving with a can of Raid and seeing the ants, they immediately moved us four rooms down. (Were they going to spray our bed with Raid?) The second night, we returned back late after a long day at Universal Studios, and the key to our new room didn't work. We had to go down to the office and get replacement keys. We have stayed here in the past and did not have any issues, so maybe this was just "one of those days". For the price and the fact we just use the hotel to crash between days at parks, still not a bad hotel and
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We always make it a point to exceed our guests expectations and make sure they have a wonderful stay. It is disappointing to hear you experienced some issues during this last visit. We assure you we have addressed the issues mentioned and do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great budget motel close to Disneyland !!!
Summary: Awesome place. Friendly for the family, within walking distance to Disneyland, short drive to supermarkets and outlets. Older rooms but clean. Some renovations in progress but did not effect us. Breakfast room did get busy but if you got there early it was easier to find a table. Staff were helpful. You can access printer in reception. Laundry easy to use and access. Will return again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, It is wonderful that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during  your stay. We have been doing a lot of renovations and upgrades here, and things are looking great. We do our very best not to inconvenience our guests as you said and we are thinking you will find our improvements to greatly improve our property. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here during a trip to Disneyland and were pleased with it.  The breakfast included waffles, packaged pastries, juice, cereal, oatmeal.  The breakfast room was really crowded, but there was overflow seating if you were willing to walk upstairs to get to it.  The room was clean, the hotel was quiet.  According to my pedometer, it was 1800 steps to the security gate at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found your room so clean. We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We do  hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary Heading: Spoiled son first response "This is not Super 8, It's horrible 8", then he's okay with it.
Summary: First of all, let me start with My kids normally travel in luxury, since My wife works as a quality control person at a 5 star hotel.  We were on a volleyball trip and my wife couldn't go due to work.  So I decided to stay at regular hotel (Motel?) at Super 8 which is relatively close to Disneyland and the Convention Center (the volleyball tournament).  We arrived on a 2 nights on a monday the week before the 4th of July.  I guess since I looked capable of carrying my luggage up the stairs they put us in a 2nd floor room in the back.  I've read in previous reviews about the walls being thin and you can hear everything.  I didn't notice any noise, since we were on the 2nd floor and it seemed not fully occupied.   I noticed that the management gave out rooms at every other room
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad you decided to stay with us for your family vacation. It is good to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you found our location to be so convenient. We are delighted you found our amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast added so much value to your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed for four nights. Room was clean, beds were comfortable. Has fridge but no microwave so it's not too helpful if you have leftovers from dinner. Front desk will provide one for $5 - not sure if that's a daily fee or not since we didn't get one. Parking was free which is nice. Breakfast is standard continental. We ended up going to Denny's across from Disney instead. Lots of restaurants close by, Target really close too. 10 min walk to Disney, quick drive to Angels Stadium. Would not recommend walking to Angels Stadium. It would be too hot and kind of far. Parking is only $10 at stadium and its easy in and easy out.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay and you found our location to be so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We do have microwaves available upon request at the front desk for $5 plus tax per night of use. We do have fridges in the room for no extra cost. Its wonderful to hear you found our amenities such as free parking, free wifi and our complimentary breakfast to be such a great value. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Pros: Free parking, 16 minute walk to front gate of Disneyland, Professional staff Cons: Old rooms, Low quality free breakfast, Sink outside of bathroom on carpet, Small plastic handheld showerhead that leaned to the right and would not point straight on its own We found a of couple hotels that had similar pricing and proximity to Disneyland. We booked this hotel mainly because of the above average rating it has on Tripadvisor. My wife and I arrived in town after a long drive, many hours before the 3PM check in time. We asked for an early check in around noon, but no rooms were available. We got lunch, drove around and came back to the hotel at 2:00PM and luckily were allowed an early check in. The room was clean, but out of date. The next morning we tried the free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it is so great to hear we fit so well into your budget and that you would consider staying with us again. We do have a great complimentary breakfast and those waffles are so delicious! Amenities such as our complimentary breakfast, free wifi, and free parking, this does add so much value to your stay. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It's a nice hotel very convenient if you plan on going to Disneyland also some good places to eat around the area.The only thing I didn't like was there was a door to the next room inside the room I rented.Other than that I would stay here again next time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay and even more so that you will be back! We are in a perfect location, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance, and right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are several great places to shop and dine as well. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Seen some dodgy reviews for here and all unfounded as far as I can see. Flew in from Scotland, no problem checking in, nice staff.  Rooms are standard USA layout, clean and for for purpose. I want a comfy bed and a shower, I don't wanna sit all day in my room. 10 mins walk from Disney and free parking. I'd stay here again quite happily. Only downside is the free breakfast is a bit rubbish, but then again it's free so dont grumble. We just had breakfast elsewhere, no problems :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear we fit so well into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. We are so excited to hear you will be back! We look forward to it.

Summary Heading: Everything we needed for Disneyland stay
Summary: This hotel is an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland which is why we chose it. It is close to z number of diners & fast feed places. The dining room was small so we took our breakfast to the rooftop terrace each morning which was pleasant. From here you can also see Disneyland fireworks each evening about 9.30pm if you have already returned from the park. Refrigerator in the room was useful for chilling drinks for Disneyland. We made good use of the outside pool & hot tub each afternoon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so true we are very convenient to the Disneyland park. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast on our sun deck. It is a pleasant place to have breakfast isn't it? It is also a great place to watch the fireworks. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Typical US Motel. Carpet on the floor, bit dusty and not the cleanest place. Cockroch in my room was a bit unsetteling. The price was accordingly. Walking distance to the convention center. Don't expect too much from breakfast. A bowl of cereal and a toast. Open until 8.30.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us while attending a convention at the Anaheim Convention center. It is true we are just a quick 5 minute walk to the convention center making us so convenient. We do have a complimentary breakfast that is served daily from 6 am to 9 am. This includes fresh fruit, yogurt, freshly made waffles with syrup, 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, toast with jam, as well as 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, tea and coffee. We do apologize if you were a bit unsettled, We do have a wonderful maintenance staff who have a  great pest prevention schedule. We do hope to see you again next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: This is a perfect hotel to use if you want an easy walk to the parks. It had a simple breakfast, clean rooms, and free parking. Perfect
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are very conveniently located when visiting the Disneyland Park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. With our free parking it does make for a great value. We have a complimentary breakfast as well and free wifi. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice stay at a reasonable price
Summary: My husband, baby, and I stayed here while in town for a baseball game.  I can't attest to food or pool quality as we didn't use them but the room was nice enough and the hotel staff was very friendly.  They were nice enough to give some great recommendations on places to see/ things to do.  We would stay again
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great to know you found us to be so reasonable and you had such a nice stay. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is awesome that you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Ladies working in the breakfast area were super helpful.  they had excellent costumer service.  Rooms are a bit old but they were clean. Did not like the bf options.  Walking distance to pretty much anything that I needed.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. we do our very best to exceed every guest's expectations. It is wonderful that this was the case. We are in the perfect location as you say. Disneyland park is just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance and we are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk as well as a quick 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: PERFECT location for access to Disney Parks!
Summary: Free breakfast. Less than two blocks away from Disney parks. Next door to shopping mall and restaurants like Bubba Gump's. Friendly staff. Clean, comfortable rooms. We will definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so glad to know you found them to be so friendly and helpful during  your stay. We are so happy to hear you will be back!

Summary: This place was just 3 blocks to Disney gates. It was Clean, great price, had a pool. Nice hot breakfast. Just about a half block was Bubba Gumps and other eating places. I would stay here again. I am keeping the business card so I can make reservations next time around.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. It is so exciting to know you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Our annual visit to the  USA from Australia
Summary: As soon as the shuttle dropped us off we were greeted by the friendly staff and in no time we were in our room,which was clean and comfortable as usual. Peter, manager greeted us as old friends.Motel has a pool which is inviting on hot summer days
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to see you return! We always love to hear from repeat guest's. We do look forward to seeing you next year!

Summary Heading: Best value, clean rooms, friendly staff, free breakfast, and near Disneyland.
Summary: My family and I really enjoyed our stay at Super 8. The staff was very friendly. The location was perfect. It is 15 min walk to Disneyland entrance. It is also near many great restaurants. The rooms were clean and comfortable. There is a lot of parking space. The pool area is clean. There is a coin laundromat in front of pool area it is $2 to buy detergent, $2 to wash clothes, and $2 for dryer. The continental breakfast was basic but fulfilling. They serve coffee, Apple juice, orange juice, milk, hot chocolate mix, toast, mini waffles, oranges, packaged  Cinnabon pastry, cereal, oatmeal. We will definitely be coming back to super 8!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome to hear you found us to be such a great value. It is true with our complimentary breakfast, free parking and free wifi it does add so much value to your stay. We are in the perfect location, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance. We are so happy to hear you will be back!

Summary: Opened the door and viola... I got a bonus man with my room!  Thank God he was not a gun owner or having a "private moment."  I went back to the desk where the repeatedly tried to convince me he was maintenance.  I explained to them usually the maintenance men don't lay around in their underwear and have suitcases in the room with them.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize for problem you may have experienced during your stay. We do our very best to exceed our guest's expectations, and we are sorry if this was not the case. We do hope that you will decide to stay with us in the future.

Summary: Noisy neighbouring guests, but other than that a good motel. We'd requested a roll-away bed and they hadn't put it in the room, but quickly rectified the problem. Friendly reception staff, and check out was no hassle.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so true we do have the perfect location when visiting Disneyland or even attending an event at the Anaheim Convention center. We do have a very friendly front desk staff available 24 hours a day to assist with anything you need. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel was great! Rooms were very clean, beds were super comfortable and the staff was very friendly. Only problem I had was that checkin is so late in the day (3PM)  seems odd but it's not that big of a deal.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear you had an amazing stay. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It is terrific you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do have a check in time of 3 pm, however if you arrive early we do our very best to check you in early if we have a room available. We will always let you preregister at any rate and let you park your car here or we can hold your bags if a shuttle drops you off. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Quaint Hotel Near Disneyland and Convention Center
Summary: I stayed here during VidCon and it was a very nice hotel room. The water pressure in the shower was not that great, the continental breakfast was a joke, my room didn't come with the described safe in the listing (though, at least when I was there, there was just a bunch of families looking to have a good time at Disneyland so I wasn't too scared for my belongings) and lastly, their wifi did not work for me. It was probably a issue with my computer, and apparently Windows 8 did have problems with old routers, but the kind staff in the office didn't have the first clue how to troubleshoot a internet issue. And I ended up having to use the slow internet at the convention center. But those were my only real complaints. The A/C cooled well. The fridge was adequate. And the distance
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear you had a good stay with us. We do apologize for any issues with your laptop and our wifi.  We do have a good wifi system. Our wifi system boasts 20 commercial grace access points powered by a 100 mb fiber optic cable. We also do have a 24 hour internet support number listed in your room for great assistance at any time. We do have safes available at no charge at our 24 hour front desk. We are in the perfect location when attending an event at the Anaheim Convention center. We are just a quick 5 minute walk. Disneyland is only 15 minute walk to the front gate, and we are right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk where there are several great places to shop as well as dine. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Not fancy but more than just ok!
Summary: Family of 4 stayed here for 2 nights. Location was great.  Close to Disneyland. Room was very clean and tidy. There was everything you needed. Also a fridge. Air con was very loud though. Breakfast was continental: toast, waffles, yoghurt, jam, coffee, juice. Not much for surprise but ok.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  We took a Hollywood bus tour which the staff helped us book. Nice  We will most definitely stay here again next time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad to know that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We do our best to exceed our guest's expectations, it is good to know that this was the case. We are so excited to know you will be back! We look forward to your return.

Summary: Was very pleasantly surprised. The property is very well kept. Everything is very clean, including the pool area and breakfast room. The room was exceptionally clean and included more than enough towels, coffee maker, refrigerator and larger flat screen TV. Wi-fi was reliable. The air conditioner was quite and efficient. Staff was friendly and helpful with questions about local attractions. I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found us to be such a great value. It's true with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast, it does add so much value to your stay.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We arrived after our flight from Australia at about 9am expecting to leave our bags and head off to Disneyland as check in was at 4pm. The receptionist told us that we were   able to check in then as the room was ready much to our delight. The room was spacious, clean and quiet and only a short walk to the theme parks. Will be staying again and recommending for others too as well. :)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such an excellent experience when staying with us. We are just a short walk to the Disneyland entrance as you say, it's just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are so happy to hear you will be returning and that you will be recommending us to others! We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Great Stay and close to Disneyland
Summary: Was visiting Disneyland in December with my dad. The room was nice and clean and it was a short walk to Disneyland.  The only thing is the breakfast which was just cereal and pastries, but wasn't a problem for us since Denny's and IHop were a short walk away. Would stay again for the price,proximity and friendly staff.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay. We are a short walk to Disneyland, its just a quick 15 minutes walk to the entrance. We do have a complimentary breakfast that does include cereal with milk as well as a cinnamon pastry. We also have hot oatmeal, fresh baked waffles with syrup, fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam,  hot cocoa, hot tea, coffee, and 2 kinds of juice. We are so happy to hear you will be back!

Summary: We came back to stay at this hotel again, this time with friends. We were not as happy with our room lactation but over all it was a good stay. We spent some time in the hot tub this trip and it was warm and clean. The hotel has added some verity to the there breakfast, it was VERY good. The staff was as helpful and nice as our first stay.  Good value for a hotel within walking distance of  Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank  you for the review. It is always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests.  We are glad to know you had a great stay and you find our location to be so convenient. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, this does make it so easy to get to and from the park. Thank you for the compliments to the staff. It is wonderful to hear they were so helpful and friendly during your stay. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: For the price the stay was what I expected it to be.  After all you get what you pay for.  After having read reviews I knew the possibility of roaches and indeed we came across one during the 2 night stay.  If these things bother you I wouldn't recommend this place but if you are prepared like I was then it's liveable at least for a day or 2.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad to hear that you did enjoy your stay with us and that you were comfortable in your room during your 2 night stay. We do have a great maintenance staff that does routine pest control every month.  We do respond to these issues if a guest reports anything during their stay. We do not show that anything was reported during your stay with us. In the future always let us know as we do have a 24 hour front desk staff who are ready to assist at any time. Thanks again for the review and we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: What a lovely place to stay . We stayed for four nights and were so happy with the room . We went to Disney land for the 3 days and it was so lovely to come back to a clean room.  Rooms smelt fresh and clean, bathrooms were spotless beds were extremely comfortable and very clean and crisp.  Would definitely stay here again next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a beautiful and relaxing stay. We are delighted to know you loved your room so much. We have recently upgraded and remodeled our rooms with all  new decor, carpeting, bedding and beds as well as the bathroom tiles and countertops. We are so looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We always stay at the Super 8  ! We go to Disneyland many times during the year,and many members of our family stay too! we love the Super 8 everything is clean all of the staff are so friendly and nice! Its our favorite place to stay! we already have rooms booked for September!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are always excited to hear from repeat guests. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it is so nice to know they are providing you that helpful and friendly service you so deserve. We are looking forward to your next visit in September!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for 4 nights while enjoying Disneyland. My requirements for a hotel were free parking, free hot breakfast, hot tub, and walking distance to the park. This hotel met all my needs and at a great price. The walk to Disney wasn't difficult at all. I would recommend this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad to hear that we  were just the right choice for your visit to the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance as you say. We are so conveniently located to both the Disneyland park as well as several great places to shop and dine. We do offer a great complimentary breakfast, as well as free parking and free wifi. We also have a nice relaxing heated pool and hot tub, which is so great after a long day at the park. We are so happy to hear you will be recommending us and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I have stayed here 2 or 3 times now and I love it! The staff is very friendly and helpful, the upkeep of the grounds is excellent and so is the comfort and cleanliness of the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always so wonderful to hear from repeat guests. Thanks for the compliments to our staff as well. It is great to know they were so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Thanks for a clean room, great desk service. Had a nice quiet room even though in was on Disneyland drive. The complimentary breakfast was great for a perfect busy day at Disneyland. Would stay here again, any time. Give it a try.. I hope you won't be sorry.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank  you as well for recommending us. We do have a great breakfast which is complimentary. It is a great way to start y our day. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Not cool enough for the prize
Summary: This hotel is standard is not good enough for the prize, this should be a $50 hotel and not the $124 i paid, but they have good customer service, and the environment is cool, but it should be $50. the toilet, was horrible, the room had some kind of odor, never wish to ever visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff regarding their excellent customer service. We are glad to hear you found the environment "cool" and to your liking. We are sorry to hear you found the toilet in your room horrible. As you do not state what was horrible about it, we can only apologize that it was not up to your standards. We are always here to assist our guests to make sure they have an enjoyable stay. Unfortunately we were not given the opportunity to make this happen for you during your stay.  We have a 24 hour front desk ready to assist with anything. In the future, we would encourage you to let us know so we can assist you. We do hope that you decide to stay with us next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is in a very good place, actually near of Disneyland. The room was clean. I was all day off of the room, then I only have a little information. The room was near of the parking then the noise of the cars could be strong into the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its so awesome to hear you found us a very good place to stay. We are glad to know you were so comfortable during your stay with us. We do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: staff was very friendly. their breakfast was very much enjoy by the grandkids. rooms where clean and well looked after. they kept a very clean lot. near to Disneyland. with bus stop near. tour buses would pick you up at the door to take to difference sites. they had free wifi which was enjoy by the whole family. not a 4 rating hotel but  worked will with the family.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay. We are so happy that you found the ART shuttle so convenient to get to and from the Disneyland park. It is so convenient as it picks up right out front of the motel. We do have some great tours that you can book right at the front desk so you can have a great southern California experience. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I picked this location because it was close to the Disney entrance. I'll say it's pretty darn close to the gate.   Now onto the diseased carpets.   Ever walk around in brand new white socks at home, the office, or another hotel room? Naturally, the bottoms would become tainted, and turn darker as the day progresses.   The carpets here take it up to Defcon 1. If you walk around bare foot, expect black feet and enough pathogens stuck to them to kill every patient in a cancer ward. I'm talking athlete's foot, staphylococcal, and God knows what else.   How is this acceptable? Vacuuming dust off the floor is one task, but you would think they would at the very least wet shampoo every once in a while. Just looking at the color of my feet alone after walking around for 5 minutes, I can
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you chose staying with us because of our convenient location to Disneyland. it is true we are a short 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are sorry to hear you were extremely disappointed with the cleanliness of the carpet in your room. We do have a scheduled routine shampooing agenda and keep up on the carpet cleaning with a wet shampoo as you say. We are inspected by Super 8 corporation as well as OSHA  and the state health department. We have not only always passed, but we have been awarded the  Pride of Super 8  recognition. We do apologize if you found the carpet not up to your standards. Sometimes due to our guest's previous use, it can become dirty before we have the chance to address it. We always want our guests to be extremely happy with their stay and we really wish we would have had the opportunity to make this happen for you. In the future, please do not hesitate to contact our 24 hour front desk so we can assist. We would have been more than happy to move you to another room to make your stay with us a great one. Again, we do appreciate you taking the time to give us a review, and we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This was actually my third stay at the Super 8. But it has been 10 years since my last stay in 2006.  We arrived at 10am from Australia but unfortunately our room wasn't ready.  We were told to come back by 1pm. We would have loved to have checked in straight away as our kids were very tired after a long flight from Australia.   We returned at 1pm and our room was ready.  It was on the fair side of the property and i requested a lower level room as we had two strollers and would be difficult climbing stairs. Our room was 176. We asked for help with our bags as we had 4 suitcases and a couple of pieces of hand luggage plus two strollers and two small kids.  Unfortunately we were told no even though there were two men at the front desk at the time. So we went to our room and then
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is always wonderful to hear from repeat guests.  We are delighted to hear you had such a great return trip with us. We do have a luggage cart that is a great way to move your bags to and from the lobby. Our front desk staff is always helpful, however, in this case was unable to leave the front desk area when you were checking in. We do apologize for that. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, we do pride ourselves in great customer service, it is good to hear the ladies made such a great impression. We really do hope to see you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: we've stayed here a few times when we've visited disneyland. it's always been nice and clean, staff is always pleasant, they offer a pretty good breakfast. it's walking distance from the park, but it's just a few doors down from the garden walk, so that shuttle is available also. lots of restaurants and such nearby too.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so fantastic to hear you enjoyed your stay. We are so conveniently located as you say. We are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk and within a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Hotel was fine, not noisy.  Bed was kind of hard, as seems to be the case with the Super 8 motels.  Shower towels more fitting for a gym, not at all soft or large.  My only complaint is they could not credit my member account because I didn't book direct.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  It is true if you do not book directly with us we are unable to add your Wyndham Rewards number to receive your points. However, if you send in the receipt you receive from the party you booked with you should have no trouble receiving the points for your stay. We are really looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: This was my third stay at this Super 8 location. I must say, since Wynn took over Super 8, things have been fantastic! The room was always cleaned quite well and the staff was attentive. I really appreciated the breakfast in the morning, with the waffles and yogurt being plenty to get us going before our days in Disneyland! The only downside was the pool being closed often due to construction; however, the construction workers were never too loud and were always courteous.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so excited that you enjoyed your stay and that we exceeded your expectations. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to start your day. Our fresh baked waffles are so delicious. We have a wonderful selection of items. Fresh waffles, cinnamon rolls, cereal, toast, oatmeal, fresh fruit, yogurt and juice as well as coffee cocoa and tea. We are sorry about the pool being closed when  you were here due to the improvements and upgrades we are working on. We are happy to say that pool is now open! We do hope to see you again soon next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: We previously stayed at this hotel in 2000, it was clearly a budget hotel and lacked a fridge and microwave unless you were willing to pay extra to rent them.  I have stayed at many other hotels in the Disneyland area since then, but for this trip I left my booking a bit late and I was unable to get anything right opposite the park, so I reluctantly booked the Super 8 again.  I have to say, I was pleasantly surprised! The care and maintenance at the Super 8 seems to have stepped up a notch and my 5 night stay there was very pleasant.  Our room now had a fridge and microwave as standard, the beds were clean and comfortable, the staff were all very pleasant and helpful and the stop for the bus to Disneyland was just outside the entrance.  The only minus points on this visit were
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We are so glad to know you were pleasantly surprised with our upgrades and updates we have made. We are continuing to improve our property and are excited for your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: They gave our room and did not give a crap!!
Summary: After booking with Expedia and prepaying for our room - I assumed we were were guaranteed our room. We were going to be delayed one day so I called the hotel to let them know that our trip will be delayed and that we will be there the next day. After a long day of traveling, we reach the hotel to only find out they gave our room away. We had no place to stay .. the hotel was full and they could not do anything for us. This was not what we needed after travelling all day. They didn't care about us or our reservation. We were NOT happy and will NEVER book with this hotel again!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Castle Inn and Suites on our last visit and loved it but decided to try the Super 8 because it was a better deal and right next to Castle Inn. We would definitely return to this Super 8. Our room was very clean upon arrival. It was quiet and very comfortable. The air conditioner worked great and so did everything else in the room. The free on demand on the TV was nice. We used the jacuzzi and enjoyed that as well. Did not eat breakfast because we ate at Disneyland but did check it out and it seemed pretty simple. Free parking and Internet. Enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are delighted you choose to stay with us this time! We are even more excited to hear you will be back! It is always wonderful to hear we exceed our guest's expectations. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I love the fridge; sink outside of the bathroom; no cigarette smell; plenty parking; 10 mins walk to Disneyland; free breakfast.  Sound proofing could have been better.  I can hear voices from next door, but its not too bad.  Overall, a good stay.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We do have a complimentary breakfast which does add so much value to your stay. The other amenities such as free wifi, and free parking  add so much more to your dollar. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Hotel is awesome!!! Clean Rooms. Very quiet. Great Location especially if  you are going to Disneyland.  Walking distance to everything.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location was good.  The walls are very thin so you can hear everything.  The windows are huge and not double pane so noise is a problem.  Room was nicely updated.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, It is true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are glad to hear you liked our updated rooms. We are in process of upgrading the whole property.  We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Exceeded expectations for a budget motel
Summary: Our room was clean, and updated with granite counter tops.  Plenty of room for my friend and I who were traveling to run the Tinkerbell half marathon.  We really appreciated the large refrigerator.  My only complaint was the noise outside.  There were buses parked next to our room that started in the middle of the night.   I would bring earplugs next time, then the stay would be perfect.  Also, it would be great if there were some hard boiled eggs for breakfast.  I was looking for more protein.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always so exciting when we hear we exceed our guest's expectations.  We are delighted that you chose to stay with us when attending the Tinkerbell half Marathon. We are in the perfect location. We do look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: We stayed here because of the good reviews. The location is excellent, it is a 15 minute walk from Disneyland. The bathroom was very clean, so was the rest of the room. The Wi-Fi was good, the breakfast is also ok but crowded between 7:30 and 9:00.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, It is wonderful to hear that you had such a great stay. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Decent hotel very close to Disney
Summary: This is our second time staying at this property. It works well for us and our family when going to Disneyland. Decent price for the distance to the park. Not a bad walk in in the morning or back at night.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is always so wonderful to hear from repeat guest's. We are a great location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed at this Super 8 for a one night trip to Disneyland. And if you are looking for a nice, clean, and cheap room within walking distance of the parks this is a good place to stay. The room was clean. The bed was nice. The room was clean. And that was all we needed. We will be staying here again on our future Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy that you had such a great stay and even happier to hear you will be back! We do look forward to seeing you next time you are visiting Disneyland!

Summary: I had been told by friends this was a good hotel and I got a good rate for us in a single queen room. This is an older hotel but nicely kept up, if you don't like places like this then you need to crack your wallet and fork out for a higher end place, for us it was perfectly fine. Ana met us at the counter when we checked in early before check in time and she had a room for us. She was very friendly and helpful with showing us where the room was and letting us know what time the Disney fireworks were that night. Our room was very neat and the towels, bed linens and bathroom were nice and clean. We had a quiet night and comfortable bed. The next day we went out antique shopping and came back before lunch and our room was already made up. My wife likes sleeping with a terry cloth
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a great stay and we fit into your budget. It sounds like from check in and throughout your stay you had great service provided to you. That is wonderful to know our staff is doing such a great job providing you with that excellent service you so deserve. We are really happy that you will be planning on staying here in the future. We do look forward to it!

Summary: I normally do not frequent these type of properties, however, on a trip with people on a tight budget, this hotel was chosen. It's run down with an attempt at a modern touch. I had hair in my towels and washcloths, glad I brought my own. The room was musty and humid upon entry and any second the air was not on. The water was like warm 2/3 nights of our stay which was very disappointing, decent water pressure though.   The carpet in the room was terribly stained and ripped in areas exposing the padding which didn't set well with the musty smell. There was also no TV guide and the remote barely worked. Another thing that was odd to me, typically at hotels when I leave my bed a mess with personal items, they do not touch it or attempt to make the bed - which is appropriate.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, thank you as well for the compliments to our front desk staff. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful and you found their customer service skills to be so amazing. It is always great to hear when we exceed our guest's expectations. It is always our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. We have recently been awarded the "Pride of Super 8" award. To get this award you must excel in all areas, such as front desk, housekeeping, maintenance, and over all property conditions. We are inspected every quarter and you must receive an "A" consistently. We have always passed with flying colors as our property is Super clean and well kept. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance as you say. There are several great places to dine right next door in the Anaheim Garden Walk. Bubba Gumps, PF Changs, California Pizza, and the Cheesecake Factory are some favorites. I am sorry to hear you had some issues with the room you were staying in. We do have a 24 hour front desk available, so our guest's  can contact us with questions or concerns regarding their room at any time. We do have a TV guide in every room. It is actually on  the TV itself. The cable company provides a complete listing of channels and descriptions  of the programming in great detail.  We do provide remotes for our guest's and sometimes during the guest stay the batteries may need to be replaced. A simple call to the front desk at any time can easily fix this. We do not provide transportation to the Disneyland park as we are only a 15 minute walk to the park entrance, however, the City of Anaheim does provide the ART shuttle that operated every day. it starts running an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. It picks up right out front ever 20 minutes. It is a great way to get to or from that park especially if you are tired. The do charge a small fee, but you can get a discounted ticket if you purchase multiple days and in advance. We do hope you decided to visit us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great Rooms, Location, Breakfast, Disney, What's not to Love!
Summary: Clean, Comfortable rooms. Very friendly and helpful staff. Great amenities. Solid Breakfast. Half a block to the Tower of Terror corner of California Adventure, an Easy Walk to the main Gate of Disneyland. The outside of these buildings looks old and tired.  The rooms are fresh and clean and nicely appointed. Free WiFi. Breakfast includes Golden Malted Waffles, Cold Cereal, Yogurt, Fruit, Toast, Coffee, Hot Chocolate, Juice, Milk and more. Housekeeping was friendly and efficient. We just didn't have a single complaint with our 5-night stay at this property except that our Sprint cell phone service was slower than normal...Which is certainly not the fault of the hotel. We travel to Disney/Southern California fairly often and we will certainly be back at the Super 8 Anaheim later
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay and even happier to hear you will be back! We are in a perfect location, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance, and so close to so many great places to shop and to dine. Bubba Gumps is right next door at the Garden Walk. The Cheesecake factory is there as well as The California Pizza, PF Changs just to mention a few great places to dine. We do have a wonderful breakfast, and it is certainly a delicious way to start your day. We are so looking forward to seeing  you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: the location is great, right by disney quick walk over. Doesnt get much better than this. Staff was excellent and nearby food and ya disney is only a quick walk away. Price was good and breakfast in the morning was also great
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so true our location is so great when visiting The Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate making it so convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so awesome to hear you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We are also glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do have a great breakfast, with the freshly made waffles and fresh fruit, yogurt, cereals, cinnamon rolls as well as toast and jam. We do look forward to seeing you again next time  you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Room was very clean and comfortable. Easy walk to Disneyland and places to eat. Very good breakfast at the motel. Nice pool and spa.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear you had such a wonderful trip and you had a great stay. We do have a delicious breakfast I know. Those fresh baked waffles are so tasty! We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance and right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are several great places to dine. Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake factory are some of our favorites. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Super 8 is reasonably priced and I did not expect the best. But I was very happy there. Very nice, very clean, room coffee pot and refrigerator. The best. Breakfast was home made waffles. I don't like waffles, but these were good! I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always so wonderful when we exceed our guests expectations. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that you will be returning! Those waffles are so delicious I know. It really does make a great breakfast. We do look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Took my daughter and friend.  This was a great place to stay.  Walking location close to everything.  We went to Bubba Gumps for dinner, walked to and from Disney.  Free breakfast with made to order waffles.  I'll stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful you found us to be so conveniently located to Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. Breakfast is complimentary as you say, and we do have those wonderful fresh baked waffles that tast so good! We are so happy to hear you will be back and we do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Looks like a motel. Close to Disneyland (you can get there by foot on a short walk). The room is good with fridge and free wi fi. The only downsize was the noise. My room was on the first floor close to the breakfast room and it was impossible to sleep after 7 am. The breakfast is ok..  Would stay again only if the price is good.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had a great stay and that you will be returning. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: It's a little bit of a hike to walk to Disney but can be done within 30 minutes.  The Super 8 is clean and surprisingly quiet at night.  I expected noise from kids but it wasn't a problem.  Great stay!  The breakfast area was a tad crowded and the danish, yogurts, waffles was the same day after day.  Nice to have a "breakfast" but I would have liked a rotation of items available.  Front desk is awesomely helpful!!!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are a perfect place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making us so convenient. We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast. It is  a great way to start your day. The complimentary breakfast as well as the free parking and free wifi does add so much value to your stay. It is wonderful you found our front desk staff to be so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Pleasantly surprised with a clean, nicely decorated room. When I requested ground floor because of not being able to lift suitcases upstairs due to a back problem, they cheerfully and quickly put us in a downstairs unit. The staff was courteous and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay, and even happier that you will be back. Thank you so much for the compliments to our staff. It is so terrific you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed at the Super 8 near Disneyland recently and were very happy with the experience.  Checkin / check out was easy and hassle free. There was no charge for parking.  My children (aged 5 and 7) rated it to be as good as the 5 star hotel we stayed at in San Francisco. The adults were probably a little more discerning and probably wouldn't be quite so generous, but the hotel room was clean, well maintained and quiet. The bathroom was very recently renovated. The beds were comfortable and a good size.  The free breakfast we a simple and easy start to each day. Who can not enjoy freshly made waffles?  The Super 8 provided exactly what we were looking for. A clean comfortable room, close enough to walk to the parks with a comfortable bed to sleep in each night.  If I had to be
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay and enjoyed our amenities and  complimentary breakfast.
