Our free amenities such as complimentary breakfast, free wifi and free parking do add so much value to your stay. We are so happy to know you will be recommending us. We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Comfy Hotel Minutes away from Disney
Summary: Perfect location. for the price you pay you get: free wifi free breakfast. short walk to disney clean room friendly service.  The main value is the close proximity to Disneyland. well worth the money paid.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland. In just a quick 15 minute walk you are at the Disneyland park entrance. We do look forward to another visit from you next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: Stayed here in April.  Looked very old on arrival and was a little hesitant.   Staff were very helpful and checkin was a breeze.  Rooms were clean and presentable although smelt a little musty/old.   The pool and spa was nice after walking all day.  This is 5 minute walk to Disneyland and 20 minutes walk to stadiums.   Very affordable especially for families.  Breakfast was included and is very basic although they make the best hot waffles!!   The breakfast room is on the small side but most people eat and run.  Close to a heap of restaurants.  Would definitely stay here again.  Free parking also was a bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient and that we fit into your budget so well. We are even happier to hear you will be back!  Those breakfast waffles are so delicious  are they not? So yummy! We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Hey, this place isn't bad!  I've stayed in quite a few hotel/motels near Disneyland since we're annual pass holders.  This motel is clean, quiet, and a good price and has everything we wanted plus breakfast & free parking which you can't beat.  It's also a quick walk to the park (we did it in less than 15 minutes)!  They were exchanging the toilets for low-flow ones so right outside our room in the parking lot were all these old toilets which looked funny.  Breakfast was delicious (cinnamon rolls, waffles, cereals, sliced oranges, coffee/juices and helped save some $$ for the park.  Ana at the front desk was helpful and friendly at check-in too!  Thanks for the good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear had a great stay, and even happier to hear you will be back! It's so true we are so conveniently located to the Disneyland park. It's just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We do have  a great selection for breakfast. It is  great way to start the day. We are so sorry for the inconvenience while we are remodeling. I am sure you will be happy with all of the upgrades and improvements. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Loved that we were within walking distance to Disneyland!  Although the breakfast selection wasn't great, we really can't complain because it was included in are great room rate.  Enjoyed taking advantage of the parking at the hotel as well.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient and we fit into your budget.  With our free parking it  does save paying those parking fees at the Disneyland park. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I stayed here for 11 nights in March and it was great. The staff were all very friendly and accommodating. It's about 10 minutes to walk to Disneyland (about the same to the Convention Centre) and there are plenty of restaurants nearby, like Bubba Gump and The Cheesecake Factory. The GardenWalk is pretty much right next door (although it doesn't have very many shops). The rooms at the Super 8 are clean, but fairly well loved. It also has a pool and continental breakfast which ends at 9 -- which was a little too early every single day for me while on vacation, but it was nice to know the option was there. When I did go down for breakfast, they had a good selection of food including waffles, cereal, fruit, and some pastries.   I had booked a room with one queen bed, but a friend
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so great to hear you found our location to be so perfect. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance, 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center and right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful  during your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Stinky moldy smelling room with filthy carpet
Summary: We were looking forward to 3 nights at Disneyland and after exhaustive research decided to stay at Super 8. The reviews are what convinced us. Very disappointed with the room! It has a horrible moldy smell that is overpowering. The carpet is tacky (sticky) and very dirty. So dirty that I am sleeping with my shoes next to the bed so if I wake up to use the bathroom I can put them on! Beware this place doesn't appear to be all it's cracked up to. Asked for another room but were told they are sold out.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is our goal to exceed our guests expectations, and we are sorry to hear that you were disappointed in your room. We do strive to make every stay a great one for our guests. We do have a great maintenance crew who is on top of our carpet shampooing.  We also have a commercial company that comes to shampoo our carpeting. We are in process of upgrading all our rooms with all new carpeting and furnishings. I think you will be pleasantly surprised with all the upgrades when you visit us again.  We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I chose this hotel due to the location so close to Disney. The price was very reasonable compared to others nearby. Although the rooms are a little older they are nice and clean. All facilities are provided along with a complementary breakfast which is a bonus. Staff were extremely helpful and fantastic. Thoroughly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's so terrific to hear you found us to be such a great  value and you found our location to be so convenient. With our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast, it does add so much value to your stay.  We are in the perfect location. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is always super to hear that our employees are doing an excellent job at providing that customer service you so deserve. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Location, appearance was presentable enough to warrant a return. Price is good for a family stay. Will definetely stay here again
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are delighted to hear you had a good stay with us and even more so to hear you will be back! Its terrific that we fit into your budget and you found us to be convenient. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The hotel was updating some rooms and I think we got a room that had been renovated. It was clean but still hate that green carpet.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Yes we are in process of remodeling and upgrading all our rooms, including the carpeting. We are glad you found our rooms so comfortable and clean. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel was clean and nice. Breakfast was great. We stayed 5 days, it was a little bit of a hike to Disneyland but not terrible. Beds were a little hard for me and the bathroom was very small.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome to hear you found us to be such a great value. It is true with our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast, it all does add so much value to your stay. We are a block and half from the Disneyland park entrance, making it about a 15 minute walk. The ART shuttle does pick up right out front and for a small fee it will take you to the entrance as well. It runs every 20 minutes and is very convenient as well. We are remodeling our bathrooms and I am sure that next time you come visit us you will be pleasantly surprised. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I have lost track of the numerous times I have stayed at this facility. It's convenient for the places I'm visiting. Never have had issues of any kind. This last trip, staff wasn't as warm but no issues so no real need to have more interaction than needed. They are renovating sections, making parking a little annoying. My only complaint is room rates are getting pretty high. I will return like always because it's safe, clean, and convienent to many things (various food joints, Disney, convenience stores, and I don't have to drive to these places if I choose not too)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We always love to hear from repeat guests. We do apologize for any inconvenience during our remodel. We do believe next time  you will be pleasantly surprised. We are remodeling all of our bathrooms with new tubs and tiles! We are so conveniently located to the Disneyland park as well as so many great places to shop and dine. It does make staying here so convenient. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This hotel was conveniently located, and appreciated that we were able to get a ground floor room. which we could park right outside of. The pool and hot tub was a nice amenity. As we really appreciated the breakfast. Cleaning staff looked after our needs in exceptional manner. This is our second stay at this location and would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. We are delighted to hear you found our heated pool and hot tub to be so inviting. It is a great way to relax after a long day at the Disneyland park. We are so excited to hear you will be staying with us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here while vacationing to Disneyland. It's within walking distance to Disneyland and the rooms were pretty nice. The front desk had very kind employees. The only thing was the water smelled funny, and the rooms weren't attended to until about 2:30. Even then, we left the maid a $10 tip and she didn't even bring in more coffee. Plus the water was turned off one day when we came back to our room for lunch. There was no note our anything. I had to call and find out what was going on. The breakfast was mediocre at best. Cereal, toast, and yogurt. No eggs, donuts, etc. You also have to pay $5 a day to use a microwave. Overall, it average.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thanks for the compliments to our staff as well. It is good to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do offer a complimentary breakfast every morning. The menu does include 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls, waffles with syrup, fresh fruit, yogurt, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea and coffee. It certainly is a great way to start your day. We are really looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This motel was in an excellent location for a with an easy walk to Disneyland.  Since we weren't planing to be in our room much, the price helped us chose Super 8.   The breakfast was OK, but very crowded and small for the number of people they were trying to serve.  Very clean and well kept up for an older motel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient during your stay. We are so close to Disneyland this is true, just a quick 15 minute talk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are happy we fit into  your budget as well. Thanks again for the review and we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The good: great location, 10-15 minute walk from Disneyland entrance! Room was quiet, bed and pillows were comfortable. Bathroom and shower were fine. All you need as you spend most of the day in Disney. Staff were the best. One thing though, the bottom of my feet and the bottom of my wife's new white socks were black from the dirty carpet. It should be steam cleaned more often as obviously, people walk on the carpet with their dirty shoes on. Keep your sandals on and this would be a great place to stay while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient during your stay with us. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. It is great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your return.

Summary: We had a very pleasant stay! The room was very clean, and they have amazing breakfast! Disneyland was very close so we didn't have to walk a lot. I would definitely come back to this motel!  They have EXCELLENT service!!!
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so good to hear you had such and excellent stay and even better that you will be back!  We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We look forward  to your next visit with us.

Summary: Biggest pro for this property is convenience given its proximity to Disneyland and value, I.e why you pay for it. You get a clean bed to sleep in after being wiped out the whole day in the park:). Morning breakfast is pretty good, again given the whole package. One irritant was the bathroom. It was too small and had furnishings not working well. But bottom line, I would recommend this hotel to folks traveling on budget.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Great to hear you found us so affordable and that you found our location to be so convenient. We are in process of upgrading all of our bathrooms with all new furnishings as well as new tubs and bathroom tiles and faucets. I am sure you will love the new look next time you visit us. We do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: Just needed a room close to the park. About what you would expect from a Super 8. Good value but nothing spectacular.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to know you found us to be such a great value. It is so true with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast this does add so much value to your stay. We do hope that you will stay with us again next time that you are in Anaheim

Summary: My bf and I stayed at this motel for 3 nights. Price was decent for a decent room. It's obviously not a fancy place but it was good enough to get some rest. Housekeeping came in to freshen up the place so by the time we would come back around 7/8pm the room was cleaned up and new towels were placed. Complimentary breakfast is kind of a joke but good enough to get you started. The offer 2 cereals , little waffles , some mini size yogurts & a fruit. The area is also not fancy looking but again it's good enough to get started for the day. The parking there is free. No fees. Wifi is free... There's a couple of restaurants around & a cvs close by. Also a liquor store in case you want to unwind. The walk to Disney was not bad at all. Would recommend this place if you're not picky of
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to know you found our location to be so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. It is just a block and a half distance from the entrance. We are so close to so many great places to shop and to dine as well. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: The room is simple and clean.  To me it's very similar to the quality you get with a value resort at Disney World without the Disney Decor.  The bonus is you can walk to Disneyland!  There is no need to drive and pay a parking fee.  The breakfast was below average but the waffles were great.  The wonderful thing was they had a lady who made the waffles for you so they were hot and ready to go when you arrived.  No waiting for the timer to go off.  The price, location and clean room gives it a 4 rating.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay at, close to Disneyland and the garden walk! Very clean, you can smell it when you walk in. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is great to hear you had a good stay and even better to hear you will be returning! We are in a perfect location as you say, right next door to the Anaheim Garden walk where several great places to shop and dine are just minutes away.  We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for the money and location
Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel and it is a great place if you are going to Disneyland. It is within walking distance and the rates are reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always a delight to hear from repeat guests. We do have a perfect location. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate of the Disneyland park. We are happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and we do hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary Heading: Great for the price but don't expect too much though
Summary: 10-15min walk to Downtown Disney/Disneyland/California Adventure Park. Lots of people around so we felt safe at night. Beds are very comfy and fridge was included which was a bonus, however there was no in-room safe as stated. WiFi is practically non-existent and very frustrating. Included breakfast is handy but 4 days of eating the exact same thing was boring. Disappointed that they did not have soy milk or non-dairy alternative so we couldn't have cereal.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review.It is so great to hear we fit into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient.  We are in the perfect location to Disneyland park, only a quick 15 minute walk as you say. We have upgraded all our rooms with new beds and furnishings as well as new mattress. Glad to know you found the room so comfortable. As stated on our website, we do have safes, they are at the front desk. There is no charge for this service, and you keep the key until you check out. We have a 24 hour front desk, so you are able to access it at any time. We have recently upgraded our free Wifi. Our new wifi system boasts 20 commercial grade access points powered by a 100 Mb fiber optic cable, and really is quite fast and reliable. We also provide a 24 hour wifi support line to assist if there are any problems accessing the web, or if you have questions on how your personal device works with our Wifi. I am sorry if you experienced any difficulties with the free wifi, but next time do not hesitate to bring it to our attention so we can assist.  It is good to hear you found our complimentary breakfast to be so handy. I do apologize if you found the choices boring. We do have a great menu. We have fresh waffles with syrup, toast with jam, hot oatmeal (several flavors to choose from) 2 kinds of cold cereal with milk. Signature cinnamon rolls, they are so good heated up! fresh fruit, yogurt, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, hot tea, and regular and decaf coffee. Mix it up a bit each morning, waffles one day, cereal the next day, fresh fruit and a yummy yogurt  with toast the next day, and maybe one of those cinnamon rolls heated with hot cocoa one morning. We do hope that you come visit us again soon and we want to thank you again for the review.

Summary Heading: Clean, Friendly and close to Disney
Summary: It was a nice stay within a 10-15 minute walk to Disney main gate. Very clean room with friendly staff. Reasonable rate and some restaurants near by. Close to CVS and a couple other small stores.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are also right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are several great places to eat. Bubba Gumps and the Cheesecake factory are some favorites for sure! We are happy to hear we fit so well into your budget and we are excited to see you come visit us again soon.

Summary: If you are looking for a clean room, quiet location with a helpful staff, this is the location for you. Walking distance to Disneyland.  Our 8 and 10 year old had no problem with the 10 min walk each day.  You get a yummy brunch in the morning served from 6-9.  The waffles were my kids favorite.  There is a pool and hot tub for the kids and adults to rest by after a long day at  Disneyland.  Nothing fancy but it has all you need if you are just looking for a basic hotel so you can spend more money playing at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank  you as well for the compliments to our staff, it is great to hear you found them to be so helpful during your stay. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, and right next door to so many great places to dine. We do have a nice heated pool and hot tub. It makes it a great way to relax after a day at the park. You can even see the Disneyland fireworks from the pool! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: A little farther than I thought from Disneyland. A good 15 minute walk. But it was clean and the staff was nice. Pool and jacuzzi were clean, too. Refrigerator was not cold.Helpful in getting members of our party rooms next to each other.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. It does make it so convenient. Glad to hear you found our staff so friendly and our heated pool  so inviting. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: Could not get hot water at the sink unless we turned on the hot water in the shower. But overall the rooms were very clean and office staff were great.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank you for the compliments to  our staff as well. It is wonderful to hear they provided you with that excellent guest service you so deserve.We hope to see  you again soon

Summary Heading: Excellent value for budget accommodation, walk to Disneyland
Summary: Booked in for 7 nights, over Easter weekend and was quite impressed for the price. If you don't need five-star quality (or cost!) this place is great - good sized room, plenty of storage space, shower over a bath, comfortable beds and pillows, good air con. Reception staff quite friendly and helpful, one night we got home at 10.15pm and our toilet handle was loose, we couldn't flush it, rang reception and a guy came over within 5 minutes and fixed it.  Good laundry available although a bit expensive.  Nice deep pool and lovely warm hot tub. Sell discount tickets to the attractions.   Would recommend for budget accommodation.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. So excited to hear you had a great stay and we fit so well into your budget. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so close to Disneyland it is a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. So Convenient! We are so looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Now when someone thinks Super 8, they don't think clean and friendly and high quality, but this super 8 smashes all of those bad qualities because it was one of the nicest hotels I've ever stayed at, and it is so close to the park, I could see the fireworks from my room! I travel a lot and have stayed at many hotels, strongly recommend this one and I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is awesome you enjoyed your stay with us and even better to hear you will be back! We love to hear it when we exceed our guest's expectations. We really look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Room looked clean, but it smelled like water that had sat around in a room that was closed up too long. Fortunately, I bring air fresheners with us on trips, just in case. There is a CVS on the corner not too far, which was convenient for buying cheaper bottled water and putting in the refrigerator at the hotel, and or air fresheners if need be. Wasn't a bad walk to Disneyland. (I am not a walker, so that is saying a lot) But it is doable and saves you the parking fee at the park. I noticed that the housekeeping staff turned off the air conditioning while we were gone, so the room was warm when we got back to it. After a walk from the park, the air conditioning would have felt good. Not much for breakfast, but I am not really a breakfast eater so I didn't mind. There is cereal,
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in the perfect location for convenience when going to the Disneyland Resort. We are  just a quick 1 minute walk to the entrance. We next door to some great places to dine. Great restaurants such as Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake factory just to mention a couple are right next door at the Anaheim Garden Walk. Glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. it is great way to start the day this is true. We do offer free parking as well as free WIFI, which is really adding  a great value to your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: All very good but gor breakfast.  Motel was sld out snd breakfast facilities and food assortment and quality lacking!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to hear you found us to be such a great value. It is true with our amenities such as the complimentary breakfast, free wifi, and free parking it makes it does add up to a very valuable stay.  Our location is perfect when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick  15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We just came back from 6 days at the hotel.  The kids loved the pool and hot tub as it was great for a relaxing afternoon before going back into the park.  The room was clean, quiet but nothing fancy.  It was a 12 minute walk to the park and very close to the pharmacy and grocery store.  Very enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is so awesome to hear you had such an enjoyable stay. We do have a great heated pool and hot tub as you say. It is a great way to relax after a long day at the park. We are happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It is just a quick walk to the park entrance and several great places to shop as well as dine.

Summary: Pros: Room was clean            Free breakfast            10 min walk to Disneyland  Cons: Rooms were small and old            Pool was not appealing             Lots of street noise at night            I forgot my water bottle in the fridge and went back for it once I had checked out. My water bottle was in the lost and found in housekeeping and housekeeping was gone. The front desk staff would not get it for me or offer any solutions. I was annoyed by the lack of service around this issue.   Bottom line....pay the extra money and stay somewhere nice.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear you found our complimentary breakfast enjoyable. It is also wonderful to hear you found your room to be so clean and comfortable. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and have new bedding, furnishings, new carpeting as well as all new vanities. We are in process of upgrading our bathrooms as well. We do have a nice heated pool and hot tub, and most of our guest do enjoy it after a long day at the park, or just to enjoy as a refreshing and relaxing part of their day. We do apologize if the water bottle you left behind was not readily available at the front desk when you came back that evening after checking out that morning. We treat our guests lost and found items very carefully and realize the importance of our guest property to each and every guest. As a service to our guest and to make sure every item is safe  we do only allow our housekeeping manager to have access to the lost and found items.  Our housekeeping staff is only hear during the daytime. This is why the front desk clerk did explain this to you and advised the housekeeping manager would be here the next day. We also are more than happy to ship items to our guests if they have already left town. You can still contact us as we do hold our lost and found for a the required time as per regulations. Give us a call and we would be happy to ship it to you. Thanks again for the review, and we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Great spot with only a ten minute walk to Disneyland. Rooms were good with good air con. And the pool after a long day at Disneyland is great for relaxation. Plenty of food outlets close by, even bubba gumps near by for our fix of shrimps. Free breakfast was ok, pastrys and cereals aplenty.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is good to hear you found our heated pool and hot tub to be so inviting. It is so nice after a long day at the Disneyland park.  We do have a great complimentary breakfast, it is a great way to start the day. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Decent hotel for visiting Disneyland - not that close though.
Summary: I booked this hotel for my family after reading lots of reviews of this hotel and others in the area.  We spent 4 nights here and it is a clean hotel, the beds are nice and comfortable with pretty nice linens on them.  When we checked in, the rate that I was going to be charged was more than the rate that I had confirmed when I booked the hotel (directly through their website with a AAA discount).  I had called the hotel to add an extra night after my original booking and specifically asked if the rate was the same and he said yes it was the same reservation without even really looking at anything.  When I showed up, the rate was higher, but I had my original reservation printed out, so he changed it back to the lower rate without any trouble.  We went to our room and our keys
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are so many great places to shop and to dine. We are also just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort entrance. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: We arrived early on 4th March expecting to put our bags in storage until check in time, we were very please when we were given our room early. The room was very clean with a fridge extra towels and everything we needed. Breakfast was good plenty too choose from and the hotel is close to restaurants and 15 mins walk to Disneyland. Great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found us to be such a great value and we fit into your budget so well. It is true we are in a perfect location to the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are also a few minute walk to several great places to shop and dine. We cant wait to see you again next time you are visiting the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary: We needed a place to stay just one night last minute and this place was very accommodating. Just a couple blocks from Disneyland it was reasonably affordable. Very clean and modern. Comfy beds and spacious (we stayed in a 2 queen room). Front desk was super nice =) We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you enjoyed your stay and even better to hear you will be back! It is true with our free amenities such as free Wifi, Free parking and complimentary breakfast, this does add so much value to your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Room was clean and well taken care of during my stay. Breakfast was decent. Pool area and hot tub were very nice. All staff was helpful and accommodating. Great deal. Even saw the fireworks from Disney from the hotel!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so great to hear we fit so well into your budget and you enjoyed your stay with us. We do love to hear that our staff was so helpful and accommodating. It is our pleasure to make sure you have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. We do  look forward to seeing you again next time you  are in Anaheim.

Summary: When we checked in the front desk manager did not make eye contact and was not very friendly. When asked if we could get another blanket for our room I called the front desk and they told me that I could have another one but would have to come down to the lobby. I was clear in the back of the hotel. Needless to say I did not get one. I was disappointed that the staff was not friendly. I was excited about the waffles at the breakfast but was disappointed that we were not able to make our own. Had to wait for ours made by staff or take a cold one.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. i do want to apologize if you found the person checking you in was not friendly. It is very important to have friendly and helpful staff and we pride ourselves on exceeding our guest's expectations. I do apologize if this was not the case. We do have extra bedding including extra blankets in the room. We do have additional bedding at the front desk. If a request is made during the daytime when housekeeping staff is still here we are more than happy to deliver it to the room. If our staff has gone home for the day, it is available  at the front desk upon request. We do have those freshly made waffles and we have a wonderful staff who makes them every morning for our guests. It is our pleasure to serve our guest's and are more than happy to make them hot and fresh every time. We do hope to see you visit us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The family and I stayed for one night and it was fine. The free breakfast is something to be desired as there was a long line and no where to sit, other than that it was a nice stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. So glad to hear you had such a great stay with us. We are in process of remodeling our breakfast room and it will be larger with more seating. We are sure that you will be pleasantly surprised during  your next visit. We do look forward to it.

Summary: I've read some reviews on help and it did not disappoint. The rooms are nice and clean. When we returned to our room at night, the room would be fixed for us.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you decided to stay with us for the first time and that you enjoyed your visit with us. We do hope to see you again in the future. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: I have to say, going in, I was a little nervous about booking this hotel.  We had a last minute opportunity to go to Disneyland for the day, so I booked this hotel because of the proximity to Disney, but most importantly, the price was right.  I figured, we would not be there very long, so even if it was bad, we did not pay too much.  I am sorry but I was totally wrong and misjudged this motel. Our room was a very nice size, two big comfy beds with a bunch of fluffy pillows, a refrigerator, TV, little toiletries, etc.  We were so surprised and relieved!!  The walk was maybe 10 minutes - close to many restaurants and a 24 hour CVS and 7-Eleven.  Plenty of people walking around - we felt very safe.    Everyone we dealt with at the front desk was so nice and helpful.  They offer
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is so awesome to hear you were pleasantly surprised and that we exceeded you expectations. We also love to hear  that our staff was so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do our very best to make sure each and every guest has a comfortable and enjoyable stay. We are really looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Pretty close to Disneyland. Room was a little small for staying more than a night or two. Ceiling over shower had a drip that we informed management of. Otherwise,a nice place to stay. Wish there were more breakfast options. Wi-Fi was spotty, but overall, served our purposes.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear that you had a satisfactory stay with us. We are very close to the Disneyland park. In just a quick 15 minute walk you are at the front entrance of the park. We do have free wifi, as well as a great complimentary breakfast. This adds so much value to your stay as well. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The room was newly redone with hard wood & fixtures & seemed very clean. Location was close to Disneyland & worked out great for our stay. Breakfast was a good variety. Only bad thing was & partly my fault I left my daughters new sketchers in the room & I called the next day after check out & they were not in lost & found. So either service worker got a new par of shoes or the person who had our room next did. So double check your room before you leave or figure whatever you left is gone.  Otherwise it was a good stay & I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is good to hear you liked our recent upgrades to our rooms.  We always do a great job keeping inventory of our lost and found. I think it may be a good idea to give us another call so we can check again for you. We are so happy that you had a good stay and even happier that you will be back!

Summary: This hotel is great! It was clean and the staff were very nice. The breakfast was good. I will definitely stay here again. We were very impressed with it even though it is not a fancy hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We love to hear that you will be back.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff, It is our pleasure to make sure you have an friendly and enjoyable stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: It was very nice -close to everything that one could walk.  Rooms were clean and breakfast was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you you had such an awesome stay. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance! We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Absolutely awesome! Happy at return to Super 8.
Summary: I am so happy with Super 8. I will go back again and again. Nothing fancy. It is clean, close to Disneyland and has incredible staff. We booked the weekend prior and still got a great deal. I need to remember to book early next time. Free parking and free Wi-Fi are excellent. The hotel is older but they make great efforts to make up for that. Very clean. Nice amenities like a good sized fridge, hair dryer, free basic toiletries, nearby vending machines, ice masker and coffee maker in each room. The bed was comfortable especially after a long day at the amusement parks. Plenty of clean towels and This hotel has a pool and jacuzzi but we didn't get to check them out.   All of the staff were super nice. The front desk people were incredible and helpful. The cleaning staff smiled
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is always such a pleasure to hear from our repeat guests. You have given us such a wonderful review.  We are happy to know you love staying with us and that you will be back. We look forward to it.

Summary: Great walking distance to Disneyland. Staff is very friendly. Room was clean and bed is comfortable after a long day at the park. Breakfast was good. .Also close to the Garden Walk for restaurants.  This was our second time staying here and we have our next trip booked here as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear you had such a great stay and you found our location to be so convenient. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is always so good to know our staff is so friendly and helpful. It is our goal to exceed our guests expectations. We are looking forward to your next trip.

Summary: Extremely pleased with my stay (1 month) at this Super 8.   Conveniently located within walking distance of Disneyland and excellent eateries next door. There is also a 7/11 and CVS down the road should you fancy a quick snack or sick.  Rooms were clean and comfortable. From my previous stay - they have continuously upgraded and updated the rooms. The Staff were extremely helpful in regards to assisting me with tourist information.   I don't often specify names but there was one particular staff member whom I must mention. Gaby of the Home Keeping team. She did a beautiful job cleaning our rooms religiously and to a high standard and ensuring the wellbeing of my stay at the motel. Gaby you're a real asset and a beacon of exceptional standards.   I hope the manager sees this and
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. Our location is certainly a bonus when staying with us and visiting Disneyland or the Convention Center. We are just a quick walk to the front entrance of the Disneyland park. We are also right next door to so many great places to shop and dine. We look forward to seeing  you again soon.

Summary: I stay at a lot of hotels, and I wasn't expecting much when I stayed here, but it was nice and clean, staff was friendly. I'd stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear we fit into your budget and we exceeded your expectations. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to know you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Very quiet room, staff was very nice and professional. It was a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland, not bad at all. If we had the kids with us I could see it being a little long at the end of a long day. But we saw a lot of families making the walk so I am sure it would be fine. Nice breakfast in the morning. Nothing special, but it got us going and held us over till lunch. I would definitely recommend this hotel for a family trip to Disneyland. Another bonus is we stayed the night before we went to the park, but we could keep our vehicle in the parking lot (if a pass supplied at checkin) until midnight of the day we checked out. Saved us the $15-20 it cost to park in the Disneyland lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so wonderful to hear you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland this is true. We are just  a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, making it so convenient. We do have free parking as well, so leaving your car hear and walking to the park saves quite a bit of money. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: Front desk service for night shift was rude and made it difficult to check in. After requesting bottom floor we were still stuck on a top floor.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I do apologize if you found our night shift to be rude and difficult. You do not specify, but I can only say that we want to treat every guest in a friendly and helpful manner. I assure you  we have addressed this and do hope that you will visit us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We were looking for a cheap, clean place to crash at night after spending all day at Disneyland. What a treat this hotel turned out to be.  Firstly, this is a budget hotel. And it is an older property. Having said that, it is IMMACULATELY clean, the beds are comfortable and there are ample cushy pillows in each room.  The staff are amazing - they couldn't do enough for us.  The pool area was clean and well maintained.  Breakfast was adequate. While the protein options are limited, there was fruit and waffles, and like everywhere else on the property, all was kept clean, tidy and well stocked.  We loved our visit and absolutely will be staying there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear you had such a great stay. We do our very best to make sure our guest's are comfortable and that our rooms are nice and clean. We have recently upgraded our rooms with new bedding, it is great to hear you found it so comfortable.

Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff. We felt the rooms and beds were comfortable. The property was located in a nice, safe area. The price was very reasonable and we would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. It is always good to hear that we are doing a good job keeping our guest's happy and comfortable during their stay. We are so happy to hear you will be recommending us and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: While not expensive, it is not that great. The beds and pillows were very uncomfortable. While the sink and such was nice, the actual bathroom was aging. With unkempt walls, cracks on the baseboards and tub, the AC unit was outdated and falling apart (very loud as well). It was only a 2 day trip but I was already wishing to be home after the first night of sleeplessness. The staff on the other hand were amazing! Extremely friendly and helpful with any questions or concerns. The breakfast was pretty typical of any hotel, except its sitting area was horrendous! Tables and chairs place in any free space in a tiny room. With the dozens of people coming down for breakfast most just took and left back to their rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear that we fit into your budget. It is wonderful you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are in process of upgrading, and the breakfast room is going to be enlarged and improved with additional seating as well. We are sure you will find the improvements to your liking when your return. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I was very happy with my stay at Super 8. As a business travel I like staying in clean hotels that are priced right and in good locations. This hotel exceeded all my expectations. Great staff and super clean rooms and grounds. Best deal I have seen in a while.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in the perfect location as you say, just 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are also right next door to the garden walk where there are several great places to shop and dine as well. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We were pleased and happy with the cleanliness of this motel.  The beds were comfortable and the room was spacious.  The breakfast was better than we expected with yogurt, fresh waffles, fruit, toast and cereal.  One of the less expensive places to stay around Disneyland and an easy walk to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear you found us to be such a great value. We do have a wonderful breakfast this is true. This does add so much value to your stay. This along with free parking, and free wifi saves in so many ways. We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed there for two days and the price was very  good the people in the front desk were very friendly and nice .The room was very nice and clean and nice decorated had a mini fridge , and they have a free breakfast which is pretty good waffles are good and small the only issue was that the water in the bath tub didnt want to go down but other than that is a nice place to stay has alot of different restaurants close by and disneyland is close by I highly recommend itand I would definately stay again good service and very friendly people.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I love the title to your review. It is so true we are a great price  and so convenient to Disneyland park. In just a quick 15 minute walk you are the main entrance of the park. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast! Those fresh baked waffles are delicious! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My partner and I stayed at this hotel in December 2015 as we had planned to go to Disney Land for a few days and check out some other sites in Anaheim. Overall we were impressed with our stay here, very short walk to Disney Land which was convenient as in the afternoon you could easily come back to the hotel and relax then go back to the Disney Fireworks. You can even see them from the hotel. The rooms were always very clean and tidy which was wonderful. We wish there would've been a bit more room at breakfast time downstairs as we never got to sit down and eat our breakfast, it didn't quite accommodate for the number of guests. However that being said we would just go out for breakfast down the road which was easy and cheap enough anyway :)   Overall, very happy with the stay
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so  true, staying here does add up to such a good value. Complimentary breakfast, free parking and free wifi are just a few of our amenities that add so much value to your stay. We are so happy that you were impressed and we hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel was fantastic and the room was great, location was amazing being so close to Disney.  There were restaurants locally and a fantastic atmosphere in the area as it was close to Disney.  The customer service was good and the hotel was nice, I would recommend the hotel for location and amenities
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. it is so true we are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are also just a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. There are several great places to shop and dine right next door in the Anaheim Garden Walk and at Downtown Disney. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: I have stayed here on more than one occasion, its not the newest hotel in Anaheim but the rooms have all been refurbished and are quite nice. lots of freebies
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found us to be so affordable and we fit into your budget. It is true with all our free amenities such as free parking, free Wifi and complimentary breakfast, this does add a lot of value to your stay. We even have upgraded rooms with fridges and coffee makers in every room. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a week. Just 8 minutes walking to Disneyland security check point. A few good restaurants (Bubba Gump, Cheesecake Factory) just next to the motel. Breakfast is fine with all basic food: toast, waffle, yogurt, cereal, juice. Breakfast room (close by 9am) is small so you may want to bring the breakfast back to your room. Clean and tidy room with a fridge and not expensive when compared to the hotels around. Didn't hear any noise from the other rooms. The only complaint I have is the air conditioning unit is too noisy. I woke up every time when the unit started running.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so awesome to hear you found us to be such a great value. With our amenities such as our complimentary breakfast, free Wifi, and free parking this does add up to a lot of value for your stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Awesome location and great room value
Summary: Stayed here for a conference at the convention center. Amazing location within quick walking distance to nightlife, restaurants, the Anaheim Convention Center, and Disneyland! The pool was also a great place to relax.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is very true we are in the perfect location, so close to the Disneyland park as well as  the Anaheim Convention Center. We are the perfect location to to many great places to shop and to dine as well. We are so looking forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We had a 5 night stay here last week and were more then pleased. This is a no-frills motel, however they make sure that what you do experience is clean, convenient, orderly and well maintained. We slept great in our very clean and comfortable room. The room size is small, but if you are hanging out at Disney during the day, room size really is not an issue.  The walk to Disney is about 15 minutes, and very easy. Even at night when we where very tired, we found the walk to be easy as well. There are restaurants right next to the hotel (bubba-gump, cheesecake factory etc..) these places also had bars that you could stop in for a drink after a day in the parks. There are also a couple of the usual national breakfast places like Denny's and IHOP along the route to Disney as well.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so true we are in such a great location! We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance of the Disneyland park. We are also so close to so many great places to shop and dine. We are so happy to know we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: For the price this hotel is the best in the area. Free wifi, breakfast, parking, and walking distance to Convention Center, Disneyland, Gradenwalk, etc. Also the staff were always friendly and kept the facilities immaculate. I would recommend this Super 8 to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you found us to be such a great value. It is so true, our amenities such as free parking, free Wifi and complimentary breakfast do add up to a lot of value for  your money. We are so conveniently located as well. We do hope to see you again next time y ou are in Anaheim.

Summary: Location was perfect, price was okay, service was good. The fridge didn't get very cold, but that was minor. They let us park ahead of check in so we could go straight to the park. The walls are super thin and there were crazy young adults getting drunk and screaming all night above us--so that was a downer. Bring your earplugs. Otherwise, it was fine. Breakfast was actually really good--those mini waffles are yummy. :)
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you round our location to be so convenient and we fit so well into your budget. We do have a 24 hour front desk, if in the future you have the need to call us, please do. We are here to assist. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a great hotel, right around the corner from Disneyland. The staff was great, no problems at all. Very quiet and close to everything. We enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  It is true we are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed for a week. The check in was easy and staff very friendly. Room was made up every day with clean towels. We didn't hear noise from other rooms. The pool was great - after a long day at the parks, great to soak your feet in the hot tub! The bus stop is just outside. Disney is about 10-15 mins walk.  Lovely restaurants nearby. Cheesecake Factory definitely worth a visit or 3! Really good pizza takeaway 2 mins away along with a Chinese Mexican and subway.  We had prebooked trips and they collected from outside the hotel. Very easy to get around Breakfast was good - porridge, cereal, toast, waffles yoghurt, oranges, drinks Wifi connection was great.  We didn't have any reason to speak to the staff but check out was as easy as check in. As a single parent I felt very safe
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, It is wonderful to know you had such a great experience when staying with us. It is even better to hear you will be staying here again! We are in a perfect location it is true. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are right next door to so many great places to dine such as Bubba Gumps, The  Cheesecake Factory, and PF Changs to mention a few. We are happy to hear you took advantage of our complimentary breakfast. It is a delicious way to start your day. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: For those who are looking for a place to stay near Disneyland and not to go bankrupt, this is an ideal place. The hotel is located 15 min of walking distance from the parks (I was with 3 kids, so for some families it could be even faster). It is a nice stroll either in the morning or in the evening and in case you are extremely tired the taxi will cost you $8-9. And the location is off the busy street so not much noise through the night ))  The room is standard hotel room, nice, clean and bright with blow dryer, ironing board, fridge, tv and good wi-fi connection.  The hotel has a pool with a hot tub where you can relax in the middle of the day while taking a break or at night.  The front desk is very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast room is kind of a small for all the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you found you made the right lodging choice when visiting the Disneyland park. With our location so close to Disneyland (just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance), Free amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay. We are so happy to know you will be recommending us and we do look forward to your return.

Summary: Great room. Good location. Friendly staff. We will definitely stay again. Only complaint was finding a live bug in the refrigerator.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. It is so great to hear you had a good stay, but even better to hear you will be back! It is wonderful that you found our staff to be so friendly! We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The room was very clean.  Every employee was extremely nice and accommodating. We had a delicious continental breakfast before sleeping for a few hours.  I would recommend this hotel to others.  Close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay. It is so good to know you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is  terrific way to start the day. We are so convenient as you say so close to the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We fell in love with super 8 quite accidentally when we stayed several times in our local college town. This trip We were use to $$$$ hotels by Disneyland and this time thought " what the heck? Let's try our Super 8" So we did. Walking distance from D-land, excellent pool and very large room. The bed was comfortable and nice big windows. The roof top deck was perfect for viewing the fireworks. The rates were amazing and extremely professional employees. You did it again Super 8. The negatives were no micro in the room but awesome fridge and the free breakfast could use an egg or breakfast meat. Only protein was  Yogurt. We will return again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We do have a great view of the fireworks from our sundeck don't we? It is a great way to finish a wonderful day and enjoy time with the family. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so great to hear you found them to be so professional and friendly during your stay with us. We do have fridges in all of our upgraded rooms and we have microwaves available upon request at the front desk. It is super to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do have yogurt as well as fresh fruit, 2 kinds of cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, toast with jam, We also have hot coffee, hot cocoa, and tea as well as 2 kinds of juice. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Clean, Affordable, Quiet and Everything Worked
Summary: I stayed one night for three distinct business-related activities.  The venue was perfect for my needs.  The only concern I had was for safety of myself and my belongings.  The signs posted all over about management not being responsible for theft added to my anxiety.  If theft is that big a problem, perhaps additional security would be a good investment to attract new clients.  The breakfast was sad.  No hot service other than coffee (which I don't drink), no fresh fruit... and no grab-n-go other than stale pastries.  Otherwise, I liked the place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you decided to stay with us while you were on business here. The Anaheim Convention Center is just a quick 5 minute walk from here making it so convenient. The signs you speak of is standard for most all motels and hotels, and is a requirement of our properties. It is is for our guest's security and safety that we do have evening and nighttime security staff here. We do have a complimentary breakfast that is served every morning from 6 am to 9 am. Our breakfast does include freshly baked waffles with syrup, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls (that are delicious heated by the way) fresh fruit, yogurt, 3 kinds of cereal with milk, coffee, tea and cocoa. We also have 2 kinds of juice. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: This Hotel was clean, well maintained and had excellent helpful staff.  Rooms were spacious and well appointed.  Close to Disneyland Park (about a 15 min. walk to the main parking lot) and many restaurants.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear they were so helpful and friendly during your stay. We are so close to the Disneyland park, just a quick 15 minute walk as you say to the main entrance. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you in Anaheim.

Summary: We were very pleased with the accommodations. The room was clean and quiet. We even had a refrigerator and coffee maker. Absolutely no complaint!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found us to be such a great value, It is so true with our complimentary breakfast, free wifi and free parking  it does add so much value to your stay. We have upgraded rooms with fridges as well as coffeemakers in all our rooms at no extra cost. We are delighted to know you had such a terrific stay. We look forward to your return.

Summary: As a family Disneyland offers many memories,however, the park does become extremely crowded.   Here's my recommendation:  Stay at one of the Disney Hotels and you will be able to enjoy the park one hour earlier than the general public.   If you can visit the park on slower days such as Monday and Tuesday.   Make sure you are at the park when it opens to get on the rides. Normally by 1 pm the park becomes very crowded.   Have a great time!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thanks for all the tips for those visiting the Disneyland park. It is true it can be very busy at Disneyland especially during peak times. We are so close to the Disneyland park making it very convenient as you can walk to the park in 15 minutes. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is a very comfortable, clean hotel, remarkably well situated and is definitely worth every penny you spend to stay there. I recommend it to anyone who is going to visit Disneyland, since it is easily accessible on foot!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is very true with our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking, and complimentary breakfast, this does add so much value to your stay. We are so conveniently located as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We so excited for your return!

Summary: This is our 3rd time stsying at this location and it is the best hotel by far...friendly staff..clean rooms and pool. Love the fact that its just walking distance to Disneyland ..restaurants.. a 711 and other places to eat. Will definatley be our hotel to stay at when we visit Disneyland!!..
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so wonderful to know that they provide such great service to our guests. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland!
Summary: When my fiancee and I checked in, they had a room for us for 2 queen beds instead of just the 1 which we originally booked (awesome). This is more like a hotel than a motel. The room looked elegant, there was a nice pool and most of all, it's only a 10min walk to Disneyland! Also, it's right next to Bubba Gump (famous Cali restaurant) as well as other restaurants. Everything is literally within walking distance: quick fast food places, a grocery store, etc. For the price we paid, it was so worth it. No need to get an expensive hotel when youre gona be on Disneyland all day anyway.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are so conveniently located. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance as well as right next door to so many great places to shop and dine  a the Anaheim Garden Walk. It is so true you do get so much value for your money with all of our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking, and even a great complimentary breakfast. We are really looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Central - right in the middle of everything .... Clean and nice rooms ... very helpfull and nice staff. Enjoyed the fireworks from neighbour Disneyland every night. Clean towels every day - even though we did not ask for new ones.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are in a perfect location it is true. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. You can see the Disneyland fireworks from here, A great place to see them is from our sundeck as well as our pool area. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights at reasonable rates. Room was clean & quiet.  Only problem was no hot water in sink area.  Breakfast area is not set up well and crowded.  Stay was enjoyable Would recommend this Super 8 to others.  We have stayed at this location numerous times..
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review.  It is always such a pleasure to hear from our repeat guests. It is so super we fit so well into your budget and you enjoyed your stay. We do have a complimentary breakfast available every morning from 6 am to 9 am. Our breakfast is popular with our guests, we do have additional seating on our sun deck as well as at our pool area. It is really a perfect way to start your day and enjoy the southern California sunshine while having breakfast. We are happy you will be recommending us to others. We do look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights. At first it was ok but the first morning the shower in the room above us started leaking into our room. The next day maintenance fixed the leak but when we returned from Disneyland we had 2 roaches crawling around the bathroom. Two days later we had another roach crawling around the bathroom. On our 4th night it had warmed up and wanted to is the air conditioning. Turns out the plug on our unit was fried. They said the would get it fixed first thing the next day. The next night after returning from Disneyland at 10 pm it had not been fixed and at this point just dealt with the warmth since I had no interest in changing rooms. Breakfast was ok although after finding roaches I didn't really feel comfortable eating anything there. The walls are also
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do apologize for any issues you experienced with the AC unit during your visit with us. We do have a great maintenance staff available and we do our very best to fix things right away when they happen. Unfortunately there are times where the issue might require us to move the guest if it can not be fixed that same day. Again I do apologize if this was indeed the case. It is our goal to make sure each and every guest has a wonderful visit, and  we would love the chance to make it up to you.  We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed Sunday thru Friday night, paid $65/night. Staff was friendly and prompt. Room was clean and as expected, request for second floor main building was met. Chose this to shorten walk to Disney and be close to breakfast. Came with a lot of road noise though, would stay further back next time. Breakfast was decent, used it three mornings. Waffles, Raisin Bran, yogurt, and an Orange slice each time. Used hot tub once. Clean, hot and all jets working. Took us 12 minutes to walk from hotel entrance to Disney security at a pleasant pace. Would recommend this Super 8 for those on a budget. Met all our expectations for a room at this price range.
Manager Response: Thank ;you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast which does include freshly made waffles as well as fresh fruit, yogurt , 3 kinds of cereal, toast with jam, 2 kinds of juices hot coffee cocoas and tea. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we do look forward to seeing you again .

Summary: VERY close hotel to Disneyland, only 2 blocks away. The hotel is clean and is all you need since you stay at the parks all day and you only need a place to sleep. Breakfast includes a simple american breakfast: waffles, yogurt, coffee, juice and toasts. They sell park tickets cheaper too.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it very convenient when visiting the Happiest Place On Earth. Some great places to dine are shop are walking distance as well. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, it is a great way to start the day. We do sell discounted park tickets at the front desk as well. We are looking forward to seeing  you again!

Summary: This is a three star hotel, at the absolute maximum.  Key Positives:  Location, location, location for Disneyland visit Service was very good from the staff Price is reasonable  The hotel is typical of a Super 8.  The accommodation is basic but adequate.  The walls are thin and you do get a lot of noise from other rooms.  There free breakfast is very, very average but typical of many American hotels.  Lots of processes, high sugar foods and little healthy options.  The free internet was poor and barely worked from our room.  Overall, the hotel was reasonable.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it very convenient. We do have a complimentary breakfast every morning and it does include 2 kinds of cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit, freshly made waffles, as well as yogurt, hot cocoa, coffee and tea. It is a great way to start the day. It is great to hear you found our staff so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Loved this place. Clean tidy and great breakfast. Louis and Ichel very helpful all the time. Had a great stay there recommend it to all. The team were helpful with all inquiries and even helped getting transport and tickets. This staff knew the area well and could direct people using local transport to good shopping areas as well as getting to other attractions. Job well done
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear they were so friendly and so helpful during your stay. Thank you so much for recommending us to others. We look forward to another visit from you!

Summary Heading: A good choice for Disney Visit
Summary: The mission objective;  To find a clean, bug-free, restful, budget-friendly hotel in fairly close proximity to Disneyland.  Our stay was going to be five nights, and I wanted to do all I could to make sure we didn't end up with a bad case of "booking remorse" when we checked-in to the hotel we selected.  So, boy did I spend a lot of time on Tripadvisor and other sites doing research.  We picked this Super 8 because of the reviews, the price, and it's location.  It turned out that we made a good choice.  The Super 8 was very clean and we didn't encounter any bugs.  The hotel beds were comfy enough and we got a very good nightly rate.   I booked the hotel room directly with Super 8 on their website.   That's the only way you can actually get a "senior discount" with a decent
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for such a detailed review. We are glad you had a great stay and we were just what you needed when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We are in the perfect location, just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance of the park. We are also right next door to so many great places to shop and dine as well. The Gardenwalk is right next door and great restaurants such as Bubba Gumps, and the Cheesecake factory are there as well as so many others. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in the area.

Summary: We stayed here for a  long weekend trip to Disneyland. We found the hotel staff very friendly and the room was clean. The breakfast was okay but we were excited to be so close to the park...it was a 10 minute walk away. Parking was free and breakfast included. The fridge in the room was also helpful to keep drinks and snacks to take into the park. Would definitely stay here again - great deal!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  We are so happy to hear that you had such a great stay and even happier that you will be returning! We are so conveniently located next to the Disneyland Resort. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I've always liked super 8. Except that day, I thought that guy that accommodated us was so stoic a vending machine was friendlier. I know he could have helped us check in earlier, I just don't think he was in the mood to do so ( or at least pretend to do so). I really needed a sleep, but i'm just another credit card to swipe in.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear that you always try and stay at a Super 8 and you have always had great experiences when staying at Super 8. I am so sorry that this was not the case upon arrival at our location. We do pride ourselves in great customer service. We always try and accommodate our early arrivals and check them in early when at all possible. I do apologize if you felt as if the person checking you in was very stoic in nature.  A warm and friendly front desk is so important upon arrival. I assure you I have followed up on this and do hope that you will give us another chance to make it a great future stay. We really do appreciate you, and want to thank you for the opportunity to have you as a guest at our Super 8.

Summary: We had a great stay at this motel. It was affordable, given its close proximity to the parks. The staff were also friendly and very accommodating. Our room was clean and comfortable, however the shower was always lukewarm.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear that we fit into your budget so well and you found us to be so affordable.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. So convenient! We are so looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I booked a room hoping that I made the right choice but I didn't. The room smelled like cat urin. The sink water never got hot. The house keeping laundry room was close to our room and as they were doing laundry they played their music very loud. If I hadn't prepaid I would have found another place to stay.  The staff was pleasant and professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I want to thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they were so pleasant and professional during your stay. I do want to apologize for the inconvenience if you were disturbed by the music coming from the laundry room. I assure you we have followed up on this and have taken care of things. I do only wish you had let us know during your stay. We do have a 24 hour front desk. ready and willing to assist with making your stay an enjoyable one. We could have also assisted with any smell you may have experienced in your room, although, since we are a pet free location, I am unsure of the odor that you say you experienced. Please give us another visit and always know we are here 24 hours to assist in making it a great stay.

Summary Heading: Clean, affordable, close distance to park.
Summary: Stayed January 4-14th, and had a very nice stay. Chose this location because of its distance from the park, it's price, and it's great tripadvisor reviews.  Pros: -Free wifi; it was off & on, seemed to go off at night... But nice to have regardless. -Clean rooms -Big sized mini fridge, perfect for snacks/drinks. -Free breakfast room; from 6-9am only, basic options but free... -Next to garden walk shopping strip -Close to restaurants, cvs, etc... -Quick & easy check in -cool a/c & nice hot shower -laundry room, $6.00 in quarters for washer + dryer + soap  Cons: -Walk can be long; if you're not used to walking I do not recommend this distance, I work in retail so it wasn't as bad, but walking back after long day can be hard. -No set housekeeping schedule; one day 4:30pm, 8:35am
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  I am so glad that you found we fit so well into your budget. We are so close to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. It does make it so convenient. For those who do not wish to walk the ART shuttle picks up right out front of the motel and runs every 20 minutes. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel was great ! Lovely front desk staff and a very clean motel. The pool / spa was also very clean and a nice place to relax.  shower / toilet area was small although the mirror and sink were outside the room so was not a problem . Enjoyed that they had the coin operated laundry, very handy. The complementary breakfast was a bonus with toast and waffles, although very little seating room and had a strange 'flow' to the whole operation. Would stay here again it's a great location to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to hear ;you had such a wonderful stay with us and you enjoyed our facilities so much while you were here.
