We do have a heated pool and hot tub that is so relaxing after a long day at the Disneyland park. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to get started for a full day at Disneyland as well.   Our coin operated laundry is so handy as you say. We have extended hours for our laundry room from 7 am till 10 pm. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary Heading: A great surprise! !!!  The stay, in all ways was a pleasant surprise.
Summary: From the charming lady, who checked us in, to the friendly gentleman who assisted us in putting our bags in our car, Every one was more than polite and extremely helpful. The breakfast was great in variety,and wonderfullly attended by the 2 attewndants in the Room. It was also delicious...Those Waffles, yum!  Did I mention the room we were in.? The Bed was most comfortable, the lighting was ample and the wi-fi was THERE FOR US. Who could ask for anything more.  I will certainly suggest this property to anyone who is looking for a reasonable place to stay in Anaheim, with all the extras thrown in. THank you Super8 of Anaheim!   Disabled lady from San Deigo, Ca
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is awesome to hear that we exceeded your expectations. It's terrific that you found our staff so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are hoping to see you again soon when you visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary Heading: Great Location walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: 5 night stay for a trip to Disneyland. 15 min walk to Disneyland. Great location to Anaheim Garden Walk mall. Close to stores such as market or 7-11. Hotel outside is a bit old but the rooms have been updated. Good complimentary breakfast with waffles, cereal, toast, fruit etc. Nice pool with hot tub. Solid 3 Star hotel and a good deal for $100.00 Cnd. Only thing of concern was the wifi didn't work well in IPhones. No problem on lap top or IPad. Would stay here again on next visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. It is so true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance.  This is so convenient as well as budget friendly when visiting the Disneyland park. We are very excited for your return.

Summary Heading: Great price for a very adequate hotel
Summary: This is my go to hotel when visiting Disneyland.  It is within walking distance and serves continental breakfast.  I have been using this hotel for my Disneyland trips for years and they have recently added mini Belgian waffles to their breakfast.  Great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so great to hear that we fit so well into your budget and you found us so affordable. We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast that include fresh baked waffles, It's awesome you enjoyed  it so much.  We are hoping to see you again soon next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I was very shocked on this hotel... I've stayed at some super 8 before and they were dumps...THIS WAS A GREAT HOTEL!!! The staff in office were great, rooms great. the only problem we had was there was a lot of hot water.  There could be some more choices for breakfast,  fruit. Have a microwave in room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful we fit into your budget so well. It is so true with our  amenities such as our free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast, this does add so much value to your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am so happy to know that they provided you with such great customer service. We are so looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, Clean, Good Breakfast
Summary: A trip planned 6 months out had an unexpected change and we needed to find a new hotel closer to Disneyland. Super 8 was a great deal. About a 10 minute walk from Disneyland, and just down the block from a CVS (which came in handy when I got a cough from the dry Cali winds) The rooms were clean and since there was a cold spell during our visit, we got to use the heater/air in the room. The free breakfast was a great start to prepare us for a day in the parks. Our room was right at the front of the hotel, near the street and it was quiet at night. Would highly recommend this hotel for the price and location. The walk isn't bad even late at night, only 2 streets to cross. We would definitely stay here again. Didn't get a chance to try out the pool because the temps were only in
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so true we are very close to the Disneyland Park. It is just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are so happy you had such a great stay and even happier that you will be back! We look forward to your return.

Summary: Nice clean hotel with a good breakfast.  You are within walking distance to Disneyland which is a big plus.  They also sell Disneyland tickets at the lobby.  The  staff was very friendly.   Clientele is mostly families which makes for a nice safe environment.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are excited for your return.

Summary: The only reason I chose this location was because when I was making a reservation for the motel across the street, an ad popped up suggesting this place at a much LOWER price! I chose this location instead and was pleasantly surprised! I've had friends stay at this motel and have liked it and I thought I'd have the same experience...and I DID! This place was great! It was within walking distance of Disneyland, had local eateries nearby and had an easy "get into/out of" entrance/exit onto Katella Ave. The room was nice and clean with the beds fixed every night. This place also had a coffee maker in the room even though they served coffee for breakfast! That was a shock! The only other "shock" that I got was that there was an electric clock in the room and on my final night it was
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so awesome to hear you found us to be such a great place to stay and we fit so well into your budget. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Reasonably priced and quite comfortable. Very close to Disneyland. Smelled much better than our following few days in Lad Vegas at the Bellagio. I would recommend this motel to anyone visiting Disney especially with children. Laundry available to use. WiFi free. The only problem we experienced was that the room phone would not work and the staff were unable to fix it. I didn't understand why they didn't just replace it with one from another room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so great to hear you felt so comfortable and and at home while staying with us. It is also wonderful to hear we fit into your budget. Thank you so much for recommending us! We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I am 23 and visited Disneyland in October with my mom; both she and the park turned 60 in 2015 :P We decided to stay at this hotel and it was quite nice! Clean, comfortable room easily within a short walk to the park. The part that stood out to me though was the two employees in the lobby who helped check us in, an older gentleman in a veteran's cap and a young dark haired woman. They were very sweet and chatted with my mom and I. I would definitely consider going back for the friendliness if nothing else :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us to celebrate your moms 60th birthday! It is so nice to hear you had such a great experience with our staff  at check in. It is our great pleasure to deliver such great friendly service to all our guests. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This is a motel, but so comfortable and clean, AND cheap! Very familiar, since Disneyland/Downtown Disney/California Adventure is 5-minutes walking from there. What is best, it is in a very safe area, so when me and my sister got out of the park at, say, 11 o'clock at night, it was OK to walk back to the hotel since there are always families and friends walking around.   The bedroom is spacious, there is a little refrigerator where we always had water bottles in handy. The free continental breakfast was excellent since we could eat well before going to the parks, instead of spending a fortune at the park. There are coffee, yogurt, toasts, waffles, cereals and fruits.   People at the front desk were extremely nice to us; they helped us when we had a little issue, and they were
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear we fit into your budget and you had such great time! We are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park as you say. It is a safe and quick walk to the Disneyland park from here, it's just 15 minutes to the front gate. We are so looking forward to another visit from you.

Summary: Great value! Bed was comfortable, and the room was clean. The breakfast was a huge money saver for us. They offered coffee, fresh waffles, bagged cinnamon rolls, cereals, Yoplait yogurts, toast, juice and milk. It was a great way to fill up before heading to Disneyland. It was about a 15 minute walk, which wasn't bad given how great of a deal the room was. Our flight arrived super early (6am) and we checked in at 8am, thinking we wouldnt get the room until the afternoon. Staff was super friendly and welcomed us to our room right then. I would definitely stay there again, just wish it were a little closer to the park.
Manager Response: you so much for the review.  It is true we are a great value with our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast. WE are delighted  to hear you will be returning!

Summary: I booked the room through booking.com, which was about 30% cheaper than booking through the hotel directly. My wife and I wanted something close to Disneyland for our 3-night vacation. We usually stay closer to the park but decided to save a few bucks by staying further away, but still in walking distance. Immediately after booking the hotel I had second thoughts on the locations versus price and found a closer hotel, with a shuttle to Disneyland, for just a few bucks more. I tried to cancel my reservation with the Super 8 in less than 10 minutes from when I booked it but they refused to cancel it. So much for that.  We walk at a pretty decent pace and the hotel is a 30 minute walk to the main gates at Disneyland. Not so bad in the morning, but after a long day of being in
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a terrific hotel. Very clean and we'll maintained. There is a nice breakfast area with a continental breakfast and a nice pool area with a hot tub. The staff are terrific and do everything they can to accommodate you. It is also near many nice restaurants and the Anaheim Garden walk and the hotel is only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. We will certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay and even better to know that you will be back! We are in the perfect location, so close to so many great places to shop and dine. The Anaheim Garden Walk is just next door and there are wonderful places to dine such as Bubba Gump Shrimp and The Cheesecake Factory. We are so looking forward to your return.

Summary: It was a fair price for an average hotel for being only a ten minute walk away. Free breakfast but its just cereal, cinnamon rolls, coffee and fresh waffles. One warning, if you're planning on walking to Disneyland there are some annoying timeshare promoters outside the hotel next to it on the way there.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are happy to know you found we fit into your budget and you loved our location to Disneyland. We do have  a delicious complimentary breakfast that includes fresh fruit, yogurt, fresh waffles, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls, 3 kinds of cereal coffee, cocoa, and tea as well as 2 kinds of juice as well as milk. It is a great way to start the day. We are looking forward to another visit!

Summary: I was so upset.  I rinsed the bathtub out and was running the water in the tub for a quick rinse off bath for my 22 month toddler, went to the counter to grab his soap and came back and he was trying to get away from something in the water.  I was like, in my head, that's not a bug, I just rinsed out the tub, but sure enough it was!  I took a picture of it but I can't upload photos (I still have on my phone if requested)....  Nothing like bathing with cockroaches.  I was so mad!  I emptied all our luggage and shook out all our clothes, jackets, travel blankets etc... I was NOT bringing home any bugs with us! Good thing we were checking out that morning because had I saw that nasty thing when we got there, I would have checked out immediately.  Breakfast was bleh and very
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I can certainly understand how you would be upset. It is so good to know you did not find any after checking so thoroughly. Our maintenance staff does an excellent job with preventative maintenance, and this rarely would occur. I do apologize for any inconvenience and promise you we have done a thorough followup on this. We do have a complimentary breakfast that includes fresh baked waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit, yogurt, 3 kinds of cereal, toast with jam, 2 kinds of juice, coffee, tea, hot chocolate and milk. It is very popular as you said. We do have a great sun deck with tables to enjoy your breakfast as well as additional seating in the pool area. Speaking of the pool area, it is great to hear your kids enjoyed the heated pool. It is a great place to relax after a long day at the park. We do hope that you will give us another chance next time you are in Anaheim, we do value you as a guest and it is always our goal to exceed your expectations. We do hope you will give us that chance.

Summary: This is our second stay at Super 8 - last stay was in 2001. This time the room was tired looking with outdated decor and furniture. The bathroom was shabby with only luke warm water - you needed to let the water run for about 5 minutes before it started to get slightly warm. The room backed onto the commercial laundry which was noisy with water being turned on and off. The hot water tap in the sink did not work at all. The air conditioner was extremely noisy and would wake us up every time it switched back on - sounded like a freight train. However, it was too cold to eave turned off.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. We have recently upgraded all of our rooms with all new decor as well as beds and furnishings. We have also upgraded all of our AC units. We have all new linens, pillows and mattress as well. We have all new vanities and sink fixtures and are in process of replacing the tile and upgrading our bathroom area including the bathtubs.I do apologize if you had any issues with the hot water. We do have a 24 hour front desk staff as well as a wonderful maintenance staff available to assist our guests. We do hope that you will return again. We pride ourselves in service to our guest's and it is our goal to make sure everyone has a fantastic stay. We would love the chance to make that happen for you. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at your hotel. Our only complaint was that we couldn't regulate the water temperature in the shower, but otherwise the staff was amazing, the room was always clean, and the walk to the attractions was minimal and quick!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so delighted to hear you had such a great visit with us and that you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. We do want to apologize for any inconvenience with the shower in your room. We do have a wonderful maintenance staff and a 24 hour front desk to assist. Please notify us in the future if you experience any issues such as this. We are so looking forward to another visit from you!

Summary: Stayed a week here at Super8 Anaheim and was VERY satisfied. Price was reasonable rooms clean and bed comfy. Cleaning staff was very friendly and accomodating. Breakfast was typical continental but always hot clean and the staff here is awesome. Love this place walking distance to several restraunts, Disneyland, California Adventure. 20 min drive to Knottsberry Farm. Would reccomend to families dingle travelers. Great place to stsy. Front desk staff are top notch.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. It's so great to hear you had such a great time and you were so satisfied with your stay.Thank you for the compliments to our staff we are happy you found them to be so friendly and helpful. It's terrific that you will be recommending us and we are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Overall very good. The only disappointing thing was thing...
Summary: Overall very good. The only disappointing thing was thing was the breakfast. The area was way too small for the number of people to be able to sit down and eat. Also when it is that busy the 6 to 9 time frame was too short.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. we are so glad to hear you had a very good stay. We do have additional seating for our breakfast on the sun deck, it is a great place to enjoy you breakfast and enjoy the sunshine. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights to go to Disneyland for Christmas. Rooms are very clean for an older hotel. Location is great. We were able to walk to Disneyland and to nearby restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so true we are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland Resort. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate and right next door to several great places to shop and dine. We are hoping to see you again  when you are visiting the Disneyland Resort next.

Summary: The staff was very friendly! Our room was very nice!! We were visiting disneyland and were within a 10/15 minute walk so very easy to get to. The only thing I had a problem with was I never could get hot water out of the shower. I would stay here again! Overall I really enjoyed my stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found our staff to be so friendly. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance as you say making it so convenient. It is so exciting to hear you will be staying with us again in the future! We look forward to it.

Summary: The front desk staff was very friendly and inviting. The room was nice and the air conditioning worked very well. One of the breakfast cooks wasn't so great or inviting. When we arrived at 8:50 to enjoy a breakfast of waffles (as so advertised til 9am) she quickly said well you have to come earlier. Then she offered the prepackaged cinnamon rolls. We felt really ripped off. If the breakfast is advertised to be served until 9am with waffles, then it should be served until 9:00am, not 8:50am or earlier because I don't know when she actually stopped serving them. I wish I got her name because the other breakfast staff never seemed to be put off when they were making and serving breakfast. I did overhear that she went to Fullerton and that was the only time she seemed to genuinely
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad you found our front desk staff so friendly and helpful. We do apologize if you had some issues when coming to enjoy our complimentary breakfast. We do serve breakfast from 6 am to 9 am every morning and we do our very best to make sure everything is provided during that time. Again I want to apologize if this was not the case. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Somebody's auto alarm kept going off, taking the owner a very long time to turn it off,  doors from other rooms kept slamming all night long. unable to get any rest.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do want to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay with us. We do have a 24 hour front desk and our staff is always ready and willing to assist at any time. In the future please do not hesitate to let us know of any issues during your stay. I am hoping that you will return and that you will give us another try. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: This hotel was super clean and well taken care of. We booked this hotel for its location since it's a 15 min walk to Disneyland. As soon as we pulled up we were helped immediately and shown directions to our room. Always came back to a clean room and the breakfast was delicious and FREE. I had some doubts since it was so cheap and a Super 8 but I was proven wrong. Very nice and if you're planning on going to Disneyland and have a place to sleep this is the perfect place. Would recommend to anyone. I'm definitely coming back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had such a great stay and so very excited to hear you will be returning! It is so true we are a great value and a wonderful place to stay when visiting the Disneyland Resort. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed here 3 nights, this was my fourth time staying here. Its a great hotel, it's very clean. There's is free breakfast it's not much but it's still good, it's within 20 mins from walking distance to Disneyland park. They even allowed me to park my car there before check in time, so I didn't have to pay $18 for parking at Disney. Woo hoo! Would recommend and will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. As you say we are so close to the Disneyland Resort. It saves so much to be able to park here and then take the short 15 minute walk to the front gate. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Been coming to this motel over past 10 years, almost annually. It has been renovated and really upgraded from past stays. Breakfast area is very nice and rooms are nicer. Very nice for the price and staff was very pleasant. Stayed 3 nights, pre-Christmas. Will definitely be back next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always  a pleasure to hear from repeat guest's. We are so glad that you like the new upgrades that we have made and we are so excited to hear you will be back next year!

Summary: Great customer service, good complimentary breakfast, nice clean rooms except mattresses could more comfortable like upgrading to pillow top.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear that you received such wonderful service while you were here. We have upgraded all our rooms with new beds as well as new mattress, bedding, furnishings as well as decor. We hope that you will be visiting Anaheim again soon and you will choose us as your home away from home.

Summary: It have a good location wit cheap prices, the foos is regular but iI could have a very good exprerience
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful that you had such a good stay. We will be looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: After reading great reviews here on TripAdvisor, I was looking forward to a nice and affordable stay at Super 8 Anaheim with my husband. We were taking a trip to Disneyland together, without kids, for the first time in 15 years and very excited about it. Sadly, the week of our trip, my husband was snowed-in in Denver, CO on a work trip. I became nervous about whether we'd be able to take our Disney trip, so decided to be proactive, explain the circumstances to the hotel, and see if a date change might be possible, seeing as it was 5 days out yet and the hotel would hopefully be able to still book our room again. (I was trying to be a courteous customer.)  I spoke to the night manager, and he was understanding. He explained our rate was not cancel-able but after he'd placed me on
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. I do want to sincerely apologize for any confusion or mistakes that may have been made with your reservation. As you know we did rectify the situation and refunded you any charges that were processed.  This type of reservation is normally non refundable, however, I am happy that we were able to refund you and again we do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: A cozy, clean Super 8 and a 20 minute walk to Disneyland.  Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast is a typical continental breakfast, a good start for the day.  Room was clean and beds were comfortable.  The service was very fast, the staff was very attentive and always there for any assistance. The wireless internet needs upgrading as it was very slow especially now a days that people are very dependent with internet to contact friends and loved ones through viber or facebook, thus, an  inexpensive communication as opposed to calling long distance.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are in the perfect location as you say when visiting the Disneyland Park as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are also so conveniently located next to the Garden Walk as well as Downtown Disney where there are several great places to shop and to dine as well. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Newly renovated room . Nicely decorated. Staff were very pleasant and helpful! 3 easy walking distance blocks from Disney, Feet were tired one night so took a cab $8.00 back to hotel.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, it's wonderful you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so excited you will be back!

Summary Heading: Economical motel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: The Super 8 has a pool, hot tub, and complimentary breakfast that includes made fresh waffles each morning.  The rooms are comfortable and have refrigerators. Disneyland is a few blocks away.  The motel premises was clean and the staff were very helpful.  Fast food and other restaurants are within a short walk.  CVS is a short walk.  My only complaint is I could not get the window shade to completely block out the parking lot light and I prefer to sleep without extra light shining into my room.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. It is true we are walking distance to the Disneyland park. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. It's great to hear you found us to be such a great value. With our amenities such as free parking, Free Wifi and complimentary breakfast it does make for a more valuable stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed yourself and you will be back.

Summary: Took my family to Disneyland as a Christmas present. We've stayed at this hotel before. Everything is clean, staff is very friendly, and free breakfast to get your day started. What else can you ask for?!?
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so good to hear you had such a great stay and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful as well. We are hoping to see you again soon next time  you are in Anaheim.

Summary: My family and I stayed here at the beginning of December. The hotel wasn't anything fancy, but it had everything we needed. The staff was really friendly and helpful. We arrived early (around 9am) and even though they weren't able to let us check in early, they did hold our bags for us and gave us a parking pass to use. The parking and Wifi at this hotel are free! Big Bonus!!  The rooms were decent. The beds were comfortable. We had a ground floor room, and the people above us had about 4 kids so it constantly sounded like a herd of elephants above us, but luckily we are all heavy sleepers. But something to consider if you're not.   The bathroom was a little dingy and I didn't care for the shower controls, but it was all usable. Also, the shampoo and conditioner are Matrix! Not
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is true we are so close to the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. We offer free parking, so it saves quite a bit to park here and walk on over to the park. The ART shuttle does pick up right out front for those who do not wish to walk. It is ran by the city of Anaheim and there is a small fee for taking it, but it sure is nice for those who just wish to leave the car here and ride on over. Thanks again and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Great location - very close to Disney Resort without the Harbor Blvd. traffic! Wonderful breakfast with waffles, yogurt,cereal & fresh fruit. Very clean room & exactly like the photo (including the wall art). Didn't ask & didn't need it but a microwave would have been a nice compliment to the under-counter fridge with freezer.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is so wonderful to hear we exceeded your expectations and you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just around the corner from Disneyland park. it is just a quick 15 minute walk. The Anaheim Garden Walk offers so many great places to shop and dine and they are right next door. We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit and you will be back.

Summary: The hotel was in a great location, within walking distance to Disneyland and several restaurants.  The room was large and clean.  The employees were extremely friendly and helpful.  We had a few issues with hot water in our room, but otherwise it was a great stay!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Its so great to hear you found our service to be so great and you found us to be such a good value. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's great to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon

Summary: stayed here many times and this trip was as enjoyable as the past. best item is plenty of free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. The free amenities we offer such as the Free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast so make for an excellent value. We are so happy to here you love it here so much and you will be returning.

Summary: I was able to stay at this hotel at a very good price.  I was happy with the room, breakfast and proximity to Disneyland.  Like others, had trouble getting very hot water for baths, but I managed for showers. Like most of the hotels around Disney, it is an older hotel, but I still feel it was well maintained.  I liked the breakfast and the staff were all pleasant.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is so awesome to hear you had such a great stay and even more exciting to hear you will be back! We are so looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Starting with the staff they were very friendly and helped us to check in quickly, the room was very clean, the hotel was very close to Disneyland and we didn't need to use our vehicle during the stay, overall the location and hotel were great!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review and thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. Its wonderful to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your. We are the perfect place to stay when visiting Disneyland. As you say we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient! We look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Disneyland!

Summary: We booked our stay at a different hotel by mistake. Luis, the manager, was very helpful in booking us a room here and even offered us the same rate as our other reservation (we had a discount). He even let us check in early. On our final day they let us keep our car in their parking lot until midnight after we checked out as we went to Disneyland one more time. The rooms were clean and beds comfortable. It's always walking distance to Disneyland.This was a great place to stay for our family for our Disneyland trip. The management is very accommodating to families and very friendly. We got Disneyland annual passes this year and will always be staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear you found our customer service to be so excellent. We are so excited to hear you will be returning! We look forward to it.

Summary: Room was always clean, and grounds were clean also. only trouble was no hot water available for shower on thurs. 10/10/2015. even waited 1 hr to see if high demand was issue.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is so great to here you found us to be so clean and comfortable during your stay. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have had with the hot water during y our stay. We are here 24 hours for assistance with anything you need. Next time please do not hesitate to let us know so we can make it right for you. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Hop skip and a jump from disneyland
Summary: I was very surprised with the size of the room and it was really really clean. Staff were amazing. It was by far the quickest check in I have ever done. Great parking, nice heated pool, laundry room, nice continental breakfast. It was super quiet with lots of stuff to shop and eat within walking distance. I would definitley stay here again
Manager Response: Hi thank you for the review. It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's also great to hear you will be back. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as you say. It is so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We are so excited for your return.

Summary Heading: Exactly what you need for accomadations
Summary: I was plesantly surprised by the size of the room. Check in and check out were so fast I wasnt even sure if I had done it, lol. The rooms were super clean. Staff were super friendly. Plenty of parking, nice pool, laundry, quiet. This is worth every dollar. and even that was resonable.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so awesome to hear we were just what you needed. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so terrific to hear they were super friendly and helpful during your stay. It is also awesome to hear we fit into your budget. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Nice room, staff was great, good breakfast but heater in room had a mind of its own.  Could not get heat to work very well.  Also hot water was not very good.  Medium hot at best.  Also price was good and close to mouse park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We do have a great front desk staff available 24 hours to assist. I do apologize for any inconvenience with the heater in your room. Our staff is ready to assist with such issues at any time. Next time notify the front desk right away so we can make things right. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed 17 days here, loved every minute, was beautiful and clean inside and out, staff were great and friendly, breakfast was good, ( got a bit crowded, but that is to be expected when it's a busy time) had a spa, swimming pool and laundry, fantastic value for money, about a 10 min walk to Disneyland, which didn't bother us at all, close to heaps of food outlets and the Garden walk, we have previously stayed in hotels across from Disneyland, but I'd definitely stay here again over the ones opposite Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. it's so good to hear you had such a great stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's so awesome to hear you found our staff to be so great and friendly during your stay with us. We are right next door to the Garden Walk where there are several great places to shop and dine. We are only a quick 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney as well where more shopping and dining experiences await! We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The room was in excellent proximity for walking to Disneyland and the staff were very helpful. We checked in early and left our bags in the car as the room was not yet ready though it made for an easy transition late at night, after a day at Disney. I cannot comment on the breakfast as we didn't have it. The room was roomy and the bed comfy. An iron was provided which I thought was excellent.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park as we are only a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they were so helpful during your stay. We look forward to your next visit with us next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: The room was a little small but the price was right and was only a 15 minute walk from Disneyland. The complimentary breakfast was really good. The only complaint is that the curtain does not block out light at the side and there are a lot of lights outside.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is great to hear we fit into you budget and you found us so affordable. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as you say making it so convenient. With our free parking it saves so much to be able to leave the car here and just walk on over to the park. We are very excited to see you again next time you are here in Anaheim.

Summary: The room was small, but comfortable. Biggest positive about this hotel is the close proximity to Disneyland. It offers free parking so you can just walk there (which should save you a few bucks - whatever the parking for Disneyland is). I did not like the fact that you had to pay $1 to use a computer for 5 minutes, or pay to get things printed - but it is what it is. The hotel is close to many restaurants (cheesecake factory right next door) I do recommend this hotel if you are going to Disneyland (the price was great compared to others in the area). Free wifi was also a plus.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient. With our free parking it saves on the transportation cost to and from the park. We are hoping to see you again soon when you are visiting the Disneyland park again.

Summary: This is the way to go for a clean, comfortable and  budget friendly hotel which includes free breakfast, decent free wifi and free parking (including all day on the day of departure). Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Clean and roomy rooms with a decent fridge. Easy walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so true staying with us is a great value. With our free amenities such as free Wifi, free parking, and complimentary breakfast it does add up to a very cost efficient stay. We do look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I have   Never stayed at a Super 8. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the room. It was extremely clean and the bed was very comfortable, I also enjoyed having four pillows. They have a complimentary continental breakfast.  This hotel is also very convenient we located to Disneyland. It was about a 10 minute walk away. iIt is also situated close to Gardenwalk and the convention center. The complimentary Wi-Fi was slow and would not hold the connection but I didn't say anything as it was not a big deal.  I will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank  you very much for the review. We are very convenient to the Disneyland park. It is just a quick 15 minute walk from here. We offer free parking so it does save to stay here park here and walk on over. We are a block from the convention Anaheim Convention Center as well as right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk. We are happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Great little find, its always improving, will continue to stay here.
Summary: Qantas originally pointed us to this Super 8, but since we've been managing our own holiday itinerary's we still stay here.  Pro's. easy walk to Disneyland Main Entrance. Feel safe and secure here, if you have a car, its pretty easy to get a spot close to your room.  Breakfast room has been expanded since our last visit, our room (280) has been upgraded since last visit (new carpet, good size fridge) and from this angle, on level 2, you can also see the fireworks if you've left the park early.  Easy 3 min walk to Bubba Gump, California Pizza Kitchen, Cheese Cake Factory.  Con's - struggling to find something (based on the price we paid).    Our kids actually look forward to staying at Super 8, they know how it works and enjoy it.   We had a 10 day DL pass and so we spent 5 days
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's always wonderful to hear from repeat guests. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and even happier to hear you will be back! We are in the perfect location as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are also so close to so many great places to shop and dine. The Anaheim Garden Walk is right next door. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: The room was clean, the beds comfortable, the staff was amazingly helpful!! Great location! I would definitely stay here again!! The kids enjoyed the pool. Breakfast that is included is the same everyday and not much to it. But did its job!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its terrific to hear that you had such a great stay. We are so convenient as you say when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance.We are also just next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk which has so many great places to shop as well as dine. Bubba Gumps and the Cheese Cake factory are just a couple of our favorites. We are happily looking forward to your return.

Summary: This was probably our 6th or 7th stay here in the last 2 years. Nice clean place to lay your head after a day at the parks. We spend the whole day at Disney, so we don't need any fancy extras. Breakfast is ok. Love that they added hot waffles. Pool and spa are sufficient. About 15 min walk to park. No elevators. The best part is free parking and NO resort fees. Seems like everyone is charging them now and so far, they haven't started :) The staff is always wonderful.  We love Ron at night. Nice guy.  If the price is right, this hotel is our go to #1 choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We always love to hear from repeat guests. We have upgraded our breakfast this is true and it does include those fresh baked waffles. It is a delicious addition to our menu isn't it? As always we are looking forward to seeing you again next time  you are in Anaheim.

Summary: great value for money , very friendly staff , NO charges for parking ,wifi included as well as a continental breakfast , walking distant to Disneyland, next to restaurants like cheese cake factory & bubba gumps , others plus shops . rooms a very spacious and has a fridge and coffee machine , there is no road noise either
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's really wonderful to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do offer free parking, free wifi, and a great complimentary breakfast. This does add so much value to your stay. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel was a pleasant surprise!  We weren't expecting much and were pleased with the cleanliness of the room and property.  The room was very modern with lots of outlets...very important these days!  It was a nice short walk to Disneyland and the price was right.  We would stay again!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you had a great stay and even happier to hear you will be back! We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We added on a stop at Disney to a Palm Springs trip. We were trying to keep the extra costs down and picked the Super8 after searching for the best value/quality stay within walking distance.  Our immediate impressions were favorable. The front desk staff were very friendly and knowledgeable. They also accommodated out early check in so we could hit the park.  The room was clean and appeared to be recently updated. It was roomy. There was a fridge and sink counter area. The free internet worked great.  The location was great. Close to the park and a choice of restaurants.  Highly recommend the California Pizza Kitchen and the Tony Roma's. We had an issue with inconsistent hot water. Initially, I assumed it was just an old motel and high use times. Turned out it was a problem
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so exciting to hear that we exceeded your expectations. We are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. Thank you so much for the compliments to our staff. It is great to know that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This is a 15 mins walk to Disneyland, and a nice motel.  The rooms were large, the beds comfortable and the staff superb.  The rooms had refrigerators, the breakfast room had a great selection of choices(plus fresh mini-waffles) and the pool looked nice, though we didn't have time to use it.  The only downside was our room was facing the Garden Walk parking structure and the walls were quite thin.  Every motorcycle, car alarm and loud radio were quite audible thru the night.  Next time we'll remember to bring ear plugs, or try to get a room on the other side of the building.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so close to Disneyland park this is true. It i just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do have some really nice upgrades to our rooms which do include a fridge. This does make it so convenient. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: One of the nicest places around Disney
Summary: The hotel was great as it was the first time I stayed there. The room was clean, the bed was comfy and more importantly the Wifi was free, unlike other hotels in the area.  The only complaint I have is that I was at the very back of the property, which meant walking all the way to the front when leaving and as its not super close to the parks, it does add quite an additional trek to the walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad that you decided to stay with us during your trip to Disneyland. It is so true we are one of the nicest places to stay when on a trip to the Happiest Place on Earth. Our free amenities such as Free Wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast do add up to such a great value.  We are so conveniently located only a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. We are looking forward to you return.

Summary: Even though this hotel is not very close to Disneyland (like in front of Disney Close) it is still within walk distance from it (like just around the corner close). I really enjoyed the experience. The room had the perfect size, beds were very comfortable and everything was clean all the time. I didn't get much interaction with the staff but I the little I had was good. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is terrific to hear that we were just what you needed and even better that you will be back and you will be recommending us to others. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is one of the best in the often overcrowded Disneyland area. We always stay here when visiting the area. The staff is great. They are very professional, quick to please and always make us feel at home. The hotel has a slight retro look to the exterior, which is one of the reasons we keep visiting, but the rooms have nice modern d√©cor and amenities. And the beds are some of the best we've ever slept on. In fact, we talked to the manager to see about possibly ordering one for our home. We get to watch the nightly Disneyland fireworks show from the hotel balconies and the location is within walking distance to some cool restaurants and nightlife, plus getting into the theme parks is only a short walk to the front gates. We always recommended this hotel to family and
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We always are delighted to hear from repeat guests. Its so great to hear you will be recommending us to others and that you will be back to see us again.

Summary: Me and my wife stayed here for a night. The place is clean and very presentable. Staff are helpful and very accomodating. The complimentary breakfast is also delicious!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is awesome you had such a great experience when staying with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very clean rooms. Maid service was excellent. Quiet and...
Summary: Very clean rooms. Maid service was excellent. Quiet and restful for sleeping. Nice walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its so awesome you found our rooms so clean and you had a pleasant stay with us. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I booked this last minute, it was a good price and close to park, I figured to not expect much. I was soooooooo wrong, very nice staff, free breakfast, free parking, very quick walk to park and gardenwalk is right there, clean room. Wonderful value, but again extremely happy and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is our goal to exceed our guest expectations with every visit. It is wonderful that you had such a great experience when staying with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. It is so nice to know you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are so excited that you will be returning!

Summary: We went to Disneyland for my daughter's 3rd birthday.  We decided to Stay at the Super 8 because of the close proximity to Disneyland.  Our stay was amazing!!!!  The hotel is in a great location walking distance to Disneyland.  We were also surprised to find so many great restaurants right out of the hotel parking lot.  Our rooms were both very clean and the housekeeping staff did a wonderful job cleaning them throughout our stay.  The towels were fresh and the beds were very comfortable.  We will always stay at this hotel for all of our future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Glad to hear you had such a perfect stay with us when celebrating your daughters 3rd birthday.  We are so happy that you will be back to see us and we do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Staff were friendly and helpful. Room was clean.Great location for a trip to Disneyland. Good selection of affordable restaurants just outside the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park. We are a block and a half from the front gate. We are also so conveniently located next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are several great places to shop and dine. Downtown Disney is another great place to get great food and do some shopping. The RainForest Cafe is one of our favorites. We are so happy to know you will be returning.

Summary: When visiting from Australia, I arrived very sick With a virus. Coming home early from Disneyland and without my friends I needed help. One of the lovely staff members got me water bottles and a bucket and stayed with me while I needed it. I appreciated this so much and will never forget it. Super 8 was very clean and such a friendly environment and my friends and I really enjoyed our stay. Such an easy walk to Disneyland and a great pool to sit by at night. I will defiantly be coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It s so wonderful to know that they provided you with such fantastic service. We do our very best to exceed our guests expectations. We do hope that you are feeling better and we are so glad that we could be here to assist when you were not feeling well. We are so hoping to see you again in the future.

Summary: Have stayed here before, the staff are very friendly and helpful. Rooms were spotless A big thankyou to Ron and Isha for their help would defiantly recommend, a short walk to Disneyland and the convention centre
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always such a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff.  It is so great to know that they are providing that excellent service you so deserve. We are so looking forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This was my third time staying here for a Disneyland trip.  The hotel's location can't be beat.  15-20 minute walk to the parks.  Staff was very friendly and ready to help.  Breakfast was simple but good.  Fresh warm waffles were the highlight.  Room was located on the second floor of the same building as the front desk and breakfast room.  Room was clean.  Although I didn't use housekeeping, they left a note on the door saying they honored my request for privacy. I would recommend Super 8 to anybody.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  It is always awesome to hear from repeat guests. It does sound like you had another great visit. We are so looking forward to seeing you again  next time you are here visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Celebrating my little daughter on her birthday
Summary: Very good service, nice clean room, excellent location and friendly staff, in the future if I will return again
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. thank you as well for choosing us when celebrating your daughters birthday. We are in the perfect location when celebrating at Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. We are so excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: The room that was given to us was on the first floor near the breakfast room.  Because of the location there were cockroach sightings in the room and an eventually we were lucky to kill one of them.  The front desk was told of the issue and provided a new room on the second floor.  Although we did not encounter anymore cockroaches we were on the lookout and our experience of the hotel was diminished.  We found the rooms to be old and require some refreshing.  Doesn't help the cockroach situation if the door has a gaping crevice on the bottom.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do want to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay with us. It is wonderful that our 24 hour front desk staff was able to relocate you to another room so quickly. We do have a great maintenance staff who are always right on top of things like this and they have regular  preventative maintenance that they perform. We do hope that you will decide to stay here again. We have been upgrading our property, and I am sure next time you visit you will be pleasantly surprised and pleased with the improvements.

Summary: The location was convenient, excellent and friendly staff. The facility had things I was looking for: hot tub, free parking, continental breakfast and 10 minute walk to Disneyland parks. The reason I didn't rate a 5/5 is because the bed and pillows were not the comfiest.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff.  It is great to hear that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We are in a great location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance from here. We have recently upgraded all our rooms with new beds, mattress and bedding. I am sure you will be delighted next time you stay with us.

Summary: Traveling from NZ we usually stay across the road from DL but are looking at bringing a group to Anaheim soon so took the chance to try this hotel as an option for future travels. We are glad we did. We stayed at this hotel for a week during Halloween. Big sized clean double queen bed rooms. Breakfast was good and loved that we could take it upstairs or back to our room (we are not big breakfast people but the hot chocolate, toast & banana was the perfect start to the day) we loved and used the pool and hot tub most days and washing room at night. Everything that you need is here. My only issues is that it was just me & my 9 year old daughter and we were placed right at the back of the property above the hotel service/laundry area by the staircase. I did ask twice for the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you decided to stay with us for your Halloween visit. We are delighted that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and our other amenities. We are in a great location when visiting Disneyland as well as so close to great shops and places to eat. Several buses do stop right here as well to take you to some great locations and tourist stops. We do look forward to seeing you when you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Checked in after 10:00 and the guy was getting ready to leave and was asked to put the roll away bed into the room.  He did it instantly with a great attitude.  The man at the front desk served in the Vietnam war and received the purple heart.  He was so friendly and wanted to make sure we were going to be comfortable and we were! They were all awesome!!!!!!!!  My 8 yr.old daughter even told me to Thank all of you who worked there.  So, thank you from all of us!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We strive to exceed our guests expectations and make every visit with us a super one. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Reasonable motel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: The Super * motel is conveniently located a few blocks from Disneyland.  They provide a complimentary breakfast each morning from 6 am to 9 am that includes fresh made for you waffles.  The room is comfortable and had a refrigerator.  My only complaint was I couldn't close the drapes enough to block out the light and I like to sleep in the dark.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to hear that you found us to be such a great deal and reasonable. We are walking distance to the Disneyland park as you say. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance.  We do apologize for any inconvenience  you may have experienced with the drapes in the room. We do have a 24 hour front desk and maintenance available to assist. Please let us know next time. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I went to Disneyland last June and I completely forgot to write a review ... when I booked this hotel I thought I was expecting the worse due to the price, but I was surprised, the rooms were nice, the breakfast was good, and the staff was super kind and helpful (specially Jesus and Ron) :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so great to know you found us so affordable and we fit into your budget. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are so pleased to hear that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anahiem.

Summary: Beware of credit card charges. I booked without paying attention to the "fine" print. My credit card was charged $2000.00. As a Canadian, i had hoped to pay upon arrival with hopes the exchange rate would be better. They refused to reverse my charges. Not a good policy. üòØ
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We had comfortable beds and walking distance to Disneyland...
Summary: We had comfortable beds and walking distance to Disneyland. Free parking and breakfast. Perfect for our needs.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We do have free parking, Free wifi, as well as complimentary breakfast. All of these free amenities does add up to a great stay. We are walking distance to the Disneyland park as you say, just  a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for price
Summary: Stayed here end of October till early November, our stay was enjoyable we where basically in anahiem for Disneyland didn't do much else. free breakfast which was a big range of different things fruit, toast,waffles, Cereal, yogurt. tea coffee or apple or orange juice. WiFi rooms where a good size, bathroom a little small but not a problem. I would recommend anyone to stay here. and just a 10 to 15 min walk to Disneyland not far at all and there is also a shuttle bus out the front $3 to take you there.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are a great place to stay for the price. Very economical and budget friendly. It's so great to hear you found we fit into your budget and you had such a great stay. We do look forward to another visit soon!

Summary: Clean property,many restaurants walking distance ! Rooms clean but could use modern update (batroom tub ) microwave would be also great ! But all in all for the $$ very nice !
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are just a quick walk to so many great places to shop and and eat as well. We are a great place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park or the Anaheim Convention Center. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Right by Disneyland and the convention center, decent breakfast.  Didn't try the Internet because I didnt have time.  Shower drain cap needed to be repaired. Room looked and felt clean. The only exception was the shower drain cap.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. It is so true we are so convenient when attending the Anaheim Convention Center. In just a quick 5 minutes you are there. So easy to walk there from here and so convenient. We are so looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Location of this Hotel to the various attracions in the area make it an ideal place to stay
Summary: The welcome at "check in",  and the friendly and helpful attitude of the general hotel staff add to the enjoyment of staying at the Super 8 Hotel.  Disneyland and any number of restraunts are within a fifteen minute walk from the Hotel. Courtesy busses or taxis' or the local public bus service provide access to attractions further afield, some free, some at a nominal cost. The room was pleasant to stay in with TV / Fridge / Coffee and Tea making facility, Free WIFI ..... And a "serve yourself" continental breakfast.  ( No 'a la carte' restraunt in-house though)..... And a swimming pool for the energetic. Happy to recommend this Hotel as a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay. Even more exciting to hear that you will be recommending us to others! It is so true we are in a perfect location. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park and right next door to several great places to shop and dine. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed at the Super 8 five times over the last 10 years. After staying elsewhere the last 2 years we decided to save some dollars and stay here again. For the price it is fine, but there were a few niggling issues. On our arrival (of a 6 night stay) one washing machine and the detergent vending machine were out of order. This was rectified on our last night.   Whilst the vanity unit has been updated, the bath/shower and toilet area could really do with some updating. Nothing has changed there in 10 years and it's starting to show with faucets coming off the wall and just general deterioration.  The room also lacked anywhere to hang clothes. There is a pointless miniature closet as part of the tv unit, but otherwise nothing. I thought that in the past there was a luggage
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. It is true we have made some changes here and upgraded our rooms including the decor. We have all new furnishings, new carpeting, new wall decor, all new light fixtures, new AC units, new drapes and bedding as well as new mattresses. We have updated our wardrobes which do include a closet for hanging clothes as well as large drawers. All of our rooms have extra outlets, blow dryers, coffee makers and fridges. We also have added an iron and ironing board to all our rooms. Our sink and vanity area is all new with marble counter tops. We are in process of upgrading our bathroom area. They will include new tubs with fixtures as well as all new tile floor. We have also been updating our breakfast area, as well as our new lobby area and the exterior of our building. All in all it has been  a very exciting project. We do hope to have  you come back and see the further improvements we are doing. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My son and I came to Anaheim for BlizzCon 2015. I picked this hotel because of price and location near the convention center. It turned out to be an excellent choice. It's an older hotel and the building isn't perfect. However, it was very clean! And my bed was quite comfortable, even the pillows!!!!! Since we are planning to do this trip again next year, I'm planning to book rooms here again. My only complaint was that house keeping turned off the AC during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted that you choose to stay here during the BlizzCon convention.  It is so great to hear that you had an awesome stay but even better to hear you will be back!  We are so conveniently located next to the Anaheim Convention center, in just 5 minutes you are there. You save on time and money when you park here and walk on over, avoiding the traffic and the parking fees. We  look forward to seeing you again next year.

Summary Heading: Excellent value, perfect if you're going to Disneyland!
Summary: Perfect location if you are going to Disneyland.  For a basic hotel room the beds were very comfortable.  Even the bath towels were surprisingly above average, thick and absorbent. Clean room and everything worked.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that we fit into your budget so well and you found us to be such a great value. With our amenities such as free wifi,complimentary parking and free breakfast it does add so much more value to your stay. Thanks again for a great review and he are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Affordable. Beds super clean. Total comfort. Coffee and tea, a little touch much appreciated. A fridge for snacks. Clean bathroom. Rooms serviced beautifully. Helpful staff. Can't fault. AAA discount. Really is super.
Manager Response: Thank your for the review. We are delighted to hear that you felt so welcome. while you were staying here. It is good to know that our staff made you feel so at home. We really do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Nice clean motel and one of the most affordable. Location is pretty awesome because it is close to a couple of restaurants and not a bad walk to/from Disneyland. It is close to a CVS too if you forgot anything for your trip. Garden Walk is super close by too!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you found us to be so affordable and that we fit into your budget. We are just 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient when visiting the Happiest Place on Earth. We are also walking distance to so many great places to dine. The Anaheim Garden Walk as you say is just right next door. Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake Factory is favorite of ours as well as our guests. We are also just 15 minutes walk to Downtown Disney where you can find great places to eat such as The Rainforest Caft, and the Jazz Kitchen as well as the House of Blues just to mention a few. We do hope to see you again soon next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: My husband and I stayed three nights at the Super 8, near Disneyland, and would happily stay here again. The rooms are not fancy, but the bed was comfortable, the room was clean, the AC worked fine and the shower was hot. A plus, too, the wifi worked well and there was a small fridge was appreciated. There is a pool and hot tub, too.  The staff were helpful and friendly at check in, check out and maid service. The breakfast was okay, again, not fancy but there was enough choices including cereal, toast ,waffles, juice and good coffee.  Disneyland is less than 10 minutes to the main gate, so it is very doable. There are a number of restaurants around the hotel (Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gumps, California Pizza), plus corner store and Starbucks.  There is a discount ticket place
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so excited to hear you found us to be such a great value. Our amenities such as free wifi, free parking and our complimentary breakfast do add so much value to your stay.  We do have a wonderful heated pool and hot tub, which is great for relaxing after a day at the Disneyland park. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to start off your day. We have fresh baked waffles with syrup,  cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit, yogurt, 3 kinds of cereal including hot oatmeal. We have toast with jam, hot cocoa, milk, hot tea and coffee. We are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park as you say, just 15 minutes and you are at the park entrance. We are so looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The lady at the front desk was great and booked us in early on a very hot day. The pool was nice in the middle of the day. It was a perfect temp. The walk to disneyland was a little longer then expected. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable but the hot water was terrible! It never got hot and would only drizzle. I enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank  you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's so wonderful to hear they provided you with that excellent guest service that you so deserve.  We are delighted that you found our pool and spa a great way to relax after a day at the Disneyland park. We are so looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The super 8 Anaheim is a comfortable hotel, with a lot of space in the room, 2 queen beds, frigobar. The restroom is not too big and the problem was that the  water shower couldn't warm easily. It took a time to get it warm before the shower what increases the water consumption. There¬¥s a pool and hot tube at the hotel..nice. The breakfast is ok, not too many options, just milk, coffee, juice, some donuts and waffle. The only thing is that it finishes early, at 9 am. It's close to buba gump and cheese cake factory and a walking distance from disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you had such a good stay with us and found us to be so conveniently located. It's so true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park and just right next door to the  Anaheim Garden Walk which does offer so many great choices to dine as well as shop. We do look forward to seeing you again soon next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: Very helpful and friendly staff (front desk, breakfast room, maintenance, housekeeping).  Clean, safe property and rooms.  Good selection at complimentary breakfast, including waffles (but no eggs or meat).  Nice clean (but small) pool.  Real queen-size beds.  Complimentary fridge and microwave in the room...and wonderful prices near $100.  Pleasantly surprised!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. It's so true we do have rooms that have  good view of the fireworks. We also have a great view from our sundeck above the lobby as well as in the pool area. We are hoping to see you soon next time you are in the Disneyland area.

Summary: I expected a clean rooom and comfortable bed as I have had in the past and I did get both.  Very pleased withhelpfulness of front desk staff ready to answer all of my questions. Requested quiet room and received it.  Room was clean.  Very pleased with my stay at this Super 8.  Price was right and only 10 minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's so great that you enjoyed your visit with your family here and you found that we exceeded your expectations. We do strive to do that with every guest. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's so awesome that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are looking forward to another family visit from you in the future!

Summary: The room was large, clean, and nice looking. It had a fridge but no microwave. A bathtub but no way to plug it for filling. Although we didn't use it, there was a heated pool and hot tub. The breakfast sucked but what you would expect. Overall I was very satisfied with the place.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's great to hear that you were so satisfied with your stay and that we did indeed exceed your expectations. We do have a complimentary breakfast served every day from 6 am to 9 am. Our breakfast does include fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls,  2 kinds of cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, fresh baked waffles with syrup, hot cocoa, hot tea and coffee as well s 2 kinds of juice.  We do apologize if this was not an adequate breakfast for you during your stay with us. We do hope to see you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for two nights on the 22nd  and 23rd of October. This hotel is wonderful. In a perfect location 7 minute walk to Disneyland and downtown Disney as well. There are several food options along the way like Denny's!! Also a pharmacy and 7/11 and plenty of souvenir shops cheaper than Disneyland itself. There is free breakfast, simple but tasty waffles cereal fruit coffee juice etc... Anna on the reception desk is wonderful and went out of her way to help us on every occasion. The room itself was nice, not big but pretty modern with nice art on the wall. They will lock up your valuables in their safe at reception as well. Great value for money would stay again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay, but even more excited to hear you will be back!  It's so true we are a great value,With all of our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast this does add so much value to your stay. We are so convenient just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance as  you say. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great family motel close to disneyland
Summary: Ron and Cheryl and the team made our stay at the super 8 really enjoyable. Close to all types of eateries, transport, 24 hour pharmacy nearby and of course close to Disneyland. Breakfast was just right. having a laundry onsite made it so easy right nearby the pool. I fully recommend super 8 everyone was so helpful and it was so affordable
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, it;s so awesome that you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We do always want to exceed our guest's expectations every time. We are a great place to stay with the family. We do have connecting rooms making it so easy to stay together as a family. We are hoping to see you next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: The super 8 is not fancy but it is clean and within walking distance to Disneyland and the staff is very nice. A good value overall. The shower has very good water pressure. The bathroom fixtures are a little old and shabby looking but if you don't care about that sort of thing it's a fine place to stay. It's my go to place when visiting Disneyland. They also offer a free breakfast cereal,yogurt and waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are such a good value. We have free amenities such as free Wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast  which do add so much value to your stay. We pride ourselves in our guest service and our housekeepers do a super job at making all of our rooms so clean and fresh every day. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: All good but one little thing.
Summary: Note that this is a two star hotel. And for that it is a nice one. The price is a great bargain. Clean and good service, and includes waffles for breakfast. The walk is a bit long to the parks, so if you've got little ones without a stroller the walk feels really long at the end of the day. The rooms are quiet and clean, with some wear showing here and there. The beds are good.   The only issue I had was getting back to my room one night after midnight and having my bathroom floor littered with about 30 flying-ant type bugs that had come in through the ceiling vent. I'm not a bug freak, so I just put them all in the garbage can and tied the bag. I talked to the front desk in the morning, and they offered to move me to another room while they looked into it. I declined to change
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found us to be such a great value and found us to be so conveniently located. With our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast this does add up to a terrific value doesn't it?  We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay, We are happy that our staff was so helpful and efficient and you found them to be so friendly as well. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Super 8 being less than a 15 minute walk to Disney and considering the cost of staying there it is exceptional value.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are a Super value it is true. With our free amenities such as our free Wifi, free Parking, and complimentary breakfast it does add so much more value to your stay. We are super convenient just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance as you say. We hope to see you again soon next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: Great hotel close to Disney and lots of eaterys, the staff were fantastic and went out of their way to help us , we had a room at the back which was nice and quiet, the room itself was very clean and comfortable and had everything we needed great internet and even a veiw of the fireworks at Disney. The hotel also had a great pool that we used each night which was lovely after a hot day at Disney Great value hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so close to everything as you say. Disneyland park is just a 15 minute walk from here. So many great places to shop at the Anaheim Garden Walk as well as Downtown Disney, and several discounted outlet stores as well.
