We are happy that you enjoyed your visit with us and are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Clean, comfortable, updated place to stay within walking distance of the park.  Restaurants, convenience store and shops near-by.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted to hear that you found us so clean and comfortable and that you enjoyed our upgraded rooms. We are right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk where there are several great places to dine. Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake factory, as well as PF Chang's and California Pizza Company are some of our favorites. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance as well, making it so convenient as you say. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Excellent hotel, great price, very clean, comfortable beds, nice pool and hot tub, customer service is exceptional, front desk staff were great, continental breakfast is very good too!  We stay here every time we visit.  Just a quick walk to Disney and you can see the fireworks from the hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear that you found us so affordable and that we fit into your budget. Our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast do add so much value to your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's terrific that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do hope to see you again soon next time you are in the Disneyland area.

Summary: The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, Ron who checked us in was so sweet and let us know the restaurants near us. The location was an easy walk to Disneyland and near quick stops like 7-11 and CVS to pick up essentials like water and snacks for non-park prices. The rooms were clean and updated, a little loud, but we were across from the pool. I would recommend it to a friend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's always a pleasure to hear that a guest will be back and will be recommending us to others. We are so happy you found us so conveniently located as well. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance, and so close to so many great places to shop and dine. Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake factory are a couple of our favorites to mention and they are right next door at the Garden Walk. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our room was clean and comfortable, perfect for our needs.  The personnel at the front desk were friendly and courteous, giving us directions to the Super 8 when we were totally lost.  The only thing that I was disappointed with was the fact that there were only two washcloths in the room, instead of four.  Overall, it was exactly what we needed.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's wonderful that you had such a comfortable stay with us. It's terrific that you found our staff so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are so excited to have you back for another visit!

Summary: During the two weeks in USA this place blew us away. So cheap! Even included breakfast and free parking. This isn't a 5 star hotel but was a very nice place to stay. We are used to stay 4-5 star hotels and were a little scared about staying in super 8, but it really exceeded our expectations!! Would definately recommend and stay there again. Good job super 8!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a great review. We are delighted to hear that we did in fact exceed your expectations. That is our goal with every guest. We do offer free amenities that do add up to a great value for your money.  Free Wifi, Free parking, as well as a delicious breakfast every morning. We cant wait until your next visit! We are really looking forward to it.

Summary: By no means is this a five star hotel, but for a cheap place within walking distance to Disneyland, you can't do better. Staff is friendly and stays out of your way unless you need them. The room is much nicer than you expect it to be. The parking is abundant. The beds are comfortable. The area is quiet. I was expecting a very average experience at best but was very happy with my stay. I will definitely keep it in mind next time I go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we are so excited to hear that you had a great stay and will be back! Our goal is to exceed our guests expectations, It is wonderful you found that you got such a great value for your stay and you found our service so friendly and helpful as well. We are so looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed here twice before.  They recently replaced their mattresses and they were so high off the floor even my husband who is 6' had his legs dangling.  Beds were comfortable once we got in.  Ron at the guest desk was very helpful and friendly.  Breakfast was good.  Could use more seating.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We are walking distance to the Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We have upgraded all our rooms with new mattress, new bedding, and all new furnishings as well. We are glad to hear you found the bed so comfortable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, It is wonderful to know you found our staff so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again during your next visit to the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Super 8 Katela excellent place to stay
Summary: This property is surprisingly nice if  you are looking for an inexpensive place to stay near Disneyland.  We have stay here more than once and enjoyed our stay every time.  We do not spend much time at the hotel.  We only use it for a clean place to sleep and shower.  The room layout is spacious to comfortably fit a family of 4.  The staff is also accommodating and helped us change our reservation to extend our stay for a few more days.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted that you had such an excellent stay with us! Our goal is to exceed our guest's expectations every time, and it is our pleasure to be of service. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My wife and I spent 5 nights to celabrate our 47th anniversary.  Stayed on second floor on back side and got a perfect view of nightly fireworks display because we do not stay out late at Park. Only problem was 3 of the 5 days we had problems with our TV.  Nice morning waffles and OJ. Hot Tub was great in the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us when celebrating your 47th anniversary. We are happy to know you had a great stay and you found us so affordable and such a great value. We do hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Great customer service.. Luis at the front desk was...
Summary: Great customer service.. Luis at the front desk was pleasant and accommodating ..Good room for the price
Manager Response: thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, It's great to know that you received that excellent guest service you so deserve. It's wonderful to hear as well that we fit into your budget! We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed in the Super 8 Motel near Disneyland. We were celebrating my wife's 65 birthday. The location is great since it's less than 10 minute walk to the Disneyland front gate.  The front desk staff were very helpful.  They sell Disneyland tickets at a competitive price and explained the various transportation options. There's a wide variety of markets, restaurants, and retail stores nearby. The room was not fancy but was very neat and clean, flat screen tv, phone, and good internet connection. Everything we needed and more! We'd plan on staying in the Super 8- Anaheim on return visits.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We were so excited to have you choose us when choosing that perfect place for your wife's 65 birthday!  It is so awesome that you found us to be so conveniently located to the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate it is true. We are right next door to so many great places to shop and dine as well. The Garden Walk offers some great choices such as Bubba Gumps, PF Chang's and the Cheesecake factory just to  mention a few. We are so looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: An okay choice for the price
Summary: The room was what you can expect for the price in an area that charges a lot to Disneyland visitors. Although somewhat older, it was clean and spacious enough to be comfortable. Curiously, it did not have a closet, just a wardrobe, so that was a bit of an issue when it came to hanging up clothes. Our room seemed to lack sufficient hot water, but our son's room next door did not experience that. Front desk personnel were friendly and helpful and there was a small breakfast area that provided cinnamon rolls, etc. This hotel is a approximately a 3/4 mile walk to the entrance to Disneyland, which is right on the edge of being able to comfortably  walk to the park. On the flip side, parking is free so that was a big savings.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are delighted to know that you had a good stay with us and that you found us to be so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, and we do have free parking making it so affordable and convenient as you say. We have upgraded all our rooms with new furnishings which do include a wardrobe as you say. The wardrobe has space and hangers for hanging clothes as well as several drawers for putting clothes into. I do apologize if you didn't find this adequate. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's terrific that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This property was a pleasant surprise.  The rooms are spacious, clean, and comfortable.  The vanity area was very large.  The large refrigerator was a great surprise, as I had brought a cooler full of food for my trip.  The beds were comfortable too.  The artwork was welcoming.  The breakfast was a little lacking, but it's free, so acceptable.  I just brought extra protein for my own sake.  The walk to Disneyland was 11 min. but the ART bus would drop us off at the corner, by the 7-11 for a small fee.  Overall I was very happy with the location of the resort.  My kids were thrilled with the pool too.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's great to hear that you found us to be such a great value and we fit into your budget. It is so true, we are a great value with our free amenities such as free WIFI, Free Parking and our Complimentary breakfast as well.We have upgraded all our rooms to include a fridge as well as a coffee maker and an iron with ironing board for use during our stay. All this does add up to a very valuable stay.  We are so glad to hear you had a great stay and you will be back!

Summary: Staff and help at check in were 1st class.  Staff were very helpful for any info on assistance needed or for info on excursions or attractions.  Rooms were very clean and could not be faulted. Nothing to plush or over the top but perfectly comfortable with everything you would require, TV, Fridge, Hair Dryer, Iron and Ironing Board, Coffee Maker with coffee, Bedside cabinets and drawers and cupboards. I would say on par with a Travel lodge or Premier Inn if you are from the UK or know these Hotels. They also have an outside pool for guests use and a complimentary breakfast buffet everyday running from 6am - 9am which was very good for those early starts.  Rooms are cleaned and hoovered every day with fresh towels and essentials replaced daily.  I would definitely use again on a
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful stay, but even happier to hear you will be back! It's so great to know you found our staff so helpful and friendly during your stay and you received that great guest service you so deserve. We are looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: My family and I stayed here in October while we visited Disneyland. This is a big month for the park, so rooms close by fill up quickly and the rates go up. Super 8 still had pretty good rates and was not a bad walk from the park.   The rooms themselves were clean. They looked like they had been updated recently. Our shower needed an update, but it was clean and in good working order.   They did also offer a continental breakfast. It was a couple brands of cereal, some yogurt, juice, and fresh waffles. They also had packaged cinnamon rolls and I think I saw bread for toast as well.   Overall, if you're looking for a place within walking distance from Disneyland and you don't want to pay an arm and a leg, this is a good option.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in a great location as you say being just a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance. We are also affordable and with our free amenities such as free parking, free Wifi, and complimentary breakfast it does add so much value to your stay doesn't it? We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: good price and location near disneyland
Summary: great location, great price, very clean spacious room, friendly front desk (allowed me to check in 1 hour early without any additional charge), free wifi. my only complaint, though minor, is that the breakfast consists of mostly pastries and other sweet stuff.  it would have been so much better to have some protein (eggs, ham or sausages) included. not a biggie though.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad to hear we fit into your budget and you found us an affordable choice when visiting Disneyland. We are in the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park as you say, being only a 15 minute walk to the front entrance. We are excited for your next visit with us, and are really looking forward to it.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nightsin Oct 2015. Great location. 2 min walk for food and shops. 10 min walk to disney and about 45 min drive to LA and Universal Studios. Plenty of beaches that are about a 30 min drive away.   Pool open til 10pm. There is also a decent sized terrace where u can watch the disney firework display each evening.   We stayed in room 202 which was decent sized, frusge etc. Only bad point of this is that its on a fairly main road and right above reception so rather noisy if ur a light sleeper. The air con also sounds like a shuttle bus driving around ur room.   Free breakfast too. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do have an excellent complimentary breakfast as you say, and we are just minutes from several great places to shop and dine as well. We are so convenient when visiting the Disneyland Park as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate. We are delighted to hear you will be returning and we look forward to it!

Summary: I booked in advance so I got the hotel at a reasonable price, we arrived early and was given a room without any problems. Room was clean and a good size. Breakfast was good, waffles delicious, although the breakfast room was busy, later in morning I noted people queuing outside. Pool and hot tub great, we had a lovely early evening swim. Would recommend this Super 8
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay with us. It's great to you you will be recommending us and you will be back! We do look forward to it.

Summary: I'm a fan of staying at the Super 8 when I go to Disneyland. One particular visit I had a very late check in and Jesus was phenomenal with helping me out while there was a minor issue. HIGHY RECOMMEND! I'll stay there any chance I can.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear you will be recommending us! Thank you for the compliments to our staff, We are happy to hear you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I don't do surveys but this is worth noting.  I was actually surprised. Clean rooms, good AC (it was 99 in Anaheim!) friendly, polite and professional staff, ice machines worked. Tired of fighting for the complimentary breakfast? There's a person actually manning the waffle machines! You get what you pay for - it's still a motel. It's walking distance to Disneyland.   I stay in hotels for a living (Airline worker) so I know hotels. No surprise additional fees. Give it a try.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for taking time to give us  your feedback on your visit with us. We do offer personalized service, including during our breakfast. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast as well as appreciated our staff who serves our breakfast. We do look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Just what we were looking for
Summary: This is a no-frills property, reasonable in price, clean and friendly staff.  We figured that we were going to spend our days at Disneyland so we did not need anything fancy.  This filled the bill.  It is a bit of a walk to the Disneyland tram, about 20 minutes for us older folks.  The one downside was the fact that there were no restaurants nearby.  We had to go to Downtown Disney for our meals.  A bit expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear we are just what you were looking for. The garden walk which is right next door has several great places to dine such as Bubba Gumps, The Cheese Cake Factory, California Pizza Company just to mention a few. There is also a Subway, McDonalds, IHOP, Tony Romas, Denneys right around the corner as well as several other fast food establishments. Please inquire at the front desk next time you are here so we can make some suggestions. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Oct 1st-8th 2015 this is a very clean hotel and property,very well kept,it has a hot tub and pool that are both nice and clean as well,they have an adequate breakfast for a quick bite or to get the kids going...waffels,cereal,toast,coffee etc.it is about a 15-20 min walk to the Disney parks and close to lots of restaraunts,great over all value
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are such a great value as you say.  When traveling with a family amenities such as free WIFI, free parking and complimentary breakfast  are worth so much!  We also have upgraded rooms with fridges at no extra charge. I am so glad to hear you had a wonderful stay and you found us to be such an awesome value. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The Super 8 is a clean, safe and comfortable choice for a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland (around 15 minutes, but it depends on how fast you walk and how tired you are after being in the park all day).  The wi-fi is steady, the staff are friendly, there is a pool.  Our room was pretty spacious, with two beds and room to walk around.  No microwave, but there was a fridge, which was handy.  Air conditioning worked great.  Laundry on site.  Lots of ice machines around the property, which is important if you are going into the parks on hot days.  It was a bit noisy - but that's not the fault of the hotel at all.  It's a motel-style property, and for some reason, some people don't think about how loud they are when they leave their rooms and are walking by yours.  We had
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. As you say and so many other guest say, we are a great value.  Our amenities such as free WIFI, free parking, and complimentary breakfast do add a lot of value to your stay. The convenient location is another value as you can walk to the Disneyland park, or the Anaheim Convention center in minutes, as well as several great places to dine as well as shop. We have upgraded all our rooms to include a fridge, coffee maker, blow dryer, and iron  at no extra charge. We do have microwaves available upon request for a small nightly fee. So much value for your dollar when you stay with us. We are really happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and you will be back.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, this is our fourth time to Disneyland this year, first time with this hotel and it was the best out of the other ones we stayed at. The front office was very friendly. Room was clean, pool was nice. The breakfast was good & free, and walking distance to Disneyland. We have another trip planned in December and will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for the review. We are so excited to hear you  had such a wonderful stay and even more excited that you will be returning!  We are a great place to stay with families. We do have connecting rooms per request. This makes it so nice when traveling with large families.  Our complimentary breakfast is such a great time and money saver as well. Grab a quick bite for breakfast before walking to Disneyland with the family. We are so very happy to know you will be back in December!

Summary Heading: No need to stay anywhere else
Summary: Visited for the first time in 2012 and didn't hesitate in returning this summer.  The service is very good and friendly.  The breakfast, although basic, is absolutely fine for a quick something to eat before heading to Disney.  The rooms are clean and have excellent air conditioning meaning i could set the room to be freezing cold when I returned to my room from the hot summer heat  The pool and hot tub are great and we used  the tub every day to relax after walking back from the parks.  I honestly cannot believe people think the distance to Disney is far.  Maybe its because Americans aren't used to walking anywhere but seriously, it takes 15 minutes to get from the hotel to the front gates and that is very near to me.  The hotel could be considered basic but I don't see the
Manager Response: We thank you so much for the review. It's always such a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. As you say we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland front gates. It saves on the $18 per day parking fee at Disneyland when you stay here and park at the motel for free. Our other amenities such as free wifi and complimentary breakfast does add so much value to your stay. We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: We stayed here based on the reviews on tripadvisor and found the hotel met our needs for 4 nights/5 days.  Staff: They are great, very friendly and helpful!  Location: it took us 11 minutes to walk from the hotel to the entrance way of the buses for Disneyland - 15 minutes to get to the security check point.  It is a longer walk at the end of the night as feet and legs are tired from all the walking at the park...something to think about. There is a 7-11 at the street corner where we stopped each morning to buy our water (much cheaper then the park!)  Breakfast: Very simple, nothing fancy.  They make the waffles for you and are quite yummy.  Fruit was orange slices only, would have been nice to have bananas as well.  Choice of white/brown bread for toast and there is only jam
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. It sounds like you did have a good stay and you enjoyed your stay with us. We are a 15 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland. No need to take a shuttle. The security check points can be long depending on how busy Disneyland is that day. We really look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Clean, walking distance to Disneyland, great price, comfy beds, new decor, includes wi-fi, free parking, and free continental breakfast with laundry facilities.  Stayed as a family in adjoining rooms.  Only problem is if you book with a third party they do not give you the Wyndham points.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's great to hear we it into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. Our amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast do add to the value of your stay. We are in a great location as you say. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland front gate. Several great restaurant choices are just a few minutes walk away. Thanks for choosing to stay with us for your family vacation! We look forward to your return!

Summary: Room was booked for me by staff (who will not get that task again) and had there been any vacancies nearby I would not have stayed!  Room was clean and bed comfortable.  Staff was helpful.  "free" breakfast was great if you like waffles....the sweet sickie smell of syrup permeated the air outside and crept into the rooms as well.  Room NOT what a traveling business person needed after a long day on tradeshow floor.  Room very small, desk area too small and crowded, not even a comfortable chair to sit in.  Free internet service was unreliable and signal continually dropped.  TV service was out for 24 hours and when it did work the signal was continually breaking up.  Location is good for shopping, restaurants, convention center and Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We are delighted to hear that you found our staff so helpful and friendly. We do pride ourselves in great customer service, and it's so great that this was your experience.  We have a wonderful housekeeping staff, and they do a terrific job at making sure each and every room is so clean and fresh every day. We have recently upgraded all our rooms with new mattress and all new bedding. Extra pillows included! This really does make for a restful sleep. We are in the perfect location when attending a convention  It is just a quick walk  from here. With our amenities such as free parking it does make it so affordable.   Our complimentary breakfast does include waffles with Syrup. We also provide fresh fruit, yogurt, cereal, oatmeal, toast with jam, cinnamon rolls, fruit juice, coffee, hot  chocolate,  and tea. We do apologize for any inconvenience regarding the TV. Our cable provider did experience an outage while you were here and it did affect us as well as several hotels in the area. This was totally out of our control, but we do realize it was an inconvenience and we sincerely apologize. We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I left my home in chandler, az Sunday October 4th and arrived 5:50 in the morning the 5th. The breakfast was delicious. Spoke to one of the staff memebers. She was helpful how to plan my days out. Very knowledgeable. Even the staff in the office were nice. They were able to hold my bag so that I don't miss any of the disney magic. I was able to check into my room at 11 at night when I left the park. From now on I'm staying here when I visit disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  We are so excited to hear you spent your birthday with us! We do have an awesome staff who is always so helpful with planning out your vacation while you are here. It is great to know that they were able to help plan things out for you and that you had such a marvelous time. We look forward to another visit from  you!

Summary Heading: Great for a quick visit to Disneyland
Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights in July.   For the price I paid it was perfect. The rooms are basic but clean. I really liked the TV and choice of channels.   I used this a base whilst I visited Disneyland. 10 minutes and you're there!!!   The breakfast was great and kept me going till lunch.   The front desk team were great and check-in and out was a breeze.   I'd stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It;s wonderful to hear they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve. You are right we are so convenient and close to the Disneyland park. It's just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk to the park entrance. The added savings of free parking here does add so much value to your stay. Our other amenities such as free WIFI and complimentary breakfast are a great deal as well. We are looking forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Great cheap accommodation within walking distance from Disneyland and has everything you need. It's is not a resort so don't expect one but if you are spending 10-12 hours a day at Disneyland and just need a place to sleep then I highly recommend it. The pool is a good size to cool off and the staff were very pleasant. The rooms are clean and there is a free breakfast and plenty of other food options on your door step. I have stayed at the bigger hotels nearby and for less than half the price I will be back at this one for sure!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's so great to hear that you found us to be such a great value for your money. It's true with our amenities such as a complimentary breakfast, free WIFI and free parking it does add so much more value to your stay.  We are so convenient to the Disneyland park, it's just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed 4 nights to go to Disneyland and it was perfect.Clean rooms,,free breakfast,walking distance to the parks and close to restaurants outside the park.We never moved our car in 4 days and saved money by walking to the parks.We were on the second floor and enjoyed watching the fireworks there the 1st. night and eating breakfast there.Would stay again and reasonable too!Very nice and helpful people that work there too!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad to hear you had such a great stay with us. We are so convenient as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance.  We are also right next door to so many great places to dine, such as Bubba Gumps and the Cheesecake factory. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: This reservation was for my Daughter who was attending a concert in LA.  She raved about the quality and cleanliness of the room.  The location was perfect for her and her friend.  Before checking out, she had a quick jog through the neighborhood and a swam until it was time to check out.  The hotel employees were awesome and knowledgeable.  She strongly recommends Super 8 Anaheim/Near Disneyland!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear you enjoyed your visit with us, but even more exciting to hear you will be back!  Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It is good to hear that you found them to be so friendly and so helpful. Thanks for recommending us and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: An extremely sick guest was seen coughing and sneezing all over the breakfast counters, utensils, toasters, and exposed foods with no regards for the other guests. Please post a sign for ignorant guests like that to protect the rest of us.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy that we fit into your budget and you found us to be an affordable place to stay. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Anaheim areal.

Summary Heading: Great price, pleasant place to stay!
Summary: We have stayed here twice now for Disneyland trips! Walking distance to the park, clean rooms, and the best price I could find. If you're expecting a 5 star hotel you'll be disappointed, but if you just need somewhere comfy to spend the night for trips, then it is perfect!  Free breakfast is a little skimpy, but hey its free! Wifi was great. Staff was very nice and helpful. One of my favorite parts about the rooms is there are none of those bulky motel bedspreads that you know never get washed :) This hotel uses a top sheet for a bedspread, with a cute decorative cloth across the bottom, and a cute pillow. Nice to know you've got a nice clean sheet to sit on on the bed, rather than a gross bedspread!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear that we fit into your budget and you found us a great place to stay when visiting Disneyland. We are glad you enjoyed our upgraded rooms which does include upgraded linens and bedding. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Several days the cable was out. I asked for assistance in...
Summary: Several days the cable was out. I asked for assistance in carrying my luggage up the stairs. I waited a few minutes and ended up carrying it up myself. While going to my room a worker then assisted to my room which was only a few away and then insisted on a tip. I would suggest if you have a fridge in a room that there also be a microwave. Front desk workers were extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast seemed lacking and was hard to move around in the room.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's great to know that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We do apologize for any inconvenience experienced with your TV during your stay with us. Our cable provider did experience an outage, which did effect us as well as many other motels in the area. Things are working great now though and we do hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: A typical hotel for a big chain. Rooms were good. The room was big enough for the two of us. We really liked that It had a mini fridge n the room. We also enjoyed the cable television in the room. Really close to the park and great restaurants.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and now there is a fridge in every room at no extra cost. It's great to know that you found our new upgraded rooms suited your needs and you found them to be clean and comfortable. We are looking forward to another visit from you!

Summary Heading: It was really convenient to Disney and the Angels stadium.
Summary: Room 215, near the pool and upstairs. Breakfast was busy. Guest laundry was really useful.  Our room was clean and comfortable with a fridge in the room. The location is close to a variety of restaurants.  Nice view of Disney fireworks in the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so convenient to the Disneyland park as well as the Angels Stadium. It's just 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park entrance and just a quick drive to the Angels stadium as well. We are so close to so many great places to shop as well as dine in the area. We are hope to see you again soon on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: When we booked, I emailed with requests like: close to the pool, fireworks view, and first floor ... not expecting to get each one of those granted.  Peter the Mgr was very prompt at replying to my email. All were granted.  Stayed 5 nights in late September, $62 usd per night.  Checked in at noon, but our room wasn't ready until 3pm.  Room itself was a decent size.  Pretty big fridge, no safe, satellite tv. Bathroom hasn't been updated in a while, but it did its purpose.  The towels are small and we could have used more than three 'large' ones.  The property itself is in a perfect location.  Beside Garden Walk Mall, which is basically just restaurants.  Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gumps, California Pizza Kitchen, PF Changs all within minutes.  10 minute walk to Disneyland --
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It's wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. It's so true we are just so close to everything making it very convenient when staying with us. We are just a quick 15  minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance. We have free parking, so its really a great savings when parking the car here and walking over to Disneyland. We are right next door to the Garden Walk., a really great place to shop and dine. We are really looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: within walking distance to Disney. Clean, nice rooms
Summary: This was not your typical super 8 motel. It was upscale, clean, spacious with very nice beds, microwave, mini fridge and pool. The best part was that it was only 3 blocks from Disneylands main gate. A very short walk that made it easy to leave our car parked and not pay parking fees. We left one day and forgot to take our room key. Jesus made us new keys when we came back late at night. He was super helpful and friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's so true, we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park, making it so cost efficient and convenient. We have recently upgraded our rooms, It's wonderful to hear you liked our new upgrades and that you found the room to be so comfortable.  We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: As advertised.  Simple no frills, clean place to sleep.  Very close to DL... Walkable about 10 minutes. (Good for taking a mid-day break from the park).  Plenty of places to eat within walking distance too. Perfect for a budget Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's great to hear you found our location  to be so convenient. It's very true we are just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are so close to so many great places to shop and dine as well. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I love this hotel. The employees are wonderful especially Danielle our waffle making breakfast host. Sweet Juan Luis tried to help me for over an hour to get HBO on the TV but was unable to do it. They have a flier for what is on HBO but it is not on any of the channels.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. So happy to hear you love staying with us. We do have HBO included in our channel lineup.  We did have some issues with our cable provider during your stay with us as there was a temporary outage with some of the channels. Unfortunately HBO was one of the channels that was down. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed 4 nights here and had a few issues. The bathtub spout dripped which in this drought is not cool and the tub backed up, so by the time you were done showering you were standing in ankle deep water. Nasty. They fixed that problem the next day, but not the drip. Then the night before check out our TV wouldn't work. The boy at the front desk was of no use. Maintenance came the next morning, looked at it, said he'd be back and never seen him again. No biggie because we were checking out that morning. Other then those few things we were satisfied. Would stay here again if I got the same rate.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you found us to be a nice place to stay. We are sorry to hear of any issues you may have experienced during your stay with us. It's awesome to know that our maintenance staff was able to fix things for you. We are sorry if you experienced problems with the TV while you were here. Our cable provider had an outage and unfortunately it affected us as well as several hotels in the area. We are so happy that  you will be back we do look forward to your return.

Summary: A quick 15 min walk from Disneyland.  Nice pool and Jacuzzi with the strongest jets I've ever experienced!  Free breakfast includes fresh made waffles (a step up from the toasted frozen waffles at other Super 8's I've been to).
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's very true, It is a great value when you stay with us. Our amenities such as free WIFI, Free parking, Complimentary breakfast (with those delicious freshly made waffles!) it really does add so much value to your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed here for a last minutes girls weekend. We wanted to be within walking distance to the parks, and this fit the bill for a decent price. It is not super close, but for two adults, it was manageable. If you aren't up to walking that far, there is the ART shuttle that will pick you up instead. Check -in was quick and easy. We had prepaid, so they just needed a credit card for incidentals.   Our room was clean and plenty spacious. I would have been good with the space if I had been traveling with my family of four. The A/C worked well, and we turned it on before heading over to the parks so it was nice and cool when we got back. The breakfast was fine. The waffles were freshly made and there was cereal, fruit, yogurt and bread available as well. They had coffee, juice and
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  It's great to hear you found our location so convenient when staying with us. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to start your day isn't it? So glad to hear you enjoyed it. We have all new an upgraded ACs in all our rooms and they do a great job at cooling the room down and fast! We do as standard practice have our housekeeping staff turn the AC down when the room not occupied. This is to conserve energy. The State of California recommends this, especially during hot days. I am sorry if it was an inconvenience during your stay with us. We are so happy to know you will be returning!

Summary: Very friendly staff.  Free breakfast was good. Close to Disneyland with free parking. Room was clean,  nothing fancy, it's older. But we felt comfortable & it was quiet.   The only issue.... And it was a big one. The coffee machine had maggots!!!! Disgusting!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review.  Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your say with us. We do have a delicious complimentary breakfast, free WIFI and free parking. This does make for a valuable stay for your money.  We do have a great maintenance staff and housekeeping  staff. Our housekeeping staff cleans and sanitizes the coffee makers every day. I do apologize if there was any issue with the coffee maker in the room. We did not see any reports of this to the front desk or to housekeeping. We are hoping to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The proximity to Disneyland was our main reason for choosing to stay one night at this motel. And that purpose was served okay.  Check-in was quick and flawless, the wifi worked well and right on Katella were several restaurants so food was also easy to get to.   Our room was somewhat clean, toilet and shower basic but functioning. There was also a small pool which we didn‚Äôt get to use because it was raining.   Breakfastroom was extremely crowded though, and not a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.We are happy to hear you  were satisfied with your stay. We are in the  process of expanding our breakfast room and making quite a few changes. We do look forward to seeing you again and are sure you will be happy with the new improvements.

Summary: Hotel registration staff very helpful and friendly, a delight to see each trip.  Room adequate and meets our needs
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear they were so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Nice place, quiet, just a broken AC is the only gripe.
Summary: I liked the place. Jesus is probably one of the kindest employees there and really deserves some extra points for being real nice about the local eateries and ticket sales of the attractions nearby. I would go again if they fix the AC. Also, work on the wi-fi; it, plainly put, does not work at all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family stayed at this Super 8 for the duration of our Disneyland vacation. We really enjoyed our visit! The hotel is walking distance from Disneyland Park. The rooms are clean, the beds are super comfortable, and the pool is very inviting! There is a great complimentary breakfast -- a great way to start your day! Danielle personally made us waffles in the morning, and she is also well-versed in Disney lore, so keep your ears open. The front desk staff are very friendly. Cheryl gave us a tip for a great restaurant in the area and helped us plan out our beach itinerary.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are delighted to hear you had a simply wonderful stay with us.  A good sleep is so important when you are away from home. Our new mattresses are so comfy!  We have recently upgraded all our rooms with new mattresses, new bedding, all new decor, new fridges in all our rooms as well as extra outlets and brighter lighting.  We do have a heated pool and hot tub which is a terrific place to relax after a long day at the Disneyland park. It's also a wonderful place to view the fireworks. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's always great to hear that they are providing that excellent guest service that you deserve. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: A good choice for a Disney vacation
Summary: Our stay at Super 8 was quite nice. Before arriving, I asked Cheryl at the front desk for a crib and microwave for our baby's needs, and they were both ready to go in the room upon arrival. Rooms were very clean each day of our stay. Breakfast room gets very busy, so we tried to get up early each morning. Danielle, in the breakfast room, was very friendly and made us feel very welcome. Overall, we were very satisfied with our stay. We will definitely be coming back in the future and would recommend this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing us to be part of your family's Disney vacation. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and even more happy to hear you will be back! It is wonderful to hear that you found our staff so efficient and helpful during  your stay. We pride ourselves in great guest service and strive to exceed our guest expectations with each and every visit. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Wonderful hotel. Walking distance to parks. Friendly staff. Spacious rooms. Very reasonable rates. You can come back from the park, relax in the hot tub and enjoy the firework show. My brother stayed at the resort and the only difference was they had a coffee maker and a view of Adventure California. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We are a great place to stay! Especially when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just  a quick walk to the front entrance making us so convenient. With our free parking it makes us such a value! So happy to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub while you were here. You are correct it is a perfect place to unwind after a long day at the Disneyland park and a great place to catch the fireworks as well. It really is a great way to end a magical day. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Amherst proved to be a very convenient location to break our journey from Nova Scotia to Greenfield PA. Everything was close by and the accommodation clean and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are a very convenient location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance and right next door to the Garden Walk where you will find several great places to dine and shop as well. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay so much and do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay on a Disney vacation
Summary: Great place to stay for a Disneyland vacation. Clean, close (less than a mile walk), affordable, and family friendly. Great option for a family on a budget. I've stayed at many economy motels in the Disneyland area and this one is the best.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found staying with us during your trip to Disneyland to be so convenient. We are also happy to hear that we fit into your budget. We do look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The staff at the front desk aren't overly pleasant.  The rooms were clean, except bathroom where the flooring definitely needs to be changed and the fan in the bathroom didn't help a whole lot.  The maids did a phenomenal job in tidying the rooms up and making sure there were fresh towels.  The breakfast wasn't overly great as we had a choice of pre-packaged cinnamon buns (That come with a warning from CA), toast, 2 types of cereal and waffles. WI-FI didn't work most of the time.  Kept disconnecting every 5-15 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our housekeeping staff. We are glad to hear that you found your room so clean and fresh while you were here. We do have a complimentary breakfast that does include 3 kinds of cereal with milk, fresh fruit, toast with jam, fresh baked waffles and cinnamon rolls. We also offer yogurt, 2 kinds of juices, hot chocolate and tea. I do apologize if you did not find this to be an adequate breakfast. We recently upgraded our free WIFI Our new WIFI system boasts 20 commercial grade access points powered by a 100 Mb fiber optic cable. It really is very reliable and quite fast. We also have a 24 hour hotline to assist when our guest's  are experiencing any problems regarding their connections. If ever there is an issue please contact the front desk so we can better assist you. We do hope to see you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Great place as always - like a second home. Love that the rooms now have fridges. The staff as always are fantastic, from the front desk to the cleaners - always nice and helpful. Front desk staff Cheryl and Ron are an asset to the hotel. I will be back again and again :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It's always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear that you received that great guest service that you so deserve. We are so excited to hear you will be returning and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This place was verry pleasant, near all service. The staff was agreeable too and obliging. The bedroom was confortable and clean. If we could find bugs sometimes, we can't say it's because of a lack of cleanliness, it's more because of the heat. We can recommencer this motel to every people who want to spend relax and enjoyable vacation ;)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy you had an pleasant stay. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. We do pride ourselves in great guest service and always strive to exceed our guest's expectations. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: from the start, Ichel was very helpful at the front desk with a warm sense of humor.  our room wasnt very cool so i called her and when we got back to the room we had a new air conditioner and it worked.  there was a refrigerator and a generally nice room.  pool towels were handed out easily.  the breakfast was just cereal, coffee waffles and yogurt but that was fine.  as long as i get coffee. i dont stay at a budget hotel for the fine dining.   im used to staying at the plaza around the corner but this isnt much further.   i would stay here again
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments about out staff. It's so awesome to hear that they provided you with such great service with a smile. We are glad to hear you will be back!

Summary: We were quite pleased with our stay at the Super 8 while we were visiting Disneyland. We found that it was comfortable to walk to and from Disneyland every day, and it was close enough that it was not unreasonable to walk back to the hotel during the heat of the afternoon to go for a swim. The pool was reasonably sized and the whirlpool was very nice. The breakfast area was very small and it was always crazy busy (everyone wanting to eat before they went to Disney) so we never actually ate there, which was unfortunate because everywhere else was expensive. The front desk staff was very helpful, although a little judgmental about the number of pool towels they handed out. We always requested four for the two of us because they were tiny towels. The rooms were reasonably clean,
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its true we are so conveniently located right next door to so many great shops and places to eat. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance as well. It's wonderful that you were able to take advantage of our heated pool and hot tub after a long day at the park. It is very relaxing. We do have plenty of pool towels available at the front desk and you may take as many as you need. We really are happy you had a great stay and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here several times and I always have a great time. Value is great, room is big and clean. Beds are super comfy. Arrived early yet the room was ready for check-in! Location is only a 15 walk from Disney or you can take the ART shuttle which stops right in front of the hotel. The employees are wonderful and very helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We always love to hear from repeat guests! It's great to know you found us to be such a great value as always. With all our amenities such as free wifi, free parking, and complimentary breakfast it does add up to a valuable stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: From check in to check out this place was great!  Check in was very quick we were in our room within minutes of arriving.   The room was very clean and spacious for 3 adult women on a girls weekend getaway to Disney!  The walk was a bit too much for me after a long day of walking in the park and the breakfast wasnt too impressive but other then that i would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for a wonderful review. So glad to hear you had such a fabulous stay. We are a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance as you say. The ART shuttle does pick up right next door and runs every 20 minutes. It starts running an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. There is a small fee to ride, but it is  a terrific way to get to and from the Disneyland park with ease. We are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: We found two bedbugs in the first room we stayed in, which was 193. One was already dead, and we killed a second one which was alive. I also found the room to be dirty by the window and there was a dead bug on the floor. Besides that, the fan in the bathroom did not seem to work well as it appeared to be clogged. We were moved to 181 after I brought up my concern with the front desk, but not until the next day as the guy said we had to deal with it for the night. He answered me as if it was just a normal thing that was brought up quite frequently, and on top of that, they said they filled that room in the next day or so. I guess this was not taken seriously and I felt bad for the person who may have been unaware of this.  I also wanted to warm up some food after coming back late
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay with us. We do have a great maintenance staff, and they do preventative pest control on a routine basis.  I  do understand your concerns, however we are always a step ahead to make sure our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. It is  good to hear our staff took such great care of you and moved you to another room so you were more comfortable.  We do have microwaves available to use during the breakfast hours at no extra charge. Do to State of California regulations we are not able to have access to the breakfast area unless it is during the hours of breakfast operations. We do however have microwaves available at any time for  small fee of $5.00 per night and we can put it right in  your room. I am so happy to hear you found our free parking and complimentary breakfast to be such a great value.  We also have fridges in all our rooms as well as free wifi. This does add up to a more valuable stay. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Great location and VERY good people. Every worker had a smile and a grating. Extremely Pleasant. Room was excellent and well cared for. Front Desk always helpful and two people were FUNNEE. Enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad to hear you found our staff so helpful and pleasant. I am happy that they provided you with such great service during your stay. We look forward to another visit next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here for a 2-day RunDisney event, which was unfortunately Labor Day weekend = all hotels were overpriced (including this one). The proximity to Disneyland was about a mile, so I walked to and from my races both days and didn't have to pay Disney's ridiculous parking fees. Parking at the hotel was free (which many hotels don't offer) and I had a space right in front of my room both nights! Also, this hotel is right next door to GardenWalk, so we walked to go to dinner and bowling. The outside of the building is extremely dated, with thick stucco. We didn't use the pool, but others were enjoying it. The inside of the room was clean and had mostly everything we needed. But when I took showers, they were cold and slightly less cold! The free breakfast was fantastic, and even
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is wonderful to know that you found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are so close to the Disneyland park as well as so many great places to dine and shop. Our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi and complimentary breakfast do add so much value to your stay. It is good to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. The waffles are so tasty!  I am sorry to hear that you had an issue with the hot water during your stay.  I did not notice a report to the front desk regarding this. We have a 24 hour front desk to assist with any issue you might experience during your stay. Please do not hesitate to let us know during future visits!  We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: rooms were very clean. front desk staff very friendly and helpful[ ron rigo marlon] in fact ron was very helpful to us in finding a mobilty scooter for rent when the company we had  failed to show up with ours.the breakfast was very good with many items to choose from. daniella in the breakfast room is a doll so friendly and very helpful there was also another sweetheart working the breakfast room [didnt get her name].everyone working the hotel always greeted us and were very kind. thank you super 8 for helping make our disneyland visit a super one. we will stay with you again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. Thanks so much for the compliments to our staff. We do our very best to exceed our guests expectations with each and every visit. We look forward to seeing  you again soon!

Summary Heading: last day at Disneyland and it was so close to the park we walked.  Nice breakfast to start our day ride home.
Summary: room was clean and had two comfortable beds for 3 adults.  we requested a micawave and it was brought promptly. the others staying there were pleasant and your could tell from the kids at play, pool and breakfact they were having a good time.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so very close to the Disneyland park, just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance making it so convenient. It's awesome you took advantage of our complimentary breakfast and found it a great way to start your day. We  are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Bottom line:  Liked it.  Came to Anaheim for conference at upscale hotel around the corner from this one.  Rooms here were less than half the rate of that upscale hotel.  Pleasantly surprised by room amenities, cleanliness, and appearance.  Not fancy, but certainly pleasant and clean.  (If you want fancy, go around the corner.)  Free wifi worked ok.  Staff courteous and helpful.  Parking was easy.  Pool looked nice, but I didn't happen to use it.  Free breakfast was also nice.  My one complaint:  breakfast was all starch offerings -- no eggs, meat, or other protein was available.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are a terrific value as you say. We have a lot of free amenities such as our delicious breakfast. We do have a variety of breakfast items. Fresh fruit, Yogurt, cereal with milk, toast with jam and hot oatmeal. We also offer yummy cinnamon buns and fresh baked waffles. So Yummy! We are so excited to hear you will be returning!  We look forward to it.

Summary: The room was nice, clean and comfortable.  It was conveniently located to Disneyland and the price was out of this world.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are a great place to stay you are right! We are so glad we fit into your budget and you found our location to be so great as well. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great value and close to Disneyland
Summary: Clean motel, plenty of parking. Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Pool and hot tub with sitting area. Many restaurants close by, Disneyland 2 blocks away (approx 1km) Not the newest property available but it's clean and rooms are not cramped. Included breakfast is pretty simple, but it's free.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy to hear that you found us to be such a great value and we fit so well into your budget. We are in a great location as you say, just 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are also so close to so many great places to shop and dine as well. Bubba Gumps is one of my favorites! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I stayed at the Super 8 for 8 nights at the end of August.  I had a one queen bed room for only $75 (Canadian dollars)/ night which, with the exchange rate at the time, worked out to only $56 U.S/night.  What a great rate for a great motel.  My number one priority is a clean, comfortable bed and the Super 8 didn't let me down.  Clean, white sheets, clean mattress(I checked) and 4 nice pillows! I slept very well. As for the other amenities:  The fridge in the room was one of the best I've seen.  Definitely larger than some with a nice freezer compartment that worked well, a crisper drawer and compartments on the door.  It was also deep enough to fit a large pizza box so I really appreciated this fridge. The counter top was granite and a good size.  The bathroom, I will say, was
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review. It's so great to hear that we fit into you budget and you enjoyed your stay with us. We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland as we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. I am glad that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, as well as our heated pool and hot tub. It is a perfect place to relax after a long day at the Disneyland park. It is also a great place to view the firewoks at night. We are so happy to hear you will be returning!

Summary: This was a great place to stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The breakfast in the morning met our needs and the staff was very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the pool area as well. We were within a 10 min walk of the Maingate at Disneyland and a 2 min walk from some great restaurants. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's terrific you found us to be such a great value when staying with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's so wonderful to hear they were so friendly and helpful during your stay. It's true we are just right next door to the Garden Walk where there are several great places to shop and dine. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as well making it very convenient and cost effective when staying with us. We are looking forward to your return!

Summary: When we arrived at the front desk the gentleman who checked us in was great! Very helpful and welcomed us with a great smile. Being so close to Disneyland and in walking distance of restaurants. Hotel was very clean and housekeeping did a great job on the several days we were there. Would stay here again!! Our shower would not drain the first night we were there, I called the front desk and maintenance fixed it right away!  Would recommend to anyone. Even has a pool and hot tub. Never got to try the breakfast we thought it was closed at 10 and it only was till 9! If your concerned if its worth it? Yes its worth it and I do trip advisor reviews before any trip! So your in good hands!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's just terrific to hear we fit into  your budget and you found us to be such a great value. It is very true our amenities such as free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast do add up to more value for your money. Thank you for the compliments tour staff. It's so great to hear that they were so helpful and efficient during your stay with us. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Super 8 Anaheim has great staff, big rooms, clean and only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Ron and Cheryl at the front desk were a huge help. I was having issues with my airport transfers and Ron took it upon himself to call the shuttle service and get me a pick up time at the hotel, something the shuttle service would not do for me even though I had already paid for it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's so great to hear our staff was so helpful. I am so glad that our staff provided you with that excellent service you deserve. We pride ourselves in great guest services and always try to exceed our guest's expectations. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Thank you so much Cheryl and Ron, you are the most amazing people to work in hospitality that mom and I could have asked for. The room was big, beautiful and wonderfully clean. The continental breakfast is very filling. The walk to the park is super easy and convenient. This is the ONLY place I will stay on any future Disney visits üòé
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's so wonderful to hear they provided that personal extra special guest service that you so deserve.  We are thrilled to hear you will be back!

Summary: Terrific Reception Staff!!!  We spent a week here while visiting Didneylsnd. The rooms were cleaned daily! The assistance provided by reception was awesome, they helped me work out which bus we needed to take to travel to different locations in Anaheim and Costa Mesa. They just need a bigger breakfast room. Otherwise highly recommended and only a five minute walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. So awesome to hear you say you received excellent service. We do pride ourselves in our guest services and always try our best to exceed our guest's expectations. We so look forward to another visit from you in the future.

Summary: I would come here again and again I have stayed here back and 1999 and now in 2015 and both time were execellent and it's better now with a better breakfast menu.
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. It's wonderful that you were able to come back and stay with us again! So glad to  hear that you enjoyed our new upgraded breakfast. We hope to see you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Danielle and Ansley are awesome.  These two gal's  go out of there way every day to make your stay the best; )  They should get a raise, they always have a smile on there face and willing to give you what you want and need.  If there is a chance to come back I will come here again because of them
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy to hear that they made your stay so special. We are so happy to hear that you will be returning! We look forward to it.

Summary Heading: very nice staff but I didn't like the motel
Summary: I have 3 kids so it is hard to walk them for ten minutes to get to disneyland in the scorching anaheim heat. No way to get them back to the motel I tried taking the shuttle but it took too long. The staff was very kind especially Jose O. And Daniella.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments tour staff. It's great to hear they provided you with such great guest service. It's true we are a 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance.  The ART shuttle does run ever 20 minutes and starts running an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. It picks up right in front of us. It is air conditioned and is a great way to get to and from the park especially when it is warm outside. You mention you did not like the motel, however you do no specify what it is you did not like. I am sorry if you did not find us up to your expectations. We do hope that you decide to visit us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here for 13 nights in August 2015 and spent US$1200 for the entire stay.  The purpose of this trip was to spend multiple days at the Disneyland Resort and also to attend the D23 Expo at the Anaheim Convention Centre. Therefore, location (and price point) of the hotel had to be optimal for this trip. The Super 8 definitely met both of my expectations in this regard. It was about a 15- 20 minutes walk each to both Disneyland and the convention centre so a car rental is not required. Wi-Fi is free and fast (password is mickey).   The check in process was quick albeit straight to the point (initial here, sign there, credit card please) without really any friendliness or warmth. This hotel is separated into a few buildings and all have two floors with no elevator so future
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! It is so terrific to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and you will be back! It's true we are a super place to stay when visiting Disneyland. We are just 15 minutes walk to the front gate. We are also right next door to so many great places to shop and dine making it very convenient when staying with us. Its so good to know you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. Our free wifi, free parking and complimentary breakfast to add up to a budget friendly stay. We  look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here 4 nights on a trip to Disneyland and universal studios. The hotel is very clean. Check in was fast along with clerks being very friendly. Room itself is very clean. It has been updated. There's new cabinets and countertops, nights stands. Pictures on walls. Room felt very very clean. Continental breakfast was enough, they had the basics, cereal, toast, fruit, yogurt, juice walffles. It was good for being free. Hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland. Would stay again and recommend to anyone else !
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your visit with us and you will be returning! It's great that you found our upgrades to our rooms so pleasant and added to your stay. We have upgrades such as new beds and bedding, all new lighting and extra outlets. We have added fridges to all our rooms making it so convenient and cost effective. We are very excited to see you return!

Summary: This was a great budget hotel for Disneyland.  There is a shuttle to Disneyland. The rooms were clean and spacious and the staff was very polite and helpful.  I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so excited to hear you will be back. We are in that perfect location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance, as well as just a quick walk to the Garden Walk where so many great places to dine are ready for you to enjoy. Bubba Gumps is my favorite!  We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I thought the entire hotel staff was over the top friendly! I noticed the rating was 2 out of 5 stars. I give it a 5. The Price is right and it is walking distance to  Disneyland and a good amount of restaurants.The rooms are clean. The parking lot is big and easy to park.My favorite thing about the hotel is the friendliness. This is my second time staying and I will always return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear that they are providing you with such friendly and helpful service. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: This is a lovely motel. It is super clean, has lovely beds and the nicest, most friendly staff. It is in an excellent location for visiting Disneyland and has lots of food places nearby. The free  breakfast is good and the pool is lovely and clean. They also have a laundry which  a was a bonus for us. We would definitely stay there again. Excellent value for money!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so great that you enjoyed your stay and even better to hear you will be back. I am glad that our staff provided you with that excellent service you so deserve and you enjoyed our new and updated rooms. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Perfect for what we wanted.  The hotel was clean, the people were friendly, the beds were comfortable.  We arrived early the staff allowed us to park for the day and do the paperwork for check in so upon our evening return from Disney we just needed to pick up a room key.  Breakfast was very crowded but they had people working in the breakfast room to help make things run as smoothly as possible with the large amount of people present.  Very basic breakfast but it was fine.  We stayed 2 nights, it was a great value.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's wonderful that you found us to be such a great value and you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know that they made your stay a great one with their customer service expertise. We do have a great breakfast. It's a terrific way to start your day. We do have additional seating for breakfast on our sundeck as well as the pool area. A lot of our guest's love to enjoy their breakfast while taking in the beautiful California sunshine. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: 1) Guy who checked me in changed my room from 2nd floor to 1st floor without any problems or charges.  This was very good for me.  Ron was very friendly and help out with info and directions during my stay.  The repairman gave me a ride in his cart when I checked out so I didn't have to carry my luggage to the office 2) CVS store and other stores just 1/2 block away for last minute supplies and shopping for souvenirs very reasonably priced and good hours. 3) Room was clean and in good condition.  A/C worked fine and very comfortable.  bathrooms clean and plenty of hot water for shower. 4) very close to both of the events I went to during my stay.  Easy to walk so no taxi was needed. 5) plenty of places to eat in the area from just sandwiches to very nice sit down dinners 6) area
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear that you found us so affordable and we fit into your budget. Our fee amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast do add up to a valuable stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do look forward to your next visit1

Summary: Nothing fancy but has what you need. Hair dryer, fridge and a/c (noisy). Sink separate from bathtub & toilet. Rooms in the far back will get you a view of the fireworks!  Plenty of parking, free breakfast has the basics (starts at 6 am), pool looked clean, noise between rooms was non-existant (we were in the far back). Free wi-fi worked well. Self-serve laundry facilities available, as well as vending machines.  Three minute walk to Cheescake Factory, California Pizza Kitchen, Bubba Gump's, etc. 10-13 minute walk to Disneyland Resort and 10 minutes to Anaheim Convention Centre.   Front desk was helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad to hear you made the right choice by staying with us. It is very ture we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as well as just minutes from several great places to shop and dine. It's great to hear you enjoyed our breakfast. It is a great way to start your day. Our free amenities such as complimentary breakfast, free wifi and free parking do add so much more value to your stay. We do look forward to seeing  you again soon!

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel multiple times for trips to Disneyland. When I read the reviews on trip advisor and other booking sites, I wasn't so sure about booking it. But some I've been there five or more times, I'm obviously happy with it. The woman that runs it is so sweet and always has a smile. The rooms are clean and it's really a good price for the close walk to Disneyland. I'm very happy I found this hotel.however, there are a couple of people who work the counter that are kind of weird and intimidating. Other than them, it's a really nice place.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so great to hear we exceeded your expectations.  Glad that we fit into your budget and you found us to be so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Have stayed there for many years. It gets better every...
Summary: Have stayed there for many years. It gets better every time. The up grades over the past few years is a great improvement.  You always know that it's going to be a good experience when you see the same employees there year after year. They like it, so you know that they have pride in their job,  so it comes down to the guest being treated well
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's always great to hear from repeat guests. We love to hear that you have enjoyed your stay every time  and you will keep coming back. We do pride ourselves in our guest service and take pleasure in providing you with that excellent service you so deserve. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This may not a five star hotel, but the staff is!!!!  I've stayed at this facility a few times now and am always amazed by the service. The rooms are clean, well supplied, have a fridge, microwave and coffee maker, and very adequate. But the staff is AMAZING. They are always kind, courteous, prompt and helpful and go out of their way to make your visit a positive one. I have stayed in much more expensive hotels and had much poorer service. Everyone, consistently, is kind and attentive. We have season passes to Disneyland and this is our "home" while we're there.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thanks so much for the compliments to our staff. Glad that you found them to be so amazing.  We do pride ourselves in excellent guest services and it is always our pleasure to entertain our guests and make sure they have an excellent stay. We are happy you will be back to visit us again in the future.

Summary: Clean Rooms - Excellent Front office service - Close to Anaheim Convention Center for D23 Expo - 15 minute walk to Disney Properties - Good restaurant close by -  would book this place again
