Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Great to hear that you had a great stay  and that you will be returning. Thanks for the compliments to our staff, it's always good to hear that they provided you with great service. We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I have no major complaints really. For the rate, you get what you would expect.  Service was good, the lady at the front desk was helpful. Looks dated on the outside, but is clean and obviously regularly maintained. Room was nicer than I expected. Only thing I didnt like was the lighting which was starkly white and made the room feel not so comfy. I suggest they change the lamp shades and lightbulbs to ones that give off a warmer glow. Carpet had a couple stains but nothing major. The first night arriving my tv didnt work. I called the front desk and they sent someone up to fix it immediately. Less than 5 minutes  someone was there and reset it.  I was impressed at the speed of response to my call.  Breakfast was okay,  I was hoping there'd be some eggs  and bacon but  what they
Manager Response: thank you for the review. Its always wonderful to hear we have exceeded our guest expectations.  It's great that our staff was so efficient and you received that excellent service you so deserve. So good to hear you will be returning! We do look forward to it.

Summary: A short walk all things considered.  Good communication.  Would stay again.  Had pretrip issues and the manager communicated clearly and helpfully.  Its not a 5 star but a nice hotel at a nice price.  15 minutes to the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's awesome you found us to be such a good value and you will be back to visit again. We do look forward to it.

Summary: Was looking for a place to stay for a few days in Anaheim near the attractions with walking distance. This place is next door to Bubba Gump restaurant, and the Anaheim Walk, and with 15 minutes walk of Disneyland. Easy to find and get out of on Katella Avenue. Used a rental car to get there. Was fully booked on Friday night, but thinned out out over the weekend, so got quite as the weekend went by. Get to breakfast early or else the place fills up and there is no where to sit or move. First morning I gave up and went out to Denny's. After that it was good. No real complaints and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. So glad to hear you will be back so see us again! We are so close to Disneyland as well as so many great places to shop and dine. This does make us a very convenient place to stay when visiting. We do have additional seating for breakfast on our Sundeck, as well as in the pool area. It's a refreshing place to enjoy the California sunshine along with a delicious breakfast. We are so looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It was a great stay. I have no complaints. For the price I paid, I got what I expected. Good breakfast, clean rooms, pool, quiet, and secure. If you are looking for a place close to Disney and/or the convention center, this is a good place to be.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland or attending an event at the Anaheim Convention center. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park and even closer to the Anaheim Convention center.  Glad to hear you had a great stay and we do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I was not expecting much when I booked the room considering how low the price was, but the room was more than comfortable and the customer service was excellent! Jesus, who helped me check out in the early hours, was very helpful, quick, and caring! I would recommend this hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so great you found us to be such a good value when staying with us. With our amenities such as free wifi and free parking, as well as a complimentary breakfast it all adds up to a lot of value to your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is so wonderful to hear that you received the wonderful customer service you so deserve. We do look forward to another visit next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Spent two nights here.  It's only a short walk to Disneyland, the pool and hot tub area was a great way to wind down after a day in the parks, breakfast included was quite nice, waffles made fresh were a highlight.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. You are correct we are very  nice and close to Disneyland. Just around the corner, and just a quick 15 minute walk to the front gate. The heated pool and hot tub is a great way to relax after a long day at the park isn't it? We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Had a fantastic stay at this hotel. Found it was great proximity to everything we wanted to visit and see. Ron and Cheryl were extremely helpful on checkout arranging for our pick up to the airport to come early thanks booked. Overall would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so glad you found staying with us so convenient. It's true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to Disneyland and so close to so many great places to shop and dine. thank you for the compliments to our staff. Its so wonderful you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: love the expansions nearby convenience stores,pharmacy!always love super 8 the upgraded rooms a plus!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's so fantastic that you found our upgraded rooms so great and that you found it made for a more enjoyable and comfortable stay. We are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland and so convenient to so many great places to shop and to dine. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Although our room had recently undergone a superficial renovation, the bathroom had not been touched. Dirty walls, old linoleum, ants crawling on the tub and sink along with a toilet that leaked constantly convinced us never to return. I requested a copy of my statement upon checkout and was told, based on how my reservation had been booked, that there was no way to print a copy. Unbelievably poor service. Cheap - yes. Convenient to walk to Disney- yes. Recommended? - Absolutely not.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the review. We have done a lot of recent renovations to our property, Our improvements have been outside as well as inside. As far as our improvements to the rooms, we have replaced the carpeting, repainted the walls put in all new decor such as new wall decor, new beds and bedding and all new Armoires, We have added additional outlets in all our rooms, and have upgraded our lighting with additional light fixtures to brighten the room.  We also have replaced our sink vanity with marble and they are so beautiful!  We have included fridges in all our rooms and they come standard with no additional charge. We have upgraded our tub/shower which has a water saving massage spray, and new curved shower rods. We are in process of putting tile in our bathrooms as well. We have put in all new AC units which are much more efficient  and ever so quiet. We are still in process of making additional improvements to the property, which does include a larger breakfast area and all new entrance for the lobby. Oh yes, and we  have a all new and beautiful lobby area as well that our guest love to enjoy when taking a quick break from walking from the park.  You did mention you requested a copy of your receipt.  We do apologize for the inconvenience, however we could not provide that for you because you booked and paid through a 3rd party. Vendors such as Expedia, or Hotels.com or even Orbitz  collect from you when you book it with them, and for your privacy and security, the rates that your pay are not disclosed to us. We do not have that information available, and we would always refer you to the 3rd party with whom you booked. In the future if you choose to book directly with us, we are more than happy to provide a receipt as you booked and paid us directly either online with Super 8, or on the phone. I am happy to know that you found us to be so convenient to the Disneyland park. We are very close, just a quick 15 minute walk. I do hope that you will change your mind and visit us again.

Summary: Hi,  The hotel room was reasonable and as I expected the room to be. The little improvement that can be made and have a great impact on a large portion of your customers is having good AC system in your breakfast area. My kids and wife were very uncomfortable when being in this area.  I appreciate you asking.  Leonardo
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are pleased to hear you found us so affordable and we fit into your budget. We do have AC in the breakfast room, I do apologize if you found it too warm. We keep the thermostat set at a very comfortable 70 degrees. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I so recommend this hotel nice, clean and so friendly right price too! Needed a room asap after a fun day at Disneyland and this was the only one with an available room üòÄ .. The staff is amazing Jesus was very understanding and helpful thank you super 8 ...
Manager Response: Thank you fro the review. Thank you as well for recommending us. We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and that you found our staff so amazing and helpful. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nicest Super 8 I have stayed in- good value.
Summary: Room was modern, well fitted and good value. Pool was a bonus although the grounds are mainly carpark. Breakfast provided was sensible for the price and a good start before a day in the Disney parks. Within a reasonably walking distance to Parks, bus to Knotts berry or Anaheim train station close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear that you found us to be such a good value. It's true our complimentary breakfast, as well as our free parking and free wifi do add more value to your stay. We are very convenient and within a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I have stayed at this location several times now.  I am always pleased with the cleanliness of the rooms and the staff. I've already booked this motel again for this October.  My girlfriend stayed with her son at this same motel in another room.  She's very particular about motels and she actually suggested that we stay there again in October.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its always great to hear from repeat guests! Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are very excited to know you will be back soon. We await your return!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for!
Summary: We (2 adults with 2 teenagers) stayed here to be within walking distance from Disneyland!  The towels were like sandpaper, the sink faucet had low pressure to rinse off your toothbrush and the shower's hot water went lukewarm very quickly.  The continental breakfast area was very small and over crowded with a bunch of scavengers!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank  you as well for choosing to stay with us when visiting Disneyland with your family. It is very true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Park entrance making it very convenient when staying with us. We do use top grade linens and towels that are approved by the Wyndham Worldwide hotel group. The Wyndham Worldwide corporation does have excellent  standards of operations, which of course is very evident in there professional rating  and worldwide existence. We are sorry to hear that you did not find them up to your standards of softness. Our water pressure is up to the city standard, and it certainly is strong enough to rinse off a toothbrush. If this was not the case, had we had been informed we would have had our maintenance staff take a look at it and make any adjustments needed. Unfortunately we were not informed of any issues with either the water pressure or the water temperature. We do have a 24 hour front desk and maintenance staff readily available to assist. Our staff does take pride in making things right for each and every guest so they can have a terrific stay. We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast every morning from 6 am to 9 am. Our breakfast features freshly baked waffles, cinnamon rolls, 3 kinds of cereals, Yogurt, fresh fruit, toast with jam and spread. We also offer 2 kinds of juice, hot chocolate, tea and milk. Most people find this to be a perfect way to start their day. We are sorry to hear that you did not find this to be an adequate breakfast.  Although it is  true our breakfast area is not as large as we would like it to be, so we are in process of enlarging and redesigning it and are very excited to see the results when it is finished. In the mean time, we do have additional seating in the pool area as well as our sundeck. The sundeck is actually a favorite spot to many of our guests. It's a great place to enjoy your morning coffee and breakfast as well as the beautiful southern California sunshine. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: this is on Katella, within 1.5 miles from walking distance to Disneyland, and lt is 3 blocks from the Anaheim Convention Center. I have stayed at this location several times, because I can walk to the Convention Center. There are restaurant close by. The area is great for walking at night time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's wonderful you found us so convenient when attending your event at the Anaheim Convention Center. We are just a quick 5 minute walk from the convention center, making it super convenient when staying here, especially with our free parking. We are also right next door to so many great places to dine and shop. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Best hotel experience in Disneyland area
Summary: This is the nicest Super 8 I've ever stayed at - and just 2 years ago I stayed at a different Super 8 in the Disneyland area. The rooms are very nice with better-than-average amenities. The pool and spa were very clean and nice. Breakfast included waffles along with all the standard fare. Every staff person I talked with was extremely friendly and helpful. I will be going back to this hotel every trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  So happy to hear you had such a great experience when staying with us.   We do have a wonderful complimentary breakfast that includes those wonderful freshly baked waffles. It's a great way to start your day. It's so wonderful that you will be coming back we do look forward to it! .

Summary Heading: Simple and Clean!  $109 + tax (2 nights= $255.20) Fit our Budget Perfectly!
Summary: Room was spacious enough for a family of 4. We did have air conditioner problems for the first hour but with the help of Jose Romo (maintenance guy), it was replaced by a new one. Breakfast was nothing special and way over crowded. But the hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland and several restaurants. We did purchase the Art Trolley pass at $22 for 4 people next hotel over (Ron at our front desk was very helpful with that info). It was worth it after all day& night walking in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear that you found us so affordable and we fit into your budget.. Our free amenities such as complimentary breakfast, free WIFI, and free parking all add more value to your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, so glad you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Fantastic value, close to Disneyland, plenty of parking and great service from Jesus at reception! Room was well maintained with air con. Only downside was that we spotted a cockroach crawling around 2 mornings in a row. This may be an anomaly but apart from that this place was great. Breakfast was good and convenient in the morning before heading out for the day.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so awesome to hear you found us to be such a fantastic value when visiting Disneyland. We are so very close as you say which does save on parking at the theme park. We offer free parking, free WIFI, and complimentary breakfast as well. All of these amenities do add up for a great value when on vacation. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. It's great to hear they are providing you with excellent guest service. We are here at the front desk for 24 hours and are available at any time to assist if needed. Please always let us know right away if there is any problem or concern during your visit so we have a chance to make things better for you during  your stay. We have maintenance staff here every day and we do have pest control as well as other routine maintenance scheduled regularly. I do apologize for any concerns.  We do have a wonderful breakfast including those warm freshly baked waffles Yummy! So happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: 4 nights in the motel near Disneyland
Summary: The people were very helpful and friendly and efficient.  The room was in great shape and always very clean.  The pool area was also very clean and nice.  Overall a great experience, like every year, that I would repeat again and recommend--especially for the price.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear you had such a great experience when staying with us. So great to hear you will be recommending us and even better to hear you will be back to see us again! We cant wait.

Summary: After going to Disneyland a couple of years ago and staying at the Motel 6 just a few blocks down, my wife and I decided to "upgrade" to the Super 8 Motel which was within walking distance from Disneyland. it only cost about $50 more than the Motel 6 so why not? When I called I asked if the hotel had a shuttle to Disneyland just in case my 5 year old was too tired to walk back home. They said "yes" they did have a shuttle. When we got there we noticed right away that the pool was about half the size of the Motel 6 pool. Bummer. Then when we got into the room the room was smaller too! Since we left Disney so late, midnight, we wanted to take the shuttle back, only to find out that we had to pay $5 for the shuttle. Which was actually the city shuttle to and from the theme parks!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, and thank you for choosing us when visiting the Disneyland park. It's true we do not operate our own shuttle service to and from the Disneyland park. The ART shuttle (Anaheim Resort Transit operated by the city of Anaheim) does service most the motels/hotels in the area surrounding Disneyland. This does include us as well as the Motel 6.  They use the ART as well. This shuttle does pick up right next door and operates an hour before park opening till an hour after the park closes. It runs about every 20 minutes and there is a small charge for taking the bus. We do have a few guests who do like to take the shuttle, particularly after a long day at the park. We are just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk to the park entrance, its one and a half blocks from here. I do apologize if there was any confusion or misunderstanding when you called and asked if there was a shuttle to the Disneyland park. There is indeed a shuttle, however it is not operated by us the Super 8. Information on rates etc for the ART would be available through their website. We never quote the rates for their services as they are set and collected by the ART service. We do have a nice heated pool and hot tub here on property. The pool does go as deep as 8 feet and is 40 feet by 80 feet in dimension. We do have a complimentary breakfast that is served from 6 am to 9 am every day. This does include those wonderful freshly baked waffles that are so yummy. We also have fresh fruit, a variety of cereals, toast, juice, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, yogurt and cinnamon rolls as well. I do apologize if you found this did not work for you and your schedule while you were here. We do have a great housekeeping staff here to assist, as well as a front desk staff available 24 hours. We do pride ourselves on how clean our rooms are and always want to exceed our guest's expectations.I do apologize if this was not the case.  I do not show that anything was reported to the front desk regarding the size of the room or the cleanliness. Please always notify us so we can have the chance to make things right. I am sorry to hear you say you will not be back, and do hope that you change  your mind. We do appreciate you choosing to stay with us while visiting Disneyland.

Summary: On arrival we were greeted by Jesus at front desk very helpful as we arrived after midnight. The rooms were huge 2xQueen beds so comfortable big fridge for our own supplies. Great shower with hot water. The rooms were clean and the smell of freshness was awsome. 10mins walk to Disney great location next to great dining and shopping. We have stayed many times different locations and feel this is the best value for room size and cost. Id stay again. Thanks Super8
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's wonderful to hear you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay! We do have a 24 hour front desk, so check in at any hour is available. Glad you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms which do include a fridge as well as those new fresh and crisp linens every morning.  Its true we are so close to Disneyland as well as so many great places to shop and dine. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We spent four nights at the super 8 with our grandchildren. The hotel was walking distance to everything we needed. The theme parks and local restaurants were a short walk. The kids loved the pool and I soaked in the jacuzzi. Great memories!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's so great to know you choose to stay with us when creating those very special once in a lifetime memories with your grandchildren and family.  It really helps particularly with a large family to be so close and convenient to the Disneyland park, are well as all kinds of places to shop and dine. Our heated pool and hot tub offers a place to relax and for the kids to play after a long day at the park. So many families take advantage of this when visiting, glad you and your grandchildren enjoyed this time together. We do look forward to another visit from you and your family in the future.

Summary: The room was perfect. Basic and clean, well decorated for the area. Easy walk to Disneyland. Breakfast area was simple and Danielle made it enjoyable by making a point of remembering who everyone was and where they came from. Marion at the front desk made our stay fun right from the start with his smile and suggestions! Loved it, would definitely recommend and would stay here again no problem.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Its terrific you found you got more value for your dollar with staying with us. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It's great you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. So glad to hear you will be recommending us and even better to know you will be back! We do look forward to it.

Summary: Even though this hotel is convenient to Disneyland, I booked it because every other hotel in the area was way overpriced.   The staff was friendly.  The room was pretty much bare bones and nothing special but in the end was fairly quiet and I slept well.  It is walking distance to lots of area attractions, shopping and dining.  I even walked to the Angels Stadium in about 30 minutes and felt safe walking back after the game.  Wifi was free and seemed to be pretty strong. The free breakfast had waffles but no meat or eggs but there is an Ihop just around the next block if you need a better breakfast.  If you are looking for a no frills room at a decent rate then this place should fit your needs.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a block and half away, 15 minutes walk to the front gate.  We are also just minutes from several great places to shop and dine. The Garden Walk has some of my favorites! Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory, PF Chang's are just a few. So glad  to know you found us to be so convenient and we fit into your budget so well. The Angels Stadium is very close as you say. It is a nice 30 minute walk, or if you prefer, the ART (Anaheim Resort Transit operated by the City of Anaheim) Does pick up right next door and goes to and from the Angels Stadium. Please check out their website for more details on schedules and rates.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff, its great you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We have a 24 hour front desk, and are available to provide you with that excellent customer service you so deserve at any time. We do offer free WIFI and as you say it is quite strong. We recently upgraded our WIFI system. It boasts 20 commercial grade access points, powered by a 100 Mb fiber optic cable. It's very fast and reliable. We are glad to hear you found our breakfast a great way to start your day. Those fresh baked waffles are wonderful! We also have 3 kinds of cereal, toast with jam and spread, cinnamon rolls, yogurt, fresh fruit, Hot chocolate, coffee, tea, juice and milk. We are very conveniently located to some great places to enjoy a hot breakfast any time of the day. IHOP and Denny's are open 24 hours! Mimis Cafe is one of my favorites for any meal, breakfast lunch or dinner. All are just a few minutes walk from here. So good to hear you had a quiet and restful sleep. Our rooms are super clean with all new furnishings, including new mattress's. We have added fridges to all our rooms for more convenience and to help with the dining budget when on vacation or business.  Other features such as additional outlets, larger flat screen TVs, Single serve coffee makers and blow dryers all come standard in all our rooms. Additional bedding and pillows are tucked in the room for easy access and comfort. We do look forward to another visit from you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: A 15-minute walk to Disney parks - save on parking. Rooms were clean and renovated recently. Pool + hot tub were nice. You will not find a closer place for this price.   Breakfast was chaotic - too many guests for such a small serving area. Breakfast ended at 9 am - I think that 10 am would be better, but this is not a deal breaker. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location the best option when visiting Disneyland. It's true we are very close, just a quick 15 minute walk from the park. Saving on parking at Disneyland is a great way to help with your budget. We have recently upgraded all our rooms. I am so glad you liked the improvements! We have new carpeting, new mattress's and all new furnishings and decor. We have added fridges to all our rooms as well along with all new light fixtures. We are still working on improving all areas of the motel including the breakfast room and dining area. We know it is a very popular place! We do have additional seating at this time on our wonderful sundeck, or in the relaxing pool area. We are so excited to hear you will be back, we do look forward to it!

Summary: The location to Disneyland was great. The room was quite old but clean and adequate for our needs. The check in was easy and the price was fair. The complimentary breakfast was good with the usual menu. Has a small pool that we would've enjoyed but we were anxious to go to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great that we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. Our amenities such as the heated pool and hot tub, free parking, and free wifi do help with the cost of your stay. We do look forward to seeing  you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We needed a moderately priced hotel near Disneyland and this Super 8 was just what we needed.  The room was clean and the beds very comfy.  We slept great and were surprised how quiet it was seeing it was booked to capacity! The quick 15 minute walk to the park was safe and easy.The staff were so helpful and kind explaining all the perks of their establishment
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to know you had such a super stay with us. We are so close to Disneyland as you say just 15 minutes walk to the park entrance. It is very safe and easy to get to from  here. It's great you found our staff so informative and helpful during your stay as well. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and were so impressed! As soon as we arrived, staff were so friendly and helpful. Then we got to our room - wow! For a motel, the room was great! Beautiful, clean, a massive TV with cable and a great air con that kept the room nice and cool.   My only critiques of this place are that there are no elevators so lugging luggage up the second storey was a mission. There's only two stories though so it wasn't a massive issue. Also the sink isn't in the bathroom, but that wasn't an issue really, as I was expecting far worse for a motel!  A quick walk to Disneyland, Cheesecake Factory, free parking, a pool and hot tub - we would definitely stay again!!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the awesome review. Glad to know you had such and amazing stay with us. We have upgraded all our rooms with larger TVs new beds and bedding as well as new carpeting and decor.We have also added fridges to the rooms! It's true we do not have an elevator, but are more than happy to assign a first floor room. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We went to VidCon 2015, including Disney day. This Super 8 is about 2 blocks from the convention center and 3 blocks from Disney Resorts. We parked on our 1st day and never moved the car until we left. There are restaurants, convenience stores, a CVS all within a block. Our room was very clean. The staff was great and always there to help. The laundry facilities worked well and the pool is well maintained. I'm sure we'll see them next year for VidCon 2016!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's great you found us so convenient when attending the convention. We are just about a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention center. Just a half block away, and the Disneyland park is just 15 minutes. A block and a half from here. Its wonderful to hear that our staff was so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We had rented a room at Super 8 mainly because it is very close to Disneyland in Anaheim (15 min walk). The room was quite big, two queen-sized beds, nice and clean. Staff were very friendly and serviceminded. The hotel also has a pool, but we did go into the pool because we did not have time for it. I can only recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear that they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve. We are in a perfect location as you say when visiting Disneyland. It's just 15 minutes walk to the park entrance from here making it so convenient. Thank you so much for recommending us! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My Wife and celebrating our 30th wedding anniversary and when we got to our room we found it was very clean and well kept. We enjoyed our stay and we will be back. My wife and I love Super 8 it was located near Disneyland and Downtown Disney. We could have not asked for a better time and we look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for staying with us when celebrating your 30th wedding anniversary! Congratulations! It's so true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance and so close to so many great places to grab a bite to eat or shop. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and you will be back! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Very comfortable, clean and walking distance to Disney.
Summary: This was my second budget conscious trip to Disney and really I will never pay to go to larger hotel chains again. In all reality you are never at the hotel so you really just need a safe environment, comfy bed and shower. The water pressure was awesome and the water was always perfect temp! That is very unusual with older motel setups. The toiletries were unusual high quality for a Super 8 but seemed this location is actually owned by Wyndham resorts so you will get the expensive shampoo/conditioner that they supply to their hotels which was amazing! I didn't utilize the food in the breakfast area but had plenty of morning coffee between 6am-9am. Breakfast consisted of Raisin Bran, frosted flakes, white & brown toast, individual yogurts, instant oatmeal, super 8 packaged
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. I am so happy to hear you had such a comfortable and enjoyable stay with us. We are very convenient to the Disneyland park. It's just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We are also right next door to so many great places to shop and dine. The cheesecake factory is one of my favorites! I did want to let you know we do have safes available at the front desk free of charge that are perfect for storing your passports in. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It was a great hotel for the price. The walk to Disneyland was very short...ten minutes. The beds were comfy. The room was perfect size for the three of us.The only complaint is the gap under the door because you hear the construction going on around us. They also don't have elevators,  but it's only two stories high.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's wonderful you found us so perfect for your family trip to Disneyland. It is true we are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park, making it so convenient. With our free parking it makes it such a value. So glad we fit into your budget and we are awaiting your return!

Summary: All was very good. Jesus, the receptionist was very nice and looked for our necessities. All the process of check in was very fast, in just minutes we were ready to go to our room. The room also was comfortable and clean. I will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its so awesome to hear you had such a great stay with us, and even better to hear you will be back. Thank you for the compliments to our staff.  I am happy to hear they were so efficient and so helpful to you during your check in and your stay. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: First time staying at Super 8 and will definitely stay again. We used Super 8 as a base while we travelled around LA. Very close to freeways and all kinds of shopping, car hire and Disneyland. We stayed for 6 nights in a room at the back from the main road. Rooms very tidy everything worked, free wi fi, housekeepers lovely and the girls in the breakfast room each morning were so helpful answering any  tourism questions. We didn't go to Disneyland as we have already been 4 times but if you would like somewhere reasonably priced with free breakfast each morning this is the place to stay. Super 8  were very accommodating as we arrived early from Australia getting us into our room at around 11am instead of 3pm Thank you so much for a wonderful stay, can not wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's wonderful you had such a great stay! So excited to hear you will be back! We do look forward to it. As you say we are so close to so many great places of interest here in Anaheim and the surrounding areas. We are just minutes from the freeway entrances as well making it so very convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's great they were so helpful in helping you plan your vacation while here in Anaheim.

Summary: I think this is a very good hotel.We really enjoy it.We had a good time.The breakfast is really good.And the waiter is good too.I really enjoy it.The bed is very comfortable.I love this trip.Anywar just good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Great to know you had such a good stay with us. Glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and staff. We are just a quick walk to the Disneyland entrance as you say. It's terrific you found it so convenient. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was in a great location. A ten minute walk to Disneyland. Restaurants right around the corner. You have a view of the fireworks show each night near the back of the hotel. The staff was very knowledgeable and sweet. The only complaint I have is that the walls are paper thin. Other guests were loud and rude. We woke up several times in the middle of the night due to screaming kids and drunk adults. The location and free breakfast each morning made up for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear you had a great stay with us. We are a quick walk to the Disneyland park as well as right next door to several delicious places to dine. I am glad you found our location so convenient.It is so fun to be able to see the fireworks from here. Our sundeck above the lobby is really a perfect spot as well. I am happy you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly! We do have a 24 hour front desk staff, so if in the future noise from other guests keeps you awake, please give us a call anytime so we can assist.  We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: My family and I recently stayed at this hotel, for 2 night to be close to the Park during our stay.  10 to 15 Min walk to the park, very Quiet room, great and quiet Air conditioner in room, Great Breakfast, Waffles, Cereal, fruit, Pastries, Juices, Coffee great choices for Free. Free parking and Internet WIFI is very good. will go back for sure. Fast check in & out also.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's great to hear you will be back! We are only 15  minutes to the Disneyland park entrance as you say. It does make it very convenient when staying with us. It does make for a more valuable stay as well with our free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast as well. We do look forward to another visit from you soon!

Summary: This place was perfect for a visit to Disneyland - it's about a 15 minute walk away and there are a few eateries nearby.  Rooms are comfortable and had free wifi which was quite good.  Breakfast wasn't much and the pool was small but that didn't bother us. Fine for a visit to Disneyland though.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are right next door to the Garden walk for shopping and great dining experiences as well. Glad to hear you had such a great experience when staying with us. We look forward to seeing  you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: My family and I stayed for a week went to Disney and the Beaches. Mini waffles delicious, room cleaned every morning. Front desk very friendly  All around convenient restaurant's walking distance. .. We enjoyed the spacious room
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am so happy to hear you found us to be so convenient. It's true we are in a great location and so close to some great places to dine and shop as well as just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's great to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We cant wait to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The room was clean and quiet and the bed was comfortable.  The water temp never got hotter than mildly warm.  After 14 hours at Disneyland, the 10 minute walk back to the hotel seemed very long for an old woman!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us when celebrating your anniversary. We are a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, and this although not long can seem that way after walking all day at the Disneyland park. The ART shuttle does pick up right at the park and will drop you off right next door. It is a great way to get back and forth when you do not wish to walk. It's great to hear you found our rooms to be so clean and comfy. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Walking Distance to Disney a Huge Plus!
Summary: The Super 8 near the Disneyland Resort had very good service and a reasonable price especially considering we stayed during peak season.  We could walk to and from Disneyland in 10 minutes which saved us the $17 per day parking fee at the park.  The room was clean and the staff took care of it well for us.  The free breakfast was a bonus for days we didn't want to take time to go out.  The only negative was the room was a bit small for four, but it was well maintained and cozy, so not really a complaint.  Great value!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's true it is a big plus that we are just 15 minutes to the Disneyland park entrance. It does save on that parking fee at the park, seeing we have free parking here. Other amenities such as free wifi, and free breakfast to add to the value of your stay. Many other choices do charge for use of their wifi, as well as parking and some do not include a breakfast. We find these added amenities as well as our in room fridges do add to the value of your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, it's great  to hear they were so friendly and helpful during your stay. We cant wait till your next visit with us!

Summary: It's nice to know that there will always be someone there to help you; even in a busy area such as Anaheim. I and 4 others arrived, exhausted, wanting to explore Disney and needing a place to stay the night. The man in charge at the time was very patient and understanding and was willing to work around the motel's busy booking schedule to help us have a place to stay the night. It was so nice and comforting to know that such generosity still exists.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am so glad that we were here to assist you when you were in town looking for a place to stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, Its wonderful to hear that our staff was here and was able to accommodate you and that you had such an enjoyable stay. We do hope that you return again soon.

Summary Heading: My #1 Backup Hotel Choice for Disneyland
Summary: This hotel has become my #1 backup hotel choice for when I visit Disneyland with my family. The price is incredibly reasonable, the rooms are average (but not bad by any means), there is a free, modest breakfast (I typically only drink coffee for breakfast so it's perfect for me), and there is no parking fee (at least not at the time I went). The only thing is that I have gotten spoiled by staying at hotels across the street from Disneyland, and with this one, the walk is a bit farther (15-20 mins). In the morning, when you're fresh, it's no problem. It's at night when you're exhausted that you really notice it. This is really the only reason it's my backup choice. So when the other hotel I typically stay at is either completely booked, or when they jack up the price, I will
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us while visiting Disneyland. We are a quick 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park entrance as you say. We do realize there are some closer choices. We do offer free parking, free wifi and a complimentary breakfast, which many of the choices closer to the Park entrance do not offer.  Realizing this does not make for a shorter walk than the 15 minutes, we do have the ART shuttle that does pick up right next door. There is a small fee, however, its a great way to get to the park with ease as they drop you off right at the entrance. We do hope to see you again in the future when you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: Located within walking distance of Disneyland, the motel must be one of the best value deals around. Rooms and pool are clean, breakfast (included) is much better than expected for the price and the staff are really friendly and helpful. Internet is a bit weak - but that was the only negative.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's great to hear we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. Our free amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast all add more value to your stay with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so glad you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We look forward to another visit from you in the future.

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 6 nights with no complaints. The staff was very friendly and helpful 24/7. They offered complementary breakfast, (the room was a little cramped) and laundry. (But it was very expensive, I don't recommend doing laundry there unless you need to) The room was extremely clean and organized. There is no problem of maids "stealing" residences items. The motel felt very safe.  If you're staying here for Disneyland, I suggest taking Uber to the park and back. When reviews say its a "15 minute walk" THEY MEAN IT. You're going to be walking all day in the park, and an extra 15 minutes of walking before and after makes the day a little longer. Uber cost exactly $4 to get to the park and vice versa. Not bad. You will hear the 9:30 PM fireworks every night
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful you had such a magical stay! We are as you say just 15 minutes from the Disneyland park entrance. For those who do not wish to walk the ART shuttle does pick up right next door and is really very affordable especially if you plan on riding more than one time. I am so happy you mentioned the fireworks viewing from here. A great place to see them is on our sundeck right above the lobby, or in the pool area as well. It does add to the magic doesn't it? We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: Very convenient close to shops, restaurants even a 7/11 which came in handy close to Disneyland infact its only a 15 minute walk to Disney. Rooms are Clean, staff friendly and helpful. our room was near the breakfast room on the ground floor which breakfast is only served between 6-9am and is included in the cost of your stay. As we were jetlagged we awoke past the breakfast hours so we didn't get to have the breakfast except for the last day of our stay we specifically woke up earlier to experience it and because we had to checkout at 11am. The orange juice was awful it taste like water. Its a very average breakfast nothing to rave on about but good enough to get something in you like cereals or toast. They do make fantastic waffles though I must say. The only negative I have
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are in a fantastic location as you say. We are just 5 minutes walk to the Anaheim Convention center, and about 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park. I am glad you found us so convenient. We do have many rooms to choose from. Some of our guest's prefer a room by the pool, or the breakfast room near the office. Others prefer a room facing the Disneyland park, and others prefer a room towards the back away from the parking area. Please give us a  call in the future before arrival so we can have you in the perfect room location when you arrive. I am glad you found our staff so friendly and helpful during  your stay. We do look forward to another visit from you in the future!

Summary: Near Disneyland is a relative term, yes it is about a 15 min walk to the front gates. When you have walked 8-10 miles in the park close is better on the return trip especially if you have young children. Rooms were quaint and cozy, towels were like sand paper, but the shower had great pressure and plenty of hot water, need to upgrade 1970 AC units in the rooms, and the maids don't need to shut off the AC when they finish cleaning the rooms. After a full day at Disney I would like the room to be at least 70 when I return.  Also if you plan on riding ART you need to go elsewhere to purchase tickets they don't have a kiosk in the lobby. Front desk staff was very nice and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. As you say we are a 15 minute walk from the Disneyland park. It can seem far after a long day at the Disneyland park this is true. The ART Shuttle does pick up right at the entrance and will take you here where you are dropped off right next door. You can purchase a one way ticket from them at a Kiosk at the park. Tickets can be purchased at the Garden walk location right next door to us. There is a  stop right next door to us  where you pick it up and it comes about every 20 minutes and starts running an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. It is a very convenient way to travel back and forth if you do not wish to walk. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and have included new AC units. Thanks again for the review, we do look hope to see you again next time you visit the Disneyland park.

Summary: As long as you don't mind the 10 to 15 minute long jaunt to Disney (which can be tiring at the end of the day), aren't very claustrophobic (the rooms are a bit small), and doesn't mind the fact that the pool is in the parking lot, just book it.   Now, there are people who will take pause at first arrival. Again, the pool is in the parking lot, the motel looks a tad on the seedy side and you're not as close to the Harbor Blvd Disney entrance as some may like. If you have the money and these things give you pause, then you should probably stay on property. But if you don't mind walking, put your perceptions away and don't get your wallet out to pay for an egergeriously overpriced Howard Johnson room just so you can cut your commute.  Once you step inside, you'll immediately fall
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It's wonderful that you had such a great stay and that we exceeded your expectations. Our free parking is a great  value this is true, and we do allow for parking after check out. This does make it very convenient and cost effective when visiting the Disneyland park. We are right next to the Garden Walk as you say. There are several great places to dine and shop there. We are also quite close to several locations right across from the Disneyland park. It's great to hear you will be recommending us and you will be back!

Summary Heading: Breakfast with Daniella was a great way to start the day
Summary: We were travelling/staying with a group of 30. Rooms were clean and serviced daily, pool was lovely. The location was great - close to a variety of restaurants convenience stores and Disney Land. Staff were very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We loved having your group stay with us. We are really in a great location for those traveling as a group whether it be for a convention at the Anaheim convention Center, or a group trip to Disneyland. We are delighted that you had a terrific stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's great to know they were so friendly and helpful during your visit with us. We do hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Fantastic location great breakfast , free wifi and only a 10 minute walk to the parks , comfortable room  with fridge and coffee maker provided , worth the stay  , heated pool free parking and surrounded by a good selection of  chain restaurants , and helpful and friendly staff
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, So great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We do have free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast as well. All of these amenities do add up to a great value. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park, and right next door to several great places to shop and dine. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know they provided you with such great customer service. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Nice spacious room with comfy pillows but gave me an occupied room at check in
Summary: So another hotel tried in the Anaheim area.  I have come to realise that when we travel to Disney we spend such a small amount of time in the room that all we need is a comfy bed to fall back into and this ticked the boxes.  The room was nice and spacious - well equipped with a spacious fridge.  I read reviews that the walk to the park was 9 minutes, I would say it's more like 15 minutes until you are standing outside one of the main entrances to either Disneyland or California Adventure.  The walk is doable and wasn't too bad - we have been spoiled before by staying a bit closer but my kids (12,14 and 17) never complained at the end of a 16 hour day about the walk back.  The air conditioning unit was new and was awesome at regulating the room temperature.  We left it off during
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's true we are a block and  a half from the Disneyland Resort entrance. It's about a 15 minute walk. We do have the ART bus that picks up right next door for those who do not wish to walk. It's very convenient and stops every 20 minutes. It starts running an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after the park closes. Its great to know you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast with our freshly made waffles. They are so delicious! I do apologize for any confusion upon check in. I assure you this is a rare occurrence. I am glad that everything worked out and you had a great stay. Looking forward to your return.

Summary: This Super 8 looks as if it was built in the 50's. I cringed thinking the inside was going to be bad.  This is truly a case of not judging a book by its cover. The rooms were recently remodeled with fresh bedding ,art and the best part ...brand new carpet! The front desk guys Ron and Jesus were very friendly ,it was as if they were welcoming us into their homes! Awesome Awesome Awesome! The only thing that could have made this little gem better would be hotter water.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you loved our newly remodeled rooms! You are correct we have upgraded all our rooms with new beds new bedding as well as adding fridges to all our rooms. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. It's always great to hear they are providing great customer service. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Really nice people, had a nice stay. Ron at the front desk was very welcoming, and Danielle took great care of us at breakfast each morning. Next time I would request a room away from the Garden Walk parking garage. On Saturday night it was noisy in the middle of the night.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad to hear our staff was so attentive and provided you with that excellent service you deserve. It's great you found our location to be so convenient. It's true we are just 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: location is good and front desk friendly but all that is moot if your shower floods and you can't shower before bed, cant go to bed until they come fix it, then wait until the morning to shower sacrificing time for sleep or getting to the parks. Motels like these have a simple of job of providing place to sleep and shower. The pool seems nice and the free breakfast and wifi is nice, but I will not recommend it nor stay there again, not the staff's fault, but one bad experience is enough with so many options in the area
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location near Disneyland, but check the hot water
Summary: We were joking that this trip to the LA-area was going to be 'Super', i.e. a Super 8 trip. We'd just come from a couple of nights at the Super 8 in Culver City, which we enjoyed, and had high expectations for this hotel in Anaheim. It was easy to get to, and the exterior appeared well maintained. The guy who checked us in was pleasant enough and gave us all the info we needed, including where to find our room (this is quite a large hotel) and the WiFi password (which worked well). With two floors to the hotel we did not get a parking spot right outside our room, but parking was readily available and we never felt that we had to compete for spots. Our room wasn't as nice as the hotel in Culver City. Same general idea in decor, only we got an unvacuumed green rug this time (a pet
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad you found our location to be so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We are about a 15 minute walk from the entrance. It's a block and a half. For those who do not wish to walk there is the ART shuttle that picks up right next door. I am happy that you found our rooms so comfortable and you liked our amenities such as the fridges in the room and free wifi. We do have a wonderful breakfast that is complimentary as well. Those freshly made waffles are so good! I am glad you found our breakfast staff so efficient and helpful. I do apologize for any issues with the hot water. We do have a 24 hour front desk as well as maintenance available and ready to assist. I really do appreciate you recommending us. We do look forward to another visit from you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It was so close to Disneyland we walked to and from Disneyland ! They also have menus of food that deliver to the hotel which was awesome! No one wants to still go out after a long day . I'm staying here everytime we go to Disneyland !
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's so great to hear you had such a great stay and even better to hear you will be back! We do have a variety of great restaurants that do deliver. After a long day at the park, it certainly is convenient. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: It was an easy process to check in. The front desk was helpful. The room was cozy and comfortable. I liked the fact it was close to disneyland. They also offered complimentary breakfast,overall pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Disneyland. I am so glad to hear you found our rooms so comfortable and our staff to be so helpful and friendly. We do offer a great complimentary breakfast and we have added fresh baked waffles to our menu! So delicious. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Good rooms and good location you can find restaurants, convenience store, and this girl Michell knows how to sell everything the motel has discount tickets, she gave us  Bubba Gump coupon we were fascinated with her services. We hope to come back next year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Our location is very convenient as you say, just minutes away from  some very great restaurants and places to shop. Disneyland is just a quick 15 minute walk. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff, I am glad that you you found them to be so helpful and friendly. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights on our first trip to Disneyland. The rooms are spacious, clean and well equipped. Location is excellent and a 10 minute walk to the park well worth the price which is considerably less than some others. The staff made the stay all the more enjoyable the girls in the breakfast room were stars always pleasant and made time for everyone. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am delighted you had a great stay with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad you always found them to be so pleasant and helpful. We pride our selves in guest service and do our very best to exceed your expectations every time.

Summary Heading: Good location, good price, you get what you pay for.
Summary: This is usually our go to place for spur of the moment trips to Disneyland.  They are a few blocks away and only about a 15 minute walk to the gate.  They are usually one of the cheaper places in the area.  The rooms are old, dated and not very insulated from noise, but you can usually sleep pretty well, just bring ear plugs if you don't like noise.  Ask for a room away from the front desk so you don't hear people coming and going from the street or to and from the lobby.  They have a free breakfast each morning that gets very busy.  They offer cereal, fruit(apples and oranges) toast and little waffles that you toast.  Not bad.  They have had some issues with their pool so beware.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am so happy you found our location to be so convenient while visiting the Disneyland park. It's also wonderful to hear we fit into your budget. With our complimentary breakfast and free wifi as well as free parking it does add much more value to your stay. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: Good price, good size rooms, comfortable beds, free wifi, swimming pool. This motel has everything. The breakfast has a reasonable supple - cereals, yogurts,  breads, waffles, drinks hot and cold.  Great position opposite Disneyland and many restaurants and shops. Short drive to everything. Myself and my 2 teenage boys stayed for 5 nights and are returning for another few nights because it is such a good motel. Will not even look anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland. Just minutes from the Disneyland park. Its a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. It's wonderful you enjoyed our breakfast. We have recently upgraded our breakfast and it now includes freshly baked waffles, so yummy! We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The room I stayed in was a big room with a nice comfy bed. I was impressed with the cleanliness of the room and the size of it. Its about a ten minute walk to Disneyland and there are shops a close 5 minute walk away. Its a good location. There was a nice roof top that has a lovey view of the Disneyland fireworks. they had fast wifi as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you enjoyed the fireworks from our sundeck. It's a perfect place to see them. It's also a wonderful place to enjoy your breakfast in the morning. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable room for a stay near Disneyland.
Summary: I have stated here three times now and have had a relaxing stay each time.  The hotel is close enough to Disneyland that you can walk there (if you are fit).  There is plenty of parking so if you do drive to the parks, you will not have to worry about not having a space when you get back.  Housekeeping does a great job of sprucing up the room every day and the front desk staff is responsive to your needs and concerns. I cannot talk about the breakfast or the pool because when I go to this hotel, it is for Disneyland and spend all of my time there.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. So glad you returned and were so happy with your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they are providing you with that excellent service  you so deserve. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Very impressed with Super 8!! The rooms were clean, and spacious, and we enjoyed the breakfast that they provided. Everyone was always polite and happy to assist us in anything we needed. Also, Ron was incredibly helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We have upgraded all of our rooms with new furnishings new carpeting, new beds and bedding. We have also added extra outlets, and fridges to all of our rooms. It's great you found the room to be so awesome. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Stayed here as a couple for three nights whilst visiting Disneyland. Hotel was available for early check in and was extremely clean and newly updated. The aircon was the loudest I have ever heard and did cause a bit of a issue through the our stay but we were only in at night. Very close to Disneyland - we walked there in 10 minutes which saved us $17 parking each day which was great! Free parking and breakfast was great too - what more could you want! Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's terrific you had such a wonderful stay with us. It's true our free amenities such as free wifi, free parking, and complimentary breakfast does add to the value of your stay.  We are very happy to hear you will be back.

Summary Heading: Our Annual Visit to the  USA
Summary: Once again we stayed at Super 8 Anaheim, as usual our room was available for early entry. Staff, Peter and Ron were welcoming and helpful as usual. the room was clean and comfortable, noise was no problem, Disneyland is around the corner and our rental car company is across the road. We are planning next years visit to the USA and will again stay with Peter and his staff at Super 8.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. Thank you very much for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The room was real nice beds are really nice there are so many pillows  nice and clean very close  to Disneyland and restaurants with in walking distance. I would do more reviews if the Web site make write at least 200 characters
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you had such a great stay. We are so close to Disneyland as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk and right next door to so many great places to shop and dine. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I stayed here when I went to Disneyland. Since I planned to spend most of my time at the parks, I was just looking for a good deal on a place to stay. This place was cheap, but the rooms weren't what you'd expect from the price. Everything was clean and nice. The bed was very comfy which was perfect after a long day at Disneyland. It's also withing walking distance from the park but there is also a bus stop right out from of the motel. I would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I think it's wonderful you found us to be such a convenient place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park. It's true we are a quick walk, just 15 minutes, or there is the ART shuttle that picks up right next door. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: A Wonderful place to Stay. Walking Distance to Disneyland with Free W-Fi and Breakfast Bar!
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised on how lovely the Hotel was. The rooms were very well done with nice furnishings with comfy beds along with nice and new towels. The room comes with a fridge and FREE Wi-Fi with a pretty decent connection too.  The FREE Breakfast Bar was a nice plus along with a clean and a nicely maintained outdoor pool. I almost forgot about the FREE Parking too! The staff were amazing as well. They made you feel like you were welcome members of the family. Finally I would love to point out a few of the people that really shinned during our stay.  Manager Cheryl was a pleasure to talk during our recent visit. She was very attentive to ours as well as other guest‚Äôs needs were always met during the entire stay. Danielle was also another person that always greeted us
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We sure are glad to hear you had a wonderful stay. It's very true we are so convenient when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick 15 minute walk and you are at the parks entrance. We are also so close to several great places to shop and dine as well. It's wonderful you found our free amenities such as our Free wifi and complimentary breakfast so valuable. We have free parking as well. This adds to the value of your stay this is true. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. Its great to hear they are providing  you with that great service you so deserve. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland Park. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: As nice as a Motel can be!
Summary: We spent most of our time at Disneyland, so the quality of our hotel choice wasn't our top priority. The Motel is fairly clean. It looks to be updated with Californian Decour. The staff was really nice. A woman named Cheryl helped us check in. I was tired & a little sick from the plane ride, so it was nice to have a friendly receptionist there to help us with a smooth check-in. I could tell she enjoys her job. Free breakfast was okay, but hey, it was free, so I can't complain. The pool was nice. Nothing special just your average pool but a nice place to relax. The motel is very close to restaurants and shopping. Right next door is a Bubba Gump shrimp. It's a short Walk to a CVS, Coffee Bean, & 7-11. Disneyland was just a few blocks away. It is nice to not have to pay the
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Its terrific you found us to be so convenient. It's true we are just 15 minutes from the Disneyland park, and just minutes from several great places to shop and places to eat. We do have a great breakfast that is complimentary. We have upgraded our breakfast with those delicious freshly made waffles. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy to hear that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. I am also excited to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub. It is a wonderful place to relax after a long day at the Disneyland park. We do look forward to another visit from you next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: REVIEW OF Cheryl the front desk helper
Summary: I am writing to tell you how nice and professional the front desk girl Cheryl was we were there June 15 through the 17th and she was exceptionally polite helpful and she was a real deligh to deal with I never write to anyone about anyone this is honestly my first time.  We ere on vacation 3 weeks and she was by far the best employee of all the places we went including Disneyland park employees which is hard to beat!  THANK YOU. KATHRYN SMITH 951 265 3162
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy to hear you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us. Its always wonderful to know that our staff is providing you with that over the top service that you so deserve.  We do hope to see you again next time you are in the Disneyland area.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by all aspects of the hotel from the time of check-in to seeing the room for the first time.  The room was well decorated and had a good layout.  The only suggestion I would say is to allow the window to open a little bit.  I sleep with the door open to allow a small breeze to come in.  I would also think this would allow for the company to same money on the a/c. I also, appreciated that you had a swimming pool and a Jacuzzi.  After a long day at Disney, my son enjoyed the pool and my throbbing feet enjoyed the Jacuzzi. The food was also surprisingly delicious. I really appreciated the waffles, yum.  I rated the location as a four instead of a five only because after walking around Disney for 10 miles, I was not looking forward to walking another .5 to
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad you liked our new and improved upgraded rooms. We have added amenities such as fridges in all the rooms, new and upgraded bedding and furnishings as well as decor.  We have also upgraded our breakfast and added the freshly baked waffles. You are correct, it is so delicious and yummy. We do have a wonderful relaxing heated pool and hot tub. It does feel great after a long day at Disneyland.  Glad you enjoyed it. We do look forward to another visit from you next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: This hotel is ideal due to the location being close (within walking distance) to disneyland and eateries and value for money.  The staff were very friendly and helpful in planning our stay in Anaheim.  Facilities were more than we expected with laundry, spa pool, swimming pool and free breakfast.  The room was comfortable and although there is not a restaurant onsite, options were provided to order meals at free room delivery at a very reasonable price, which is very convenient for tired travelers needing a night in to rest before exploring. We enjoyed the LA city tour which picked us up from the hotel at 9am and returned at 8pm.  It was so informative and gave us plenty of free time to explore some of the highlights LA have to offer.  Highly recommend this hotel and will be
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review.  It's wonderful to hear you enjoyed the city of LA tour that you booked with us at the front desk. It is a great one and so informative and fun as you say. Glad you found our rooms so comfortable and our location so convenient. We do look hope to see you again soon next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed at Super 8 for a night for Mickey's Halloween Party so we didn't have to drive back to LA late at night, but didn't want to spend the money on one of our favourites in the area or a Disney resort as it was just a place to sleep. The walk was a little bit further than we're used to (probably exacerbated by the fact we had to end up doing it more than anticipated due to forgetting part of a costume) but the hotel itself was clean, friendly, had good wife, great parking and a nice breakfast in the morning, albeit quite busy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you for deciding to stay with us on your quick overnight trip.  We do have complimentary breakfast, free parking and free wifi. Glad you enjoyed these free amenities during your stay. I am also happy to hear our staff provided you with such friendly and helpful service during your stay. We do hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary Heading: Good hotel, had trouble with the WiFi couldn't get...
Summary: Good hotel, had trouble with the WiFi couldn't get connected an stay connected. We had a room with 4 the rooms were too small way overcrowded.. Over all was a good stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad to hear you found us to be a good choice when staying in the Anaheim area. We do have a new wifi system which boasts 20 commercial grade access points powered by a 100 Mb fiber optic cable. I hope you find this to be more reliable during your next visit with us. We do have standard size rooms with 2 queen beds. Sometimes our guests prefer to have 2 rooms which connect. This does provide a lot more space when needed. Just request connecting rooms upon making the reservation with us. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Clean room and facilities in my first time visit was very pleasant and this second time the GM wasn't helpful at all with my room issues his Front desk were more nice than him, especially Echelled she showed us concern about our stayed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its always wonderful to hear from repeat guests. I want to say thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. I assure you any issues with the room during your stay is forwarded to the General Manager and is addressed right away. I am glad our 24 hour front desk staff is always available to assist at any time. Thank you again for the review and we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: When you first drive up your not sure what to expect because the hotel looks basic but what i found was very friendly staff, clean big rooms fridge included (which is a bonus. .missing in alot of hotels) free wifi, close to many eateries and of cotter disneyland . Also consists of a nice little pool/spa, laundry facilities and breakfast (which i can't comment on because unfortunately i missed) All in all well worth it.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's great to hear we exceeded your expectations and you had a good stay with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am happy to know they provided you with that friendly and helpful service you so deserve. We are in a perfect location when visiting Disneyland. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I have stayed at this Super 8 multiple times and have never been disappointed. It's just what you'd expect from a Super 8. Clean, functional and comfortable. Not fancy at all, but a great bargain and close to great restaurants and Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. I am glad that you find us to be such a great bargain. You are right we are the perfect place to stay when visiting the Disneyland park. So close to so many great places to dine and and shop. We do look forward to another visit from you in the future.

Summary: Clean room and facilities.  Friendly, helpful staff, comfortable spacious rooms. Good location to Disneyland and breakfast was good value as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to the staff. I am glad to know that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. Our new upgraded rooms are very spacious and comfortable and having a fridge in the room at no extra cost does add to the value of your stay. We are in a perfect location, just minutes from the Disneyland park, and so many great places to shop and dine as well. It's good to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and found it to be such a value. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Room was clean. Although we booked for 4, we only had two towels and when we asked for two more it was gone the next day and did not get replaced. Air-conditioner, when it came on, was noisy when all was quiet. It sounded like there was a semi idling in the parking lot just outside our window. Otherwise I'd still give this a 4 star.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  I am happy to know that you found our upgraded rooms so clean and comfortable.
