We do have maintenance staff here who are ready to assist with the AC if there is any issues. I do not show that anything was reported at the front desk during your stay. I did forward this to the head of maintenance and I assure you it is being looked into. Please feel free to report any issues such as a noisy AC. We do have a 24 hour front desk available to assist at any time. Thanks again for the review, and we do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary Heading: Great value and close to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for my Disneyland trip. Super 8 is a great hotel, cheap and close to Disneyland. It is a 10 minute walk. Free WIFI, breakfast and fridge. The only minus was that the room smelled a little musty.  I would defenitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's great to hear you found us to be such a great value! It's true with the amenities such as free Wifi, free parking, complimentary breakfast, and a fridge in every room at no extra cost it does add value to your stay. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park, and several great places to dine and shop are within minutes. It's wonderful to hear you will be back! We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great alternative to expensive Disney properties
Summary: 10 minute walk from the front gate of Disneyland and FREE parking for guests.  This is a really nice hotel with clean rooms, nice beds, and FREE breakfast.  The service from the front desk staff was exceptional!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. You are right, we are a great alternative to staying at the Disneyland Resort Hotels especially when you are on a budget. We offer clean and comfortable upgraded rooms, exceptional customer service, and several complimentary amenities such as Free parking, Free Wifi, and complimentary breakfast. We are also just minutes from the Disneyland park entrance, and right next door to so many great places to shop and dine.  We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Stayed at the Super 8 in Anaheim for a trip to Disneyland with the family.  The cost was nearly 50% less than what the other big name hotels wanted.  Also, Super 8 had a free breakfast, a pool, free wi-if and was within easy walking distance to the park.  Most of the other places we looked at were more expensive, and did NOT include breakfast, wi-if or even free shuttle service.  Front desk service was great.  We were helped by a lady named Cheryl who really went out of her way to answer all of our questions.  Our only complaint was that there wasn't enough space in the breakfast room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad to know you found us to be such a great value. It's true, amenities such as free parking, free wifi complimentary breakfast, and all the upgrades such as fridges in the rooms to add to the value of your stay. We are so conveniently located, just 15 minutes from the Disneyland park entrance, and right around the corner from the Anaheim Convention Center. We are right next door to the Garden Walk, where several great places to shop and dine are available. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: What an amazing stay. The room was beautiful and clean. The staff was amazing and we walked right to disneyland from the room. It only took about ten minutes. Right next to really nice restaurants and the CVS for convenience. We will definitely stay again on our next Disneyla trip
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear you had such and amazing stay and you will be back! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they were so helpful and friendly. We are very conveniently located as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, and so convenient so so many great dining and shopping locations. We do look forward to another visit from you next time you are visiting the Disneyland Park.

Summary: Stayed 9 days while we did LA, Disney, etc.  Clean & roomy rooms.  Fridge (no microwave). Walking distance to CVS & restaurants.  Walking distance to Disney/can take shuttle for $3 each- 1 way - we only did this once because we were tired.  Friendly staff. Would recommend.   Only complaint was breakfast  room is crowded (too small).  Also, book through hotels.com or other site because it is usually cheaper then directly through the hotel.  Prices vary depending on day/weekend with both hotels.com & directly through hotel.  Sometimes the computer sites wouldn't show any rooms available but could be booked directly through hotel (still rooms).  They have a higher tax in Cal. then my state - so add that too,
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear you will be recommending us!  We are very conveniently located near several great places to shop and dine.  CVS pharmacy is right around the corner. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad you found them to be so helpful and friendly.  The ART shuttle does pick up right next door for a small fee. It is very comfortable and handy after a long day when you do not want to take the 15 minute walk from the Disneyland park. I am glad you found it to be so convenient. We do want  to say thank you for the review and look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: Spacious rooms, good amenities and comfortable bed. We saw the Disney fireworks every night from our room, but there is another building going up behind this one which will probably block this view in the future. The spa was excellent and great for relaxing at the end of a long theme park day. Great value for the location and price. Breakfast was very basic, but ok for free.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's true we are in a great location when visiting Disneyland. It''s just a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We are also so close to so many great places to dine and shop. Bubba Gumps Shrimp Co is right next door as well as The Cheesecake Factory to mention a couple great dining locations. Isn't it nice to be able to relax in our hot tub or take a swim in our heated pool after a day at the park?  It is also a great place to catch those Disneyland fireworks at night. Our sundeck above the lobby is also a great place to see them. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the customer service.  The rooms were very clean, the Continental breakfast was abundant and tasty.  The personnel preparing the breakfast were excellent.  If I was the "Under Cover Boss", I'd give everybody a raise, especially Danielle, a very bubbly person, who could even make a grumpy person feel at home.....
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve. It's great to know that you enjoyed our breakfast as well as our breakfast staff. We do our very best to exceed our guests expectations every time. We do look forward to another visit next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel was exactly what we needed for our trip to Disney! The staff was very accommodating, and allowed us to park our car there at 7AM the day we checked in (before check in time) so we didn't have to pay parking at the park. Only complaints are that we had to pay for the shuttle ($3/person) so we ended up walking every time. Would not recommend if you have young children as I imagine it is a bit of a trek for the young ones! Our shower also never warmed up completely, but I like hot showers so maybe it was just not hot enough for me. Other than that the rooms were clean, the staff was friendly, and the breakfast was decent. Would recommend to other young couples!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you had such an awesome stay. It;'s wonderful to know that you found our staff so helpful and friendly. While it's true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, sometimes especially at the end  of the day little ones get tired. The ART shuttle (Anaheim Resort Transit) is available and starts running up to an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. It stops right next door about every 20 minutes. It is provided by the City of Anaheim and there is a small fee for taking the shuttle. Multiple trips do receive a discounted price.  Please contact the Anaheim Resort Transit for more information. Thank you again for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The staff made us feel very welcome, Ron and Jesus in particular. The rooms were spacious, clean, and had a refrigerator and coffee maker. (Microwave was available upon request), and the beds very comfortable. The free breakfast had lots of different food options. We had free high speed internet. The walk to Disneyland is only 12 minutes, so with our three-day passes, we saved a bundle on parking fees there. It had a nice pool and hot tub. No matter what time of day, there was always someone cleaning something; scrubbing the stairs, wiping window sills... very impressed with the cleanliness of the place, and the overall positive atmosphere.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for recommending us! We appreciate you staying with us and also for complimenting our staff. We do our best to exceed your expectations and provide you with excellent customer service. It's very true our amenities such as free WIFI, free parking, and complimentary breakfast do add value to your stay making it for an affordable stay. We are just a quick walk to the Disneyland park. Just a 15 minute walk to the entrance. So conveniently located to several places to dine and shop as well. We do look forward to another visit from you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Good, clean rooms, workable Wi-Fi, great breakfast and friendly staff. The pool is great and it's only a short 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Thanks to Jesus, Ron and the team for a great experience during our Disneyland stay.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. So great to know we fit into your budget and you had such a great time during your visit. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. It's great to hear they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: After reading the reviews for this property, we decided to reserve 2 rooms at this location.  Don't let the name Super 8 discourage you from staying at this location.  We usually would not consider Super 8 due to the stereotype image of low budget, dirty, old, unkept property associated with the name.  However, this property is not anything like the stereotype.  Although our 2 rooms were not like a Hilton or Marriott, they were clean and updated for an older property.  The beds were comfortable and the a/c worked well.  The location is convenient for walking to Disneyland.  Breakfast is provided, and although it is not a hot breakfast buffet like at Marriott Residence Inn, it is enough for a fast bite before heading out for the day.  The price for the rooms was extremely
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear that you found us to be such a great bargain. We have upgraded all our rooms with fridges in all our rooms, new bedding, new beds, new furnishings and decor as well as new bathroom counter tops. We have also put in new carpeting and repainted every room. We are happy you found these upgrades made for a more comfortable stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear that you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay.We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We booked this room because of the inexpensive price and mostly good reviews.  We spent two days at Disneyland resort and just needed the room to sleep; we didn't need anything fancy. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful.  They allowed us to leave our car in their lot before check-in so we saved the money we would have paid to park at Disney.  The walk to Disney wasn't too bad, but might be a bit long for small kids.  We had 3 teenagers and 2 adults in the room and the hotel provided a roll-away bed for a small charge.  The extra bed made it tight in the room, but overall the room was clean and quiet.  The continental breakfast wasn't great, but average for the cost of the room.  The waffle lady was a bit rude to our kids for no apparent reason, but maybe she just doesn't
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to know we fit into your budget and you found our staff so friendly and helpful. It's true the walk to Disneyland from here is not bad, just 15 minutes to the entrance of the park. We do look forward to another visit from you in the future.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Super 8.  We have stayed at this hotel before and so it was great to see the new decor in the room.  New furniture, carpet, bed covers and we liked the fact that there is a fridge in the room. The staff made us feel very comfortable, taking care of all our needs.  If we needed anything we would stop by the offic and it was taken care of immediately. Breakfast was great with fresh coffee, tea and juice.  A selection of yogurt, fruit,toast, danish, cereal or freshly made waffles.  It was nice to have a smiling Daniella there to help you with coffee and waffles. Location of the hotel is very good.  Walking around felt very safe.  It is about a mile from Disneyland and Downtown Disney.  There are lots of shops, restaurant and a drug store close by. Everything
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! It's always wonderful to hear from repeat guests. I am so glad that you found our recent upgrades to our rooms to your liking! It is true having a fridge in the room is so convenient isn't it?

Summary: The staff here were very friendly, the room was nice clean and modern. Loved the pictures that are displayed behind the bed. Walk to Disneyland is about 15 minutes, but you save in parking, there are buses nearby too. As a special treat we saw the fireworks form outside of the room. The Jacuzzi and pool were nice too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am happy that you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay. It's wonderful you found our upgrades to our rooms to your liking. We do have all new decor, with those fabulous pictures in the room, as well as new carpeting, new furnishings, new beds and bedding and now we have fridges in all our rooms as well! Our heated pool and hot tub are awesome it's true, especially after a long day at the Disneyland park. You can see the fireworks from the pool area, as well as on our sundeck, such a special treat at the end of the day. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance, making our complimentary parking an extra added value. For those who do not wish to walk, the ART shuttle picks us right next door and runs about ever 20 minutes. It takes  you right to the front entrance of the park and is very economical. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Great value for a quick stay
Summary: This location is a little bit dated but it is close to Disneyland, clean and a very good value. Our room was basic but comfortable. Good for the two of us for a quick overnight to the DLR. We will use again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's great to hear you found us to be such a great value when visiting Disneyland. We are very excited to hear you will be back. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, location, staff, reasonably priced
Summary: We were traveling with kids and wanted a hotel within walking distance from Disneyland, with free breakfast and clean rooms for a reasonable price. The rooms exceeded our expectations, the location was just 10 minutes walk from Disneyland, which was great and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Will come and stay here again. Wifi was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's so great to hear you will be returning! I am glad to know we exceeded your expectations. It's true we are just 10 to 15 minutes from the Disneyland park entrance making it so convenient when visiting Disneyland.

Summary: We stayed one night and it''s located right next to disneyland. Great customer service from Jesus and Ron! They helped us with the rates and they were friendly. They were just amazing , Id come to the hotel just because of them
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's great to hear that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. It's awesome that you will be back and we do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: First stop was at the super 8 on Katella , we met Jesus and Ron at the counter and they sorted everything for us , great guys and service ! Disney and city tours organised plus all the good retaurants to go to , noyhings a problem .
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thanks as well for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful they were able to assist you with booking your various adventures while here in Anaheim. We do book tours to Hollywood, Universal Studios, Seaworld, just to mention a few right here at the front desk. I am glad that you found our staff so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your next visit with us next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Good quality, decent price, walking distance to Disney
Summary: We chose this hotel because we wanted to be walking distance to Disneyland and not pay a fortune. The room was clean, the bed was comfortable, we got a free parking space and all the employees were very kind and helpful. It's also walking distance to many restaurants. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's true we are walking distance to the Disneyland park. Just a quick 15 minute walk to the front entrance. I am happy to hear you found our staff so friendly and helpful. Thank you so much for the compliments to our staff. We are so excited to hear you will be returning and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Happy stay near the happiest place on earth
Summary: Visiting in April, we were pleasantly surprised with the service, cleanliness, friendliness and our room. We requested a microwave, charged extra, I think 5.00 a day, and it was there shortly after we checked into our room. Thank you to the desk manager and all of the friendly employees we came into contact with. I highly recommend this motel to anyone who wants a positive experience during travel. Beds were very comfortable. We have made reservations for October and look forward to coming to your motel. So sorry it took me this long to offer this review.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It's wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy that you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We do look forward to your return in October!

Summary: We are currently staying at this hotel property.  The staff at the front desk was super friendly and helpful.  The breakfast room offers the standard fair...but the staff elevates the experience to a new level. THEY prepare the waffles so there are plenty ready at all times.  Cereal, oranges, packaged cinnamon rolls, coffee, juice, milk, yogurt, bread for toast.  DANIELLE is a bright spot to start your morning off right!  You are a 15 minute walk to the parks and a 5 minute walk to unbelievable dining selections.  Cheesecake Factory, PF Changs, Bubba Gump, McCormick and Schmicks.  Or 15 minutes to Dennys, McDonalds, etc.  Rooms were clean, spacious, and well maintained.  Our air conditioner's compressor was a tad on the noisy side...but it did the job so I can live with that.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them so helpful and friendly and ready to assist at any time. We are in a great location as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance, and so close to so many great places to dine and shop. So glad we fit into you budget and you had such a comfortable stay. We so look forward to your return!

Summary: I've stayed here many times when I've visited Disneyland, and I've never had a complaint.  It's close to the park (like a 10-15 min walk) so it'll save you $18 in parking. The rooms are your basic Super 8, a place to rest your head, shower and get ready to visit Mickey, so if you're expecting Ritz Carlton, you'll be disappointed.  There's a CVS, 7-11, and Subway within a stone's throw of the place. Next door is the Anaheim Gardenwalk with restaurants and shops as well.  The check-in staff have always been helpful and friendly. I have never tried their complimentary breakfast because I'm too excited to get to the park, but it looks like it has a big variety of stuff.  Like I said, when I go to Disneyland/California Adventure, this is my go-to spot because it's pretty affordable,
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. As you say we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance and since we have free parking its a great way to save those dollars during a vacation. We are also just minutes from so many great places to dine and shop as well as just around the corner from CVS pharmacy and a 7-11.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad you find them so helpful and friendly. We do look forward to you visit with us next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: This hotel is our "go-to" for Disneyland trips. It's close enough to be convient and not TOO far away. (another block away would be too far). The breakfast includes yogurt, toast, juice, milk, cereal and the newly updated HOT WAFFLES!!! We were very excited with this option. The employee (Daniell I think) that stocks the breakfast bar is such a fun person to greet us first thing in the morning! Very nice and friendly. The pool is heated, the hot tub is hot, rooms are large and clean, free parking, free wifi and laundry facilities onsite. Nearby resturants, Bubba Gump, CPK, Cheesecake Factory, Subway, pizza, chineese, 7-Eleven....etc. We even found a Dominos and Little Cesars a few blocks over (we had a car)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests. I am so glad you enjoyed our upgrades to our breakfast. The fresh waffles are so good! I do want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them so friendly and helpful! We do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: This budget hotel exceeded our expectations.  We decided to extend our stay for one extra night and arranged to do so at check-in.  The Day clerk was very helpful with the last minute change in our reservations.  We reserved two adjoining rooms.  The rooms looked renovated.  Not upscale but newer. The queen beds in our room was comfy (pillows were a little flat but, hey, its Super 8) and the bathroom was clean.  The room for our other party had a noisy AC unit. Other than that, the room was comfortable.  On our last night, someone had a noisy "Happy Birthday" party. The off key singing and lots of shrieking laughter at 10:52 pm is not very nice but we managed to ignore it.        We needed a budget hotel to stash our bags, shower, and sleep when not at the theme park and the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear we fit into your budget and you will most likely be returning!  It's true amenities such as our complimentary breakfast, free parking,  and free wifi do add value to your stay. Other amenities such as having  fridges in all our rooms is also an added plus. I am glad you enjoyed our upgrades to our rooms including new beds and mattresses, all new furnishings and decor, as well as new carpeting and newly painted rooms. Again we do thank you for the review, and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I did not like the super8. I asked for my credit card to not be photocopied when checking in. The clerk was rude and sakd he didn't care what i wanted. I reported it to the manager checking out, but they also seemed unconcerned with their policy or my personal financial security concerns. Normally with visa or master card you security numbers are on the back. With americanexpress they are right on the front. Not much security for me if they have all the info anyone would need to use the card. It was also very noisy. The shower went back and forth from hot and cold about every other minute. I do not recommend you spending your hard earned money at this establishment. Im more and more dissapointed with the Wyndham brand the more i find out im utilizing their services.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. In today's times credit and identity theft are definitely a concern for both business and customers.  To ensure our guests safety and protection  in these issues we do ask for the credit card so we can get an imprint and match it to the card holders ID. This is for our guests protection and to help prevent fraudulent activity on their account. All information is confidential, and we of course respect and protect our guests privacy at all times. I did speak with the desk clerk that checked you in and he of course was following company policy, and this is what he advised you upon check in. I do apologize if this seemed rude to you, however, I assure you the clerk did not mean to be rude, but was only following policy. I do understand your personal financial security concerns, and do apologize if our check in process raised those concerns. I do assure you we have all our guests best interest in mind. and are doing our very best to make for a safe, worry free and enjoyable stay. Thanks again for the review. We do hope to see you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: 5th visit this year and always great service. Good about parking also. Good at price matching.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's always wonderful to hear from repeat guests. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Hotel was great location to disneyland & good eateries which was exactly what I was after. The stairs to the second story aren't safe, they are cracking and one is even on an angle. Room was great except the shower was Luke warm every day.   Staff however except for Jesus I think his name was were rude. Wouldn't stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's true we are in perfect location, so close to the Disneyland Park, The Anaheim Convention center and several great places to shop and dine. I assure you I did look into  the issue you mention about the stairs. All of the stairs are safe, in fact we just had our annual safety inspection and passed with flying colors. I do want to thank you for the compliments to one of  our staff members, but you do not specify how all the other staff was rude. I would be more that happy to follow up, if I had more information. Again, I do thank you for the review and do hope to see you in the future during your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: This was a great motel. I'd totally stay again on my next trip to Disneyland. The staff were all friendly and quick.  The room was clean and very spacious and was perfect and comfortable with our 2.5 yr old toddler.  The carpet was clean and beds comfortable without the gross bedspread that probably never gets washed at most motels - just the clean linen covering the blanket. While we were there we saw them replacing mattresses with new ones in many rooms and also saw them repainting several areas. The place is well kept. We had a room in the back on the inside so it was quiet enough for her nap and sleep at night.  My only complaint would be that the towels in the room and especially the pool towels are really small.  But other than that, we had an excellent stay. The close
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's great to hear you will be returning! It's true we have upgraded our rooms including new mattresses, new beds, new carpeting, new furnishings, and repainted as well. It's wonderful to know that you like the improvements and upgrades! We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I had a workshop to go to at the double tree on harbor blvd but decided to pay half the $ at the super8 instead of the double tree and walk there (10 minute walk). Surprisingly besides the noise from multiple families (bring some earplugs and you will be jsut fine), the staff was friendly and helpful. My car battery died on me the day of the checkout. I explained to the front desk the situation, they told me to leave the car there until I could get towing later during the day. The ladies at the breakfast area where firendly and my room was always clean. I would recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. So glad to hear you stayed with us during your workshop here in Anaheim. It's wonderful you found  us so economical and you found our staff so friendly and accommodating. Thank you so much recommending us! We do look forward to your next visit next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I have business in this area occasionally and use this Super 8 every time. It's clean, quiet, friendly and convenient. There is nothing more you could ask for!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's always great to hear from repeat guests. It's wonderful to know that we provide you with everything you need when you are on a business trip and need a place to stay. We do look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: If it weren't for the MOLD and weak WIFI...
Summary: Perfect location!  Almost perfect budget motel!  FREE parking a plus!  Four complaints:   Spotty concentrations of MOLD in the bathrooms (floor corners, surrounding foot of toilet)  -probably due to lack of daily disinfecting/cleaning;  owners need to install a repeater to strengthen the wifi signal;  laundry room not available 24hrs;  refrigerator, but not microwave.  The recently upgraded exterior grounds are really nice, which is a plus.  I hope this means more upgrades to the interior in the future.  Because I'm an Annual Pass Holder, I may return for a quick weekend trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's wonderful to hear you will be returning next time you are visiting Disneyland. With your Disneyland Annual pass I am sure you come often, and we look forward to seeing you. We are so convenient to the Disneyland park, just a quick 15 minute walk and you are at the entrance. We do thoroughly clean and sanitize all the rooms, including the bathrooms daily. I assure you I will be following up on your report of mold in the room. We have recently upgraded our free wifi. Our new wifi boasts 20 commercial grade access points powered by a 100 Mb fiber optic cable.  The speed is really very good. Glad to hear you found the upgrades to our property to your liking. We have upgraded the outside grounds and building as you say, and have also upgraded our rooms with new carpeting, new beds and decor, new bedding as well as added fridges to all our rooms. We are continually updating and improving our property to ensure our guests have a great experience and get more value for their stay. We do look forward to another visit from you soon!

Summary: Spent three nights here as we were spending the weekend in Disneyland. Location is about a 15 min walk to the park. Really easy to get to the park. Hotel has a small outdoor hot tub and pool with deck chairs. There is breakfast each morning which is grand. Has oatmeal / waffles / toast  / cinnamon rolls and yogurts! The rooms are nice and large. Got a two queen beds room which was spacious and clean. Has loads of TV channels and also has channels on demand which is really great for just watching series! Staff were pleasant and would recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad that you found our location to be so convenient. It's true we are in a great location when you are visiting the Disneyland park, or when attending a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center. Either on is just a quick 5 to 15 minute walk and our parking is free here. It sounds like you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We have recently upgraded our breakfast menu, which now includes freshly made waffles. Good to hear that you found our breakfast to be so good and such a good value. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, and so good to hear you will be recommending us! Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I had stayed at a Super 8 some years ago, and it was certainly not as pleasant an experience as my recent one was. The room was clean, although I would have preferred to have  had the sink in the bathroom, instead of the bedroom. The front desk folks were awfully helpful, and the breakfast was not bad at all.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's wonderful to know we exceeded your expectations. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast. Did you try the freshly made waffles? We have recently added them to our menu and they have been  very popular. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We do look forward to your next visit next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We spent six nights at this hotel. I was very satisfied with everything.  The room was clean and had plenty of room. Housekeeping came everyday, removed trash, replaced towels, made beds and vacuumed.  The hotel is on the ART bus line otherwise you can walk. It's about a 15 minute walk. The free breakfast was good with cereal and made to order waffles.  The pool was nice. There were plenty of food options with a CVS on the corner and a Target down Harbor BLVD. I would definitely stay there again.  You can't beat what you get for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's true we are very close to the Disneyland park, within a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. We are also very close to those great places to dine such as Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory and PF Changs to mention just a few. We do have a CVS pharmacy right across the street as well as a 7-11, and just down the road is a TARGET. So convenient to so many places I do agree. For those who wish to take the shuttle to Disneyland, the ART shuttle starts running an hour before the Disneyland park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. It arrives here about every 20 minutes. Thanks again for the review, and we do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I like the location of this particular Super 8 it's close to Disneyland and a central point for all the points of interest,I like the idea there are a lot of eateries within close proximity whether you want to walk or drive no more than a 15 min drive max,but it'll be better if you walk in case you want to partake of alcoholic beverages,room was good all your basic essentials ,serves its purpose well your there to sleep ...the hot water issue was good this time only draw back was the handle 4 times 4 different handles ,but there was hot water when I wanted it,didn't have to worry about prime time showering...for the breakfast be sure to get there early ,I usually got there at 0600a by 0730-0900 it's standing room only.... They have this have waffle machines ... And Danielle who
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It's always great to hear from repeat guests and hear that you will be returning. We are happy to know you loved our breakfast upgrade with the fresh baked waffles and that you were impressed with our staff. We do look forward to seeing you during your next trip to Anaheim. Thanks again for the terrific review.

Summary: I've never stayed at a super 8 but this one is amazing. It's very clean and the staff is very friendly. Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear we exceeded your expectations and that you will be back! We are so glad to hear our staff was so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Excellent, reasonably priced hotel, very close to Disneyland
Summary: I stayed a week and found the amenities very good and the staff very professional. Hotel is located within a short walk of Disneyland and close to restaurants and car hire companies (the latter was around 200 metres east of hotel in West Katella Avenue). Very happy to recommend and would certainly stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review!  We are glad to hear you had and excellent stay with us, and equally happy to know you will be back! It's true we are just a 15 minute walk  to the Disneyland park. We are very convenient to several great places to dine and shop as well. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a super price :)
Summary: Second time staying at this hotel and I would choose it again. Friendly helpful staff. Clean rooms and comfortable beds. Not too far away from Disneyland. If you are older and have trouble with stairs, make sure you have a room on the ground floor as there are no elevators.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's always a pleasure to hear from repeat guests and even better to hear they will be back again! Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay. It's true we do not have an elevator on site, however, we are more than happy to accommodate with a first floor room as you say. We are very close to the Disneyland park, just a 15 minute walk to its entrance and so conveniently located next to several great places to dine such as Bubba Gumps and The Cheesecake Factory just to mention a couple of them. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: I stayed in Room 212 for a week in late May. Great hotel if you are traveling on a budget. And really, if you are visiting this area, you are here for Disney, so you only need a room to lay your head. But in saying this, the hotel is in a great location, (only 15 min walk from Disney). The bed was comfortable and a good nights sleep is in store. The Super 8 is very family friendly and a lot of families seem to stay here. The breakfast is good and suited my needs. There are a heap of restaurants located next door, as well as a cinema complex. Westfield shopping plaza is a 5 min drive away. There are more restaurants located closer to the main gate of Disney and they are a 10 min walk away.  The staff were friendly and i found Jes'us was really friendly and helpful when I dealt
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Its great to hear you will be returning! We are very conveniently located next to several dining and shopping establishments as well as just a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance as you say. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We didn't make use of all the amenities but we had no problems during our stay. The room was equipped with everything we needed and it was only a 15 or 20 minute walk to the parks. Clean and comfortable. My son liked the ice cream vending machine. We even saw the Disneyland fireworks when we walked down the outdoor hallway
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you had such a clean and comfortable stay with us. We do have some great amenities such as free wifi, free parking, complimentary breakfast and other extras such as a great ice cream machine right here! It's true we have a great place to watch the fireworks as well. The sundeck above  is one of my favorite places to view them. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Always a great stay. Clean rooms, very friendly staff, nice breakfast, and great view! I love staying here because the staff is so courteous and helpful. They always listen to my needs and offer assistance any way they can. So much appreciation for them!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's wonderful to hear from repeat guests! Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's great to know they are providing you with that excellent friendly and helpful service you deserve. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Rooms were small but clean and very modern.  Customer service was not the best.   Loved the pool and the location. Bubba Gumps was right next to us.  Was a pleasant stay.  Parking was nice and safe. Safest that I saw.   Breakfast was tasty and the young lady at the waffles was awesome.    There is all the amenities you would need including a laundry facility.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad you found our location so convenient. It's wonderful you found our pool so inviting and  you enjoyed your stay in our clean and comfortable rooms. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad you found them so friendly and helpful when enjoying your breakfast. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: My parents and I stayed here a second time a few years ago. Great location, short walk to all the theme parks. A good cheap and easy breakfast was also easily accessible.  The room didn't look amazing but it was the most comfortable bed we have ever slept on while travelling!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Its true we are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. It's just a 15 minute walk to the entrance making it so convenient. We have upgraded all our rooms with new beds, I am glad you found them so comfy. We have other upgrades as well  such as adding fridges to all our rooms.  We know this adds value to your stay. It's good to hear we fit into your budget and we do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: This hotel has, yet again, exceeded my expectations. The...
Summary: This hotel has, yet again, exceeded my expectations. The pricing is extremely reasonable and it is a leisurely 10-minute walk away from the main gates of Disneyland. If I'm not staying at the resort, I'm staying here.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's great to hear we exceeded your expectations and you found us to be such a great value as well as convenient! We love to hear from repeat guests and we are so happy that you will be returning! We look forward to your return.

Summary: It was close to and within walking distance to attractions and restaurants. The rooms were nice and clean. Pillows could do with upgrading and the bed was ok. We appreciate the manager letting us drop our luggages off early before check-in time, so that we could go the attractions. Breakfast was basic but the staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. I am also glad to know you found our staff so accommodating and so friendly and helpful during your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: really enjoyed staying here.our room was very clean the beds were very comfortable hotel staff was warm and friendly very easy check in/out [ anna was a doll great sense of humor].the breakfast was great. very close to disneyland about a 15 minute walk.i will stay here again. once again super 8 staff thank you for everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to know you had such a nice stay. I am also happy to know that you found our staff to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are very conveniently located to the Disneyland park as you say. It's just a quick 15 minute walk to the park. It's great to hear you will be back! We do look forward to your return.

Summary: We arrived the hotel very late. The receptionist, Jesus gave us a warm welcome, and helped us to check in, find the room, and settle down everything. So, staying at Super 8 made us feel very comfortable. A very good hotel with a very reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear that you found our staff so friendly and helpful during your stay. It's wonderful to know you found us to be such a great value. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: very comfortable hotel.staff was very friendly [anna was wonderful great sence of humor} check in/out was very easy great breakfast.this is a no frills hotel but if you want a clean  comfortable room with very nice beds and at a value price this hotel is for you. disneyland is very close about a 15 min walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found us to be so helpful and cheerful during your stay. We are very conveniently located as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Very close to Disneyland, clean and comfortable. Easy check in and check out. Fresh waffles for breakfast. Basic but comfortable.. Value for money. I'd stay there again. There's a common balcony where you can see Disney's fireworks from too.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It's true we are very convenient to the Disneyland park. It's just a quick 15 minute walk to the entrance. Glad you enjoyed our fresh baked waffles and you found our breakfast so inviting. It's wonderful to know you found us to be such a great value when visiting the Disneyland park. We are so happy that you will be staying with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Good price, good service, close to Disneyland
Summary: Good quality hotel for a very reasonable price. We always felt secure and comfortable, and everything was clean. They had a reasonable continental breakfast. Best part of all is that it's very close to Disneyland. Just a couple of blocks away. Easily within walking distance.   Would very much recommend for anyone looking for a place to stay near Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to know we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. We are also happy to hear that you experienced that great customer service you so deserve. It's true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park making it so convenient. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Not that great, but for the price and the proximity to Disneyland you can't beat it.  Disneyland was a 20 minute walk with kids.  Rooms were comfy, but smelly and moldy.  Bathrooms weren't that clean, a bit tiny, had pink moldy looking thing in the bath tub. During my stay always wondered what lay under those green carpets.  Wifi connectivity was good in the rooms.  Parking was included.  Breakfast was decent, not bad.  The girl who was serving the breakfast was very friendly, cheerful, helpful and a saving grace for this hotel.  This could be a much better hotel if they replace those stinky carpets and update their bathrooms. Staff in the lobby is friendly and helpful.  For the short stay of two or three days this is a good hotel for the price and its location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's true we are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a quick walk to the entrance. We are also just minutes away from several great shopping and dining locations. Good to know you enjoyed our amenities such as the free wifi and complimentary breakfast as well as our free parking. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We are in the process of upgrading our rooms which do include updating our bathrooms and we have new carpeting in all our rooms. We have also replaced our mattresses, bedding, added new decor and have added fridges to all our rooms. All of this does add value to your stay. I am happy to know you found we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I have stayed at Super 8 Anaheim twice and both times have been highly impressed with the way the staff are so friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean, the breakfast is adequate, wi-fi works, and it is a short walking distance from the Anaheim Convention Center and Disnelyand attractions. I will certainly choose this hotel again when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's always great to hear from repeat guests and great to hear you will be back again! It's wonderful you find our location to be so convenient. It's true we are just minutes from so many great places to shop and dine as well as just a quick walk to the Disneyland park. Thank  you for the compliments to our staff. I am happy to know you found them to be so helpful and friendly. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you in in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Room was clean.  Bed too soft for me.  Pillows were good.  Bathroom was worn.  Towels were small, scratchy, and plain awful.  Bring your own towel if you stay here.  Shuttle to Disneyland is $3 per person one way.  10-15 minute walk otherwise. Very noisy outside all night and water in shower is inconsistent temp.  Front desk was nice.  Had a crib for my toddler delivered quickly.  Staff were friendly and helpful. Snack machines worked.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's true we are a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. There is a shuttle that runs every 20 minutes its called the ART shuttle and picks up right next door. We do appreciate the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay. We have done some recent upgrades of our bedding and linens in our rooms. We do hope you find them to your liking next time you visit Anaheim. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Good price, ok location, nice pool, grateful for breakfast and Disney channel, excellent parking, kind staff, but definitely an outdated motel.  Bathroom was small, paint chipping, smell was horrific(you know that old hotel smell). They tried to hide it with pine sol or something but then that was way too strong!  Some suggestions for the hotel: don't put your pile of junk mattresses and coolers right in the middle of everything. Set them in the back corner for pickup. Don't leave all your brochures outside the lobby in the walking space. That's tacky. So are all the medieval dinner posters in the window. Don't let your employees smoke and congregate right outside the pool where everybody walks.  Would be nice if you provided conditioner and lotion.  Don't put cement looking
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am happy to know that you found us to be such a great value and you enjoyed our amenities such as complimentary breakfast, free wifi, and free parking. It's also great to hear that you found our location to be so convenient and our staff so friendly and helpful. We are working on updating and upgrading our motel, this is why you did see some items waiting to be picked up outside. All our rooms have been newly painted, have new carpeting, new beds and bedding, all new decor, and we have added fridges to all our rooms as well. We are in process of upgrading our whole property and are very excited to see what you think when you return. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights at the Super 8. The staffs are nice and helpful. Rooms are spacious and newly decorated.  Superb location, 10 min walk to the main gate of Disneyland and minutes away from a mall with lots of restaurants. Will definitely stay here again when I visit Disneyland.  P.S. Laundry room is not 24 hours.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am so happy to hear you will be back! We look forward to it. It's great you found our location to be so convenient and our staff so friendly and helpful. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: It was a perfect location to Disneyland and Knotts Berry. The staff were amazing especially Ron and the "pretty boy". Very very helpful staff with every enquiry I had. Room was nice, clean and comfy. We enjoyed our stay. If we ever go back to LA we would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am so happy to hear you had a wonderful stay! Thanks you for the compliments to our staff. Its so good to know that you received that excellent customer service you so deserve. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: quiet location very close to universal
Summary: Place was clean quiet and very close to Universal Studios.. It was a little hard to get to..Had to turn down a side street to find the entrance,,After that I had no problems,,Traffic was very manageable,,,
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are close to Universal Studios, it's about a 45 minute drive depending on traffic. We are just a block and a half from the Disneyland park. We are located next to the Garden Walk. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and found us to be so convenient and quiet when visiting Anaheim. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect Price and Location for Disneyland Visit
Summary: After lots of online research of Disneyland area accommodations, we settled on the Super 8 and were very happy with our selection. My main criteria were walking distance to the Disneyland Resort, free parking (not many walking distance properties offered this), wi-fi, and clean. This property checked all of those boxes.  We stayed 7 nights (Saturday-Saturday) in late April. Check-in was very easy. We arrived around 3:30 in the afternoon (flight into LAX and rental car) and were the only ones in the lobby at the time. All the front desk staff we encountered throughout our visit were cheerful and polite and eager to offer unsolicited suggestions for our trip.   The motel is comprised of one building housing the lobby, breakfast room, guest laundry, and some guest rooms and a
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. So glad to hear that you found our location to be so perfect when visiting Disneyland. It's true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park entrance. We are also conveniently located as you say to several great places to dine as well as shop.  Its also great to hear that we fit into your budget.  Our amenities such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast do make us an affordable place to stay. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: For the price and location, I would give this place a 5... Seriously, not expecting a Diamond rated hotel at that price! But... TWO visits a month apart and both times cost more money than the original reservation made online.  For THAT is give this place 2/5.  I've increased it to 3/5 because the more costly stay was fixed by Corporate.  Detailed version:  January: I made a reservation under the criteria 2 adults, 2 kids.  I originally planned on only staying one night, but the weekend before the Friday stay I decided to add another night so I called and asked if i could extend my stay.  The man that answered located my existing reservation and pointed out since it was through an online service it would be different.  no biggie.  I confirmed 2 adults, 2 kids, 2 queens.  I asked
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am sorry for any inconvenience with the billing on your rooms through the third party from which you booked. We do pride ourselves in great service which includes our reservations we make for our guests. Unfortunately, if a reservation is booked by a third party online, we are unable to make changes or adjustments from here. We do recommend calling us directly so we can make sure and provide a great experience right from the start. As efficient as it is to make reservations online with these third party websites, nothing is like calling the place you desire to stay directly to receive that great service you so deserve. This also leaves less room for errors such as these. I am glad to hear that everything was settled though regarding the billing. I am also glad to hear that you found our rooms so spacious and you enjoyed the amenities such as the fridge in the room, and complimentary breakfast during you stay. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Me and my family of 4 had a great experience earlier this week while staying at this super 8, rooms were big and clean for the price it was great, best of all was walking distance to disneyland. took full advantage of the free breakfast too! them waffles were amazing! was plenty of great restaurants next door to us as well. bubba gump, cheesecake factory, california pizza kitchen & more, even a 7-11 at end of block. Even received a jump start from the mantenience guy when my car battery died, friendly staff, oh and the internet was on point! over all was a pleasant experience!! will be coming back for sure!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's great to know you enjoyed our complimentary upgraded breakfast. We now have included fresh waffles in our breakfast buffet. We are conveniently located just minutes from several great places to dine and shop. We are also just a 15 minute walk to Disneyland as well. I want thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. We do look forward to another visit next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We arrived on a Sunday evening during Springbreak and were surprised that a decent motel within walking distance to Disney and other fun things had any rooms at all. We did get a room upstairs and we stayed there for 5 days. The cost was reasonable and the pool on the property was clean and fun. We could walk to resturants like the Cheesecake Factory and the Anaheim shopping walk. Despite it being Springbreak the motel was quiet except when Disney would shoot off fireworks.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thanks as well for staying with us during your spring break. We are close to Disneyland park as you say, just a quick 15 minute walk from here. I am happy to hear you found our heated pool and hot tub to be so enjoyable. It's a great way to relax after a day at the Disneyland park. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We had a very nice stay at the Super 8. The staff is very friendly and hospitable. Breakfast staff do great at keeping up with the flow of guests. Rooms are clean and we'll maintained. Definitely worth the price we paid. Nice to be able to buy Disneyland tickets right there at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad to know you enjoyed your stay. Thanks as well for the compliments to our staff for their friendly and helpful service.  Yes you  can purchase Disneyland tickets right here at the front desk at a discounted price as well! We do hope to see you again soon during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: As other reviewers have mentioned, the staff is very, very friendly....and they seem to really care about your stay. The walk to Disneyland is very short...about 15 minutes, If you are the type of person who expects a lot then this is not the place for you, if you want an inexpensive room (with carpets that really need cleaning) then this is you place.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. I am glad your found our staff so friendly and helpful, we do pride our selves in great customer service. You are correct, we are just 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland entrance, making us a very convenient place to stay.  I do apologize if you found the carpeting was not clean. I do not show any reports to the front desk. As I said we do pride ourselves in great customer service and we are here at the front desk 24 hours. Please always contact the front desk at any time so we can address the issue. We do have maintenance staff available every  day and  we also have the carpets cleaned on a regular basis. We do look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: Purpose of our stay was for Disneyland's Tinker Bell Half-Marathon, not our first time staying here, will be back and already booked for Disneyland Half-Marathon for Labor Day weekend.  Always loved this Super 8, due to location to race and plenty of restaurants within walking distance.  Enjoyed the large rooms with big TV in our Room. Also the FREE breakfast of Orange Juice, Cinnamon rolls and Yopliat yogurt.  WiFi worked Great to access the Internet on both my tablet and laptop. Great Job, Super 8!!! See ya in September!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing us when finding accommodations during the Tinkerbell Half Marathon.  It's true we are in the perfect location when visiting Disneyland park. It's just a quick 15 minute walk and you are at the front gate. We are also just minutes from several great places to shop and dine. Glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and our free wifi. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this Super 8. The rooms were clean, and had everything we needed. The fridge was an unexpected bonus! The staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast had several options - yogurt, cereal, toast, danishes, fruit and freshly made waffles, juices and coffee/tea. (We did wish that there had been a protein option -even just peanut butter would have been good, but all in all, we were happy.) Location is great - easy and safe walk to and from the parks, with convenient places to stop along the way to grab snacks and/or meals. Also the ART #6 stopped right out front, which was a great option for returning on those late nights when my little one just didn't want to walk anymore. Great value for the price! Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad that you found us to be such a great value.  Our amenities such as our complimentary breakfast, free parking, free wifi, as well as upgraded rooms which includes a fridge in every room certainly does add to the value of your stay. It'w wonderful to hear that you will be back to visit and you would stay with us again. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great price.
Summary: This is a lower priced hotel with a high priced hotel service mentality.  My husband and I were visiting Disneyland and were only staying one night.  We've stayed at pricier hotels in the area with great service, but you pay for parking, for breakfast, for wifi.  This hotel included all of these amenities and the staff was very accommodating, friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very adequate and clean, with more room for belongings than most hotels.  We arrived at 10 am and asked if we might park our car while we visited the Park.  I expected to pay an extra fee, but they said no charge, and in fact, our room was ready and they let us check in early with no extra fee.  Needless to say, we were very impressed.  The only negative is that the breakfast room in small for the number
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I always love to hear that guests will be returning. It's wonderful to hear that we fit into your budget and you found us to be so affordable. Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad that you found them so friendly and helpful during your visit with us. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Day nap for a red eye trip to Disneyland
Summary: We rented this hotel room to take a nap for a red eye trip to Disneyland. We also thought it be wise just in case we needed a shower. There were over 50 students/parent chaperones.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  Thank you for choosing us as well for your quick visit to Disneyland. We are in a perfect location to the park, just a quick 15 minute walk. We do have larger groups that do like to stay with us because of that. We always make it a point to put the whole party together and as you mention we do require there be adults in every room when children are here.  I do hope that     you enjoyed your visit with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I recently stayed at the Super 8 motel around the corner from Disneyland.  It was a super nice motel.  The rooms were very clean, we had plenty of towels and the staff was very nice.  The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland. I will be staying there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. So glad you will be back! We look forward to it. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay. We look forward to another visit from you!

Summary: We only stayed here for one night on our recent trip then went on to Los Angeles but the location is great for most attractions in the Anaheim area. The room is standard, nothing special about it. But couldn't beat the price for a hotel that is only a few blocks from Disneyland. We were actually in Anaheim to attend a Ducks game and cheer on our home town Oilers. Tip for this hotel...DO NOT ask the front desk to call you a taxi!!! Where we are from, we don't have UBER so we were not familiar with their use. So I got the front desk to call and shortly after the called me to let me know our taxi had arrived to go to the Honda Center which was only 3 miles away. The first thing I noticed was that the mini van that showed up had no decals or anything indicating that it was in fact a
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  I am happy that you found our front desk so helpful and friendly and you had a great stay with us. I do apologize for any issue you had with having us call a taxi for you. I did call Yellow Cab to get a quote from them and it was the same price you were quoted. We do try and use the same transportation services for our guests as we know they are honest and reputable. We thank you for staying with us and do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: We have enjoyed 4 nights at this excellent location. Walking distance to Disneyland, short time to Hollywood and about 1 hour to Legoland, the kids loved it! The swimming pool is enjoyable; the breakfast is really a no-go on the other hand...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and found us to be so conveniently located. It is true we are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. We have upgraded our breakfast which includes freshly made waffles, fresh fruit, yogurt, toast, cereal, hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, juice, and hot cocoa, tea and coffee. We hope to see you again soon on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel staff (Ron & Cheryl) when checking in were great! The hotel was comfortable and our room even had a fridge in it. We had a nice continental breakfast each morning and it was close to Disneyland! We would stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear you will be back!  I am glad to hear that Ron and Cheryl provided you with such great friendly service. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and they all do include a fridge as well as upgraded bedding, new mattresses, all new furnishings and decor. It's wonderful to know you had such a  comfortable stay.

Summary Heading: I just stayed there to go to the Taste of Anaheim on 05/07/2015 at Anaheim Garden Walk that is next door to the hotel.
Summary: It was very clean and newly remodeled.  The mattress was very comfortable, and I got the best nights sleep that I haven't had for a long time.  My body didn't hurt at all the next morning.  The front desk was very professional and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Yes we have recently upgraded all  our rooms including new extra comfy mattresses. I am glad you had such a great night sleep.  Other amenities were added such as a fridge in all our rooms and extra outlets, new lighting and all new decor. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Awesome Service and great staff and its close to all Disney parks and after a long day of walking you can come back to your hotel and take a nice swim or sit and enjoy the hot tub, also its close to all good restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to know that our staff provided you with such great friendly service while you were staying with us. Our heated pool and hot tub is a great way to relax after a long day at the Disneyland park. We await you return!

Summary Heading: Visit to Disney with small children
Summary: Had read the reviews on trip advisor about how good this motel was and I wasn't disappointed. Location was great, room was great and seemed to be newly decorated. Staff were very helpful and breakfast was lovely. Couldn't fault this motel and would definitely recommend. Also brought our tickets for Disney at the reception and saved about $10 per ticket.
Manager Response: Thank you  for the review. I am glad to hear you had such a great stay. We do have discounted Disneyland tickets, as well as other popular theme park tickets at a discounted price. It's great you were able to save on your purchase and hope to see you again next time you visit the Disneyland Park.

Summary: Hotel staff was very nice and friendly. Breakfast was awesome great walking distance to the disney parks and shopping. Rooms were clean and comfortable . pool was clean and big .Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear you found our location to be so convenient during your stay. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am happy to know that they were so helpful and friendly during your stay. Thanks again for the review. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Took inlaws and kids to celebrate inlaws 50th Anniversary!
Summary: Great stay! Ron at the desk and all staff were really great to us, we really like this Super8. It is always clean and comfortable and close to everything we like in Anahiem and beyond! We willbe back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thanks as well for deciding to stay with us to celebrate your 50th anniversary! We do appreciate the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear Ron and the rest of the staff provided you with that excellent service you so deserve.

Summary: went for the star wars convention hotel is walking distance  to convention center , downtown disney,and many restaurants room is good for the 4 nights i stayed bed is comfy wifi worked well continental breakfast was ok go to walmart to get shampoo the mini bottles were just o.k but a convenient place to stay with great front desk
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad you decided to stay with us when attending the Star Wars convention at the Anaheim Convention center. It's true we are just a quick walk to the Convention center making it very convenient when attending a convention. Thanks again for the review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland and so much food options
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while only spending 2 days at Disneyland. Great location close to so many restaurants, a cvs, 7/11's and more while 15 mins walk to Disneyland. Free breakfast which is only 6-9am but forces you to be up early. Just a basic breakfast but all you need. Rooms have everything you need as well. Great value for price!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you found us to be such a great value. Amenities such as free wifi, free parking, and complimentary breakfast all add to the value of your stay. We are in the perfect location for so many great choices to dine. We cant wait to see you again next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay during a convention
Summary: I stayed at this Super 8 during the Star Wars Celebration at the Anaheim Convention Center.  It was conveniently located and there were great places to get food within walking distance.  The room was really nice (better than expected)...the beds were comfortable and the fridge was a plus.  I will be staying here again when I'm in town.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. You are right we are a great location to stay at when attending a convention. We are just a quick 5 minute walk from the convention center. We have updated all our rooms to include a fridge  as well as upgraded beds and bedding and new decor.  We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Super 8 (415 W Katella) poor service and not so super when our daugter was sick !
Summary: The night staff had no access to bedding or any cleaning equipment when our daughter was sick during the night and just said there is nothing that can be done and that it will have to wait until the morning for the cleaners! - I stated that this was unacceptable as it was everywhere and I either need another room OR the room cleaned OR at the bare minimum I needed the required equipment to enable me to clean it up myself and I would appreciate help doing so.  Reluctantly one member of the night staff found some towels & a box of tissues and assisted with the clean up process, this was much appreciated and he was tipped accordingly. The night staff at Super8 (415 W Katella Ave) need to have access to cleaning facilities to assist in this situation.  The breakfast room is really
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do have to clarify some statements that you have made that are in no way correct and I feel I must correct those statements.  1- The night staff had no access to bedding or any cleaning equipment when our daughter was sick during the night and just said there is nothing that can be done and that it will have to wait until the morning for the cleaners!  This is not correct. When in deed our housekeeping staff would be arriving in the morning,  our 24 hour front desk staff does indeed have access to bedding and cleaning equipment at all times, including in the night.  2- Reluctantly one member of the night staff found some towels & a box of tissues and assisted with the clean up process. This is not correct, as our front desk staff member was more than happy to assist, and he also provided you with extra clean and new sheets, blankets and new pillows which you fail to mention.  3-The breakfast room is really tiny and holds 15 seated people max and is not fit for purpose. (very misleading photos on website) This is not correct, actually the breakfast area has 50 chairs inside as well as additional seating outside on our sun deck, allowing for more than adequate seating as the breakfast hours are from 6 am to 9 am. All photos listed on the Super 8 website are indeed correct and are not misleading.  4-The washing Facilities (3 x washing Machines / 3 x Tumble Dryers / machine supplying powder and bounce sheets) were unreliable as most days at least one machine was out of use.(misleading photos on website, again very small room and not enough machines when considering all the rooms) Machines keeping cash and not working  This is incorrect as well as most days machines are working properly and photos on the website are  not misleading, it shows 3 washers and 3 dryers. And any cash that you say you lost was indeed refunded.  5- Swimming pool - More misleading clever photos. This pool is an "after thought" and placed in between access roads to / from hotel rooms The pool was put in when the property was established and it was not an "after thought" and all photos on our website are correct and not misleading. And the pool is no where near the main road.  6- The staff didn't care about our two children or us (2 adults) and were quite happy for us all to remain overnight in a smelly vomit filled room with it all over the floor and walls. This too is incorrect as our staff went over and above to assist in cleaning up after your ill child and provided extra bedding so you could sleep in a clean room after this unfortunate incident of a sick child in the night.

Summary: We stayed for 6 days while got the "tourist" portion of our USA holiday out of the way. we have been there before and thought we knew what to expect but the place has had a cosmetic facelift. Still a budget motel that we use as a base for sleeping and storage but it was a nice surprise to see the new queen beds, bench/sink and fridge in our room. As it is so close to Disneyland and the price is right we recommend to family and friends to stay here.  The staff are great and happy to assist with booking tours and organising great prices for Disneyland passes. Overall it is a budget motel but it is a clean place to stay in a great location to all the theme parks and shopping outlets.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Yes we have done a lot of improvements here lately and it's wonderful you found the changes to be so wonderful. We have updated all our rooms with new beds, new furnishings, new decor as well as upgraded the rooms with new fridges in all rooms as well. Our staff is available as you say to assist with all your needs during your time away from home. We do assist booking tours, discounted tickets, airport shuttles and taxis as you mention. Our friendly helpful staff are here for you!  We do hope to see you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary Heading: The hotel has had some improvements done
Summary: Hotel rooms are in good repair, Lights all worked, bed have been upgraded, Coin self serve laundry efficient, breakfast room has been enlarged from last visit, breakfast - good start for the day, very important MUST see front desk for Disney tickets, plenty of shops & restaurants within (5 mins) walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Yes we have done a lot of improvements recently I am glad you noticed!  We also have now added fresh baked waffles to our complimentary breakfast menu. Its always great to hear from repeat guests. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I cannot say enough about the desk staff, Especially the older night gang. They were attentive to our questions and needs and gave excellent alternative suggestions to our preplanned venues to which saved us money. Our room was clean and funtional.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It's always great to hear that they are providing you with that excellent customer service you so deserve. So glad you had such a great stay and we do look forward to your return!

Summary: A 15 minute walk from Disney. Room very clean and spacious. Staff helpful. Only downside was breakfast room got pretty crowded. Pool looked clean (didn't use as too busy at Disney!) overall I would highly recommend.
