Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to know you found us to be such a great value. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am happy you found them to be so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. It's wonderful you will recommend us to others and we do look forward to another visit from you.

Summary: I stayed for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland last week. This hotel is close to Disney parks and one can walk over. Rooms are not new, but looks like they are repainted. A/C was cooling good in the room we stayed. Toilets were clean and so was bed. We hardly stayed in room considering that we spent more than 12 hours in Disney parks everyday. Considering that, this hotel was value for money for us. Breakfast was average and served only till 9 which made us miss it on one day. I suggest keep it till 10 for people who wake up late! After all they are holidaying in your hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am happy to hear we fit into your budget and you found us so affordable. We are at the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. Just a quick 15 minute walk and you are at the front gate! We are also located near so many great places to shop and dine making things very convenient. Thanks again for the review. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Honestly...we stayed a total of..............6 hours at our room, just when you thought you had your whole vacation figured out, this hotel wasn't our main hotel we stayed at during our vacation...our downfall...we didn't exactly plan where we would stay once we arrived in Anaheim, and we arrived around 4:15 am, our main hotel we couldn't check in till 3 pm, but our family needed a quick room/place to sleep after traveling for 22 hours straight...we were tired.  So after calling numerous hotels in the area, we settled on this one because they had a room available right away, and the guy (sorry forgot his name...who ever he was that worked the front desk April 9th around 4:45 am...thank you!!!!) even let us check out at 12...but we still checked out at 11, that was a very nice
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad to hear you had such an enjoyable stay with us and we do look forward to seeing you again next time you in the Anaheim area.  Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they were able to accommodate you with an early check in.  We do our very best to check each guest in as soon as possible even if it is before check in time. We will always keep your bags and let you park your car here so you can go about your day as well. Thanks again for the review. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Super 8 - Super Stay for Super Cheap
Summary: Great Service - Rooms are always clean - its a cheap place to cash in between the parks and fun of Anaheim. Full carb breakfast - toast, eggos, cinn buns, cereal - but a free way to start the day - and a few snacks for later. Staff is always friendly and close by to the parks and other places to eat. Good parking. If you want 2 beds in the room then your at the VERY back of the property though which isnt good for disabled folks. Pool is small but fun and clean as is the tub. If your looking for 5 star resort this is NOT it. But again great for the budget!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do have the items you mentioned included in our breakfast menu as well as several other wonderful items such as fresh fruit, yogurt, fresh made waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, toast with jam, cereal and milk, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of juice as well as hot cocoa, tea and coffee. We do have 2 bed rooms close by the entrance, next time let us know and we will be happy to assist and have you closer to the entrance. Good to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub during you stay! We look forward to another visit soon.

Summary Heading: Very convenient to stay esp. If u will visit Disney land u...
Summary: Very convenient to stay esp. If u will visit Disney land u can park there u don't need to pay parking pay for $17..10 min. Walk to go to disney..
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so conveniently located next to the Disneyland park. Just a quick 10 minute walk. Its great to save the parking fee at Disneyland and park here for free. Amenities such as free parking free wifi, complimentary breakfast (now with our warm fresh made waffles!) and fridges in all our rooms makes it such a great value when staying with us. Thanks again for the review. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I spent 2 evenings. Very enjoyable. Staff were very accommodating. Room was clean and pleasantly decorated. Complementary breakfast was a pleasant surprise, sweet roll, cereal, toaster waffle, tasty juice and coffee. Easy s walking distance to Disney Land and convention center as well as restaurants $-$$$.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review. I am so happy to hear you received that excellent service you so deserve. I am also glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do have some exciting news! We are upgrading our breakfast and now have made to order warm fresh waffles! Oh so yummy!   We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel was nice and clean.  Hotel staff were very helpful...
Summary: Hotel was nice and clean.  Hotel staff were very helpful during check-in.  For a budget type hotel, this Super 8 is in an excellent location for Disney goers.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! I am so glad to hear our  staff was so helpful to you during your stay. We are in a perfect location as well. Just minutes from so many great places to shop and dine, as well as a quick walk to the Disneyland park entrance!  Thanks again for the review. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Overall, a pleasant stay here.  We were pleasantly surprised with the condition of the rooms and that the property was well-maintained.  It's about a 20 minute walk to get to the Disney gates, which is doable, but not always great after a long day at Disney.  Several in our party walked back to take naps during the day and it's not too bad.  There are definitely closer hotels, but you also pay a premium for those.  Front desk was able to get us adjoining rooms which was nice.  Beds were comfortable, and noise was not an issue at all during our stay.  Room was very clean.  You are right next to the Anaheim Gardenwalk area.  Would not recommend most of the restaurants in the strip mall on the corner of Katella and Harbor.  Breakfast was in a tiny room next to the lobby and was
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad your visit with us was so easy and convenient. We are about a 10 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance. As you said we are very close to several places to dine as well as shop. The Garden Walk is a wonderful choice to visit as well for a place to eat. Bubba Gumps is right next door, as well as the cheese cake factory my personal favorite! We have upgraded all our rooms and they all include fridges now. We have also upgraded all our bedding and decor as well. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Myself and family stayed here for 8 days at the end of March. The location is fantastic for visiting Disney (about a 8 minute walk). It is also right next to a shopping mall which is handy for a few eateries. The family room was of a good size, the pool heated and clean. The breakfast was basic. The staff helpful and friendly. My only complaint with the motel is that we were staying on the ground floor. The walls seemed very thin and in the evening it sounded thunder claps going off over our heads with the people walking in the room above us. But all in all a very present stay
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad you had such and fantastic visit when staying with us. We are very convenient to the Disneyland park. We are also just minutes away from several places to dine and shop as you say. I am glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and found our rooms to be so clean and comfy. We do look forward to another visit!

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet, reasonably-priced motel in excellent location
Summary: We felt that we really hit the jackpot with the Super 8. Friendly front desk staff, large comfortable room, nice pool, great hot tub, quiet at night, family friendly, decent breakfast. And just a 15-minute walk from Disneyland. We never used our car while we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am happy to know you enjoyed your accommodations when staying with us! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful you found them so friendly and  helpful.  Yes our heated pool and hot tub is great, especially after a day at the Disneyland park. Thanks again for the review and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The main reason we stay at Super 8 is the continental breakfast. We look forward to not having to go any further than the lobby to grab something before we start our day. In times past when we stayed at Super 8's we enjoyed fresh fruit, a variety of fresh muffins/pastries and a waffle baker. The two separate Super 8's we stayed at this trip had nothing more than a couple choices of cereal, white bread, and a prepackaged danish. Rude woman in breakfast room was checking our room numbers???? AND I was charged $1 for 5 min of slow internet and $.50 per page for printing?? Also, luckily we checked out when we did because right after a maintenance worker jack hammered into a pipe, leaving the motel without water. Ridiculous. I will not be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Our super start breakfast does include a variety of choices. We do indeed have fresh fruit, yogurt, hot oatmeal, 2 kinds of cereal, cinnamon rolls, waffles, hot cocoa, hot tea and hot coffee, as well as 2 kinds of juice. We also offer milk, spread for toast, waffle syrup as well as jam. For more information on our complimentary breakfast, please visit the super 8 website. We do ask for our guest's room number upon arriving, just to regulate inventory. I do apologize if this offended you. We do have a computer and printer in our lobby available for our guest to use if they need to. There is a minimum charge for this service. We do offer free wifi throughout the building and are always here to assist if needed. In regards to the maintenance worker who jack hammered into a pipe leaving the motel with no water, this is incorrect information. I do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Good location to Disneyland.  Was about a half-mile walk.  Also within a block of some nice restaurants...California Pizza Kitchen, Cheesecake Factory, etc.  Morning staff were very nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad you found our location to be so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We are just a 10 to 15 minute walk to the entrance of the park. We are also just minutes from several great places to dine and shop as well. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they provided you with the excellent service you deserve. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Stayed for one night on March 30 2015.  Best Super 8 we've ever stayed at!  Very clean, comfortable beds, clean pool area and in a great location.  Even a small breakfast buffet to grab a bite before heading to Disneyland.  A very easy 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Lots of restaurants nearby also within walking distance.  We were planning on driving to Disney since we were checking out early on the 31st.  The lady at the front desk told us to leave our car in at the hotel for the day to avoid paying the $17 parking fee at Disney...even though we were checking out of the hotel.  Very nice place and would stay there again anytime!
Manager Response: thank you so much for the great review. I am so glad to hear you had a wonderful stay with us. I happy you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. We are very convenient to the Disneyland park as you said only a quick 15 minute walk to the park entrance. We do offer free parking as well and it does help saving the parking fee when going to the park. Thank you so much for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Staff was outstanding. My grandson and I arrived early and were allowed to check in, which I really appreciated. Response time for any request from the front desk was super fast. The room was clean, the only problem was in the bath...the water was never quite hot enough for a good shower. It would take a long time to get lukewarm.  Walk time to the main gate of Disneyland was about 20 minutes for me and my grandson.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! It's true we are very conveniently located when visiting the Disneyland park. Its about a 15 minute walk to the front entrance. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they provided you with the excellent service that you so deserve. I do apologize for the inconvenience of the lukewarm water in the shower. We do have a maintenance staff here and a 24 hour front desk staff always ready to assist. I do appreciate you taking the time to give us a review and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: My kids and I stayed here a few weeks ago to be close to Disneyland. It's reasonably close, but there are many closer places along the way. One thing we didn't appreciate was if you wanted an afternoon break at the hotel, all the walking adds up (because we would go back for the evenings).   The kids really loved the pool, but unfortunately I think they got sick. The adults didn't use the pool and were ok. We all ate the same stuff during the trip, so I'm suspecting it was the pool which caused them to be sick with stomach cramps and diarrhea. It didn't seem there was much of a chlorine smell (which I'm used to back home).   The breakfast was just ok. The ventilation fans didn't really work well for the bathrooms unfortunately.   Rooms were cleaned well but A/C was very noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Yes our pool is adequately chlorinated. I am sorry to hear the children were ill on the trip. Sometimes the difference in schedules and eating out often when on vacation can be a bit harder on the little ones. I do hope they are feeling better now. We are a 10 to 15 minute walk from the Disneyland park,and at times that can seem long after walking so much at the Disneyland park. The ART shuttle does pick up right next door and starts running an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. It runs every 20 minutes. There is a small fee, but it is very convenient and best of all it is air conditioned! We do appreciate you taking the time to give us a review and we look forward to seeing  you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Travelling from Australia with my daughter to USA to visit Disneyland you can be unsure as to what accommodation can be like.  Super 8 was clean, safe, updated and nice and close to the theme parks without breaking the budget.  We were very impressed with the property, enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, pleased with modern decor in the room and surprised by how close to the Disney theme parks Super 8 was. We felt secure and confident our property would be safe left in the room as the staff appeared trustworthy and honest.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! I am so glad you decided to stay with us when visiting America and the Disneyland park. I am glad that you and your daughter had such a great time and you enjoyed your visit here. We have recently upgraded all our rooms, they are very modern now and comfortable as well! Its true we are very convenient to the Disneyland park as well as several great places to shop and dine in the area. It's wonderful to hear our staff made such a great impression, I  want to thank you for the compliments to them. Thanks again for the review and we do hope to see you again next time you are visiting the area.

Summary: Stayed here for Anaheim cheer competition at Convention Center. The venue is short walking distance from motel. Room was clean and comfortable for family of 4. There are many eating options within short walking distance. I would definitely stay here again. I would suggest you let the guest know at check-in that you need to make a copy of their drivers license and credit card. Some people are uneasy when it comes to personal info like that.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! I am glad to hear we fit so well into your budge and you found us to be so reasonably priced. We are in the perfect location just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance. We are just minutes away from several great places to dine and shop. I am glad you chose us when here for the cheer leading competition at the Anaheim Convention center. We are only a quick 5 minute walk from there as well. I do appreciate your concern regarding our guests identification and information and I assure you we are extremely sensitive to this and very careful. We do this to confirm and protect our guests financial information. There is a lot of credit card fraud out there these days as well as identity theft, so we treat this very seriously when servicing our guests. I am so happy to hear you will be visiting us again soon! We do look forward to it. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: It's Spring Break so we took the kids to Disney and wanted an inexpensive place within walking distance. 10 minute walk from the Disney front gate. Had a 2 queen bed room on the second floor. Beds were new and very comfortable. The free breakfast was just okay. The only down side to the stay was the carpet in the room was old and stained. The kids didn't care but I did!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am so glad you chose to stay with us while on spring break! You are right, we are just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance. So convenient to the shops and  places to dine as well. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our new and upgraded rooms which includes new mattresses. They are very comfortable. I do appreciate your feedback on the carpeting and assure you I did pass it on tour housekeeping manager. Feedback such as your helps us improve our service for our future guests! Thanks again for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is only a 15 minute walk from Disney.. Rooms were clean and nice for our two day stay. No charge for parking was nice as a guest of the hotel. The staff was very nice and helpful since this was our first time visiting Disneyland.. Plenty of places to dine next to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park as you  say and just minutes from several great places to shop and dine. We do offer complimentary parking, which is a great deal when you can just walk to the park from here. I am glad to hear you found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. Thank you for the compliments. We are happy you had a great first trip here and we hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Good place for a short stay!
Summary: This is a good place in a good location if you're planning to visit Disneyland. There were restaurants around in walking distance. Not sure really how far it is from Disney if you plan to walk :) because I have a toddler with me so we needed a car.  Great price for a small accommodation, just don't expect a real 'hotel' amenities and service.  I travelled in 2012. Just didn't manage to review then! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's true we are in a perfect location when visiting the Disneyland Park. We are just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance. We are also very convenient to several great places to dine and shop as well. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Affordable, clean and within walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: The owners are clearly doing their best on keeping this older hotel clean and in good repair.    Breakfast left a lot to be desired, but they are trying.  With the great price we received on the room, I don't feel like complaining much about breakfast.  We just needed a no-frills, safe, clean place to recover before heading back to Disneyland at the crack of dawn each day.  This did just that.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad to hear you noticed and enjoyed the upgrades we have been making to the property. We are continuing to improve our motel to better our service and the experience of our guests. We do hope to see you next time you are visiting the Disneyland area.

Summary: This hotel was not far from Disneyland. Within walking distance. It was next to Hertz where I picked up my rental. My favorite restaurant: The Cheesecake Factory was right next to it.  Staffs were nice and friendly. I had bought some goods from EBay and had those delivered to this hotel prior to my arrival. They kept it for me and I had no problem receiving those after showing my passport. One of the dryer had problem and "swallowed" my quarters without working, the staff compensated my $2 lost with no question ask.  Breakfast was okay. It's free so can't complain much.  The only complain is WiFi connection which requires web log in. So web log in has to be redone every time I returned to the hotel after a day out.  As long as they could keep the rate low, I don't see why I
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. You are correct we are just  next door to the Garden Walk where the Cheesecake Factory (one of my favorites as well) is as well as several great places to shop and dine. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know they provided you with such great friendly service. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. I realize the when using the WiFi you much put in a password to access the internet. We do provide that to our guest's, but for security purposes this is very important as we want to make sure our guests are safe when browsing the internet. Thanks for recommending us and we do look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: Had everything we needed within walking distance to Disneyland.. the only sucky part, was there was no assigned parking.. if you parked close to your room, and you left.. it would be taken.. that was the bad
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. I am glad to hear we fit into your budget and you found us to be so affordable. We do have a great location when visiting the Disneyland Park. We are just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk to the front gate. We are also just minutes away from several  great places to dine and shop as well. The Garden Walk is right next door and then Downtown Disney is a great place to get a bite to eat or do some shopping. Thanks again for the review. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Thanks to Super 8 for being flexible with my booking needs - needed a ground floor room, because I was going to be using a wheelchair due to a knee injury.  This is our 6th time staying at this hotel.  Newly renovated rooms, with fridges, a bright new office and very friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's always great to hear from repeat guests. I am glad you liked our newly remodeled lobby and rooms. We are always improving to better our service and amenities for our guests. I am glad to  hear you found us to be such a great value and we fit into your budget so well. Thanks as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know they provided you with that excellent friendly service as always. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Decent place to stay but no in room safes even though the website lists safes as a room amenity. Safe available at front desk which is kind of inconvenient. Otherwise place was all right and served us well. Most of our problems arose in booking through Expedia so while we thought it was a decent place to stay we highly recommend not booking through expedia unless you want headaches and dissatisfaction!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am sorry about your experience with Expedia. Our hope is that you will find future reservations a lot easier and less confusion. You can call us directly to make a reservation and we are available 24 hours a day. We do have safes available at no extra cost at the front desk. Thank you again for the review and we do look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Run, do not walk, from this place. With all the options in Anaheim, I truly regret reserving this hotel. My experiences on the East Coast with Super 8 were very different. Below average conditions were made worse with a noisy area, the water being turned off on two occasions within 48 hours, only hot water for at least a day, and sporadic wireless that would kick in and out while trying to work. The advertised business center consists of one computer that only does limited internet, nothing else. The staff are friendly, but seem helpless to do anything.
Manager Response: I do want to thank you for the review. We did have an emergency which required the water to be shut off for a short time on one day of your stay. As a result we did discount your stay for the inconvenience. We do strive for perfection, however, there are times when emergency's do happen and unfortunately when it involves a major water line we do have to resort to such measures as shutting off the water for a couple hours to repair it. Again, we did compensate you for this and do apologize for the inconvenience of it. We do have wireless internet throughout the building, and for basic browsing it is just fine. Due to security measures we do not allow downloads and such. This applies to our lobby computer as well. This is for the security of all our guests. I do want to thank you for the compliment of our staff for being friendly. You did not specify what it was exactly that they did not do to assist you. We have a 24 hour staff and are always available to assist our guests at any time. Thanks again for the review. We do hope you will change your mind and decide to stay with us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Very Affordable and walking distance to the park. ...we stayed four days and three nights and had no complaints. ....staff were very friendly and helpful when needed. ..recommended to everyone.........................
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the review. I am glad to hear we  fit so well into your budget and you found our location so convenient. I want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. i am glad they provided you with such great friendly service. Thank you for recommending us to everyone and we do look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Love the location had a few problems with our room for...
Summary: Love the location had a few problems with our room for example the bath tub had some issues the water could not get hot enough and the drain plug came out.   The great part of the our stay was the staff very helpful and had great customer services.  The other thing we really liked is the location the hotel is next to some great restaurants and close enough to walk to Disneyland.  Next time we go to Disneyland we will be staying at Super 8 because of the customer service and location of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am happy to hear you found our location so convenient during your visit to Disneyland. It's true we are located just a quick 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know you found them to provide you with that excellent customer service you so deserve. We always strive to exceed our guests expectations. I do apologize for any inconvenience with the hot water. We do have a 24 hour front desk and a wonderful maintenance staff always ready to assist. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Perfect Deal - Good offer for staying near Disneyland!
Summary: You walk around 5-7 minutes to the Disneyland Entrance. We Paid under $80 per night including Tax, Fees and Parking. Room was very clean and looks new including flat TV. Perfect Deal.   Look, you save again $17 for not Parking at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It's wonderful to hear we fit into your budget and you found us to be so conveniently located and clean and comfortable when visiting the Disneyland park. We have upgraded our rooms including new flat screen TVs and fridges in all our rooms as well. Good to know you found these new amenities to your liking. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing  you again next time are in Anaheim.

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here Sunday through Wednesday in March to explore Disneyland and California adventure. Here are a few things about our stay to keep in mind..  LOCATION:The location was great, about a 10 to 15 minute walk away from Disneyland which is not bad at all.   PARKING: The free parking was a BIG PLUS considering most hotels will charge you a daily parking fee around$10 to $15 depending on the hotel.   OTHER FEES: You will get charged $5 for everyday that you need to use the microwave, or you can just wait to use the microwave from 6am to 9am during breakfast.  BREAKFAST: you get what you pay for, just like any other continental breakfast. For the price and savings you get with this hotel it's not too bad.  STAFF/ENVIRONMENT: The staff was very welcoming and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review!  I am so happy to hear you had a great stay and we fit into your budget as well. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to know they provided you with that excellent customer service you so deserve! It's true we are at a great location when visiting Disneyland. Just a quick 15 minute walk and you are at the front gate. We are also so close to so many great places to shop and dine as well. We do have complimentary parking which is a great value when visiting the Disneyland park as well. Thanks again for the great review. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: pros - .7 miles to Anaheim Convention Center        -  friendly staff        - nicely furnished and clean room with comfortable beds        - exhaust fan worked in bathroom cons - waffles were previously frozen         - one has to pay to use internet to print up boarding passes         - no microwave but there is a fridge
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. You are right it is a great location when going to the convention center. We are just a 5 minute walk from there. Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well. We will be having fresh made waffles very soon. I do hope you will  come back to check this out and stay with us again. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was a great find. A comfortable 10-15 minute walk from downtown  Disney, comfy rooms, near lots of places to eat, friendly staff.  It was a great bargain and really comfortable.  My one caution/suggestion - skip the continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! You are correct we are just 15 minutes from the Disneyland park and so close and convenient to so many shops and places to dine. Thank you for complimenting our staff as well. We look forward to seeing  you again!

Summary: My family visits Disneyland very often. We are used to staying at a different motel. At first, I was very disappointed when my usual choice was booked during my traveling days. Then Super 8 turned out to be a much better choice. I'm very glad things worked out the way they did. The rooms are clean. The walk to the park is easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad that you had such an enjoyable stay. It's true we are just so convenient and close to Disneyland and several dining establishments and shops as well. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: This was a nice experience. It was clean and quiet. It was easy to get to. Very enjoyable. I would definitely use this place again. Office staff were pleasant and very helpful.  I would recommend for others to visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Very happy to hear you will be back! We look forward to it. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy that you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay with us.

Summary: Nice and close enough to the park,reasonable priced,rooms clean and beds comfortable. Spa and pool are great for relaxing after a hard day at Disney or whatever. Plenty of outlet stores close by. Great staff,all pleasent,but must give a bouquet to the girl serving breakfast,always had a smile and pleasant,went out of her way to help. Best place to watch fireworks on Fridays through Sunday,was from the balcony area above the reception. Only letdown I had,was the dismal hot water supply to the hand basin,had to boil water to have a shave.Maintenance man thought it was great,but 2 mins to become barely tepid,nah! Pity,as they want you to conserve water,but if you have to 2 wait that long every day to get it warm enough to shower.Spa pool was the only decent hot water. Apart from
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. I am glad to hear we fit into your budget and you found us so convenient. I am also happy to know you found our rooms to be so comfortable.  We have recently upgraded all our rooms and have added several amenities such as new beds, and fridges in all our rooms. We have added new outlets as well for more access. Thanks for the compliments to our breakfast attendant. It's great to know she provided you with such great and friendly service. We do look forward to seeing you next time  you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Pros:  updated look to room (granite countertop).  comfortable bed close to Disneyland (10 to 15 minute walk depending on pace) right next to the Gardenwalk mall with PF Changs, Cheesecake Factory, etc. Conveniently located next to markets and CVS friendly front desk staff
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's true we are at a great location when visiting Disneyland. We are just a 10 minute walk to the park.We are also close to so many great places to dine and shop making it very convenient. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they were so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is a great hotel, close to Disneyland, can walk if you like, staff was very friendly and prompt with any issues. Beds were nice and comfy. I'd recommend this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I also want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy to hear they provided you with that excellent customer service  you deserve. Its true we are just a 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. We are also so close to dining and shopping, it makes it very convenient when staying with us. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We have stayed there on many occasions and have always been happy with it. It is not the fanciest of places but the rooms are pretty spacious and comfortable. Location is wonderful. Close to Disneyland and the garden walk and many restaurants.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's wonderful to hear we fit into your budget and you found us so affordable. Its true we are at a perfect location when visiting Disneyland as we are just a 10 to 15 minute walk from the park and so close to so many wonderful places to dine and shop. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Its a few years since we stayed here nothing has changed! Could do with updating, the room we stayed in had no hot water in the wash basin until you ran the shower the plumbing was very odd kept making strange noises! The room was clean & bed was comfortable & you get free breakfast so was good for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We have done a lot of upgrades to the property including the rooms. We have added fridges to all our rooms, updated all the bedding, and furnishings including the beds. We are consistently upgrading and improving our property for our guests to make every guest stay more comfortable and convenient. I am glad you found us so budget friendly and you found the room clean and comfortable. I am also glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Thanks again for the review and we do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This hotel is quite close to the Disneyland east entrance.  As other mention, the breakfast consisted of the cinnamon rolls, and toast or waffles. There were also some cut up oranges, and cereal. It was "OK" for a quick meal before heading out.  Our room's heater was a bit noisier than I would have expected, and there was a rattle whenever it kicked on. We didn't sleep much the first night, but must have gotten used to it after that, as we slept OK the remaining nights. Our room was at the very end of the complex on the outside, so it was very quiet with little to no traffic.  On the 2nd morning there we discovered there was no hot water. I let the front desk know, and there was a maintenance person at our room by the time I got back. They did something to the faucet that
Manager Response: Thank  you so much for the review. I love the title of your review. Its true we are at the perfect location when visiting Disneyland or if you are going to the convention center. Just a quick 10 minute walk and you are there. We are also so convenient to so many great dining and shopping establishments. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. I do want to apologize for any inconvenience experienced during your stay regarding the water, I am so glad that our maintenance staff took care of things so efficiently for you though. We do look forward to seeing you again when you are visiting the Anaheim Disneyland area.

Summary: Clean rooms. Friendly staff. Good pricing! Everything was great over all. Will definitely be booking again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We love to hear you will be returning! I thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad that you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay. Our housekeeping staff does do a wonderful job, its great to know you enjoyed your room and your stay. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: We had no shower curtain in one of ours rooms was told we would have to wait until the next day to get one. Also the hotel charges your card for rooms that you didn't booked and they keep charging you for 4 days for their mistake and then blame you! I don't recommend this hotel unless you want to loss money!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Even though from the onset your review  as well as the title of your review appears antagonistic, we assure you that we take your underlying issues to heart. Regarding your accusations of fraud as well as theft, we do take exception and we hope others will quickly discern the diversity and validity of all our reviews. Since there is a somewhat vindictive tone in the wording of your review, we have confidence it will quickly lose merit when held against the overall positive experiences expressed on Tripadvisor. Genuine and constructive feedback will always garner more reverence. Regarding the missing shower curtain when you arrived, we do apologize for the inconvenience of waiting until first thing in the morning.  Even as we strive to be the best hotel we can be we are not impervious to an occasional stumble along the way. We do take your feedback very seriously and have followed up with our Housekeeping manager regarding the issue of the missing shower curtain upon arrival.

Summary: Good value for money - it isn't fancy but pretty good for what you paid for. We stayed there for an entire month using it as a base to venture around the place.   We didn't fully anticipate the size of Southern California but there are a lot of great places to eat and also public transportation scattered around the place for you to use to visit places inside and outside Orange County.   The staff are really helpful and knowledgeable about what things to do including organising transportation and even making really good recommendations in regards to places to eat. There is a nice mall next door - decent restaurants and a movie theatre complex and a bowling alley downstairs in the basement.    The housekeeping staff were a bunch of angels - very friendly and professional. No
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! You covered so many great things I thank you for your detail. I do also appreciate your compliments to all our staff. I am glad the front desk staff was able to assist in  your long awaited vacation and the planning of your trip.  Thanks as well for the compliments to our housekeeping staff. I am glad that every thing went well while staying with us and you enjoyed your accommodations so much. Our rooms have recently been upgraded, it's great to know you  found it so comfortable. We are so happy to hear you will be back!

Summary: The price was right and the Super 8 staff were very friendly and kind, the room was amazingly clean, beds & pillows were great, everything worked in the hotel room,breakfast was great too! The cinnamon rolls were the best!! I am very pleased with our stay and will be staying here from now on!  You can walk to Disneyland in under 8 minutes - it's maybe 2 blocks away!
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. We are so happy to hear you will be returning! Its true we are just a quick 10 minute walk to the Disneyland park and so close to several nearby shopping and dining as well. I appreciate the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they were so friendly and helpful to you during your stay with us. And Yes, the cinnamon rolls are a great addition to our already wonderful breakfast. We are awaiting your return!

Summary: The receptionist was nice.  We were quickly helped.  The room was nice  and beds good the bath room tub was kind of old and I thought the tub was dirty.  The tub was not dirty just worn out.  The outside looked outdated but again the room was nice. There was a trash bin by where I parked I guess there is spring cleaning going on.  for a one night stay is it was good.  Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I appreciate your compliment to our staff. I am glad things went efficiently upon checking in. We are updating all our rooms, this is why you saw possible construction going on. I am glad you found the room clean and comfortable. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel has under gone a rehab since the last time we stayed 4 years ago.It is clean and comfy.The prices have gone up since the last time we were there but still worth every penny . we will definetely stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, its always wonderful to hear from repeat guests and to know you will be back! It's true we have worked on upgrading the rooms as well as the whole building including the breakfast area and the front desk. All our rooms come standard with extra pillows, upgraded bedding and mattresses and we have made sure there is a fridge in every room. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great deal for a nice room!
Summary: This hotel worked great for our Disneyland adventures. A short walk to Disneyland was really nice. They also have a shuttle which is helpful for those who need it. Property was nicely kept. The rooms were great. Our beds were very comfortable and everything was really clean. Breakfast provided was ok. Kinda skimpy but it worked.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's true we are just a 15 minute walk from the park, but for those who wish, there is the Anaheim Resort Transit that picks up right next door for a small fee. It's wonderful to hear you found our new and upgraded rooms to your liking. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Great location 10 minute walk to Disneyland,  Super clean room, super comfy beds ....my family enjoyed it ....will definetely be back soon
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. So glad to hear you loved your stay! We are very convenient just a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland park as you say. Happy to know you found our beds so comfy and the rooms so welcoming and clean. We are excited to hear you will be back!

Summary: This was a surprising decent hotel considering it was a Super 8.  The hotel was somewhat old but it was clean.  There were a few minor issues but other than that it was decent.  The doorknob to the bathroom wobbled and the bed was too close to the A/C unit.  It wasn't a major issue for us.  There were some construction going on during our stay but it was quiet.  The only inconvenience was that some stairs and hallways were closed and one had to walk around.  Breakfast was lacking but it was what I expected from a Super 8.  Mainly cold items and pastries and toasts.  No big deal as there were many restaurants around the hotel.  Staff members were friendly.    This is not a luxury place to stay but if you're here just to have a good sleep then it is decent and the price is fair.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found us to be a good place to stay when visiting Disneyland. Thank you for your patience during our refurbishment. We are doing our best to improve and make our guests comfortable during each and every stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I appreciate that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay. We look forward to seeing  you again

Summary: Great place to stay! Very affordable and easy walk to Disneyland. Loved the pool and spa, great to relax after a long day at Disney - and if you didn't stay for the fireworks you can watch them from the spa! Continental breakfast for free was good - cereal, yoghurt, fresh fruit and a cinnamon roll each morning is very easy. The staff were quite helpful - booked a day tour to Warner Bros for us and also helped confirm out bus trip to Las Vegas. The rooms were an adequate size, good having a mini fridge to keep drinks cold and the wifi was good, no troubles there. The beds are quite firm but suprisingly comfortable. Our only issue was the paper thin walls - maybe our neighbours were on their Honeymoon but we could hear 'everything' even with the TV on - at all hours of the day and
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! It's true you can watch the Disneyland fireworks from the hot tub and pool area. Another great place would be our sundeck. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to know they are excelling in customer service! I love to hear you will be back!

Summary: We stayed her for our very first Disney visit.  We got a grate rate directly from the hotels website ,better then any other . They had free parking free wifi( that was good)vand a continental breakfast. There a little pool and a hot tub that comes in handy after a long day at Disneyland. There's a mini fridge and a microwave in every room. This hotel was better the. The more expensive one we stayed after this.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It's true we are in a great location when visiting the Disneyland park. We are just a 10 minute walk and just a couple minutes from great restaurants such as Bubba Gumps, and the Cheesecake Factory. I am glad you found our amenities such as our free parking and free wifi to be so valuable. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome staff, so helpful and understanding.
Summary: Me, my husband, and my 2 year old son had planned a 3 night stay at this hotel. Sadly the night we arrived my son came down with a fever and a cough. We considered staying and trying to do Disneyland but after medicine nothing got better. So the next morning my husband went to the front desk to talk to someone about checking out early. They were very understanding, very kind and only charged us for the night we stayed and half for the second night. We were also given Disney folders for my son. This is why we always stay at this hotel. It's great hospitality anything we ever needed is done in a timely manner and with kindness. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review. It's always wonderful to hear from repeat guests. It's great to hear you will be back. We do hope your son is feeling better! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We decides to go to disneyland a day early the hotel price was right at $97.00 . The front desk was friendly and the room was clean. The bed was a little hard for me but my sisters like them. Our room was 163 on the bottom floor really quiet. It's is a little walk to disney  long block. I have to say that my friend left her watch in the room after check out she called the hotel they went to our room and they got it for us and put it in the safe. Kudos to them for honesty.  Thank you
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so helpful and friendly during your stay. I am also happy to hear you enjoyed our upgraded rooms. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Clean rooms, great price, not too noisy and plenty of parking. Within walking distance obit preferred the art shuttle which stops right out front of hotel. No microwave in room.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you found us to be such a great value when traveling. We are just 10 minutes walk from the Disneyland park, however the ART shuttle does pick up right next door and runs every 20 minutes. Although we do not have microwaves in our rooms, we do have them available upon request at the front desk. Thanks again for the review, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice clean rooms, very boring breakfast, but excellent value for money!  Yes the rooms are dated but still very clean. About 15 min walk to Disneyland gates, very close to 7/11. Small swimming pool but still great to have one. Staff not overly friendly or helpful, but I still think it's excellent value for money. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: thank you for taking the time to give us a review. It's great to know you would highly recommend us! I love to hear that you found us to be such a great value for the money. Thanks again for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again

Summary: We just got back from a trip to disneyland to celebrate my dads 60th birthday. This was a trip on a budget so any money we could save was going to be a bonus. This motel met all our expectations for the price. The rooms were clean and reasonably we'll serviced, we ran out of toilet paper one day but a minor issue.   One tip try and get a top floor room! If you have someone above you it sounds like an elephant stomping or maybe we had a heavy walker above us!  All in all a good place to stay, the free parking and free wifi were a definite selling point and more anaheim hotels should follow this lead!   They are renovating the motel but we didn't hear any of the work being done! Will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. So glad we fit into your budget and you found us to be an affordable place to stay. It's wonderful you found our rooms so clean and comfortable during your stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Older motel, but the owners appear to be reinvesting in the place to make it nice. I have stayed here several times in the past few years. Pretty clean for the most part.  It seems to get better each time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is always wonderful to hear from repeat guests. I am glad you have been enjoying our upgrades along the way. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: The Super 8 hotel in Anaheim is fantastic. Very friendly...
Summary: The Super 8 hotel in Anaheim is fantastic. Very friendly staff, great space in room, great selection of tv shows, free wifi, parking is well organised and excellent location. Really enjoyed my stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. It is a great feeling to be so conveniently located to the Disneyland park and the fact we have free parking as well. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I love to hear they are so helpful and friendly. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great place to stay,specially traveling on a budget. it may not be as cheap as others SUPER 8, but compared to most hotels in the area is a very good option, breakfast is basic but ggod enough to start the day..
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay. I am also happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very comfortable & clean & the maids were great. Great hotel for the price! & only a couple of blocks from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! I am glad you found our location so convenient. Thanks as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they were there to help make your stay so great! We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: A decent budget option in Anaheim, not too far from Disneyland (around a 15 minute walk). Our room was a good size for a couple and clean. Best of all is that the kind gentleman at reception let us check in early, given that we'd just arrived on a 15 hour flight from Australia, was much appreciated.  Was also an easy walk away from diners, a liquor store, a shopping mall, CVS and rental car lots. Didn't get around to trying the breakfast or swimming pool, so can't comment about those. The hotel seemed to be pretty popular with families and groups of friends visiting Disneyland. Would consider this place again for future visits.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. I also want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad we were able to check you in early as you had a long flight. It's true we are very conveniently located very close to the Disneyland park as well as several great dining and shopping places. So happy to hear you will be back! We really look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Our stay at Super 8 was great, short walk to the park, great price on the Hotel, no parking fees. The room was in great shape. LI loved how there was plenty of parking The only two negatives were the Hot tub wasn't Hot and the breakfast was fair.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Its true having complimentary parking is a big plus when traveling to the Disneyland area. Particularly since we are just a 10 minute walk to the park from here. I do appreciate your feedback regarding our complimentary breakfast. I am glad you enjoyed staying in our upgraded rooms. We have added some wonderful amenities to our rooms including fridges in all rooms at no extra cost. I do apologize if you found the hot tub was not hot enough. We do service it daily and check the temp on a regular daily basis. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I got this at ¬£44 a night on a deal and for that price I can't fault it. Rooms were as shown & clean, motel is perfectly placed in Anaheim, was quiet although I stayed in Jan. Staff were friendly, breakfast was basic but adequate
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I do appreciate your feedback and am so happy to hear you found us budget friendly and convenient to Disneyland Park. We are only a 10 minute walk from the Disneyland park as well as so many great places to shop and dine. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Far and above - superb for the price!
Summary: I was extremely pleased with the service and room for the price at this motel! The motel is located 2 1/2 blocks from the Disneyland Resort Theme Parks and is surrounded by a number of restaurants for those not wanting to eat at the parks.  The room was very spacious and clean, while the bathroom didn't have 'new' amenities, it was quite pleasant. The bed was extremely comfortable and while I was staying on the ground floor (which is at the car park), I didn't find it overly noisy.  Complimentary breakfast, a pool, superbly helpful staff and great location - all at an extremely low price!!  Why think of staying anywhere else?!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am so happy to hear we fit into your budget and you found staying here so convenient. We have upgraded all our rooms, I am so glad you enjoyed staying with us and you found the extras to help make your stay even better. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I have stayed in this hotel many times and am actually booking a room for my upcoming trip in Feb, I find the staff to be extremely friendly, the rooms clean and comfortable with all the amenities you need after a long day at Disneyland (which by the way is a 5 minute walk at the most you lazy fools) it has free parking, an amazing pool that has just been remodeled.  I don't know why, but on here I keep reading reviews about how terrible the FREE breakfast is... one, it is free, what are you expecting? I've had free continental breakfasts that are juice and an old packaged bran muffin... two, This goes WAY above and beyond your standard continental breakfasts... I mean, are you really complain about them NOT having bananas and having a bland orange?? They offer hot waffles,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay. I am glad you  enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. It is a great way to start your day. You are right, staying here is a great way to stay within a travel budget as we have so many complimentary amenities such as free parking, free wifi, complimentary breakfast as well. We have upgraded all our rooms and now there is a fridge in every room at no extra cost. Thanks again for the review and we do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was in town for the NAMM Show...all the flights were cancelled after the blizzard hit the north east...this Super 8 was very accommodating for me....allowing me to reserve additional days on a day-by-day basis at a discounted price until I could get on a flight (four days after my scheduled departure!)....great location, clean room, friendly staff, a bargain for that location, close to everything, and again, they went out of their way to make me comfortable while I was dealing with the travel disaster.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am so happy to hear you had a great stay during the NAMM convention. I am sure it was very convenient being just minutes from the convention center. I want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they were able to accommodate you and make your trip a bit easier. I do want to thank you again for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: There should be an audio-file from this hotel attached to the definition of "paper-thin walls."   I can hear people sneeze, giggle, and fart in surrounding rooms.  Last night my whole family didn't sleep a wink because there one of my neighbors was having sex all night long.  When I finally went to the front desk and complained, I was asked what room the people were in.  I replied, "either next door or upstairs.  I can't really tell because it is filling my room like stereo."  I asked to cancel my reservation for the following night because...I actually need myself and my family to sleep.  Imagine that!  I was dismissed without help.  Believe me, Disneyland is NOT the happiest place on earth with 2 hours of sleep.  I will NEVER stay in this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do try and make each and every guest as comfortable as possible. We do want every guests to have a relaxing and restful stay. We also have a 24 hour front desk available to make sure this happens. I appreciate the fact that you did contact the front desk and I assure you we did as always follow up on things for you. I do apologize if we could not cancel the following night for you, however your reservation was unable to be canceled or changed due to the booking method. It disheartens me to hear you do not plan on  visiting us again and I do hope that you will decide to stay with us in the future. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: I stayed here 5 years ago in 2010. Since then the breakfasts have got better and the beds are excellent. Good value for money and great location. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It's always great to hear from repeat guests. I am so glad you found us to be even more inviting and you noticed our updates. It's true we have updated our breakfast with some new items. We have also added fridges to every room as well as upgraded all our furnishings including the beds. We do look forward to your return.

Summary: Stayed with my partner, 9 year old daughter, and 9 month old son.  Rooms were clean and tidy, but the bathroom was dated.  Cheryl on reception was grumpier than a hive of bees after you've poked a stick at them.  Stayed twice, and as we had a stroller requested a downstairs room.  Got it the first visit, not the second time.  Cheryl got all huffy and made a scene of trying to find a room that had been serviced.  Eventually we ''got lucky'' and she found a room.  That, when we entered hadn't been used for a few days as it was out the back and smelt all hot and musty.  It was raining and right outside the door water fell from two stories onto the ground meaning we had quite a noisy night.   The breakfasts were quite good, lots of variety, and the server was pleasant and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad you found we fit into your budget. I am am sorry if there was a bit of delay checking in. I am happy our staff was able to get you in a downstairs room. Thank you for the compliments to our breakfast staff. I am glad they were able to provide you with that excellent service you so deserve.  We do love to hear from repeat guests. Hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Purpose of our stay was for the Star Wars Half-Marathon, Excellent Location, only a two-block Walk, West to Start Line. Plenty of Dining Options, we opted for Cheesecake Factory for our Carbo-Load, just a very short walk, East.  Enjoyed the Free Breakfast, of the Great Orange Juice and Cinnamon Rolls.Enjoyed the FREE WiFi, no problems connecting to the Internet at all, for both my tablet and laptop.  Our Room 104, Queen, was Big, Clean and Comfortable. We stayed at this hotel for the Disneyland Half-Marathon last Labor Day weekend and will return in May for the TinkerBell Half-Marathon, already have our Reservations set.  FREE Parking too!!
Manager Response: So happy to hear you enjoyed your stay as before. It's always great to hear from repeat guests. Convenience of location as well as our complimentary amenities does make for an enjoyable as well as  affordable stay. So happy to hear you will be back again! Thanks so much for the review. Look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The hotel was AWESOME ! near to a lot of great locations like Disneyland (of course), Bubba gump, The cheesecake factory, 15 minutes from Knott's berry farm (car drive).  The room condition was great, the staff was friendly and very efficent. Free parking was a big plus too !   Nightlife is great around the hotel and some stores are opened 24 hours a day.   This is an awesome deal, especially for the price. We will definitely stay here again, each time we're going back to anaheim.  Thank you super 8 !!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It is also wonderful to know we fit into your budget. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: I don't usually write reviews but felt that I had to for this hotel
Summary: I stayed at the Super 8 for three nights over the MLK holiday weekend.  I was never able to get hot water in the shower on four separate occasions.  It was lukewarm for all 4 showers.  Our room was in the back and had neighbors who were smoking directly outside of our room and were talking outside of our room everytime that we were back at the room from the parks.  The heating worked too well.  I tried to put the heating at low for two of the nights but woke up in the middle of night with the room at 100 degrees.  It is a good location for walking to the parks as it is only two and half blocks.  The price was very reasonable but I would be willing to pay $30-40 bucks a night to have a shower and working heat.  Parking was free.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during  your stay. The mentioned items were never brought to our attention though. I wish you would have given us the opportunity to make things better for you. We have a wonderful 24 hour front desk and a great maintenance staff who are more than happy to assist at any time. I do hope to see you again when you are in the Anaheim Disneyland area. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: I was in town to race the Star Wars 10K and Half Marathon. Given I was already running over 19 miles, I wanted somewhere close. The Super 8 was the perfect choice. A block away from the park and, as a great surprise, the Anaheim Garden next door with California Pizza Kitchen among other well known restaurants. The car stayed undriven while I had a great time,
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. I am so happy to hear you found our location so convenient during your stay. It's true we are just minutes from so many great places to shop and eat as well as only a 10 or 15 minute walk from the Disneyland park entrance. thanks again for the review, we do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stay in Super 8 hotels every time we go out of town. Not only was this one not what we expected but we had no working key for our room the whole entire time and the continental breakfast was nothing but cereal and eggo waffles. We had a room next to ours that had a con joining door and the family we were traveling with were staying in it so we had to go through their door anytime we wanted in our room. We contacted front desk they sent maintenance and it worked for them with their master key but never did with ours. We got to the parking lot one night and smelt marijuana. People were just sitting in their car smoking it right next to our vehicle. I'm not saying that is the hotel's fault because I don't have a clue who the people were but the fact that they felt comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  I am sorry for any inconvenience experienced with using your key for the room. We did have maintenance fix this for you and the keys worked. As far as someone smoking in their car, we are a non smoking motel. We  can not advise our guests not to smoke in their car. If there is ever an issue with this bothering another guest while they are in the room we will always address it of course.  We did not have any reports to the front desk regarding this. I do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: The hotel was very clean considering the price. The employees were also very nice as well. Its a nice walk to disneyland. This would probably be my hotel of choice next time :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they provided you with excellent and friendly customer service. It is true we are at a perfect location when visiting Disneyland. Just a 10 to 15 minute walk and you are there at the front gate. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed here for the Star Wars Half Marathon 2015. I was pleased with the price and its vicinity to the parks. Check-in was seamless and the young woman checking me in was very, very nice.   Parking was free and ample (however there was an entire row cordoned off due to construction or renovation). This was during a holiday weekend as well (MLK). I wanted to mention this because the hotel rooms were quiet and I could not hear any of my neighbors either of the nights I stayed. Quite honestly, I was not expecting much from this hotel. When I walked into my room (second floor) I even went "woah" because it was a lot nicer than I imagined it would be. However, once I spent more time in the room the age of the room started showing. It seemed a lot of the room had been renovated/redone
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad  you had a great stay with us. Thank you so much for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they provided you with that excellent service you so deserve. I am sorry about the hot water inconstancy. I do not have any reports to the front desk regarding this. In the future please notify us right away so we can fix things for you. I do appreciate you taking the time to give us such a great review. We do look forward to seeing  you again soon!

Summary: It was a nice budget hotel, clean sheets, and towels and nice beds. The breakfast was a bit meager, but it is a budget hotel! This hotel is very close to Disneyland and the staff were pleasant and helpful. They were renovating some rooms while there, but it did not interfere with my stay. This is an older hotel, so no elevators for the upper floors.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. We are very close to the Disneyland park, you are correct. Just a 10 minute walk away. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so glad to hear they were so friendly and helpful during your visit with us. We are upgrading all our rooms, including the furnishings and the decor as well as the amenities. I am glad it did not interfere with your stay. Thank you for the review once again and we do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed at this location several years ago, so we knew that it was in a good location with regards to its location to Disneyland.  It is just over 1/2 mile from the entrance, which doesn't feel very far in the morning, but at night can seem twice as long!  We had two, connecting, rooms, and one was far more updated than the other.  Both rooms were very clean, but the less-updated room never had truly hot water.  I wish my sister had made me aware of it during the trip--instead of after we'd left.  I would have said something.  The rooms are not fancy, but they are large and clean.  They really need to get around to updating all of the rooms, as well as making sure that all rooms have hot water all of the time.  If I continue to see that hot water is an issue, I would probably
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are a block and a half from the main gate of Disneyland. It takes about 10 to 15  minutes to walk.  We also have the ART shuttle that picks up right next door and comes every 20 minutes. It starts running an hour before the park opens and runs up to an hour after it closes. It is 3 dollars each time you get on per person. We are upgrading all our rooms with new amenities, and furnishings. We are very excited to have you return to stay with us again. I am sorry to hear about the hot water issue. We do have a 24 hour front desk as well as maintenance available to assist. Thank you again for the review and we do look forward to seeing  you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, very close to Disneyland
Summary: we stayed at the hotel from the 23/12/14-29/12/14 the room was big enough for two people but the bathroom was a little small, but very clean. Customer service was very good, staff very friendly , they booked a number of tours for us. Free breakfast was included every morning, which was very good, also we used the guest laundry during our stay, we needed quarters for the machines and staff at the office have rolls of quarters all ready for guests to use. Disneyland is only about a 10min walk around the corner, so not far at all. Wifi was fantastic very quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. I want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they were able to assist in booking tours while you were here. We can book tours to Hollywood including the beaches as well. We also book tours to various theme parks such as Seaworld, Universal Studios, The San Diego Zoo, and many more great places to visit while you are here. Just check at the front desk! I am happy to hear you took advantage of our complimentary breakfast and enjoyed it so much. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: We stayed 3 nights and didn't want to leave.
Summary: Cheap price especially considering we stayed during a busy holiday rush.  Breakfast was nothing fancy - juice, coffee, toast, donuts, but it was helpful nonetheless!   Not as close to Disneyland as they make it seem. Yes it's on the same street, but it's about a 10-15 minute walk if you're ok with that. Wasn't a problem for us (2 adults, no kids). No restaurants within walking distance. Closest would be Downtown Disney. We ordered pizza delivery our first night, and the other nights we ate in the park. (THAT was actually bad service. Delivered more than an hour after we called it in! Pizza Plus - stay away!) Clean rooms. Comfortable beds.  Wifi was terrible but we didn't have much downtime anyway.  Parking was free.  Front desk service was great! Can see the Disneyland fireworks
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! So great to hear you did not want to leave you enjoyed your stay so much. It's nice to know you enjoyed our Super Start breakfast. It its a great way to start your day. We are within a short 10 to 15 minute walk from the Disneyland park entrance. For those who do not wish to walk, the ART shuttle picks up right next door and comes every 20 minutes. It will drop you off right in front of the Disneyland park gate. Thank you for the compliments to our front desk staff, Glad to hear they are providing that excellent service you deserve! We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Worth about as much as you pay.
Summary: Pros: friendly and helpful desk staff, great location, great rates, good size mini fridge. Cons: no comforters on the beds made for a cold and uncomfortable sleep, thankfully they do have excellent heaters in the rooms, there was also a funky smell in our room for the first couple of days until we successfully covered it up with perfume (yuck!), housekeeping didn't seem to be very thorough as we ran out of kleenex and toilet paper halfway through our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I also want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they provided you with that great customer service you deserve. We are at a perfect location when visiting the park. Just a 10 to 15 minute walk. We do provide extra blankets available at the front desk at all times. There are also extra blankets in the drawer in the room if needed. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to you  next visit with us.

Summary: Nothing but good things to say about our stay at Super 8.  Bed was comfortable, wifi was great to have.  We only utiliized the breakfast for the coffee.  The refridgerator was nice sized and we asked for a microwave and they brought it immediately.  It was exactly what we needed to be close to the park and all of the staff were very professional and always smiling.  Would definitely stay at this hotel again.  Also the ART shuttle picks up at the hotel next door, so we purchased tickets at the Discount Ticket place over in Garden Walk for the three day pass and it helped alot to cut down on some of the walking, but it really is a short 10-15 minute walk to the park if you don't want to wait.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We have upgraded all our rooms and now all rooms include a fridge. We also have microwaves available upon request at the front desk. We are just a 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. The ART shuttle does pick up right next door for those who do not wish to walk. I am happy to know you will be back!

Summary: Who'd knew: here's a break down the items on their breakfast menu: Eggo waffles, sliced bread, raisin bran/frosted flakes cereal, milk, packaged cinnamon bun, bland oranges, strawberry/strawberry banana yoplait yogurt, powder hot chocolate, Sunny Delight Orange drink or Apple Juice. Of course there's also coffee and hot water. So now you know.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do have a complimentary breakfast every morning from 6 am to 9 am. The signature free SuperStart breakfast includes hot coffee, tea and cocoa as well as apple and orange juice. Choose from cereal, fruit, yogurt, waffles, white and wheat bread for toast, and our new Simply Super Cinnamon Roll ‚Äì perfectly delightful after warm-up in the microwave for 20 seconds. We're pleased to feature the following delicious brands: Farmer Brothers¬Æ World's Finest¬Æ or Medium Roast Coffee, in Regular and Decaf Lipton¬Æ Tea, in Regular and Decaf Swiss Miss¬Æ Hot Cocoa Florida's Natural¬Æ Growers Orange Juice and Apple Juice Kellogg's¬Æ Raisin Bran¬Æ Cereal Kellogg's¬Æ Frosted Flakes¬Æ Cereal Kellogg's¬Æ Special K¬Æ Cereal Quaker¬Æ Instant Oatmeal Variety Pack Dole¬Æ Fruit Cup (or fresh fruit) Dannon¬Æ or Yoplait¬Æ Yogurt Carbon's¬Æ Golden Malted¬Æ Waffles or Eggo¬Æ Toaster Waffles Our free breakfast hotels also offer the Simply Super Cinnamon Roll.  I am glad you found our location so convenient while staying with us. It's also great to hear we fit into your budget. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: The location of this hotel is great, right beside a convenience store and 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. (If you are heading there from the hotel, remember to stay on the sidewalk closest to the hotel - the right side - because if not, you will get all the way up to the Disneyland gates and realize you would have to climb over a huge meridian wall to get in).   The hotel itself is pretty average, it could use a facelift and carpet cleaning for sure. Continental breakfast is nice but it's also pretty average. Do not expect very much out of your room.  One thing that was very strange: My boyfriend and I were going to an Anaheim Ducks game and needed a cab to the stadium. The man at reception said he would call us a cab and it would pull up outside the reception doors. What
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. It's true we are just a 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance. I am not clear on the wall that you speak of however.
