If you go right out of our parking lot and walk on the sidewalk to the signal which is on Harbor Bld.  You cross the street and head right up Harbor Blvd. It will be on your left hand side just about a block up. If someone does not want to walk, there is also the ART shuttle that picks up right next door to us on the sidewalk in front. Either way, it's very easy to get to the Disneyland park from here. Thanks again for the review, I do hope to see you again next time  you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It's a Super 8, but it was clean and quiet.  It took our family 12 minutes to walk from the Super 8 to the Disneyland sign.   On our way back every night, we would stop at the 7-11 for slushies or hot chocholate.  We have annual passes to Disneyland and usually stay directly across the street.  This was the furthest we have stayed, but the walk was not bad.  We only went to Disneyland two days on this trip.  If it had been a four or five day trip, this would have gotten long for us.  If you have stayed across from Disneyland, you know that none of the hotels are 5 star hotels.  This hotel is comparable to the hotels across the street as far as cleanliness goes, just be ready for a further walk.  My sons enjoyed the breakfast every morning.  It was all quick food but they had
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we exceeded your expectations. I want to thank you for the compliment to our housekeeping staff. It's true we are at a great location, so close to the Disneyland park. It's just a 10 to 15 minute walk and you are at the front gate. We are also so very close to several dining and shopping establishments. I am glad to know you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. It is a great way to start your day. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I love this hotel not only because it is close to everything but also because the people who work here are exceptional from the front desk, to the wonderful morning breakfast crew, housekeepers and maintenance crew. I am disabled and they always take the best care of me. Lots of great places to eat nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I also want to thank you for the compliment to our staff. We do our very best to provide you with that excellent customer service you so deserve. I am glad to hear that you found our location so convenient. We are located only 10 to 15  minutes from the Disneyland park and there are several dining and shopping establishments right next door. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: When this hotel was cheaper than any other I was worried what might be wrong with it. NOTHING! Large rooms, walkable to Disneyland, right next door to Anaheim Gardenwalk, great big breakfast room. We will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review. I am so happy to hear you will be back! We look forward to it. I am so glad to know we fit into your budget and you found our location so convenient! Thanks again for the review.

Summary: The room itself was ok.  It was clean and recently remodeled.  However, the bed was lumpy and uncomfortable. Walls are very thin, could clearly hear people in the next room having a rather serious argument. There was also no hot water.  When I told the front desk they didn't seem real concerned.  It is barely within walking distance of Disneyland, coupled with the lack of hot water I would not stay there again.  For the price, I expect hot water.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We have recently remodeled all our rooms and have upgraded all our furnishings including new beds and mattresses. We are a 10 to 15 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance. For those who do not wish to walk, the ART shuttle picks up right next door and runs every 20 minutes. I do see you reported no hot water here at the front desk and we had our maintenance staff on it as soon as you reported it. We do appreciate your review and hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Hotel was clean .staff was very friendly and nice .location is walking distance from disneyland .restaurants right next door
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad that you found we fit into your budget. We are at a perfect location, just walking distance to the Disneyland park as well as several dining and shopping locations. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them so helpful and friendly. We do look forward to your next visit with us when you are visiting the Disneyland park.

Summary: This is our third stay at this Super 8.Handy to just everything. Staff are absolutely outstanding.from the ground staff to the office staff.Rooms large and comfortable. Free car parking, and breakfast included. What more can you want.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's always great to hear from repeat guests. I am happy to hear you found our rooms so comfortable and spacious. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and added fridges to all rooms. Upgraded bedding and carpeting as well as furnishings  are just a few of the changes and upgrades we have made. Thanks so much for the compliment to our staff. I am glad they are continuing to provide that excellent service you so deserve. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This hotel was in walking distance to Disneyland, it had a view of the nightly Disney fireworks, and a nice breakfast. The desk staff was friendly with excellent suggestions for Disney access and nearby amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. it's true we are in walking distance to Disneyland. Just a 10 to 15 minute walk and you are at the gate. I do want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to hear they were so helpful and friendly. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again when you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Great location to the convention center and Disneyland for the price. Clean, decor was slightly dated, but the room was much bigger than I expected for a Super 8 motel. I was there for work and only stayed one night, but the staff was polite, helpful, and they served breakfast. Overall, I enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I do want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. Its great to know they are providing excellent customer service. I am also happy to know you enjoyed your accommodations and found them so clean and comfortable. We do look forward to seeing you again soon

Summary: Stayed here with my two kiddos on a trip to disneyland. The beds were super comfortable, the room nice and clean and big, the television was really nice. Was close to the park, and since I had my daughter in a stroller, was a quick 10-15 minute walk to the front gates every morning. Continental breakfast was served, we grabbed something quick to get to the parks early and not have to spend a huge amount of money on breakfast at the park. Cheesecake Factory was a 5 minute walk away as well as a little mall. Only ONE thing would have made this perfect, and that would be a fridge in the room, but everything was so great and we will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Thank  you for the review, I am glad to hear you found your accommodations so comfortable as well as our location to be so convenient. I noticed it has been a while since you have visited us. We have since your stay with us upgraded all our rooms with fridges. It is a popular request, so we have made this standard in all our rooms. We have also upgraded our furnishings as well as all the decor, carpeting and mattresses. You will be so happily surprised next time you visit us. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: Wow - what a great stay. Ichelle at the front desk was outstanding, and couldn't have done more for us. So much friendlier than at other more expensive hotels. Room was nice and clean. Close to new CVS and of course Disneyland. Highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I also want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know that you were given that excellent customer service that you so deserve. I am happy to know you enjoyed your accommodations and you found them to be so clean and comfortable. We do have a wonderful location, just 10 minutes from the Disneyland park. I am happy to hear you found us so convenient. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We love this hotel. We stay in the park all day so we don't need all the frills. Always clean. Noticed the shower heads were finally replaced which is awesome along with refrigerators in the rooms. They were in process of replacing the bathroom countertops during our stay so can't wait to see those next time. The only 2 complaints I have this this time is we were in the very back upstairs and a large family was staying below us and next to us and they were out in the corridor very late at night and it echoed very bad back there so ill make sure we don't get those rooms again. Also after the counter tops are done can we get new mattresses??? Maybe I just noticed it more this time as we spent more time in the room due to the rain, but they've definitely outlived their
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! It's always great to hear from repeat guests. I am glad you did enjoy some of our recent upgrades to our rooms. Yes we are in the middle of upgrading all our furnishings as well as beds. As always thank you so much for returning and we do look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Very convenient, clean, comfortable place to stay.  Only disappointment was the breakfast. Options were lacking.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad you found your accommodations so clean and comfortable. I am also glad to hear you found our location so convenient. We do have a complimentary  Super Start breakfast from 6 am to 9 am every day.Our breakfast includes cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, yogurt, fresh fruit, toast with Jam, Signature cinnamon rolls and waffles with syrup. We also have assorted beverages such as juice, tea, coffee and hot chocolate. It is a great way to start your day. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Idea for disney on a budget!
Summary: Lovely room! Didn't hear a sound from any neighbour, walking distance to disney and breakfast was great. Would definitly stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and found your accommodations so comfortable during your stay. I am also happy to know we fit into your budget. It's true we are just a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland park making our location very convenient when visiting Disneyland. I am so glad to hear you will be back! We look forward to your return.

Summary: We stayed in this motel for 5 nights at the end of November. The Location was great. It is about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland and there are many restaurants very close. There is also a CVS and a 7/11 (i think?) very close by. The beds were very comfortable and the room was clean which is basically just what you need when you're visiting Disneyland! The motel was also very quiet and we had no issues with noise whatsoever. The only reason for not giving it 5 stars is that we didn't get hot water in our room. You had to fiddle with the shower for a long time and only then was the water moderately warm. We didn't complain or mention this to the front desk and maybe we should have but it was only a small problem. The front desk people were also great and I would recommend this
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review. I am so happy to know you found our location so convenient during your stay with us. It's true we are just minutes away from several great dining choices as well as just a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland park. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay. Please do not hesitate to notify the front desk in the future. We do have a wonderful 24 hour front desk to assist with any concerns at any time. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We went to Disneyland in October of 2014 and stayed 11 days at this motel. These people are really on top of things for a moderate priced motel. Very clean and very safe motel to stay at. Front office people are great and the house cleaning staff were friendly and they do a great job. I do not think you should stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's great to hear they are providing you with the excellent service you deserve. I am so glad to know we fit into your budget and you had such a great stay with us. Thanks so much for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The hotel is in a very convenient location, not only clost to Disney, but restaurants, Target, CVS, etc. And the room is confortable with clean sheet and fresh air. My allergy usually got triggered by some motels, but I did not feel irritated during the 4 nights I stayed there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you found our location so convenient during your stay with us. We are just a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland park as well as very close to many great dining establishments and shopping. Thank you for the compliments to our housekeeping staff. They do a great job making sure to exceed your expectations every time. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Not 100% super, but pretty hard to beat!
Summary: It had been two years since my then-boyfriend/now-husband and I had been to Disneyland.  Last time we stayed at a 5 star hotel up the road.  This time we thought we'd be more practical since it was just a place to lay our heads after 2 busy days at Disneyland.  Got a great rate for 3 nights by booking online.  Definitely met the budget.  And this time, the walk was even closer to the Park than the last time (after a 14 hour day, the shorter walk back, the better).  And the 7-Eleven close by is always fun for a quick drink or snack. Price! Price! Price! Location! Location! Location!  It truly is a Super place to stay if you need to shower & sleep.  Only a few knocks:  first, the clean towels and bathtub had a couple of hairs.  The water isn't the hottest.  The bottom of the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am so glad to hear you found our location so convenient during your stay. It's true we are just 10 minute walk from the Disneyland park as well as several great restaurants . I am also happy to know we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. It's wonderful you will be visiting us again next time you are in Anaheim. We look forward to it! Thanks again for the review!

Summary: It has your basic necessities. I slept well and was able to take a shower. Problem is, I woke up with a bite in my face and ankle. I'm not too worried as I have gone camping before and had a ton of mosquito bites. Just didn't expect it from a super 8. We didn't care for breakfast much because there were a lot of people in the breakfast room fighting for microwaveable waffles.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We do have a great maintenance staff who does preventative maintenance on a regular basis. I do hope you take advantage of our complimentary breakfast next time you stay here. We do have additional seating in the pool area as well as on our sundeck. Thanks again for the review. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Cheap, great location, nice room, but very basic breakfast
Summary: It's cheap and the location is great. There's enough parking for everyone. The room is quite big, nothing fancy but comfortable. I wish the breakfast were better -- it's a buffet, but it really doesn't taste good. There's no protein too. If you're into good breakfast, you might want to eat elsewhere.  There's also no elevator, so try to ask for a room on the 1st floor if you have big bags.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am happy to hear you found our location so convenient during your stay. It's also great to know we fit into your budget. We do have a super start breakfast from 6 am to 9 am every day. We do offer a variety of items, including fresh fruit, yogurt, oatmeal, toast, cereals with milk, waffles as well as our famous signature cinnamon rolls.Our yogurt, whole grain oatmeal, whole wheat toast as well as the milk are all great sources of protein. Thank you again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: This hotel and staff is so amazing.
Summary: I stayed 10 days at this hotel. I fell in love with the location and the staff. I've never met a front desk staff as amazing as these guys. They always have a smile on their faces. A special thanks to the housekeeping department. They kept my room clean and fresh. A special shout out to Ana, Ichele, Omar, Ron,Rigio, and there manager Peter. Keep up the great job! :-)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! I am so glad you enjoyed your visit with us. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear they are providing you with the excellent customer service that you deserve. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights, room was satisfactory size & clean. I did have to ask for soap & tea bags as they were not restocked each day. I guess it was just forgotten. Pool & spa is good size. Location is good, 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Bubba Gump next door, Chinese, pizza 5 minutes walk, souvenir shops very close, breakfast room rather small & at times hard to get a seat. Overall it was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to hear you found our location so convenient during your stay. It's true we are just a 10 minute walk from the Disneyland park. We are also very close to several restaurants and great shopping. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: easy to find location, close to freeways. Nice place to chill out. We had the pool area to ourselves during the day , as everyone goes to the theme parks. Easy walk to many restaurant's. Rooms plenty big enough.
Manager Response: I am happy to hear you found our location so convenient while staying with us. We do have a heated pool and spa available from 8 am to 10 pm every day. I am also happy to know you took advantage and enjoyed the pool and spa. We do look forward to seeing again soon.

Summary: Our 4-night stay was comfortable.  Our room was clean and spacious.  It would be great for the complimentary breakfast to include eggs...even hard boiled ones so there is some sort of protein available.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review.  I am glad you found your room so comfortable and you enjoyed your stay. We do offer yogurt as part of our breakfast, which does provide a good source of protein as well. Thank you again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Great location (within walking distance to Disneyland park...
Summary: Great location (within walking distance to Disneyland park entrance), clean rooms, helpful and pleasant staff.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. I am happy to know you found our location so convenient. Thank you for the compliment to our staff, I am glad they are providing you with excellent friendly customer service. Thanks again for the review, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great hotel, the beds were fantastic and comfortable, for busy days at the theme parks this is the perfect low cost option.   Having previously stayed at the Hilton, I would stay in the super 8 again first - better location, free breakfast and friendly staff.   The only negative was the shower pressure - pressure needs to be increased, or shower heads updated as it is a bit poor. However the hot spa is a great option for fixing tired feet.   Staff are friendly and helpful - overall very happy with this budget option
Manager Response: Its wonderful to hear we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great value. It's true we are at a great location, only a 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. I do want to thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad to know they are giving you that excellent customer service that you so deserve. Thank you so much for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland Park.

Summary Heading: Noisy and too far from Disneyland
Summary: Spend 3 days in this hotel 11/8-11/11/2014.  It is too far for seniors to walk to the park, so we paid to park at the disneyland parking lot .  It was advertized that there was a shuttle, I never saw one.  The one queen bed had the A/C unit that blocked one side of the bed.  When Disney had there fireworks, it shook the whole building and felt like it was in the hotel room!  First night there was a car speeding in the parking garage next door with police sirens a blazing behind him. Not a place I would recommend .
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. There is indeed a shuttle that picks up right next door. The ART shuttle (Anaheim Resort Transit) starts running one hour before the park opens and up to an hour after it closes. It runs every 20 minutes and drops you off right at the Disneyland resort entrance. We are a 10 to 15 minute walk for those who wish to walk on over. You mention the Disneyland fireworks shook the building, this is not possible. We are pretty close to the Disneyland park, and you can see the fireworks from here, and of course you can hear them.Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.  I do hope to see you again next time  you are visiting the Anaheim Area.

Summary: I seriously love this place. It has a great breakfast and all the facilities I need when I'm away at a reasonable price. Bed, Fridge, WI FI, Pool and Hot Tub, 2 blocks from Disneyland. Been going there for years. Wish I was there right now.
Manager Response: We wish you were here now as well. Thanks so much for your great review, and thanks for continuing to make us your home away from home. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: It was good that we were able to register for our motel room and leave our vehicle in the parking lot the morning we arrived. The 15 minute walk to Disneyland/California is not too bad. Plenty of restaurants nearby if you don't want to eat inside the Disney Park area.  Continental Breakfast in the morning was okay.  Beds were very comfortable for a good nights sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's great to know  you found our location so convenient during your stay. It's true we are just minutes from the Disneyland park and several places to dine and shop. I am glad you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Decent rooms, good front desk staff. Comfy beds too. One light didnt work in the room but other than that, everything from Ironing board - hairdryer - wifi - fridge was there and all clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments to our staff. So nice to hear you enjoyed your accommodations. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: This hotel was far better than I expected. It was...
Summary: This hotel was far better than I expected. It was incredibly clean and the staff was lovely. The complimentary breakfast was even good!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Its great to hear we exceeded your expectations. Our breakfast is a great way to start the day and its complimentary! Thanks again for the review, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here Nov3-12. Had a good experience again, as was my 4th stay! Rooms are clean, for the most part was quiet (had noisy neighbors), breakie was ok but a good start to the day: consisted of toast, eggos, yogurt, juice, cereal, coffee. Close to resturaunts: IHOP, PF Changs, Bubba Gump.   My Dad had issues calling hotel (the girl who answered the phone first sent him to the wrong room, then told him we had checked out. Then had the nerve to blame my Dad for the mishap!). Other than that, the staff was great, friendly, & helpful. Free breakie should be adjusted with the hours of Disneyland - makes it tough to eat by 9am when the park opens at 10am. Only about a 15min walk to the park.  Pool and hot tub were awesome, but only open till 10pm. WiFi did however tend to cut in and
Manager Response: Glad to hear you will be back! I appreciate you taking the time to give us such a great review. Happy to know you enjoyed your stay and you found us so convenient during your stay. We do have a great breakfast to get you going in the morning. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland Park.

Summary: this is all you need when you stay so close to such fun adventure parks! the room was very clean and the breakfast is pretty nice. Would recommend to anyone who wants a budget but nice place to stay!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am happy to hear we fit into you budget and you found us so conveniently located. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I only stay there when I go to Disneyland, I mean, I only use it to sleep so it's ok, it's clean and cheap and that's what matters. Kudos to Danielle in the breakfast room, she's great! gave us a lot of tips. And also the guy at the front desk, Eli or Ali (Sorry, I don't remember) very helpful and kind. Great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments to our staff and the great review! It sounds like you had a wonderful stay with us, that's great to hear. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: If you are planning in spending all day at Disney, stay here. The rooms are spacious and clean. There were heaps of house keeping staff and when I saw them they were being very thorough, cleaning door handles and everything! The check in staff (owner) were super friendly. Had a infant cot and microwave bought to our room within 15mins of asking. The breakfast is basic, but fills the spot. Looked like they were renovating some rooms too. Easy walk to Disney. BEST bit... The beds are AMAZING!!! We stayed in 10 hotels on this trip... And these beds were the best! Even our baby had a REAL crib! Not a pack and play! If I had to complain it would be about the curtains not being adequate to keep out the light from the exterior lights and morning sun. But that was minor.  Don't waste
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! I am so happy to hear you had a great stay with us. It's true we are just a short walk to the Disneyland park and so convenient to so many great places to dine and shop. Thank you for the compliment to our staff. It's wonderful to know they are providing the great customer service that you deserve. Thanks again for the great review, we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We are regular visitors to Anaheim,and we always stay at the super 8,the staff are very helpful and friendly.  The updates to the rooms are great, big comfortable beds,great after a long day at Disneyland,and having a fridge in the room is a huge bonus,we love the flat screen tv's,and having free wifi is a great way to keep in touch with family back home.  In one of our rooms we had a problem with the tv and the front desk had maintenance straight down to fix it.    We had a request for bottom rooms due to health problems and the super 8 accommodated us, a big thank you for that. We will be back in Anaheim again and look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. I am happy to know you enjoyed the upgrades to our rooms. We have upgraded all the furnishings, carpeting, decor, and added amenities such as a fridge in every room at not extra fee. So glad  to hear you will be back! We look forward to your return!

Summary: This hotel is in an awesome location! It's a very short walk to Disneyland, and there's a nice mall next door with lots of good places to eat. But, let's be honest here, for the price it is, and the location, don't expect too much from the room itself. It is a Super 8.  The pillows on my bed had to have been nothing more than just a piece of foam rubber with a pillow case on them. They were awful. It made me wish I had brought my own pillow! I thought it was neat they put four on the bed, until I realized that you have to double them up to hope to have any sense of comfort.  The room was quite clean. The bathroom, while modest, certainly worked fine.  It was fairly noisy my first night there, but got quieter the other nights. (Of course, those nights I had been to Disney and was
Manager Response: I am happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient while visiting the Disneyland park. I am also happy to know we fit into your budget and you found our accommodations to be so comfortable. I do appreciate your feedback, and will look into upgrading our pillows. I do apologize for any inconvenience regarding us not changing the sheets while you here.  We do as respect to our guests and their personal property, not touch personal belongings and remove them from the bed. We do as a courtesy,  leave a note to let our guests know that is why the bed was not made up with clean sheets. Thanks so much for the review, and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed here for our family Disney trip. It's nothing fancy but definitely a decent place to lay your head. The room was clean, service was good. The walk to Disney isn't bad if your in decent shape but if you don't like to walk, this place probably isn't a good option for you. You can't beat the price. We don't really care about how nice the room is, as long as it is well kept (and this one was), especially at Disney because all we do there is sleep. The continental 'breakfast' wasn't really anything but a bunch of sugar so if you want to do Disney without crashing after a couple of hours, you should opt to eat an actual breakfast at a restaraunt somewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us. It's true we are a 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park. For those who do not with to walk, the Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) picks up right next door and it comes every 20 minutes. It's another great way to get to the Disneyland park for a small fee. We do have a Super Start breakfast including yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal, oatmeal, waffles cinnamon rolls, toast, as well as coffee, cocoa, and tea. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed here 11 days in November 2014. The rooms were clean and they parking area is kept very clean too. They have night walking security officers on duty after dark and everyone is very friendly. The breakfast while fairly plain, will still fill you and save you a lot of money each day. The walk to Disney takes about 10-15 minutes at a brisk pace. We will always stay here!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! Its wonderful to hear you will be back! Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am glad you found them so friendly and helpful during your stay. It's true we are just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland park from here. Values such as free parking, free wifi, and complimentary breakfast do add to the value of the accommodations. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: From the moment we walked in the people here were nothing but friendly.  The bed is the best we have stayed in throughout the 7 cities we visited on our trip.  The breakfast staff were friendly, helpful and had a great range. Location was great. 5-7 minute walk to Disneyland.  Our room didn't have a microwave, I went to the office to re heat some food. The male at the counter told me to go back to my room and they would bring one up. I argued but he wouldn't have it, he insisted on someone going beyond to help.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments to our staff, I am so happy that they were so friendly and helpful during your stay with us. I am glad to know you enjoyed your accommodations and like our upgrades such as the fridge coming standard in the room and upgraded mattresses. It is true we are just minutes away from the Disneyland entrance making it very convenient when staying with us. We look forward to seeing  you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thanks for the great review!

Summary: Great location. Close to Disneyland, conference center and restaurants. Room had small fridge, flat screen TV with lots of channels. Tiny bathroom. Carpet looked old and dirty. Air conditioner worked but falling apart. Room smelled musty- air fresheners to put on vent supplied by motel. Price lower than nearby motels/hotels-but still high for rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a review. It's good to hear you found our location so convenient. It's true we are just 10 minute walk to the Disneyland front entrance. We are also just minutes away from several great dining locations and shops. We have added fridges to all our rooms, as well as flat screen TVs with upgraded cable channels. We also have new carpeting and new AC units in our rooms.  We do hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: This was definitely a good option for the price and location to Disney. However, the water was never warm and being right next to the pool was really loud. The staff were good at making sure the noise didnt continue past 10 pm, though.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear you found us to be such a great value for your money. We are the perfect location as we are only 10 minutes walk to the Disneyland park.  I do apologize for any inconvenience with being in a room close to the pool. We do have many rooms that are located away from the pool area. Just request when you make your reservation with us. I am glad to hear our staff did a great job with making sure things quieted down once the pool was closed at 10 pm. We do look forward to another visit next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Good size room but dirty.  Carpet hadn't been cleaned in 12 or months.  My grandson who's 5 was so dirty after playing on the floor. When I put him in the bathtub t o give him a shower he had left muddy foot prints on the tub. The tub had black mold and it was clogged.  I will NOT book any future stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We actually do clean the carpets on a regular schedule, and it is certainly more often than every 12 months. I did research your stay and do not find any reports of the mentioned problems with the tub or the carpet.  We do have a 24 hour front desk staff as well as wonderful Maintenance staff available to assist, I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay.  I do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel was a great stay for our vacation. It's super close to Disneyland, we were able to just walk there every day. Room was clean and in good condition, didn't notice any excessive noise, and staff was very pleasant and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear you had a great stay with us and you will be back! I want to thank you for the compliment to our staff. I am happy to know you found them to be so helpful and friendly. We are in the perfect location for shopping and dining nearby Disneyland.  Just a 10 minute walk and you are at the front gate of the Disneyland park. Thanks so much for the review and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Great location and value for money with super helpful and informative staff. It is walking distance to both Disney parks and lots of nearby restaurants and rental car firms as well as a 711 and DVS store for take to your room spirits. The free breakfasts are an added plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad to hear you found staying with us to be such a great value. I want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them so helpful and informative. It's true we are just minutes away from the Disneyland park as well as many wonderful dining establishments and places to shop! We do look forward to seeing you again !

Summary: It was ok except for the fouls smell coming out of the airconditioning and the roaches crawling up the walls! Slept with the lights on to keep them at bay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I have checked with the front desk and have no reports of the mentioned problems you said you experienced during your stay.  We do have a 24 hour front desk staff and maintenance is available to address issues such as this if needed. We do have a routine maintenance prevention and upkeep schedule for all our rooms. I do apologize for any inconvenience and do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I had to be moved 4 times in one day! They kept locking me out of the room. Not a good time. Was gonna stay longer but went to another hotel and enjoyed there much better
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. Originally you had a reservation for an ADA accessible room with one queen bed. We determined upon check in you did not need an ADA accessible room so we moved you to a standard one queen bed room. You then requested a room with two queen beds, so we at not extra charge upgraded you to a room with two queen beds. You then requested that we move you to another location in the building, so we upon your request moved you to a different location. At no time did we make you move to another room, only moved you upon your request. We did not lock you out of the room at any time. There was an occasion during your stay that you said your keys did not work, we  after checking the lock discovered it was user error as the lock worked just fine. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during you stay, I know we did our very best to make your stay a pleasant one and meet all your needs.  We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Firstly: SAVE $17 BUCKS ON DISNEY PARKING!!! YAYYY!!!! It's only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, which is super awesome. We paid about $85 per night for our room with 2 queens, but after saving the money for parking, it was even better.  The staff was super nice. The guy who helped us check in was super personable and he talked and joked with our whole family. As for breakfast, it wasn't the greatest. Toast, some fruit, etc. We usually got a snack from there, ate it on our walk to Disney, then got a snack later on in the park.  Rooms: The beds were AMAZING, but the pillows were HORRIBLE. We loved the beds so much, but our necks ached all week because the pillows were about an inch thick. Otherwise, we loved our room. Lots of counter-space near the bathroom to get ready, which we
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am glad you found our beds so comfortable. I do appreciate your feedback on the pillows. I assure you we will look into this and do our best to make sure your next visit is even better. I do want to thank you for the compliment to our staff. It's always great to hear that our staff is exceeding expectations with our service to our guests. We do look forward to seeing  you again next time you are in Anaheim visiting Disneyland!

Summary: Aside from being within walking distance and saving the $17 Disneyland charges for parking (like it's not expensive enough already), the room was spotless, the folks at the front desk very pleasant and helpful, and the BED was AWESOME!  Since I'm not a breakfast person, it didn't bother me that it was more a "snack" than breakfast, but don't expect to get full on the breakfast.  √ú
Manager Response: I am so happy you loved our new upgraded beds! We have remodeled all our rooms and have all new furnishings including new mattresses. It's true with our free parking its a great value when staying here. Disneyland charges $17 dollars a day for parking, save your money walk on over, it's only a 10 minute walk to the park. Thanks so much for the review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Another budget hotel that was perfect
Summary: Located on Katella Ave, but near to the Disney complex.  Since we had a 4 day park hopper Disney pass we just wanted to be close enough to walk each day.  It was about a 10-15 minute walk, but not a hard one.  An ART shuttle picks up out front but will cost $3/person each way.  Stayed in room 215, room was clean and comfortable.  Fridge and percolator in the room.  Nice pool and spa with good WiFi site wide.  As with all hotels around Disney you have heaps of restaurants nearby, we had a great meal at Tony Romas.  Breakfast is continental in a nice area, staff very friendly and mostly helpful (maintenance guys REALLY nice and friendly).  Remember this is a budget option so we found it good value, don't come here looking for a Disney Resort experience.
Manager Response: I am glad you had a perfect stay with us! I want to thank you for the compliment to our maintenance staff. They do a very good job assisting our guests. We have upgraded all our rooms and I am happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities. The fridge and coffee maker as well as extra pillows, irons and blow dryers in all rooms do add to the value and comfort of the room. The ART shuttle is a great way to get to the Disneyland park if you do not want to take the 10 minute walk from here.  Again I am happy to know your stay was perfect. We look forward to another visit from you soon! Thanks for the review.

Summary: want to drop all your cash on a hotel or save it for  fun and entertainment? this hotel is inexpensive and offers parking FREE, breakfast FREE, in room frig, hairdryer, iron, in room tea and coffee FREE, in room wifi FREE, the rooms have all been refurbished, are spacious, flat screen tv and when you exit your room you are outside on your verandah, no walking down the hallway looking for the elevator. its an easy walk to everything including the Disney Parks, restaurants, CVS, 7/11. it offers a pool and spa, coin operated laundry. the staff are friendly, and the main thing the rooms and grounds are kept clean. i have stayed at this hotel many times and certainly recommend it,
Manager Response: It's always great to hear from repeat guests! You are right with all the free amenities it does make it a great value for your money when staying with us. I am glad you liked seeing the fireworks from our sundeck!  We look forward to seeing  you again. Thanks so much for the great review.

Summary Heading: Shocked by the amazing value for money
Summary: Ok, so you have to take this review in context ‚Äì we paid $85 (AUS) for our room per night, which in Australia would get you a backpackers (probably with a rat thrown in). This review is very much based on my idea of good value for money and I have to say I was wowed. My husband and I stayed for 4 nights from 7th September to 11th September and like a lot of people we just wanted somewhere to crash. We don‚Äôt have kids and so I didn‚Äôt want a place with a big gorgeous pool, full of kids, that I then wouldn‚Äôt want to use. We just wanted a nice clean hotel or motel walking distance to Disneyland and for this part of our trip (2.5 weeks away from home) we wanted something cheap. We were both very surprised by how much we got for our money.  Pros  Perfect location ‚Äì 15 to 20 minute
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's so wonderful to hear you had a great time when staying with us. I am so glad you know that you found us such a good value for the money. Our amenities that you mentioned such as free wifi, complimentary breakfast, free parking all add to the value of your stay here. It's true we are at the perfect location when visiting the Disneyland park. It's just a 10 to 15 minute walk to the entrance. It makes it very convenient to get around when the local restaurants and shops are just moments away. Thanks again for the wonderful review and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Terrible hotel but close to Disnayland
Summary: If you are looking for a cheap hotel and are willing to overlook the bad breakfast and outdated rooms this is your place. Only good thing it has going for it is the location to Disneyland. The breakfast was bad. No hot food unless you want an ego waffle or toast. No fresh fruit. If you like cereal and yogurt this is your place. The room was outdated. The hot water in the sink did not work. The bed was comfortable. Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. We actually have updated all our rooms and upgraded them with all new furnishings, new carpeting, new mattresses, and upgraded all our rooms by adding a fridge to every room, as well as a coffeemaker and iron and ironing board. Our complimentary breakfast does include waffles, oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, toast with jam, 2 kinds of cereal, fresh fruit, yogurt, juice, coffee, tea and hot chocolate. It's a great continental breakfast, and a great way to start the day. Glad you found our location so convenient, it's true we are just a 10 to 15 minute walk from the park. I am sorry to hear about your problem with the hot water not working. We do have a 24 hour staff that is always there to assist. I do not show any report of the hot water issue during your stay. Always report these things and we will be on it right away. I do hope you will stay with us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights. The room was clean and comfortable,plenty of room for our family of 4. The  breakfast which was included with our stay was convenient and made it easy for us to get on our way for the day's activities .  The staff was excellent and responded quickly to any question or need we had. The hotel is close enough to Disney Land to walk there and the free parking at the hotel made it very economical.  It was also very nice to have the refrigerator in the room.  Our stay was very pleasant and we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear you will be back!  It's always great to know that our guests feel well taken care of when they are staying with us. I am glad you found our location so convenient during your stay. I am glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It's a great way to start the day. It is wonderful to know you found the new upgraded rooms so comfortable and that you found the fridge to be a great asset while staying with us. We have upgraded all our rooms, and one of the best features is the fridge in all rooms. We do look forward to seeing you again soon! Thanks for the review!

Summary: The room was very spacious and well kept. I've paid more and gotten less before. We were on a trip to Disneyland, hotel was 5 minutes from parking lot, also there was shuttle service available right in front of the hotel. Staff was very friendly and did a great job. The free breakfast was very adequate. Pool and Jacuzzi were great! My only small complaint is it is getting about time for them to upgrade the A/C units, but it worked well while were there. The beds are newer and very comfortable.  I will absolutely stay here again the next time I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the compliment to our staff! I am so happy you found us to be such a great value. It's true our complimentary breakfast, free wifi, complimentary parking, fridges in our upgraded rooms and our convenient location make it a great value when staying with us. Thanks for the review, We cant wait to see you again during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Good value, room was clean, and reasonably quiet. Plumbing is noisy, fairly loud when a neighboring room is running their bath or shower. Breakfast offering very basic but adequate for kids. Better restaurant next door
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, I am so glad you found us to be such a great value and we fit into your budget. It's very true we do have several dining places close by. This does make it very convenient. We do have a complimentary breakfast that includes 2 kinds of cereal, oatmeal, yogurt. fruit, toast, waffles, cinnamon rolls, juice, and coffee tea and hot chocolate. An excellent way to start your day! Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Service OK but cheap doesn't have to mean dirty
Summary: This hotel is basic, cheap accomoadtion near to disneyland which means there is one reason and one reason only for booking into it and that is that you can walk to disneyland.  I am a big fan of value for money and so would probably have graded this higher but for a few major issues.... because it is the cheapest in the area.  They laid on a spread for breakfast which was basic, easy to eat food that filled a hole , but if you have a bit of spare cash I would save it and pop next door for a decent brekkie.  This is because the dining area is a bit run down, crowded with 'scraping across the floor chairs' and spilled milk and juice on the tables from it's previous occupants.  Nobody comes round to clean up when one set of customers leave....which brings me onto the real reason
Manager Response: I do want to thank you for the review, We do have an excellent staff who is here to make sure things are clean and tidy while you are staying with us. Our housekeeping manager inspects every room prior to renting it to our guests. I do apologize if you found this not to be the case. I do not have any information of any reports to the front desk regarding this during your stay. I do know if there are any issues during our guests stay we do address it right away. I do hope to see you again so we can show you that excellent service and accommodations that you so deserve.

Summary: Stayed here for a night while we were traveling to san diego. Can't really say much about the price since I didn't pay for the room. However the room was ok. The bathrooms were ok, pretty small but it got the job done. Beds were fine.  The cons were the traffic noise, what else can we expect from the location. I usually don't have trouble sleeping with noise, but it was a little distracting hearing the amount of traffic that took place throughout the night. We were given a choice of free donuts and coffee for breakfast though, that was nice.  It's an ok hotel if it's in your price range and don't get bothered much by the traffic noise.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, I do appreciate you taking the time to give us a review. I am glad to hear you liked your accommodations and found our rooms so comfortable. I do apologize for any noise experienced during your stay. If there is anything the front desk can do it's always a great idea to let us know. We do have a 24 hour front desk. I am happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is a great way to start your day. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Had a great time, treated well, price is right, and some upgrade, excellent place. And we love the new breakfast, oranges and yogurt perfect :)
Manager Response: Its wonderful to hear from return guests! Thanks so much for the review. I am glad you found the same excellent service as always. I am sure glad we fit into your budget and that you enjoyed our upgraded rooms! We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Excellent location and great customer service!
Summary: Located at just 5 minutes walking from Disneyland this is our go to Hotel when we go to LA, the staff is always on a great mood and always happy to help. the only bad thing is that if you get a room too far from the main building, the internet connection is a little slow. otherwise a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, and the compliment to our staff. I am glad they gave you that excellent friendly and helpful service you so deserve. I am also glad you found us so convenient. It's true we are just minutes away from the Disneyland park and several restaurants and shops as well. Again, thanks so much for the review, we do look forward to your next visit with us next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The room was clean, the bed comfortable, the shower hot. Breakfast was simple, but available daily. The transit has a stop right outside the hotel to get to the happiest place in earth and the Garden Walk is just a block away with good food. It's a great stay for the value!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Happy to hear we fit into your budget and you had such a great stay with us. It's true we are at a great location when visiting Disneyland park. It's just a 10 to 15 minute walk, or as you say the ART transit does pick up right next door. Glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, and found our accommodations to be so comfortable and clean during your stay. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: Staff were fantastic, couldn't have been more helpful. Room was well looked after during our stay and was always neat and tidy to come back to after a hard days footslog seeing all the wonderful sights of CA. Only draw back was the room had only 2 queen beds and we had to pay for a roll away due to having two teenagers of different sexes. It was an expected cost that we hadn't counted on, however not a fault of the motel but that of our travel consultant, who should have been more thorough in her checking. A 10 minute walk to the front gates of Disney land and California adventure park, with IHOP and Denney's and many other restaurants on the way.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am happy to know you enjoyed your stay and thanks so much for the compliments to our staff. I am glad they were so helpful  during your stay. It's true we are just a few minutes away from the entrance to the Disneyland park. There is a 7 11 next door, however we also have a new CVS pharmacy that just opened as well for even more convenience during  your stay. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Just what you need to get you through the vacation or stay in Anaheim.  Perfect local for Disneyland/ Angels stadium/ whatever you do.  Friendly staff and clean rooms.  Thumbs up
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments to our staff, It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found our accommodations so comfortable and clean.It is very true we are so close to the Disneyland park as well as other locations such as the Angels stadium. I am glad you found us so convenient. Thanks so much for the review, we look forward to the next time you visit Anaheim!

Summary: Check-in was pleasant and easy, the staff helpful, and the room was clean. The property was generally calm and quiet. Using the wi-fi was convenient. Though the pillows were a bit awful.
Manager Response: I am happy to hear we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay with us! I do want to thank you for the compliment to our staff, I am glad they were helpful and friendly. Thanks so much for the review, we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was very helpful finding us transportation. The only reason for the 4 is the pool was small but large enough to enjoy.
Manager Response: Thank you  for the review. I am glad to hear you found your accommodations to be so clean and comfortable during your stay with us. We have recently upgraded all our rooms with new furnishings and decor. We have also added fridges to every room for added  convenience. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so helpful during your visit with us. We are here to assist you 24 hours a day here at the front desk. Thanks again for the review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We booked this as the price was good and it was close to the parks and it delivered on both accounts! The room was standard but fine for our needs. We were only really here for disneyland so it was only a place to sleep. We walked to the parks took about 20mins. They have a Cheesecake Factory and bubba gumps just next door. The staff we encountered were all were friendly especially the lady who checked us in!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Thanks so much for the compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so friendly and helpful. Its also great to hear that you found us to be such a great value for your money.  Our amenities such as complimentary breakfast, free parking and free WIFI are just a few things that help to make your stay more affordable. We are just minutes from the Disneyland Park entrance so you can save the parking fee and park there and take just a 10 to 15 minute walk and you are there! Thanks again for the fantastic review, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed here a few times. Before we had kids and now with our two girls. The Super 8 is always clean and the back rooms are quiet. Its is cheap, within walking distance to Disneyland and includes breakfast. What more could you want? We will definitely stay here for any future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: It's so great to hear you will be back! We look forward to seeing you again! Thanks so much for the review. It's great to know you found our location so convenient and you found us so affordable. We are just minutes away from great places to dine and shop and are just 10 to 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland park. Thanks again for the review, we cant wait to see you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: No doubt about it, great location, certainly close to Disneyland, good clean accommodation and certainly good value.  Always the problem when you have a good business the manager's get lazy and ignore the fact that you have nearly 50 people trying to have breakfast by 9am in a space that sits 15 or so.  What ever you do don't ask the managers a question....it won't get answered professional because they don't care.  However, their staff are awesome and will go out of their way to help you.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's nice to know you found our location so convenient and your accommodations to be so comfortable and clean. I appreciate your compliments to our staff. I am glad you found them to be awesome during your stay and that they were so helpful and friendly. I assure you your feedback regarding the breakfast room will be addressed. It's feed back such as yours that helps us better our customer service. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I want to start my review with a praise to the desk staff, we arrived earlier than expected and they gave us an early check-in at the moment, what a great way to start our vacations. The hotel is super well located, just 10 minutes from Disneyland, however we prefer the drive because at the end of the day all we wanted was to sleep as soon as possible, the Disneyland parking lot is at 3 minutes or less. The breakfast wasn't that great, but is a good sugary way to start your morning: waffles, yogurt, cereal, juice and milk. Good pool great for entertaining the kids, but watch out there's no lifeguard on duty so you will have to be with your little ones. This hotel is great for when you're vacationing on a budget, I will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the compliments to our staff. I am always happy to hear they are providing that excellent service you deserve. I am glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and found we fit into your budget. Such things as our complimentary breakfast, complimentary parking and our great location make it an affordable convenient place to stay. I do thank you for the awesome review, and we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary: We ended up going to Disneyland last minute. We booked Super 8 as we were referred by a family member that had stayed there before. No complaints. Was a great price & walking distance to Disneyland. Breakfast in morning & last minute booking was a plus.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. I am so glad to know we fit into your budget! It is true we do have a great location and are very convenient when visiting Disneyland, just 10 to 15 minute walk and you are there! We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The location is fantastic if you are visiting Disneyland. It is less than a mile walk so you don't have to deal with shuttles or public transportation. My family stayed for three nights and had no complaints. There's nothing fancy about it, but the room was clean and equipped with a refrigerator, so that was a nice plus. The continental breakfast included yogurt, cold cereal, fresh fruit, waffles, toast, and packaged cinnamon rolls, along with orange or apple juice and coffee or hot cocoa options. The parking is free, so you can leave your car during the day while you're at Disneyland. The pool is fine, nothing fancy, but again, functional! The shower head is quite low, so unless you are under 5'7", it isn't ideal, but it does the job. All in all, considering the price and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! I am so glad to hear that you had a great stay and will be recommending us! It's true we are at a great location when visiting Disneyland. In just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk you are at the park entrance. It's nice to know you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. This as well as complimentary parking are just a couple of money saving options when staying with us. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for one night while we were waiting for our family to arrive and our timeshare to be ready. I had never stayed at a Super 8 hotel and was a little apprehensive, but after reading the reviews, decided to give it a try. During our stay, the whole staff was friendly and helpful. I was even able to purchase my Disneyland tickets from them at a great price, $201.81 for a 2 day park hopper. Our room was not swank but very clean, well appointed and comfortable.  Breakfast consisted of yogurt, packaged danish, fruit, frozen waffles, cereal, oatmeal, toast and beverages. Even though I checked out in the morning, they said I could park my car there all day while I was at Disneyland. In summary, great deal for a great price!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! I am glad you found us so affordable and such a great value. Thanks for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy to know that you found they provided you with friendly and great service. It's true we do have tickets to various theme parks including Disneyland at a discounted price. Please check with us upon arrival. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Used to more - Great for what you pay
Summary: This room is just that - a room. Nothing fancy, nothing special, it's just a (short in the morning long in the evening)  17-25 minute walk from Disneyland!  If you're looking for Disneyland accomodations on the cheap, this is your hotel.    They were out of tickets when we tried to buy some, so we had to walk into downtown disney the night before and pick them up.    Definitely a great place for a last minute vacation on a tight budget.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad you found us a good value for the money. We do have upgraded deluxe rooms that have upgrades such as a fridge in every room. We have recently upgraded and updated all our rooms with new furnishings and decor. I am glad you liked your accommodations.  We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I liked this hotel. Pretty close to disney parks and downtown disney. Price was fine, and so was the pool area.  Room was spacious, but the staff at the front desk was not so polite. Not rude, but dealing with tourist could be done differently (not assuming someone has a perfect English).
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad you liked your accommodations and the location. It's also great to hear we fit into your budget. I do apologize for any inconvenience at the front desk. I am glad you did not find our staff to be rude. You deserve excellent service. I realize sometimes the language barrier can make it a little difficult at times to communicate. We do have an excellent staff who will do their very best to accommodate and assist you. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: My family and I went here for a night while attending the happiest place on earth (sorry its not you).  The staff was friendly and tried to engage in conversation with myself along with my family, allowed us to park while prior to checking in, and were excellent the entire process.  I would highly recommend and we will be back next time we are going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Happy to hear you will be back! Thank you so much for the wonderful compliments to our staff. I am so happy to know that you received such great service as you so deserve! I am glad you had a great experience, we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at Super 8 and had a great stay - primarily due to the awesome Staff! Comfortable and easy walk to Disneyland. Staff were just great in accommodating our needs, requests and answering our questions. I would recommend and will certainly say here again!! Fantastic value for money.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! I am glad to hear you found us such a value for your money. I want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad to know they are providing you that excellent customer service you deserve.  We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Excellent value for money, would stay again.
Summary: This was the cheapest place we stayed in during our USA Holiday, and we were a bit concerned. But being peak season and booking a last minute holiday we didn't have a lot of choice. However we had no reason to be concerned. Yes, its an older place, it's furniture is outdated, and it doesn't look anything special. But for the money we paid, I give it 5 stars! The staff were very helpful and friendly. The room was large, the bed very comfortable, it had everything we needed. We walked to disneyland (and home) everyday, it was 10 minutes if that.  I would have felt lazy getting a shuttle. The cheesecake factory was a few doors down. Good location, Good accommodation and value for money excellent!
Manager Response: Glad you found this to be such a great value! It's also great to hear you will be back! We have upgraded all our rooms with new furnishing including adding a fridge to every room. We do have a great location, just minutes from the Disneyland park. It's true it is very convenient. I want to thank you for the compliment to our staff. I am glad you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your return! Thanks for the review.

Summary: Way too noisy at night. Noisy including cars, loud music, people, I put on my ear plugs which helped a little. Most of the noise stopped by about 2AM. What a rotten nights sleep. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS MOTEL.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. I do apologize if you did not get a good night sleep due to noise. We do have a 24 hour front desk, I did not see any mention of you calling the front desk. We are here to assist with such matters to the best of our ability. Please always give the front desk a call when your sleep is disturbed. We are here to help make sure your stay is the best it can be. We do hope to see you again.

Summary: Hotel was clean. Staff working hard at maintenance & cleaning to maintain the facility. Some rooms look like the start of updating hotel rooms.  Very nice staff
Manager Response: Thanks for the compliment to our staff as well as your accommodations. I am glad to hear you received excellent and friendly customer service and you loved our updates to our rooms! It's true we are upgrading all our rooms, adding fridges to every room, putting in new furnishings, bedding and d√©cor. Love to know that you noticed! Thanks for the review, we do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We LOVE the Super 8 on Katella.  We've stayed there before.  We'd stay there again.  However, the shower situation has GOT to get fixed.  We had little to no shower pressure, and a SUPER LEAKY shower head.  It would blow water out of the shower curtain and get all over the floor.  Once we figured out the problem we put down towels to catch it the next time.  When we checked out we told the person on duty and they said they'd check into it.  Otherwise the rooms are spacious, clean and there's even a strip plug on the desk to plug in all your electronics (VERY handy with 4 girls with cell phones and curling irons and hair dryers...).  The ability to get 2 parking passes was HUGE for a us too and was the different between staying there and ANYWHERE else.  We carpool as much as
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad to hear you had a great stay with us. We have upgraded all our rooms with fridges and other amenities such as the power strips, new bedding new furnishings, new mattress and all new modern d√©cor. We have also upgraded our breakfast to include those cinnamon rolls along with waffles, yogurt, fresh fruit, juice, cereals, toast, coffee tea and cocoa. Glad you enjoyed it!  I am sorry to hear you waited till you checked out regarding the shower. We do have maintenance available to assist with this and we would address it right away if we knew. Please don't hesitate to advise us right away in the future. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim, Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: We stayed here from September 9th till the 14th during our visit to Disneyland Resorts. Overall, the staff was friendly and courteous, the room was fairly clean and updated, and most of all served our needs being a short walk to Disneyland and close to some familiar restaurants and convenient stores. I would recommend this place for couples or small families who would like a affordable stay and do not need much except a place to sleep and shower.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Glad to hear we fit into your budget and you found us an economical place to stay. I do want to thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am happy to know they are providing you with that great service you so deserve. It's also wonderful to hear you found our location so convenient. Its true we are just 10 to 15 minutes from the Disneyland Park entrance. We do hope to see you again next time you are visiting the Disneyland Resort. Thanks again for the review!

Summary: We got this hotel because we thought it was a good proce dor a quick stay, we were hesitant at first but the pictures lookes nice so we figured give it a shot. we arrived and were pleasently suprised everything looked great exactly like the pictures.... Unfortunetly, later that evenimg we saw cochroaches!!! Crawling near the TV!!! We immeditley asked to switch rooms, the hotel front desk was very accomdiating and apologized... We switched rooms and the new room had a leaky sink, when we turned it on water dripped and it smelled gross. We will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am sorry you were disappointed with your stay. I am glad our staff was so accommodating and were able to move you to another room right away. You mentioned we moved you to a room with a leaky sink. I did not show that anything was mentioned to the front desk or maintenance regarding this. We do have  staff available at all times to assist with any issues such as this. In the future please mention it right away so we can address it. I do hope to see you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Very nice place, the rooms were cleaned every day, good selection for breakfast, close to Disneyland and nice swimming pool. The only thing is not everybody likes to drink coffee and there was a coffee maker but no kettle to make the tea, we managed to make it with what we had but use up both teabags on the first day and had been given more coffee bags each day that we did not use   but no teabags so we end up buying them from the shop.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! I am so glad to hear that you had a great stay and will be recommending us! It's true we are at a great location when visiting Disneyland. In just a quick 10 to 15 minute walk you are at the park entrance. It's nice to know you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. This as well as complimentary parking are just a couple of money saving options when staying with us. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Stayed at this location for the second time and rooms were pleasantly updated and clean. It is within walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants. Parking is free and spacious. Beds are very comfortable and A/C works great. In room iron & board were not the best, pad had burn holes and iron is tethered to the board makes it hard to use. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Bathroom could use some TLC. Breakfast is just ok. There is no elevator, but we opt to have top floor. Overall great place to stay.
Manager Response: Glad to hear you had such a great stay! It's always great to hear from repeat guests. I am happy to know you like our upgraded rooms and you enjoy our amenities such as the free parking, free WIFI, and complimentary breakfast as well. Our location is awesome as it is just a 10 minute walk from the Disneyland park and so many great choices for dining and shopping as well. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am always happy to know they are providing our guest with excellent customer service and are friendly and helpful. We really look forward to seeing you again soon! Thanks so much for the fantastic review.

Summary: The carpet is duty and smell not good and i leave on the air accoditioner and when came back to my room somebody turn off and my room very hot.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I do apologize if you found the carpeting not smelling good. I do not show any complaint to the front desk during your stay. I assure you if you do let us know we will address things right away as we are here 24 hours for our guests. For energy purposes your air conditioner may have been shut off or turned down while you were out for the day. But again I do not show any complaint or information at the front desk regarding this during your stay. I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. The AC units are new and they do cool the room off very quickly once turned on. Thanks again for the review, we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is okay. We were going to Disneyland while staying here and while it is within walking distance, it is still pretty far. The first night we were there, we were awaken at 4:30am by a huge truck outside our room and a few men. There were maintenance people all over the property and a lot of the unoccupied rooms had their doors left open....not sure what's up with that. Breakfast was good, and the girl who works in there was always nice.  I think if I visited Disneyland again, I'd stay at a hotel across the street... This was no where near good enough for me to come back.
Manager Response: thank you for the review. We are upgrading all our rooms with new furnishings, new bedding, and new carpeting. My guess is that is what you were noticing our maintenance staff is working on that. I want to thank you for the compliment to our breakfast staff. I am glad you found her friendly and happy to assist. Glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. We are just about 10 to 15 minutes walk to the Disneyland resort. The ART shuttle does pick up right next door for those who wish to ride.  I do hope that you decide to stay with us again. We do appreciate you staying with us and again thank you for the review.

Summary: The rooms were nice and comfortable. Very close to Disneyland (15 min walk) and the Gardenwalk and enough space to park your car. The breakfast was a little too sweet if you ask me, they had waffles, pancakes, yoghurt, cinnamon buns, cornflakes (sweet) milk, and some bread with (straw)berry jam.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad to hear you found our rooms nice and comfortable. I am also happy to know you found our location so convenient. We do have waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, 3 kinds of cereal, fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with butter and jam, as well as juice and coffee. Our breakfast is complimentary as well. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Great place to stay, friendly,awesome House Keeping, and a great staff. Short walk to park, fun Pool.. and The AC works also the Refrigerator.Will tell my friends and I'll be back. Thank You to all. The shuttle is right out front , great for the return from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments to our staff! It's great to hear you will be back! I love to hear you loved our amenities such as the heated pool and hot tub, complimentary breakfast and free parking and WIFI. We have recently upgraded all our rooms so all of them have fridges in them as well as upgraded furnishings and bedding. Thanks for taking the time to give us a review. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Grat place for very good price
Summary: We stayed only one night, for me it¬¥s perfect located in a very nice area, breakfast is good, the coffee is excelent. I like very much stay in the ground floor, because we made a lot of shoppings and it¬¥s very easy to get down with the shopping bags, it¬¥s very close of my room.
Manager Response: I am happy to hear you found our location so convenient. I am also glad that we fit into your budget.  We do have a nice continental breakfast that is complimentary as well. I want to thank you for the review and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Love this place and it was the 3rd time we stayed there!! The rooms are updated that I love !! There always people around cleaning and the front desk people are very helpful ( especially Ali ) I would recommend super 8 and disney around the corner.  The pool should be open till at least 12 , since some days disneyland closes at 10 and you dont want to spend more money !
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review! It's always great to hear from repeat guests. So glad you like our upgraded rooms with amenities such as fridges in all our rooms now. I love the compliments to our staff. I appreciate you returning and staying with us each time your are visiting the Disneyland resort. We really look forward to your next stay with us!
