Summary: Great location, clean, staff friendly, great pool facilities. Showers need updating, and should be a little taller. Microwaves should be included in room, not at an extra charge. Overall very impressed with this hotel- would stay here again
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so convenient, so glad you found us to be such a great location! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's wonderful to hear you received the great customer service you so deserve. I love that you will be back, we look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed here late august and really enjoyed my stay. Cleaning staff were awesome, people on the front desk were awesome, pool was awesome, breakfast was awesome. Go early for breakfast otherwise it gets to busy. Staff at front desk were really helpful with calling up to confirm tours and they even post your postcards for you! It is a bit of a walk to disneyland but is right next door to the GardenWalk. There was a fridge in our room and the AC worked nicely, would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the compliments to both our housekeeping staff and our front desk staff.  It's always great to hear from satisfied customers and that you will be back. Thanks so much for taking the time to give us a review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The hotel was easy to find based on the directions on the website. Room clean and the bed was very comfortable. Had a great single night stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your accommodations. We have recently upgraded all our rooms, they all have upgraded amenities such as fridges in all our rooms now. Thank you for the compliments to our housekeeping staff as well. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are the Disneyland area.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights to do the Disneyland thing.  The location is PERFECT restaurants either side of you and walking distance to Disneyland.  The beds are a little uncomfortable and the b/f is average to say the least.  But for the middle of summer it was a good location with a pool to cool off in.  I would recommend for a short stay if you are going to be out most of the time.  Parking here is free which is a nice added bonus.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Its wonderful to hear you liked our amenities and our location. We are just 10 minutes walk from the Disneyland entrance making it so convenient. Our free parking makes it such a value as well. No need to pay parking here or at the Disneyland Resort. Thanks again  for the review. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: I think people expect a 4 diamond stay. We need to reflect on the price point and expectations. We chose this hotel for value purposes. This property is right around from the park, food and attractions. I was surprised it would offer a continental breakfast, very pleased. The pool has one end at 8' deep enough depth to have fun. This was an awesome deal and I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! How wonderful that we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay with us. I am so happy to hear you will be back! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland and loved it. clean spacious rooms, breakfast which while basic was still good. next to the Gardenwalk which has plenty of restaurants to choose from and Tony Roma's around the corner(my fave restaurant).  Staff were lovely, plenty of parking.. don't know where people got that there wasn't enough parking in previous reviews i read before arriving. Over all a lovely stay, i was very happy, you can even watch Disneyland's fireworks from your room or the street if you don't manage to get to Disneyland
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay with us while going to Disneyland! We are just a 10 minute walk from the entrance makes it so convenient. I am happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. We look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks for the review!

Summary: Reasonable price and within walking distance to Disneyland. Loved the free breakfast! Staff was friendly and knowledgeable.
Manager Response: So great to hear we fit into your budget! The amenities such as the Complimentary breakfast and free parking sure help save some costs while on vacation. Thanks for the compliment to our staff, I am glad you found the staff so friendly and helpful. Its true we are located within minutes from the Disneyland park entrance, making it so convenient while staying here. Thanks for the review! Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed for a brief visit to Disneyland. Perfectly adequate for this type of trip and reasonably priced. You can walk to Disneyland in just a few minutes so saved parking and shuttles. Rooms are clean and fairly spacious, breakfast included but very limited choice. Also has a number of restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay with us! It's wonderful to know you took advantage of our free parking and the convenience of walking to the Disneyland park. I am glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. Thanks so much for the review! We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: If you wanna sleep don't stay here. All rooms have noisy old air con and you will be woken by various noises.
Summary: Check in early was free 10am instead of 3pm, that was good. City pass was $30 cheaper than elsewhere. Booked transport on luxbus with Super 8 but either one of them stuffed up and told us the wrong departure time. The women in the office tried to help but suspected it was our fault I am guessing until I phoned and complained to Lux bus and we were rebooked for the next day. Air conditioners are old style one unit and very noisy. Do not stay here if you really want to sleep. Noise from a boom box, drag racing and a TV above kept us awake. Despite complaining at 3.30am about the TV the operator did not deal with it. It has no cooking facilities that you would expect from a motel although does provide simple non nutritious breakfasts with frozen butter cubes (why do hotels not
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am surprised you state the ac unit is old. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and every room has new AC as well as all upgraded furnishings including a fridge in every room. We do have a 24 hour front desk who is there to assist in such cases as noise issues. I do apologize if you feel you didn't not get the rest you needed. We do provide a complimentary super start breakfast that does include butter for your waffles and toast. We do not freeze the butter cubes however.  We also include other great items such as cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit and yogurt as well as cereal and milk. I do hope you visit us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We travelled with our 3 kids under 4 and the Super 8 offered everything we needed. Good enough breakfast, hot spa and pool, laundry services and in close proximity to Disneyland, supermarkets and a variety of food stores. The only room for improvement would be to offer a high chair in the breakfast area so our smallest could sit somewhere other than our laps. We came from the Aria in Vegas and rate Super 8 the best of the two.
Manager Response: It's wonderful that you enjoyed your stay with us and all your needs were met. I am glad we could provide that excellent service and accommodations you so deserve! I am happy to hear you enjoyed our amenities such as the heated pool and hot tub, laundry facilities, and you took advantage of our complimentary breakfast as well! Hope to see you again soon! Thanks so much for the review!

Summary Heading: Great Value and Location at Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is very close to the Disneyland entrance and is a great value if you are looking for staying one or two nights.  The rooms are clean and up to date.  The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable and you can't beat the free parking which makes the hotel room worth it just for that.  If they could do one thing, it would be to update the bathroom and shower heads.  If there was also a back gate to get to Harbor Blvd. then this hotel would be an even closer walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: I am happy to know you found us to be such a great value! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. It's always great to hear that you are being given that friendly and helpful service you so deserve. It is nice to take advantage of our free parking and walk on over to the Disneyland park. You are there in 10 to 15 minutes and you save on the daily parking charge at the park. Thank you so much for the review. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Satisfactory stay. Big room. Will return as long as prices stay low and room quality doesn't go down.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am glad we fit into your budget and you found us an affordable and convenient place to stay when visiting Disneyland. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This hotel was chosen due to the price being very affordable. We were given a clean room with modest furnishing a big bonus was a refrigerator. The beds were comfortable and the bedding was of top quality, just right for a restful nights sleep of which is about the only thing we did there with our busy vacation schedule. One morning and one night we utilized the swimming pool and hot tub which was a great outdoor setting. Breakfast was modest but adequate. The room was well made up each day and towels replenished. The reason I gave a very good and not good rating was because the room did have a bit of a musty smell when you entered it when the air conditioner had been running.
Manager Response: Great to hear you enjoyed your little vacation while staying with us!  I am glad the upgraded amenities such as the fridges in the room and upgraded bedding made your stay even more comfortable. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and added those extras to all our rooms. Thanks so much for the review, we hope to see you again soon when you visiting the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: this was my first time visiting Disneyland. My friend and I had a great time staying there. The staff was friendly. The room was big and comfortable. The location was nice. It's about 15 minutes walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for you compliments to our staff. It's great to hear you received that friendly excellent service while staying with us. It's true we are just a 10 to 15 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance. We  are very convenient to several dining establishments as well. Thank you so much for the review. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We walked from this place to Disneyland. For the price, I don't think you can beat this place. Rooms were big and clean. If you are looking for a luxury hotel, keep looking. If you are looking for a family/budget friendly hotel near Disneyland, then you have found what you are looking for!! I would have no problem booking a stay here again in the future. We even had a earthquake (about 10 miles away) when we stayed. This place is not too far away from Knott's Berry Farm either.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to know that we fit into your budget and you found us to be such a great deal. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found our service and amenities to your liking. Its true we are very convenient to the Disneyland park, only a 10 to 15 minute walk from the main entrance. The ART shuttle also picks up right next door for those who wish to ride over there for a small charge. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We recently stayed 4 nights at this Super 8 and were pleasantly surprised! Our room (295) was located directly above the office, and was quiet, clean and a good size. There is a porch with tables chairs located outside of this room which has good views of the nightly fireworks and also doubles as extra seating for breakfast -- be careful when you walk down the stairs here as the bottom step is painted the same colour as the ground and caused us both to fall. Breakfast was a nice bonus -- there were cinnamon buns (surprisingly good!), toast, toaster waffles, yogurt, cereal, fruit, coffee, juice, and milk. Breakfast was more than sufficient, and is a good way to save $$!  The seating area fills up quickly after 7:30am, so it is good to get there early or plan on eating either by
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the awesome review! It really does sound like you had a great stay with us! It is good to hear you took advantage of our amenities such as the free WIFI complimentary breakfast  and you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub. Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am so happy  that you had such a wonderful stay, we really look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Nice Stay, close to the Happiest place on Earth
Summary: Nice hotel, clean, big rooms.  If you like to share the bathroom, it is a tight squeeze.  Pillows could be fluffier.  Breakfeast was a nice addition.  Seating could be more however we sat around the pool and that was nice. Parking is free, you can walk to the park.  Employees very helpful.  Good deal for the money.  I like air, so took a box fan however I do that with all of the hotels I stay at.  I would for sure stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's wonderful you had a nice stay with us. It's true we are just minutes from the main entrance to Disneyland. Very convenient. Thank you for the compliment to our staff. I am glad they are providing you the wonderful friendly service you deserve! We look forward to your return!

Summary: Pros: Situated 15 minute walk ftom Disney's main gate (not 10 as the lady at the front desk said). Room is clean, towels etc changed daily.  Breakfast ok (wafels, toast, butter, jam, yogurt, oranges etc), though very crowded. Free parking.   Cons: Wifi terrible,  keeps disconnecting. Very noisy. A little too expensive for what you get.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's true we are a 10 to 15 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance depending on who is walking. For those who wish to ride, the ART shuttle does pick up right next door. Glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Sorry for any inconvenience regarding our free WIFI, we do have a tech service available at all times in such cases. the info is right in the room. Please let us know and we are there to assist 24 hours at the front desk.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: While staying at this hotel, my wife received a late night phone call direct to the hotel room from "the front office" requesting credit card confirmation. As I had booked the room but was not there, my wife advised the caller to contact me at home. The caller somehow knew our name and had our home number. The caller offered me a 30% discount for confirming my supplied credit card information. I recognized this immediately as a phishing attempt, but already the caller knew 1) my name, 2) my home phone, and 3) what room my wife and daughter were staying in.  My family went to Disneyland Park in the morning and, by the time we spoke and connected all the dots, we weren't comfortable staying in this hotel. We had originally booked a 4-night stay but checked out after the first
Manager Response: I am sorry about the phone call you say received to your room. This call came from an outside line and never came through the front desk. Unfortunately there are scams out there and fortunately you were smart enough as not to give out your credit card info over the phone. We would always advise this to any traveler. Its true you did have a 4 night stay, and you came to the front desk at around 3 pm,  4  hours after our check out time. We canceled 2 of your nights even though it was past the 24 hour cancelation period as a good will gesture. If you would have notified us at least by check out time on that second day we possibly could have waived that policy as well, however, being well past check out, and well past when housekeeping would have been able to turn the room around to re rent, we did charge you for that second day. The phone call did not come from the motel, it was an outside call, unfortunately we can not control calls that go directly to your room. This did not mean you were unsafe here, and it does not mean that your registration and cancelation policies do not apply. I do hope to see you again, thanks for the review.

Summary: In such popular place we received very good service and room. No problems with parking after checkout etc.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! I am glad we fit into your budget and  you found we were a great value to you. I want to thank you for the compliment to  our staff for providing that great customer service you so deserve. We can wait for your return!

Summary: This motel is ideally situated, close to Disneyland. Its reasonably priced and the breakfast substantial. Best is the hot spa after 12 hours walking around Disneyland. Great to have the bus stop outside  .
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Great to hear you found us so convenient and handy while visiting Disneyland! Its true we are just a 10 to 15 minute walk from the park. I am glad you enjoyed our amenities such as the complimentary breakfast and our heated pool and hot tub while you were here. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: My only complaints are the drain on the bathtub and their breakfast hours. The water drained slowly and breakfast hours ended earlier than I would have liked. Other than that, the TVs were good, service was good and friendly, and the beds were comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear you compliment our staff and that you enjoyed your accommodations. Sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay regarding the slow draining tub. We do have maintenance staff available to assist in such situations. Please do not hesitate to notify us so we can address it right away. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney and great WiFi!
Summary: Stayed 5 nights to end a month long USA holiday. Disneyland is only a short 10-15min walk. Breakfast was good - waffles, pastries, cereal, coffee, juice etc. The inside seating area can get crowded so get in early! WiFi is awesome - no issues. Bathroom is very small - only just enough room for the door to open, shower curtain was very short so floor would get wet and it was hard to get the temperature of the shower warm enough. Laundry facilities are good - 3 washers and dryers. Room itself was huge but 2nd bed leaned on the air conditioner which was very loud. We opted for a ground floor room because we had a number of bags but as the car parks are outside the rooms you could hear people milling around in the early hours and the beeps as people constantly locked their cars -
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Yes we are very close to Disneyland, only a 10 to 15 minute walk. We do have free wifi, good to hear you enjoyed it while staying with us. It sounds like you took advantage of our other complimentary amenities such as our wonderful Super Start Breakfast. Glad you enjoyed it! We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We dropped off our bags and left for DL. When we returned several hours later our beds had many ants and the sink was full of ants. We called the front desk and they sent a maintenance man with a can of ant killer, not going to sleep in a bed sprayed with ant killer. He didn't speak english and did not understand. We were able to switch rooms. The front desk was very uncaring and kinda creepy. We are low maintenance folks, but do except some kind of customer service. They could not do a refund, but the new room was ant free. It was very musty, but no ants. I would not recommend this hotel, there are just too many to choose from.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am happy to hear we were able to move you to a different room. I do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Sorry to hear of any problems you may have experienced with our front desk staff. We do our very best to make sure every guests stay is the best possible. We do have a maintenance staff that responds to all our guests needs as quickly as possible. They also do preventative maintenance on a regular basis. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We weren't expecting much when we booked this hotel.  We were pleasantly surprised!  The pictures shown on their web site didn't do the rooms any justice.  They must have since upgraded the linen as it was modern and tasteful.  The breakfast was adequate but got very busy the later you got there. They did constantly replenish supplies so there was no fear of missing out!  The pool area was not the prettiest so we gave that one a skip. In terms of locality, the motel was superbly situated.  It was an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland which could be safely done at night.  Additionally, the motel is situated adjacent to Bubba Gumps and close to Johnny Rockets and a shopping centre.  One negative was that the air conditioner was noisy.  Apart from this, our room was remarkably sound
Manager Response: I love to hear you will be back! We look forward to it! We are located just moments from the Disneyland park and several great places to dine and shop this is true. I am glad you enjoyed your visit with us and we did our best to exceed your expectations. Thanks so much for the review!

Summary: 10 minute walk to Disneyland, hotel pool and rooms good, nothing too fancy but lets face it, if you are here you are doing Disney and you only need somewhere to shower/sleep.  Check in staff really polite and helpful, and a fast check out.  Would stay here again- great value, superb location and excellent staff.  Thanks!
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear you found our location so convenient!  It's true we are just minutes away from the Disneyland park as well as several great dining establishments and shops. I want to thank you for the compliment to our staff. We do our very best to provide that excellent customer service you deserve. Thank you so much for the review, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We loved the refrigerator and large room!   The breakfast was a great bonus.  The rooms were very well cleaned by the staff.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! So happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and you liked the additional upgraded amenities such as the fridge in your room. Thanks for the compliment to our cleaning staff as well. It's always great to hear we are exceeding your expectations. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: If you want a place to stay while exploring Disney this is an excellent choice that won't cost a fortune.
Summary: This is an excellent motel to stay in if you are visiting Disneyland. Breakfast is basic but filling and the cinnamon buns are really tasty. The rooms are very clean. They are pretty basic but honestly they are places to sleep between park visits so why pay for amenities you won't use. The staff are friendly, especially those who man the breakfast room. Just 10-15 minutes from the parks with shops and food establishments on the way. I would recomend this place to anyone. Thank you Super 8 for making our stay that much better.
Manager Response: Wonderful to know you enjoyed your stay with us! It's always great to hear our staff is providing the excellent customer service you deserve. A smiling face while enjoying our complimentary Super Start breakfast is always nice. We do look forward to your next visit and am so happy to hear you will be recommending us!

Summary Heading: Great location, everything else was average
Summary: I stayed at this Super 8 with a couple of friends for a convention last month, and the location was wonderful. We were a short walk away from both the convention center and Disneyland. There were multiple restaurants in the area, and multiple others were willing to deliver to the hotel. The bed and bedding could have been more comfortable, but they were adequate for a week's stay. The walls are thin, so you can hear what's going on with your "neighbors." The people staying around our room were fairly quiet, so I wasn't bothered by it. My friends are absolutely obsessed with "staying connected" on social media, and there were few outlets in the room. Trying to get on the hotel's wifi was pretty much a waste of time. It was slow if it worked at all. I wasn't there to use the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am glad to hear you found us so convenient and we met your needs while staying wit us. It's very true we are so close to the Disneyland park, only a 10 or 15 minute walk. We are also very convenient to the various dining establishments in the area as well, and  a lot of them deliver as you said. So sorry if there were any issues with the free WIFI while you were here. Next time please notify our 24 hour front desk, we are always here to help. Thanks again for the review, we hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Good location, all else pretty minimal
Summary: Stayed here for 4 days recently while visiting Disneyland and the beach. The location is perfect for Disney as it was really just a 10-min walk. The place was generally quite clean, including the pool and hot tub. Handy laundry facilities. The breakfast was pretty awful. We ended up buying a box of cereal and a carton of milk and having bfast in our room instead. Front desk people were very friendly and attentive. Our toilet and shower didn't function terribly well. Hardly any temperature range possible for the shower and the toilet needed to be "babied" for it to flush properly. I suppose they can get these high prices because of their location. Kind of a mixed-bag experience.
Manager Response: I am glad to know you found our location so convenient. We are just about 10 minutes from from the Disneyland entrance.  I am also happy to hear you found our staff so friendly and attentive to your needs. We do have a nice continental breakfast each morning that is part of your stay. We do provide various choices such as cereals with milk, yogurt, fresh fruit, waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, toast with jam and juice. Hopefully you will be back to see us again! Thanks for the review!

Summary: They gave me the worst room above the breakfast room. Nonstop noise..I paid for my room the morning before at 7am and after all day at Disney the rude night auditor said this all we have even though online they had availability. He didn't care to listen or do anything just completely ignored us. I will never stay there again.
Manager Response: So sorry if you feel your needs were not met when staying with us. It's true, we may have had rooms available online, however, all the rooms above the front office area where you were are one bed rooms. We most likely were sold out of that particular type of room. I do not have a record of you contacting the front desk regarding noise, we do apologize if this was the case, but we do have a 24 hour front desk staff to assist at all times. We always strive to excel in customer service and meet all our guests needs when we are giving the opportunity to do so. We do hope to see you again, when you do make your reservation, please request the particular location that will work best for you. We will do our very best to make sure you are where you are comfortable.

Summary: I've stayed here every year for the past 12 yrs. or so.  It's close to Disneyland (about 15 min walk depending on how quick your step is), the pool is nice and the rooms are clean and in good shape.  The people at the front counter are very courteous and helpful and since the renovation the bags stored there are in good hands and safe although it would have been nice to have some sort of check of identity before claiming your bag.  But then they no longer do that at the airport either.  Good place, quiet, newer air conditioners which are quieter.  Breakfast is always good and you can eat at the pool or the terrace. Wifi is fast this year. No complaints!!
Manager Response: It's always great to hear from repeat guests! Yes we have made a lot of changes and improvements to our property and our rooms. We have upgraded all our rooms now and they all have those added amenities such as fridges in each and every room. So happy to here we exceeded your expectations once again. We look forward to your next visit! Thanks so much for the great review!

Summary: My husband and I took our 2 kids (9 years and almost 2 years) to Disneyland.. Could see the fireworks from our room. The room was clean...we would come back here. If I could change 2 things it would be a softer bed and a better breakfast... it was all starchy/bread items (oatmeal, cinnamon buns, toast, waffles)... I need meat proteins in my meals (medical reasons) so we only had breakfast there once and ended up going to IHOP or Dennys (both close by) or just ate at Disney. The breakfast was our biggest complaint but we did enjoy our stay. The pool was small but it was never full so it really wasnt a big deal that it was small. We really loved having the Disney fireworks show at our room... it meant we could come back to the hotel early and watch them from there... which mean
Manager Response: I love to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to catch the fireworks from here. We do have an excellent view from here. Nice that you were able to take advantage of our heated pool and hot tub as well. Thanks for the review! Look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Very helpful in getting directions to get there. No hassle in getting a room. Room was clean and did not have a weird smell.  Plenty of room to get comfortable. Easy to find when we finished our day touring the local attractions.  Near by shops and also places to eat.  All within walking distance.
Manager Response: It's so good to hear you found us inviting and enjoyed your stay with us. Glad you liked your accommodations and found us so convenient.. thanks so much for the review! Hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: This Super 8 is  at the very convenience location.It only...
Summary: This Super 8 is  at the very convenience location.It only takes 15 minutes to walk down to Disneyland, 3 minutes to Subway, and just next to two the other restaurants. The guest room is clean and the staffs are nice. The down side is my room was a little of noisy and the internet speed was too low.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's true we are very convenient to the Disneyland park and several great dining establishments. So glad you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Check in was great, parking was no problem. Stayed two nights while going to Disneyland. I was disappointed in the room. The only room available was one with one queen bed. Okay, it is only two nights, we'll survive. Get to the room and the bed was quite small, I have a double bed at home and it did not look much bigger than that. Like another reviewer said, the air conditioner was quite loud at times. It seemed like it would kick on for awhile really loud and then quiet down for a bit. This went on all night. Breakfast was okay-no better/worse than any of the "Breakfasts" the hotels serve. The area was a bit small, but not sure that anything can be done about that. The girl who was cleaning the first day was very diligent-she even cleared our dishes. Didn't eat the second day
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. I am glad to hear you had a good stay with us and you enjoyed the accommodations. We do have upgraded rooms with queen beds as well as some with a King bed. Glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and found our staff so attentive! We look forward to your return!

Summary: Room accommodations were dated but clean. Pool was small for the 150+ units and guests but nice in the evening. Breakfast was basically a 'grab and go' but most are on the run to Disney anyway. As per other reviews breakfast room was small and crowded at times. Disney was within walking or ART bus #2 stopped right outside hotel...beware though, this is the last stop before Disneyland and on one day it was already full. Walking is about 20 min. Located right next to the Garden Walk with stores, restaurants, movies, etc. Mention it's your first time if you eat at Calif Pizza Kitchen and you get a special treat. We would stay again.
Manager Response: Its so great to hear you will be back! We look forward to it. I am glad to know you enjoyed your visit. It's true we are just minutes from several great dining establishments and only minutes from the Disneyland park. The ART shuttle does pick up right next door for those who wish to have a ride to the park. It's very convenient. Thanks so much for the review! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Only 3/4 of a mile hike to Disneyland.
Summary: The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly.  There was plenty of hot water and there were not a  lot of out of control children running up and down the place.    The TV listing does not match with the channels on the television (I have yet to find a hotel where it does match) so I had to search for programs and stations to relax after a hard day of Disney.  There are plenty of eating establishments within 10 minutes and a 7-11 on the corner of Katella and South Harbor.  I arrived early and my room was not ready, but they still checked me in, gave me a parking pass, and told me to come back later, so I went into Disneyland a little earlier.  If you are planning on walking from the hotel to avoid the $16 parking fee, the Disneyland entrance plaza is exactly 0.75 miles from the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It sounds like you had a great stay, that's great to hear. We are a block and a half from Disneyland front entrance. It is about a 10 to 15 minute walk from here to the park.  We do have 2 floors, and it is a great suggestion to request a lower floor upon making a reservation if you have a need for first floor. Thank you so much for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again .

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland without the premium price
Summary: Stayed for two nights when visiting Disneyland, a big bonus that it was within walking distance to the park. The rooms was a bit worn, but clean. Breakfast was ok, but the breakfast room was very crowded, also the case for the small pool. Very happy with the service. PS there may be a problem with parking if you arrive late, but we were able to find a spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. Thank you for complimenting us on our service as well. We strive to exceed your expectations and provide you that excellent service that you and all our guest's deserve. We do have a cozy breakfast room where our breakfast is served, however, we also have additional seating on our sundeck, which is a wonderful place to enjoy your morning coffee and have a bite to eat before heading to the park. We are only a 10 minute walk from the Disneyland park, so convenient when staying with us as we do not charge for parking. We do have adequate parking for every room, and we issue a parking pass when you register  your vehicle at the front desk. Parking space is not a problem. Thanks again for the great review, we look forward to seeing you in the future when visiting Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney!
Summary: I went to check in and the guy was very helpful and made the process really easy. He explained all details for me and I checked in right away. There are shopping centers, eatery, bowling and movies right by. Also it's not that long of a walk to disneyland. Safe area as well. I'd totally stay there again!
Manager Response: It's great to know our front desk staff was so accommodating, friendly and efficient. We are in perfect location when visiting Disneyland, just minutes away from the Disneyland park as well as nearby dining establishments and shopping. We do have various entertainment next door at the Garden Walk, as well as at Downtown Disney. I am so happy to hear you will be back!

Summary: This was our first time to Disneyland.  We took the Disneyland bus from John Wayne airport to the ART bus stop. We spent 5 nights at this motel.  The motel was two (long) blocks from the Disneyland entrance.  The room had a good window unit and was clean.  We were placed on the back side first floor facing Disneyland.  You could hear the loud fireworks from inside the room.  The beds were comfortable and the room had a good size mini fridge.  We placed protein bars, milk, cheese, and plenty of other snacks inside.  The bathrooms were very small: you need to close the door before you sit on the toilet, otherwise you have a hard time doing it after.  There was plenty of counter space next to the sink (outside the tub and toliet area) inside the main room. The bathtub was old and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Its nice to know you enjoyed your stay with us. It's true you can view the fireworks from our rooms on the Disneyland side. We recently updated our rooms with new beds, new furnishings including fridges in all our rooms. Glad you found our beds comfortable and the fridges so convenient. We have a complimentary Super Start breakfast each morning from 6 am to 9 am. It's a great way to start your day before heading to the parks. We are only a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance, however there is the ART that picks up right next door. It's very convenient and comes every 20 minutes for a minimal charge. I want to thank you for the compliment to our staff for being so friendly. I am glad you had a good experience when staying with us and look forward to seeing  you again!

Summary: This hotel was not too far and not too close to Disney Land and California adventure park.Walking distance,  It was also walking distance to restaurants, shopping etc. The hotel was clean,good service of rooms,it provides parking, has a pool and  light brekky. There are drink machines and snack machines on the property as well as ice machine and Laundry facilities. You can buy your tickets to the fun parks here, good prices. The cheesecake factory and Bubba Gumps within about a minutes walk. YUMMMMMMY.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, we are in a great location when visiting Disneyland and the surrounding area. We are in walking distance of several wonderful restaurants and there are so many places to shop as well. We do offer a Super Start breakfast to get you going in the morning, and we also have vending machines with various beverages and snacks. There is a 7 eleven next door around the corner as well as an ABC market, but Target and Food For Less is just a few minute drive as well. Ross Dress for Less and Walmart are close as well. So many options when staying here with us. I want to thank you for the compliments to our housekeeping staff, they do a great job perfecting our rooms for our guests and making them Super clean. We do sell tickets to Disneyland, Universal Studios, Knotts Berry Farm as well as Southern California City Passes right here at the front desk. Such a convenience, as well as a savings to you when visiting the near by parks. Thanks again for the review! Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: LOVED IT SO MUCH WE WENT BACK AGAIN LAST MONTH!
Summary: This motel is awesome! There's no other word to describe it.   This time we took our  youngest daughter and her husband and their 2 children, and our older daughter, her fianc√© and their daughter. We requested 3 ground floor rooms, with 2 with an adjoining door, and all of them to be at the very back of the building, opposite the vacant land on the way to Disneyland. We found this was an ideal spot 2 years ago, as it was perfectly quiet at night, and you could watch the fireworks from out the front (if you weren't at Disneyland for them).. And that's PRECISLEY what they delivered for us. The 2 rooms with the adjoining door meant we could put the grandkids to bed and watch TV while our children went out for the evening without having to go between rooms to watch them. It was the
Manager Response: It's always great to hear from repeat guests. So glad to have you back! We do have connecting rooms which is perfect for a big family. Thank you for mentioning our complimentary amenities such as complimentary parking, free wifi, and  complimentary breakfast. Our location is very convenient to Disneyland park as well as all the nearby restaurants and shops. Disneyland and Downtown Disney is only a 10 minute walk from here. Thanks for the review, and thanks for coming back to stay with us. We look forward to seeing  you again!

Summary: Great hotel Mickey theme hotel room. Very close to Disneyland! 15 minute walk. Beds were comfortable. Breakfast was enough for the 3 three teenagers and myself. Overall good experience. Location to restaurants near there was perfect.
Manager Response: We are so close to Disneyland this is true. It's just a 10 minute walk to the main entrance of Disneyland. When staying with us you are in a perfect location, so close to several restaurants, and shopping. I am glad you enjoyed your room and our beds. We have recently upgraded our rooms with new beds, as well as other new furnishings including fridges in all our rooms. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to start your day. So glad you enjoyed it. Thanks so much for the review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed 3 nights our room was large, loved the big fridge especially since we traveled with 2 full ice chests.  Staff was always helpful and friendly.  Pool was rather small but hot tub made up for that.  This place isn't top class elegant.  But I was happy with clean and hospitable.
Manager Response: So glad to hear you enjoyed the fridge! We recently upgraded all our rooms so all of them have fridges now. I want to thank you for your compliment to our staff. We strive to exceed your expectations with  our customer service and hospitality. We do have a heated pool and hot tub, and it does feel wonderful after a long day at the park. Thanks for the review! Look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Spent 2 nights with 2 teenagers while visiting Universal Studios & Disneyland.  The rooms were very nice, clean & large.  Beds were comfortable!  In one room the TV would not work, but called the front desk and within 10 minutes it was working! Second night woke up to water dripping from the light fixture above the tub in the bathroom, called the front desk who offered to move us to another room, but at 2 in the morning didn't want to do that.  Water continued to drip throughout the night, the floor and all of fixtures were wet in the AM.  Couldn't use this bathroom, but thankfully the connecting room & bath were fine.  Again called the front desk and they sent someone right away.  Turns out the leak was from the room above, when we left the commode was sitting on the balcony.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we do appreciate you feedback. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your accommodations! We have recently updated all our rooms with new carpeting, new beds, new furnishings, as well as added fridges to all our rooms. Its wonderful to know that our maintenance staff was there to fix your TV for you right away. Sometimes leaks take a while to fix, that's why we suggested moving you to another room. I do apologize for any inconvenience this caused during your stay. Sorry to hear you missed our on our complimentary breakfast. In the future, I would like you know we have additional seating on our sundeck as well as in the pool area. It's really quite pleasant enjoying your breakfast in either one of these locations. We are only minutes away from the Disneyland park, as well as several wonderful dining establishments. With our free parking, it is both economical as well as convenient when staying here. I do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Expedia recommended this hotel and my stay was awful. The check-in clerk was incredibly rude, and my boyfriend and I were thrown into a handicap accessible room for no reason. The room was dirty, stank horribly, had no blanket on the bed, and had bugs on the floor. It looked ancient and nothing like the picture when I made my reservation. When I called to ask why we were in this room and to complain about the cleanliness, the hotel MANAGER told me that that room was all I was going to get. We were kept awake all night by vagrants banging and shouting in the parking lot, and by a buzzing clock radio that we couldn't unplug. We woke with pinched nerves in our necks and backs from the flat, stained pillows. We left the hotel as fast as we were able. Nothing was done to rectify the
Manager Response: We definitely take your feedback to heart and appreciate that, though you never communicated any of these concerns during your stay, we are learning about them now, so that we can make a difference for our future guests. We only regret that you did not allow us to make a difference during your visit.  Though you mentioned many things that you were dissatisfied with during your stay, we were not aware of them. I have full confidence that if we had been made aware of any of them we would have made a positive impact in resolving each one for you. You state you called and spoke with the manager, which is me, however I do not recall speaking with you once during your stay with us. Nor do I have any communications with the front desk, maintenance, or our housekeeping service. The only communication I have is a request for a late check out which we honored with great pleasure.  Instead of apologizing for what you never allowed us to do, I will thank you for booking with Expedia.   They did book you in a One Queen bed room, which did happen to be an accessible room. We would have gladly accommodated you with another room if we had had it available at the time of check in that evening. We however did not have a different type of room to offer as we were sold out that evening.   In closing, I would like to encourage you to always speak up during your stay if any situations arise.  Our goal is to excel in customer service and to ensure you are pleased with your visit to the best of our ability.  We must however be made aware during your stay with us to make that happen.

Summary Heading: 15 minutes walk to Disneyland but noisy sleep.
Summary: We (a couple) spent three nights in this motel in order to watch sights of Los Angeles and Disneyland. We were lucky enough to avoid traffic on the way to Los Angeles because of the weekend days. The week day was left for the Disneyland, which was located 15 walking minutes away from hotel that saved us money for the Disneyland's parking.  Super 8 Anaheim is located on a big central road decorated all the way with huge enlightened palms. Just the view to the main street is impressive enough to make you want to stay there.If you spend the night at the hotel you will be lucky enough to see Disneyland's fireworks from your balcony. Another plus for the location is that nearby there are a lot of restaurants like Cheesecake Factory, IHOP, Denny's and stores like Seven Eleven.  Our
Manager Response: What an awesome review!  I appreciate you taking the time to give us such a thorough review.  It is true, we are just moments away from so many great places to dine and shop and just minutes away from Disneyland park as well. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed our rooms and found them so accommodating. I am sorry to hear about the AC though. I do not have an reports to the front desk regarding the fact that it was so noisy. We do have a 24 hour front desk staff and maintenance that is right there to assist in such situations. In the future just notify the front desk right away and we will be right on it to fix things for you. We want every guest to be comfortable during their stay and we are here all the time to make sure that happens. We just need to be aware. Its so nice to know you enjoyed our breakfast and the room environment. It is smaller, however we do have additional breakfast seating on our sundeck, as well as in the pool area.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, and glad we fit into your budget. Thanks again.

Summary: The Room was big and clean, but Old, seems its not renovated and painted in a long time. The room had a fridge and a microwave which was not plugged in (hence was not sure if it was a charged service). Staff is not very helpful. Breakfast is below par. The room has a lot of noise coming in from the corridors and I could hear my next room guests speaking and laughing in the night. Only good thing about this hotel is the location, its just a 10 min walk from the Disneyland tram station. The hotel provides a map on how to reach there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. So glad you found our location so convenient during your trip to Disneyland. We actually have recently upgraded all our rooms and added extras such as the fridge in every room for the convenience of our guests. New carpeting, new furnishings as well as new bedding. I do take your comment that the staff was not helpful very seriously, and wish you had elaborated on that a bit more. Our staff prides themselves at exceling in customer service and being helpful and friendly to each and every guest. I am disappointed to hear that they fell short during your visit with us. You mention that there was noise at night. We do have a 24 hour front desk that you can call at any time and they will assist. I would always suggest giving them a call in the event that you are disturbed by other guests during your stay. We do offer a complimentary breakfast served daily. Our Super Start breakfast consists of 2 kinds of cold cereal, hot oatmeal, toast with jam, waffles with syrup, our Super 8 signature cinnamon rolls, as well as yogurt, fresh fruit, juice, cocoa, tea and coffee. I am sorry to hear this did not meet up to your expectations. Please come visit us again next time you are in Anaheim, I am sure you will be happy with all the room upgrades and the refurbishments we have made. Look forward to seeing again.

Summary: The rooms were nice and clean and the location was great.  Only downside is the breakfast.  Very small variety,  and if you want anything hot, you have to stand in line forever.  The room whe the food is is miniscule inducing claustrophobia.  My recommendation: bring your own breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! I am pleased to hear you found our location so convenient while visiting Disneyland. We are just minutes away from the Disneyland park, as well as so many wonderful dining establishments and shops. Thank you for the compliments to our housekeeping department and its great to hear that they exceeded your expectations and your found the room so nice, clean and comfortable. We do offer a complimentary Super Start breakfast every morning that includes 2 kinds of cereals, oatmeal, toast with jam, waffles with syrup, fresh fruit, yogurt, as well as Super 8 signature cinnamon rolls. We also offer coffee, hot cocoa, and tea. We do have additional seating in our pool area, as well as on our sundeck, both places are a super place to enjoy your breakfast before you start your day. Again, thanks for the review, we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nice accommodations in close proximity to Disneyland.
Summary: The rooms are clean and redecorated and the beds were very comfortable; great location with easy access to Disneyland and Downtown Disney; nice pool and hot tub outside.  Negatives:  the price was higher than I expected for a Super 8 and breakfast wasn't much.  Still, a nice room and acceptable accommodations.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Yes we have recently remodeled our rooms, including adding fridges to all the rooms. I am glad to know you are happy with all the upgrades. We do have a great location, so convenient to Disneyland, only 10 minutes walk and you are there. I appreciate that you mentioned our heated pool and hot tub and enjoyed them during your stay. It sure is nice after a long day at the park to take a dip and have a bit of relaxation time.  We have many complimentary amenities such as free wifi, complimentary breakfast, free parking, we are priced accordingly, and during peak season, rates are a bit more than during off season. We do hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: The location was very convenient close to Los Alamitos & The Convention Center!
Summary: The first night I was impressed with room appereance, the location was perfect, the next night I stayed the maids didn't do any effort to fix the beds they were made like in a rush otherwise I would of give 5. I would come back again!!
Manager Response: We do have a very convenient location so close to the convention center, just a few minutes walk. I am happy to know you found our rooms to your liking. We have recently remodeled them and added amenities such as a fridge in every room. I am sorry to hear you found housekeeping did not  meet your expectations during your stay. I have followed up with my housekeeping manager, and assure you it has been addressed. I am so excited to hear you will be back! Thank you so much for the review!

Summary Heading: Super Location, Adequate Accommodations, Good Price
Summary: On a recent trip to California, we were looking for a place to stay near Disneyland (location) that offered safe surroundings (location), comfortable and clean accommodations (from reviews by others), at a price that still allowed us to enjoy Disneyland.  This was exactly what I hoped it would be.  It's located less than a block from the parks and surrounded by other (seemingly nicer by appearance) hotels.  This made it so there were lots of other tourists walking around and provided a very safe feel.  Out our room's window we could see the Tower of Terror and the back of Cars Land.  We also were able to enjoy the Disney's nighttime fireworks from the pool of the motel.  The room was clean enough for the price.  No complaints here.  We weren't there to hang out in the room
Manager Response: I love the fact that you enjoyed being able to view Disneyland fireworks from the pool. We also have a great view of the spectacular show from our sundeck. We do have rooms that face the Disneyland park and they do have a wonderful view of the Tower of Terror, as well as Carsland and many other attractions. I am glad to know you found our location so convenient, and you felt safe and sound when staying here. I appreciate your feedback on our complimentary Super Start breakfast. We do have various items such as cereals, hot oatmeal, toast with jam, waffles with syrup, our Super 8 Signature cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit, yogurt, hot cocoa, hot coffee and tea. I will take your comments into consideration, and again appreciate your feedback. I am so glad that we fit into your budget and we do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My son and I stayed at the Super 8 on Katella. The location was really close to Disneyland- only a 10 minute walk- the rooms were clean, decorated beautifully, and the beds were so comfortable!!! The staff were awesome! Very nice and helpful! We will stay here again for sure!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the awesome review! Great to know you loved our location and found it so convenient when visiting Disneyland! Our rooms have recently been upgraded and renovated with new beds, furnishings, d√©cor as well as added fridges to each and every room. I am happy you found this to your liking and enjoyed staying in our new rooms. Thank you so much for complimenting our staff, its always great to hear they are excelling in customer service and are here to help each and every guest. Most importantly, I want to say I am so happy to know you will be back to see us again! We truly look forward to it!

Summary Heading: Nice Place For A Low Price
Summary: The property itself doesn't look the best but the room was vey nice looking. The beds were comfortable and the wall AC unit was actually easy to control.The breakfast was disappointing. I've stayed at other Super 8 places before that offered scrambled eggs and sausage patties, but not here. There were frozen waffles needing to be toasted, oatmeal, 2 kinds of cereal, oranges, yogurt and packaged cinnamon roll pastries. Aside from that, it was a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. I am glad to hear you found our rooms so accommodating and our beds so comfortable. We have recently updated all our rooms with new furnishings as well as added a fridge to each room! We do have a complimentary Super Start breakfast that does include 2 kinds of cold cereal, oatmeal, fresh fruit, yogurt, toast with jam, toaster waffles with syrup, our Super 8 signature cinnamon rolls, as well as juice, tea, hot cocoa and coffee. I will take your suggestions into consideration, and do again thank you for the review.

Summary: Once again we stayed at Super 8, have always found staff friendly and helpful. we stay in the same room each year and the room has been refurbished. we thank Peter and Omar for fixing the small problem with the door. We have no trouble with the basic breakfast and the breakfast lady is always helpful and cheerful.  we will again stay here during our visit next year.
Manager Response: So good to hear from previous guests! It was so nice to see you again!  It's good to know you had a great time and enjoyed your stay so much. I am happy to hear our staff is providing the excellent service you deserve.  It's true we have refurbished all our rooms and updated them with fridges in every room now. Glad to know you enjoy our complimentary Super Start breakfast. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The only good thing is the closeness to Disneyland.  The rooms are small, old, and in need of restoration (or demolition).  The maid service is unsatisfactory, they only pick up the big stuff and seem to run through the room.  The "breakfast" is cold cereal, bread, and donuts - not what you need to get your day started.  Parking is bad!!!  If you return after 9 PM you are likely to be double parked in the rear and hope that the person in front of you moves before you need to get out.  I would not recommend this place for any more than one night- wish we could have left after the first night.  Spend a couple more $$ and get a decent place.
Manager Response: First and foremost, I would like to apologize if your visit with us was not what you expected and was not a good experience for you. Our goal is to exceed your expectations and I am sincerely sorry that did not happen during your stay with us. You did mention you thought we had a good location close to Disneyland. I am happy you found this convenient. You mentioned that our rooms are in need of restoration. We have upgraded all our rooms with new carpeting, all new furnishings, new mattresses, an upgraded fridge in each and every room. I do apologize if you feel the maid service was not satisfactory during your stay. I assure you I have spoken with my housekeeping manager about this and followed through with it. I do apologize if you found our breakfast not sufficient. We do have a breakfast that includes 2 kinds of cereal with milk, toast, with butter and jam, hot oatmeal, waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, yogurt, fresh fruit, juice, coffee and tea, along with hot cocoa. I do apologize if you had issues with our parking lot when you where here. Was someone double parked? Please let us know if this ever happens. We are here 24 hours and we do have sufficient parking for each and every room. There never should be an issue of double parking. If this is the case please let the front desk know right away.  I do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thanks so much for the review.

Summary: Excellant value for money considering your within 10-15 min walk away from "the mouse". Handily placed from the main highway and for getting to the SoCal beaches. We are nearing the end of a 38 day road trip that started in Chicago and have stopped off in a few Super 8's here and there and have not been disappointed in any of them.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is so nice to hear that you found our location so convenient during  your stay with us. It's true was are only minutes from the Disneyland Park and very convenient to the beautiful southern California beaches!  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: the rooms were ok the maid service was terrible they didn't  empty the trash bins or throw anything away the breakfast in not breakfast by any stretch of the imagination they had some cold cereal small toast able waffles and some fruit and bread its not one of the strong points also I had reserved 2 rooms and we were charge for a damaged frig that was in the room that I and my wife stayed in all we put in it was 2 soft drinks and I know for a fact we did not damage it
Manager Response: I want to sincerely apologize that your stay was not to your expectations and I apologize for the items you noted. I do thank you for your response to the email I sent you and as I said we do listen to all comments and while we never want to disappoint the guest, we do value these opportunities to continue to train and grow in our guest service. I have personally spoken with our housekeeping manager and we have discussed at length the issues you have mentioned and assure you this has been addressed. I do want to add to the items you mentioned on our breakfast menu. We do have in addition hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, yogurt, 2 kinds of juice, hot cocoa, tea and coffee along with jam and syrup for your toast of waffles. I do want to thank you for your business, and if you have further questions or concerns please feel free to call or drop me an email.

Summary Heading: Will Never Stay at ANY Super8 Again
Summary: This property stated that is it "corporate policy" to photocopy my driver's license onto the paper that had my credit card information.  When I complained, I was told that it would be shredded in front of me the next morning.  In the morning it wasn't returned and they refused to shred it.  I took a permanent marker and blacked out my entire license (although they said that they needed me to leave my address visible).  I have traveled all over the country and the world, and, yes, I have had to show my license, but it has NEVER been photocopied.  I expressed my concern about my license being with my credit card information and how this could VERY easily lead to identity theft and/or credit card fraud.  They told me that my "attitude" was not necessary (never mind that there
Manager Response: I want to apologize first of all if your stay was not up to your expectations and if our check in process caused any inconvenience or made you uncomfortable. Our check in process is actually our company policy. We actually do this to prevent credit card fraud, and is for your protection in the event someone gets a hold of your credit card and tries to use it. I do want to apologize if you felt the front desk did not act professional or gave you attitude. I assure you this has been addressed with my entire front desk staff. I am glad you found our rooms clean and to your liking. I also appreciate your feedback on our breakfast and the breakfast room itself. I will take your comments and concerns into consideration. Thank you again for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location, and fit my budget.
Summary: Disney Land was only a block and a half away from hotel, which was a plus for us. The staff was so nice and helpful. Room was clean and beds were made everyday. Breakfast was not the best, but everything else about our stay was great. Will be back here again next year for our 2nd family vacation. The WIFI was not the best, but we were blessed with balcony floor to watch the fire works from Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It's great to know we fit into your budget and you like our location. Its true we are just minutes from the Disneyland park. I love to hear our staff was so helpful and pleasant during your stay with us, and that the rooms were clean and comfortable. I appreciate your feedback on our breakfast and assure you I will take your comments into consideration. I do apologize if you found the free WIFI was not giving you the best service. Next time please do bring it to our attention so we can address it right away. Yes! You can see fireworks from some of our rooms on that side top floor. Another great place to watch them is from our deck above the front desk reception area. It's so wonderful to  hear you will be back! We look forward to your return!

Summary: This hotel is good value for money. The rooms are very spacious and clean, and have nice comfy beds. The bathroom is a bit pokey but clean and good water pressure in the shower. 15 minute walking distance from Disneyland and near a variety of restaurants including Denny's and IHOP if you don't want to eat at Disney. Front desk were very helpful and always friendly. We would recommend this to anyone wanting to stay close to disneyland without breaking the bank.
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear we fit into your budget and found us an affordable place to stay when visiting Disneyland. I love to hear you found our rooms so spacious and clean and found the beds so comfortable. It is true we are minutes away from the Disneyland park as well as many great dining choices in the area. I am happy to know that you found our front desk staff so helpful and friendly during your stay. Thank you so much for recommending our Super 8  to others and we do look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary: The room was very clean.  They had clean towels, newly painted walls, clean bedding, and the showers and bathroom.were in great condition. The TV was flat screen with great clarity, and there was Direct TV with ON DEMAND, so we had movies and tv shows at our disposal, all for no extra charge.  The AC worked perfectly too. The location was great, just 2 blocks from Disneyland.  The staff was friendly and helpful, and the continental breakfast was like a mini-buffet with cereal, milk, juice, coffee, pastries, yogurt, fruit, waffles, and toast.  Overall, i was impressed with the place.  The room rate was very cheap, but the quality of service and the quality of the room was top notch. I will be staying here again for my next disney vacation.
Manager Response: I am so happy you enjoyed your recent stay with us! We do have new renovated rooms with new flat screen TVs New furnishings New D√©cor, and we have new fridges in all our rooms now! Glad to know you found our location so convenient and you thought our staff to be so friendly and helpful. It's great to hear we fit into your budget and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Good location for walking to Disneyland. Seems expensive for Super 8. Convenient to have breakfast but could use some protein and whole grain options. Room was clean, yeah! Hot tub was closed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Its great to hear you found our location so convenient. I do appreciate your feedback on our breakfast. I will take that into consideration. We do have yogurt and whole grain wheat bread on our breakfast menu, as well as fresh fruit and whole grain cereal with milk. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your room and found it clean and comfortable. I do apologize for our spa being closed when you were staying with us. Sorry for any inconvenience it may have caused. We have it open now, and do hope to see you again soon next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Loved the location..stayed there at the beginning of our 6 week vacation and again at the end of our vacation. When we arrive at the beginning they were putting refrigerators in all the rooms which is a great asset, would be nice to add microwaves to each room also. Overall our stay was excellent, it is my 4 vacation to USA and each time I have stayed at this motel, and would recommend it to friends and family..
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are at a very convenient location this is true, close to Disneyland and many dining establishments. We have added fridges to all our rooms now, and do have those microwaves available upon request.  Glad to hear you had an excellent stay and you will be recommending us to your friends and relatives! We cant wait till you return!

Summary Heading: This was a great choice. Nice desk person--even though it...
Summary: This was a great choice. Nice desk person--even though it was 3 am! Clean rooms, accommodated us when we needed 4 rooms instead of the two we reserved, got us checked in quickly. Breakfast was very basic.
Manager Response: Glad you feel you made the right choice staying with us. I am also so happy to hear our front desk staff was so friendly and helpful even if it was at 3 am. We pride ourselves on great customer service, and I am glad to hear our staff is here to assist at all times. I do appreciate your feedback on our breakfast and I will take this into consideration. Thanks so much for the review, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We would typically choose an option that might provide more quality for the price and from the reviews, I had expected a little more.  The room was older but clean so that was good.  We also got discount tickets to Universal Studios from the front desk which we appreciated.   The front desk people were friendly enough.  In terms of the feel of the surroundings, it was very basic and felt like a budget place.  The pool was in the middle of the parking lot.  The breakfast room which is very small and congested for the number of people trying to use it.  There is an attendant on duty requesting room numbers which is understandable in a busy location but unfortunately she wasn't very friendly.   Breakfast selections were packaged cinnamon buns, toaster waffles, toast, cereal and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. I do apologize if we did not meet up to your expectations. I am glad you found our rooms clean and comfortable. It also great to hear you found it so convenient and such a good value to purchase tickets with us at the front desk. Thanks for the compliment to our front desk staff,  I am glad you found them friendly and helpful. I do apologize for any inconvenience concerning our breakfast room area. I assure you I take your feedback very seriously and am looking into this. I am sorry to hear you found our breakfast hostess not friendly or efficient. I have addressed this, and want to thank you again for your feedback. I do hope you give us another chance and would like to have you stop by and say hello when  you are back.

Summary: The location was very handy to Disneyland and the price was cheap. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean however dated, small and the air conditioning unit was noisy. This isn't too much of a problem as you really only want a bed to sleep in, you have to get out and experience California ! If I was to go back to Disneyland I would go back to Super 8 for the location and price. Thanks Super 8 !
Manager Response: So happy to know you found our location to be so convenient! Its true we are just minutes away from the Disneyland park as well as many other dining establishments. We are also glad to hear we fit into your budget and made it an affordable stay. Thank you for the compliments to our front desk staff. I am glad you found us to be friendly and helpful. I appreciate your feedback on our rooms, I will take this into consideration . I am so glad to hear you will be back next time you are visiting Disneyland!  We look forward to your return.

Summary: This is the place to stay. Best price for area. Replaced sheets & towels daily. My #175 room did not smell, Did not look old, no droopy curtains, no marks on walls. AC worked & was quiet. Fridge, hairdryer, TV, & clock in room all worked good. I could have rented a microwave. Had a door to adjoin to next room. Complementary breakfast was adequate: some fruit, yogart, frozen waffles, bread for toast, butter, syrup, jam, ceral, milk, juice or coffee. There was an area where food was & an area with table 7 chairs.  All condiments/utensils are in food area-I feel it should be with tables.  If you don't have all you need at 9am when they close the food area, too bad.  But they nicely wait if you are in the process of getting your food.  Pool was open & clean. Hot tub was closed off
Manager Response: Wow what a wonderful review!  I am so glad me met if not exceeded your expectations when staying with us! Thank you for your compliments to our rooms as well as our housekeeping staff. It means a lot to hear praises from our guests about our staff. I am glad you enjoyed our amenities such as our complimentary breakfast WIFI and our heated pool. You are correct in saying we are just minutes from the Disneyland Park entrance. I am happy to hear you loved the convenience of that. We do offer free parking which is great and we will even extend that on the day of check out so you can go play and come back to pick your car up later. Thanks again for such a thoughtful and informative review. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Super 8 seemed better than I thought it would be however...
Summary: Super 8 seemed better than I thought it would be however, we did see a roach a few hours before we left, which was disgusting. Also we found a mans sock that wasn't ours. Other than that the room was okay.
Manager Response: First and foremost I want to sincerely apologize for the above mentioned problems. We do have a maintenance staff that is in charge of preventative maintenance. I assure you that I personally followed up with my maintenance staff and the issue has been addressed. I also followed up with my housekeeping manager and have addressed that as well. I am so happy you decided to stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations. I do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: My family and I come to Disneyland for 3-4 days every June and stay at a local hotel. This year, we found the Super 8 to be the least expensive within a decent location to the park. The walk is about 1/2 mile, not too bad. Checkin went smooth and we had no problems. We used the pool twice. It was small but clean. Breakfast they offered was cereal, toast and eggo waffles.  Nothing fancy but fine for kids. The room was very dated but very clean. Parking was easy. My only complaint is they did not make up our room the first two days. We had to ask twice for clean towels. I would only stay here again is I couldn't find somewhere closer that was not too much more expensive. Overall, a clean place to sleep. Nothing more.
Manager Response: I am happy to hear you found us affordable as well as a convenient location. We are a 10 to 15 minute walk from the entrance to the Disneyland Resort. 1 and a half blocks. We are also conveniently located next to the Garden Walk as well as many other dining establishments. It's wonderful you had the chance to enjoy our heated pool and spa while you were here. It's a great place to relax after a day at the park.  I'm glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do have the items you mentioned, as well as warm cinnamon rolls, fresh fruit, yogurt, hot oatmeal as well as hot coffee, tea, and cocoa. We also have 2 kinds of juice as well. I do want to apologize if your room was not made up for two days. I assure you I have addressed this personally with my housekeeping manager. I do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.

Summary: room was clean and smoke free. price was great!!!!!!!! we really enjoyed our stay we will use your motel again
Manager Response: We appreciate your review! I am glad to hear you found us to be affordable. It's true we are 100% non smoking as well as a pet free motel. I love to hear you will be back! We look forward to  seeing you again soon!

Summary: Clean, tidy and within easy stroll of Disneyland. Breakfast was good and the breakfast facilities kept clean and tidy with a staff member there all the time keeping it that way. Had a problem with the bedside clock/radio but it was rectified promptly and readily when pointed out to the staff. We'd be back at a shot!
Manager Response: I am glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We have many selections such as fresh fruit, toast, waffles, warm cinnamon rolls, cereal with milk, hot oatmeal, yogurt, fruit juice, coffee, tea, as well as hot cocoa. It's good to know you found our rooms clean and tidy. I do want to apologize for the clock radio not working, but am very happy to hear we fixed things right away. Our location is just minutes from the Disneyland Resort as you said, a nice stroll. About 10 to 15 minute walk is all. So convenient!  Thanks so much for the review and best of all I am happy to hear you will be back to see us! We look forward to it.

Summary: Have stayed there 3 times over the years. 2013 & 2014 most recent. Spa was out of action. Breakfast room as crowded as ever - (take your brekky to pool area - much better). Office staff helpful. Rooms just a place to rest the head after Disneyland.
Manager Response: It's always nice to hear from repeat guests! I do apologize that our spa was not up when you were here. I hope it was not an inconvenience. We do from time to time have it out of service for a short time for maintenance. I appreciate your feedback on our breakfast area. You are right, we have a perfect spot in our pool area, or our sundeck for a lovely setting for breakfast. We have upgraded our rooms with new furnishings, carpeting, and other added amenities such as fridges in all our rooms. I hope this improves your experience next time your are here. I appreciate your compliments to our front desk staff. I am glad to know they are providing that excellent customer service that you so deserve! I look forward to seeing  you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great stay for a great price!
Summary: We wanted to pick a place that was close to Disneyland but still fit within our budget. The Super 8 was perfect for that! I found a great deal online, and it was perfect for the two of us, my husband and I. I requested that we be on the second floor away from the road and they gave us just what we asked for. The staff were always courteous and helpful. The room was simple, but clean. We really only used it for sleeping in, since the whole reason we were there was to spend time enjoying Disneyland. It had a nice television plus what looked like a brand new mini fridge. I saw on a previous post that someone complained there weren't enough outlets, but our room had power strip with plenty of open ones. I was a little bummed that the hot tub was closed for repairs, but can't really
Manager Response: none
