Summary: From the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out the staff was incredibly friendly and welcoming. The rooms were great and the hotel was really close to disneyland. I am already planning my next visit to disneyland and will be staying at super 8 again!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was rude and unhelpful, they gave us a handicap room even though neither of us was handicap. The bathroom seriously looked like the murder room in the first Saw with creepy white tile and a drain in the middle of the floor. There was no bathtub in our bathroom just a shower curtain. I was creeped out to even go in there, let alone take a shower. Furthermore, there was never any hot water and the wifi did not at all. We requested maid service at the front desk and our room was never serviced.  This place is a convenient location to Disneyland but I wish I would have just paid more to stay at a more quality hotel. I will never be staying at another Super 8 EVER AGAIN!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I decided a last minute trip to Disneyland on Memorial weekend was a good idea but we had no place to stay. Super 8 was the best price, closest to the park. $240 for 2 nights in room 245. We booked 2 rooms and they kindly gave us both rooms side by side.   Parking was plentiful and well lit. Check in was smooth and the staff was nice and efficient. The rooms were so spacious! Beds were clean, plush and inviting. One of the beds in my room had a bit of a pit, but nothing we couldn't sleep through. Restrooms were a bit small but clean. Towels were great and they provided more than enough. Our room had a coffee pot, fridge, basic soaps/shampoo, large flat t.v., table and extra blankets. We asked the front desk for a microwave and it was promptly provided for an extra
Manager Response: none

Summary: First rate budget accommodation. We have been here 5 nights. Wonderful, - professional staff through and through. Great room, excellent furnishings and a bed not too hard and not too soft! And a bath too - ideal to relax in after a big day out at Disneyland! Breakfast was really enjoyable with a lot of choice for an all inclusive package. The pool looked inviting and on our stay the spa was getting a make over so not in use - somebody else will have a treat soon I'd say. Nice to see the operators reinvesting in their business. The room a/c units are a "bit noisy", but we slept like a log all night without it. Maybe their on the operators "bucket list"  for an upgrade....Thanks Super 8!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My fianc√© and I recently had a great stay @ the Super 8.  Very good value and upgraded amenities (Wifi, breakfast, pool etc).   The rooms were recently remodeled and we did have a nice size refrigerator. Great location to Disneyland and many restaurants.   In addition the front desk staff was able to book many excursions for us to Universal, City Tour, etc. and were very helpful.   Looking forward to staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Friendly Staff, Great Location
Summary: Hotel was a great stay, super close to Disney Land and California Land.  Great restaurants close by, and friendly staff.  The Super 8 has everything you need in a stay including a pool, hot tub, washers/dryers on premise.  The continental breakfast is a great bonus in the morning.  Peter the General Manager is super friendly and very knowledgable about tours, restaurants, and Disney Land.  If your looking for a nice place to stay that is reasonable priced (trust me you will need all the extra money with the inflated prices in Disney) I would recommend staying at the Super 8 on Katella.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here 6 nights in early May.  Small rooms but clean & comfortable.  Had a coffee pot which was great & they were installing fridges close to the end of our stay.  We were within walking distance of Disneyland & thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.  Would definitely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We booked two rooms at the super 8 right  next door to each...
Summary: We booked two rooms at the super 8 right  next door to each other because we have a big family. One of the rooms smelled really bad like cigarette smoke becaue of the previous people. We couldn't even use the room the whole weekend. Six of us had to share one room. We couldn't even get our 350.00 back for the room that didn't get used. The complementary breakfast is very unorganized. Coffee was not good. I am very unhappy with this hotel and will not use it again or recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location is great, cleanliness was good, service great, free wifi & breakfast daily a added bonus. We would definitely stay here again. We were originally only staying for 9 nights, but we decided to extend our time in the US so we extended our stay here 3 more nights. Close to excellent restaurants (California Pizza, Bubba Gump's and Cheesecake factory all on the same block) walk to Disneyland, however we have a 7 year old and a 4 year old, and after doing long days at the parks, a stroller/pram would be an idea to have with you. If we ever return to the happiest place on earth, I would definitely stay here with my family again. The rooms are not flash but who cares. We stayed here to be at the parks all day and just needed the room to fall into bed at night. The rooms are
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: i really enjoyed my time during my stay with you. when i...
Summary: i really enjoyed my time during my stay with you. when i first checked in to the room i needed a microwave and call front desk to see if there any one that i can use, front desk sent me a microwave to my room that was so cool.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We didn't have a very good experience at this hotel/motel. On our first night at around 11.30 we had 3 men try to enter our room as they had a key card with our room number on. when they found their room they were extremely loud as they were emptying a van for around an hour.   When we complained to the staff the next morning they had no explanation and were not apologetic about the previous nights situation.   The next two nights were quiet but we did not feel safe in the room.   The only good thing about this place is that it is close to Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a bed and bathroom.  All the things necessary.  The shampoo provided was not good quality but it was included so can't complain too much.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: nice stay & near to disney land
Summary: cute woman at front desk let us check in early at  11 am ..strong signal wi fi..nice pool but unfotrunatly i did not use it..disney land is 10 min walking distance..sweet contenental breakfast..taxi 10 $ to & from train station
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall good deal for the price.  The hot tub was out of order. We asked for late check out and 30 extra minutes was all they could do. The room is nicely furnished. We had the 2 queen beds. Our room was on the second floor above the smoking area, and this was not comfortable. The hotel was full so unable to change rooms.  Bathroom VERY small. The shower head was very low and even at 5-4 I had to duck to rinse hair. The drain had a large wad of hair in it. We did not mention this to staff.  There was a refrigerator but no microwave.  The furniture was in good condition.  Beds firm but overall comfortable.  They use double sheets so no nasty bed spread.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The most positive aspect of this place is the great location (15 to 20 minutes walk to Disneyland Parks); on the other hand, this motel lacks a decent space for breakfast, which is really a shame.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Plain but comfortable, within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Not particularly memorable stay, but considering it was a motlle and than main objective was to be close to Disneyland and stay on budget 0 it was staisfactory Pros: Pros:  - within walking distance to Disneyland ( 15 min).  - basic but filling breakfast - spacious rooms - swimming pool on the ground - friendly reception staff - very good value ( 45$) as for such proximity to Dinsneyland  Cons: - rooms a bit worn out rooms  - Swimming pool located oddly in the middle of parking and rather for kids than for adults
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The room was just what I required for a restful trip to...
Summary: The room was just what I required for a restful trip to Disneyland.   The service I received was very good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a special trip to be with 3 of our grandchildren and spouses.  We had a very friendly check-in.  We were very delighted with the room.  All of our needs were fulfilled, even breakfast!  As seniors, it was a long walk to Disneyland, but we did it!!  We would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of this motel is very good. Near the entrance of Disneyland and close the a row of restaurants. Parking is free!
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are looking for just a cheap, clean room close to Disneyland, you will be fine with this hotel. Do not consider the b-fast they offer an actual breakfast. There is never any room to sit down and eat and sadly the food is far below average!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location to Disneyland and restaurants. The hotel was...
Summary: Great location to Disneyland and restaurants. The hotel was going through renovations so it was noisy and the hot tub was closed. Cleanliness was an issue. I did experience a problem during my stay and the staff was great and refunded my visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It's a motel - what do you expect?
Summary: We've just 'done' California from London and what we've learned is that all motels are identical, i.e. awful. We thought this might be a little different because of the positive Trip Advisor reviews but we hated it. The big, big pro is it is walking distance to Disneyland. 15 minutes if you're fit and haven't got small kids with you. There's also free parking. The bed was quite comfortable. It's also pretty much next door to several decent restaurants so plenty of choice for evening food. The bad things? Shower that blasts you in the face and switches from too hot to too cold without you touching it. Crazy shallow bath. 5 dollars extra per night for a fridge that buzzes. Buzzing air con. Noise from people walking outside and in their own rooms (and not because they were behaving
Manager Response: none

Summary: We appreciate clean and comfortable motel service, especially when it is convenient to what we came to see or do. Thanks for meeting all our needs!

Summary: A decent bed, try to get an upstairs room unless your used to people stomping above you.  The continental breakfast was all sugar, in various forms but all sugary products.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland. Was quiet, reasonably clean. Hotel...
Summary: Close to Disneyland. Was quiet, reasonably clean. Hotel could use an overall makeover as it's showing its age.

Summary: The hotel was great but the walk feels longer coming back from Disneyland. The price and accommodations are great.The walk might be the only reason we might not stay there again everything else was great.

Summary: We have stayed at this property a number of times because it is economical and close to Disney. We notice marked improvements to the motel this time: the hot water was actually hot! The rooms were slightly upgraded with new artword and a fridge! We will stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very good value-so close to Disney
Summary: I had a great stay at Super 8 near Disney. Very good value and basic, all you actually need. There was no need to book into a top Disney hotel and we were only in our room for sleeping. The breakfast was very basic- waffle, fruit, yoghurt and cinnamon pastry.   The Disney entrance is about a 10 minute walk away which was very convenient.   When we arrived it looked like they were starting to install fridges into the rooms- We had one in our room. It did proof to be very handy as it kept the snacks for disneyland cold.  I was also happy with the cleaning team- one of the beds in our room had items on it- the cleaner left a note saying sorry we could not change your bed lien as there were items on the bed, I found his very reassuring.  One issue with the room was the shower,
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 10 nights in Feb of 2014, 1 adult and 3 kids.  Our room was big, and beds were really  comfy.  The shower head was really short; wasn't a huge deal for us, I'm the tallest in the crew and clock-out at 5'2" so it worked just fine.  For a 6 footer though, you might have to contort slightly to wash the upper body!  We found the staff was helpful and friendly.  Had a few pool days and quite enjoyed the facility.    The only niggly about our room was that we found the room smelling musty our last few days there. I don't think is so much a reflection of the accommodations as it is the weather!  It was VERY rainy our last few days and with 4 people showering the humidity really didn't have a way to dissipate.  That being said - it was very minor.  For us the breakfast

Summary Heading: Noise of water flowing from next rooms
Summary: The noise of water flowing through the pipes when water in the bathrooms was used in the next rooms or upstairs rooms was terrible.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The room was clean, comfortable, roomy, & conveniently...
Summary: The room was clean, comfortable, roomy, & conveniently located to Disneyland.  it was not that far of a walk to the park. The breakfast that was provided was simple & ok for a start to the day. I will for sure be staying here again. The staff was kind & welcoming.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location is safe and next to alot shopping. About 10 minute walk from Disneyland.rooms were ok nice tv and free wifi were cool
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just stayed the last few nights with my husband and two teenagers. The room was recently remodeled and we did have a refrigerator. Not sure if we paid extra for it. On our reservation we asked for a rollaway and upon check in they didn't know about that request but luckily they found one and brought it to our room quickly. The room was clean and attractive, beds were a bit firm for me but not horrible. The shower was not great. So-so water pressure and the shower head is really low. Our room was quiet. We were in the back away from the Garden Walk parking lot. They had just filled the pool and the water felt nice since it was in the 90's when we were there. We walked to Disney in about 10 min but we found out about a free shuttle to Disney from the Garden Walk and used that when
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here because it was close to Disneyland, about a 10 min walk, not too far. The room was clean, you can tell they recently upgraded some things, and our room had a brand new refrigerator which was nice. For a Super 8, this was very nice, and the price was great. The man at the counter checking us in was also very kind and helpful. We will probably stay here again, the only thing I would suggest is getting breakfast elsewhere because the selection of food was limited and the breakfast area was crowded, but that wasn't such a big deal to us.

Summary: Stayed during the heat wave in early May.   Room was very comfortable, staff was friendly, bedding was new.   Rooms are what you'd expect from a Super 8, and they are on the larger side for hotels in this area.  Hotel is within walking distance, although due to the extreme heat, we opted for the ART shuttle which stops at the front of the hotel.  We will stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here with my 5year old daughter for our trip to Disneyland and found this Super 8 to be quite acceptable. The rooms are decent even if they have a slight musty smell, there is a pool and hot tub that are great (although the hot tub was closed because of a leak half way through our visit), and this is probably the most affordable hotel that is relatively close to Disneyland. There is a breakfast with toast, eggos, cereal -hot and cold, cinnamon buns, juice and coffee so it is really convenient. It was very crowded in the breakfast room and very hard to navigate actually getting your food when it is that crowded but it satisfied our morning hungers!  The walk to Disney is doable but can be a little far for going back and forth or if you have younger toddlers. The staff were
Manager Response: none

Summary: Generally it is ok but I was shocked when I asked if there is a microwave in the room to heat up my kids food the receptionist told me they don't have it in the room  but he can rent me one for $5 ,In addition they don't have those small refrigerator in the room, so if you plane to bring food this is not the right place for you.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: great hotel 2 blocks walk from disneyland.
Summary: has breakfast. decent super 8. good value for the money.  its not the ritz by any means but one of the best super 8's I have been in.  the 2 bedded room does hold 2 adults and 2 kids easily. clean. great if you are going to Disneyland.

Summary: Check in was easy, the rooms were clean and comfortable.  I had emailed the motel prior to my stay to request a fridge, but did not get a reply.  I asked for the fridge upon check in and it was brought to my room within a few minutes ($7 per day extra charge). The only real complaint I have about the room was the lack of outlets.  Two adults and two children travel with lots of tech devices (phones, tablet, iPods) and we were constantly rotating them for charging.  My tip would be to bring an extention cord with you! The free breakfast was ok, nothing special but it did the job.  Coffee, milk, juice, toast, waffles, cereal, and cinnamin rolls.  We went every morning around 6:30/7:00 and it wasn't too crowded yet.  If weather permits, take your breakfast outside to the pool area
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great location lovely staff
Summary: We checked in with ease at the lovely Ana who was lovely. The hotel was more than we expected very clean and comfortable, the bed is comfortable. Room has fridge and microwave and wifi. The rooms are large, we were on the too floor. This was in a great location only 5-10 mins walk to Disneyland, Garden walk only 2 mins away great for restaurants etc. Pool had just opened due to now coming into summer season, the spa is still to operate. Would Definately recommend this hotel we have stayed at some fancy places with terrible beds and service etc but this has everything you will need and the service is first class. Thanks to Ali as well he offered great service. Thanks

Summary: This worked out fine for our needs. We aren't people that need to luxurious place to stay as we really only used it to sleep. So for the price and proximity to the parks (10 minute walk) it's well worth it. The only negatives I really have: 1. there was no shower curtain the first night we were there and 2. the last day we were there, I found a cockroach on the wall as I was packing up.3. water for the shower was warm at best. The staff was friendly. Never had an issue with finding a place to park. Right around the corner from PF Changes, Cheesecake Factory, and Bubba Gump. Looked like they were adding mini fridges to the rooms when we were leaving.

Summary: I have stayed here many times, and always have excellent service, clean rooms and love that the ART bus stops right in front. It is close enough to walk to Disneyland, but I am a senior so I do appreciate the bus. I think the only suggestion I have is to extend the breakfast hours to at least 10am. I appreciate the housekeeping employees. When I put out my "Do not Disturb" sign they always observe it. I have stayed in many hotels across the country, and have had housekeepers pound on the door early in the morning when I have my sign out and wish to sleep in. Thank you, thank you housekeepers!. This is a bargain since it is so close to eateries, shopping and Disneyland. I will be back!

Summary: Best part were the beds-very comfy. The sink in my son's room was plugged and not fixed because we were leaving next day. The Pool, hot tub were getting maintenance done. We were really looking fwd to those after  long day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here before because the location is near Disneyland and good places to eat, the price is ok for the location. Upon leaving we couldn't help but noticing that there was approx 50 brand new refriegerators still in the plastic wrap just seating in the parking lot. One of the reason for returning to this place was because they offered free friegs and microwaves, we truly hope that they change there policy of charging for refiegerators and microwaves and just include them in the room price like they did before. Manager Response: none

Summary: Only gripe is that the doors were too easy for our 1 year old to open. Most hotel doors have that heftiness to prevent that. That's a small complaint though. Felt safe. Super close to Disney. I would stay again.  Oh skip the free breakfast. Not worth free lol

Summary: Facilities are older and comparative to the price.  Clean, housekeeping performed daily, responsive staff from Front Desk to Service.  Security was posted in the parking lot during night so your vehicle and contents were safe.  Walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center.  Continental breakfast  was quite adequate; cereal, toast, milk, good coffee, juice and such. One pick would be the lack of outlets; the only open outlet was at the sink.  Overall, good value for money.

Summary: We stayed here over the Easter weekend. We found the property to be old but clean. Check in and check out was friendly and easy. We stayed in a 2 queen room. Room was clean. Vanity was seperate from shower/toilet area which was helpful when 3 ladies are getting ready in the morning. Newer furniture and clean linens. Breakfast was minimul but filled us up to start our day. We had oatmeal and yogourt to start our day. Breakfast lady was pleasant.We were at breakfast by 6am and didn't have a problem with crowding etc. We stayed on the second floor and closer to the back of the property. It was quiet during the time that we spent there. We were gone by 6:30am and not back again until 11pm so during the nighttime, it was quiet. AC worked fine. Housekeeping visited everyday and did a
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose this place based on positive reviews from Tripadvisor for this Super 8.  Through enough this is a great place to be near disneyland.  We stayed in Islander Motel (opposite this place) last year and we voted this place has a much better value.  Pros 1.Large clean room  2.Comfortable beds and pillows 3.Room is made up everyday 4.Buffet cold breakfast with a dedicated breakfast room as opposed to lobby area in most motels. 5.They sell disney tickets at discounted rate (3 days park hopper has a good discount) 6.Plenty of laundry machines  Cons 1.The ice-cream machines contains stale ice-cream.   Silly matter though! 2.Refrigerator is available for USD5/day and the microwave is USD3/day  Besides all above, the walking distance to disneyland entrance is ok.  You better walk

Summary: No fridge or microwave. Front desk staff was very unprofessional and rude. Summary: I asked for a room with a fireworks view but quiet (away from a stairwell). Our room comfortably fit my husband and I, grandma in her own bed, and two kids: one in our pack n play and the other in a toddler air mattress (we brought both with us but were offered a crib and cot). We got Room 284, which was great! Super quiet, security at night, a shuttle that comes to the front door of the motel. Our room had a view of the back of Cars Land and the Tower of Terror. Our room had 2 queen beds, and clean everywhere. Great water pressure in the shower, complimentary shampoo and soap. We walked to dinner at Cheesecake Factory. Breakfast was good, go early because they close the gate at 9am SHARP. The breakfast room faces west, so it gets hot in there. Plan to eat in the pool area on a
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! It's great to hear we fit into your budget. I am also glad to hear that you liked your room the amenities we provide. We look forward to seeing  you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: The pricing was affordable.the only 2 things I didn't like...

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.

The staff was pleasant and helpful.  Hot tub and pool are a nice amenity. Hot tub is a good size. Complimentary breakfast! Free parking! Close to shopping and restaurants (2 minute walk).   The not so good: The A/C unit was noisy it was difficult to sleep. It turns off and on every 30 minutes with a loud banging. We tried sleeping with it off but it just got too hot and stuffy. This problem would have been solved if the window was functioning; all we needed was fresh air.   The breakfast room was too small and not enough tables (even on a week day). Not a problem if you don‚Äôt mind eating standing up (which my
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad to hear you found our staff so friendly and helpful. Its also great to hear we fit into your budget.  We do have fridges now in all our rooms. They come standard, so no extra charge for the fridge Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The room was nice and the beds were comfy.  The drains we slow to drain.  Good location, not too far from the park or restaurants.  Loved the patio above the check in office to watch the fireworks at night!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad you found our location to be so convenient. It's also great to hear you enjoyed the Disneyland fireworks from our deck. Look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: The rooms are average, the food market on the 3rd floor is handy and of course the proximity to Disneyland is super!  Really appreciated the extra plug-ins on the table lamps for plugging in phones and iPads! Was there same time as a bunch of teens and the banging of the doors was loud at times but hey it is Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! So glad you liked our location! We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Came down a week early for a cheer competion. Found great rates on cheap tickets. Rooms were spacious and clean. Staff was more than accommodating and pleasant to deal with. Free breakfast was great. And the long hours it was open for (5-9am) made it easy for early risers or late wakers. Very close to Disneyland,  about a 20 minute walk. Plenty of parking and the spaces actually had room! Only negative I have to say is no shuttle to Disneyland and the shower heads are at cheast high. But the pool gets sun all day and is pleasant to use. It also has a Jacuzzi. Definitely will stay here again. You get a good room with good service. And dont have to pay a "resort fee". No hidden costs, no suprise charges.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel is in a good location to Disneyland if you are to go...
Summary: Hotel is in a good location to Disneyland if you are to go there. The room needs better lighting, needs to smell better (old smelling),  and MORE outlets.  With the various types of devices now a days, it only had 1 outlet to plug anything in.
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review! It's great to hear you found our location so convenient and enjoyed our amenities such as our free wifi. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: It's a good service, good location near Disney.  Internet without problems. Room clean and big. In general good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Glad to know you enjoyed our free wifi and appreciated our great service.  We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I am happy with the room rate, considering the location of the motel.  Definitely, will rent from Super 8 Motel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! It's good to know we fit into your budget and you loved our location so. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Good stay as always, a little noisy this time around.
Summary: This was our 5th stay with the Super 8 near Disneyland and as usual it was pleasant.  We were in the second set of buildings on the top floor, closer to the pool.  They were very busy this trip, and for the first time had people staying on both sides of us.  One side didn't know the meaning of "inside voices" as they were two younger males, so we could hear them pretty much whenever they were in the room.  Nothing the sound of our fan/AC/heater couldnt fix.  We continue to come back here because the rooms are decent, the beds are comfortable and it's pretty close to Disneyland and places to eat.  I recommend staying on the top floor, no matter what.  They have a free, simple breakfast from 6am-9am everyday.  You can walk to the park(Disneyland) in about 15-20 minutes, or take a
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! Its always great to hear from repeat guests. I am sorry to hear you experienced some noise from our other guests. Remember we are open at our front desk 24 hours. So in the future, please let us know if you have any concerns or inconvenience. Its great to hear you will be back and you enjoy staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Recently stayed at this hotel. I found it to be a good value. Front office staff was very helpful. I made a mistake in booking the room and they were more than accomodating. Quiet room with a tub and a comfortable mattress. Clean room. Breakfast was carb heavy so I stayed with the yogurt. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It's great to hear you will be back.  We are glad that we fit into your budget and you found our staff so helpful as well. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The price, the location and accommodations were good. A little bigger breakfast selection and free access to print boarding passes would be appreciated. Extra outlets in the rooms are needed or lamps that have plug ins. Having only the bathroom outlet for all electronics needed in a family of 4 is not sufficient. We struggled to stay charged up!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's great to hear we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay. It's true we are at the perfect location when visiting Disneyland. It's just a ten minute walk. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Absolutely nothing fancy, but great location and price. If...
Summary: Absolutely nothing fancy, but great location and price. If you're like us and spend all your waking hours in the Disney parks - and only need the hotel to sleep in - it's a great value.  Unlike other hotels in the resort area, they don't charge extra for parking or resort fees, and breakfast (basic "continental") is also included. And it's a manageable 7-10 min. walk to the main gate, so you don't have to pay for shuttles. Super value, if you aren't looking for fancy lobby, pools, full breakfast, etc.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! Its great to hear you found us such a great value! It's true, our amenities such as free parking, complimentary breakfast and free wifi make for a great added value. We are also so convenient to Disneyland park as well as great places to dine. Thanks again for the great review, we do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Comfortable at a great location and price
Summary: I've stayed at this Super 8 several times when attending conventions in Anaheim because it's economical and close to numerous good restaurants and downtown Disney as well as the Convention Center. The room and free breakfast are nothing to brag about but comfortable enough
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! Glad to hear you had such a comfortable stay! Its true we do have a great location and are very convenient to Disneyland and other great places to dine and shop in the area. We do appreciate you taking the time to give us such a wonderful review. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here when we went to Disney and it was a great deal, parking was included even on the day you check out so we saved on parking at Disney. The walk was about 10-15 minutes and was very straight forward.   Room was clean and the staff was friendly. Room could use better sound proofing as we could hear the icemaker next door and people walking past the room. Bathroom was a bit small, but it did its job.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! Great to hear you found us to be such a great value! Its true our amenities such as free parking and free breakfast make it very affordable. and a great value. Thanks again for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This is an older motel, but it was clean and served well as a place to crash after a full day at the Disneyland Resorts. Its location is its greatest asset. It was an easy walk to the Disneyland entrance. The breakfast provides little nutrition, but it is still a nice that it is included. The terrace above the entrance was a great place to watch the fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Its true we do have a great location. I am glad to hear you enjoyed the fireworks from our above terrace. It is a great view from there.  We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Rooms cleans and nice settings;service at the front desk was nice and quick we got into our room in fast.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Glad to hear you had and excellent stay! Its wonderful you received such great service and found our rooms so clean and comfortable. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: First, we had roaches in our room.  Air conditioning was falling off the wall.  Hanger in bathroom was falling off.  Not to mention that that breakfast rolls were stale and not good!  never stay here again!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. I do apologize for any inconvenience you my have experienced during your stay. We do have a great maintenance staff that does a great job maintaining the rooms and provides great preventative maintenance as well. We thoroughly inspect every room before it is occupied for all maintenance as well as housekeeping perfection. I do apologize again for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay. We do again want to thank you for the review and hope to see you again next time your are in Anaheim.

Summary: Very comfortable bed, super clean room, friendly staff, good prices all within walking distance of the happiest place on earth. Well done, Super 8, well done.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad to hear you will be back! So glad to know you found our location so convenient, the staff so friendly and helpful and the rooms so clean and comfortable. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Very nice stay for 7 of us who were going to Disneyland. The rooms were clean the staff was very friendly and helpful. We stayed 4 nights, the breakfast was the same everyday which got boring but, all in all it was great. I would reccomend this motel to anyone staying in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's great to hear you found our rooms clean and you found our staff so friendly and helpful! It's also wonderful to know you found us to be such a great value! Great to hear you will recommend us to others! We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: About 10-15 minute walk to park entrance. Nice location to restaurants, etc. The pool and spa looked ok but it was pres day weekend so it was always overflowing with rowdy teens. The room was clean but it had a musty smell to it. After we took showers, you can see why. Not very good ventilation. No privacy curtains so if you wanted natural light, everybody could see you. Otherwise would stay here as we spend all day in parks on our short visits anyways. Breakfast was a joke. Yogurt and fruit and cereal.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's wonderful to hear you found our accommodations so clean and that we fit into your budget. I do apologize if you did not find our breakfast to your liking. We do provide yogurt, fruit and cereal, however we also serve cinnamon rolls, waffles, oatmeal, toast with jam, hot cocoa, juice, and coffee and tea. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Super 8 Anaheim/Near Disneyland for 4 nights. There were 12 of us and we shared 3 rooms. We arrived later in the evening and our rooms were set aside and ready for us. They were all together as requested as well as 1 adjoining room. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the front desk staff were very friendly. I had done quite a bit of research prior to booking and there were several comments regarding the quality of breakfast available so to be honest we were a little worried. The selections we had were toast, waffles, cereal, oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, hot chocolate, juice and coffee. The breakfast is basic yes, but plenty of options to start off your day. The hot tub could use a little maintenance as the water looked like it needed some attention
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are glad to hear you had a great stay with us! I love to hear you received great customer service and you found our location so convenient and you enjoyed our breakfast. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: No need to spend more elsewhere
Summary: It is cheap, easy, clean and in a great location.  Close to convenience stores and major hire car companies.  As for food options after a big day at Disney, You are spoilt for choice from cheap and easy take-away or eatins, for diners to fine dining all within easy walking.  A bit of a hike to Disneyland compared to others which can be a tough, but the price of closer Disneyland resort hotels can't be justified for this reason alone, especially if you are on a budget.  Rooms are clean, plenty of parking, friendly staff.  Dining room for breakfast could be a bit bigger.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is good to hear you found our location so convenient and so close to everything. It is also great to hear we fit into your budget and you found us so affordable. I love to hear you found our staff so friendly and so helpful. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Great Hotel within walking distance, but of course it seems far after you have walked all day around the Parks.  Will stay here again :)  Heated Pool and free breakfast in the morning.  Beds are comfortable and there are quite a few great restaurants within walking distance also.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! It's great to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub and also enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It's true we are just a few minute walk to the Disneyland park. Glad you found our location so convenient. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I had a room on the second floor near the office. I don't know if that building is older than the rest but the walls are solid concrete which keeps out the noise of adjoining rooms. The room was clean and the price great. The only drawback is a lack of electric outlets that are easily accessible.
Manager Response: thanks so much for the review! Its great to hear you found us so affordable and that we fit into your budget. Its also wonderful to hear you found our accommodations so clean and comfortable. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay regarding the electrical outlets and their locations. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great staff, clean room & bathroom. Just amazing!
Summary: For the price I paid I deff got more than expected. The room was very clean as well as the bathroom. The bed was very comfy as well with nice clean linens. I'm deff staying here again! Great job to everyone maintaining the hotel being nice and clean! The ice machines where great too.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Glad to hear you found our staff so helpful and friendly. I am also glad to hear you found our accommodations so wonderful! We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Our room was not small and not well ventilated--felt like we were inside a gym bag. We have stayed here a few years back and thought it was acceptable for a night, we are unlikely to stay here again. Our room was also close to the street, on the noisy side, the maid service doesn't come until 2 or 3 p.m., and the shower head is so low it came up to my belly button. On the plus side, it's right next to Anaheim Gardenwalk with a California Pizza Kitchen and a P.F. Changs. It's also easily within walking distance to Disneyland for reasonably fit adults.
Manager Response: thank you for the review! I am glad to know you found our location so convenient. Its true we are just walking distance to Disneyland park, a 10 minute walk. We are also right next to the garden walk which has a wide variety of wonderful places to eat. I do apologize for any inconvenience during your stay with us. If you need maid service at a particular time, please just notify the front desk, we are more than happy to accommodate your needs. Thanks again for the review, we do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Super 8 - Clean and in good condition
Summary: This Super 8 was a fine hotel for our Disneyland trip. It is an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland. The room was clean and the the bed fine for sleeping. Lots of pillows. Cute little pool and hot tub. Hotel is very family friendly. Free breakfast. Good place to stay. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Its true we are just a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. So convenient! It is great to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub and you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast! We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We choose Super 8 because our friends were staying there. It was clean, and surprisingly quiet. We got a decent rate for 3 nights. The free breakfast was acceptable....coffee, juice, yogurt, cereal...were just fine to start the day with.  However.... There was a lack of outlets. Extension cords were in place for TV and were used to plug in the refrigerator. The extension cords were 2-prong, so to accommodate the 3-prong refrigerator plug, the staff had bent the 3rd prong out of the way! We plugged the refrigerator into the only 3-prong outlet (near the sink). The hotel needs to update their electrical system as the situation with use of extension cords is not safe!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, We do appreciate your feedback and do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and you found our rooms clean and comfortable. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: WILL NOT EVER STAY AT A SUPER 8 AGAIN
Summary: this was a nasty place. hot tub looked GREEN and they gave you little hand towels for the pool area. the breakfast was a JOKE McDonalds is better. never again
Manager Response: . I am sorry to hear you found our breakfast not to your liking. We do offer the standard Super 8 breakfast per their requirements. The various items we provide are on the list of breakfast preferred items of our guests. I also apologize if the hot tub did not seem the right color to you. We service our hot tub and pool daily. I also apologize if the pool towels seemed too small for you. They are standard bath size towels. Again, I do apologize for any inconvenience experienced during your stay, and do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is a GREAT place to stay!!! The staff is so great and helpful!! Rooms are big and clean!!! The price is also great!! Worth it!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It's wonderful to hear you found our staff so helpful and the price so affordable. Its also great to hear you found our rooms clean and to your liking. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The stay itself was very nice..  But the check in was the worst experience I have ever had!!! The lady who checked me in was rude and robot like. She ran over her speech like she was a recording.. When I asked her to start over again she acted as if I asked her personally to borrow $$.. She has got to be the worst customer service rep I have ever had the unfortunateness to meet..
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is great to hear you had a nice stay with us. I do apologize if your check in process was not a good experience. We do strive for great customer service, I am sorry to hear that this was not the case upon check in. Again, glad to hear you had a nice stay and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The place was very good overall, There was quite a bit of noise from the street but that is not that surprising. However my only downfall was that the pillows sucked and I had to go buy new pillows the first morning at wal-mart.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! I am glad to know you found our location so convenient during your stay. It's true we are just a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. I do apologize for any inconvenience you had with our pillows in the room. We do have a wonderful housekeeping staff available that are happy to assist as well as a wonderful front desk staff who are available 24 hours. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: PROS - walking distance to Disneyland (pushing double stroller took about 15-20 minutes)  - Clean  - Updated - Decent amount of space - Comfortable - all rooms are non smoking (pro for me, might not be a pro for others)  CONS - Our AC stunk and so did our neighbors around us, had to buy Febreez to help the smell - Breakfast was a mad house and they are crazy strict about the 6am-9am rule and while it is free it is very basic. Waffles are like Egos (frozen, not the kind you make yourself) One kind of cereal (raisin bran, doesn't go over well with the kids), they did have OJ, Apple Juice, Milk, Plain Oatmeal packets, some pre-packaged cinnamon rolls (not bad), but since we are protien people we ended up buying some of our own stuff to supplement.  - No refrigerator or microwave,
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Its great to hear you found us a clean and comfortable place to stay. I also am glad to hear you found our location so convenient. I do apologize for any inconvenience with the AC when you were visiting. Please let us know as we do have maintenance staff available that are more than happy to assist you. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Perfect place to stay and only minutes from everything enjoyed the breakfast and especially the pool if you ever come to Anaheim it is great place at a great price I am going to stay here from now on!
Manager Response: So wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay so much! I am glad to know you enjoyed our pool and our breakfast so much. It's also great to hear you found our location so convenient. Thanks so much for the review and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Our room was very basic, we have paid allot less for way more but considering its location it was all right. 10 min walk to the park but if they had an opening in their fence it would have cut off 5 min!!!! The room was stuffy and very dark and their wasn't much seating or counter space and our plug in items would not stay in the plug! Glad we brought a plug bar!. It was weird for the bathroom sink to not be in the bathroom! And the shower head was very low!!! (make sure your shower curtain fits before you shower) Overall it was OK! I think cheap for the Disneyland area is the bottom line here, although next time we will pay more for a better room! Oh! and they require a $100 deposit cash/credit card that you don't know about until you check in!!! The lady at the front desk kept
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, I am glad to hear we fit into your budget and you found our location to be so convenient. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay.  We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Me and my family stayed here for spring break our room was nicer then I expected it was fairly close to Disneyland maybe a 10-15 min walk but the area is super nice very nice restaurants all around room was very clean couldn't hear people outside that much The bad I would say about our stay was that the shower water would get hot and cold throughout your shower and there's really no outlets around the beds to plug in your phone's or laptops but besides that I would highly recommend this place to friends and family
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's great to hear you had a great stay! I do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with the shower. We do have maintenance available for any of your needs or concerns and they are ready to assist. Again, so great to hear you enjoyed your stay and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you just need to sleep for...
Summary: Great place to stay if you just need to sleep for Disneyland. Clean rooms decent ac decent cinnamon rolls for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and you liked our breakfast! We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The shower drain had a few troubles, but all in all, the price & quality were quite wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, I do apologize for any inconvenience with the shower. We do have maintenance staff available, ready to assist with anything you need. It is good to hear you found us affordable and you liked our accommodations. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Immaculate heated pool walkable to good food and Disney.
Summary: They were really sweet to us here. They have a nice little fresh cool pool and a clean outdoor hot pool. Clean. Thin walls but great location. Right by Bubba's shrimp - a fun restaurant for adults and kids.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's so nice to know you found our staff so friendly. Its also wonderful to hear you found our accommodations so clean and our location so convenient. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Fantastic value for being within walking distance of the Disney gates. Close to convenience stores and restaurants along the way to the park, and adjacent to an outdoor mall, which we didn't visit because, well, Disney. The rooms were clean, surprisingly well decorated, and the only complaint I have is that on the east facing side of the property, it was quite loud two mornings as garbage trucks rolled through nearby. I don't know if it's better on a side facing west, but it might be worth asking when you check in. This was one of the lowest rates for a property so close to the parks, and for just having a place to rest your head at night, there's no reason not to take advantage of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It's great to hear you found our location so convenient and our price so affordable. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting! Thanks again for the review!

Summary: loved this hotel, cheap and clean and very near disney. Love how they let us check in at 7++am cos we reached there early. Love how they did not disturb us when we were sleeping in the room, and left a note on the door explaining that they'll not make up the room as our sign on the door says "do not disturb". Love the bubba gump shrimps just next to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay! Its wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient and that we fit into your budget. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Apparently rated somewhere as a 4 1/2 star..  really bad joke!
Summary: First off - I did not contribute to the selection of this hotel for our group, but as it was presented I felt obligated to keep an open mind.    Eyes wide open - I would never stay here.  We arrived just in time to see the police tour through the parking lot.. somehow that's not a cozy feeling..  I moved out as did some of my colleagues.    We had to pay the 1 days penalty for cancelling but nothing was going to keep me here.   If you want to know... its as basic as it comes..  it had new bedding, tables & pictures and looked like new paint and carpeting..  I could tell by the heaps of old furniture & garbage outside my door..  problems underlying requiring some spit & polish.. most likely.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review, I do apologize for any alarm when  you arrived with seeing the police tour our parking lot. Actually as a courtesy and for additional safety and comfort of our guests, the police periodically tour our parking lot. Most guest find this comforting as the Disneyland area is a very popular place at all hours and the thought that the police are watching out is a good thing. Glad you did notice that we are upgrading our rooms!  Adding new bedding, and new furnishings as well as new painting and d√©cor is for the benefits as well as enjoyment of our guests. We have also upgraded our rooms with Flat screen TVs! I do apologize for the inconvenience of your cancelation policy, We do make sure guests are aware of the policies prior to booking the reservation. Again, we want to thank you for the review and do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This is a very basic hotel / motel on the Disney strip.  No frills.  Basic amenities and no bells and whistles.  Rooms exit to outside parking lot, no hallway. Security seemed sketchy but we ran into no problems (no break-ins) and nothing was missing.  Rent-a-cop was present. Rooms and decor were very dated but acceptably clean. Towels were clean.  Hot water and water pressure was good.  Lack of electrical plugs. Breakfast was very very basic.  Would be ideal for a budget oriented family vacation that wanted to save money.  Otherwise, not recommended for business travelers.  Pay the extra bucks and stay in a hotel with a proper lobby and enclosed hallways.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed from Febuary 21st to the 23rd, since it was dapper weekend at Disney. I loved it, it is cozy, clean and just what we needed for our little getaway. Its about a 5 minute walk to disney, of course we have no children or baby in a stroller.  It is a perfect location for either going to disney or going to downtown disney for a drink. The front desk was really nice, the housekeeping service was excellent. I highly recommend this place. Lastly, my boyfriend left his swim shorts and my earphones at the hotel, we called and they gladly sent them to us :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Its so great to hear you loved staying with us! I also love to hear you found our staff so friendly and nice. We do strive to excel in our customer service. I am also glad to hear you found our location so convenient. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel 2/6 to 2/10, for a quick getaway to disneyland with my 10-year-old son.   All we needed was a bed to sleep in and a roof over our heads. We planned to spend all our time at the parks. So I wasn't worried about the ratings for the hotel, or the state of the hotel room when we got there, which wasn't stellar by any means, because the price was perfect for me, through bookit.com.  When I got home I checked my credit card statement. I saw a charge for $117 from Super 8. I had prepaid for this room through bookit.com, so I did not expect any other fees. When I called them, they stated I had a CAT in the room so they've charged me a cleaning deposit!!!!  Ignoring the OBVIOUS question of who brings a cat to disneyland, I stated that in no way did I have any type
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced while staying here. We are a pet free motel. We have chosen this policy and make sure to state it on our registration cards and mention that when you are checking advising of the cleaning fee if pets and or pet evidence is found in the room.  We charge this cleaning fee because for the protection of our other guests, we have to completely clean and sanitize the room for new arrivals. . Many of our guests who stay here rely on the fact we are pet free motel and stay here because they may have allergies etc to pet hair or dander or the animals them selves. We had 3 managers verify that there was indeed a cat in your room. Again, we do apologize for the inconvenience, however, for the safety and comfort of our future guests, this room had to be serviced to remove the pet hair and dander found in the room. The cleaning fee for this service was applied to your room charges as clearly stated in the registration form filled in and signed upon check in. Sincerely,  Peter Bhagat,  General Manager

Summary: Very close to the parks (10 to 15-minute walk), good and spacious rooms, not great but decent breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced while staying here. We are a pet free motel. We have chosen this policy and make sure to state it on our registration cards and mention that when you are checking advising of the cleaning fee if pets and or pet evidence is found in the room.  We charge this cleaning fee because for the protection of our other guests, we have to completely clean and sanitize the room for new arrivals. . Many of our guests who stay here rely on the fact we are pet free motel and stay here because they may have allergies etc to pet hair or dander or the animals them selves. We had 3 managers verify that there was indeed a cat in your room. Again, we do apologize for the inconvenience, however, for the safety and comfort of our future guests, this room had to be serviced to remove the pet hair and dander found in the room. The cleaning fee for this service was applied to your room charges as clearly stated in the registration form filled in and signed upon check in. Sincerely,  Peter Bhagat,  General Manager

Summary: I loved this place !!! Great and comfy beds and clean rooms ..slipper socks stayed clean!!!! Will stay again and again !!!
Manager Response: Wow love to hear you will be back again and again! We look forward to seeing you. It is wonderful to hear you loved our upgraded rooms and beds. Thank you so much for the review!

Summary: I like the hotel. They have good rates and  this is the only hotel my family stays in when traveling.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is wonderful to know we fit into your budget and you find us an affordable great place to stay. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: A great hotel overall. I don't usually do reviews  but for...
Summary: A great hotel overall. I don't usually do reviews  but for the price and what we got it deserves a good post. Two problems for the stay. First day there was no hot water so had a cold shower. Management was informed and resolved by the evening. Second was the limited availability of fridges and microwaves. Considering the price this is an amazing hotel to stay for your trip!! Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, It is great to hear you will be back. I do apologize for any inconvenience with the shower while you were here. Next time request the microwave and fridge when making the reservation, we can note that for you so it will be here upon arrival. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We had a great time staying here....nice hotel for a cheap price especially for a near buy Disneyland stay
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!  Its great to hear that you find our location so convenient! We love to hear we fit into your budget as well. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Had a great stay we were very happy with the location and friendly, helpful staff. would definately stay there again. Thankyou Super 8.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am so glad to hear you had a great stay. It is also great to hear you liked our location and found our staff to be so helpful and friendly. We do look forward to you next visit!

Summary: we were looking for a low cost option close to Disney as we were only staying one night, and would not be spending very much time at the hotel. The room was clean and quiet, and the price was good. there is a free continental breakfast included, but it is very minimal. The rooms do not have windows that can be opened, some fresh air would have been nice, but otherwise we were pleased.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am glad to hear you found our rooms clean and quiet, and you liked our location. I am also glad we fit into your budget and you found us affordable. I do apologize for any inconvenience with the windows in the room, we do have AC with a fan function that works quite well. Again, thanks for the review, we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The room itself was, just ok.  The problem wasn't the room.  As I was checking in my husband noticed on a tv screen that apparently had 'hotel information' scrolling through.  Thankfully he read as he was standing there. This motel CHARGES for the use of the refridgerator and microwave!!  Now this might have been ok if the guy checking me in had informed me, or asked if I wanted this 'add-on', but nope no warning at all.  Once we got into the room, the appliances themself didn't even have anything posted. There was nothing anywhere in the room that stated a separate change for these items.  I just think it was very poor business not to forewarn your guests of these charges.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Yes it is true we do provide microwaves and fridges for a small additional cost. These are available upon request. We do not place them in the room and charge for them without our guest knowledge. I do apologize for any confusion, however, when you checked in the room, we had not removed the microwave and fridge as we wanted to expedite your check in, we just left them, and did not charge you for the items. Again, I do apologize for any inconvenience or confusion this may have caused. We just wanted to give you that excellent service and did not charge you for the items. We do look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Good value and close to Disneyland parks. Your comfort (noise-wise) will depend on your room location. The breakfast left a lot to be desired. Some mornings fruit or yogurt others nothing but dry cereal and frozen waffles. Overall you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Its great to hear we fit into your budget and you found us to be a good value. It is also wonderful to hear you found our location so convenient during your stay. We do offer a continental breakfast every morning with a variety of items offered. I do apologize if these items were not to your liking. We do offer fresh fruit, yogurt, waffles, cinnamon buns, a variety of cereals, toast and jam as well as coffee tea cocoa, and juice.  We do appreciate your feedback. Thanks again for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Nice room.  Clean.  Convenient location to convention center.  Don't get too excited about their continental breakfast, it's awful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We do appreciate your feedback. We do offer a Super Start Super 8 breakfast every morning with a variety of continental breakfast items. I do apologize if this did not meet your needs. I am glad to hear you found our accomodations clean and to your liking. It is also great to hear you found us so convenient. We are just minutes from the convention center.

Summary: The staff was friendly and the room was dated but clean.  The price was EXCELLENT -- less than $60/night, particularly for the location -- within walking distance to Disneyland and SEVERAL good restaurants -- and parking was free.  My only recommendation would be to step up the breakfast a notch.  The breakfast wasn't terrible, but they could upgrade the toaster waffles to real waffles and it would be a lot better.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Its wonderful to hear we fit into your budget and you found our accomodations to your liking. Its great to hear you loved our location as well. We do look forward to seeing you next time you are visiting Disneyland. Thanks so much for the review and your feedback on our breakfast. We do serve a complimentary continental breakfast dailiy at the motel and it does include a variety of items to choose from. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Our hotel room was exceptionally clean, the beds were very comfortable, especially after having a full day walking around Disneyland.
Manager Response: Great to hear you had a great family vacation while staying with us! It is good to hear you enjoyed our upgraded bedding in our rooms and found the rooms to be clean and comfortable! Thanks for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The room was clean but the only accessible plug, by the sink, was so worn out nothing would stay plugged in. Had to pull out the nightstand and use that plug instead, The thermostat on the a/c was broken so we rarely had any a/c. The shower was installed so low we had to duck to get our hair wet. Even for the relatively low price I was very disappointed and will not stay here again.
Manager Response: I do want to thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear of any inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us. We do have outlets throughout the room for use. I do apologize if there were not enough to accomodate your needs. I also want to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with the AC in your room. We do have maintenance rutinely check the thermostats. We also have maintenance available and a 24 hour front desk, if there are any questions regarding the thermostats, please contact us at any time. I also want to apoligize for any inconvenience with the shower in the room. We do have standard shower tub units in all of our rooms. We would love to see you next time you are in Anaheim, please come visit us again. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: We were coming off a weekend cruise and wanted to spend the day at Disneyland. We were able to get a parking pass before check in time (since we already had a reservation) so we didn't have to pay for Disney garage parking. The staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean. Great price, nice amenities. We had some sort of water soaked area in our room but the staff was quick to access and fix the situation. Very close to Disneyland! 10-15 minute, easy walk to the main gate! My only problems were that the shower head was too short (and I am 5'7"), I had to lean backwards to wash my hair, and the lady in charge of breakfast locked the doors and gate right at 9am, even though people were still finishing up their breakfast and trying to get drinks. Other than that, wonderful
Manager Response: thank you so much for the review! Its great to hear you found us so affordable. Its also great to hear we exceeded your expectations with our clean rooms and friendly staff. Thanks again for the great review! We look forward to seeing you again!~

Summary: i was pleased with the location, price, and the cleanliness of room. they also have free breakfast and a laundry. i stayed 2 nites but booked 4 and was not able to get a refund since i booked on expedia and it was non refundable. the room only cost me $56 per nite and was only 1 1/2 blocks from covention center.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Its wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient! I also am happy to hear we fit into your budget and you found our various amenities such as free parking, and breakfast to be so valuable to you. We do look forward to seeing you again and thanks again for the great review!

Summary: The stay overall was comfortable. However, the breakfast that was served could of had some improvement. We werent expecting a five star meal,  but they severed waffles that you had to make yourself, packaged muffins, no meat etc.. We could have went to 7-11 on the corner for that type of food. We enjoyed ourselves all in all. Word of the wise: if you can get a room upstairs because most people that are staying there are going to Disneyland so that means kids running around :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Its great to hear you had a pleasant stay with us. I do appreciate your feedback on our breakfast. We do have a continental breakfast that is complimentary and is served from 6:00 to 9:00 every day. Again, its great to hear you had a great time and we do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: myself and friend stayed here whilst visiting Anahiem.  Very close to amenities (convenience stores, restaurants and other shops)  As well as short walk to Disneyland Very budget rooms, but for the price we did not expect the Ritz etc but still clean and well maintained for its age, we were very pleased as we just wanted somewhere clean to sleep and shower etc  We weren't on holiday to spend in a hotel, who does? The staff were extra friendly and helpful, especially the guy (owner?) at the gift shop who gave directions and even offered us a lift to post office. The hotel stored out luggage as we had a later flight, when we realised we had to walk down the road for our bus stop they even allowed us to borrow luggage trolley to take our suitcases (we had 6 between 2 of us) and one
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Its great to hear you loved our location and found we fit into you budget as well. Its also wonderful you found our staff friendly and our rooms to exceed your expectations. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This motel is defiantly very average, you get what you pay for. Breakfast is not that fantastic, very sugary and asking for to become a diabetic!  Room service and the cleanliness of the room is good. This hotel is about a 10 minute walk to DisneyLand and plenty of buses around. The motel uses Gray Line services as a tourist operator, which is extremely reliable.   The service of the motel is very slack, no one seems to be knowing what is going on. When we first got there, our room booking had been changed before arrival to a smaller room as we had requested. No one knew what was going on , and tried to charge as the same amount as our original booking.   Be very careful giving credit card details to this motel, when we left , they had charged us two nights to our credit card.
Manager Response: thank you for the review, It is good to hear you found our location so convenient. I do apologize for any inconvenience with your bill upon check out. Our records did not show an error, however we did and still do suggest if you have not done so to contact your credit card company, as again we do not show an error. We do our very best and want to excel in our customer service to our guests at all times. I do apologize if there seemed to be confusion, or you feel you did not get that over the top service you do deserve. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim, and thanks again for the review.

Summary: I chose this hotel based on the good reviews and proximity to Disneyland.  It was what I expected - no more, no less.  But the beds were VERY nice.... so comfortable that I didn't want to get up!  Breakfast was basic, toast and cereal, coffee, oatmeal - but its FREE so I will never understand people who complain about anything that is FREE.    It is a pretty short walk to Disneyland compared to other hotels, but not as short as other reviewers implied.... Especially after the long day at the parks!  But the showers were great - yes, you have to stoop, but great water pressure.  I wish it was just a little closer to the parks, but I will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Its wonderful to hear you will be back again! It's great to hear you enjoyed our complimentary amenities such as our free breakfast, and our location. Thank you so much again for the great review and we do look forward to seeing  you again!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, but not at all up to par!
Summary: The small room had old furniture and fixtures, a older lumpy mattress, a rusty sink with outdated faucets that groaned, a shower that would not EVER drain properly, and a shower head which is placed where only someone 4'8" or shorter can use it effectively.  The linens and towels were old and tough.  Only 2 bath towels in the room.  The room has no usable electrical outlets, with the exception of 1 at the sink.  The AC unit was horribly outdated and sounded like a tractor driving thru each time it came on.  Outside the door, the AC unit had been kicked and looked like it had been there 30 years.  There is a computer to use to check email in the lobby that must be fed cash before it will work (like a vending machine).  The complimentary breakfast was seriously lacking.  Some
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are looking for a close in, clean, and inexpensive hotel to walk to and from Disneyland this is it.   The breakfast is minimal I would've had expected a little more. There are no fruits besides cut in half oranges and no protein besides tiny tiny yogurts that they dole out 4 per room maximum.  The rooms have no-frills, but we spend very little time in our room so they were perfect for our needs. They were clean and well organized and big enough. A plus is that the beds were queen size not double.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am glad to hear we fit into your budget and you found us affordable and our rooms clean and inviting. I do appreciate your feedback on our breakfast items. We do have a complimentary continental breakfast served every day between 6 am to 9 am. I do apologize if the items we provided were not what you expected. It is good to know you found our location so convenient as well. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim..

Summary Heading: Good hotel for what it is.
Summary: This is a good hotel in a great location.  There is nothing fancy about it, but it is clean and comfortable.  Breakfast is less then impressive, but it is free.  The best feature of all is the fact that it is a very short walk from Disney.  All things weighed out, it is a pretty good deal for a room you probably aren't spending much time in anyway.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad to know you enjoyed your stay with us. I am happy to hear your enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and also that you found us so convenient. It's true we are just minutes from the Disneyland park. With our free parking this does save money. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We have stayed a about 6 different hotels within walking distance of Disneyland over the years. Most of these 6 we have stayed in more than once.  In October we almost stayed at Super 8 but decide to stay at another hotel for the third time in a row. After staying at this Super 8. I wish we had stayed here instead.   Here's the deal: -It's a 12-15 minute walk to Disneyland -Room was clean and updated, the mattress, sheets and towels were in good condition.  -The staff were great, very helpful, and pleasant.  -Didn't use the pool or hot tub but I checked them out and they were clean. The hot tub was warm. -The wi-fi works great and it was free:) -The breakfasts was better than I expected, a lot of people have whined about the breakfast.  Remember its free and continental.  The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Glad to hear you like our upgraded rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast. Its also wonderful to hear you found our staff so friendly and helpful. Its great to hear you will be back and we do look forward to your return!

Summary: very good experience the remodel is great and you just cannot beat the price and location for entertainment purposes Omar was extremely helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Its great to hear you found our price within your budget and our location to be so convenient. We love to hear our staff is doing a great job as well. Thank you again for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: My first time staying at a super 8 and I will do it again. The room was bigger than other hotels and CLEAN. In other hotels the bottom of my feet turn black from the carpet, not here. The breakfast was good. Plenty of different options.  Hot tub and pool were cleaned every morning. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The price was excellent too. The only downside is the shower. I'm 6'3" and the shower head is around 4 feet high. Beds could be a little better too.I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is great to hear we exceeded your expectations. Glad to know we fit into your budget and you found our rooms to be clean as well as the pool area. It is wonderful to hear you will be back! We do look forward to your return. I do apologize for any inconvenience with the shower head height. We do have standard shower tub units in all of our rooms. Again, thank you for the review! Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel description states the hotel is a few blocks from Disneyland. To walk to the Disneyland entrance is several miles, not quite the close proximity I wanted. No Disney shuttle. Parking was easy and free. The rooms were ok. Customer Service was great.  Wifi was good. The complimentary breakfast was pretty poor.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review! And we appreciate your feedback. Our location is 1 and a half blocks from the Disneyland entrance on Harbor Bld. It is about a 10 or 15 minute walk. We also are right next door to where the ART picks up and drops off for the Disneyland Resort. It is a minimal fee and is very convenient to get to and from the park entrance. I am glad you liked our amenities such as our free parking and our wifi service. It is also great to hear you found our staff so wonderful and helpful. I am sorry to hear that you found our breakfast not to your liking. We do have a variety of breakfast items such as fresh fruit, yogurt, cereals, toast, juice, coffee, tea, waffles, and cinnamon rolls served from 6:00 am till 9:00 am every day. Again, thank you for the review, we do look forward to seeing you again.
