Summary: The rooms are plain, but kept very clean as is the pool and hot tub area.  The  staff are all very nice!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is good to hear you found us such a great value. I am also happy to hear you found our rooms and pool area so clean and the staff so friendly. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We booked our room at Super 8 due to the price point and location to Disneyland.  It was definitely a good experience.  Both check in and check out were smooth and quick.  We arrived at around 2am, and there were no problems at all.  The room was very clean, the carpeting looked fairly new, flat screen tv with a good selection of channels, and the beds were comfortable.  It provided exactly what we needed for the short time we were in there.  The parking is free and breakfast provided, which does provide savings and enhances the value.  Breakfast consisted of cereal, toast, coffee/juice/milk, cinnamon rolls, Eggo Waffles, oatmeal, and oranges.  It's enough to get through the morning without having to purchase an additional vacation meal.  The walk to the pedestrian gate at
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! Its wonderful to hear you will be back, we look forward to your return. Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and found our amenities such as complimentary breakfast, free WIFI and free parking to be so valuable to you during your stay. We are in a great location this is true, just minutes from the Disneyland park as well as several dining establishments nearby. Again, thank you so much for the review and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Well worth the money and really close to disney. The whole family walked both ways day and night without complaint. The breakfast was just enough and the rooms were very clean. We didn't use the pool but it looked good :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, it is great to hear you had a Super visit with us. I am glad to hear you found our location to be so convenient. Its also nice to know you enjoyed out breakfast! We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Super!  - Cheap but nice and reliable!
Summary: What can I say,  I was a bit nervous when my company booked me here but I soon was very pleased indeed.   Staff are incredibly friendly and helpful and showed all the good things in the local area.   The room was basic but comfortable and clean and at the end of the day who can ask for more.  Beds where better than at more expensive hotels that my co-workers booked into.   Great selection of on Demand programming or cable TV in the room a great plus! Rooms where quiet and sleep was good.  Breakfast was basic but good. Located very close to great dining options or the parks and exhibition center.   All in all super!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is great to hear you found us a Super place to stay and will be back! I love to know that our staff was so friendly and helpful as well. We do strive to exceed your expectations and its wonderful to hear we are exceling in our customer service. Its great to hear you found our location to be so convenient as well. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: When I checked into the room there were ants in the bathroom and in the sink area.  The room did not feel clean.  No outlets would charge in my room in any of my devices for the next day. They said they would spray for bugs and when I woke up the next day there were a line of bugs down the wall around the door and into the bathroom.  It was terrible.  They would not take care of it at that time.  They never killed all of the bugs in my room. They locked me out of my room as well.  It was a terrible experience!
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review. I do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay with us. We do have a maintenance staff available and are more than happy to assist at any time. I am sorry to hear that your thought the room did not seem clean upon check in. We do strive to exceed your expectations and I am sorry to hear you were disappointed.  I do again apologize for any bad experiences during your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Excellent location and value.  Staff are excellent too...
Summary: Excellent location and value.  Staff are excellent too.  This was a repeat visit and I will stay there again on my next trip to Anaheim.  #1 choice when going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It's great to hear we are your number one pick when visiting Anaheim. It is wonderful to know you will be back to see us again. I am glad to know you find our location and pricing fits right into what your needs are. Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: The Super 8 on West Katella is a great place to stay. I have been staying there for at least 8 years for my annual business convention in Anaheim. It's not fancy but it is clean, relatively cheap, and well located- near everything in Anaheim whether you are there for business or pleasure. What really makes it great are the staff. They're friendly, helpful, and welcoming to you the customer. Rounding out the value is the extensive FREE breakfast they include in with your stay. I cannot recommend this hotel enough.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! it is wonderful to hear from repeat guests. I do appreciate your compliments to our staff. We always do our best to exceed your expectations. Thank you so much for your recommendations of our Super 8 and thanks again for the great review. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I booked this motel for the location and the reviews. I was not disappointed. Location was great. Walking distance to many great restaurants. If your use to walking it's not too far. We arrived a little early and were able to check in. Check in went fast and smooth. The motel staff were very friendly and professional. I travel a lot and I do not always see professionalism at Hotel/Motels but was impressed with the front desk staff at this location.  We were given a room towards the back of the property. We checked in on a Sunday so it was very quiet.  A Queen Double room on the ground floor. Was very pleased with the room. Very spacious, I feel it would be big enough for two couples to share, and CLEAN.  The bathroom was also clean supplied with plenty of towels. I didn't see
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Its so wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us. Its great to hear you found our staff so friendly and helpful during your stay. It is true we are just minutes away from the Disneyland park and the surrounding dining establishments as well. We love to hear you found us so convenient when staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are here!

Summary Heading: Bare bones but close to Disney and had everything I could ask for
Summary: I stayed three nights at Super 8 because I wanted to go to Disneyland and California Adventure.  My avg night was U$68.  This isn't bad considering how close it is to Disney.  While walking you can see the Tower of Terror and the backdrop for the Cars ride.    Staff I only encountered the check in person and she was so friendly and hilarious.  The kitchen staff in the morning would not say much and all you have to do is give your room number, so I guess that's ok.  Room I stayed at 182.  We took the parking spot infront of our door.  The room itself was great, and had queen size beds.  The sink is outside the bath room.  The decor is simple and can seem a little outdated but personally I didn't care.  The heater/cooler makes a bit of noise at night but not unbearable and it
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Its great to hear you loved our location and found our front desk staff so inviting. Glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and accommodations. We have recently updated our rooms and do look forward to your return so you can check out our new and improved rooms and d√©cor!

Summary Heading: Have stayed here a number of times.  Nothing fancy but the...
Summary: Have stayed here a number of times.  Nothing fancy but the rooms are clean and have nice new HD flat screen TVs.  Very handy to restaurants and the Garden Walk Mall as well as Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is always great to hear from repeat guests! I am glad to know you enjoyed our new TVs in our rooms. It is true we are super convenient to the Disneyland park as well as many dining establishments in the area. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Pros:  The staff, they were all very friendly and helpful. The front desk people were so nice. Nothing was too much trouble. We asked for an iron and someone delivered it within 15 mins to our room.  The breakfast was good. Proximity to Disneyland, restaurants and other food eateries/shops.  Laundry on site.  Computer and printing in the lobby.  Vending machines  Cons: It is dated. The breakfast room is too small to have everyone eat there so we ate it in our room which was a bit of walk with lots in our hands to hold.  We had a bad sink and it was blocked all the time and leaked from the pipe onto our carpet. Not ideal. We couldn't have natural light come into our room because if we pulled the curtain anybody walking past would be able to see as there is no net curtains.  The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! It is great to hear you found our staff so accommodating to your needs, as well as friendly and courteous. It's wonderful to know you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location to be so convenient. It is true we are just minutes from the Disneyland park as well as other dining establishments and stores. With our offerings of free parking and free wifi as well as free breakfast it does make for a great value when staying with us. I do apologize for any maintenance issues or housekeeping issues you experienced while you were here. Please let us know as we have a staff dedicated to assisting you with your needs while you are here. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: hotel was better than expected    breakfast was more then...
Summary: hotel was better than expected    breakfast was more then adequate  altho not enough seating  rooms were clean but the shower head in the tub was seriously too low even for a shorter person
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is great to hear that we exceeded your expectations. I do want to apologize for any inconvenience with the shower and tub. We have standard shower tub units in all our rooms. It is good to hear you enjoyed our breakfast. I do apologize if there was not adequate seating available when you were here. We do look forward to you next visit with us!

Summary: Okay, so there are some definite good points about this place: Clean, convenient, super affordable, plenty of parking and modern linens and decor. I have a few bad points but it may not be an issue for you depending on who you are staying with, what you are doing or if you can sleep like a log. I stayed here for the Tinkerbell Marathon because of cost and convenience. I specifically asked for a quiet room for this reason and made it known on my reservation form. Arrived earlier than check in time and the staff was gracious and allowed me to park there while I went for lunch and the expo at the Disney Hotel. When I came back there was someone else on shift who gave me a room. We walked in and were impressed except for the musty smell but nothing horrible. The AC/Heater does not
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is great to hear you found us clean and convenient and accommodating to your needs. We have recently upgraded all our rooms and are glad to hear you liked the new and improved d√©cor. I do apologize for any inconvenience experienced due to noise outside your room. We do have a 24 hour front desk staff. Please let us know in the future and we will address it right away at any time. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The air conditioner smelled like mildew when turned on. When we alerted the staff, they told us it was fine and did not change  the filter or provide any other solution. The mattresses were sunken in and the shower head was 5ft from the base of the tub requiring anyone over 4ft6in to stoop in order to get clean.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. I do apologize if the air conditioner seemed to smell when you turn it on. We do have a maintenance staff here and we are always maintaining them and changing the filters as needed. I also want to apologize if you found the shower head too low. We have standard shower/tub units in all our rooms. We also have recently remodeled all our rooms and have new mattress in all of the rooms. I do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. We do look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We only stayed for one-night for the Disneyland 10K. This hotel has great customer service and is a 10-minute walk to Disneyland park and Downtown Disney. Another bonus of the location is the dining options about one block from the hotel - Cheesecake Factory, CPK, Roy's, etc. Great location, great price. Staff allowed us to stay a half-hour past checkout because we were up so early for the Disney run, thanks for the extra long nap! Beds could use fluffier (or more) pillows but otherwise, great hotel for this level of hotel standards.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It is wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient. It's also wonderful to hear you found us to have wonderful customer service. We strive to exceed your expectations with every stay. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Quick check in, friendly service & very, very clean rooms. Walking distance to Disneyland, restaurants, stores and much more...
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. Its true we are just walking distance to the Disneyland park as well as shops and dining establishments. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was fine for an inexpensive hotel.  We were on the second floor above the registration office.  The room was very quiet, which was very nice. The room was clean including the bathroom and shower.  No problems with holes or anything else with the sheets or blanket.   We never ate in the breakfast room as it didn't look too appealing so the only thing I can say about it is that it was really small.  The hotel staff was cordial but not friendly. We didn't have any problems so I don't know how they deal with issues.  So for us, no problems or compliments on the staff.  Regarding the location, the hotel said it was a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  This wasn't true.  It took us over 15 minutes going in the morning, and then coming back in the evening when we were tired from
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is great to hear you found us accommodating to your needs and our rooms clean and efficient. We are located a block and half from the Disneyland entrance. It does seem far after a long day of walking at the Disneyland park I understand. There is the ART shuttle that picks up right next door and comes every 20 minutes. It will drop off and pick up right at the Disneyland Entrance. That helps a bit for those tired feet. We do want to thank you for choosing to stay with us. Possibly consider the ART shuttle next time you stay. We do offer the free parking, I am sorry to hear our front desk staff did not appear friendly or inviting. I do apologize for that. Please do try our breakfast next time you are here as well. We offer a variety of great items to get you started on your morning and get you ready for that fun day at Disneyland! We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The place is good and clean. Location is great but I hope the owner takes more interest and make it better specially the breakfast lounge. It's too small and badly arranged. The staff is unfriendly. Items in breakfast not displayed well. Microwaves and toasters placed wrongly.   Overall good place but needs attention.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review and do appreciate your feedback. It is great to hear found our rooms clean and thought we were accommodating to your needs. It is also wonderful to hear you found our location to be so convenient as well.  In do apologize for any inconvenience regarding the breakfast room. We do appreciate your feedback and will take that into consideration. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We reached the hotel to visit the Disney parks.  On arrival we got a room key. We went upstairs and opened it - the room was not empty- There was a couple who slept there and woke up in a panic when we opened the door. we immediately closed the door and see behind us the receptionist who to tell us that he gave us the wrong room key!!!! even without any apology !!! and one other night we came to the room very late at night and the keyroom didnt worked. The staff were very unpleasant and not welcoming. The room itself was o.k. and not more than that. It was clean but not well organized and the heating of the air conditioner did not work and we had very cold nights. We called reception and they sent us maintenance man who does not understand anything of air conditioners and so
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. I do apologize for any inconvenience or disappointments during your stay with us. I am sorry to hear you found our staff unpleasant and unwelcoming. I do apologize for that. We do strive to exceed your expectations and want to welcome all of our guests. We do have a maintenance staff available and we are always here to assist as we have a 24 hour front desk staff. Please don't hesitate to stop by the front desk or give us a call at any time. We are here to assist you at any time. It is true we do offer free parking and are a 10 minute walk from the Disneyland park. There is the ART shuttle that picks up right next door and will drop you off right at the Disneyland Entrance and picks up there as well. This shuttle service comes every 20 minutes during the park hours of operation. I do apologize if you found our breakfast not to your liking. We do offer a variety of items such as waffles, cinnamon rolls, a variety of cereals, yogurt , fresh fruit, toast with Jam as well as juice and coffee as well as Tea and hot cocoa.  Again I do want to apologize if you experienced any inconvenience or disappointments during your stay with us and do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The renovation was very nice!  The rooms were clean and fresh.  It was very comfortable.  The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review!  It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's wonderful that you found our staff so friendly and helpful. We strive to exceed your expectations with our customer service. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed here last week for 2 nights, the location was very convenient.  We walked to Disneyland which is only 10 min away.  You can also catch the ART shuttle for $3.00 right out front,but we chose to walk.  Clean, helpful,and the price is right!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review, It's wonderful to hear you had a great stay with us! It's true we are only 10 minutes away from the Disneyland park, and for those who with to ride there is the ART shuttle that picks up right next door. And we also offer free parking. Again, thank you so much for the review, We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I was reluctant to stay at this hotel based on its "STAR" rating‚Ä¶1.5/5.  However, the place was clean, relatively close to Disneyland, and they offered free parking.  I can usually find something to complain about when doing reviews, however, I cannot on this one.  Everything was great at this hotel.  Thanks Super 8!
Manager Response: It is so wonderful to hear you had a great stay with us! Its true we do offer free parking and are just a few minutes from the Disneyland park. Thank you so much for the review. We do look forward to your return.

Summary: This hotel location is very close to the entrance of Disneyland, approximately an 8 minute walk to the gate. We were staying at another motel nearby and were walking by when we noticed the Super 8's pool and hot tub. My 7 year old daughter was fixated on this place so we inquired about it. The front desk staff were very friendly and accomodating. We ended up booking two night at this hotel for our last part of our holiday. The price is right, the grounds of the hotel are spotless, the pool is warm and clean, and the hot tub was great. Overall, if your looking for a nice bed, inexpensive motel, and friendly staff, stay here. My family enjoyed the stay and we even had a great view of the Disneyland fireworks from the motel. It's even close to plenty of restaurants. Thanks, we will
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It's great to hear you found staying with us so convenient. I am glad to hear we fit into your budget and you thought your stay was wonderful. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My daughters stayed in this hotel for 3 nights while visiting Disneyland and Universal. We originally chose this hotel because of favourable comments on TripAdvisor and proximity to Disneyland. On check-in the girls were particularly impressed by how friendly the staff were. Their room was clean with very comfortable beds.  The 2nd night of their stay my youngest daughter came down with a tummy bug. According to my eldest daughter we couldn't have chosen a better hotel as the staff were just so lovely and helpful. In the middle of the night they needed more bin liners and towels. The young man on duty was incredibly accommodating with all their requests also suggesting medication they could purchase from a local shop if she was no better by morning. In the morning while my
Manager Response: We want to thank you for great review. I am glad to hear you had a great visit with us and our staff was so accommodating. This is why a  24 hour front desk staff is so wonderful to have when staying away from home. I do hope your daughter is feeling better and we are looking forward to your return!

Summary: Have stayed at this location for trips to Disneyland in the past, we love the staff, the available parking and overall location for this motel. We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's always great to hear from our repeat guests. It is great to hear that you find our staff so helpful and friendly. It is true we do have an excellent location being so close to Disneyland park and the surrounding dining establishments. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: me and my wife went to disney for just 2 days.  were looking for a hotel close to disney. After reading several reviews, this one was very close..  It was close but there were other hotels way closer to this one. The price was around 55 a night so it was good, descent breakfast.  Overall was good with the hotel.  Its about 10-15 min walk to disney. But if you are looking to closer hotels outside disneyland hotels. try the ones across the street from Disney. At Harbor street.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Its nice to hear you found us so accommodating. Its good to know we fit into your budget as well. I am glad you enjoyed our breakfast  too! We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Our stay was for 3 nights around the Christmas season. Our requirements were simple - clean shower and bed - since we plan to be out and about for most of our stay in Anaheim. For the price you pay, and relative to the other accommodations you can get around the area, Super8 was basic and good enough for us. We were a travelling party of 6, and got 2 rooms with 2 queen beds each, which turned out to be very spacious. The room did lack sufficient spare electrical sockets and wardrobe space for a room that can accommodate up to 4 adults though‚Ä¶ The beds were soft, probably because they‚Äôve been slept in so much. Nonetheless, we found the space to be clean and liveable. The compound was generally quiet and we did not experience any disturbance from the neighboring guests or traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review! its great to hear you were very satisfied when staying with us. It's wonderful to know we fit into your budget and you found our location so convenient. It's also great to know our staff was so friendly and helpful while you were here. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: My boyfriend and I just left super 8 today. We had to sort out a lot of confusing details with our baggage and the people behind the desk were so so helpful. They sent us in the direction of suitcase shops (gave us bus numbers and prices) and stored our bags all day. They also let my boyfriend sit in the small lobby for 3 hours with a ton of bags waiting for me to come back from the luggage shop. They were so helpful and nice. The rooms were clean and had cable and tea and a hair dryer and it was a 10 min walk to Disneyland. Right next to subway and other food places. I highly recommend this place
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is wonderful to hear you found our front desk staff so friendly and helpful. Its also great to hear that you found our location so convenient. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Water temperature in the shower varied immensely. Wifi reception quality varied. The Big Guy working the evenings is a helpful, friendly staff member. A true asset to this motel as well as Super 8. You can't beat the price for what is offered. Thank-you.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! Its great to hear Ron was so friendly and helpful. I do apologize for the trouble with the Wifi or fluctuating water temperature. We do have maintenance available and they do check these  on a regular basis. Next time if there is an issue, please let us know right away.   Its great to hear we fit into your budget as well! We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: The appearance of the exterior and lobby were nice.  The...
Summary: The appearance of the exterior and lobby were nice.  The location is great!  The beds and bedding were comfortable.  The room overall was too stuffy, had poor lighting, and just walking across the room would cause the windows to rattle.  As clean as the bathroom appeared to be,  I found a cockroach climbing up the bathroom door.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This weekend we were graciously invited by some friends to visit Disneyland and stay at their home however we wanted to stay an extra night so I found a great deal on Orbitz for this motel for only $59 a night and we decided that we would try it out.  I had read it was recently renovated and had free parking , breakfast and wi-fi and those were all bonuses on top of a great price. We left the park about 3pm to check in and were quickly assisted and given our room keys. Everything was pre-paid and we had no issues with payment.  We were informed of breakfast hours which we unfortunately weren't able to take advantage of but appreciated the information regardless. We were provided a map to where our room was and found it quickly. It was on the backside on the ground floor. We
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! So good to hear you enjoyed your stay and you found everything so great when you were here. You did a great job of describing our rooms and other features of our Super 8! We are so glad to hear you frequent the Disneyland area and will be back! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Good hotel for a good value. It's also lose enough to Disneyland if you really wanted to walk. Plenty of eateries around, too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Its wonderful to hear you found us to be a great value and we fit into your budget. Its also wonderful to hear you loved our location! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here with my son and found it very clean and comfortable. Loved how it was next door to the garden walk with shops restarants and movies also only a 10 minute walk to disneyland .Breakfast was included and was just right staff were lovely .Hopefully will be flying over from aussie again this year and will deff be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We look forward to seeing you again. It is great to hear you loved our location, it's true we are so convenient to all the shops and dining establishments as well as the Disneyland park. It is wonderful to hear you found our staff so accommodating and friendly. Again, thanks for the review, We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: When we booked at Super 8 I was a bit skeptical having never stayed at one before. I wasn't quite sure what to expect but was swayed by the price, location (walking distance to the park), free parking (Disney parking is now $16 per day so this is a huge savings), and free continental breakfast. Wow, were we pleasantly surprised. Even though it was the busiest time of the year (the week between Christmas and New Year's) the staff was patient and friendly (this means you Rigo). The room was big and clean and the beds were comfortable. The sink was located outside the bathroom shower area so that more people can get ready at one time. I can't even begin to explain how nice it is to have plenty of parking, even when you check in late. The room we had (292) was on the back side of
Manager Response: I do want to thank you for the great review! Its wonderful to hear your found our parking convenient and liked the fact it is complimentary. It is also great to hear you found our rooms clean and comfortable. Thank you for mentioning Rigo,  it is nice to know he was so friendly and helpful to you. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Decent hotel going on a budget
Summary: Rooms are not new, but are clean. We didn¬¥t have any problems with funcionality (TV, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron, all good). Bathroom is small but enough.  They offer complementary breakfast. I would suggest to include another fruit different than orange (the only fruit offered), as it is not that easy to eat for toddlers. Maybe change oranges for Bananas or apples? General Manager of the property "Peter" very friendly and helpful. Other members of staff not that friendly but certainly helpful.  If going to Disney on  bidget , it is a good choice overall, not excellent, but very decent.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We do appreciate your feedback and will take that in to consideration with our choices of fruit that is offered. I do apologize if our front desk did not seem friendly. We strive for excellent guest service which does include a friendly staff. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Another visit, some minor info updates
Summary: Back again; I stay here at least once or twice a year... no real change from my last review (good location, good value), nothing fancy & still usually the best price for the area. Updates: stayed in a "1 Queen Bed" room this time; this is a much smaller room than the 2 Queen bed rooms (i.e. it's not just the 2 queen room with one bed removed). Yes, the shower heads are a bit low, but I don't consider it a problem and I'm 6'. However, one of my pet peeves: the water temperature in the shower kept fluctuating, not by a lot, but enough to be annoying. One note: make sure your door fully latches when you close it - mine easily closed, but needed some force to make sure it latched. It would be easy to accidentally leave the door open if you weren't careful.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is always great to hear from our repeat guests. I do apologize for the fluctuating water temperature. We do have our maintenance staff check this, if in the future it is a problem please let us know right away. We do appreciate your feedback and we do look forward to your return!

Summary: Was a very basic hotel.  Management states fruit provided, but not so-at least not everyday.  Not much of a choice with selection in breakfast items.  Did help to tide us over until we could eat at next location.  Internet connection slow and boots off.  Front desk upon check-in was not helpful or even friendly. I thought it was close for walking, which was great.  Housekeeping did go out of the way to bring a smile to our faces when we would get back to the room in the evening.  If you are trying to save money to spend at the resorts, this is the place.  Just one bad experience with the woman checking us in, otherwise the other staff was friendly.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! I do apologize if our breakfast was disappointing to you. We do have a variety of items including fresh fruit, I do apologize if it seemed to be lacking when you were here. It is good that you found our housekeeping staff and the front desk staff friendly and helpful. I do apologize if the front desk checking you in seemed unfriendly and unhelpful. We strive for excellent guest service here. Again I want to thank you for the review and do look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Room is  clean and spacious. Was informed when checkin not...
Summary: Room is  clean and spacious. Was informed when checkin not to leave valuables in the room. Brought my ipad to the reception and was told to l everyone leave it in the room or leave it on the tabletop behind the counter for all to see. Found it ridiculous.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear you found our rooms clean and spacious. I do apologize for any confusion regarding leaving valuables in the room. It is fine and recommended to leave items in the room, however, if it makes our guests more comfortable they may leave an item at the front desk while they are away. Again, thank you for the review. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Very difficult at breakfast. Thought I was at Disneyland standing in line for a ride. Only wanted coffee but waited 5 minutes for line to move. Need to consider rearranging. Perhaps beverages should be in eating area and another entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear you had some problems with our breakfast in the morning. I do appreciate your feedback. We do have coffee available at the front desk ask well. We also provide extra coffee packets for your room. They too are available at the front desk. Thanks again for the review and we do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Though reasonable we had a 5 star visit at a motel which was almost walking distance to Disneyland.  There was a shuttle which came by the front of the building every 25 minutes which took you to Disneyland entrance. An nice breakfast was also served and the personnel warm and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! It's so great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's great to hear you took advantage of the ART shuttle that picks up next door. It is a very handy service and a great way to get to and from the Disneyland park. We look forward to seeing again soon!

Summary: This was a great place to stay at.  I was checking around for different hotels in the area around disneyland and this one is one that I would go back too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. It's wonderful to know you had such a great stay and will be back. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here for our Disneyland vacation and liked it. I liked how we can just leave our car in the hotel parking lot and walk over to Disneyland. We definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: we want to thank you for the review, its so great to hear you had a wonderful stay! We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Hotel is 10 minutes walking distance from Disneyland...
Summary: Hotel is 10 minutes walking distance from Disneyland. Customer service was good. Cleanliness was good. Staff did a bad job at describing the room location to us. No blankets and no access to WiFi without calling from desk.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's true we are just 10 minutes from the Disneyland park. Glad to hear you found our customer service so good as well as the quality of your room. I do apologize if the directions to your room were not clear. We do provide a map at the front desk upon check in that shows where the rooms are located.  We do have blankets in all our rooms. They are conveniently located in the drawers in your room. If you need extra blankets, we have those available at the front desk upon request. For your security, we do have a password that is given to our guests at the front desk. I do apologize if this was an inconvenience during your stay. Again thank you for the review, and we hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Shower head is four feet up.  Breakfast was a draw for me,  but disappointed with breakfast items, service,  space.  Decent location and price.  Not my first choice.  Will not stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do apologize if the shower head seemed to low for you. We do have standard tub shower units in all our rooms. We do provide a complimentary breakfast including waffles with syrup, cinnamon rolls, cereals, oatmeal, toast with margarine and jam, yogurt, fresh fruit, coffee, cocoa, juice and milk. Our breakfast is served from 6:00 am to 9:00 am every morning. This is self service breakfast provided in our breakfast room. I do apologize if you found this not up to your standards. We do appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: It's tough to find a motel within walking distance of Disneyland that either is not a dump or incredibly expensive. This motel fits the value slot perfectly. It's a basic property that's clean and well maintained. It's great to not have to deal with the parking at Disneyland, and it's easy to walk back to the motel in the afternoon for a break. And as an extra plus, parking is free for guests. Other properties in this area charge an extra $10 a day or more.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Its great to hear you find us to be a great value when visiting the Anaheim area. It's true we are in walking distance to the Disneyland park. The convenience of staying so close with complimentary parking is an added plus. For those who do not wish to take the 10 minute walk, there is the ART shuttle that picks up right next door and comes every 20 minutes. Thanks again for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: Shower heads are neck high. (I'm 5'4) Rooms smell moldy  Unprofessional staff. Early check- in are not accommodated even if clean rooms are  available. ( so don't catch the early flight if you plan on staying here)
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do appreciate you taking the time to give us a review. I do apologize if the shower head seemed too low for you. We do have the standard size tub shower units in all our rooms. We do apologize if the room smelled moldy. We have a very thorough housekeeping staff, as well as a maintenance staff available. Please notify us right away in the future if you notice this. We will do our very best to honor an early check in if the room is available. Our check out is 11:00 am and check in is 3:00 pm. We do our very best to accommodate early check ins during this time with no additional charge. We do apologize if this was an inconvenience to you during your stay with us.  We do apologize If our front desk seemed unprofessional. We do pride ourselves in providing the very best service to all our guests. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thank you again for taking the time to give us a review, and we do appreciate your feedback.

Summary: I would definably go back to super 8 great service, my family from out of the country stay and they love it, rooms are a pretty reasonably rate for the night I would recommended if you have family over and don't have enough room at your place this is the perfect stay for the price. specially if you go to Disneyland you can beat the price.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! It's so wonderful to know we are an excellent place to stay. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We arrived late but checking in was simple and quick since we have already booked. Cars may be parked just outside the rooms. The room was clean, comfortable and spacious. It was a bit chilly in the morning when a little bit of draft passed through the door panel. Everything else was fine. Breakfast is served at the same building as the reception. Do not expect much but the warm tea/coffee, toasts and waffles is just good enough to start the day. There was also an outdoor swimming pool (which was heated I presumed since there are people using it), a laundromat and snack vending machines. If the reason you stay here is because you plan to go to the Disneyland theme parks, then you are okay. It is only about 15-20 minutes walk to the Disneyland entrance and you need not worry
Manager Response: Thank you for the great informative review! We do appreciate you taking the time to give us such a good review. We are very convenient to Disneyland as you say, and we do have complimentary parking for our guests as well. It is a short walk or yes, you can take the ART shuttle. Thanks again for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This is my third stay here in over the last 5-6 years and they are consistent - clean room, clean property and close to Disneyland at a fair price.  Not looking for a ton of amenities, just someplace to crash and relax.  No issues, excellent customer service and clean.  Older property which is maintained.  I would have have recommended to friends.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests. Its so nice you have found a home with us when you are visiting Anaheim. We do look forward to seeing you again. Welcome home! Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: It is a no frills simple lodging, with some nice eateries within 5-10mins walk. Our room was tidy and clean, and maintenance was quick to assist when our bathroom got locked accidentally. We booked it as we are planning to visit Disneyland, which is within walkable distance (around 20 to 30min).  Only issue was the heater was rather noisy, but it did manage to cover up my friend's snores.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is great to hear you find our location so convenient when visiting Disneyland. We are just minutes away from the Disneyland park as well as several great dining establishments. I love to hear you found our housekeeping and maintenance staff so helpful and efficient. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The guy at the front desk was extremely nice, and the rooms are clean with well maintained furniture. There are cute restaurants right next door that look really nice and new. It's really close to Disneyland, and nice to know it seems to be Disney and Medieval Times approved.
Manager Response: It's really great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and you found us so convenient, clean and friendly! Thanks so much for the great review! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The super 8 is just a short 10-15 min walk to Disneyland and let's face it if your here to see Disneyland all you need it a reasonable place to sleep at night. Most of your time will be spent in the park. We found the Super 8 to be a great price when all we did was sleep there and would go stay again. The outdoor pool was not heated and gets really cold in the fall but the hot tub was a welcome relief after so much walking. The staff were nice and helpful and can't wait to see Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are happy to hear you found our location such a great asset to your stay. We are also glad we fit into your budget and you found our staff friendly and helpful. We actually do have a heated pool, and a hot tub. The pool temperature is kept at 81 degrees throughout the year. I do apologize if the pool seemed cool when you were here. We do look forward to your return!

Summary: Great location.  Great location great location great location. Great location.  Really great location yup
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It is great to hear you found our location was so awesome! It's true we are within walking distance to Disneyland park and several dining establishments as well. Thanks again for the review and we look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Way Too Small for the price
Summary: The staff is friendly and helpful so it was not their fault.  But, when we went to our room we found it to be too small.  The AC/Heater did not work well example it would go from all hot to cold in a heartbeat with nothing in between.  There was NO REFRIGERATOR in the room so if we had (and we did) items that needed to be kept cold, we were out of luck.  We have to use a couple of trash cans and plastic bags with ice to keep anything cold.  The electric cover plate by the vanity sink was loose and could cause a fire hazard.  We could flip the switch and the light would either be on of off.  We had to wiggle the switch for it to work.  we did report this to the hotel staff when we checked out.  We will not go back to this Super 8 again.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for taking time to give us a review. It is good to hear that our staff was friendly and helpful to you during your visit with us. I do apologize if the room seemed small. Our rooms are standard motel room size as per Super 8 standards. I am sorry to hear that the heater/AC unit seemed to not work properly. We do have our maintenance staff do checks on these to make sure they are working properly. We appreciate you reporting that along with the loose cover plate in the room so our maintenance staff can fix things right away. It is true, we do not have refrigerators in the rooms, however; we do offer them and will deliver them when requested at the front desk. I do apologize if you were not aware of this. We do hope that you will return, and give us the pleasure of you being our guest once again.

Summary: This hotel was basic. It was relatively clean and maintained. We booked 5 rooms for 3 nights and they put us all in a row which was great. One of the rooms had blood all over a pillow, another had a bad lock but they repaired it quickly once we reported it. Their "breakfast" wasn't worth the trouble. It consisted of orange halves, frozen waffles, packaged "cinnamon" rolls and some cereal. We try to eat healthy and there was nothing there but the oranges that worked. The attendant at the breakfast watched you like a hawk and asked how many people you were taking food for and made you feel uncomfortable if you took anything. The coffee was bad too. If you just want a bed to sleep in, a clean shower and to be close to Disneyland...this works. No frills but convenient and adequate.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. It's great to hear you found us clean and well maintained. We do apologize if our housekeeping staff made a mistake, we do always want to offer the very best  to be clean and well maintained. It is great to hear our maintenance staff responded so quickly to your report of the faulty lock We do appreciate your feedback about our breakfast. We do provide the standard super 8 breakfast, which does include items such as whole grain cereal, yogert and fruit. We do also provide signature cinnamon rolls from Super 8 as well as other items such as waffles or toast and cereal. We do apologize if you did not find these items to meet your dietary needs. We do have a breakfast attendant to assist with breakfast and our guest's needs. I do apologize if this seemed uncomfortable to you. I do want to thank you for complimenting our front desk staff for being nice and efficient. We really do appreciate your feedback and really do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: For visiting Disneyland, it was convenient that the ART bus stops next door at the Fantasy Inn.  It's a 20 minute walk to the park, which isn't bad but we had our 6 & 8 year old grandsons and by the end of the day, it was a bit too much for them to walk.  Also many restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It is great to hear you found our Super 8 so convenient and clean and quiet! It is true the ART bus dose pick up right next door to us and makes it so easy to get to and from the park with little  ones. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed at this Hotel for one week, the rooms are much larger than you would expect for a Hotel so very reasonably priced, they were clean and free Wi-Fi, coffee maker & a flat screen tv are included.  Super 8 also does provide free parking which is a bonus when many other Hotels charge from $4 to $20 per day.  Great shopping & restaurants are less than 5 minutes walk & Disneyland is about a 10 minute easy walk.  My wife and I had just checked in after staying a week in the Bellagio Penthouse in Las Vegas and I can honestly say that the staff here are 2nd to none.  They were very friendly and assisted us in booking tours and transfers and were always happy to assist us with their local advise and knowledge.  I would recommend this Hotel for families with
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! It's wonderful to hear you had such a great visit with us and we exceeded your expectations! We do hope to see you again in the future! Thanks again for the wonderful review.

Summary: Room was terrible, room service and cleaning often didn't show up. Staff were extremely rude and often contradicted things they told us, which ultimately ended up stuffing our traveling party around immensely.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. I do apologize if the room was not up to your expectations. There is not much information as to what was lacking, but I do want to apologize if it was not up to your standards. I am sorry to hear that our housekeeping staff failed to service your room. We do have all rooms serviced daily, unless there is a Do not Disturb sign or the guest requests it not to be done, and we will still call to check if you need service if this is the case. I want to say I am sorry as well if our staff seemed rude or contradicting. Again, there is not much information given, however; I do apologize if this seemed to be the case. Our staff does pride itself in being helpful and friendly. We do hope to see you again in the future next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: We were satisfied with the room, it was about what we...
Summary: We were satisfied with the room, it was about what we expected for the money. The location is good and the room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is always great to hear from satisfied guests. It's good to know you found our location so convenient! We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The room was clean and bigger than I had expected. However, the shower head is very low, and only one outlet by the sink to use for everything was a little frustrating when there were phones and laptops to plug in. I was very surprised to have to pay to use the lobby computer, $1 for five mutes and $.50 per page to print my boarding passes.  The breakfast is minimal and just enough to get you by until you get a real breakfast.  Walking distance to DL and DCA was more like 15 to 20 minutes, but doable.  Room smelled a little musty.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It's great to hear you found the your room so spacious and clean upon arrival. I do apologize if the shower head seemed low to you. We do have standard shower tub units in all our rooms. We do have one outlet by the sink area, we also have other outlets in other locations in the room by the nightstand as well as the table in the room. I do apologize if it made things difficult only having the one outlet at the sink area. We do have a computer and printer service that we offer to our guests. There is a minimal charge for the service of $1.00 for 5 minutes of internet use and .50 a page to print. This is a 3rd party service and they do charge these minimal fees for use. We do offer the Super 8 breakfast complimentary to all our guests. The breakfast does consist of juice, milk, coffee, tea, cocoa, cereals, hot oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, ego waffles, yogurt, fresh fruit, break, with margarine, and jam. It is a great way to start your day. We are within a 10 to 15 minute walk to Disneyland park. The ART shuttle does pick up next door for those who wish to catch the ride. It runs every 20 minutes. We do apologize for the musty smell in your room. Sometimes when the rooms are shut up for while they can get a bit stuffy. Please notify our front desk and housekeeping will tend to it right away. Thanks again for the review. We do look forward to seeing you again in the future..

Summary: I love to stay at this hotel. I never write these reviews but this is a great place to stay with your family for a great price. It is a short walking distance to Disneyland. I have stayed here twice and the next time I take my family to Disneyland I hope they have rooms available.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is good to hear you had a great stay. It's always great to hear from our repeat guests. We are walking distance from the Disneyland park. I am glad you find our location convenient when visiting the park. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The room needs a serious upgrade. The tile in the bathroom is cracked and broken. The vent needs to be cleaned and the carpet needs to be replaced.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I do appreciate your feedback. We are remodeling all our rooms and making several upgrades along the way. I am sorry to hear that you found your room not up to your standards and I do want to apologize for that. We have replaced carpeting, bathroom tiles and also upgraded our bedding and d√©cor in all our rooms as well as upgraded our TVs in all the rooms.  We hope to have you come stay with us next time you are in Anaheim so you can see all that we have done. Thank you again for the review.

Summary: The room was satisfactory. However, the breakfast was so-so. They had eggo waffles and stale bread :/
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am glad you found your stay and your room satisfactory. I do apologize if you found the breakfast not to your liking. We do offer Ego waffles and we do have bread that is delivered fresh daily to the motel. We also offer signature cinnamon rolls, cereals with milk, juice, fruit, yogert, hot chocolate, and oatmeal. This is a standard Super 8 breakfast that we provide as a complimentary service to all our guests. We do appreciate  your feedback, and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Super 8 Kaetlla is close enough to Disneyland . 5 min walk from the Parks and still worth it for the hotel Quality .   In 2005 when i was the it smelled tobbacco inside the rooms but now they refurbished the hotel and it looks great . The Outside are still the same but inside the room they ve changed everything and they've got the free wifi which is a great plus for a foreign visitor like me .
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is true we have remodeled and also have become a 100% non smoking motel. We are happy this is to your liking and you enjoyed your stay with us. I am glad to hear you find our location convenient and a great place to stay! I do appreciate you feedback and look forward to seeing you again,.

Summary: stayed here for the night. very cheap. nice staff. close to Disneyland. my only complaint would be that the water in shower never got hot. other than that, everything else was good. would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's nice to know you enjoyed your stay with us. I am sorry to hear that the water temperature did not seem to get hot enough. We do have maintenance staff who are available to assist when ever needed. It is great to hear that you will be staying with us again in the future! Thanks again for the review!

Summary Heading: Ants all over bed and room
Summary: My son and I stayed at this Super 8 for 3 nights at the beginning of November 2013 to attend a convention. Clearly this hotel tries hard to provide basic but suitable accommodation but the worst aspect were the tiny ants that infested the room. We first noticed them the first morning all over our beds....actually in the beds with us. After the room was made up all appeared OK so we went to bed happy. Next morning the same thing...little ants as bedmates! We mentioned this to the maid but clearly there was a language barrier which resulted in our beds not being made up at all...and, of course there were even more ants. Since the hotel, and indeed every hotel in Anaheim was sold out for the convention we brushed as many off the beds as possible and tried to sleep before a very
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you found ants in your room, I am sure that made your stay uncomfortable. We do have maintenance staff here as well as a 24 hour front desk. If this happens we are more than happy to address the situation if it brought to our attention. We do preventative maintenance for these type of issues, and I am sorry to hear of the experience you had. I do hope to see you again in the future. Thank you for taking the time to give us a review, and we do appreciate you being our guest while in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: If the front dest person named Ichell was trying to help me...
Summary: If the front dest person named Ichell was trying to help me more then what she did from the start then the stay would have been a lot better than it was. She gave me to feeling I was bothering her. Ali was very nice and I told him of me incorunter with Ichell. If he would have given me the same attitude I would have left the next day and not stayed as long as I did.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for the review and your feedback. I do apologize for any problems with our front desk staff, it is our pleasure to serve you as our guest. We do appreciate you staying with us! I am glad to hear that things turned around for you so you were comfortable staying here. We do look forward to having you stay with us again. Thanks again for your review!

Summary: Nice staff. Friendly reception. Clean. Brekfast not fantastic but works. Tiny smell of mould from the bathroom.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Its wonderful to hear you found us so welcoming and friendly, as well as clean and convenient. We do look forward to seeing you again soon! We do appreciate your feedback, thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: staff was nice,  water never got "hot",  no hair dryer...
Summary: staff was nice,  water never got "hot",  no hair dryer. looks like they are in the process of "remodeling" some rooms. this in a non-smoking hotel which i liked, unfortunately their were people smoking outside & the smoke smell filled my room :-(
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It's great to hear our staff was so nice and friendly during your visit with us. I so apologize for the people smoking outside your room. We do have a 24 hour front desk, please give us a call in the future and we will address this right away. It is true we are remodeling! We are upgrading all our rooms and bedding to make things even better for you and our other guests. We look forward to seeing you next time you are here in town. Thanks again for the review!

Summary Heading: We always end up back here
Summary: Its Cheap and basic- but when you spend 12+ hours at Disney, who cares what your hotel room is like! As long as it has a bed and shower that's fine for us. The bed isn't the best, but it is fine. There is a stale smell in the rooms, we got used to the smell after a bit.    This is my second time staying here this year and I recommend this hotel to everyone I know coming to Disneyland that doesn't have young children and don't mind the 10-15min walk to the parks.
Manager Response: We always love to hear from repeat guests! Thank you so much for the review. We do apologize if there seemed to be a stale smell in the room. We do inspect our rooms before every check in to ensure the very best quality. I do apologize if the bed did not meet up to your expectations. We have improved our rooms with new mattresses. I also do understand with small children even a 10 minute walk is a challenge. There is the ART that picks up right next door every 20 minutes round trip to the Disneyland park. Perhaps in the future this would be of use and a bit easier when traveling with little ones. We do look forward to seeing you again soon! Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: This was a last second check in as I had booked online for the howard johnson that I saw online. Upon arrival (from Australia) they had booked me into a different howard johnson nowhere near the one that they advertise online, apparently I had to many guests which the dont accommodate ( would have been nice if they informed me of this) I arrived to find I was in a area called stanton the hotel was a run down ugly looking thing and a drunken old man trying to fill ice from the ice machine, there was no chance I was staying with my kids there. I went online and found the SUPER 8, drove there and it looked decent for a family. The receptionist was lovely and after explaining what had happened to us was quick to help and suggest near by places but we decided to take 2 room adjoined
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! It is so good to hear that everything worked out so good for you once you arrived. We are always happy to hear our staff is helpful and friendly. We do hope that next time you are in town you give us the pleasure of having you as our guest. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Great group stay at Super 8 on West Katella
Summary: Thank you very much, Peter [the Manager], for all your assistance in setting up excellent accommodations for our school field trip group.  The staff was friendly and helpful, the rooms were clean, the breakfast was wonderful, and the fridges were much appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is so good to hear you had a wonderful experience when staying with us. I am so glad you enjoyed our breakfast! We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: First of all this is a motel and not a hotel so your door/window is basically open to the outside and not enclosed like it would be in a hotel. We visited this motel for our visit to Disneyland and it was possibly one of the worst places I have stayed in, in terms of noise and safety. The walls are paper thin and you can basically hear every little thing from outside, people talking, cars in the parking lot, cars driving passed on the street. Although the room and bathroom itself is of a good reasonable standard, and it includes free parking and breakfast, all this is pointless when you are unable to have a good nights sleep. It is unfortunate as it has an excellent location, but there is a reason why this hotel is priced so cheaply. The A/C is also very loud and lets in noise
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate your feedback It is true we do have outside entry. I do apologize if this made you uneasy. I can assure you we do have security that is there to make sure every one of our guest's is safe and sound during their stay. I am sorry you found it noisy during your stay. We do have a 24 hour front desk, and they are ready to assist. Please in the future give us a call at the front desk if you find your neighbors to be too loud. We do have free parking and free breakfast as well as free wifi. I am glad you found this helpful and enjoyable during your stay. It is also great to hear you found our location convenient. We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim, and want to thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Stayed for four nights. Check in was easy, parking free. I agreed with the musty smell but turned on the AC and it subsided. Tub drained VERY poorly, ok for adults to shower, but wouldn't want to be bathing little kids in it. And the water temperature varied a lot throughout my shower.  Location was awesome. The bed was adequate, but coming from a memory foam, it was a little hard. Property is definitely not new, but for the price, we were very pleased. Oh, the breakfast was dry cereal and frozen waffles. FYI. We we at the Convention Center, close enough to walk comfortably, but not multiple times. Next time I would want to stay slightly closer, if we can afford it. If not, good option!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We do appreciate your feedback. I do want to apologize if the tub drained slowly. We do have our maintenance staff available and are always here to help during your stay. We perform preventative maintenance on the drains on a regular basis. Glad to hear you loved our location. It's true we are within minutes of the convention center. The free parking is a  great benefit as well.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights. Check in was easy and fast. Plenty of parking. Walked into room, hit with a very strong off/mouldy/musty/bad paint smell. Got used to it within about 5 minutes. Toilet didnt flush at first, rang maintenance and service was very prompt, no issues after that. This is the closest hotel to the Anaheim gardenwalk, 2 minute walk from our door to Bubba Gumps Restaurant (highly recommend)and others. Downfall to that is some of the rooms face the parking garage and hoons can be very loud, burnouts etc. My companions had no issues sleeping through it, I had slight issues as light sleeper but still nothing too bad. Theres a free breakfast - waffles, bread/toast, syrup, jams/jellys, oranges, yoghurt, oatmeal, cinnamon scrolls and juices. Awesome considering it is free.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! I am happy to hear our maintenance staff was so efficient and helpful to you during your stay. I am glad that our location was so convenient for you while visiting Anaheim. It is true we are located next to some great shops and dining establishments. Glad you enjoyed our breakfast as well. We do have refrigerators for a minimal cost available upon request at the front desk. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim,.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at Super 8, short walk to Disney. Our room was clean and roomy. Staff was very kind and helpful. Would absolutely stay again and would recommend to family and friends. Good time was had by all.
Manager Response: It's so great to hear you find us such a great value for your money! We are also glad to hear our staff was so helpful. We appreciate you taking the time to give us such a great review. We look forward to seeing  you again soon.

Summary: The hotel was clean, well kept, the staff was very friendly and helpful. It's very convientent as it's close to Disneyland and to the garden walk mall. There are a lot of very good places to eat very close as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! I am glad to hear you had a wonderful stay with us! It is very true we are just moments from the Garden Walk mall as well as so many other great places to dine at while visiting Anaheim. It is always great to hear our staff is so friendly and helpful to our guests. We do strive to be the highest level of hospitality to all our guests! We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Stay there for one night for a trip to Disneyland. Ideally situated as its a ten minute walk to both parks and even though we checked out that day they let us keep our car there for free whilst at Disney. Rooms are fairly basic but we had no complaints. Same with breakfast room but food was plentiful and free! Would definitely choose there again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review! I am so happy to know you will recommend us to others, but most importantly I am so happy to know you will be back to see us in the future. It is true that we are just a ten minute walk from the Disneyland park, and very conveniently located to many dining establishments as well. We do look forward to seeing you again soon and thanks again for the review!

Summary Heading: FrIendly ,efficient and helpful staff , room was average...
Summary: FrIendly ,efficient and helpful staff , room was average, quiet location , convenient to Anaheim convention center,anaheim gardenwalk and disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location to be convenient while staying with us. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We use this quality Motel for group tours of all the hot rod sites etc. in the USA, we regularly through the year book up to 15 rooms at a time, the staff are awesome, rooms fine and the service exceptional. Close proximity to Disneyland and so central, highly rate and we will be back in June 2014!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It's always great to hear from our repeat guests. It's great to hear we are still your favorite place to stay! We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: All in all it was not bad. A few draw backs were the shower. The shower head was VERY low, as I am 6 ft tall and it didn't drain well. We also had a bad experience with 1 of the clerks in the lobby. We had ordered take out from the menu in our room to the tune of 50.00 and he forgot to give us utensils to eat with. My husband went to front desk to see if they could give us some from the breakfast room and was told no and he could walk down to the pizza place on the corner. We ended up waiting for 20 min for delivery driver to come back with some.
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We do appreciate your feedback. I am sorry to hear about your experience with our shower in the room. Our tub shower units are standard compliance, which is 6 foot from the base of the tub. We do also have routine  maintenance on our tub drains. I do apologize for any inconvenience the slow drain may have caused. I would also like to apologize for the bad experience with our desk clerk when asking for utensils. Our breakfast room is open from 6am to 9am every day. Our desk clerks do not have access to the room other than those times. I am sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. Again, thank you for the review, we do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel, but no internet and very unfriendly staff and alarms that woke me up
Summary: This hotel had good reviews this is why I booked it, but really don't go there. When I first entered the room everything seemed perfect. Then the internet did not work and the woman at the reception really said I am the only one who has a problem with internet and that they are not responsible (!!) and I would need to call the IT company. Then before 7 in the morning the alarm of the fire detector went on and woke me up - the people at the reception said that the battery was low and this is why. Then at evening I asked for information about how to get to the train station and the answers were just so unhelpful and unfriendly, really this was a shock to me. It was the same mean woman that I spoke to already about the internet problem.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our motel. I'm glad to hear everything was perfect with your room at check in. I'm sorry to hear that our wifi was not working for you. We just recently upgraded our internet service to 100 Mbps! Our network is professionally monitored and supported to ensure that all of our guests are able to connect their devices. I apologize if our guest agent appeared rude in sharing this with you. The IT service is free of charge to to our guests and normally a real life saver since we certainly understand how crucial wifi is to everyone. I greatly value wifi when I travel and feel our travelers do as well. I am glad we were able to silence the pesky smoke alarm that was beeping early in the morning. The batteries are changed out every 6 months to avoid this from happening but at times we do receive defective batteries that do not meet their life expectancy. Lastly I wish to apologize for the lack of attention given by our evening clerk. We quite honestly strive to be the friendliest and most helpful property in the Anaheim area.

Summary: One of the worst. Among other things:dangerous bathroom, no outlets to speak of, & creepy lot guard.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We truly value guest imput to improve our property. I'm greatly saddened that we did not meet your expectations Please feel free to contact me directly to share your exact experience  since very little can be derived from your comments. we do provide private security from a reputable professional company because safety and security are essential for our guests.

Summary Heading: Good Facility in an Excellent Location for Disney Visit
Summary: For a visit to Disneyland this facility is well located and we found the service and assistance by Ali on the desk to be very good. Our room had a very comfortable bed with safe lit parking outside our room . The bedding and linens were very acceptable and TV availability alos very good. A small pool and laundry room are available as well.   The location is excellent for a short walk to the 2 Disney theme parks and thus saves the parking fees at the park.Tons of restaurants, shops in the area and easy to reach from surface streets ( Katella ) and major highways ( 405 ).    The area where improvement is required is the breakfast room where there is significant congestion in the food pick up and eating areas with everyone converging on the area around 8 am before departing to
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It's so great to hear you found our accommodations comfortable and enjoyable. We do appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast room, and do apologize for any inconvenience that  may have caused during your stay with us. Our breakfast hours are from 6:00 am to 9:00 am, and there are times when it is very popular. We do have seating in the breakfast room; however we also have additional seating on the sundeck above the lobby, as well as in our pool area. Enjoy a pleasant breakfast by the pool, or purhaps get a bit of sun and enjoy our sundeck, We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Kids loved the pool. Would have been nice to not be in the very back corner of the lot as that made it a long distance to walk for pool and breakfast. Otherwise, accommodations were good enough for the price.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! It's so great to hear your children loved our pool! We do love to locate our guests in their favorite area whenever possible. Next time, just let us know where your perfect spot is and we will do our very best to accomodate! We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Had a great time. Got a nice big room.  Remodeled and better than last time we stayed here in March 2013.  Will be back. Can't beat the price and location.  Cheap Disneyland tickets saved me $60 right from the start.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We love hearing from our guests. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was our 2nd stay and again, no complaints.  It is, in my opinion, an easy walk to Disneyland, but you can also catch the ART bus.  The room itself is very comfortable, but a fridge would be nice.  The air worked great.  (it was in the 80s)  And like I said, clean. Oh, and more tv channels that I have ever seen at any hotel EVER!!  If you are looking for a place to rest that is affordable, this is a reliable choice, and will recommend to others.
Manager Response: Its so great to hear you had a great visit with us. We appreciate the wonderful review. We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: Well it wasn't horrible but we won't be going back. I took my Granddaughter who was 11 months after wiping the crib down myself she was never allowed to crawl around. Just don't expect much. Like one wash cloth for four people unless you go ask for more. Or how about a extra roll of tp would have been nice. Don't expect much sleep either from the hard beds and the sounds of elephants above from about 6 am - 12 am. The good thing is that internet always worked.  You get what you pay for I guess.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. We do hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during a recent trip to Disneyland.  It worked out fine for our needs.  It was comfortable, and all the "negatives" were things we were willing to deal with.  The rooms are accessed from the outside.  This was OK, though I prefer to access a room from a hallway, inside the  hotel.  The bathroom was tiny & the showerhead was ridiculously low, however, everything worked and we were able to "do our business".  The breakfast room was small, cramped, and didn't come close to having enough seating.  Also, the breakfast selections were pretty skimpy.  We ate outside and/or took food back to our room.  Still, the breakfast was "free".  It's better than going hungry, or having to buy breakfast, if you're on a budget!  Our main priorities in a hotel for this trip -
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's nice to hear we met your needs while you were here.  We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This hotel had a nice staff and clean.  The breakfast far exceeds those of other hotels on the strip.  Only problem is too far to walk after long day in Disneyland Park.  Too expensive to pay for parking and stay.  Shuttle would make this a contender!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We do love to hear from our repeat guests. There is an ART shuttle that picks up right next door. This takes you right to the Disneyland park! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Loved it! Decent and more than expected..
Summary: What do you want when you visit Disneyland?  Decent shower, good comfy bed with pillows, heating cooling works properly, quiet at night.
