Basic but more than filling and sufficient breakfast, pool jacuzzi to chill at night, good coffee early morning, friendly service, neat rooms no smell, prompt service..  Best feeling at night looking at fireworks from pool.. I didn't do it but I was there looking at others and wished I was in there..  Not to miss this one.. Great value and comfortable..  One thing to be improved maybe..  Closet space. Not that much of a problem though..  Back entrance would be awesome to save on walking from Disneyland..
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. We do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The room we stayed in was clean but had an damp odor that bothered me but I did not complain about.  The shower head is way too low for an average size person.  The breakfast was lousy, frozen waffles, white bread only and yogurt.  Eggs and hot waffles would be an improvement.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review, It is always great to hear from our guets.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We stayed for a week at this hotel.  We were pleasantly surprised that the beds were comfortable and the rooms kept clean.  Though a little dated, everything worked well in the room with the exception of the sink faucet.  We couldn't get it to have the water pressure that the shower had--it sort of just sprayed into the sink as if it were only halfway on.  But we had hot showers with good water pressure there, so that was good.  The breakfasts left something to be desired.  They had toast, yogurt, oranges, eggo waffles and pre-packaged "cinnamon rolls."  As a result, we only ate breakfast there about half the time.  The hot tub and pool areas were kept up and clean.  I used the washers and dryers on site and they seemed to work well, though it was $2 to run each of them.  It was
Manager Response: We Want to thank you for the review. We do appreciate hearing from you. We would love to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The lady in the breakfast roon has a bad actitude with the guest and the the menu is pritty bad  the lady en the frint desk the same thing bad actitude the only good person was the housekeeping
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review and do appreciate your feedback. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel is a pretty good value and reasonably close to Disneyland.  The shower was lukewarm to cold every morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is great to hear you found us a good value. We do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This was a great deal.  Best in the Disneyland area.  Clean, fresh, nice pool and hot tub.  Quiet, easy check in.... it was wonderful.  It's my first choice in the area now.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights in October room was good, clean and had cable tv. Free breakfast included which was good free parking free wifi close to Disneyland and food outlets. Front desk staff were very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we do love hearing from our guests. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The hotel room itself looks clean and nice but dont be deceived by its looks! Nasty carpet Nasty sheets (I saw a man folding the clean laundry but man it was so disgusting) Hotel room smells like dust Towels are icky! Bathroom is icky No fridge you have to pay $5 a night for it Breakfast? No thanks!
Manager Response: we want to thank you for the review and do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: When you go to Disneyland you want a clean and close hotel.  This was both.  We loved the look of the room.  It was very clean and comfortable.  The rate was awesome.  It made our trip even better.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, we appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great value, close distance, friendly staff
Summary: We chose this hotel because it was decent walking distance to Disneyland. The rooms were clean and the staff was friendly. It's a value hotel, so it isn't five star, but it suited our needs perfectly fine. Would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Its wonderful you find us a great value and a great place to stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: I had a wonderful stay.  Thanks.
Summary: I loved being able to walk to disneyland and any store I needed. Wish the room had a fridge and more channels.  Other than that, everything was fine.  There's a free breakfast and Internet.   Do not do the Hollywood tour they suggest.  You could research and choose a better one.
Manager Response: It's great to hear you had a wonderful stay! Thanks so much for the review, we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Budget motel close to the park
Summary: Anaheim Super 8  I was skeptical when we saw the reviews for the Super 8. ¬†We had a previous experience with a ¬†Super 8 in Southern Utah that left us promising not to return to that motel. But the many positive reviews here gave us hope. ¬†And we were not disappointed.¬†  We checked into the motel on a Tuesday afternoon after driving all day. ¬†Check in was quick and efficient. Front desk staff was accomodating.¬†  We were in a room at the back of the hotel so away from Katella Avenue which is very busy and noisy nearly all of the time. ¬†The motel has rooms the open to the outside. ¬†There are no interior hallways. And there are no elevators so be prepared to carry your bags upstairs if you don't get a main floor room.  We timed our walk and it took us 15 minutes from our room to the
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review. We do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Room was ok, bed was horrible front desk staff rude
Summary: Fine to stay for 1 night but dont expect to get any help from a couple of the front desk staff. There were a couple of lovely staff but the 2 i had to deal with regularly were rude and very unhelpful. asked if there was a possibility of late checkout (and offered to pay for it) as our flight didn't leave until 11pm was told that they needed the room as they were fully booked. If they were fully booked there wouldn't have been any rooms available on their website!
Manager Response: we want to thank you for the review, We do appreciate your feedback. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: First but definitely not the last
Summary: We had a great stay. Location was good as it is only 10 to 15 minutes walk to Disneyland. Room was big, clean and complete with amenities. Plenty of choices for breakfast. However, spaces are a bit limited unless you dont mind to bring the food up to the 2nd level room or your own room. Definitely will stay here again for our next visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Its always great to hear from our guests. We do appreciate the review and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Always a nice place to stay
Summary: The room was clean and comfortable. I stayed two nights and the maid service cleaned my room as well as how I first found it. Beds were made and fresh towels delivered. The only complaint is with the others guests. They walk past your room late at night talking just as load as they would during the day. No consideration for those wanting to steep. I enjoy the quick breakfast in the morning. I always make a point to stay here when I am at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, Its always great to hear from repeat guests. We look forward to seeing you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Not as clean this time around!
Summary: I stay here about every two months when I visit Disneyland. But I have to say I was disappointed this time. They were very busy so I didn't get a chance to speak to the general manager. I had a problem with my bathtub draining, so I cleaned it out myself. I have to admit it was very disgusting, a handful of dark long hair! (I have short blonde hair!) I overheard another person complaining about the drains also. Please, please, please have your maintenance- men clean the drains when people leave. (Vinegar and soda does wonders! I used this method when I cleaned professionally) You have such a great bargain for families visiting Disneyland. You are close to Disney and I have always found your rooms clean. I will stay again, but please work on those drains! Also a smile goes a long
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: As usual I had great experience and few concerns.  The pillows are very flat now. They are getting old and it may be time to get new pillows. If you can I would recommend bringing your own pillows if possible.  The lobby was renovated and looks nicer than it did, but the couches are horrible to sit on. They look new because no one wants to sit on them.  BRING BACK THE RED COUCHES
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We love hearing from our repeat guests. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My Stay at your hotel was good as usual. This is my second stay and I would return to your hotel if I am ever in the area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we appreciate you taking time to give us a review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Our room at this Super 8 Hotel was basic, but clean, which is what we were looking for. The best things about this hotel are: - Only 700 meters from Disneyland's main entrance - Free continental breakfast (Eggo waffles, toast, cold cereal, two kinds of oatmeal, juices, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, oranges, yogurt and pre-packaged cinnamon buns) - Free parking, which is very hard to come by around Disneyland - A small swimming pool to cool off and hot tub to soothe sore legs (from all the walking). Yes, the bathroom was a little dated, but there were plenty of clean towels and the beds were also clean. This hotel is nothing fancy, but it offers such competitive rates that as long as one has realistic expectations, it serves its purpose: a quiet, clean, safe place to spend the
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. It's true we are at a great location, close to Disneyland. We appreciate hearing from you and look forward to seeing  you again soon.

Summary: It's a good hotel if you're going to Disneyland, since my husband and I were in town for business, it also was perfect for us. The room was very clean, smell well and it really look like a room from a much expensive hotel. We don't have any complain with this hotel and for sure, we will stay here in a future.
Manager Response: Its great to hear we fit into your budget! Thank you so much for the review, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I love staying here. It's the best value hotel around Disneyland which means more money to spend at the parks or on dinners!  The hotel is basic but clean and safe. The beds are comfortable, although not enough blankets for me. To be fair, I didn't ask for more.  Bathroom is small but clean. The shower head was too low though. I'm 5'10" and I couldn't get my head under. I wasn't super stressed though.  You can walk to Disneyland in under 15 minutes. It's a nice walk too. It feels a bit longer on the way back after a long day in the parks! There is an ART shuttle you can take for a couple of bucks.  Food wise - the pizza shop on the corner makes great pizza, and there is a subway and other fast food places there. There is a 7-11 on the corner. The Anaheim Garden walk is next door
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Good h√¥tel And good staff, but if guest upstairs make noise...
Summary: Good h√¥tel And good staff, but if guest upstairs make noise or walk hardly early 3 am , we hear it very well And we canot sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: After a mix up with our travel agent booking the other Super 8 in Anaheim (which is TERRIBLE) we made it over to the Super 8 on Katella after calling them saying how we were unhappy with the other property. They said to make our way over and they would have a room for us for 7 nights. We wanted a King or Queen but they only had a 2 x Double room left so we took it. The tarrif was $69 a night plus tax which I think is around 17%?  It was 9am so I wasn't expecting the room to be ready but it was and we were so happy to be able to get a good room. The room was large, clean and only a 10min walk to Disneyland. There is the Garden Walk mall next door which has a bowling alley, Bubba Gump, Cheesecake Factory and a bunch of shops. All along the walk to Disneyland there are shops and
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the wonderful review. We are always happy to hear from our guests. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I chose this hotel because it was cheap we stayed there for two nights. since the beginning that we arrived we had problems with them, the front clerk was very rude. they gave us the keys, then we walked in the room and it smelled like cigarettes. the bed was stained with little spots, the pillows were stained as well, the bathroom was dirty, there wifi didn't even work. we decided we were going stay because most of the day we were goint to be at Disneyland. we weren't going be there all day, we  just want somewhere to crash .when we checked out I noticed they charge $117.00 extra  because they said it smell like cigarettes so I called to resolve the problem and I spoke to the general manager, he was very rude since the beginning he said that supposedly four managers went inside
Manager Response: all of our rooms are inspected prior them being rented out to new guests.This room did NOT smell of smoke when you checked in. This room was smoked in during your   stay.  We charge a fee so we can clean it properly for our non smoking guest when someone such as your self smokes in the room. If there are any questions regarding this review, please call me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: I was really impressed with Super 8. We'd stayed at this same location a couple years ago and it was just ok. But they've put new paint, carpet and possibly beds in the rooms and it makes a huge difference. The lobby had a very nice remodel as well. Everything worked, no funny smells, no loud noises at night. It was actually more than you should expect for the price
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed here for one night as we started our vacation a day earlier than we thought. We couldn't contain ourselves and needed to get there!!   The hotel was nice and clean. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable. It was right next to lots of shopping and restaurants. The breakfast was average and the room fills up quick.  Parking was sufficient, especially in the back. We parked right outside our door!  Overall it's a great room especially for the cost!
Manager Response: Its great to hear we fit into your budget. Thanks for the review, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here over the weekend with our toddler. We got a great deal on the room, but only got a queen bed and wanted to put our daughter in a crib. I called a week in advance to see if I needed to reserve a crib and the man at the front desk said they would have them available whenever we arrived.  We got in around 10 the first night and when we asked for a crib, the man that checked us in said maintenance had gone home for the night. We all had to cram on a tiny bed and barely slept a wink the first night. We let it go because we got in really late and that was our fault, but I wish we could have had the crib in our room beforehand. The beds in the room are pretty stiff and the blanket is a very thin foam blanket with a thick sheet.  Breakfast is so-so and super busy, (one
Manager Response: Its great to know we fit into your budget so well. Thanks  for staying we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Good price, close to the park.
Summary: This was our first time staying at a Super 8.  I would give it a higher rating but there were a few issues that I wanted to address.  This hotel was great for the price!  It's within walking distance to the park, I think it it took us about 15 minutes(with the wait at each cross walk).  The grounds were well kept and the rooms themselves were nice.  Their beds were pretty comfy, a little bouncey, so if you are a light sleeper you will feel your spouce, etc's every move.  Their pillows are not that great.  Breafast is included in your stay.  It consists of waffles, packaged danish, cereal, toast, coffee, tea and orange/apple juice.   My main beef with the hotel was this:  We were arriving late so I contacted the booking site and told them we would be checking in after 9pm.  Even
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice place to stay for a night before heading to Disneyland.  Rooms and bathrooms were clean and close to restaurants.  Check in clerk at night was not the happiest person in the world but check out clerk was super nice.  Would probably stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Such helpful staff, we arrived hours early and the front end staff were more than happy to check us in early! They also were terrific at guiding us in directions and organising transport for us. Great location as The Disney parks are only a short walk away and the garden walk shops and eateries are on the same block. After spending a tiring day at Disneyland it was wonderful coming back to a clean spacious room, that had the best shower that we have had our whole trip! The breakfast is simple but for the price of how cheap the room is, we chose to eat on our walk to Disneyland at nearby diners.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We cant wait to see you again.

Summary: Pulling into the super eight you think, aw man. Wish I was not on such a budget but a last minute trip to Disneyland with a group of friends ended up in this lot. Let me tell you, of all the other lower end hotels in California that I have stayed at this was definitely the cleanest, most comfortable and super close to Disney. The breakfast is better than any other motel there was a bit more than my previous stay at Express Inn.
Manager Response: We love to hear we fit into your budget. W look forward to your return!

Summary: Unusually we were staying here to be close to a wedding as opposed to Disneyland so can't comment on the convenience for the theme park. The motel is good and the pool area, despite being in the middle of the car park, was nice. We were here for six nights in total and our rooms were clean throughout. Breakfast was over a little early in the day considering most people will have been on vacation and therefore not rushing out of the door in the morning. Not 5* in terms of quality but for the price one pays, it's a good deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.; We do hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, cheap and great location
Summary: We booked a room for 2 nights for our visit to Disneyland and we were not disappointed. The rooms were spacious clean and comfortable for the amazing $59+tax price tag. The breakfast is also much better than few other places and just 8-10 min walk from Disney world.  Reception people were friendly and gave us disneyland maps for planning and helped us with all the queries.  Only thing I wish they keep either paper cups for milk or provide hot milk, as not only us but I found many families out their at least asking once for this.
Manager Response: thank you for the review.We do    love hearing from our guests.WE hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I stayed for two nights and would recommend staying here if you're going to Disneyland. It was an easy 10 minute walk to the park.  The room was clean, the breakfast was good although the ran out of a lot of things the morning I was checking out so eat early if you want more than a cinnamon scroll.  The air conditioner was really loud but you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. We appreciate hearing from our guests. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Last week my daughter and I stayed here for one night while in the area to see the Los Angeles Angels game. You can tell it is an older property that has recently had improvements made to it. For the price you can't beat it. We could see where they had just shampooed carpets in several other rooms.  Rooms were clean and a pretty decent size. I would definitely stay here again, very reasonable and clean!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  It is good to know   we fit into your budet . we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Quite a walk from disneyland especially after a long day. No microwave and fridge in the room. Breakfast is below average. Wifi is great and parking is free. Will try some other hotel closer to disneyland next time.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback,. We are about a10 minute walk from the park entrance. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice rooms and property.  Continental breakfast average.  Only suggestion I would have is a fridge or microwave in the room.
Manager Response: WE want to thank you for giving us a review.      We look forward to your next visit with us

Summary Heading: would highly recommend this hotel, close to Disney either...
Summary: would highly recommend this hotel, close to Disney either by ART bus transit or a short 10  minute walk.  The Garden Walk mall is right next store and has lots of great dining and shopping.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! We look forward to seeing you again soon

Summary: Great Location, very helpful staff and really nice. Rooms are clean. Location is great. Have stayed there twice now and will return again. Have also stayed at other super8's. Value for money..
Manager Response: So great to hear you had a great visit with us! We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Perfect for Cheap Stay near Disneyland
Summary: We went to Disneyland for our baby-moon, and we wanted a cheap place to sleep. Didn't need any frills since all the joy (and money) would be had at the parks.   We got a clean room with two beds, a working A/C unit (that was a bit loud), a shower, etc. If you want a hotel where everything is very nice, don't come here because everything is very basic. But if you just need a place to plop down to sleep after a wonderfully fulfilling day at Disneyland, this is a great place to do it.
Manager Response: WE appreciate your feedback and want to thank you for the review. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Hotel was nothing special but for price and location. Well you can't beat it. Friendly staff as well. If I return, I'll be heading right back to Super 8. There was a pool which was clean and also spa. You also have free muffins and juice in the morning but be quick before they run out.  You can also book tours and obtain tickets at the service counter as well. Disneyland is like a 15min walk. Very easy and you won't get lost. Plenty of food places around the Super 8 to also eat. Location is perfect.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Its great to hear you had a great visit with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland/CA Adventure/Downtown Disney.  Free parking, free breakfast, free wifi, great Orange County location, clean rooms, strong a/c unit.  The only negative I would mention is that there is no elevator (or at least I didn't see one) so it may be a bit of a chore to climb stairs with luggage if you get a room on the 2nd floor.  I would recommend for travelers looking for a good value close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, Its always nice to hear from our guests. We do look forward to seeing you again next time your in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Good hotel, but Super 8 Disneyland Dr. is way better!
Summary: The rooms are very nice and clean, they are updated (with flat TV screens!)... however the rest of the propery looks really outdated, especially the breakfast room. And while I am on the subject of breakfast, it wasn't really great... All in all, it's a good hotel, with a great location, but my advice would be, if possible, choose Super 8 Disneyland Dr. over this one!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review, we do appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Very warm staff...clean rooms and efficient customer desk. Stay at this hotel was a big positive in our entire trip.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate the review and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Hotel was great but it lacked a lot of things,Towels were rough, A/C unit was noisy,WiFi  signal was not strong,the room did not have enough electrical outlets, if you are staying here please bring your own extension (3 prong) cord , - I had to be near the sink, to plug it and was afraid the splashing of the water was going to damage my laptop beds were not too bad after a long trip it did not seam to matter at all. Plenty of pillows, on both beds,showers were nice. Restaurants plenty to choose from. COCO`s , Tiffy`s are good places to eat.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the feedback. We appreciate your review. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Good Price and  worth the money you paid .  Rooms are clean.  We still going to use this place in the future
Manager Response: We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nicely remodeled and good value for the price
Summary: We really enjoyed this hotel, especially after spending four nights in the other Super 8 on Disneyland Dr that was NOT a good place to stay (see that review that I wrote for that info). Overall, they were polite, the rooms were clean and updated, and they had a pool and hot tub. They were closer to Disney than the other hotel, and on the main shuttle lines. Also walking distance to many restaraunts, and a little cheaper than the other hotel also. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! Its so great to hear from our guests. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location for budget hotel to Disney
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights.  Great value and location to Disney Parks. The rooms are clean and whilst not top quality the beds are extremely comfortable.  Yes the hand basin is in the room not the bath room but no big deal.   We've seen comments on breakfast room being too small. Sorry but don't see what the issue is. It has around 30 seats and is a fairly quick turnaround.  For the type of hotel it's fine and adequate.   Big bonus is free parking when you are so close to Disney.1st day we parked in Disney which was a mistake,as it took 40 mins to get shuttle bus.  The walk is 15 mins max.   Staff very friendly.   I'd gladly book again if going back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. WE do have a great location to the parks. Its great you found us convienent. WE do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very clean, Better plan on breakfast some where else. nice...
Summary: Very clean, Better plan on breakfast some where else. nice beds. walking distance to Disney. Overall a three out of five.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your review! We appreciate your feedback ast well. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This place was decent and clean.  We could walk on the carpet without our feet turning black.  Customer service was fine.  Pool was too warm.  Breakfast was okay.  Walk to Disneyland is about 10 minutes, not bad at all.  I would stay again if I could book the same low rate I did this year.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, it is great to hear from our guests. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Sorry, I want to love the Super 8 as my family and I have stayed there countless times over the years. It is old and is in serious need of updating. You can't ever get hot water in the evening to even wash your face let alone shower and that was for the whole 10 days we stayed. Yes, the room was clean but certainly old and dated. The pools chairs were disgustingly dirty. The morning breakfast was sticky and dirty and the worst selection and quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nothing fancy - but clean, friendly, large rooms...and a 10 minute walk to Disneyland's gate! We'll never stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! We do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Out stay was outstanding.  Our room was great. The price was great. Very clean great help from staff.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Glad to hear you had a great time! Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very clean rooms with comfortable beds.  I like the check in and out process, fast and with people that know what they are doing.  This motel has always been great, I've been a return customer for the past four visits.  Thanks Super 8 for making my trip an enjoyable one.
Manager Response: We are glad to know you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to your return! Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Very pleased with the size of the room.  The bed was comfy...
Summary: Very pleased with the size of the room.  The bed was comfy too.  Would have liked a few more choices in the breakfast, but what you had was good.
Manager Response: It is wonderful to hear that you loved our accomodations. Thanks so much for the review. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel was cleaning and the upgrades that are being done are good and when asking for service it gets done fast and the breakfast was good.
Manager Response: It's great to hear you had a wonderful stay with us. We look foward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: if you just need a box with a bed to sleep in during your trip to Disneyland, this might be o.k.  The rooms were small, the breakfast was not good, and the staff was moderately friendly.  However, it was a reasonable walk to Disneyland (ended up carrying the youngest all the way back, which was a bit long).  Certainly not great, but then, we were not there to sit in the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! we do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again soon

Summary: The help at desk are rude!!!!!!! I put in a request for the lower floor...I have a bad knee and going up stairs is not easy...but very painful.... And the person behind the desk said they had not one!!!!! and it is just a request and thats all and nothing more than that...
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback. I want to thank you for the review, and hope to see you again when you are in Anaheim

Summary: What a great place to stay in Anaheim! Two nights, one day at Disney and I actually thought to myself about halfway through Tommorowland "I can't wait to hit that lovely bed at the hotel!"  Service was great, so many towels at the ready, crystal clear pool for the morning and a breakfast to really get you going with an amount that never ran out! We had connecting rooms and a crawling baby but we did not hesitate to put him on the floor as it was so clean!  Thank you Thank you Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights with my daughter. Nice Hotel but hard to drag cases up stairs, b/fast included in price. Close to Disneyland, walked each day. Next door to Anaheim Garden walk shopping plaza, plenty of places to eat. Staff at desk good but when they call a cab for you they use their own company  (they call John), don't know if this is the best, we waited 30 minutes at the shopping mall to be picked up when we used the card their driver gave us. Could have got a taxi in a couple of minutes by just standing outside mall. Live and learn.  Other than that would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We do look foward to seeing you next time you are in the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Bathroom light did not work, refused to refund double book
Summary: Nothing special about the motel except a moderate walking distance to Disneyland. Light in bathroom did not work. Reserved for 2 nights but decided to stay a 3rd night and booked separately online. I informed front desk that 3rd night was booked and I'd like to stay in the same room. Distracted woman did another charge for 3rd night w/o my knowledge. I called motel 4-5 times explaining the mistake but they flat out refused to refund the double book, claiming that my 3rd night booking was non-refundable. They stole about $76 from me.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much you added another night to stay with us. Thank you so much for your feedback, We do appreciate your review.

Summary Heading: Fantastic for the price and class of motel
Summary: For being a basic motel, this Super 8 has done a great job of keeping a place that feels clean and has all needs met.  We have stayed here twice and its a convenient access to Disneyland and a nice break when your budget is limited.
Manager Response: Its great to know we fit into your budget! We do love to hear from our guests, thanks for the great review! We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: More than expected, but poor breakfast.
Summary: The room was actually nice and clean. I was expecting a cheap, old and outdated hotel, but it actually looked nice and it was clean. The breakfast wasn't all that but we had a good stay overall. We went to Disneyland for a few days with the kids and this was the best we could afford.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad we fit into your budget. WE do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Almost everything great, just the service and attitud of the "manager" on turn... He was so unfriednly and say that he dont speak spanish... Affortunately I speak english also.  I asked for a ground floor room and his attitud was basically unfriendly,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We do appreciate your feed back and look foward to your return!

Summary: I stayed in this hotel with my family for vacation. We spend 3 nights and the hotel is pretty close to Disneyland Resort. It's about 5-10 minutes walking. Next to the hotel there is also a shopping mall with lots of good restaurants like Bubba Gump Shrimp, California Pizza Kitchen,  Cheesecake Factory, etc...or if you want a cheaper meal, there are Chinese food and Pizza in the other corner. The rooms are simple but comfortable. They also offer free breakfast, pretty decent (waffles, cinnamon rolls, yougurt,etc)..but you have to get early because there are only few tables.  For the price we definitely would stay here again in our next visit to Anaheim.
Manager Response: It was so great to hear you enjoyed your stay! We do have an excelent location to Disneyland and other popular places. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Good stay in clean, simple hotel (including free breakfast), for a good price!  We stayed overall for 7 nights.  We had arrived 1 day early so added it to our original 6 nights; no problem what-so-ever by front desk.  We booked through Flight Center (by phone) for our 6 nights and got a bargain of a deal.  (TIP:  We also included one day at Knott's Berry Farm in the same reservation and got the tickets at almost 1/2 price than the price at the gate).  I totally recommend pre-booking and doing your research for prices through various sources for the best prices.    We admit we made an error in booking though, a pleasant, positive one.  We THOUGHT we had stayed here before but it was at a different hotel (other hotel was further away).  This Super 8 Anaheim turned out to be newly
Manager Response: thank you for giving us such a great review! Its great to hear you had a great stay. We appreciate all the feedback and look forward to your return

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for the price!
Summary: The room was clean, staff helpful and friendly--we even added another night at the last min. and they were happy to accommodate us.  The walking distance from the park isn't bad at all and the price of our stay was the best part!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving us a great review. We do appreciate your feedback. We look foward to seeing you again.

Summary: On arrival one of the male staff at reception was so arrogant and rude. We had prepaid so felt obligated to stay. Will never ever go back! Our motel was very basic but clean. The cleaning staff didn't seem very happy either not sure why! Plenty of other hotels and motels in the vicinity.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback, thank you for taking time to give us a review, we would love to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: It was a clean and spacious room. Front desk was very nice...
Summary: It was a clean and spacious room. Front desk was very nice and accommodating especially since I was running late for my check in. Carpets were a lot cleaner from the last time I was at the hotel so that's a plus. Not a bad walk to Disneyland. The only thing I would have to say is to make sure the front desk communicates because we called for a late check out and the guy at the front desk said no problem it will be until 12pm and then 11:05 rolled around and the front desk called and a lady asked if we were staying over or checking out and I had to explain about how we called for a late check out and was already approved.
Manager Response: thanks for giving us such a great review! we do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Our family occupied side by side rooms at the rear of the property. Reservation/Check In was quick and efficient. Rooms were clean, though a little musty after being closed up for a period. Our reason for being here was the Disneys and for that it all worked well. We purchased some competitively priced  passes from Reception. The walk to Disney for the reasonable mobile was a brisk 10 minutes or so. A goodly number of the big chain restaurants are very close by. Of which we found the Cheesecake Factory offering to be a standout. We got what we paid for and were well satisfied with it.
Manager Response: we want to thank you for the review, We do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Not a nice experience at all. My friend and I stayed here while visiting Disneyland. Upon our arrival, the guy at the front desk was hesitant to help us carry our luggage up stairs as it was too heavy for us to carry. The room is outdated, windows are so thin we could hear every noise from downstairs and the rooms next door, the iron did not work and the hair dryer was ridiculously small. Everytime we asked for some kind of simple service it seemed all too hard for them and took them a good half hour to do anything. I understand this is not a five star resort however customer service goes a long way. we did not feel comfortable nor welcome during our stay here. Do yourself a favor- pay a few extra dollars and stay in a nicer place with a more friendly environment.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback, although nothing that is stated here was ever brought to the front desk's or manager's attention. Thanks for taking the time to give us a review.

Summary Heading: great hotel 100%  saul torres el paso tx
Summary: personal great clean great location the best to disneyland :) recomend  thank u ali front desk this is my second year staying in this hotel and i will stay there again recommended the staff very friendly the pool its great hot tub very clean very close to garden walk cheeseca
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We do love hearing from our guests! We appreciate you feedback and look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Our stay was short but comfortable.  Parking spaces were...
Summary: Our stay was short but comfortable.  Parking spaces were spacious, I have a full size truck and parking can be an issue.  I was concerned if they would be for small size vehicles. Good size and plenty of them too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We appreciate hearing from you! We do look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Pros- Comfortable bed & fairly clean room, close to Disney Cons- water pressure & temp, and breakfast
Manager Response: It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We want to thank you for the review and look foward to seeing  you again!

Summary: We checked it and put the DND sign on the door for two days, so no room service came and we didn't want them to come.  But it was in great shape upon arrival, and there were no problems experienced.  The pool is not very warm, but it's nice.  And there is a hot tub.  Wifi worked well, as opposed to another hotel we stayed at when we left.  Economical way to see Disneyland, and it is decorated well for that purpose.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback! Thank you so much for the review. We look foward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Our yearly visit to the USA always starts with a week in Anaheim staying at the Super 8. Staff, Peter, Omar and Ron always make our stay enjoyable. This motel is central to attractions we visit, Disneyland, Huntington Beach, Old Orange Town and shopping malls.  the rooms are always clean, our car is always safe in the car park and in the morning if you have time before you depart breakfast is simple but sufficient and staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We love hearing from our repeat customers. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Front desk person was friendly and the beds were comfortable and room were clean. The pool area was well maintained and clean. My family really enjoyed going to the pool and spa.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We do appreciate you feedback. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This hotel was clean, close and cheap.  Its a 15 min walk to the park entrance, or there is a  trolley stop just out front for a fee.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  It has a pool, hot tub and breakfast.  Although the breakfast is very basic (cereal, toast, fruit, etc), its what I usually eat anyway.  Parking is free.  There are several restaurants within a 5 min. walk.  My biggest complaint is probably that the towels were so small, but its a Super 8, not a 5 star resort and they gave me extra's.  It was perfect to come back to after an exhausting day at the park, chill in the hot tub/pool, then go get a nice dinner.  Would definitely recommend to others and stay again myself.
Manager Response: It was great to hear you had a great time and enjoyed your stay when you were here. We do appreciate the great review. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: If you're on a tight budget for Disney stay here its clean and cheap. But there are downsides first of all the rooms have little sound proofing so every night we hear people walking the halls and where our room was was under a hall so everything echos every morning we heard the cleaning people talking and going about. Also the bathroom was worn but not dirty. The carpets needed to be cleaned but the beds were comfortable and clean.  Breakfast was nothing special. And the tv was fuzzy. Now the service was the biggest. When we called to have a microwave and fridge put in, which they charge for,  they said it would be done. .. never got done but oh well saved me money. And when we called to see about extending our stay by one night the female I talked to was rude.  My parents like
Manager Response: We do appreciate your review, and do appreciate your feedback. We do hope to see you again when you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: I was here for three nights just last week and was overall satisfied with my stay. The motel was about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and was next to a bunch of great restaurants at the Garden Walk. The room was small, but very clean. Air condition was a bit noisy. I don't think you can find a better deal than the Super 8.
Manager Response: It's great to know you enjoyed your stay with us! Thanks for the review. We look foward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: The hotel was ok - when we got there the sink was plugged...
Summary: The hotel was ok - when we got there the sink was plugged but the repair man fixed right away.  It was an ok room nothing great but seemed pretty clean.  Bathroon could have been cleaner.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback. We want to thank you for the review, and look forward to seeing you again when you are in Anaheim.

Summary: THis hotel is well located to Disneyland, 20 minute walk. Hotel staff were nice & helpful, washing area good, quiet, bathroom had super power shower which was brilliant &great for day on the back after walking around Disneyland. Close to restaurants and also close to the Anaheim baseball stadium. Will stay again. Skip breakfast.
Manager Response: We do appreciate you giving us a review! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We do hope to see you again next time you are in  Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Good Stay at Super 8. Good Location near Disneyland...
Summary: Good Stay at Super 8. Good Location near Disneyland California (~10 min by foot). Room clean with good furnitures. But really bad breakfast (no choice, no place, employee not welcoming) and a low speed wifi access.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We do appreciate your feedback. We do hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: This super 8 was very clean considering the location and...
Summary: This super 8 was very clean considering the location and the amount of quest coming and going daily.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review!  It's great to hear you had a good stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: nothing to be Wow'ed about. room was clean and comfortable...
Summary: nothing to be Wow'ed about. room was clean and comfortable. staff was friendly. I really appreciated that they let me check in 3 hours early. I would stay here again
Manager Response: it's great to hear you will be back! Thanks so much for the review. We do appreciate hearing from you and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Another good option for visiting Disney
Summary: A good location near the Disney parks and some dining options at the Anaheim Garden Walk. The room was your average "Good Neighbor Hotel" room. We did have some trouble with water temperature in the shower and the sink. The sink had no hot water pressure and the water only got hot after the shower had been run. On our first morning the shower jumped from hot to scalding a handful of times and on day two the water was warm to cold so there may be an issue there with the water in the facility. Just use caution when your child is in the tub or shower. We did not try the breakfast but the room was very busy when we walked by. Other reviews suggested to skip breakfast here, which we did. Lots of free parking on site. I thought the bed was nearly perfect with the amount of firmness
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, we do love hearing from our guests! Its great to hear you had a great visit with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed here after spending the night at Disneyland.   The room was pretty big, the mirror and sink area were pretty nice. However, the room just didn't feel clean. I did my normal bed bug check, and everything came up clear but I am really glad there were sheets because the mattress was sorta gross. The towels were worn and thin. The breakfast was lacking, but I was able to get coffee which means I was good to go.   It's a good option for a family on a budget at Disneyland, but probably not for someone who prefers something nice.   One positive, you can see Disneyland fireworks!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! We do appreciate your feedback, and hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We have stayed here for the past 16 years.  The staff knows us and is very accommodating.  We recommend this location to anyone traveling to Anaheim, especially with children.
Manager Response: Its always great to hear from repeat customers! We appreciate your review and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We choosed this Motel because it is very close to Disnleyland. 10 Minutes walk, which safes parking at the park. Motel is very big - rooms on 2 floors - typical motel style. Free parking and a nice pool area. Safe place in a nice area and also security was on duty at night. Rooms are very clean.  Breakfast room is way to small for this facility. Also the breakfast selection was poor. No bagels or muffins, no cream cheese. Absolutely no go in my opinion is that you have to pay US$ 5 per day for using a fridge
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thank you so much for the review!

Summary Heading: Consistently Great...We stay here all the time!
Summary: We run a hot rod shop in New Zealand and every year we host at least two tours to the USA, we always stay with the friendly team at Super 8 on Katella for our Anaheim/Los Angeles portion of the tour. The service is exceptional, the rooms clean and comfortable and the location is so hard to beat.It's a short walk to Disneyland (5 mins) your right next door to Bubba Gumps and the Garden Walk shops etc, the pools great to cool off in and the free breakfast is always consistently fresh and good. Incredibly great value for money and with such great service etc. we look forward to seeing you again in October.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review, It's always great to hear from repeat customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I was in town for a faith meeting, and the hotel where the meeting was held became completely booked! Super 8 came to my rescue; just being two blocks from the meeting, and more reasonably priced than the booked hotel! Nice big beds, and all the comforts of home! I may just stay here every year!
Manager Response: thank you for the review! Its great to know you enjoyed your stay and will be back! We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel some recent updates increased rates
Summary: Stayed there for three nights nice hotel called front desk to have maids come they were quick to respond some upgrades I love that it close to garden walk restaurants stores even a a couple blocks away from target they need a shuttle free parking though and the pool was a little cloudy overall nice rooms and you can see fireworks from really nice balcony above front desk would stay again
Manager Response: Its great to hear you like the recent updates. We do look forward to seeing you again soon. Thank you for the review!

Summary Heading: Excellent location- all that you need
Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights and was impressed. Staff were extremely friendly upon check-in and assisted with booking tours throughout my stay. The hotel is just around the corner from Disneyland (5 mins walk) and even closer to Anaheim Garden Grove with restaurants/bar and shops which was excellent. Room was average- had everything I needed but nothing too special. The pool was very nice- lounge chairs comfy and the roof top seating area was bliss- quiet and relaxing sitting in the sun  Would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you giving us such a wonderful review! Its great to hear we met all your needs. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This was a great find. Close to Disneyland. Clean and affordable. Nice grounds and friendly staff. Breakfast, parking and internet were included in the rate and we were able to leave our car at the hotel while we went to Disneyland to save in parking fees. Pool looked inviting and was busy but we didn't use it. Overall a nice and stress free stay.
Manager Response: So great to hear you had a wonderful stay! We look forward to seeing you again. Thank you so much for the review.

Summary Heading: Cheap place to sleep but call your own taxi
Summary: In most senses we got exactly what we paid for and expected with the Super 8. We really just wanted a cheap, comfortable place to sleep while we spent all day in Disneyland. It was exactly this and the location was great. Less than 10 minute walk to Disneyland and surrounded by great eating options and grocery stores. The pool was nice and the hot tub was a welcome feature at the end of the days walking around. I had issues with the wi-fi signal but as I was on holidays it was more of a irritation, anyone wanting to work might find it more so.  Breakfast was a sugary, carb filled delight - packaged cinnamon buns, frozen waffles, commercial cereal etc. The 12 yr old me would have had a field day. The adult in me tried to get in early to get some of the yoghurt containers and
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review, we do appreciate you feedback. We look foward to seeing   you again.

Summary: Stayed here in late may. Check in was easy and it was nice to be able to buy Disneyland tickets at the front desk instead of having to stand in line at the ticket booths.  Room was near the rear of the hotel.  It was clean, plenty of pillows on the bed but the bed was a bit hard but after walking all day at Disneyland it didn't matter much.  The breakfast was basic but got the job done for getting a quick bite on the way to the park.  Pool area was good, but the pool appeared to need a bit of cleaning as it seamed like there was a layer of dirt on the bottom of the pool.  All the staff we met very nice.  Only drawback to this hotel is the walk, it is about a 10-15 min walk to the park and at the end of the day it seems like it takes much longer.  But even with that being the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review.  It is great to hear  you enjoyed your stay.  We look forwad to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Nice placed to stay rear Disney world
Summary: Walk able distance to Disney world. Stayed here 2 times in past 2 year. Nice to place to stay if u are visiting Disney world. Rooms are really big, nice and clean.They provide free parking for a day after u check outThe only improvement needed is the breakfast service.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! its great to know you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here this past weekend while we visited Disneyland. The hotel was great! The room was clean, had lots of room for luggage as well as a dresser and an armoire to hang up/store clothes in. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was a good size.  The breakfast was good and filled us up. They offered toast, waffles, yogurt, cereals, cinnamon rolls, oatmeal, fruits, and a variety of juices.  The hotel is only about a 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland, which was awesome. Saved $15.00 a day on parking. It is also next door to a bunch of restaurants so you have options outside of the park to eat at.   Overall it was very conveniently located in the perfect location, and it was an excellent price. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! its great to know you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Great hotel! Everything was clean. Pool area was great. Beds were comfortable. Room was decently big. Price was super good! Breakfast was a bit cramped and didn't have much selection, but still worth it.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney

No wait time at any of them either!!!  We didn't walk to Disney because of an injury, but the parking lot is just around the corner.  I suppose you could walk to the parks.  There is a little mall next door that always had a lot of car traffic, but I don't know where the people were going because you never saw anyone shopping.  We didn't use the pool, but it looked clean.  Breakfast hours were not long enough and people filled the space making it hard to get food.  There was a decent variety though.  You can get all of your tickets from them, either Disney or Knotts Berry Farm.  Overall it was a great location and
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! its great to know you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return.

The only negative happend was the sink drain problem just before we checked out, else the entire stay was pleasant and near to Disney land (10 mnts atleast). Pros: Near to attractions, affordable tariff, Neat clean rooms, friendly staff CONS: No Fridge or Mocrowave staying with family will face this difficulty.  Overall i would strongly recommend this hotel

Summary: I spent three nights here on a business trip. They offer a simple continental breakfast in a modified room that is difficult to move around in with other guests due to a center counter and an employee who asks you for your room number. I thought that was a little odd. Seating area is choked with tables and chairs, so you will enjoy continental seating also. If you are on a budget trip to Disney you may consider, not for the seasoned or business traveler.

The night staff was friendly and helpful. The minuses: the distance to the park is a long walk for tired legs and feet, the ice machine rarely works properly, the staff during the day is a little apathetic for what is sold as a Disneyland good neighbor hotel. Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! We do appreciate you feedback and look forward to your return. Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights on a recent visit to Disneyland.  This is our third stay here at the Super 8 Anaheim Near Disneyland.    Rooms are large with comfortable beds, and we found them to be very clean.  Air conditioning worked well.  Soundproofing between the rooms is solid, and you cannot hear your neighbours.  I missed having a fridge in the room, and wish they would add these without the additional charge to rent.  We made do with a cheap styrofoam cooler purchased at Walmart.  It was enough to keep our drinks cool.  We did not take advantage of the continental breakfast.  Location is great if you plan on visiting the GardenWalk for restaurants, the movie theatre, or bowling alley.  We walked to and from Disneyland almost every day.  It is a good 10-15 minutes, and you
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! We do appreciate your feedback. Its great to hear you had a great time when  you were visiting us. Its always great to hear from repeat customers! We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Not really next to Disney parking structure
Summary: I choose this motel because it was cheap AND it advertised itself as next to the Disney parking structure, so I felt that I could get by without a car. In fact, it is a 1/2 mile walk to the parking structure and then a 1/2 mile ride to Disney property. After a day of walking in the parks, I ended up taking a cab back to the hotel. This walking thing would definately be a problem if you had children with you. Also, the pictures show bright, sunny rooms, but the walls in my room were all very dark and dungeon like.  You really do get what you pay for, and I admit that I didn't pay much, but I felt that they had misrepresented their proximity to the parking garage and the amount of walking it takes to get there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are only 1 and a half blocks from the Disneyland entrance, the parking structure is on the other side of the park, so yes we are a ways from there. The conveinence of staying here is you can park your car here for free and walk right to the entrance. Also if you do not have a car, then you just walk to the entrance of the park, which is only a 10 minute walk or so. Most people do not walk from here to the parking structure for Disneyland, as if they do have a car and want to go to the parking structure to park, they drive. Those without a car have no need to walk to to the parking structure. Sorry for the inconveinenc, we do hope to see you again in the future.

People are pushing through because they are in a hurry and after only one day, we gave up on trying to do breakfast. We were on the far backside of the hotel and couldn't connect to the wifi (at most one bar, sometimes just 'unable to connect '). The wifi seemed better at the pool, but the water was kind of cloudy and I didn't want my kids to swim.

It is less than a mile from Disney, we walked there no problem.  The hotel is nothing super fancy, but really we were only there to sleep and shower, so it was a great value for what we wanted. Summary Heading: We have stayed here on previous visits to Anaheim. Over the...

The rooms are well maintained, although the bathroom could do with updated ventilation and lighting. Office staff Ron and Ana are to be complimented for their welcome - we feel we are among friends.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Disneyland. There's a basic breakfast in a room off the lobby, nothing fancy, just toaster waffles, cinnammon rolls, cereal, and fruit, but if you want to go out for breakfast, there's plenty of restaurants right down the street. It was an easy 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. And, the hotel is close enough to see the fireworks from the parking lot (on the back side of the building). The only thing that was a problem was the shower - the shower head was at my shoulder level, so I had to kneel in the tub to take a decent shower. Anyone over 5-1/2 feet would be too tall to shower
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! Its so great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We had a great stay at Super 8 Katella/Harbour for our recent family holiday to USA with a stop in Anaheim for Disneyland.  The motel was excellent value for money. It was by far the cheapest accomodation we had in USA/Canada so I was initially uncertain about its standard, we were "only there to sleep" as we planned to have long days at Disneyland. I was plesantly surprised by the rooms size, cleanliness, very minimal road/street noise and comfortable queen size beds. There was no refrigerator but a good sized ice bucket was provided. Breakfast was tea/coffee/juice, cereal, toast, waffles, yogurt and fresh fruit which was enough to start the day. The staff were able to give us a late checkout of midday and stored our luggage as we had a midnight flight home. I would absolutly

Summary: Stayed here for four nights and can't fault the place for the price I paid, which was around $60 a night. I arrived at the motel around 12pm and was checked in right away. Got a second floor which was good since I'm further away from vehicle noises. Con was there was no elevators so I had to lug 4 pieces of luggages up 1 level.  The Walk to Disney was around 10 minutes. This seems doable initially, but after walking 10 hours+ of walking in Disney the walk home can and do feel too long. So parents be aware if you have strollers/kids/backpacks. Nice restaurants around, cheesecake factory, bubba gump is only 1-2min walk away.  I got a room with 2 Queen beds. Beds was decently comfortable. Toilet was a tad small but fully functional. Room size was decent with lots of luggage space.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It will be great to see you again. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Don't let the name Super 8 deter you. Truth is there is little difference between it and the string of hotels that line the street right across from Disneyland's entrance, which is where we usually stay. In fact that is the difference (and cost to some extent) . Super 8 is a bit of a jaunt away but still within walking distance (bout ten minutes). The rooms were spacious, clean and everything was in working order. I do wish the rooms had a micro and frig. That would've been great but we survived without. It was conveniently located to restaurants and the free parking was awesome. All in all, a quite a decent stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed here April 1-6. The staff was friendly with the exception of the night desk clerk. My wife asked if she could use the microwave to warm a bottle for our 6month old. His reply was to use the coffee maker then proceed to indignantly explain how to use it as if she was mentally impaired. I went down to inform him all we had was plastic cups and hot water would melt them  A heated exchange took place on the treatment of guest also. Next day our room was half cleaned. If you are taller you may have a problem showering as the head is only about 5'4. If you plan to stay more than 2-3 days Iwould find another place. Due to it being Springbreak we were forced to stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate your feed back. Please feel free to contact me directly at 714-778-6900

The area wasn't really impressive, seemed small.  This motel is great for the price =)

Summary: I was not impressed with this hotel at all.  The breakfast was a joke.  I asked them for water and they told me they didn't have any.  The roll away was an extra $10 a night and it was the worst thing I have ever slept on.  I have never been so disappointed.  Also while we were there, we found a large spider in the bathroom.  I would not stay here again even if it was free.  It was awful.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We do appreciate you feedback. If you have further questions regarding the review please feel free to contact me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary Heading: The property was well kept and the staff was very friendly...
Summary: The property was well kept and the staff was very friendly.  The biggest complaint was the noise from the upstairs room.  Even normal walking sounded like an elephant was up there.   Add in the fact that the people were heavy walkers and you can only imagine the noise.  Impossible to get any sleep for the first 3 nights!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! We appreciate your feedback. I hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!

Summary: Understanding this isn't the Disneyland Hotel or Grand Californian, this has always been a great hotel for a trip to Anaheim.  It's close to everything and the staff has always been great.   If you want a bed and a shower..this is a great room.  If you go on vacation to sit in your room all day...this isn't a good choice.  We'll return again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It's always great to hear from repeat customers. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Room was good, service was good with the exception of the...
Summary: Room was good, service was good with the exception of the hot water. Whenever taking a shower had a hard time with hot water. Suddenly it would become cold and I would have to adjust but sometimes there was not hot water at all. That was the only bad thing. Other than that it was very convenient because it was real close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is good to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you so much for your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Average place, somewhat friendly staff. First night, our smoke alarm started beeping in the middle of the night, so we unplugged it and in the morning we asked the management for some sort  compensation for this inconvenience.. they rudely told us we should have called maintenance at 2:30am. Well pardon me while we try to sleep....
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! We do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: I would recommend staying at this Super 8 to anyone, especially those with families.  While the amenities would have it a two star establishment, it is up to date, clean, and well maintained.    It is convenient walking distance to both the Convention Center and Disneyland.  The service was super. We discovered late in the evening that we had a issue with the reception on television due to a bad cable.  We called the front desk and requested that fixed the next day.  Instead they asked if they could fix it right away and they did.  The only problem is there are not many available electrical outlets in the room.  Then again when it was built,  guests did not have all the electronic devices that we have today.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We do appreciate  your feedback and look forward to your return.

Summary: We were staying in the area for a conference and a day at California Adventure.  We weren't going to be in the hotel a lot, but definitely wanted a clean, pleasant room. The room was very nice, even exceeded our expectations for the price. We would stay at this hotel again without hesitation.
Manager Response: It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay! We do appreciate the review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: location is good.  Rooms are small but clean.  Breakfast...
Summary: location is good.  Rooms are small but clean.  Breakfast area is kind of a joke.  Bad selection and so cramped.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It's great to know you found our location to be so great! We do appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: For the price we paid this hotel was worth it. One little complaint from my husband who is 6'1" the the shower head is too low. Also, use another room cleaner/deodorizer. The smell gave me a headache on the first night.  We will be coming here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We do appreciate you feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I had an issue with the hot water in the shower and sink. The water in the tub would come out hot until you put on the shower then it would flucuate between cold and warm ruining the one comfort you count on. Other than that it was a very nice hotel and the staff was friendly. Maintenance did ck the water issue but didn't resolve it. Location is great.
Manager Response: Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We are a great location when visiting Disneyland. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: We had a wonderful stay..the beds were very comfy. The...
Summary: We had a wonderful stay..the beds were very comfy. The continental breakfast was perfect to start the day. It is about a 15-20 min walk to Main entrance to Disney.
Manager Response: Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We do appreciate your review. Thanks so much for your feedback.

Summary: Great location near Disney land.  the room was clean and more than i actually expected. beds were really comfy. will stay again.  my only complaint was shower head was low, hubby is 6'5. and there was no fridge or microwave. could be rented for an extra fee. i have never stayed anywhere it was included before.  did not like that since we have kids medicine that has to be refrigerated. should be included breakfast could use a little help but it worked.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good budget value motel & close to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was comfortable enough. The room was a good size, the bed was comfy. The room was clean enough however the carpet was dirty your feet get filthy (dont wear socks cos they will be black) wear flip flops. Breakfast was ok nothing special. Service was ok  but a lot of different staff on the front desk. It is within a 10 - 15 min easy walk to Disneyland and there are many eating places nearby to choose from. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Its great to hear you will be returning! We look forward to seeing you again. It is great to know you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thanks for the review.

Summary: This is a great motel just 10 minutes (walk) away from Disneyland. Our room was clean, spacious & had pretty much everything a traveller would generally need.No safe in the room though. Service was prompt.  Breakfast selection was limited. Also the seating in the breakfast area was quite limited. Overall, a good choice for a budget conscious traveller.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review, It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay and that we fit into your budget. We look forward to your return!

Summary: We travel to California and Tulsa every year and the only hotel we stay at is Super 8.  We don't look for any other hotel anymore.  When we plan our trip to Branson in July we will look for a Super 8.  The service is always good and everyone is always friendly.  In two years we will go to Florida and Super 8 here we come. Keep being awesome. Kathy
Manager Response: Thank you for the Awesome review! We look forward to your return! It is great to know you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: I liked this hotel and have referred it to others already. Very reasonable pricing. Fast check in and check out. Staff was very helpful and the housekeeping was excellent. We didn't have a refrigerator or microwave in our room and we were on the second floor with 4 children raging in age from 2 to 9 yrs. It was kind of a hassle to carry them upstairs while they were sleeping after a long day at Disneyland. Overall this hotel was excellent. Staying at this hotel gave us more spending money.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review! Its great to hear you had a great vacation and we fit into your budget. It will be great to see you again!

Summary Heading: Excellent motel for value and location. The lobby was under...
Summary: Excellent motel for value and location. The lobby was under renovation and the staff was in a small room but they were very professional. Will stay there next time I have to work in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! Its great to hear you found us affordable and had a great stay. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Located around the corner from Disneyland and right next to the Garden Walk. Loved that we were right next to so many restaraunts. The room was very clean but the beds were a little uncomfortable and the pillows were hard. I suggest you bring your own. It was worth the price and we would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review, its great to hear you will be back! It's great to hear we fit into your budget.

Summary Heading: not as good as pictures or other reviews
Summary: To be fair the "lobby" was under remodel and so they were working our of what looked like a closet.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We do look forward to your return. We appreciate you feedback

Summary Heading: 2nd time we've stayed here will stay again
Summary: The only gripe I had about this stay was that there were ants in our bathroom, other than that great stay and will stay again.  the ants were due to a piece of candy hiding behind the toilet but, once it was gone so were they
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome review! It is great to hear you will be back again!

Summary: Great hotel , fantastic staff , very friendly and helpful , close to everything you need . Thanks heaps , had a "super" time
Manager Response: It's so great to hear you had such a Super time when you were here. We want to thank you for the Super review!

Summary Heading: A little loud but decent price and close to Disneyland
Summary: Only a short, safe 10 minute walk from disney. Was loud at night with cars parked right outside your door. The rooms were not very sound proof. Had a crying baby next door which kept us up.   Clean enough.  Food in the area gave us many choices. You are also on the same street as the Angels stadium and the Hockey stadium for the Anaheim Ducks. Recommend both stadiums for these teams.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It's great to hear we fit into your budget! It will be great to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Better than expected. Decent and spacy room. Parking in front of room. Bearable walking distance to Disneyland. Would probably recommend to friends on a budget. Close to Bubba Gump shrimps. Friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: So glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks so much for the review! We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Excellent value, clean and quiet.  Good location for the disneyland traveller. Would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We do look forward to seeing you again. We appreciate you taking the time to give us a review.

Summary: Awesome location! Right across from Disneyland, next to nightclubs, and near food services! For the right price! I would def stay here again! WORD!!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It's great to know you enjoyed your stay when you were here. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Comfortable Bed. Noise AC/heater a con. Rooms not spacious, but adequate. Breakfast meager. Parking free/good. Internet slow, but free. Only 2 accessible outlets in room - over sink.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review, its great to hear you found us a great value. It's also great to know you found our location to be convenient during your stay. We do thank you for your review and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Nice clean hotel!  I knew I would be in an out and just wanted a place to sleep.  Safe secure and clean!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We look forward to seeing you soon. Thanks again for the review!

Summary: This has been our favorite hotel to stay at whenever we go to DL. It's recent renovations and upgrades just made the hotel that much better. We will definitely continue to return to this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It's so great to hear from repeat satisfied customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We did a quick drive from norcal to take our daughters to Disneyland, CA Adventure and Universal Studios. We needed a good, clean, inexpensive place to stay within walking distance of Disney. Well, this Super 8 exceeded expectations on most accounts. The walk was less than 1/2 mile from Disney's maingate; the motel had ample and free parking; the beds were comfy; the hot tub was a blessing after walking all day; and the 2 queen room was bigger than expected.
