And, you can see Disney's fireworks from the lobby balcony!  The only downside to this Super 8 was the included breakfast. Although the coffee was good, the food was mostly carb and sugar overloaded. We'd like to see some hard boiled eggs, maybe cheese and more variety of fruits.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to give us a great review! It's so great to hear you enjoyed your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again soon. Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: Super 8 is about 1 mile from Disneyland.  We (including my 83 year old mother) walked to and from Disneyland, two days in a row.  If you are on the north side of the hotel, you can see the fireworks from Disney (ask for that side)  The room was the least expensive that we could find and for the money it was a terrific place.  The was VERY CLEAN, which is a big deal with me.  They have a continental breakfast that was pretty weak and their wifi was very slow.  But I would most certainly stay there again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's to good to hear you had a great time staying here. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: If you are looking for a hotel that‚Äôs around 10min walking distance from Disney, with basic amenities then this is it for you. For the price we paid, we really can‚Äôt complain and there isn‚Äôt anything that made our stay that bad.  Our group consisted of 3 adults and we stayed in a 2 queen bed room. Breakfast is included, but we never ate at the hotel as breakfast finished at 9am, which was when we were getting ready to leave our room. Ihop and dennys are just a short walk away and we had breakfast there most days. If you are looking to eat at places apart from ihop/dennys there are a few nicer restaurants to the left when leaving the hotel.  There is a pool, laundry and vending machines available. No lift, so if you have quite a few suitcases request a ground level room. I would
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review!  It's great to know  you enjoyed your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The hotel staff was friendly, very accommodating and responded quickly to my requests, especially the maintenance staff.  The rooms are in need of capital investment from corporate for renovation and updating, but sufficed for getting a good nights sleep while seeing area attractions during the day.  The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland.  There are many dining options next to the hotel at the Gardenwalk of Anaheim.
Manager Response: It's great to hear you found our location a good one for your visit here in Anaheim. We do appreciate your review, and want to thank you for taking the time to give us your review. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: While this hotel is clean and has comfortable beds and very close to Disneyland, I would never stay here again. The whole place needs a good coat of paint, wifi that actually works and doesnt continually drop out, blankets that are warm, rooms with fridges included - $5 a night to hire a fridge is highway robbery, and curtains that actually cover the windows. I had to pull the curtain over & put my suit case against it to stop people seeing in. Also the walls are so thin we could hear the person next door coughing. The check in staff are rude, and really dont like their jobs.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and want to thank you for the review. If you have further questions or concerns regarding this review, give me a call directly at 714-778-6900.  Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Good pricing. The walls are extremely thin. We could hear...
Summary: Good pricing. The walls are extremely thin. We could hear every single word spoken outside of our room and on the street. A thicker blanket would be good too. Otherwise, good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we do appreciate your review. It is good to know we fit well into your budget. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: super 8 near disneyland  Australian gives 2 thumbs up
Summary: would definately stay here again,  Staff very helpful & friendly, room was comfortable, bed was awesome.  Walking distance to restaurants, nice and close No complaints at all
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, It is good to know you enjoyed your stay when you were here. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: We have stayed here on many ocasions over the years as it...
Summary: We have stayed here on many ocasions over the years as it has reasonable rates and is located within a short walking distance of Disneyland. Our only negative critique is the noise from other guests when staying in the rooms close to the lobby and breakfast areas  -especially on the ground level. We would suggest the hotel place a sandwich-board type of sign or two along the walkway reminding guests to be quiet couteous of others that may still be sleeping in these rooms. The lobby was undergoing a remodel during our stay so the appearance wasn't good and why we rated it so low this time. Overall, we've always had pleasant experiences and clean, comfortable rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. It's always great to hear from our repeat customers. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Staying there from 02/03 to 02/14/2013 Room 204. Friendly staffs, lot of smiles on their faces. Room and motel were spotless, location was great for both business and pleasure, free breakfast was OK, I'm not asking too much for what I paid. We will return next time we are in the area. Big thanks to Peter Bhagat, Itchel and all of its staffs
Manager Response: So great to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. We do want to thank you for the review and do look forward to your return!

Summary: Last minute getaway from daily chores.  The rooms are average size but very clean and cozy. Bed was a little firm for my liking but you can't beat the price.. I would definitely stay again.  oh and its really close to Disneyland and literally down the street from Cheesecake Factory. yum...
Manager Response: It's good to know you find us a great value. We look forward to seeing you again. Thanks so much for the great feed back

Summary: Stayed here for the 3rd time. Added more to their breakfast menu - cereal, toast, eggos, milk, juice. Hotel clean, MOST of the staff was friendly. Night before check out Ron at Front Desk said we could check out an hour later but got a call in the AM advising we were late on the check out - the woman who called was quite rude. Request a room that DOES NOT face the Garden Walk - it's SUPER noisy at night. The rooms do need a duvet on each bed - the two sheets you get are not enough, and the heater/furnace is loud.  The walk to Disney was only about 10-15 mins, restaurants near by (Denny's, IHOP, McDonald's, Bubba Gump). Garden Walk is next door, but basically empty.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! Its great to hear you love staying with us. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The clerk at check in was rude and not helpful. He gave us a remote room, which had dirt in the bath. I asked him to move to the other room, but he said the did not have any so I had to pay extra 35 dollars to get a larger room on the second floor. The new room had a terrible smell. Breakfast was a joke. Would not recommend this hotel to anybody.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, We do appreciate your feedback. If there are any questions regarding this review, please call me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: Not an altogether BAD place to stay. Just know what you are in for. For example: carpet cleaning is limited here, plan to wash your feet before getting into bed. But you can expect the bed to be clean.  The bathroom was clean enough, but dark, cramped, poorly ventilated and the water could turn ice cold when the neighbor used their water. For breakfast toast and coffee was available each of our four mornings but fresh oranges were offered only on the first morning of our stay and was the only option. During our stay instant oatmeal packets, frozen toaster waffles and yogurt was offered.They were testing out these new cinnamon rolls that come prepackaged. They were so bad they became a joke even among our two kids who usually love that kind of high fat/salt/sugar junk. There is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, we do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again. If you have any further questions about this review, please call me directly at 714-778-6900

Summary: Super 8 is great place to stay.  The rooms are clean.  It is close enough to Disneyland to walk.  We stay here almost every time we visit Anaheim.  On our last visit we noticed great improvements to the free breakfast.  The staff is friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. Its good to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The rooms are clean and the staff is great the only complaint I have is the distance to Disneyland. Walking down at the beginning of the day is fine but after a long day at Disney it seemed sooo far away to get back :) If you have little ones this might be hard for them to walk back. BUT...this hotel is great for going to Disney, it is clean and super affordable! We have stayed here in the past and will continue to stay here in the future.
Manager Response: Its always great to hear from repeat customers! We want to thank you for the review. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: What a great experience we had. Our room and the hotel were spotless. The free breakfast was a nice plus. The location was great. We easily walked to Disneyland in 15 minutes. The next time we are in Anaheim, we will be back. Plus everyone was so nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Its great to know  you found us to be a great value. We do look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: The location of the hotel is great and the staff are always...
Summary: The location of the hotel is great and the staff are always extremely nice.  The rooms, while clean and well kept, are dingy looking.  The lighting (especially if you are are applying makeup) is dull.  If you want to open the curtains for better lighting, your room is in full view for everyone outside.  Also, there was only one outlet that was accessible.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are happy to hear you found our location to be a good one when visiting Anaheim. It's so great to hear your feedback. We do look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: the worst experience in my hotel life, never back,terrible
Summary: I never encounter this kind of thing in my life. The hotel make another two same reservations by my name, but I have no any idea about that. no notice, no email not even my approval,  The front desk forced me to call their own company's customer service to cancel the bookings that I never knew before. and the worse is they can' t figure it out and will give me the solution a weeks later.  Very bad experience, If you book from outside of US, caution, You may not be able to get your money back. what the hell is this super8 company? what are they doing to their customer?  Look at the hotel, miserable , almost empty, just proved my word,no one come back.
Manager Response: We are sorry you had some confusion when booking your rooms. Super 8 nor the motel would never make reservations for a customer.We did ecourage you to call Super 8 customer care so they could assist you with the 2 extra reservations you made by mistake. If there are any further questions regarding this review, please call me directly at 714-778-6900

Summary: Super 8 Anaheim has always been my hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland.  A friendly and courteous staff ready and willing to assist me when additional arangements visavis tours, tickets to attractions, and room related queries have to be made keeps me coming back year after year.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review, its great to hear you enjoyed your stay while you were here. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Recommended if you don't mind the "Motel" feel
Summary: Hotel is a 10-15 minutes walk from Disneyland Entrance on Harbor Boulevard. There is a free Breakfast that we didn't get to try as it closed by 9.30 AM (too early for us). However, there's an iHop restaurant across the street, SUPERB PANCAKES!!! There is also another one in front of the entrance to Disneyland. Room is clean, with nice amenities considering it's a motel. Our only concern was security as we had never slept in a motel before and it is not gated, anyone can have access to the rooms. There are also 2 vending machines in front of the Reception Desk.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback, we do appreciate the review. We look forward to your return!

Summary: This place is very well located for Disneyland and is close to dining. 15 min walk to the park. I had two adjoining rooms. While they were clean the one room had a strong cleaning chemical oder.  Can be noisy as well if you are in a exterior room.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are glad to hear you found us to be a great location and you had a comfortable stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here several nights for our trip to Disneyland. Walking distance is .4 miles, which takes about 10-15 min, or 20-25 by shuttle on the way back from the park since its the last stop. We appreciated that the rooms were so clean even though the rooms were not brand new. I would rather stay somewhere clean than updated. The service was very friendly and accommodating. My husband and I drove 9 hrs all night from Northern CA and arrived well before check-in time, but they allowed us to park saving us the trouble of parking on the Disneyland property. The only draw back of the entire stay was the shortage of hot water several mornings. The bed was quite comfy, the room we had was very quiet, and I would definitely stay here again for the quality and price.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review! We do appreciate you taking the time to give us such a wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Stayed here while visiting Disneyland for two days. Able to avoid the Disney parking fee by walking to the park - there was also a bus but we did not try it.  Room was clean, beds and pillows ok - we were in the park most of the time so really were just there to sleep.  Had decent selection for breakfast but did not like how they watched over you while taking anything to eat and closed it exactly at 9am - which is early to close as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. Its good to hear your comments. We are glad you found us a good value. It will be good to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We loved it here, close enough to walk to Disneyland, the rooms where great as where the staff. We had a great time. there are places to eat within walking distance, small grocery shops for the essentials, a great spa and pool, you really cant go wrong for a budget motel
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review! It's very true, we are a great location when visiting Disneyland. We look forward to your return!

Summary: If you want a basic hotel, this will meet all of your needs.  Older but clean, around the corner from Disneyland.  Breakfast:  Waffles, toast, yogurt, cereal, milk, juice, coffee.  Park @ the Toy Story Lot on Harbor south of Katella and take the tram to Disneyland or it's a 15 minute walk from the hotel.
Manager Response: It's great to know you found us a good value when staying with us. Thanks so much for the great review, we do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: small budget here is your hotel
Summary: paid $52 a night...queen bed seemed like a double or full, bed was hard, no blow dryer in room. tv was good. about a ten minute walk to disney. hot tub and pool. breakfast provided. on route 2 of ART bus...last stop. good value. inhave stayed here a few times. if you are just sleeping here and dont need posh amentities this is the place.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is good to hear we fit into your budget. Looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Room is basic, but very clean and comfortable.  Easy walking-distance to Disneyland parks.  Good for the value.  Front desk guy was awesome!  Breakfast is basic, nothing fancy.  One weird thing though - on the last day of our stay, the housekeeper didn't finish making the beds...left the pillows on the floor.  But otherwise all was fine :-)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's great to hear you found your stay with us a clean and comfortable one. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We were located in room 150 which is located in the back of the hotel. The people upstaris banged and made very loud noises all night long. The pople to the south of us ran water like filling up a tub atleast three times that evening. Me and my boyfriend had a very tough time sleeping through all of this noise.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We do have a 24 hour front desk, please feel free to call us anytime in the future. We do appreciate your business, and hope to see you again.

Summary: The hotel itself is very close to Disneyland, only about a block away. We easily walked back and forth between the hotel and the park. The front desk man was very helpful in recommending which park tickets to purchase and what to see and eat around town. The room is very basic, no fridge, bare walls, VERY low shower head (I am 6' and the shower head hit me mid chest), the shower faucet handle was difficult to operate because it was wound so tightly to the wall, the corners of the room were a tad grungy, and the beds.....were WONDERFUL! I honestly do not think I have ever slept in a more comfortable hotel bed. I hope that it was not only my room that had these beds because after a long hot day at Disneyland it was refreshing to rest up in a very comfortable bed and I will always
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review. It's so great to hear you had a wonderful comfortable stay when you were with us. We do look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The room is spacious..the bed is very comfortable..walking distance to Disneyland and eateries..they serve simple good breakfast. Drive down the road, you will get Halal arabic food, so important to the Muslims. OR just a few block to Brookhurst St, a muslim supermarket, Fresh Choice has all the halal food. A recommended place to stay if you are in Anaheim, California
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! It is so nice to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing  you again soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed here for a few days following our visits to both Disneyland and California Disney. The rooms are always clean and the daily maid service is excellent. The breakfast is very limited but sufficient for the walks we are taking every morning from the hotel to the Disney parks. They were very helpful in assisting us, esp when they reserved our Breakfast-Character Dining at the Plaza Inn. We were late in our appointment, good thing the hotel reserved our seats the night before.   The hotel is a five to ten minute walk from the Disney grounds, and that makes it easy for us if we want to go back early or if we want to rest for an hour or so from all gthe walking. you can even see the fireworks from the hotel. Vert near 7-11, next door to the anaheim gardenwalk.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review! It's so nice to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and you found our location to be good for you and your family. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: It's a typical Super 8, a little on the older side, but you can't beat it for the value. The rooms were clean and they kept us stocked on towels, soap, and shampoo. The grounds were kept up nice and the pool and hot tub were also clean.  Breakfast was simple, but well stocked. The staff went above and beyond helping us with different needs. I was extremely pleased with customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We appreciate hearing from you. It is good to know you had a great stay. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: We stayed for three days and it was exactly what we hoped for. It is not a fancy or new motel. But it is clean and very reasonable. The room was on the larger side. A refrigerator and microwave are available for rental for $8/ day. The small, outdoor pool was clean and heated. The hot tub was the perfect temperature: not too hot. The breakfast room was always crowded. But the ladies working in it managed to keep it stocked with two cereals, instant oatmeal, cinnamon rolls, ego-type waffles, toast and juice. There was also yogurt for our last two mornings.  Disneyland's entrance is a brisk 15 minute walk away. There are a number of restaurants next door at the Garden Walk.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is good to know we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim visiting Disneyland.

Summary: Like most 'hotels' in the area, this is really a motel, nothing fancy but perfectly fine for a trip to Disneyland or attending a convention. Rooms and facilities are pretty typical of most of the hotels in the area. It's an older property, and that shows, but I've stayed here many times and it's always been clean and well kept. I've never bothered with the breakfast, but my wife likes it; usually some juice, coffee, containers of yogurt, and donuts/pastries of some kind. About what you'd expect for free. It's right next to the Anaheim Garden Walk, which honestly seems to be a failed attempt at an outdoor mall, but it does have some nice restaurants there, so that's handy. It is walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center and to Disneyland, but be aware it's a long trek to
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Its great to hear you found our location to be a good one for you while visiting Disneyland. It is also good to know we fit into your budget. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Yes...I  had  bed  bugs bites this  week...stayed there for  five days and I  reported the bites up front at the desk  and I told the housekeeper about what happened and  I  got nowhere with both of them.  I just wanted to come home...the place was paid already with the airline ticket so I felt I couldn't  leave or do anything about this.  I  found that the Breakfast was a joke....no eggs, waffles, fruit (only had half oranges), strawberry jam (grape jelly mostly) and  the people that stayed there were like pigs....it was like a stampede in the morning....so  good luck trying to get breakfast there. There was  a man out front (Ron) who was  nice though and funny.  I  would not recommend this place at all.....horrible just horrible.....
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We however did not receive any reports from you to housekeeping nor the front desk. If you have further questions regarding this review, please contact me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: Excellent hotel at super location....very convenient for the people who will be visiting Disneyland. The space for the breakfast is very small but this is minor. all other amenities in the hotel are really good.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is good to know we fit into your budget and you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Went with my family and not one of the employees was nice.   Very rude.  Breakfast is a joke!  The breakfast food is mediocre and they have a rude lady guarding it the entire time.  Tiny and messy room to eat.  Location is great walking distance to disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate your feedback. It is good to know you found us to be a good location when visiting Disneyland. If I can assist further with this review please call me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary Heading: great location and clean rooms but very basic
Summary: This is a good hotel for the very budget conscious. It's close to Disneyland, clean and has a small pool for families. It's bare bones though and not where you'd want to spend a lot of time. If you're there for the parks and the hotel is just for sleeping, then you'll enjoy this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, we are happy to know we were a great place to stay while visiting Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Hotel was just as expected, a great deal for the price. Room was clean and the staff was nice. We were even able to see the Disneyland fireworks right out of our window,(certain facing rooms will see other just need to step out and watch from parking lot or balcony/stairs) which was nice for our daughter who is usually afraid of them. She actually sat and watched since she felt sage. We will look into staying here for future trips. Location and price were great!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! It is great to hear you found our location so convenient! We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Perfect end to a lovely holiday
Summary: Anaheim was our last destination after visiting LA, New York and Vegas.  We decided to go budget due to the costs of other accommodation and honestly, compared to some of the other hotels we stayed at there really wasn't much difference.  The Super 8 Anaheim hotel provided for all of our needs. It was comfortable, the rooms were generous in size, the water pressure and temperature in the shower was no issue at all (and felt great after a full day at Disneyland).  The location of the Hotel surprised us. Perfect placed near the Cheesecake factory (one of my favourites) and only a short walk to the entry gates of Disneyland. If you're tired after a long day there is a shuttle bus that drops off right out the front).  The staff were extremely welcoming. They held our bags all day so
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review, it is great to know you had  a great time when you were staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: I chose to stay here again, because of the proximity to Disneyland. We parked our vehicle outside our room and walked 0.51 miles  to the entrance  gate facing S.Harbor Blvd, the area is very safe and there are lots of folk walking specially after the park its closed, and lots of affordable eateries ,some open 24 Hours. The room was very clean,and it did not have that musky scent. I wished it had more electrical outlets, definitely bring a power strip for all your gadgets and toys. The staff was either tired or weren't having a great day when we got there,and when we checked out, but then again I wasn't there to socialize with them either, when I go back to the happiest place on earth I will most likely choose this Super 8 again, and bring my power strip along. BTW there;s a
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we are happy to see you return! We look foward to seeing you again. Thanks so much for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Cheap and well worth the money
Summary: We love to go to Disneyland as we have season passes, but do not have the extra cash to spend on $300 rooms/night. A year ago we tried this hotel and were amazed. The employees were friendly, the rooms, were clean, and we slept well. We were far enough away from the park to not hear noise all night long, but close enough we could walk. We tried staying at a different Super 8 at the Northwest side of Disneyland and we will not be making that mistake again. This one is much better. The staff was accommodating and even let us park our car there before we checked in to our room. They said they were fine with it because it was not a busy time, but not to expect it during busy season. To me that was very nice. Myself and three others stayed in the double queens and had plenty of room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, we look forward to your return. We are so glad you found we fit into your budget.

Summary Heading: Great Value, will be back again
Summary: We originally were guided to this hotel via a Qantas booking agent.  Since then (about 10 years ago) we've booked it ourselves, (visit every 18 months) and its great.  My significant other is a clean freak and will always 'preclean' any hotel room.  She has no issues with this place.  Wifi and Flat screen TV keeps the kids happy.  The new breakfast room and menu is great value for a budget chain.  We're staying back there toward the end of our holiday and will hopefully pick up free night using our Wyndam reward card.   Tip for Aussies  Stay here, walk to Garden Walk Shops 100m away, buy a 'take out" Calfornia Pizza Kitchen Pizza and take it back to your room (saves tipping etc) .
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to your return

Summary Heading: it was great but choose wisely.
Summary: Over all the stay was great. This hotel has the luck/misfortune of being close to the garden walk.  Over all the room seemed to be updated from the last time we stayed there a few years ago and the staff all seemed nice. When checking in he asked what some of our room needs might be and I was like I don‚Äôt care so we got put in the back of the place by the dumpsters in the rooms facing the parking garage of the garden walk area. I still did not care but the person traveling with me did so now I do kind of care. The dump trucks come in the morning and if the dumping don‚Äôt wake you up the backing up beep beep beep noise should, and also noises (cars, car alarms, and people who had too much fun and some of the drinking places) from the garage across the way echoed over into the
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback. It is good to know we were a great location for you while visiting the Disneyland area. We look forward to your return!

Summary: My wife and me had booked a side-vacation to break up our trip to Las Vegas so we had arranged for Lux Bus to provide a tour to us which included round trip bus transportation from Las Vegas to Anaheim, with 2 one-day tickets to Disneyland and a two night stay at the Super 8 on Katella.  Our stay at Super 8 was our typical stay; we usually pick Super 8's anytime on vacation because we know it's inexpensive and convenient.  We heard other travelers at this hotel complaining about the "super-starter" breakfast, if you have not stayed at one of these hotels then let me fill you in ... the breakfasts usually provided (in a cafeteria type setting) is generally one or two types of cereal, toast w/jam, some type of pastry, and coffee.  If you are looking for elegant food then Super 8
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, It is great to hear you had a good experience while staying with us. We do look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Clean & Cheap - nothing more we need!
Summary: We usually stay at another hotel directly opposite Disney entrance, however the cost for this stay was extremely expensive so decided to give Super 8 a go after reading tripadvisor reviews.  We really only need a place to sleep that is clean & safe as we are out of the hotel for most of the day so couldnt justify the huge cost for the other hotel. We had a room on the upper floor which was a bit of an ordeal having to drag heavy bags up the stairs (we had been travelling for a while so bags were a lot heavier than when we left home).  I also injured my foot, so this also proved a bit of an ordeal as well. The room was a decent size & the beds were very comfortable - possibly one of the most comfy we had on our whole trip.  The room was clean & comfortable.  You can rent a fridge
Manager Response: Its great to know you found us to be a good value when staying with us. It's always great to hear we fit into our guest's budget and we are affordable. Thanks for giving us the review! It's wonderful to know you will be back!

Summary Heading: The worst hotel I ever experience.... Carpet so dirty...
Summary: The worst hotel I ever experience.... Carpet so dirty. Restroom stink. For the price $77.00/night other Hotels way better... The only think I like cause it near Disney Land. Bet other tourists very disappointing as well since it near a world popular amusement park. :(
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, We want to thank you for your feedback. If you have futher questions regarding this reveiw, please give me a call directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: We wanted a place that was within walking distance of Disneyland.  It was plenty close.  The staff was friendly.  The room was cleaned for us everyday.  There was no refrigerator in the room so we used a cooler.  The only thing that was annoying was the shower.  When you turned the bath on it was nice and hot.  When you turned the shower on it was hot for about ten seconds.  But we stayed four nights for 204 bucks.  So I can't complain too much.  I would stay here again.  They also have a complimentary breakfast but we never utilized it because we didn't want to get up early.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Its great to kow you found us affordable. We are in a great location being so close to Disneyland, We do look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Very surprised with quality of the room!!!
Summary: Well let me start by saying my husband and I  travel once a month to Anahiem to visit  my elderly mother-in law and we have stayed in many cheap hotels and this is the only one we will stay in again. When we first walked into the room,  it  was super clean and smelled really awesome and was really impressive with dark wood furniture and new soft carpet.. The bed was really comfy with a pillow top mattress  It also had a flat screen tv with cable channels!!  It also had a frig. and microwave and coffee pot. We  will only stay at this hotel from now on. The older gentlemen who checked us in was a realy joy and made us feel very welcome. We slept to late to enjoy the breakfast so can't comment on that.  The Hansons from Vista CA.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are happy you liked our rooms!  It's always great to hear feedback from our guests. We are looking forward to seeing you again!

Summary: I will NEVER stay here again.  Family was ate up by bed bugs.  Husband had them so sever he had to seek medical attention for allergic reaction to so many bites. On a positive note, the staff was extremely sincere and apologetic about the incident.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are researching this, as we have had no reports of such incidents. If you have questions regarding this review, give me a call directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: I thought I would read previous reviews before we left!  Some were helpfull     First thing I noticed was some people should stay at a 300$ a night place period.     This super 8 was recommended to us by our agent. We asked for budget conscious accommodation with a pool ( kids critical)      The first person we met was a Kind gentleman named Ron. Here is what we got     -Clean comfortable beds     - Quiet rooms       - Wonderful breakfast. Some may say otherwise but the kids were happy.  Which makes happy parents.  Yes they have a new menu.      ( if your looking for a full fare breakfast there is numerous options within walking distance)       - a clean pool and hot tub       - excellent staff          To sum up our experience. we weren't looking for the ritz Carleton. We
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and do look forward to seeing you again. Thanks again for the great review.

Summary Heading: Continues to be a basic motel
Summary: Pros: Location About a 10 minute walk to Disneyland  Anaheim Resort Transportation bus stops in front of motel (ART bus) 1,3 and 5 day passes available at kiosk around the city. Also available online before you leave home. (allow 3-5 days to get the pass in the mail or delivery to most hotels,but not this one) It is $3.00 each time you ride unless you have a pass.The pass is $20 per person for a 5 day pass.Seniors $9 for a 5 day pass if you order in advance, online.  Motel staff is always friendly in the office.  Room was clean  Close to restaurants and the Garden Walk mall  Cons:Never had hot water (lukewarm showers! UGH!)  Hot water faucet at the sink didn't work at all, only cold water worked. Had to wash my hands at the bathtub  No WI-FI  Kept being told it was being fixed
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear you enjoyed your stay. We always love to hear from repeat guests. We do look forward to seeing you again next time  you are in Anaheim. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Do not let them put you in the rooms by the trash bins unless you plan to get up earlier than the 6:30 daily pickup schedule (lots of noise). Beds are not made daily and many children were coughing around the breakfast food.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. We do appreciate your feedback. We do look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: They had no good method for printing, that worked. The...
Summary: They had no good method for printing, that worked. The printer used was not working they would not refund me. They had no shampoo or conditioner. The pool closed to early. They had very dirty bathroom and dirty sheets on bed.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. we appreciate your feedback. We do look forward to seeing you again, please give me a call directly if I can be of more assistance. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: It was a pleasant stay.   I did not spend all that much time at the hotel due to being at the Disneyland Resort.   I did like the beds and the bathroom.   If there was one lacking thing at the hotel, it was absence of vending machines.
Manager Response: Its great to know you had a great stay. We want to thank you for the review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I have been to this location repeatedly. I haven't experienced problems like other reviewers, other than the low shower heads, which are apparently standard. I would come back again! We have always had parking and the staff is so friendly!
Manager Response: thanks for the great review! Its great to know you had a great experience. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We only spent one night. We only slept there and had the continental breakfast. Which was nice to have, it saved us some money at the parks. Did not try pool/spa or tv or Internet. But we enjoyed the comfort of the bed. Firm but not too firm. We brought our own blanket and pillows (from experiences of other hotels) they had a lot of nice pillows but super thin blanket and glad we brought our own comforter! Heater worked really well in the room. Satisfied with our stay! Will stay there again. Right next to the garden walk which was nice for dinner! Good experience!
Manager Response: Its great to know you had a great experience. We want to thank you for the review. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Excellent choice if you are looking cheap!!!
Summary: It was a good hotel for a really cheap price. It is pretty close to the Disneyland Parks and also from the Convention Center, it is also next to the Garden Walk Mall where you can go to eat something. It could definetely improve the service for the continental breakfast including more products, making a large room for it and a more bigger dinning area.
Manager Response: thanks for the review. It is great to know we fit into your budget. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I am pleased with my stay and the price I paid, however we traveled by air and normally are provided with a toothbrush also lotion. The upstairs room was so noisy I could not sleep on Sat night till like 2 am. I did not report it due to it's a Disneyland atmosphere!  The breakfast was way better than I expected. (:
Manager Response: thanks for the review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. We do look forward to seeing you again. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Just ok, if your on a budget!
Summary: Last minute choice, overall  its "ok". Breakfast is simple but better then just coffee. Our bathroom had ants, and we were giving a can of raid spray! The shower is great if your less then 5 foot tall. I guess if I was broke and needed a place to sleep, shower and grab something to eat before heading off to Disney, I would stay here..I guess. There is a bus pick up to Disney but you have to have exact change..we didnt and the hotel does  not sell bus tickets, so we walked..not good you if you have kids. But good work out for adults.
Manager Response: It is great to know we fit into your budget. We are thankful for the review. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We chose this motel based on it's "close" location to Disneyland and it's "warm" breakfast each morning (I called and was told the breakfast had waffles and biscuits & sausage gravy and more). We arrived not expecting the room to be wonderful so weren't disappointed... pretty standard room although it did NOT have a refrigerator which we've come to expect these days. The beds made both my and my husband's backs hurt which was frustrating since they seemed comfy enough when we layed down. The bathtub floor was stained and although the water pressure was good the water went from hot to cold and back on the busier days (Thursday-Saturday) which was super annoying. When we went to breakfast the first morning they only had cereal (raisin bran & frosted flakes all 8 days we were
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We do appreciate your feed back. We look forward to seeing you again. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay on a Disneyland trip
Summary: The location of this hotel is perfect for visiting Disneyland.  The pool and hot tub are very nice and the continental breakfast is good and saves you a lot of money!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's great to know you found us convienent. We do look forward to seeing you again when you are in the area.

Summary: Good location for concert and right next to bubba gumps. people upstairs a little loud so need a downstairs room.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Only used the hotel for an quick 2 night stay.  Did not use the pool or spa.  The hotel was clean and had plenty of towels.  Easy walk to Disneyland and across the street from the convention center. Would use the hotel again for a budget stay at Disneyland.  We could see the fireworks from Disneyland from the back of the property.
Manager Response: It is great to know we fit into your budget. We appreciate the review and look forward to your return.

Summary: everything was great.  the only problem we had was with making the reservation we were transferred to a dishonest company named shoppers advantage.  this really surprised me and i have canceled my ccard due to this company and i'm reporting them to authorities.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We appreciate your input. We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Very Clean and Convenient Budget Hotel
Summary: We checked in Super 8 well after 11:00 PM after a long drive. We were coming to Disneyland for the Halloween Party. The clerk was pleasant and almost seemed to have everything waiting there for my arrival. It went quick and we were in our 2 rooms in less then 5 minutes. The rooms were adjoining which was very convenient. The rooms were good size and very clean. The beds are comfortable, nice tv's. There is a small coffee pot in the room, you can request a microwave and minifrige in your room. If you need an iron and ironing board you will need to check it our from the front desk, but you can keep it in your room for the duration of your stay. The location is great the walk is not bad at all maybe 10 minutes and we did it 2 days in a row with an 8 year old and a 4 year old no
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is great to know we fit into your budget. We look forward to your return. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Not good!!! Just like others Super 8
Summary: Good location. 3 blocks from Disneyland. Next door from a Bubba Gump. But is a Super 8 so you have to expecting nothing!!! Not clean!!! But ok for the price and location.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again.

Summary: All nicely remodeled rooms, relaxing hot tub and pool, large expanded breakfast area, superb location for you Disneylandittes, and just a block from the Cheesecake Factory. What more could you ask for?
Manager Response: So great to know you found us affordable and that we fit into your budget. We do look forward to your return. Thanks for the review!

Summary: My husband's 6th stay and now my 5th at the Super 8 on West Katella. After our stay last year I was planning on staying somewhere else but after seeing improvements to the place decided to stay here again and glad we did. Last time I was concerned the place was getting a bit old and needed an overhaul. This time the room was great. flat screen tv (with working channels!) and fresh beds. For the price you really cannot beat it. Great for location being so close to Anaheim GardenWalk for restaurants and an easy 15 minute walk to Disney but also great with the mini mart, 7 eleven and Subway, pizza etc only 2 minutes away. The breakfast room has been improved plus a few more selections. The muffins, doughnuts still seem a little stale but that is fine as we just had cereal anyway.
Manager Response: So great to know you will highly recommend us. We are happy you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Have stayed at this motel on 3 occasions and have always found the facilities very good. Rooms clean and spacious, shuttle bus to nearby disneyland(tho is in walking distance),complimentary breakfast, launderette and nice and handy for local reataurants (Bubba Gumps) and fantastic outdoor mall.Worth a return visit and free parking is a bonus as Disneyland approx 15 min walk away.
Manager Response: Its so great to know you had a nice comfortable stay. We look forward to your return. Thanks for the review!

Summary Heading: great time was had by all
Summary: the customer service was the best ever.   They did a wonderful job.  the front desk people were very helpful, good people.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear you had a great time. Thanks for the review. We look forward to your return

Summary Heading: Bad Customer Service at the hotel
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights, on the second night, our room key was not working so I went to the front desk and spoke to the guy sitting there, he tried many other ways to open our room, but he can't and he said he was not able to call the maintenance guy to open our room, and he said he cant do anything for that night, only giving us another room, he told this in a rude manner. He gave us another room and next day morning maintenace guy opened the other room, and he said why we didn't call him last night, that he lives in front of the hotel. I hate the guy at the front desk at night, he is rude and he doesnt want to do anything.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Too much Police activity for us
Summary: We stayed at Super8 twice in 8 months.  Both times the staff were less than helpful and both times the rooms were so dirty (floors in particular) that we had to were shoes in the room.  Our first trip on May 2011 we didn't have much expectation of the place based on the price.  We did expect a fridge, which is what I thought I saw on the website.  No fridge, no ice machines in working order, and the police were there almost every night dealing with the staff and guests both!  They did accomodate our early arrival and check us in at 10:30am.  We got a big room too!  It was a handicapped room which we were told we may have to move from if they needed the room for someone in a wheelchair.  That was fine, but my tall husband had some trouble with everything being so short.  Beds are
Manager Response: none

Summary: Before I begin, I would like to state that I have stayed in several budget hotels including other Super 8s in the past and am extremely disappointed in this hotel.    We are still staying here because there are no other hotels available until Monday.  If there was, even if it was more expensive I would have moved.    I booked here because it had a pool and hot tub,  the price was reasonable(not cheap), it offered a continental breakfast, supposedly there were room safes, it was walking distance to Disneyland and the trip advisor reviews were good, Well, it IS in walking distance of Disneyland. Contrary to the reviews I read, our experience was quite different.     Day 1: We arrived in the evening and we saw people in the pool.  Checked in; were not favourably impressed by the
Manager Response: none

Summary: close to disney rooms were clean beds nice but too much street noise typical LA although i would stay again for the value and walk to disney  1 block
Manager Response: none

Summary: The water pressure was horrible in our room. It smelled like smoke very bad. The television cable reception was awful! We could not even watch some channels. We will never stay at this hotel again. We had no access to an outlet to plug in our electronics. There was no table in the room to eat at. The complimentary breakfast in the mornings was sad. There was nothing th choose from but a muffin & doughnut. The wifi connect was poor.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We do appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again in the future. Please dont hesitate to call me directly regarding this review at 714-778-6900.

Summary: I was going to stay at the Super 8 for five nights. That is, until I checked in and found out that they did not have a refrigerator or microwave (two items that I really, really like to have). So, I only stayed a night. Staff was friendly. Pool and hot tub were clean. Rooms were clean and I liked having lots of pillows.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review, thanks so much. We do have microwaves and fridges available upon request at the front desk. We do hope to see you again in the future. Thanks again for your feedback and the review.

Summary: The room was big, and clean.  Staff was very helpful regarding local transportation and Disneyland tickets.  The showerhead is really low, but everything else was really nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate your feedback. We do look forward to seeing you again. It's great to know you had a good time. Thanks again for the review!

Summary: We stayed here because we were going to Disneyland and California Adventure and it's really easy to get there because it's near. My friends recommended this hotel and I'm very satisfied about it cause we were only there at night. The only thing we didn't like is the ''continental breakfast'' coffee was horrible and no strawberry jelly.  Other than that I would definitely stay at super 8 next time I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is nice to know you had a great time when staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel for many years, the managerment are the best.  The hotel is in walking distance of the park or the bus is available nearby.  continental breakfast does not have a large variety, not has it changed in a long time.  The drinks are okay, but the same kind of donuts is boring.  The rooms are clean, the beds are comfortably with lots of pillows.  Ac works great.  Nice flat screen tv's, not a lot of channel choices, and reception at times is poor.  Internet was great.  Bathrooms were clean, plenty of towels, But the water in the shower is hard to adjust.  Overall for the pricing not bad at all
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We love it when families come to visit. I am glad you enjoyed your stay. Thanks again for the great review and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights with family. We requested connecting rooms and the staff met our request. Rooms were big and very clean, no bugs or trash on floor. Housekeeping did a great job as well. A/C kept the room very cool and always hot water for morning showers. Breakfast consisted of muffins, toast and donuts. Basic but did the job. Staff always friendly. The location was great walking over to Disneyland and a very short walk to Cheesecake Factory. We would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: It is good to know you had a great stay! We want to thank you for the review. We always look forward to seeing our repeat guests. Thanks again for the review!

Summary: Hotel needs an update.  They were unable to have a first floor room available as requested and without an elevator, it was difficult to climb to the rooms with a disability.  Complimentary breakfast was so bad that after first day I went out to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and your feedback. We  appreciate you taking the time to give us a review. We hope to see you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: The service is excellent the room I got was quiet from now on I am staying here.It would be nice if the rooms have microwaves and irons. Thank You for everything ;)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review, We do appreciate your feedback. We do have microwaves and fridges as well as irons and ironing boards available at the front desk upon request. Thanks for a super review and we hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This place provided a relatively decent stay. The hotel is clean, quiet, reasonably priced. The pool and hot tub were enjoyable. We used a terace above the enterance for eating supper ( nice view from there). Loved the proximity to Garden mall aand restaurants. Internet barely usable :( , would not stay here as a business guest. Also, breakfast was miserable, could improve it a bit. For $58 a night was worth staying there but for $100 there are better places around
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay while visitiing Disneyland. We look foward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Best value in area. Really clean and great staff.
Summary: Would totally recommend. Very clean rooms. Nice staff. Walked to Disney Land. Best value in the area. Will stay again and again and again and again and again and again. again and again and again and again and again. again and again and again and again and again. again and again and again and again and again. again and again and again and again and again.
Manager Response: LOVE the review! Thank you so much for your great review. We look forward to seeing you again again again and again! :-) thanks again for the review!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: I will start with the positives, which are, it's close to Disneyland. Now that the positives are done lets move on.   This place is cheap. Not only in their prices but the service and everything else. Like others have said, their is an ant problem. Why they don't fix it, who knows.   The breakfast is crap. Old stale muffins toast and stale cereal. There was nothing edible about the food.   Clean?  Not even close. There was a band aid on the pool deck for 3 days. Awesome. There were water stains on the floor in the bathroom. The Sheetrock in the bathroom was cracked and falling apart. There were what one can only assume were poop stains on the bathroom towels.   Service:  note to the manager. When you nickel and dime people there is. Itching that will make them want to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I appreciate you taking the time to give us a review.

Summary: Everything met our expectations.  Would certainly stay again.  However we did not seem to have very much hot water for the shower.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback! Its great to know you will be returning to see us again. Thanks so much for the review.

Summary: Just got back from a 3 night stay. Have to say everything went smoothly. Excellent location, clean rooms, loved the pool. Front desk was friendly and helpful. If you're looking to stay somewhere close to the park and not spend an arm and a leg this is a very comfortable, affordable and convenient location. Parking is included, plenty of restaurants around, free wi-fi (somewhat flakey). Always felt safe and secure walking around in the evenings. Comfy beds with lots of pillows.   This was my second stay here and I will consider it again in the future.  We had a great trip with my 4yr old son and girlfriend. And he made new friends at the pool.   My son thinks Mickey & Goofy cleaned our room and made up our beds while we were at Disneyland.   A few cons: ants in the bathroom, car
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's great to hear you found us so affordable! We appreciate you taking the time to give us such a nice review. We look forward to seeing  you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This hotel was great. It was in a great location - within easy walking distance to Disneyland. VERY comfortable large beds and pillows, lovely clean room (although had an ant problem while we were there). Basic, but OK breakfast (Cerel, Toast, Donuts and muffins, juice and coffee). Excellent, very helpful staff - even printed out directions for us to find places we were looking for - really well prepared and accommodating. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Its so great to know you found us a great place to stay with your family. Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: hotel was average. good value for what we paid. would have liked a better breakfast as my family ended up not liking the cheap food, causing us to go out and purchase breakfast each morning.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review, we do appreciate your feedback. It's great to know you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing  you again!

Summary: The desk service was great and the rooms were clean however the shower curtains and covers are a little old and discolored which may make them look a little dirty.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is great to hear you found we fit into your budget and you had a comfortable stay. We appreciate you taking the time go give us a review and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: appreciate all - thanks  keep more ticket supply available for Disneyland - as you'd run out while we were there  suggest TV info guide for room- as no idea what was on TV
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback. Its true our Disneyland tickets are very popular! Its great to know you enjoyed your visit with us. We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: we would stay again!  Thank you
Summary: We had a good stay   Continental Breakfast was bare; oatmeal packets might be nice and easy or a change up on the plain donuts!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Its great to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback on your stay. Thanks again for the great review and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This was a great place to stay. The kids loved it. The wife loved it. That means dad was happy when the family is happy. The rooms were big enough to handle 2 adults and 2 children, one of which was in a pack-n-play. I will return to the Super 8 next time I am visiting Disneyland.   Our only small complaint was the complimentary breakfast. It was in a very cramped space to get in and maneuver out. If you are planning to take advantage of the breakfast, send a runner and eat in your room. Especially if you have a group of 4 or more.   Other than that, this was a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review!  We do look forward to your returning to stay with us. Its always great to hear from repeat customers. Thanks again for the great review and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: It was as good as I last remembered it being.
Summary: When returning to Anaheim in October 2012 to stay here, I actually requested to my travel agent that I wanted to stay here again as I had a really good guest experience when I first visited this property in 2006. Well my most recent stay was again as good as the first, I remember the reception area being decorated with all Australian decorations and souvenirs, when I returned it was good to see them still all hanging on the walls, I suggest they have some pictures of our landmark cities or the national flag, thank you super 8 it made me feel right back at home.  The Location is very ideal it‚Äôs only a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and Disney California, there are many dining options more the franchise chains if you don‚Äôt mind them from Bubba Gump and Shrimp, Cheesecake Factory,
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! It is always great to hear from repeat customers. It is great to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: I choose this place because several reviews said the place was clean and we wanted to be in walking distance of Disney. But this place was NOT clean. I got an eye infection sleeping here. The non-smoking room had a hint of cigarette smoke blended with every air freshener. When I asked for a new towel, the maid used her toilet cleaning gloved hand to grab a towel for me. The bathroom is really small. Garbage trucks come at 7 AM in the morning making much noise. The rooms next to the Garden Walk's parking lot get a lot of noise. WiFi in the room is intermittently weak.  The only thing this place has going for it is being near Disney.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. If we can assist you further please contact me directly at 714-778-6900. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: This establishment was inexpensive and close to Disneyland. The breakfast was too basic, cereal, donuts, toast and juice. This was a very affordable place but you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. It is good to hear we fit into your budget and you found us affordable and a conveinent place to stay when visiting the Anaheim area. We look forward to your next visit when you are in the Disneyland area. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: No refunds or cancellation if you book online.
Summary: I was unable to keep my reservation.  I explained my situation to the representative and he was unable to help me.  He said he could not cance, modify, and could not even give me a credit for future use.  What a rip off.  I called 3 days in advance, sufficient notice and they would not consider the customer.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We do appreciate your feedback. There are promotional rates that are booked online that are a Non Cancelable Non Refundable rate because of the discount that is given. Please be advised when booking online that there are such rates available and that these reservations are clearly stated that they will be non refundable and non cancelable once booked. Again, we appreciate your feedback and want to thank you for your review. Any further questions please call us at 714-778-6900 and ask for me directly.

Summary: Its not a five star hotel but a great economy stay that is close to food and entertainment on a budget.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. Its so nice to know we fit into your budget and you found us so convienent. We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The beds where a little uncomfortable and you need to have frig and micro in all the rooms. It was very frustrating to have left overs and not be able to take it with us.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We appreciate you feedback. We do have fridges and microwaves available upon request for a small additional fee. Please inquire at the front desk next time you are visiting us. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: should have fridges in the rooms and tell the guest when they get one they are going to be charged. ok for the price
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do have fridges as you say upon request for a small additional fee, as well as microwaves. Thank you so much for your feedback. It will be a pleasure to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: I was pleasantly greeted and had a clean room that was well maintained. for being so close to Disneyland (7 min walk) this hotel has a good price and amenities.
Manager Response: It is so great to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your review. Its always great to hear from satisfied customers. Thanks again for the great review, we are looking forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Ok if you are searching for value hotel
Summary: For the value, an ok hotel.  Close to Disney and staff was helpful.  The breakfast was nothing healthy.  No fruit and only white bread and plain donuts and a few cereals.  Room had a weird smell in it.  Nothing fancy but confortable for short stay.
Manager Response: Thank for your review and your feedback. We appreciate your feedback. Our breakfast is being enhanced with additions such as fruit and hot waffles. We hope to see you again in the future when you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary Heading: good place, I would surely stay again
Summary: to the point, good place, decently clean, very close to Disney (easy walk) , break fast available, free parking, nice comfy beds. surely not luxury but I would say sure comfort. I must say our entire family slept very well  all 5 nights during our stay there. I would surely recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback and look forward to your return!

Summary: Overall excellent.  Breakfast crowd was overwhelming.  They need need to maybe extend breakfast hours to 10 because when they closed at 9 am there was still tons of people trying to get food ( crowded lines etc. )  Peter the manager was awesome.  The maid though tried to steal my sandals.  About an hour after checking out, I was still in the area and realized my sandals were still in the room.  When I went back to get them, they had magically disappeared from the room.  When I insisted I knew exactly where they were in the room, the maid rushed to the room to beat us there and stashed them way under the bed instead of where I left them in front of the bed.  And believe me, I know they didn't get shoved under the bed.  It was pretty obvious.  Just put stuff in lost and found
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here 2 years in a row and will be staying here again next year.  They realy know how to look after there guests here the sheets are changed and rooms cleaned each day.  The breakfast is not to bad either.  Do consider this place if you are traveling to Anaheim it's not to far from Disneyland just a couple of blocks and its great value for money.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review, it is good to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We are very close to Disneyland this is true, making it very convenient to stay here. We look forward to your return!

Summary: I'm really huge on customer service, being that its what I do for a living. I planned  on staying here for my trip on 10/1-10/3 to go to Disneyland. I was a little concerned with having to pay for parking each day at the parks, but the very friendly staff at the front desk so politely told me I could drop off my car my check in day :). When I went to check with the front desk to make sure it was okay before I headed off to Disneyland, the awesome check in clerk mentioned she had a room available if I wanted to check in early. I was overly thrilled and thankful being that it was 105 degrees and was worried about my laptop and ipad overheating in the car.  I have to say, I was a tiny bit bummed about there not being a mini fridge or microwave in the room but honestly I was just
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! It is good to know you had a good experience when staying here. We are pleased to know that our service was satisfactory. We do look forward to seeing you again. Thanks again for the awesome review!

Summary: This was the 3rd time we stayed at this Super 8 and it is consistently good service, clean rooms and nice breakfast choices. We arrived early so we had to wait two hours to check in so we decided to walk down the sidewalk to a restaurant and grab a bite to eat. We got back to the hotel within an hour and the attendant greeted us letting us know our room was ready. Super customer service! We will always stay with Super 8 Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review! It is always great to hear from repeat customers. It is good to know you love staying here. We appreciate you taking the time to give us such a great review. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: My friend and I stayed at the Super 8 in 2009 for my birthday. I honestly picked it cause it was the cheapest deal I could find and since we were going to Disneyland, I didn't expect or car if it had more than a bed and a bathroom.  The room was super clean and there was a 24 hour desk open so we got into our room in the middle of the night just fine. Upon our arrival we were greeted with a romance novel for keeps, a bag of mocha M&M's,and some traveling amenities (mini pepto-bismol, advil, etc) which was all sitting on our bed waiting for our arrival, what a treat! We also could see the fireworks at Disneyland from our window, it was great that we could see it from there after a tiring day :) This hotel gets 5/5!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! It is great to know you found us so accomdating and met all your needs while visiting here in Anaheim. We are looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: Nothing else i want or need
Summary: great place to stay, rooms are clean, staff are more than friendly and extremely   helpfull only 10 min walk to disneyland what more coyld you want and at the price it gets a 5/5 and would stay there again in a heartbeat
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. It is great to know we satisfied your needs and accomodations. It is always great to hear from our guests. We look forward to your return!

Summary: location good, room size good, The only thing the air condition didn't work. It was in the 80 this week, so quite uncomfortable to sleep.  I set it at 76 and turned the fan up to high, it never got cool, woke up hot. The service was good checking in and out, only problem the room was much too warn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Used this motel as our base while we explored local theme parks It was great for our purpose Big, clean & tidy rooms Good parking Great little pool for the kids Free breakfast, ok so it was only coffee & muffins, but hey, enough to start the day with Great location for Disney People, walking distance to the parks
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to know you found our location convienent and that we fit well into your budget. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Wow!  Cheap does not mean nasty!
Summary: We booked a room with two queen sized beds through orbitz & paid $55 per night (staying mid-week, less tax).  We weren't expecting a lot for the price, but were blown away at how much we got for such a cheap price: Free parking, free continental breakfast (cereal, muffins, donuts, juice, coffee), outdoor swimming pool and hot tub,large super clean rooms, comfy beds, flat screen TV and a pleasant 20 minute walk to Disneyland.   Even though there were people on either side of us, we enjoyed a very quiet and peaceful stay.  There are plenty of good  eating places within very short walking distance.   The managers of this motel obviously have high standards as we could not fault the cleaniness of our room or the general motel surroundings.   We would definitely stay here again...a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. We appreciate hearing you find us a great place to stay and affordable. We look forard to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: In brief: Great location for the price, friendly staff, secure premises, clean and large room, would stay here again without hesitation. On a budget? this is a great choice!  In detail:  We were there for a couple of nights for a visit to Disneyland and let me tell you that it was a very good choice. It is within walking distance to Disney's main gate (10-15 minute walk), free parking on the hotel and for me the free wi-fi Internet was a big plus.  Hotel's staff is the best, they all were very helpful, courteous and friendly. At night there was a policeman (or at least he looked like one) always on watch near the lobby, so that gave us more confidence.  The premises have laundry self-service for those who need it, we didn't use it but it was nice to know it was available.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. It is good to know you found us affordable and a great value. Its also great to know you enjoyed your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit with us next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: We arrived around midday, and were able to check in early, before dropping off our rental car.  This place is about a 20 minute walk from Disneyland, and it has a plethora of dining options within 10 minutes of walking (IHOP, Pizza, Chinese, Subway etc). It's also right next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk shopping complex.  Breakfast was nothing special, just cereal, toast and donuts, but it was OK. Pool was nice and refreshing late in the afternoon.  For the price, and the location, I'd definitely stay here again. Just don't expect the Hilton.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to know we fit into your budget and you had a great stay with us. We are located very close to the park and nearby dining establishments making it very convienent. Thanks again for the great review. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We were in town for the Get Fit Festival 5k(Sun) at Angels Stadium and wanted to escape the Heat(103-degrees both Fri & Sat) of Los Angeles. Took in a movie at the GardenWalk next door prior to Check-In.  Check-In was a breeze. Got to our Room 179 in the rear of complex, got to park our car directly in front of our room. Open the door, Fired-Up the A/C to Max Cool, the room got Cold in a Hurry to our delight, due to it was 95-degree outside at 3:30pm.  Put our things down and noticed a Microwave Oven sitting on top of a Mini-Fridge, this was not advertised, so this was a Bonus, I had brought down an Igloo Playmate cooler to keep our drinks, Cold, but Very Surprised the Micro/Fridge was in our King Room. Our room was Large and Very Clean!! Bed had 5-pillows, nice desk for writing
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It is great to hear we exceeded your expectations! We always appreciate it when a guest lets us know how things are going and how their stay was. Again we thank you for the review and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Exactly what we wanted for the price!
Summary: I first must mention that Ron checked us in and we LOVED him. We had driven 6hrs from the bay area, we were tired and hungry, and he was such a breath of fresh air. He joked and made us laugh during check in and my friend decided to go ahead and purchase her 3-day park hopper ticket right then from him. I know the manager checks these reviews, so please pat him on the back and say great job! And give him an extra day off to go ride his motorcycle! :-) As a travel agent, I more than appreciate the hospitality and warmness of the staff. It makes a huge difference!  Seconds after putting our stuff down, we walked the 20 yards to Bubba Gump's (YUMMM) and stuffed ourselves. I can't say anything about the walk to Disneyland because I use my annual pass to park for free at the park :-)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the fantastic review!  It is good to hear that you had a great time when staying with us. We appreciate you feedback as well. We look forward to your next visit with us next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: To summarize..clean, basic, comfortable and near Disneyland..this the place to stay..
Summary: Hotel  1.Basic, room clean n upgraded,service was friendly n welcoming 2. Complementary breakfast - dont expect world's best but enough to get you going...especially the friendly staff manning the breakfast area always with a ready smile..thats make the difference. 3. Laundry room - closed at 10pm 4. Maintenace crew was efficient to fix our TV always there to help. 5. Peaceful sleep..1st n 2nd floor no difference. 6. Free Wifi was a pluss. 7. internet n printing service at hotel reception. 8. Swimming Pool - ok ok lah Hotel Location. 1. 15mins walk to Disneyland 2. 5  mins from decent cafe n pizza place and 7-11 just around the corner. 3. The Garden Walk just next door for bowling, movie and pubs. 4. The Cheese Cake Factory - Awesome!!  5. The Block at Orange for shopping -
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the great review! It is always great to hear feedback from our guests. We appreciate you taking the time to review us. We look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: Decent hotel for the price. Don't expect too much. We had no trouble walking to Disneyland from here. Very basic hotel. Reasonably clean. Complimentary breakfast was very simple. Good choice if you dont need a good hotel.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear we fit into your budget and found staying here convenient to your needs. We appreciate you feedback and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The room we stayed in was beautiful and clean.  It was much more than I expected from a Super 8.  We were just a short walk away from Disneyland.  The only downside was the breakfast.  It was just muffins, somewhat stale donuts, coffee, milk, and juice.  My daughter and I had a great stay and a wonderful trip to Disneyland.  Though you are only staying in a hotel for a few hours, it makes a difference in the memories of the trip and this was definately a plus.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Its is good to know you found staying here was convenient. We do have a great location, very close to the park as well as other places to dine and shop. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: A 10 minute walk just around the corner from Disneyland main entrance, this hotel (motel style) is in a great location.  I had a ground floor room at the back (room 152).  It was very quiet, and I could see the Disney fireworks at night.  The room had a comfortable bed, television, air-conditioning, and had reasonable space.
