The bathroom had a good shower inside the bath.  The sink was in the main living area. There is no fridge or safe.  There is a small coffeemaker. The room was clean, but very, very basic.  The free breakfast consisted of cereal, muffins, croissants and toast.  There is nothing fancy or luxurious about this hotel, but it provides cheap, convenient accommodation close to disneyland.  On the corner, between the hotel and Disneyland is a small supermarket, a
Manager Response: Thank you fo much for the review! We do have microwaves and fridges available if you request at the front desk, as well as other amenities. We are glad you had a great time when staying here. We hope to see you again when you are visiting Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Not in Aniheim to spend time in the hotel
Summary: We found the Super 8 at this location great. Make sure its this one and not the Super 8 on Disneyland drive, apparently its not as nice and its further to walk. Rooms are clean and have all you really need except a fridge but we just used the ice bucket and free ice. Great walking distance to Disney. and for what you pay and your location, Zero complaints. there is a 7-11 just up the road where we would buy or water and snacks for the day from and the first night we were there we spent in at the Garden walk at Bubba Gump, and once again walking distance from the motel.  Free Wi-fi is avaliable and even if you dont want to stay at the park for the fireworks(crazy if you miss them though) there is a little pation on the second floor that will still alow you to get a good view,.
Manager Response: thanks for the review! We do have free wifi throughout the building, which makes it nice while travleing. We have free parking as well. Such amenities makes for an affordable vacation! Thanks again for the review, we look foward to seeing you again.

Summary: Beds are comfortable, pillows are perfect, room was basic but clean.  They placed us away from other rooms to avoid noise since they weren't full that week.  Only comment would be we would have liked some fruit for breakfast.
Manager Response: It is good to hear yoiu had a great stay. We have recently upgraded out rooms, It is good to know you found the room so comfortable. We look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed in two rooms on the first floor over the weekend.  We were very pleased with the rooms.  They were very clean, and the beds were comfortable.  We arrived at 6:30 AM and obviously were not able to get into our rooms yet, but we wanted to spend the day at Disneyland.  First of all, they suggested that we have breakfast there.  I thought that was very nice, since we hadn't stayed there the night before.  They have plenty of parking, and they allowed us to park the rest of the day after we'd checked out.  The staff was friendly and accomodating.  The continental breakfast was very limited.  There were mufins, doughnuts, cereal, coffee, milk.  I'm not big on breakfast, and so I didn't eat there.  There may have been toast too.  The walk to Disneyland wasn't bad.  It took us
Manager Response: We appreciate the great review! It is always good to hear from our guests. We are very happy to know you had a great stay. We look forward to seeing you again when you are back in the Disneyland area.

Summary Heading: We chose for the location and price
Summary: We have stayed at Super 8's around the USA, and since we just needed a place to sleep after visiting Disneyland and California Adventures parks, we really weren't expecting much. Boy, we were pleasantly surprised!   First, it was much larger than we thought, We were given a room way to the back of the "horseshoe" shaped facility, and were worried about the noise as it was close to the laundry and housekeeping office. Not to worry. We commented on how quiet it was that night - - no one slamming doors, no talking in front of the windows - - we slept great! The beds were very comfortable  - - I only wished I had checked to see what mattresses they were!  The short walk (10-15 min) to the theme parks was manageable, our 5-year-old grandson had no trouble with it (although he did
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! It is good to hear you had a great experience when staying with us. It is true we are just minutes from Disneyland Park as well as several other places to shop and dine. It is also great to hear that we fit into your budget when traveling on vacation. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed here from July 19 for 4 nights, with our purpose for staying here purely to do Disneyland.  The location of this property is fantastic, approx 10-12 minute walk to both Disneyland & California Adventure Park.  It is also located within 100m of a number of eateries (Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza, Bubba Gumps).  There is a 7 eleven 2 minute walk down the street also.  We had a unit at the back of the complex which was quiet and had been renovated with new carpet etc.  Bed was comfy and linen was new.  The unit was very clean with the coffee machine being a bonus.   Swimming pool was great and the staff helped with booking info. The only reason why we can't give this a 5 is the breakfast is very basic, although sufficient for a kick start to the day.  Would most
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review!  It's great to hear you will be back to stay with us next time you are in the Anaheim area. It's true we are very close to several places to dine and shop. It makes for a carefree stay. We also have free parking, so you can leave your car here and it's only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We took a last minute trip to the US so accommodation was fairly pricey as it was school holiday season.  I booked this on recommendation by a friend.  It is a budget option, and everything extra you need to pay for.  They were very helpful when we asked for a fridge, microwave and pull out bed (as we were traveling with our 3yo). From memory I think it was around $18 a day for these extras.    It is very close to Disney and an easy walk.  It is also central to the shops and has easy freeway access.    Unfortunately we were put in the second floor which meant we had to carry our sleeping son up and down the stairs in his stroller (I didn't see any lift access).   The wifi is fairly temperamental so I wouldn't recommend relying on this - McDonalds, iHop and Dennys isn't far and
Manager Response: We appreciate the review!  It is great to hear you had a wonderful time when staying with us. It's true we are walking distance to many of the stores and dining choices in the area. We are also minutes from the Disneyland park. Just  a 10 minute walk and you are there. Once again, thanks for the review, we look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: This was my 5th stay at Super8 - and as always I was greeted by the friendly staff, I got there early but my room was already ready. I stayed in the same room last year - and I noticed the room had been updated since I was last there. As I am from Australia and didn't take my phone - the front staff were always happy to call shuttles and taxis on my behalf. I haven't found a better hotel for the price. And I have read reviews about people complaining about the continental breakfast..... come on guys it's not like you"re paying for it! its free!!! and not enough seating??? well everytime I got the breakfast I would go sit upstairs above the driveway area - there is a whole eating area with tables and chairs. I guess I'm just used to paying over $100 a night for hotels here in
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is always great to hear from a repeat customer! We are glad that staying with us is always a great experience. You are right in saying there is an wonderful sundeck for having breakfast in the morning. It's also a great place to watch fireworks at night. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to your return!

Summary: What a hole. Looked good on here.  Where do I start. Room 246 Bathroom had plaster falling off the walls. We found a loose fish hook on our bathroom floor (we have a 4 year old) - took it to reception - heard nothing. Air con broke on the first day, no fridge in the room, a constant and unsightly mass of dirty bed linen on show outside the laundry, breakfast was terrible. I have nothing good to say about this place. I signed up to trip advisor just to save fellow travellers from it. If you ever take one piece of advice, take this one...'don't go to this motel, there are many better ones very close to Disney - but unfortunately, they were booked out. If there was a 0 star, the Super 8 in Anaheim would have it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Just a couple things regarding your review. We do have  refrigerators available at the front desk upon request. We also had no report of the Airconditioning not working in your room, nor any other maintenance request. Also, our breakfast is per Super 8 Brand Standards. If there are any questions regarding this review, please contact me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: A recent comment said there were bed bugs, I did not find any and the motel was clean and service friendly. It was an excellent location only 10-15 mins walk to Disney land entrance. Would certainly recommend it for a stop over and excellent value for money
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. We are glad you found the accomdations up to your standards and you had a great time. We cant wait to see you again next time you are in Anaheim!  Thanks again for the review.

Summary: We booked this hotel mainly because of the fair price and proximity to Disneyland. For the price, I don't think we could have possibly made a better choice! The rooms were very large and clean. The bedding looked updated, and the beds themselves were quite comfortable (important after being in the parks all day). We also found the pool and hot tub to be great. If I had one critique, it would be the breakfast. Don't expect much there (but what should you really expect when you are paying such a great price?). The walk to the parks wasn't terrible -- no worse than any other local hotel. I would most definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It is great to hear you had a great time when staying with us.  We look forward to your return! Its true we are very close to the Disneyland park as well as several places to shop and dine.

Summary: Room and beds clean, updated and maintained. The hotel was fully booked during our 3 nights, had no issues with parking or excessive noise.   And no issues with hot water as previous reviews mentioned.  Rooms are big. We didn't use the pool, it is on the smaller side, was always full and kinda murky (probably from all the use and suntan lotion). The laundry facilities were great. Breakfast was adequate. Yes, all carbs, but was enough to hold us over until lunch at Disney.  They do have a lady marking down room numbers, but we never felt we were ever being monitored as to what and how much we ate.  Get to the breakfast room kinda early as later in the morning the line is way out the door.   Our experience was great and we would book again.  Simple and clean for a great price!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you will be back! We are glad you had a great time and enjoyed your stay. Thanks so much for your review!

Summary Heading: Good value within walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: A typical Super 8 experience - standard clean comfortable room, free Wifi.  The best feature of this Super 8 is they are a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland parking structures (from there, the free Disney trains will take you to the park gates). Walking saved us $15 in parking fees per day.  Disneyland's nightly 9pm fireworks are visible from the balconies. Desk staff were very helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Bed bugs bit me all over
Summary: I went to Disneyland Anaheim on July 11 thru 13 and booked Super 8 because of the short distance to the parks. However, I was bit by bed bugs in my legs, arms and groin. Some of the bits in my leg turned to pyaemia. I sent a message to Super 8 relating what happened and all they made was including me in their spam distribution list.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. If there are any questions regarding this review, please contact me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: My fianc√© and I stayed at the Super 8 from 22-26th July while in Anaheim - could not have been more pleased with our stay.  The value for money is unparalleled as you are situated in an ideal spot beside the Anaheim Garden Walk (with restaurants, bowling, movie theatre etc.) and only a short walk to Disneyland. We found it quiet and our room was massive - totally unexpected. We also had a few extras thrown in as this is our wedding trip! Would definitely stay again as for the price we paid, the Super 8 was beyond our expectations!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again when you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: WHAT A GREAT PLACE TO STAY!
Summary: 4 hours on public transport, then 13 hours longhaul flight with no sleep from Brisbane, Qld Australia, arriving at LAX at 7am, then 2 hours to get to the motel, we were exhausted! Peter said, "You're room's ready, dump your bags and go to Disneyland, we've given you a room where you can watch the fireworks from the balcony."   And so began our 11 night stay at Super 8 Katella, my very first overseas trip, with my wife and 6 year old grand daughter. The holiday was a major event in our lives, the motel made it so much better. Perfectly clean room with 2 comfy queen beds, piles of clean towels in the bathroom, spotless white sheets, and staff who went out of their way to make sure 3 Aussies a long way from home relaxed and had a great time.   We'd suggest anyone staying here
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is great to hear you had a great time while staying with us. We look forward to your return. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Good hotel, nice owner, shame about the breakfast
Summary: Great location and good hotel for the advance price, just a shame that breakfast was a real scrum and little variety (toast, cereal and cakes - yoghourts and fruit would have been nice additions). Staff were very helpful when we wanted extra tea bags etc and we could leave our car there on the second day when we were at Disneyland and then travelling to the airport in the evening - much appreciated.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review, We appreciate the feedback. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Super 8 Motel at the park / convention center
Summary: The motel was fine, clean room and good beds. Free coffee making facilities and continental breakfast. Children under 17 stays free. Its about 20 mins walk to Disneyland and 5 mins walk to 7-Eleven. Anaheim Gardenwalk is just beside this motel. We stayed here for 3 days from 16 Nov 11 before departing to Las Vegas.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear you found our location so handy. We look foward to your next visit with us. Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: The hotel was fine, the staff were uninformed
Summary: The hotel was fine, good beds, clean rooms. Although, we aren't very picky when it comes to rooms. We're lenient.  The problem was the staff directed us to get to Disneyland the wrong way, they said the pedestrian entrance is the same as the vehicle entrance. Wrong! We wasted some time getting into the parking area because of this.  Anyway, we still got there early enough to get our Fast Pass to Cars. But the hotel staff, one particular girl, just didn't seem like she cared to help us get there properly.  Looking at the map provided by the hotel ...  Me: "Is the pedestrian entrance the same and the vehicle entrance?" Her: "Yes"  Not a very elaborate answer, and incorrect to boot.  We would only stay here again if the other hotels were sold out. We like higher levels of customer
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. I am glad you found our accomodations comfortable and that we met your needs while you were here. We hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: No microwave/fridge for higher price, just a paint job that makes it look like, 2 star!!
Summary: I could not believe that I paid $28 more per night to be a few minutes closer to Disneyland! Once we checked in we were told we had to shell out an extra $8 a piece to rent a fridge and microwave! That is $16 extra on top of the $28 and then the high taxes! Not worth paying the extra money. We are a family of 4 that have had annual Disneyland passes for 2 yrs now. The parking is included in our annual passes, which is a huge plus at $15 parking per day for everyone else. So staying at a cheaper hotel , with more electronics to offer at half the cost, is the better decision. Especially when you deserve to spend your money on yourself and not just getting to the fun. If you can drive 10-15 minutes to the theme parks,  it will save you hundreds and give you a taste of the best
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again when you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: I had booked my rooms for Tue and Wed over the 4th of July holiday back in May. My choice of hotel was based largely on the positive reviews I had seen here for this property. The room I had reserved was for two queen beds.   About a week prior to our arrival I decided to call and get an extra day (Monday) knowing full well that I would probably have to pay a larger fee if there was a room availble since it was so close to our check in date. I had no problem with this. I called and the agent I spoke to said there was no problem, Monday was all set. I even confirmed with him before getting off the phone of our days of stay, type of room, and charges. He assured me my original reservation was intact and the only extra charge was for Monday.  Imagine my surprise when I get the
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I would like to clarify a few things and explain things in a bit more detail. When you called to change your reservation and add an additional day, you did not call the Motel directly. You called the national Super 8 line. They did make errors when changing your reservation this is true. We recieved a call from customer care regarding the changes and mistakes that were made by the national reservation line. We adjusted the rates back to the original rates for you (from $129 back to $79) as well as added that additonal day for you. Due to occupancy we only had rooms with 1 bed available, however we accomodated you with a one bed room and added a rollaway. Our standard charge is $10 plus tax a day for a rollaway. You were here 3 nights, we only charged you for 1 (which you agreed to and paid for in cash) You have filed a case with Super 8 corporate customer care, it is not the motel that has not gotten back with you. We have not recieved a call from you directly.We are sorry about the reservation errors, however we have done our best to accomodate you, and would like the chance to discuss this with you.  If there are any questions regarding this review, please give me a call directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: This was a great hotel for families. The rooms are clean, staff are friendly and efficient. Walking distance to Disneyland is good approx 15 min for adults and probably closer to 20 min  with small children. Breakfast is basic but certainly adequate. For the price of the hotel you couldn't get better value with the size of the room and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  It is great to hear we fit into your vacation budget. Its true we are just minutes away from the Disneyland park as well as many near by dining establishments and shops. We do have free parking which is a great savings in itself. We have free continental breakfast as well as free wifi. All of this makes for a more affordable stay. Thanks again for the review, and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I used to stay at this Super 8 because it wasn't as pricey as the hotels immediately across the street from Disneyland and was still a walkable distance to the park, but never again.  The last two times I stayed there they had a problem with the boiler and no hot water.  They moved me to another room in the same building and I could have guessed the outcome, couldn't you?  Still no hot water.  The time a couple years before when we stayed here the hot water was cut off for an entire afternoon while they worked on it.  The free continental breakfast is very skimpy and they room they serve it in is microscopic....not nearly big enough for a complex the size of this motel.  A word of warning...don't try to grab some breakfast near the time it closes at 9 a.m. because everybody else
Manager Response: none

Summary: If your looking for a clean friendly  place to stay that is cheap for family's this is it.great location right next to good restaurants and shopping centre and 5 to 10 minutes to entrance to Disneyland . Rooms when good size and very clean. Basic breakfast included was great for my family.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It is true we do have a great location being so close to Disneyland and the nearby restaurants. Treat choices such as Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory, Tony Romas, and many other great places to dine are walking distance. It is good to hear you enjoyed our rooms and found them spacious and comfortable. We look foward to seeing you again when you are in Anaheim. Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: stayed for 2 weeks. value for money. near disney and attractions. only complaint is breakfast. will come again in future
Manager Response: We LOVE the title of your review! This is so true. We are so close to Disneyland. Just a 10 minute walk. It is great to hear that you had a great time while visiting during your two week stay to Anaheim. We always love to hear that our satisfied guests will be back. We look foward to your next visit with us! Thanks so much for the great review.

Summary Heading: They really need to rethink their breakfast area
Summary: Great location, good parking.  Rooms were really nice sized. The beds were really comfortable as well. Right next door to plenty of food and shopping and only a 10 min walk to Disney which was great.  We had MAJOR issues with the hot water, it was scalding hot on our first night and no matter what we tried we could not take a shower without burning our skin. Talked to the front desk and they worked on it, after that the water was barely lukewarm,but we decided to just deal with that, it was bearable.  Trying to get their breakfast is a joke, it is a small area with an oversized table, there is no rhyme or reason to the set up. The muffins we did manage to grab were not so great. We ended up going to 7-11 each night on the way home and picking up breakfast for the next day.  I
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is true we do have a great location for going to Disneyland as well as the many dining establishments in the area. We are just a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. It is great to hear you found our rooms spacious and comfortable. A great sleep in one of our wonderful beds cant be beat! Thank again for the great review, we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Super 8 and were pretty satisfied with our stay.  The rooms are clean and well-maintained.  The beds were comfortable.  And the swimming pool was not really big, but it was clean and the water was warm, but  the pool was pretty crowded.  A big negative feature for me is there isn't a mini-fridge in the room.  I like having a mini-fridge to put pop, juice, or other snacks in and it's a bummer not having one.  The other negative experience was the water temperature in the shower.  The water was mostly cold.  This Super 8 provides a free continental breakfast, but it's very basic.  Parking is free, so that's an added bonus.  This Super 8 is on Katella Ave. and is an easy walk to the Anaheim Convention Center.  We were there for VidCon which was held at the
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It is good to hear that you enjoyed yourself when you were here. We do have amenities free of charge such as free parking, free wifi, free continental breakfast all of which make for a more affordable stay. We do have microwaves and fridges available upon request for a small fee. Just check with the front desk and we will deliver it to your room right away. Our location is perfect for those attending a convention, or for those visiting Disneyland. Again, thanks for the great review, we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: stayed here 2 days in june 2012.. nice hotel and as pictured but..  The first afternoon we arrived, they were doing construction or remodling upstairs!  Had to call the front desk and ask them to cool it.  It is a 20 min walk to the parks and you can only walk or pay $3.00 shuttle fee per person.  Not cheap when there are 6 of you.  Also keep in mind the heat will kill you. 7 eleven and dinning options are good for this area.  Swimming pool and service at hotel excellent.  Breakfast a plus when your on the go to get to the park as soon as they open.  Next time i would probably stay closer to park. Overall nice stay.. kids had a blast and after all isnt that what counts?
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It is great to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub while you were here. It is nice after a long day at the park to be able to relax and enjoy the pool facilities. The ART shuttle is convenient. There are tickets available at a slightly lower cost when purchasing day passes and muli day tickets. This makes it a bit more affordable. Thanks again for the great review. We hope to see you next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: I wouldnt say it's short walk to Disneyland but for the price, it is quite worth your $.  The reception staff was friendly towards our needs and I do appreciate that.  Our room was located on the 2nd floor which I had to carry my luggage up as there were no elevators. Room was decent and clean, only had reservations about the carpet as it looked pretty old. Good to have your bedroom slippers around.  Breakfast was simple. Personally I would just go by iHop and get some warm breakfast.   I may choose a hotel nearer to Disneyland in future. Or try out Red lion hotel, the exterior of red lion was pretty impressive for me.  Missed Fantasmic's fireworks :(
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is good to hear you had a good rest while staying with us. We are a 10 minute walk to Disneyland from here. The ART shuttle also picks up right nearby for those who wish to take a shuttle. Our location is just around the corner from the park entrance. We have free parking, which is an added bonus for those who wish to park here and walk over. Again, we appreciate the review, and hope to see you the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: this was our third stay a this Super 8 motel, we had requested the same room that we had previously and the super efficient staff arranged this for us and had the room ready for us as we arrived on an early flight. the staff recognise us each visit and always make us feel welcome. the rooms are clean, non smoking.  Adequate breakfast is provided.  yes it is only 10 mins walk around the corner to Disneyland.  our rental car company is across the road which is handy. the disneyland fireworks can be seen from the rooftop balcony.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! It''s always nice to hear from our repeat guests. We are very close to Disneyland, and yes it is wonderful being able to see the fireworks from the sundeck here at the motel. The car rental is very close, as well as several great places to eat such as Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory, Tony Romas and several other great places to get a bite to eat. It's great to hear you love staying with us and we look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks again for the review.

Summary: I stayed at the Super 8 five nights for a conference. The room was clean and the bed firm enough to be comfortable, without being too hard. I slept very well on the mattress and pillows. My only complaint was the lack of plugs for charging electronics. I had a roommate for the conference, and we had to coordinate charging cell phones, a laptop, and a tablet, with the one electrical outlet for the hairdryer and coffee maker at the bathroom sink, in the few hours we had in the hotel room before bed and in the morning before each day's conference activities. The hotel did provide an extension cord, which we were hesitant to use for fear of blowing a fuse.  The shower head seemed a little low, even for a shorty like me, but I made it work. The hot water was hit or miss over the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! It is true we are walking distance to the Convention Center. It makes it nice just to be able to walk back and forth when here for a conference. We are also very close to several dining establishments such as Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory, Tony Romas and much more! We also have free wifi, free parking, as well as a complimentary breakfast. These extras make for an affordable stay! Thanks again for the review. We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Dirty room + Rude night staff= Sleepless night
Summary: As I entered the small reception area the night staff did not acknowledge the 3 other customers waiting. After waiting at least a half hour to be helped we found our room. The room was aweful. It had a dingy and disgusting feel about it. The tub was so flithy we showered with our flip flops on. Our sheets had dirty stains probably to match the stains on the carpet. The tv had bad reception all the advertiving pamphelts craming the room made it feel even cheaper than it was. Overall the room was filthy and the only saving grace was the sweet lady at check out she was helpful.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. I apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying.  Our goal is to not only meet the needs of each and every guest we serve, but to exceed your expectations to make your stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible. Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us.  Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property on a daily basis.  In addition, please know that your comments and issues will be addressed. It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you.  Again, I apologize for the inconvenience during your stay and hope to see you during your next visit. If I can provide any assistance, don't hesitate to contact me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: Very inexpensive hotel right next to Disney.  We just neede one night to finish our vaca and we were able to book this at the last minute with a great rate.  We were pleasantly surprised at the cleanliness of the room.  Looks like things had been recently updated.  They let us check in at 7 am even though our room wasn't ready yet so that we could park our car and go to Disneyland.  Very helpful employees and manager.  Don't expect fancy, but great place if you are going to be gone all day anyway.  We got a refrigerator and were able to have some food ready for a quick return to eat and freshen up before we were off again for the evening.  Breakfast is simple, so bring something else if you are avoiding carbs!  :). Pool was nice and clean.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! Its true we have recently upgraded out rooms and made some changes. It is good to hear you found your room clean and comfortable. Our amenities such as free wifi and complinentary breakfast as well as free parking are just a few things that make your stay with us so affordable. Our location to Disneyland is very helpful as well. We are only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland and the near by dining establishements. Thanks again for the great review, and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This is a decent budget property. Room was clean, everything worked. We just stayed one night, but got a good night's sleep. The location is very good, close to Disneyland. I'd recommend it for a budget place to stay that is close to the park. Nothing outstanding, nothing bad, totally average! They have slightly upgraded bedding.  Didn't bring the laptop, so not sure about wi-fi. Also, we didn't use the pool. Breakfast was the usual, cereal, coffee, etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Value for money and great location for Disneyland
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for three nights while visiting Disneyland and California Adventureland. The location is fantastic - its only a 10-15 min walk to the park gates and the Anaheim Garden Walk is right next door with plenty of restaurants to choose from. The room was clean and spacious. The breakfast each morning was simple - toast, cereal & muffins but filling. We also noticed the problem with the hot water but it seemed to be fine if you let it run for a little while, especially first thing in the morning. It was a little noisy each morning and evening as families left for or returned from Disneyland but we were so tired from our day it didn't really bother us too much. I would definitely stay here again. The location, room and breakfast really can't be beaten for the
Manager Response: It's so nice to hear you had a great stay with us and will be back! Our complimentary breakfast as well as other amenities that are free of charge make staying with us affordable. We have free parking, and free wifi as well. We are just a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, there is also the ART shuttle that picks up here every 20 minutes. We look forward to your next visit with us! Thank you so much for the review!

Summary Heading: A decent place to rest your head.
Summary: Stayed at this Hotel after our Disney cruise while experiencing Disney land.  Staff at the desk was very helpful, pool and hot tub were clean.  Rooms have large windows in them for lots of light but also let in quite a bit of noise.  Never heard our room neighbours but heard most of went on outside. (garbage truck and everyone getting up at 7 or 8am) to go to disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! It's so great to hear you enjoyed the heated pool and hot tub while you were here. It's so nice to enjoy after a day at Disneyland. It's true we are just a 10 minute walk to the park as well as very close to several dining establishments and places to shop. Thanks again for the great review, we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This is my third time in a year at this hotel. The price can not be beat. Comfy beds.  No frills but clean. Pool was very nice. Easy ten minute walk to Disneyland. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance. Only thing that would have me looking  for a new spot is the definite problem with hot water in shower.All three trips we had no hot water in shower. After mentioning it to front desk on first and  second visit they acted surprised but after seeing other reviews with the same problem i think they know there is a problem and just unwilling to fix it.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!  It is always great to hear from repeat customers. It is good to hear you find our beds comfortable. We know how important a good night sleep is. It's very true we are very close to many great places to eat and shop as well. We are also just a 10 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort. I am sorry for the problems you experienced with the hot water during your stay, please feel to contact me directly regarding your last visit with us. Again, thank you so much for the review, and we look forward to  your next visit with us.

Summary: For the price, I really can't complain to much. The pool and hot tub were decent. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were no different then any other hotel I've ever stayed in. The breakfast could of been better taste wise, but it least they had cereal and toast. The coffee sucked. Hot water in the shower was hit and miss. Somewhat close walk to Disney for older kids and adults, but for little kids, it may be a bit too far. However, the bus stop is right in front of the hotel next door and is well worth the price. Awesome resturants just down the street. If I went back to Disneyland, I would probably not stay here again, but it really wasn't too bad.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It is great to hear that  you enjoyed staying with us. We are doing an upgrade to our breakfast, and I am sure you will find it to your liking. We will have waffles and fresh fruit among other choices added to the menu. As you said we are walking distance to the park, but for those who wish to take the ART shuttle it picks up right next to us and comes every 20 minutes. We are also right next to the Garden Walk where you will find Bubba Gumps, the Cheesecake Factory and many other wonderful dining choices. We look foward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Writing this review while I'm relaxing in the room.  For the price of the rooms here this hotel is very good value.    Pros - Easy ten minute walk to Disneyland            Free wifi in rooms!!!  This is fantastic especially if you are from overseas and trying to stay in touch with loved ones.            Comfortable beds            Clean rooms            Fairly quiet location except for the fireworks at night but how can you complain when you can stand on the balcony and see them yourself.            I was allowed to check in early as the room was ready which was heaven after traveling all the way from Australia.  Cons - This for me was a really big one....basically everyday there has been no HOT water and I have been showering at different times of the day so it wasn't just in
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It is so nice to hear you enjoyed your visit when staying with us. Agreed the free wifi in the rooms is a plus when wanting to keep in touch with loved ones back home. It is good to hear you enjoyed watching the fireworks from your room. We also have a lovely deck just above the office that is a perfect spot for enjoying fireworks with your family. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Be forewarned: when booking to stay at any Super 8 online, you will get NO refund if you must modify and/or cancel a reservation. They WILL NOT budge on this and they're more than happy to tell you, the customer, how wrong you are. Oh, and the icing on the cake, the personnel continuously said "I'm sorry you feel that way." This was horrible customer service - telling a customer the "feel that way" part.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Super 8 does have  some online promotions which clearly state that the reservation is non refundable, non changeable. The rate on this type of reservation is generally 15 to 20 % off the standard rate for that day. There is an option to reserve a room online at the standard rate that does have our 24 hour cancelation policy. Please be aware of this and book your room accordingly on the web site. Thank you again for the review. We hope to see you sometime during your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Limited service is how Super 8 describes it's property. I needed a place close to the convention center that provided a place to sleep, shower. This place fit the bill. Room was plain but clean. No frills like an iron for my shirts. If you need a budget place to stay and don't need anything else this place works.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are glad to hear that staying with us fit into your budget. Amenities such as free wifi, complimentary breakfast, free parking  as well help to make your stay more affordable. We do have irons and ironing boards, microwaves and fridges available at the front desk per request. We are very close to the Convention Center, just a 5 minute walk from there, making it very easy to get to and from the convention you are attending. We look foward to your next visit with us! Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Single mom of 9 yr old twin girls. We stayed there for five nights. The room was clean, Disneyland is an easy ten min walk. The Gardenwalk is next door with PF Changs, Cheesecake Factory, and Bubba Gump. There is also a IHOP and Subway and 7-11 nearby. The staff is so nice and friendly. The shower is for short people and I would hate to be over 5'7 and have to shower there. The pool and hot tub are adequate. There was always hot water. The breakfast is orange juice and apple juice, muffins, small donuts, toast, raisin bran and fruit loops. I took my own oatmeal and warmed it up in the microwave. The seating area is very limited. Parking is free and adequate. I always found parking, there was always plenty of towels in the room, the AC and heater work fine. We returned to the
Manager Response: WOW such an awesome review! It's so great to know that you had a great vacation while staying with us. We are upgrading our breakfast choices and will soon have oatmeal availble as well as waffles and yogert and fruit choices. I think you will be happy with the new additions. Ana as well as our other staff have excelent customer service skills and are more than happy to assist in any way they can to make our guest's stay a great one. We look forward to your return, and thanks again for the great review.

Summary: This is the first time we "walked" to Disneyland from our hotel and it really wasn't too bad!  by the time you leave the park, walk to the parking shuttle, wait and scramble for a seat, locate your car by walking some more, negoitate traffic to the hotel without making illegal left hand turns and then try to find a parking space again...you could have as much time and energy invested as just walking the 10-15 minutes back.  We loved that the Super 8 was right next door to Garden Walk as it gave us a few more restaurants to choose from.  The room was clean and the staff very friendly and accomodating.  Our only criticism is with the breakfast.  It's called "Super Start" and the only real difference between that and the "traditional" continental breakfast is that there is cereal
Manager Response: We appreciate the review! It's true we do have an excelent location. Very close to the Disneyland Resort. In just a 10 minute walk you are at the park. We have free parking for our guest's so it makes it so affordable to stay with us and not worry about transportation or parking costs. We are upgrading our breakfast and it will include some additions such as oatmeal, fruit, yogert, and waffles. I think you will be pleased with the upgrade. We look forward to a return visit from you!  Thanks again for the review.

Summary Heading: Very good place to stay if you are in Anaheim!
Summary: I have stayed for 6 nights here at Super 8 and I must say that the rooms were nice and clean and location was fabulous for Disneyland, Anaheim Gardenwalk and just to get about all the touristic places.  Most importantly, fabulous customer service of the staff at Super 8 - they were very friendly and helped me to sort out tours. Thank you Super 8 for such a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you had a great time here. We are more than happy to assist our guests with tours or puchasing tickets. We take care of you while you are here to ensure you have the best experience while visiting us. We look forward to seeing you again. Thanks so much for the great review!

Summary: I love this place and I am never disappointed.  The rooms and overall property are always super clean.  The desk staff is always very friendly.  I have stayed many places surrounding Disneyland and this is the best deal.  This property truly is Super.
Manager Response: So nice to hear from you! We appreciate the review. It is always great to hear from our repeat customers. We hope you enjoyed the heated pool and hot tub while you were here. It's always a great place to relax and get some sun. We pride ourselves in excelent customer service, and it is always great to hear from our satisfied customers. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Stayed at the Super 8 during my trip to Disneyland for the 2012 Gumball Rally (we only finished in 26th place...But it was our first year)  I have stayed at this location before, and it is perfect for visiting the parks.  It is an easy walk in the morning and if you want to come back for an afternoon break, the perfect distance.  With Subway, pizza, chinese, and mexican a block away in one direction, and the upscale offerings of Gardenwalk next door the other direction, there are great options to spending and arm and a leg on park food.    here is a tip... Eat the FREE breakfast at the hotel.  For lunch, go to Fire and Ice on the upper level of Gardenwalk.  With the all you can eat, make your own mongolian grill, everyone gets what they want and the price is great.  Especially
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! You are right in saying we are a great location when visiting the Disneyland Resort. Within a 10 minute walk you are at the park. We are also located near several dining and shopping locations. We do offer a complimentary breakfast, as well as free parking and free internet. This makes your stay even more affordable. We look forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: My son and I stayed here with 2 of my granddaughters so we could spend extra time at Disneyland without the long drive home.  The hotel staff was very kind and helpful throughout the stay.  The room was clean, while the beds were comfortable.  The breakfast offerings were enough to keep us satisfied.  The walk to Disneyland was roughly 10 minutes. Nearby the is a Subway which is open 24 hours.  This was perfect for us to have a quality meal at a decent price. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Its great to hear from you and we appreciate you review! We are at a great location. Very close to Disneyland as well as several places to shop and dine. The Subway is among the several affordable places to have a quick bite here. Our complimentary breakfast as well as free parking, and free wifi are just  a few things that make your stay with us affordable. Its always great to hear our guests are satisfied and will be back. We look forward to your return!

Summary: This was a great hotel for the $$.  so close to disney and very neat and clean.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: So glad you had a great visit with us. We are very close to Disneyland this is true. Just a 10 minute walk. We are also very close to the nearby dining establishments and shops. We are also on the ART bus line for those who wish to catch the shuttle to the Disneyland gate. We have free parking, complimentary breakfast and a heated pool and hot tub. These are just a few amenities that make our guest's stay enjoyable and affordable. Thanks again for the great review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed here for two nights, at the very beginning of our vacation. Nice and decent motel, which is located a 10-15 minute walk from Disneyland and next door to the Garden Walk . The rooms were very basic but clean. Only downside was the shower, which didn't had any hot water coming out of it in the morning. However, we've enjoyed our stay and would definitely be coming back if we are ever in the area again!
Manager Response: I am glad to hear you found us affordable and such a great value. We offer free amenities such as free parking, free internet, complimentary breakfast, discounted tickets to Disney and other theme parks. We also offer combination tours to various places at a great rate!  All of this plus the location right next to Disneyland Park makes for great value for your money. We are happy to hear from you and look forward to your next visit with  us.

Summary: My husband and I are from Northern California but we have disneyland annual passes.  Because we spend all of our time over at Disney and not a lot of time at the hotel, we favor Super 8 and try to book there as much as possible.  I think we've stayed here about 8 or 9 times in the last two years, which should be an indication of their general overall amenities.   Their rooms are basic but clean.  They do have free parking for two vehicles per room. They have great rates, especially during the week.  They're right next to the garden walk and several restaurants (ranging from the subway, pizza and burger and chinese place on the corner to the fancy restaurants in the garden walk) and there's a 711 on the next corner up, which we frequently stop at for flavored coffee of donuts.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the review. It's always great to hear from repeat customers. It is true, we are just minutes away from near by dining establishments such as Bubba Gumps, the Cheesecake factory, California Pizza and so much more. We offer free parking, complimentary breakfast, as well as free wifi. We are just a short 10 minute walk to the park, or the ART shuttle picks up right in front of the motel. Thanks again for the great review. We look farward to your next visit with us!

Summary: My wife and I living this super 8. The staff is so friendly, 10 min walk to Disney, right next store to garden walk. The ART stop is right out front. There a free breakfast, toast, friut, Danish. Free parking. We've been here three other times and love it. We'll only come back here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is so good to hear you will be back to see us! We are only a ten minute walk to Disneyland, however, we are also located at the ART bus stop that takes you right to the gate! We do offer free parking, complimentary breakfast, free wifi as well. All this makes for a comforable affordable stay. We look forward to your next visit with us and thanks again for the awesome review.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights as a layover before flying home to New Zealand. The room standard was acceptable and rooms were cleaned every day.The staff were helpful and friendly. We had no problem with the hot water and for a short break it was fine.When at Disney you only spend a little time at your hotel and for the price the super 8 was good. As a previous post said Breakfast was exactly as advertised-a quick start and was a start to the day.The only thing we thought could be better was presentation-just a few things like plates for the toast,a jug of milk by the coffe could have made it better.The actual food-juice,cereal,toast,coffee,muffins,donuts was fine. The super 8 was close to he Disney parks 7-10 min walk and close to resturants at the Garden walk.All tour companies knew it and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the great review! It is good to hear that you had a great stay and will be back to see us again. It is true, we are only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland as well as several dining choices very close by. Our complimentary breakfast is a great way to start the day. We are adding a few choices that I think you will find to your liking very soon. The heated pool and hot tub is a great way to relax after a day at the park. We have free parking as well as free wifi. These are just a few things that we provide to make your stay even more affordable. Thanks again for the great review and thank you for chosing us when in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here for one week on a family holiday from New Zealand to experience Disneyland. We found the room standard but very acceptable and for the amount it costs considering we hardly spent much time there other than sleeping. Breakfast was exactly as advertised! Donuts and muffins with coffee and juice. It annoys me when people comment that breakfast was terrible, its not what I would have either, but there is no false advertising so get over it! The staff were very friendly especially Peter and Ana. Sheets were cleaned and rooms tidied every day, the only issue we had was the hot water. Some days we had it and other days the shower was luke warm at best.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! It's great to hear you had a good stay. I am glad you found the breakfast satisfactory and to your liking. We are giving our breakfast an upgrade and we will have a few more choices available. I am glad you found our staff friendly and helpful. We always want to excel in our customer service. Please visit us again next time you are in the country. Once again, thank you for the review!

Summary: This is a nice quiet little motel with quite a few rooms.  We spent the entire week based from this hotel and went all over Southern California.  The rooms are nice, the staff was helpful, and the price is right.   They just put in new mattresses while we were staying there, and were sprusing the place up even more with an outside paint job going on.  The contenintal breakfast wasn't the best but if your looking for a nice inexpensive place to stay that's within walking distance to Disneyland then this is the place to go.
Manager Response: So great to hear from you! We are glad you stay with us and find it your favorite place to stay when in Anaheim. We are working on upgrading the property with painting, new mattresses, as well as some other upgrades such as new carpeting, and new TVs and room accomodations. Our breakfast is also getting an upgrade! We will be expanding our selections and this will be available very soon. We want to thank you for the great review and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: A standard size room hotel compare to other hotels in the area. I've stayed at the Red Lion, Best Western, Tropicana, Castle Inn, Holiday Inn and they are very much similar in room size. At Super 8 we stay in a two queen beds room. The room was clean and basic, a flat screen TV (30" ?) on top of a 6 drawers dresser, A/C and one night stand between beds.  There are no closset, refrigirator, microwave or safe deposit box (I would love to see them install one). The room wall is a little thin, so if you are a light sleeper you should consider other hotels. The pool is small but if you spend most of your time at Disneyland that wouldn't be a problem, and there also a small whirlpool next to the main pool, the pool seem clean but the whirlpool look yellowish! The free breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear we fit into your budget when staying here in Anaheim. It's true, we do not have microwaves and fridges in all our rooms, however, they are available upon request at check in. We also have safe deposit boxes at the front desk as well. Our breakfast is a great way to start the day for a fun day at Disneyland. We are also minutes away from some very great dining establishments. Thank you again for the nice review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Staff was unhelpful. Requested down stairs room for disabled mother, got an upstairs. The staff explained I could stay one night but have to change rms the next. We took out our bags just to have the manager state we could stay in the same room. Following morning we get a call saying we need to be out of the rm ASAP because they are beginning to paint at 9am. My son has asthma so we were basically rushed due to unorganized booking. Will not be going there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear you had some issues with your stay. It is our goal to make everyone who stays with us have an enjoyable stay. We do have accessable rooms available with one queen bed. These are a very specific rooms which must be reserved at the time of booking. We do our best to accommodate our guests with special requests. We were able to have you stay in the same room both nights on the first floor. We were working on upgrading the property by painting the building in the area where you staying. We do all this kind of maintenance after 11:00 am when everyone has checked out. We do not have anyone doing maintenance such as painting prior to 11:00 am. Again, thank you for the review, if I can be of any more assistance please give me a call directly.  If there are any questions regarding this review please give me a call directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights in March 2012 at the beginning of our roadtrip around California. Anaheim wasn't our first choice, but having a budget and a sense of self preservation, we decided to stay here rather than spend a fortune staying in Hollywood etc, or conversely, spending less and potentially ending up in a brothel/drug den (see other reviews for motels etc in Hollywood/Venice Beach and you will see what I mean!)  Check in was easy, staff were friendly, we got parked with no problems and we collapsed with relief, jeg-lagged, into our room.  Room was large and clean, we had a very large and VERY comfy bed and we slept really well. Prices include breakfast which is basic but will prevent starvation/dehydration! Cereal, toast, muffins and donuts, together with juice, tea and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. It is good to hear you had a good experience when you stayed with us. It is true we are very close to the Garden Walk and its restaurants and stores. Bubba Gumps, the Cheesecake factory, as well as many other great dining choices make it very convenient and delicous during your stay. We are also just minutes from Disneyland and California Adventure as well as Downtown Disney, another great place to shop and get a great bite to eat. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to you staying with us again in the future!

Summary: We had a great time while staying in this motel.  The rooms were very clean and the atmosphere was wonderful. We felt very at home. The only problem we had was there was really no hot water when we tried to give our little ones baths at night ): I even tried showering early in the morning hoping the water would be hotter. It was still cold.  The breakfast was fine about what I expected. I used the laundry room while there and it was great. We were able to buy city passes here for much cheaper.  Within walking distance of Disneyland.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you had a great time while staying here. We do have discounted tickets to Disneyland,The City Pass,  as well as Universal Studios, and  Knotts Berry Farm. We also offer transportation packages for all of the above, as well as some great Hollywood tours. Our heated pool and hot tub are so nice after a long day at the park. Its great to hear you liked the laundry room facility. It makes things so much easier being able to do your laundry right here. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed here as a layover hotel for our cruise. We came from Las Vegas via the Luxbus(I really liked the bus) which dropped us off in front of this hotel.  This hotel is next door to the Anaheim Garden Walk, we did not go there but they have a Bubba Gumps and other restaurants close to the hotel, plus shopping.  I did request a bottom floor room because they do not have an elevator.  The hotel was quiet at night.  Our room and bath was very clean.  I don't recall any issues with the shower. Our room had one queen bed and it was firm. We also had a fridge in the room, it was clean. I really liked the samples, toothpaste, tiny shampoo and conditioner, breathe right strips.    I was able to see the fireworks from Disneyland from the pool area.  They also have a sun deck I was
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review! It's good to hear you found your room comfortable and clean and the accomodations to your liking. We are just minutes from Disneyland when walking. It's only a 10 minute walk. The trollies you are speaking of is the ART shuttle that the city of Anaheim provides. It takes you to and from Disneyland and comes every 20 minutes or so. There is a small fee and you can buy an all day pass at Discount Tickets and Tours right next door from us. The Garden Walk is right next door, and there are plenty of places to dine and shop there as well. Bubba Gumps and the Cheesecake Factory are just a couple great places to get a bite to eat while staying with us. Thanks again for your feedback, and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Clean and inexpensive but poor breakfast
Summary: We stayed here for 8 nights while visiting Disneyland/Universal Studio's.   Only about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland entrance.  Room was clean, front office were very polite and helpful.  They had however the worst breakfast we've seen at any hotel.  Donuts/Muffins/Toast - only 2 cereals Raisin Bran and Fruit Loops.  No fruit at all, the jam was the worst jam I've ever had anywhere.   Pretty much everything with sugar in it and very little of anything I'd consider healthy.  We adapted by bringing our own fruit and oatmeal.  Besides the breakfast thou I have no real complaints.......staff were friendly and helpful.  So if you go bring some of your own food to go along with the breakfast would be my recommendation.  Pool was quite grungy a few days.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We appreciate feedback such as yours. The Super 8 is getting an upgraded breakfast with some additional items . I think you will find it a big improvement to our current menu. We are just minutes from the park as you said, and right nearby several great dining establishments as well. This makes for an easy relaxing stay with so many things nearby. We do offer free parking as well, along with free wireless internet. The heated pool and hot tub is so inviting after a long day at the park. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I am a frequent weekly traveler to the Anaheim area. I booked a stay at the Super 8 at 415 West Katella Ave in Anaheim. The first night was ok. The rate was reasonable at 69.00. So thought i would stay extend my stay another night. Being a week day i was rather surprised to know they increased the rate to a total of 95.00 to find i was not informed that they were having the water shut off for more then 2 hours. i feel it was very unprofessional to not let your guest know that they will be with out water after they charge you 95.00. Any one going to this location you may want to make sure you have running water to shower flush toilets or wash hands.  I wouldnt recommend a stay here.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. I apologize for the inconvenience of the water being shut off for a couple hours in the afternoon on the day you extended. We did have to do some routine maintenance that required us to shut off the water for a couple hours in the afternoon. We have to do maintenance from time to time, and although inconvenient, it is necessary from time to time. We had notified all the stay over reservations ahead of time; however you were on the check out list originally. I am sorry you were not informed at the extension of your stay. We do offer microwaves and fridges upon request. These items will be brought to the room if requested. We do appreciate you staying with us. If there are any questions regarding this review, please call me, Peter Bhagat, General Manager at 714-778-6900.

Summary: After reading some reviews on here i started to worry about staying here for 6nights but i was wrong!!! The Motel was great and served its purpose well : ) its short distance away from Disneyland and unlike other reviews saying the carpet was dirty we didnt find this too be true. Also always had hot water with great water pressure. As we had flown from England with two children under 4 i think the journey had taken its toll on our son who was sick on our arrival luckily just on the bed but the staff came and took the bedding straight away and i found the Reception Staff to be very personable and helpful. We also used the laundry facilities which was great value. Yeah its not 'posh' but your not spending the 'dosh' either so i think its great def would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review!  It is good to hear that your stay was enjoyable and affordable. It is true we are minutes from Disneyland, just a 10 minute walk. We are also just minutes from Bubba Gumps, the Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza, Tony Romas, Denneys, IHOP, and so much more! We have free parking, free wireless internet, complimentary breakfast as well. All this makes for an affordable stay.  We look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks again for the review.

Summary: It's an older property but well maintained.  New carpeting would be nice! If you want a hot shower it's best to do it early in the am.  Booking months ahead allowed me to save money compared to other surrounding properties.  Since going to Anaheim we've only stayed at this hotel.  Location is right on.  Not willing to throw alot of money on a hotel.  Rather use it for eating out or shopping.
Manager Response: It is good to hear that we fit into your budget while staying here in Anaheim. We do have a great location. We are just 10 minutes from Disneyland, and very close to many dining places as well. We have free parking, free wireless internet, and a complimentary breakfast. The heated pool and hot tub, is a great place to relax after a long day at the park. It is always great to hear from a repeat customer! We look forward to seeing you again in the near future. Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: Stayed for two nights.  It's a basic hotel that's a 10 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland.  Nothing fancy, but a place to sleep.  Don't bother with the continental breakfast except maybe a cup of coffee.  It's in a really small room near the office and seemed to always be packed with people.  I'm not in the habit of throwing an elbow to get my Corn Flakes. There are restaurants on the way to Disney (IHOP, McDonald's).  Weather was too cool to use the pool, but it's outside in the middle of the parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is true we are just a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, We have free parking here, so it saves to park here and walk on over. We do have a heated pool and hot tub, so even in cooler weather it is quite comfortable. There are quite a few places to dine very close by, within walking distance from here, and as you said we have a continental breakfast here from 6 am till 9 am. Thanks again for the review! We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed here for the Disneyland "Leap Day" celebration and were pleasantly surprised.  We weren't expecting the Ritz or anything, but for $49/night, it served it's purpose. Two negatives: 1) Extremely Thin Walls... we had a family next to us with two or three SCREAMING children that didn't stop crying until well into the early hours of the morning.  If this keeps you awake, bring earplugs. 2) If you're over 5 ft tall, the shower is going to be a challenge.  I am 5"2', and the shower head was so low that I had to bend backwards to rinse the shampoo out of my hair... I felt really bad for my 6"2' boyfriend, who basically showered on his knees! lol (Also, for some reason the last day we were there (3/2), there was no hot water either)  Everything was extremely clean, staff was
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, its wonderful to hear that you found us to be a great value. Our various amenities that we offer free of charge do help make things affordable. Complimentary breakfast, free wifi, free parking, are just a few items that help make things fit into a budget. We are only minutes from the Disneyland park, so one can leave the car here and take a short 10 minute walk to the park.  We hope to see you again next time you are in Anaheim. Thank you again for the great review.

Summary: We stay at this hotel atleast 5 - 6 times a year when we go to Disneyland.  The staff is friendly and very helpful.  The rooms are cheap but clean.  We have visited some other hotels by Disneyland and they were old and disgusting.  This hotels remodels often.   Walking distance to Disneyland is a plus.
Manager Response: We always love to hear from repeat customers such as yourself. We do our best to keep things clean and maintained for all our guests. We have done some changes to the rooms, adding new bedding, upgrading the televisions etc. We have also remodeled the breakfast area, and are soon adding some changes to our menu for the complimentary breakfast. As you mention we are very close to Disneyland, its just a 10 minute walk from here. We have free parking, so you save on the parking fee at the park when you stay with us. The ART bus also picks up right in front of the motel, for those who wish to take the shuttle for a small charge. Thank you so much for the great review, and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Didn't spent a lot, and it was great
Summary: This really is a great price, and just a few blocks from Disney Land.  We had a 4, 3, and a one year old.  The stroller was fine.   The 4 year old skipped her way there, but coming back all the kids were too tired!  We still made it.  It really is close.    We were on the second floor, and there isn't a elevator, so keep that in mind.  If you have little kids, the ground floor is better.  We had two rooms with the door in-between so that was nice. Definetly no-frills, but it was close and clean.  There are plenty of places to eat near by.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is true we are very close to Disneyland, just a 10 minute walk and you are there! It is great you mentioned the stairs and requesting lower floor with the little ones. We are always happy to make your stay as comfortable as possible. I hope you had time to enjoy the heated pool and hot tub while you were here. It is very popular with all our guests. It's a great way to relax after a long day at the park. Thank you again for the review, and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Avg. Motel but clean & walkable to Disneyland
Summary: Room was clean, bed was quite comfortable, location close enough to walk (0.8 mile) to Disneyland (save the $15 fee to park at disneyland). Room was on the first floor and a little noisey when people walk by talking or from cars in the parking lot.  This did not seem to be much of a problem for us. No microwave or small refrigerator in room (they are apparently available for an additional fee).  Coffee is lousy from the room's coffee maker....go get some somewhere else. If you want a basic hotel/motel room real close to Disneyland for a reasonable price, this one works.  Also, lots of places to eat or shop nearby (walking distance).
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear that we fit into your budget while visiting Disneyland. The free parking is a plus, it does save on parking fee at Disneyland. We are just a short 10 minute walk to the park from here. There are also several places to shop and dine nearby as well. We do have microwaves and fridges available upon request for a small fee. Our complimentary breakfast also makes things a bit more affordable. Thanks again for the review, and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Dated and needs maintenance, but awful close for the price
Summary: We stayed here for ten days.  In those ten days I did tire of lukewarm showers and having to crouch down to get under the shower head.  Other than that I had no complaints about this property.  Our AC went out, but they were there an hour later and swapped it out for a brand new one.  It is just around the corner from the Happiest place on earth, so for the rate we got it, we would be pretty darn ungrateful to complain too much.  ONe word of caution, refrigerators and microwaves are an additional $5 per day each, or $8 per day for both.  You should include this in your calculation if you're going to stay there versus somewhere else that's just a bit more.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review. Its nice to hear you enjoyed being so close to the park. It is true, we are a 10 minute walk to Disneyland from here. There are also various stores and places to dine right next door and around the corner. We do provide fridge and microwave for an additional $8  a day when requested. A coffee maker is in each and every room for use during your stay. The complimentary breakfast is served from 6 to 9 every morning, and is a nice start to a busy day at the park. Thanks again for the review, we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: I stayed here Feb. 27th thru the 1st in a double queen room and enjoyed it alot. The price was really good, the bed was comfy,has a free breakfast,nice hot tub and pool. The shower head is low but it works and had plenty of hot water too. The people who worked there were all very nice that I came in contact with..the only bad thing is that I had called and asked about shuttle tickets and was told they sold them,but they don,t-so if you have to take the shuttle-buy your tickets online, but if you can walk a couple of blocks-go up to harbor and for 1.50 each way the city bus takes you across the street from the park. There is also a 7-11 on the corner of Harbor and Katella...buy your water and goodies there cause the park has raised their prices AGAIN on food and stuff. Enjoyed
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! It is good to hear you had a great time when staying with us. We are a short 10 minute walk from Disneyland, however, if you wish to purchase tickets for the ART shuttle to Disneyland, the Garden Walk next door sells them. It is $4.00 for a day pass. You can also purchase them online prior to your visit and they will mail them to you. It's nice to know you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub while you were here. It is sure nice after a long day at the park. We do look forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: After reading reviews and being advised by our travel agent not to stay here I was very hesitant when I booked. But my partner and I stayed here for 2 nights in August last year and we were nothing but pleases with our stay. The hotel manager was lovely and helpful he gave us a personal map with vouchers and recommended restaurants to eat at. it was literally a 5 min walk to all parks and down town Disney. This hotel was a home away from home I loved seeing all the Australian coins, toys and flags in the reception. And Evan a free breakfast to go with it. I will definatly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. It is so nice to hear you had a great time when you stayed with us! We always enjoy our Austrailian visitors and look forward to your visits. It is nice to know that you found the room comfortable and clean. Being so close to Disneyland and the nearby dining establishments makes it so easy to get around. We are just 10 minutes from the park! We really appreciate the awesome review, and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I suggest that you not stay here.  My husband and I checked in for our honeymoon and were promised by the manager that we would be able to add an extra night onto the end of the stay if we wanted to at any point during our stay.  Yet, when I called the night before our last night to add a night, the front desk clerk refused to do so saying they were booked up and didn't care if it ruined our honeymoon.  I strongly suggest that no one stay here if they want even the smallest amount of proper customer service.  Walls are also paper thin and we could hear people talking as they walked by outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  I do appreciate your feedback. It is true, at any time our guests can request an extension to their stay.  At the time requested, if we have a room available, of course we are more than happy to accommodate our guests.  You were here several nights, and unfortunately by the time you requested it on the last night of your stay we had nothing available.  We all care very much for every one of our guest‚Äôs and would have gladly extended your stay if it was at all possible.  We were unable to do so because we were sold out. It is our goal to make sure every one of our guests have a positive experience while staying with us. If there are any questions regarding this review, please feel free to call me anytime and speak with me directly.

Summary Heading: Some good and some not so good.......
Summary: We just returned from a week long stay at this hotel. We booked it as part of our package so while I'm not sure what we paid per night, it was one of our cheaper options so I assume we didn't pay a lot. This was our third trip to Disney and we've stayed at different hotels each time - while the stay wasn't horrible, it would rank #3 of the 3 we've stayed at. We always choose "budget" hotels for our Disney vacations because really you spend very little time in your room. I will separate pro's and con's. My ideal rating for this hotel is 2.5 but I don't know how to do half stars so I said 3 just because of the location.  Front desk staff were anywhere from helpful to not so helpful - depends on who you get.  Pro: Very nice location to access Disney parks, easy 10-15 minute walk to
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear we fit into your budget. It is true we do have a great location, being only 10 minutes from Disneyland. There are also several dining establishments very close by. Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake factory, and Tony Romas are just a few great choices that are walking distance from here. Amenities such as Free Wifi, Continental Breakfast, and Free parking are just a few amenities that make your stay more affordable.  Thanks again for the review, and thank you for the feedback. Feedback such as your helps us improve our customer service. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I was impressed with how clean and big the rooms were at this hotel considering how cheap it was.  Stay at the back and it is very quiet.  Breakfast was disapointing.  Internet is free but is a bit slow.  Front reception service was very patchy.  There was one very helpful person and a couple of unhelpful ones.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review! It is great to hear you found our rooms spacious and roomy enough to  make your stay comfortable..  I hope you took time to enjoy the heated pool and hot tub while you were here as well. Amenities such as free wifi, free breakfast and free parking help make your stay as affordable as possible. On your next visit with us, you will find some changes to the breakfast area, as well as our menu. I hope you will find this an improvement. We have enlarged the breakfast area, and are adding some new menu items. We do look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: Great place for the price. About a 15-minute walk to the Disneyland/California Adventures gates.
