Complimentary breakfast was your basic cereal, muffins, juice, etc. There are a ton of place to eat nearby - great variety. If you want to dump tons of cash on a hotel, stay at the Disneyland Hotel. If you just want a cheap place to sleep, stay here. Good value.
Manager Response: Thanks for giving us a review. It is true we are minutes away fom Disneyland. Just a quick 10 minute walk from here. It is good to hear you enjoyed our breakfast. Free breakfast, along with free wifi, and free parking make staying here affordable. We have enlarged the breakfasta area, and made some modificatons. We are also adding some new mene items that I believe you will find to your liking. As always we thank you for staying with us and look forward to your next visit with us during your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: For the price ($55/night), it was a good, cheap motel situated near Disneyland.  It was the cheapest "name-brand" motel that we could find with the closest proximity to the main gates.  When you're going to Disneyland, all you really need is a comfortable bed within walking distance, because really -- how much time do you plan on spending in your room, anyway, when you could be spending that time in Disneyland/California Adventure?  The Super 8 is conveniently situated adjacent to the Anaheim Garden Walk, which features many, many food options.  If you're a Disneyland Annual Passholder, many of the establishments offer a discount on your dine (i.e. CPK which offers a 20% discount).  All of the food options in the Garden Walk are chain restaurants -- CPK, Cheesecake Factory,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome review! We really appreciate the feeback. It is nice to know you enjoyed staying here and we met your needs while visiting here in Anaheim. You are right, being so close to the Garden Walk where there are lots of dining choices available is very convienent. Bubba Gumps, California Pizza, and The Cheesecake factory are some great choices. We have redone our breakfast room, and I am sure you will agree the changes to the menu, as well as the design of the room are an improvement.  Our breakfast is complimentary as well as the parking and wifi. It is true we are a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, and this saves on transportation and parking as well. We look forward to your next visit with us and thanks again for the great review.

Summary: Very nice budget hotel. The rooms were clean, as was the breakfast room. Nice little hot tub and pool. Friendly and helpful staff. It was about a 15 minute walk to the Disney parks.
Manager Response: It is good to hear you found staying with us fit into your budget.  The amenities we offer such as free wifi, breakfast, and parking are just a few things that help make it affordable to stay here. Being so close to Disneyland makes it easy to walk instead of paying for additional transportation. It is good to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub while you were here. Its a great way to relax after a long day at Disneyland. Thanks so much for the review. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: It's a Super 8, It's near Disneyland
Summary: There was nothing amazing about this place, but nothing terrible, either. Maybe a 10-minute walk to the Disneyland Main Gate. Right next to a Bubba Gump Shrimp Co. restaurant, which was better than we expected. The room price was good, there's a decent pool, and free parking. The continental breakfast set-up, like in all the little motels I've stayed at near Disneyland, was irritating to the point of not really being worth it (a lot of people pushing & shoving into a tiny space to get their cornflakes, coffee & donut -- this one didn't even have unripe fruit). There's a fridge in the room, so you're better off buying your own munchies.  The room was clean, and other than only having a lamp & nightstand on one side of the bed (unideal for readers), it was just fine for the price.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. Yes! We are only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, and right next door to the Garden Walk where Bubba Gumps and  The Cheesecake factory are as well as many other great places to dine. The amenities such as free wifi, free parking, and free continental breakfast make staying here affordable as well. We will be upgrading our breakfast this Spring, so we encourage you to give it another try next time you are here. It is good to hear you enjoyed our heated pool and hot tub while you were here. It's a great way to relax after a day at Disneyland. Again, thank you for the review, and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This was my first time staying here, and when staying somewhere different then the usual hotel, there's always a bit of uneasiness, not knowing what it will be like. But after staying here, I'll be booking this motel again on my next trip.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was spacious and very clean, and it was very quiet, I never heard any of the neighbors. The walking distance to Disneyland is a little bit farther from where I've usually stayed, but at half the price, I don't mind walking a few more minutes. The location is great, being next to GardenWalk, and the excellent choice of restaurants.
Manager Response: It is so good to hear you had a great experience when visiting us. It does make it handy being a 10 minute walk to Disneyland . It is also great being located so close to The Garden Walk where you can find Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake factory and many other great places to dine. Our amenities such as Free Parking, Free Wifi, and Free continental breakfast also make us an affordable choice. We look forward to your next  visit!

Summary: we spend a week at this facility.  It is easy walking distance to Disneyland and has ample choice of resturants very close.  The city bus is easily accessable for shopping further away but there are several shopping choices within walking distance.  The rooms are basic as is the complimentary breakfast but this is an economically priced motel close to attractions and you get what you pay for.  Reception staff were very friendly and helpful and had good information on local attractions at transport.  Pool and hotub were good at the end of a day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It's true we are walking distance to all the great restaurants and shops. Downtown Disney, and the Garden Walk have many great places to choose from. We are just around the corner from the public transportation  as well. We are glad you enjoyed our hot tub and heated pool. It is nice after a day of walking around Disneyland. You can also catch the fireworks right from our motel . Thanks again for the great review, we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Recently stayed over the weekend for Tinkerbell half marathon, upon check out left a backpack in hotel room, called hotel as soon as we realized which was about 6 hours later, 4 PM.  Was told the Housekeeping Manager was gone who had key to lost and found and front desk hung up on us.  We then went to the hotel where we were asked, "if your bag is so important why did you leave it in the room?" and "How could you forget your bag?" and we were repeatedly told they could send us the bag, but since Housekeeping Manager was gone there was no way to retrieve bag from Lost and Found because Manager Ron was not trusted with key. WOW!  After waiting 45 minutes while Michelle and Ron called other managers to find a key, Ron left, and retrieved our backpack from lost and found.  When we
Manager Response: While we appreciate the review, we do have a couple issues with it, and would like to explain a couple things regarding your comments.  Our standard policy regarding lost and found is as follows: When an item is left in a room, we lock it in a secure room. Only two people have  a key to this room, The General Manager, and the Head of housekeeping. This is for our guests security. By 4.00 pm the head of housekeeping, as well as the General Manager had left. It took 45 minutes, because the General Manager was off property,but once called came and unlocked the room where your item was being safely kept. The General Manager retrieved the item and gave it to the front desk clerk Ron. (who is not a manager).  Ron has worked here for 20 years, and follows procedures, He was following procedures regarding lost and found items as set forth by management. Regarding the extra charge on your credit card; this was because you smoked in a non smoking room. This is clearly marked on the registration card upon check in and you sign where it says you will be charged an addition $100 plus tax if you smoke in  a non smoking room. This fee is to cover the additional cleaning costs so we can make it acceptable for other guests who request a non smoking room and expect it to be free of smoke. We do offer smoking rooms, if guests wish to smoke in their room. In regards to not being allowed back, it was not because you left an item in the room. It was for other reasons, which fall within our guidelines to have the right to refuse service. Questions regarding this review can be addressed by  calling me directly at 714-778-6900.

Summary: This hotel is a surprisingly good deal in a great location.  The rooms are standard motel rooms, nothing fancy at all, but they are clean and comfortable.  But the location, and the price are outstanding.  This is not the Anaheim of years past.  It is now a vibrant, palm tree lined, walking friendly area.  The location is right next door the Garden Walk shopping and dining mall, and an easy walk to Disneyland parks.  Really a good location as a home base for a Disneyland visit.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! It is true, we have a great location. We are just a ten minute walk to Disneyland, and right next door to so many great restaurants. Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory, Tony Romas, are just a few of the many great choices to dine while in the area.  Within minutes you are right in the heart of the Disneyland experience. Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We were at Disneyland for the Neverland 5K Fun Run, and just needed basic accommodations for the night.  The Super 8 fit the bill perfectly.  We found the best price by booking directly with the hotel and showing our AAA card.  The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.  Parking is free, and a limited, though adequate, continental breakfast is complimentary.  Other reviews mentioned cold water.  There was plenty of hot water when we stayed, though the shower adjustment seemed backwards to me.  Clockwise for hot water, counter-clockwise for cold.  Staff was friendly, and the pool was warm.  Good location.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review!  It is good to hear that you found we fit right into your budget when visiting the Disneyland Area. Our amenities such as free wifi, free parking, free continental breakfast are just a few things that help you keep within your budget while staying here. It is good to hear you enjoyed the  heated pool and hot tub while staying here. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: We were there December 7, 8, and 9 2011 and the water was cold in the back of the property building, didn't know it otherwise we would have stayed elesewhere.  But usually this is a great place to stay for the price, we will try again in February, hopefully it's been repaired.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to your return. Thanks for giving us another chance, and we appreciate your feedback. Sorry for any inconvenience during your last visit with us.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Better than what we expected aircon smelt and the sink is in the room not bathroom. Can see fireworks from carpark, spa was good, staff helpful booked tours for you. Breakfast is minimal cereal donuts and muffins juice and coffee, was only made for kids. 15min walk to Disney.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is good to hear you took advantage of our heated pool and spa while you were here. These amenities along with free parking, free wifi, complimentary continental breakfas are just a few of the added amenities we include while you are staying with us.  Our staff is here 24 hours at the front desk and available for booking tours to Hollywood, Seaworld, Universal Studios and many other great places to visit while staying here. We also sell tickets to Disneyland, which is just a short walk from here. We look forward to seeing you again, next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary Heading: wow. What a difference two years makes!
Summary: My daughter and I stayed here two years ago and we were delighted. There was no question that this is where we were going to stay this time. Sadly, we were very disappointed. The lady at the front desk was not friendly or accomodating. They stuck us (a single mom and her 11 year old daughter )in the back alley way. The shower was cold. Four nights of cold showers-yuck. On my way out, the lady at the front asked how my stay was. When I commected on the cold water she said that was the first complaint she had received. Then the man behind me said,"make that two complaints. The water was freezing" Then she said that they were scheduled to have the water turned off that afternoon to work on it. Why would they do that if there were no complaints! I don't expect a lot from a $50.00 a
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you had a bad experience during your last visit with us. We would like the chance to make it up to you. Please give us a call directlly. Thank you for the review, we appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Our 8 night stay was excellent.  The rooms were very large as we had three families with a total of 6 kids.  Rooms were clean, staff were very freindly and efficient in regards to housekeeping and tidyness of hotel and pool.  Front desk staff very helpfull with directions,  Disneyland was about a 20 min walk, and thats with stroller for the baby and a three year old who walked as well.  We had an excellent rate and it was well worth it.  We are planning another trip without the kids and will be booking with this hotel again.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear you had a good visit with us and are planning on coming again. We look forward to it! We are glad that you found the pool and hot tub a fun part of your stay. It is very conveinent being only a few minute walk from Disneyland as well. We pride ourselves on clean rooms and great service for our customers. Glad this made your stay enjoyable.  Again, we look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: It was worth the $40 a night we paid.  The room was clean and the beds were comfortable.  The staff was nice.  The breakfast was a continental type breakfast.  They didn't have a big variety but we aren't big breakfast eaters so that was okay with us.  It's about a 15 minute walk to the parks which was fine in the morning but walking back with two tired children at the end of the day was kind of a pain.  It's a two minute walk to a good variety of restaurants in the Garden Walk.  We didn't have a lot of water pressure in the shower and there was no hot water in the sink.  We never complained so I'm not sure if they could have helped us or not.
Manager Response: thank  you for the review!  We are glad you found your stay with us affordable and enjoyable. We are very close to Disneyland, just a 10 to 15 minute walk. The ART shuttle picks up right here as well. It comes in handy with the little ones at the end of a long day at Disneyland. The Garden Walk is next door and does provide great shopping and dining choices. Bubba Gumps, The Cheesecake Factory and California Pizza are just a few of the great restaurants in walking distance from here. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit!

Summary: Everything just as our plan. Perfect Location, Good Family Motel. Room are clean, and Front Desk is helpful. Super Value with Basic Continental Breakfast. If would like to pick any minus point, I would say the internet connection need to be improved. But However, will put this on our list for next visit.
Manager Response: We look forward to seeing you again!  It is great to hear our staff was helpful, and you found our rooms clean. We want to exceed our guests expectations. Staying with us is a great value. Free breakfast, free wifi, and free parking are just a few things that we provide to make your stay affordable. You are right, we are just a few minutes to Disneyland, just a short walk and you are there. It is handy being so close to the many restaurants such as Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake Factory, Tony Romas, IHOP ect. So many great dining choices in the area. Thanks so much for the excelent review, and again, we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We got in super early (at around 9am) and the super friendly staff accommodated us and checked us in right away. The room was clean. Easy walk to Disneyland. The beds were super comfy although it did get a little noisy at night. We used the laundry facilities and they worked very well and very accessible. Continental breakfast got us through the morning although I wish they had some fresh fruit. Will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you found staying with us fit into your budget. The free amenities such as continental breakfast, free wifi, free parking is just a few things that make staying with us affordable. Being so close to Disneyland, its just a 10 minute walk, and the various dinning establishments in the area saves time and money on transportation. We pride ourselves on excelent customer service and top of the line cleanliness. It is good to hear such a great review from you! We look forward to your next visit with us next time you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: This hotel is almost across the road from Disneyland, (about a 15 minute leisurely walk to entry gate).  The rooms are clean as is the property is too.  There is always someone on the front desk and staff are extremely helpful.  I have now stayed at this hotel a few times and will continue to, everytime I visit from Australia.  This hotel is also surrounded by some great restaurants like IHop or the ever so popular McDonalds. You don't necessarily need a car in LA as there is a bus that you can catch at the airport (not supplied by the hotel), that will take you to the hotel and also buses to take the excited tourist to every attraction imaginable from the front door.  (this is not a regular public bus but a privately owned tour bus)    The hotel is very reasonable priced
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! Thanks so much!  Yes we do have tours that you can book to take you all over the LA area including Hollywood, Universal Studios, Seaworld and many more locations. It is not a must to have a car when staying here  at our location. Disneyland is only a 10 minute walk from here as are many great places to shop and dine. The shuttle to and from the airports is called Super Shuttle and is an affordable way to get to and from our location. Once again, thank you for the review, We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The perfect start to our big California adventure.  We were here for 8 nights.  Staff were excellent.  We were given a top floor room which had a good view of the fireworks and they came out to fix a broken sink within hours.  Just a 15 minute safe walk to Disneyland (would be even quicker if you could walk across a patch of wasteland!).  Very well placed if you are renting a car from Alamo, which is a 10 minute safe walk away.  Amenities were good.  We used the washing/drying facilities quite a bit.   There were ice and vending machines plentifully located.  The toiletries were superb - even including teeth whitening and toothpaste!  Room was cleaned every day to a really high standard.  No room safe, but you could leave your valuables at the front desk for no charge.  The
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review!  It is such a pleasure to know that our guests have a great experience when staying here. Being walking distance to Disneyland (just a 10 minute walk) is so nice, as well as being so close to the many restaurants in the area. It is good to hear you were happy with the use of the amenities such as the pool and spa, Laundrymat etc. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We live about 60 miles from Disneyland, so we've always just driven back and forth on the same day.  This time, however, we thought it'd be a relief not to have to make the long drive home after an exhausting day walking in the Park.  We did not want to spend alot of money, and since this property got good reviews, we thought we'd try it.  First impression - (1) great location right next to a bunch of restaurants e.g. Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump, etc. , (2) family friendly, (3) very nice & helpful staff.  The rooms themselves are dated and a bit musty.  But for $80/night, we weren't expecting the Grand Californian.  We were on the ground floor, and never heard a peep out of anyone until the morning (9am-ish), as people were readying to go to the Park. By then, it did get
Manager Response: It is good to hear that you found your visit with us so affordable. The amenities such as free continental breakfast, free parking and free wifi are just a few things that save money while staying with us. We also like to keep our rates reasonable so staying with us fits into your budget. Thanks for the review, and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Second time, will probably continue to stay here!
Summary: We stayed here earlier this year actually and came back. Can't imagine we wouldn't come back here again. It's clean, AWESOME location near lots of restaurants very close and walking distance to Disneyland. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Some kids running around making noise early in the morning, but otherwise very quiet too.  As some have said, it's not a 5* hotel so don't expect it. The free breakfast is very simple but it's free. If you want a good breakfast, do the Minnie and Friends one at Disneyland. Awesome. Pool was decent, hot tub was nice on a cool evening after walking all day at Disneyland. Only complaint I would really have was the lack of hot water most of the time. It was actually a relatively cold week we were there and it just seemed like no matter what
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review! You are right, we do have an awesome location! We are just a 10 minute walk from the Disneyland Resort. There are also several great restaurants within walking distance such as Bubba Gumps and the Cheesecake Factory. The Garden walk is right next door for dining, entertainment, and shopping. Thanks again for the review, and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel when you visit Disneyland
Summary: We are an Australian family travelling USA. We stayed at this hotel in January 2011 and we have returned for another stay in December 2011. The hotel is very well priced and the location is fantastic.  It is a short walk, 5 mins to entrance of Disneyland. There a a number of great restaurants aound the hotel, The Cheesecake Factory is just a 2 minute walk from hotel and the BEST food.The rooms are clean and comfortable and there is plenty of free parking.  The staff are friendly and helpful. We felt safe at this hotel. I would recommend this hotel to any person wanting a basic clean hotel resonalby priced.
Manager Response: It is so nice to hear from repeat customers. We are glad you came back to visit and decided to stay with us again  during your visit to Disneyland. So many people say they feel safe and comfortable when staying here and it means so much to know that our staff and our facility provide that to our customers. It is true great restaurants such as the Cheesecake factory our just minutes away. Also, Disneyland is just a 10 minute walk from here to the front gate! How wonderful is that! We hope to see you again on your next visit to Disneyland. Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: The staff was wonderful and extremely helpful with all of our inquires. Location is fantastic, only a short walk from the parks and eateries. Walking to and from the parks even at late hours we felt completely safe. The room is very basic but comfortable and with the price we weren't complaining. Room was cleaned daily with fresh towels and made beds. The breakfast was simple but complimentary so there wasn't much to complain about, i mean a free cup of coffee to start the day isn't a bad deal hey? A nice place to stay overall with wonderful staff.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you found our staff so helpful during your stay. We do our very best to make your stay as enjoyable and easy as possible. It is our pleasure to make sure your vacation is a memorable one. Being walking distance from all the restaurants and Disneyland makes it so easy to get around when staying here. Our complimentary breakfast, free wifi, and free parking are also added amenities that make your stay more affordable. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: This is a good basic hotel. Remember you are not booking a 5 star hotel! It is clean and is a ten minute walk to Disneyland. If you can't walk the distance the Anaheim Resort Transportation bus stops right in front.It will take you to the main gate to Disneyland. Discount tickets can be purchased at Garden Walk Mall a few doors down from the hotel. It is $16 for a five day pass, per person. Otherwise it is $4.per person, for a round trip each day. Exact change only is accepted on the bus. I love the pass, because you can use it all day. Can't say much for the free breakfast,but there are plenty of restaurants near Disneyland. The rooms are very basic, no irons, no microwaves. My room had a small fridge, but I don't think all of them do. Bring your own soap, and toiletries. Does
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the nice review. It is nice to know that the ART bus system worked so well for you. It does pick up right here by the hotel if you wish to take it. Otherwise we are just a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Our location makes it so easy to get around making your vacation so much more enjoyable. We do have microwaves, irons, kettles and fridges available at the front desk for use during your visit with us.  Most items are free of charge. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We stayed there for 2 night for a Disneyland trip.  Given that most of our time was spent in the parks, this hotel was great for a budget hotel.  The location is across the street from the main gate entrance, walking distance to the park.  It is also right next to a lot of restaurants.  The room and bathroom were clean.  Water pressure from the shower was great with plenty of hot water.  You can't beat the location and the price if you are planning a Disneyland based trip.  And free parking is definitely a bonus since most hotels in the area charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review! It is great to hear our customers had such a great experience when staying with us. It is true the amenities such as free parking, free wireless internet and a complimentary continental breakfast  make staying here a great value. Being so close to everything makes it very easy to get around without additional traveling costs as well. In just 10 minutes, you are at the Disneyland gate as you said. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We stayed there for 4 nights and found hotel to be good. There are plenty of eating options available nearby. We tried Indian cuisine at RAMADA hotel. The best thing is the location. Its just 10 minutes walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you had a nice stay with us. You are correct in saying there are several dining establishments closeby. This makes it nice when you can walk to the restaurant of your choice. We are also just a 10 minute walk from Disneyland! Thank you so much for the review, and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I stayed for 2 nights, & could not have been happier!  The room was clean, and the price was incredible!  Front Desk staff was very helpful, and kind.  Travelling alone, I was a bit nervous about feeling safe in whichever hotel I chose, but I never once felt uncomfortable here during my stay.  In fact, I doubt I will stay anywhere else!  Excellent experience!
Manager Response: It is great to hear you felt so comfortable during your stay with us. It is our goal to make each stay as comfortable and pleasant as possible. Being located so close to Disneyland and the various restaurants  makes it so easy to get around as well. Thank you very much for the review. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: inexpensive lodging near disneyland. within walking distance or ART shuttle picks up right on katella.  excellent restaurants very near.  dont expect the ritz and you wont be disappointed.  "special note" this is one of the few anaheim budget hotels that actually respect the DO NOT DISTURB  sign.  the housekeeper quietly tapes a note to your door letting you know what time she leaves and that towels etc are available in the office. we love this place.
Manager Response: We are glad you found your stay enjoyable and affordable. It is nice to find a place to stay near Disneyland that fits into your budget. The ART bus stop is right next door if you choose to take that to the park instead of walking. It is a 10 minute walk to the park from here. Being so close to everything makes it convienent during your stay as well. We look forward to your next visit with us!  Thank you for the review.

Summary Heading: Value for money, Free wifi, Helpful and friendly receptionist
Summary: My husband and I stayed from 18-23 Nov 2011.  Impressed by the helpfulness and friendliness of Ms Cheryl at the front-desk :)  Overall, this place is reasonably priced and near to Disneyland, eateries, and convenience stores (eg. 7-Eleven).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. It is so great to hear that our staff is providing great customer service. Our goal is so exceed your expectations when staying with us. We do offer free wifi and free continental breakfast as part of your stay as well as free parking. Other amenities such as microwaves and fridges are also available upon request. The pool and the hot tub are favorites among many of our guests as well. We are glad you had a great stay and look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Stayed here with my boyfriend to visit Disneyland and it was great. Arrived to the motel and while checking in shared with the lady at the front desk my need for a lower lvl room and she was truly concerned for my issue and even tried to get me into a room closer to the front so I had a shorter walk to Disneyland. She really showed concern and care, which I thought was great. So, I get to my room, open the door and was relieved! The room was far nicer than I had expected for the price I paid. I did the sock test on the carpet, and as my photo will show, it passed with flying colors. The bed was GREAT and I'm VERY picky about the bed I sleep on, so you can totally trust that it was indeed a wonderful mattress. From what I was told by the front desk later on when I stopped there
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the great review! It is great to hear that our staff was so helpful and kind during your stay with us. It is our pleasure to do our best to make your stay as trouble free as possible and help in making your vacation a memorable one. We take pride in serving our customers and it is so great to know we are successful in providing the service you so deserve. Thank  you for posting the pictures of our rooms. We do have a great housekeeping staff here and appreciate you feedback. It helps us serve future costomers better. We look forward to your next visit with us when you are in the Disneyland area. Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: We arrived late Friday night and departed Sunday morning. Most of our time we visited Disneyland.  Our room had was a basic room without any frills other than the 15 minute walk to the park.  The beds are smaller then a queen, carpet felt damp, poor lighting, very small bathroom and ants all over our bathroom.  That being said, it was quiet, plenty of parking and a nice pool. For the price we paid $50 a night it served it's purpose. However, I would never stay here again! And we are not picky travelers.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review and appreciate your feedback. This helps us in bettering our customer service. We are glad you found the amenities such as the pool and hot tub to be useful during your visit with us. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I usually stay around the corner at the Anaheim Plaza but tried the Super 8 because of the price. I was not disappointed. Sure, the room was on the small side but being a solo traveller, this was not an issue. I had a flat screen TV, room was clean and for $44 a nite it was great value.   I plan to be back in the USA in May 2012 and will surely be staying at this property again.  For those that want 5 stars, pay 5 star prices. The Super 8 hit the spot for me.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the review. It is good to hear you found us in your budget and had a good time while you were here. Being walking distance to the variety of restaurants is also an added plus when staying with us. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This is one of the highest-rated motels in Anaheim  (#28 of all hotels/motels), which says a lot more about Anaheim than it does the motel. It's obvious that being near Disneyland means that a motel can avoid upgrading its facilities and amenities while charging prices comparable with much nicer motels elsewhere. That being said...Briefly, the PROS: Location is a block from Disneyland and next-door to Bubba Gump's, quick and efficient check-in, clean room. CONS: Old and worn decor, very poor lighting in room, lack of hot water in sink, old and small TV, very limited breakfast. "queen beds" were actually smaller double beds. Add to that Anaheim's 15% hotel taxes and fees and the value is really Mickey Mouse. Next time we will probably look just outside Anaheim where the value is
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate your feedback. You are right, being so close to Disneyland and the various dining establishments is a big advantage when staying here. Super clean rooms and an efficient staff also makes things more comfortable during your stay. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Great location for a Disneyland visit! And great price. The rooms are very roomy, but just the basics. The rooms have a microwave and a small fridge, which is great for a family. The breakfast is very basic also. But for the location and the price, the small things that could be improved are not that big of a deal. We have stayed here twice and have recommended it to others who are traveling to visit Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our location is very convienent to nearby activities such as dining and of course Disneyland. Our quick start breakfast is great to get you going in the morning, along with fresh coffee throughout the day. Thank you for recommending us to your friends and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: I can't believe the good reviews for this motel.
Summary: My family has stayed at eight different hotel/motels around Disneyland for over 70 nights during the last few years. We have never had any complaints at any of the places we stayed, until we tried this Super 8. Our first room smelled so bad I had a headache within minutes of checking in. We were given a second room which also smelled terrible. After the third room also reeked we asked if we could just check out and go somewhere else and we were told we would be charged for the room whether we slept there or not. The staff did finally find a room that did not smell so we stayed. After showering and walking barefoot to my bed and back to the bathroom you could see black footprints on the white mat which was on the bathroom floor. The bottom of my feet were black with filth. I
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hope it is better today. Bugs.
Summary: As I checked my Disneyland pics from 2009. I found the attached one that was taken in one of the rooms on the second floor. Few of these were running on the walls. I decided to check updated reviews of this motel. What I found is the following (search and read it): Great location doesn't make up for horrible rooms Reviewed September 29, 2011. The front desk attendend wasn't surprized about the bugs in the room and we wake up the kids to change a room. Location is excellent, however there are many other motels around. Breakfast to be avoid. We stayed at Aug 2009.We will not stay there again. Other super 8 in other places were excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Although it has been quite a while since your last visit, we still value your feedback. It helps us better our customer service. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The room was really nice for the price. It was so close to Disneyland. If you're on a budget it's definitely worth paying less to stay here than paying more to stay next door to Disneyland. There was also a nice pool and spa and breakfast was good.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you had such a great time while staying here at our motel. You are right, the location is great being so close to Disneyland and the nearby restaurants. In just a 10 minute walk you are at Disneyland. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: + Rooms were clean, beds were comfortable, pool & jacuzzi were good  -shower was LAME as was the continental breakfast (but not a deal breaker)... suggestion for the motel: add a little variety to your continental breaky.... OMG - you are in So.Cal - maybe add some fruit....  anything other than those awful sugar-cinnamon donuts everyday.  But like I said, not a deal breaker.  I would definitely consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate the review. It is great that you found us and plan to return. We are glad we fit into your budget. Many of our amenities such as free wi fi and free parking as well as the free breakfast are just a few things that help give you more for your money. Being walking distance to many of the dining establishments is also a plus and being so close to the Disneyland resort makes it so easy to get around. It will be great to see you again on your next visit to the Disneyland area.

Summary: We read the other reviews and it's exactly what other reviewers stated.  Its cheap, clean, convenient location and you can see the fireworks from the parking lot.  We went on a spur of the moment trip to see friends in Anaheim.  We were able to afford 2 separate rooms.  The pool and jacuzzi were nice and we went to Downtown Disney which was a close drive.  We definitely will stay here again and recommend it!
Manager Response: WE are glad to hear you found our Super 8 convienent and affordable. It is nice to be so close to Downtown Disney  as well as the Disneyland park. It is only a short 10 minute walk and you are there! We do make sure that every room has been inspected for quality prior to every check in. So nice to hear you found the rooms were nice and clean. We are also glad you enjoyed the hot tub and pool while you were here. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Awesome location, so close to Disneyland without paying Disneyland rates. Great customer service too.  We stayed here at the start and end of our holiday, we didn't like the room were stayed in on our 2nd stay as it smelt like wee. I didn't like the free breakfast, we usually bought our breakfast elsewhere. There is a Subway just 5 minutes down the road opposite 7 eleven.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is good to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It is true we are walking distance from Subway and many other fast food places as well as dine in restaurants. We are just a 10 minute walk from Disneyland as well!  It is also great to know that our staff provided the great service you so deserve! We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: A great choice for a small budget!
Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at the Super 8 at 415 West Katella in Anaheim.  It was a very pleasant stay.  We had a limited budget, and the price we paid for the room was excellent.  The property is old and definitely showing its age, but the room was very, very clean and the front desk staff was friendly.  We didn't take advantage of the complimentary breakfast this time, so I can't say anything about that.  The hotel is VERY close to the Toy Story parking lot, so it's a great base for a Disneyland trip.  It is also, unfortunately, right next to the parking garage for the Anaheim Garden Walk, so it can be a little noisy.  We slept just fine, though, and the bed was comfortable.  The rooms are quite small and aren't fancy, but the price is right for a clean place to sleep
Manager Response: We always love to hear that our guest were happy with their stay and found the accomodations affordable. We strive to give you the best service we can and give you more value for your dollar. The location is certainly a great asset when staying here. Many people take advantage of our complimentary continental breakfast, as well as dine at one of the many dining establishments in the area that are walking distance from us. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We have stayed here 3-4 times over the years and has always been a good experience. The location is great just around the corner from Disneyland and the best part for me is having to walk by Tony Roma's on the way home which I love.  There is a small pool which is never overly busy and a decent continental breakfast in the morning.  I would not hesitate to recommend this budget hotel and will stay here again.
Manager Response: It is always wonderful to know we have repeat customers. We are so glad to hear that you enjoy your visit when staying here in the Disneyland area. It is very convienent being so close to Disneyland and the places to dine, including Tony Romas. Such great food and everything in walking distance. The pool and hot tub is a great way to unwind at the end of the day isnt it? So good to know you enjoy it while you are here. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The hotel was great overall.  The staff were very efficient and friendly. The price was very affordable and the free breakfast was an added bonus.  The hotel has a heated pool and jacuzzi which is very tidy and kept clean. We used the laundry room facilities and were given the change we needed and some help from the staff and some friendly fellow lodgers. We come to Anaheim every year and are considering staying here for the entire trip in 2012. :)
Manager Response: It is great to hear you had such a great time when you were here and that our place was suitable for all your traveling needs. It is always good to hear that our staff is doing a great job and providing the customer service that you deserve. We strive to exceed your expectations with every visit. Being so close to Disneyland is a plus as we are only 10 minutes walk from the park. As you said the pool area is a favorite to many of our guests and a great way to relax after a day at the park. We are excited to hear you will be back to see us. We look forward to it!

Summary: Best part is only two blocks away from Disneyland . Satisfactory service in all respects form room to breakfast. We stayed only a night and that seems the right choice because we stayed out most of our time and spent that in disney came for just sleep.
Manager Response: It is good to hear that you had a great stay with us and found it easily accessable to Disneyland. It is very handy being just minutes away from the park as well. We hope to see you again when you visit the Disneyland area!

Summary: I made a reservation at this hotel. The night before our stay I lost my itinerary so I called super 8 CUSTOMER SERVICE. They directed me to the other hotel near Disneyland because they confused my identity with another customer with the same exact name staying on overlapping days. I think this is and extraordinary event. I've tried talking to multiple people within super 8, including this property, and no one cares. I have been blamed for the entire event with no compromise and in effect have been charged double. This hotel refuses to refund the monies they charged. Don't stay here! LOOK AT BBB. This business gets a B-. The other super 8 in Anaheim gets an F. I currently have claimed fraud on my credit card.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was quiet, I wasn't sure we had neighbors. It's an older motel  but very clean and beds comfortable. There was a coffee maker in the room but there was an added charge per day for a refrigerator. We found it easy walking to Disneyland and to the restaurants in the area. There is a free continental breakfast but it is very limited. There is seating around the pool and an additional seating area on the second floor above the office to eat breakfast or just hang out.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review, and thank you for staying with us while you were here in Anaheim. We are an easy walk to Disneyland being only a 10 minute walk. It is good to hear you enjoyed our pool and sundeck while you were here! We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We spent 6 nights here.  It was a great price for a moderate room.  The room was suprisingly large (1 king sized bed) and included a small fridge.  One of the closer motels to Disneyland. The pool was ok- small, but adequate and included a hot tub.  Breakfast was lacking- small dry donuts, and sugared cereal- you had to ask the attendant for milk which felt a little like begging. It would be nice if they added a few more options- maybe some fruit and yogurt or something thats not straight sugar. We definately will stay here again when we come with our kids.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for staying with us and are glad you had such a great experience while staying here at our Super 8 here in Anaheim. It is especially nice to be so close to Disneyland and the nearby shops and restaraunts. Just minutes away! We are glad you found our rooms comfortable and spacious, and it is good to hear you enjoyed our Pool and Hot Tub while you were here. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: great place to stay on a budget!
Summary: I stayed here with my daughter In feb 2011, I really liked this motel. The staff are very helpful (i locked my keys in my rental car.... and staff helped me as much as possible!) The newer rooms are great, rooms are very clean, bed comfortable, shower nice. Safe location and super close to everything you need! I have heard from other Australian travellers that a hotel double the price close to Katella was dodgy and not good. I will return to super 8 on all my LA trips!
Manager Response: I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us! Our staff is  available 24 hours to assist you and make your stay more comfortable. It is great to hear you had a good experience while you were here. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great Value and Location near Disneyland
Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here in mid September. The first thing we noticed was a slight smell in the room. It wasn't as bad and it quickly went away with the door opened. The room was clean. We were on the second floor and it was quiet. There were plenty of pillows on the bed, although the mattress was a bit too soft for my liking. Only complaint was the shower faucet wasn't working properly as only hot water were available. I had to call the front desk for the maintenance guy. Did I mention the shower head was only about a meter and a half high? He showed up quickly and had it repaired with a new knob. Free continental breakfast was provided. Just the typical toast, cereal, muffin, donut, juice, hot chocolate, milk, and coffee. The hotel wasn't far from Disneyland. An easy
Manager Response: So glad you found your stay met your needs while here on vacation. Our location does make it convenient being only 10 minutes walk to Disneyland and just steps away from several places to dine and shop. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Great location doesn't make up for horrible rooms
Summary: Assuming that anything next to Disneyland would have to be very competitive, and therefore very similar in quality, was a bad assumption to make.  Upon entering our first room we were confronted with an odd smell which I later recognized as a bug spray I‚Äôd used some years back ‚Äì didn‚Äôt recall the exact brand, but defiantly an insecticide.  Ants; small black ones, everywhere. The room at one point had some type of leak for there was a huge (3 ft across), very poorly disguised patch on the ceiling.  Someone had sat on the sink counter and one edge had dislodged from the wall.  There was a one a half inch gap under the exterior door.  We asked to change rooms and were granted a move down the same building but on the same floor.  We could still smell the insecticide, but it wasn‚Äôt
Manager Response: We want to thank you for staying with us. Thank you for your feedback, this helps us in improving our service for future guests. We are glad you found our front desk helpful in planning your visit while here in Anaheim. Thanks again for staying with us, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Value, Cleanliness, Location, skip the free breakfast
Summary: This must be the 6th or 7th time we've stayed at this location. It's staff are very friendly, value for the rooms is excellent. It's clean, but does have some wear and tear. They do a good job of getting the life out of their materials (like the lino in the bathroom). I especially like the number of NICE pillows on the beds. The free breakfast is doughnuts so don't rely on the free brekky part. The pool is well kept and clean. It's a short walk to Disneyland and because the rooms are tucked back away from Katella, it's a quiter hotel than some of the locations on Harbour Blvd.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are glad to hear your stay was great while visiting us here. We take pride in the presentation of our rooms and inspect for quality each and every day. It is true we have a great location and we are only a 10 minute walk from the park. Glad to hear you found our staff friendly and helpful. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: The cheapest, best way to stay near Disneyland!
Summary: Me and a friend (both 19) stayed here for 4 nights in July while visiting Disneyland. As backpackers, we really didn't have a big budget so hoped that this super8 wouldn't be too terrible for the price. We were SO pleasantly surprised!! We got a twin king bed room which I'm sure was the same price as single beds, the room was very big, beds the most comfortable we'd slept in, in our 6 months of travelling, we felt totally safe around the area in the day. We didn't really venture out at night, as we are two young girls in a new place, but when we came back from a day in the parks at 11pm, we never felt threatened. Disney was about an 8 minute walk away, and around the area is a subway, pizza place, 7/11 and lots of restaurants. The staff at Super 8 were extremely helpful and the
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that staying here was well within your budget! We want to give you a lot of value for your money spent while staying here with us. With the complimentary continental breakfast and free parking when staying here along with added amenities helps keep you within your budget. Being walking distance to a variety of dining choices and being only 10 minutes walk from Disneyland are also a great convenience. We look forward to seeing you again next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Great clean budget motel within walking distance of Disneyland. Right next door to Anaheim Garden Walk with all it's shops and restauarants.  With a free breakfast and parking it can't be beaten.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are happy you enjoyed your stay while you were here with us. Our complimentary breakfast is just what you need to get started off on your adventure here in Anaheim. We are also conveniently located near several restaurants and quick markets to get what you might need during your stay. Please visit us again, we look forward to it!

Summary: We stayed here for one night on route to Vegas.  Room was spacious and bed was pretty comfortable. Ice machine was handy and the small complimentary breakfast started us off for the day.  Only downside we had was the proximity of a nearby parking garage which was quite noisy at times during the night however they seemed to be having a problem with one of their doors as we could hear the automated announcement over and over so this may have been a one off bad night.  Pool area looked clean and tidy.  Would recommend for short stays.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for staying with us! We are glad you found the accomodations fitting for your stay. We take pride in the presentation and cleanliness of our rooms. Every room is inspected for quality prior to every check in. Please visit us again in the future! Thanks again for staying with us during your trip to Las Vegas!

Summary Heading: Great location, close to Disneyland and reasonably priced
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights at the beginning of sep 2011. We were mainly staying in Anaheim for the theme parks. We are a family of four adults and found the motel to within walking distance from the theme parks, a bus stop which picked us up for a universal studios and hollywood tour, and many takeout convenience and souvenir shops.   The room overall was small with two queen beds, but clean and comfortable and with a reasonably fulfilling breakfast of cereals and pastries. We will stay here again if we visit Anaheim, and will recommend to our friends who are in the area.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your visit with us! Our location is perfect as you say.  It is very handy being so close to Disneyland. In just 10 minutes you are walking into the park! Taking a tour to Hollywood, Universal, Legoland, San Diego etc cound never be easier! They pick you up and bring you back right here in front of the hotel. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. It was clean, friendly and the pool was nice. The price was also great and so close to Disneyland it was perfect. AAAAA+++++
Manager Response: We are so glad you had a great time and enjoyed your stay while you were here! Being walking distance to Disneyland and the various dining establishments makes it so easy to get around doesnt it? We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Clean, quiet and comfortable.  Easy walk to Disneyland.  Cheap eats just around the corner.
Manager Response: I am glad you found our location convenient! We are only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, and close to several dining and shopping locations. Glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: We stayed here from March 13th - 16th. The morning of March 16th I woke up with bite marks all over my face, neck and arms. We looked in our bed and noticed a blood streak then a squashed bug next to it. Then we noticed blood spots all over the sheets. We pulled back the sheet and found a dead bed bug in the corner of the mattress. I counted over 80 bites on me at that time. A few days later I had over 150 bites all over my face, neck, arms, hands, and legs. We thought they only attacked me but we found out on March 21st my husband woke up with over 200 bites all over his back, hands, arms, and chest. We thought we took some home with us which we found out that we did not and we are very thankful for that. So it can take a while for the bites to show up. If we would have left a
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed here five times in the past three years and cannot fault the property, the location or the staff who work there.   The manager Peter and reception staff are always very friendly, helpful and quick to respond to any issues.  The first time we stayed there in 2008 the lock on the window wasn't working; we rang reception and within 5 minutes maintenance had arrived and fixed it - that's the only "problem" that we have had when staying there.  We found the rooms to be spacious and the standard of cleanliness has always been very good- housekeeping service the rooms daily (providing you don't put the "do not disturb" sign out) and were always happy to just replace towels if you went to see them.   The Disneyland fireworks can be viewed from one of the second levels (the
Manager Response: We are glad you had a great experience! We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: great location, wonderful staff, great value
Summary: We stayed here with our two teenagers for a visit in Disneyland, and it worked great for us! A requested by me while making the reservation they put us in adjoining rooms. We were only about a 10-15 minute walk from Disneyland, it's was great just to be in a very short walking distance from the park.We could see the park firework at closing from the balcony. The hotel staff was really kind and nice. I think that in the end the most important thing in a hotel after been clean is the quality of the staff. As for this point they got 10 out of 10.
Manager Response: We are happy that your stay was enjoyable! We look forward to your next visit with us and want to thank you for the review!

Summary Heading: Great place, great stay great vaca!
Summary: Me and my boyfriend stayed here July 28th-August 2nd. We got 2 rooms, one for us and one for my parents. The rooms were very nice, large clean and comfortable the A/C worked great. It‚Äôs a short walk to Disneyland in a safe area. My boyfriend and I would either walk there or back each day. My parents are older and have some mobility issues but even they were able to walk some days. There is a bus ART that stops right in front of the hotel every twenty minutes and takes you directly into Disney. Its 3$ per person each way or you can buy an all day pass for 4$ that lets you ride back and forth all day long. This was nice after a long day of walking at the park. The staff was very friendly and the view from our rooms was awesome! we were facing the tower of terror and were able to
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you had such a wonderful vacation! We are glad you chose us to stay with while you were here. Thanks for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great stay for what we needed.
Summary: We stayed here with friends of ours for a vacation and it worked great for us! They put us in adjoining rooms which was awesome. We were only about a 10-15 minute walk from DisneyLand! The hotel was fine for what we needed. It had working A/C, a decent bed, a nice working TV, it was quiet even though there is a party hotel right next to it! There is a 7-11 just at the end of the block and it's a great location! I would recommend it to anyone who needed something simple and clean!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you had a nice stay with us and we were accomodating to your needs! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Good option on your visit to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in July while visiting Disneyland and found this hotel to be a very good option considering the price paid, room was adequate and clean, enough parking to be hassle free (a big plus since you can leave your car during the day and just walk to the park - and thus saving 15 bucks for parking in Disney).  Front desk people were always courteous and attentive, the only issue with the hotel is the breakfast , and my issue is not so much with the content (really when you consider the price paid the selection isn't too bad: toast,  muffins, donuts, oatmeal, cereal, juice,  milk and coffe) but rather with the whole set up.  The brekfast area is very small, you have to provide your room # to obtain milk and other things from a lady that not only has trouble with
Manager Response: Our location to Disneyland is just 10 minutes away making it a great place to stay when you visit Disneyland! We are glad to know that you were happy with your visit and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: OK for the price, with some serious reservations
Summary: We stayed at this Super 8 recently while on vacation with our 18-year-old daughter and a friend of hers.  Because we arrived on the day of the infamous "L.A.. Carmaggedon" (when the 405 was closed, and L.A. locals had been advised to stay home), we whizzed through Los Angeles and actually arrived two hours before check-in time (coming from the north, I always allow two hours to make it through L.A. traffic).  The staff was really nice...they didn't have a room available for us yet, but they allowed us to park our car, and even graciously stored a musical instrument I had with me in their office so I wouldn't have to carry it around steamy Anaheim for two hours.  In fact, for the most part (exception to follow), the staff was very friendly and helpful.  The motel is nicely
Manager Response: none

Summary: Usually you get what you pay for and this Super 8 is no different.  What made it so good for us was, after a long haul flight we were able to check in at 9.00 am. sleep for a couple of hours, and then make the most of the rest of the day.  Pool was good, water a bit murky but I can put up with that because I am confident it is treated to kill al;l the germs.  Clean room, friendly and welcoming reception staff.  Water takes a long time to drain from the bath.  Location aaa+
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent value, cleanliness, location for families!!!!!
Summary: I gave this hotel 5 stars, not because it is luxurious, but is clean, affordable, and VERY family friendly.  If you are looking for a great value, you want to stay here. It is not a hotel where Egyptian cotton linens envelope the beds and lavendar aroma and robes hang from crystal towel hooks. It is clean, and very well kept.  It is a short walk to Disneyland (If you have very small children a stroller is a must by the end of the day). We parked one day, and the ammount we had to walk from the parking garage to the tram and to the front ticket booth, we should have saved our $20.00 and walked instead.  We had stayed here 12 years previously, and by some of the reviews, we wondered if it had gone down hill. It had not. It is somewhat outdated in appearance, but they have new
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: For saving money, you get what you pay for
Summary: Read many reviews for this place before booking it for out Disneyland trip in May/June. Rooms were clean nice n comfortable nothing too special especially if yours planning on being in parks all day. An easy 10-15 min walk to DL front gates (we were 2 adults only so not sure how kids will do) my only complaint is that I read many times the rooms come with a microwave & fridge this is NOT true they are both available at an additional fee. think next time we'll stay at a closer nicer hotel at DL.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean room. 15-20 minutes walking distance to Disneyland. Checked in early, no problems with that. Didn't try internet.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The first night the airconditioning did not work. So we went to another room upstairs and guess what!!! The air conditioning did not work. The maintenance guy did not speak English so we had a hot night. The next day a new air conditioner was put in. The room was dirty and the smell was unbearable we finally found out it came from bathroom plughole. So off we go to buy air freshner sprays. The breakfast is a sick joke - that's if you can get into the small breakfast room - stale donuts and 2 kinds of cereal, not worth the effort. The maids did not clean the room the whole 4 nights we spent there. Reception just said 'sorry' and do complain when you go home. The pool was small but OK. It is near Disneyland but that's why I gave the motel a star. Do not waste your money, there are
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a long 4 day weekend with friends from Vegas.   Absolutely loved this place.   Have stayed before and am never disappointed.   The staff is great and the location next to Disneyland and Gardenwalk is perfect.  Love that PF Chang and Fire and Ice are next door.  The walk to the park is a no hassle 10 minutes, but there is a bus stop right in front of the hotel if you dont want to walk.  The beds are comfortable.  You can see the fireworks from the patio if you are not at the park.  Plenty of free parking.   Will be back again for my birthday in a month!  Can't wait.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After touring the US for almost six weeks we booked in this motel for our last stop. 1. 2pm...Room one on the ground floor as requested due to disabilities...pretty good until we tried to get cool The air con was broken! 2.We were given the choice of checking out or taking an up stairs room.! 3.10.30 pm.. Room two...air conditioner was stuffed blowing out HOT air. The attitude was "tell someone who cares". 4. A new unit was installed the next day after more complaints. 5. The smell coming from this 2nd room was discusting. In summary this is a good motel which is great value for money - I'd have no hesitation in recommending

Summary Heading: The Ritz it Ain't! But you must have known that when you booked it!
Summary: okay, the carpet was vacuumed but it was still dirty.  The sheets were cleaner than the ones I got at the $400 a night Trapp Family Lodge in Stowe, VT.  The bathroom was clean.  Everything in our room worked.  At first the A/C didn't, but they sent the guy down IMMEDIATELY and he fixed it, worked fine after that.  The staff were nice.  I didn't get awakened at night by people partying.  This place is definitely a place to lay your head for rock bottom prices.  I have no complaints.  Would I want to spend a week here, no.  Was it convenient to Angels stadium and Disneyland?  Absolutely.  You could walk down the street and not fear for your life.  It was fine.

Summary: Dirt cheap motel near Disneyland. Small smelly room with old furniture and bathroom. Surprisingly nice swimming pool.  If you are on a budget then this is the place for you.

Summary: Booked the motel through an agent.  Wanted the least expensive place to stay since we would be at Disneyland all day and only sleeping in the room.  Other choice was the Red Roof Inn but it was a bit further to Disneyland than the Super 8. Room was clean but the carpet dirty and we had to wear our shoes.   -Beds were comfortable.   -Shower head was only four feet from the floor.   -Breakfest was donuts, toast, coffee, tea or hot     chocolate.   -Staff was friendly.   -Room was quiet. -TV was small. -Fridge was $5 a day extra. -Fridge and microwave was $8 a day. ------------------------------------------------------ Other things to do: Shopping The block at Orange ---  Bus to the Block at Orange ----  Orange County Market Place ---  Shopping at Coast Plaza ----  Disney Outlet

Summary: My husband & I stayed here on a 3 day mini trip to Disneyland.  I booked it for the price and because the cleanliness reviews on travelocity were the highest in this class.  I was not disappointed.  Everything was clean (except the carpet, bring slippers)!  It was a 10 - 15 minute walk to the park entrance gate from our room.  The Disneyland Resort Area Bus to/from the airport picked-up/dropped right down the street, so it was a very convenient location.  We would stay here again - however, when we bring the kids we will stay someplace closer (like The Grand Californian).  If you aren't super picky, but want a clean room for a good price, I highly recommend it!

Summary: All the hotel prices were unbearable for Sunday night due to a convention, I had booked a nicer hotel for Monday - Thursday, but needed a cheap place to crash on Sunday night.  We found Super 8 on Katella with two double beds on expedia.com for only $50.00 for Sunday night (versus the Super 8 price of $89.00 for that same room/night and other hotels were charging $150+), so we took it.  When we walked into the room, we were hit by the overwhelming smell of cat feces!  We couldn't ever locate where the smell was actually coming from, it wasn't the beds, thankfully, because we were tired and needed sleep.    We consoled ourselves with the fact that we were checking out in a few hours and heading to a nicer hotel.    The staff was alright.  The continental breakfast was OK too,

Summary: We stayed at Super 8 for three nights in August 2005. Value for money was key here, and the stay was fine. Close proximity to Disneyland, max. 15 minute walk. Staff were very friendly and gave directions and hints on our following destinations. Would not hesitate to stay here again.

Summary: After 15 hours flight from Melbourne, Australia and having pre-paid acccommodation, we were not too impresss with the 4 hour wait for our room to be ready. I can appreciate arriving at 10am was early according to their check-in policy, but I can tell you from previous visits to USA we have never had to wait for a room. What is the point of the travel agent giving your flight details to the hotel, if they don't take any notice of it?? The rooms are basic, the bathroom is tiny, but the hot water was good. A very simple hotel, and as many others have said, it is quite a walk to the resort for little kids. 7-Eleven is close by and is well stocked, so skip their complimentary breakfast and pick up some items att 7-11.

Summary: This is a motel style accomadation but for the location and cost it's a great stay just around the corner from Disneyland. It's only a 20 minute walk at most to the front gate and most of that is the outsiside of Disneyland.  The Breakfast is simple made up of Coffe, tea and Donuts and toast. The staff were helpful and will help you organise tours or show you places on a map.  We were 2 couples and were both upgraded to big rooms with 2 queen beds which were really comfortable. Summary Heading: ok but what a walk at night
Summary: We stayed here for a week it was ok but the walk from D-land after all day is quite a walk 2 1/2 blocks.  The beds were GREAT 12 inch pillow top,the rooms were clean but the carpet was dirty. Not that is showed up until you walked on it in white socks or bear feet. Summary: My 10YO myself and my sister stayed at the super 8 from the 03/10-09/10 2005.  We loved it.  I think the key to this hotel is that if you go there expecting very little you won't be disappointed.  I knew from previous reviews on this sight that we shouldn't expect the Hilton standards so we were well prepared for the dodgyest hotel on earth.  We were pleasantly surprised.  The rooms, pool and spa were clean.  The staff were OK they weren't gushing all over you trying to please or be over eager at any time but that just saved us on tipping them so that was no big deal.  They were nice enough.   This hotel is  situated in a great spot from  DL with only a 10-15 minute walk.  It also has a full laundry which was a huge bonus for anyone running out of clothes to wear! Summary Heading: Pretty Good but Would Not Return
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for one night, then moved to another hotel.  This one was OK.  THe best thing about it was how friendly and helpful the men at the front desk were.  When we got there, they were joking around and told us about some cool beaches to visit.  They set a very nice tone for our visit.  The room was just OK.  The bed was not comfortable and the floor was VERY dirty.  We had to wear sandals around the room so our feet didn't turn black.  The TV and 3 lights did not work, but they came and fixed the lights.  THe TV had bad reception.  This hotel is really cheap, which is a plus, so for the money, it's a pretty good deal, but it is pretty far from Disneyland.  You have to walk up Katella 10-15 min, but then DL is just a few minutes over on the next street.

Summary: I stayed at the Super 8 August 25-31 with my three children.  The staff was very, very nice and most helpful. There was a newspaper outside our door every morning. The A/C and television worked fine. The rooms and hotel grounds were very clean. I think for the price, this hotel was an great deal.  The only problems we had were that the continental breakfast was sadly lacking (which I know others have mentioned before me) there are glazed donuts, donuts with chocolate icing, and make your own toast. Also, travelling with small kids, I think that next time I will look for  a hotel that has a kids pool. The pool here starts at 3 feet deep (which is standard, I know). Summary: The staff was very nice, and the hotel grounds and rooms were very clean. The continental breakfast had something to be desired - In a place with alot of kids around you'd think they'd at least have Juice or something - but just Coffee, hot tea and Doughnuts.  But honestly for a budget hotel, you really can't expect anything more. The pool was great, again very very clean.  The rooms need some updating - but really if you're going to Disneyland - all you need is place to put your head at night. Summary: We just got home from staying at the Super 8 and had a lovely time. It is a budget motel, so set your expectations for that. The breakfast is very basic-toast and margarine, donuts, coffee and hot chocolate. It was enough to keep us going at Disneyland until an early lunch.
